item.text: sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gnyis pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
kya rnya? yA thA/ ba h+ya/ dang ta gA' gA' t+ya/ na na/ bad+h+yaratha'/ rgya gar skad du/ bud d+ha ka ra ya hu nA ma/ bod skad du// sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gnyis pa/ yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ dpa' bo stobs kyi rnam par gnon pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// yang gcig rdo rje 'chang chen nga// sems can kun la thugs brtse bas// ting nge 'dzin
las gnyid sad de// nyon mongs gdug rtsub mkha' 'gro'i gnas// gsang chen rol pa'i dur khrod du// yab ni gnod sbyin yag sha seng ge'i gdung// ma ni 'dod dbang lhums su
skyes// yid khros 'jigs pa'i gzugs su byas// gzhon nu dpa' bo stobs dang ldan// phyag na rdo rje bya ba ni/ sprin gyi nang nas thon nas ni// 'khor yang byang chub sems dpa'
bdun// mkha' 'gro pur na nyer bzhi dang// tshangs pa dung mgrin seng ges gdung// drang srong zla 'od gzhon nu dang// de dag 'dul ba'i yul du byas// phu sdud bye
bzhi phrag dgu dang// 'dul byed bye ba brag gnyis dang// bsdus pa a ti yo ga'i bcud// 'bum phrag gcig la sogs gsang chen rol ba'i dur khrod du gnas// tshe lo drug khri ba
yi dus// phung po lhag ma med pa ru// rim pa gnyis ldan gsang mchog tu// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// de nas dga' rab rdo rje nyid// gsang chen rol pa'i dur khrod
gnas// me ri 'bar ba'i shar phyogs su// brgyal cing smre sngags mchi ma phyung// kye ma kye hud kye ma klong// ston pa sgron ma'i 'od nub nas// ma rig mun pa gang gis sel// de

ltar smre sngags brgyal sangs nas// nam mkha'i dbyings su yar bltas pas// 'od lnga 'ja' tshon 'khrug pa'i nang// ston pa dpa' bo stobs ldan ni// phyag g.yas grub mo yar phyungs nas// rin chen shel gyi za
ma tog/ sen gang ba gcig mar la bor// dga' rab lag pa yar bzed nas// glegs bam lag pa'i mthil du babs// de nyid zhal phyes bltas pa yi// bai DUr mthing shog zhun ma la// rin chen sna lngas bris

pa snang// bltas pas dga' rab rang rgyud grol// de yi zhal chems 'di skad do// nges par sangs rgyas thob 'dod na// sngon du 'gro la rtsal nyid sbyangs// lus dang ngag dang yid gsum mo// ru shan legs par
ma phyes na/ khams gsum nyid las mi grol ba// sngon 'gro'i gnad la mkhas par bya// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'byung// thog mar dben pa'i gnas nyid du// theg pa bcu gcig dbang mchog

bskur// de nas theg pa rim gyis khrid// dang po 'jig rten lha mo'i khrid// lus kyis sngon 'gro bya ba'i phyir// rigs drug spyod pa sna tshogs spyad// skyil krung mthil par drang por srang// spyi bro thal sgyu yun du
gnas// de ltar lus kyi dub byas pas// lus bde mi rtog bar gcod zhi// zhen pa bzlog cing sdig pa 'dag/ lus nyid sprul pa'i skur grol nas// sangs rgyas sku dang gnyis su med// lhag med nyid du grol

bar 'gyur// ngag gi sngon 'gro bya ba'i phyir// rigs drug sgra skad sna tshogs brjod// zhi khro'i sgra dang 'byung ba'i sgra// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du bya// ngag ni hUM du gnas pa la// rgyas gdab pa dang
rtsal nyid 'byongs// gnyen btsal lam du zhugs pa dang// de dag rnams la ngag 'byongs pas// zhen pa log nas ngag sgrib dag/ mi rtog gnyis med longs skur grol// de rnams 'jig rten lha mi'i

khrid// legs par yang dag nyid du sbyangs// de nas lta log mu stegs khrid// rtag chad gnyis la sbyang bar bya// gcig pa nyan thos lam khrid sbyang// gnyis pa rang rgyal lam khrid kyang// gsum pa byang sems

lam khrid kyang// bzhi pa kri ya'i lam khrid kyang// lnga pa u pa'i lam khrid kyang// drug pa yo ga'i lam khrid kyang// bdun pa ma hA'i lam khrid kyang// brgyad pa a nu'i lam khrid kyang// dgu pa rdzogs chen a ti
khrid// sems kyis rtsad khungs bcad pa'i phyir// rigs drug sdug bsngal blo la blangs// 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa// kun kyang 'jig pa'i cho 'phrul sgom// de rnams sgom pa'i mkhan po ni// sems
la thug gam ma thug brtag/ sems su thug na dge sdig gang che brtag/ de nas sems 'di gang 'ding 'dra// 'dra dpe mang du bsdur bar bya// de nas lus ngag yid gsum po// gtso bo gang yin thag kyang

bcad// sems su thag chod mna' yang bskyal// de nas sems kyi byung sa btsal// ma rnyed chos kyi sku dang sprod// de nas sems kyi gnas sa btsal// ma rnyed longs spyod sku dang sprad// de nas sems kyi 'gro sa
btsal// ma rnyed sprul pa'i sku dang sprad// de ltar sems kyis sus byas pa// zhen log bar gcod zhi ba dang// sgrib pas khams gsum gos pa med// chos sku rang grol gnyis med 'da'// de nas lus ngag yid
gsum po// rnal du 'beb pa mkhas par bya// lus ngag yid gsum sor chud nas// nyams len nyid la brtson par 'gyur// de ltar sngon 'gro rdzogs byas nas// de dag blo yis bor byas te// mngon sum

gnad la phab pa'i phyir// lus ngag yid gsum bya ba spangs// ces pa'i zhal chems gnyis pa 'di// byin rlabs chen po rang babs kyi// yi ge ris su rang byung ngo// mya ngan 'das pa'i sna khrid yin// bstan pa
kun gyi bu gcig po// 'bras bu kun gyi mchog dam pa// zhal chems gnyis pa bya ba rdzogs so// skal ldan las can snying gi bu dang sprod// khros ma nag mos rgyal ba'i bka' 'di srungs
shig/ DamAnya////

rgya gar skad du/ bud d+ha b+ha ka ra ya b+he nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal chems pa gsum pa zhes bya ba/ rang grol rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can tshe lo khri tsho'i dus// srin po ru

lu'i yul du yang// pha ni rag sha khro gdungs dang// srin mo sham sham nag mo'i bu// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen ni// drang srong khros pa'i rgyal por skyes// 'khor du srin po bye ba cig/ lo ni stong phrag gnyis

bzhugs so// stag spyang 'khros pa'i ri bo la// tha mar 'da' ba'i tshul yang bstan// 'khor rnams brgyal te mchi ma phyung// kye ma kye hud kye ma klong// ston pa sgron ma'i 'od nub nas// ma rig mun pa gang gis

sel// de ltar smre sngags brgyal sangs nas// nam mkha'i dbyings su yar bltas pas// 'od lnga'i nang du ston pa byon// phyag g.yas gru mo mar phyung nas// rin chen shel gyi za ma tog/ sen gang ba cig mar la
bor// dga' rab lag pa yar bzed pas// glegs bam lag pa'i mthil du babs// de nyid zhal phyes bltas pa yi// rang byung yi ge rang shar ba// rin chen sna lngas bris pa snang// bltas pas dga' rab rang

rgyud grol// kye ma kye ma bu rnams gson// lus 'di mya ngan 'das 'dod na// sku gsum bzhugs stangs nyid la bslab// 'di ltar su yis byas pa'i mi// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi klong du mya
ngan 'das// ngag ni slob pa'i rim pa dang// gnas pa bstan cing la yang bzla// de las mi 'da' sus byas pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi klong du mya ngan 'das// bya ba dgu 'phrugs
dag tu btang// sems gnad gzigs stangs gsum bcun te// yul gnad nam mkha' skyen bral sgo// gnad bzlog phab la zur gyis lta// sgron ma bzhi ldan 'bral mi bya// rlung gnad shin tu dal la
bslab// de ltar gnad gsum gzigs pa yis// sku gsum rig pa stong par 'char// lug rgyud rig pa btson du bzung// mngon sum gnad mthong phyir mi zlog/ chos 'di mngon sum snang ba'i sa// yid spyod
'dzin pa'i lta ba nub// nyams snang gong 'phel rnam gnyis kyis// bar do'i ye shes mngon sum gsal// rig pa tshad la phebs pa yis// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ngos zin// chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba
yis// rdzogs chen bya bral 'bras bu thob// 'di ltar snang bzhi mthar phyin nas// myang 'das btsal du med pa'o// mi 'gul gsum la gzhi bcas nas// sdod pa gsum gyis tshad bzung bas// rtags ni lus
ngag yid la 'byung// thob pa gsum gyis gzer thebs so// de las bstan du med do sa ma ya// bar do ma bu gnyis sbyor bas// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po
'od gsal ba// zhi khro rang snang dkyil 'khor gsal// 'di ni rang rig 'od snang ste// gnyis med gnyis su med pa ru// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// skad cig gcig gis bye brag
phyed// sems kyis skad cig don kun rig/ bde chen gzhi 'o mi 'gyur bas// dpag med mda' ltar slar mi zlog/ mi 'gyur gser gyi thur ma bzhin// rang snang nyid du thag chod cig/ dus gsum sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi snying po bu gcig po// rin chen zhu ba'i khu bas bris// legs par dril la mchan khung bcug/ bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs// su yis byas pa grol bar nges// 'ja' 'od sgra

dang sa g.yos dang// sad ser mu ge 'byung ba'i tshe// phyogs dang mthun pa'i lce yis klag/ stong gsum sprul pa'i sangs rgyas la// yon phul bas kyang stobs che'o// 'di nyid bstan pa'i srog yin no// lnga ldan bu
la rims kyis ston// sngags kyi srungs mas srungs cig/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ thasbya mya////

rgya gar skad du/ bud d+ha ka ra ya/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal chems// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen nga// stag spyad ri la ting nge 'dzin// lo lnga 'brug gam gnyis bzhugs so// de nas 'gro ba'i don

la bzhengs// tshe lo lnga stong thub pa'i dus// lho phyogs bya rgod phung po'i ri// nyan thos rnams dang yid 'dres phyir// rgyal po dzA zhes bya ba'i khab// lho phyogs rgyang grag gcig gi sa// pha ni rgyal po seng ge
bzang// ma ni mdzes ma 'od ldan 'bum// ting nge 'dzin las sku 'khrungs pa// gser 'od dam pa bya bar grags// nyan thos rnam pa'i gdung ba gcad// glegs bam zhu ma 'di gtad do// e ma ho// skad cig
rdzogs sangs rgyas 'dod na// lus ngag yid gsum bya ba btang// shes pa rtse gcig drang lus gcun// 'phro 'du byung na de nyid lta// byung gnas 'gro gsum brtags pas shes// 'dug stangs gsum dang ldan pa
na// dbyings kyis nang na 'od kyis khyim// 'gyur de ye mnyam chen po ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// byas pa med par ye mnyam gnas// 'di nyid su yi rtogs pa'i mi// rang rig ngo bo rtogs

pa'o// sho lo ka ni bdun pa 'di// thugs rje dran sangs rgyas pa ste// skal ldan bu la rims kyis gtod// skal med rnams la ma nye zhig/ sngags kyi srungs mas thub par srungs// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ gter rgya/
sbas rgya/ dam rgya'o//// rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha d+harma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig/ de nas tshe lo stong tsho'i dus// sog po g.yu yi gnas mchog tu// byang chub

snying po'i shing la brten// brtsegs pa blo gros bya bar skyes// lo ni brgya dang nyi shu ru// byang sems dpag med 'khor gyis bskor// kun byed rgyal po khu byug rol// chos sde mang du gsungs nas kyang// rgyal po

dzA yi khang bzangs kyi// byang gi phyogs su mya ngan 'das// dza yi khang stengs zhag bdun du// dam pa chos kyi char pa bab// rgyal po dgyes te gsol ba btab// gzi yi phyag rdor gru gang ba// nam mkha' dbyings
nas 'di skad gsungs// kye kye rgyal po chen po nyon// chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med pas// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes bsgom// chos rnams dngos por gzung med pas// gzung 'dzin med pa'i 'du shes
bsgom// chos rnams rang bzhin ltar med pas// gsal stong dag pa'i 'du shes bsgom// chos rnams rang bzhin bsgom med pas// dmigs gtad bral ba'i 'du shes bsgom// chos rnams rang bzhin phyogs
med pas// blo 'dzin dag pa'i 'du shes bsgom// chos rnams rang bzhin rgyus med pa// bya btsal bral ba'i 'du shes bsgom// de skad zhal chems bzhi pa bab// rgyal po gzung 'dzin rang sar grol// gser
'od brtsegs pa blo gros kyis// zhal chems rdo rje'i tshig drug gsungs// skal ldan bu la rims kyis gtad do// sngags kyi srungs mas 'di srungs cig/ s+ya mya ya////

rgya gar skad du/ sa tha ta thA g+ha b+h+ya/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i bcud/ tshe lo lnga brgya pa yi tshe// bya rgod spungs pa'i ri bo ru// ston pa 'od srungs bgres po
la// 'khor du dgra bcom bdun gyis bskor// thog ma'i sangs rgyas rab bdun dang// dkyil 'khor gcig bsdus 'khor yin pas// la bya nyon mongs gcad bya'i phyir// nges pa don gyis chos rnams
gsung// 'das pa'i tshul yang bstan pa'i tshe// gdul bya dgra bcom 'khor rnams la// gdung ba bcad tshig 'di gsungs so// e ma chos sgo bsam yas kun// 'di la ma 'dus gang yang med// 'jig rten
'khrul pa'i blo rings stungs// kun kyang mi rtag 'gyur 'chi bsam// rgyus pas las kyis rnam dbye gsal// gdungs pas gsol pa drag tu btab// lus ngag yid gsum ru shan dbye// mi 'gyur lhun grub ma

zhen zhog/ shes rab rang byung sgron ma yis// chos sku ngo bo gcig tu bsdud// rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma yis// rig pa ye shes 'char sgo byed// dag pa dbyings kyi sgron ma yis// rig pa 'od sku 'char gzhi
byed// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma yis// sna tshogs 'od lnga rang gis mdangs// rtsal rdzogs chos tshig zad par byed// dbyings 'di rig pa'i yul yin no// snang ba mi 'gag lhug par
'char// 'khor 'das shan 'byed rnal du dbab// de nas dbyings rig snang ba brtag/ 'di la goms pa'i tshad rnyed nas// phyi rol snang ba thams cad ni// gong nas gong du yar mched nas// rims kyis goms

nas chos zad de// zag bcas rang dengs 'khor dongs sprugs// ces gsungs nas 'ja' 'od du yal lo// sngags kyi srungs mas srungs cig/ s+ya mya ya/ rba d+h+ya d+ba//// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha d+ha a k+She baM/ bod skad
du/ thems/ tshe lo sum brgya pa yi dus// rdo rje gdan gyi 'byung gnas su// yab ni bram ze mtshan bzang dang// yum ni dge slong pad+ma lcam// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen nga// mngon
rdzogs rgyal po bya bar 'khrungs// 'khor ni rigs gsum mgon po la// yang dag don gyi chos rnams bshad// de nas mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe// gdung ba bcad tshig 'di babs so// e ma rigs gsum sprul
'khor rnams// gsang sngags kun gyis yang gsang gnad// lus ngag yid gsum bya ba ni// dgu phrug dag tu gtang bar bya// lus ngag 'dug stangs bcu gcig gzir// sgo sa gnad phabs zlog zur gyis
lta// rlung gnad shin tu dal la bslab// rkyen bral gsum gyi dag dbyings la// lu gu rgyud kyis ra ba dang// 'ja' 'od sku thig zer du 'khrigs// sna tshogs gzugs can de bzhin gshegs// nam mkha' khyab
par gar byed pa// yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das// sprin bral nam mkha' dngas pa la// zim bus su rgya blta bar bya// nyin mtshan dbang po ar la gtad// zla ba dgu gsum bdun drug la// mngon sum

gong 'phel tshad phebs te// phung po rang dengs chos zad do// bstan pa kun gyi snying khu 'di// rin chen zhu ba'i khu bas bris// mgul du btags pas phyi nang grol// skal ldan bu la rims kyis gtod// s+ya mya ya/
sku gsung thugs kyi rgya dam po yod do// TA Taka tha T+wa ra TaM ba Ta////

rgya gar skad du/ rad na ti la/ bod skad du/ rin chen thig le/ tshe lo brgya pa'i tshe// ba ra na se'i gnas mchog tu// drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen nga// ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes// 'khor du lnga sde bzang

pos bskor// drang nges gnyis kyi chos 'khor bskor// nub phyogs bya rgod phung po'i ri// rdo rje gdan du byang chub gnas// byang chub shing la sku rgyab gtad// srod la bdud kyi dpung rnams btul// nam phyed ting

'dzin mnyam par bzhugs// skya rengs dang po shar ba la// nga ni mya ngan 'das tshul bstan// 'di yang gang zag rtag mtha' gsal// tshe stod 'khor 'das ru shan phye// bar du snang bzhi nyams su blangs// tshe smad
chos zad mngon sangs rgyas// spur khang nang nas sku stod phyung// 'khor tshogs gdung ba gcad pa'i phyir// kun dga'i lag tu glegs bam bab// bltas pas rigs drug dong sprug go/ e ma phyi rabs rigs kyi
bu// yon tan gsum ldan bla ma tshol// nyams myong yid ches mched grogs tshol// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas nyid du// rnam snang chos bdun lus gnad bca'// snang ba sems yin bum dbang thob// sems

nyid rang stong gsang dbang thob// stong pa mtha' khrol sher dbang thob// ngo bo mnyam nyid tshig dbang thob// rang rig sku gsum rjen pa 'di// snying gi dkyil nas lhang nge gnas// rig pa ye shes 'od po che// rgyu
rkyen 'bras bu rtags dus su// byung gnas 'gro gsum med pa ru// stong gsal ma 'gags zangs thal le// snang ba dngos bzung med pa ste// stong ni dbyings dang kha dog bral// gsal ba gzhi 'gyu'i snang ba
gsal// ma 'gag rig rtsal sna tshogs 'char// yod do snyam na bzung bcangs bral// med do snyam na 'khor 'das gsal// bcos bslad med par zang thal le// 'gag bsgrub med par yang khrol la// re

dogs med par bde khril li// gshis lug ngang na dang sang nge// rig pa 'dzin med chos kyi sku// rig pa kun gsal longs spyod rdzogs// rig pa kun 'char sprul pa'i sku// rig pa skye med klong dkyil du// phyi

nang gsang ba'i chos rnams 'du// chu rnams rgya mtshor 'dus dang mtshungs// 'dzin med skye med rang sar grol// rtog med mnyam nyid rig pa'i sku// bzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra// rig pa'i sku ni bum sku
'dra// ye shes bum nang mar me 'dra// e ma/ 'dzin med rang la mdangs// bcos pa med pa'i ngang la zhog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni// rang gi snying gi dkyil du zhog/ cang med dngos po'i rang gzugs

kun// nam mkha' stong pa'i dkyil la sbos// gsang sngags kun gyi lta phug ni// sgron ma bzhi la ma yengs stems// rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po ni// lu gu rgyud du shes par bya// rang grol chen po'i lta stangs
ni// seng ge lta bur shes par bya// gzhi khreg chod kyis 'khor 'das grol// lam thod brgal rtsal sku gsum rgyas// brgyad khri bzhi stong tshig brjod rnams// 'khrul pa'i steng du yang rtse
mnan// drang po'i sems can blo bsgyur rtsam// nges par 'di la gdeng chos cig/ ces gsungs nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// dus gcig la 'dzam bu'i gling du mchod rten bye ba rang 'khrungs
so// skal ldan las can cig la gtod cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgya yod do// rgyal ba dgongs pa brgyud pa'i// zhal chems rjes dgongs nyams bstan pa kun gyi thugs bcud do// s+ya mya ya////
rgya gar skad du/ h+ya k+ShoM sa b+h+ya/ bod skad du/ rigs 'dzin gyi 'das rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kun snang bcos bsdud dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// kun bzang chos sku'i glong las ni// 'gag

med zhi khro rdor 'chang sprul// sku yi mdzad pa bcu gnyis dang// phyi nang gi mdzad pa bcu gnyis dang// thugs kyis mdzad pa bcu gnyis dang// mdzad pa sum cu so drug rnams// ston pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa'i

dus// rigs 'dzin dga' rab rdo rje nyid// 'khor gyi dam par sku 'khrungs te// mdzad pa'i chos rnams thugs su chud// de lta bu yi rigs 'dzin bdag/ chos kyi bde ba'i lhums su zhugs// prad dz+nya b+ha b+ha zhes

su grags// ri bo nyi ma snang byed du// lo ni nyi shu sgom tshul bstan// lo ni sum cu rtsa gnyis nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i chos rnams ni// ma la ya yi rtse mo ru// rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma// 'dzin med

bde ba'i rol chen dang// bde byed ser mo zhes bya dang// rig 'dzin brgya dang gsum po yis// rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po ni// sho lo kha ni 'bum phrag drug/ bcu phrag rtsa bzhi yi ger btab// bsil ba tshal

gyi dur khrod du// shes rab gdul byar gyur pa yi// mkha' 'gro drangs las 'das pa la// gu lang bdun bur chos bshad do// bstan pa dam pa rgyas par byas// de nas chu bo dan ti g+hor// zag bcas phung po mi
snang bar// zag med sgyu ma gzugs kyi sku// nam mkha'i 'od kyi bkang nas gshegs// de dus 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis// gdung ba'i smre sngags mchi ma phyung// de tshe nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas// rang
byung rang shar tshig 'di grags// zhal chem tshig gsum gnad rig zhes// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen nyid la bab// de yi zhal tshig 'di ltar ro// olha/ rang rig rtogs pa'i gdeng la phyag 'tshal lo// yin pa

grub pa med pa'i rig pa 'di// rang snang shar tshul cir yang ma 'gag pas// snang srid thams cad chos sku'i zhing du shar// shar ba de nyid rang gis thog tu grol// grol tsam nyid nas skye 'gag gnyis su
med// gnyis med mtha' grol sku gsum rang chas so// a a a/ ngo rang thogs su sprad/ thag cig thog tu chod/ gdengs grol thog tu bca'/ de ltar tshig gsum gnad gdegs la// dgongs pa

rnam pa du ma shar// 'jam dpal nyid kyis gsol btab pas// zhal chems pa ni 'di ltar grags// ngo ni rang thog sprad pa yi// chos nyid ngo bo rjen par mthong// yid spyod blo yi the tshom khrol// thag rnams
gcig thog bcad pa yis// dngos po'i chos rnams Da h+yo// snang nyams shes nyams gong du 'phel// rang snang gcig chod nyid du grol// gdeng bzhi grol thag bcad pa yin// 'khrul snang zhing khams nyid du
rgyas// rig pa rnams kyang srang la thebs// tshad med chos nyid rang sar grol// tshig gsum 'brel pa don 'brel dgu/ rnal 'byor rnams kyis thugs la sbos// sa ma ya/ d+ha thim/ zhal chems gsum pa'i 'di
ltar grags// ngo bo'i chos rnams stong par shes par gyis shig/ thugs rje'i chos rnams ma 'gag par shes par gyis shig/ rang bzhin gyi chos rnams gsal bar shes par gyis shig/ lta ba'i chos rnams thag
chod cig/ sgom pa'i chos rnams phur tshug gcig/ med pa'i chos rnams la zlos cig/ gzhi yi chos rnams dmigs gtad dang phrol cig/ lam gyi chos rnams blo 'dzin dang phrol cig/ 'bru'i chos rnams re dog
dang phrol cig/ snang ba'i chos rnams gtad med du thong zhig/ bden pa'i chos rnams bden med du thong zhig/ nga bdag gi chos rnams snang med du thong zhig/ nga sod/ bdag slogs/ 'khor 'das thams cad
gzhi med rtsa bral thong zhig/ ces gsungs nas nam mkha' la rang bzhin gyis yal lo// dga' rab rdo rje'i zhal chems tshig gsum gnad du gdeg pa zhes bya ba/ zhal chems gsum pa zhes bya ba rdzogs
so// s+ya mya ya/ gza' bdud rgyal pos bka' 'di srungs cig/ s+ya mya ya/ rgyu rgyu rgyi/ gter brgya/ zab brgya de rgya'o// // // bcom ldan 'das rang byung gi rig pa la phyag
'tshal lo// rdo rje gdan gyi nub phyogs su// rim pa gnyis pa grong khyer du/ yab ni bram ze legs ldan te// yum ni snang la sgrol ma'i bu// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen chen po ni// dur khrod so sa gling du
bzhugs// sing ha nyid la gdams pa gtad// so sa'i gling du 'od lus yal// de dus sing has smre sngags bton// de tshe nam mkha'i dbyings rum du// gdung ba gcad phyir zhal chems ni// dgongs nyams drug
pa zhes byar grags// de yi dgongs tshig 'di ltar ro// e ma ho/ bdag 'dzin rtsa ba bcad nas/ byung gnas 'gro gsum gtor gzhig byed rigs pas brtags pas rang rig rjen par bud// rjen pa de nyid
bltas pas bdag 'dzin rtog pa bral// rtog bral ngang la gnas pas stong ngal sgo lnga bye/ sgo lnga rang lugs bzhags pa chos nyid ma dang mjal// de la goms pa'i skyes bus sku gsum 'bras
bu thob// 'khor 'das shan 'byed tshig drug dgongs nyams dang po'i// rang rig bdag tu med pa'i rig stong rjen pa 'di// stong gdangs ma 'gags rang bzhin ngang las gnyis med gsal// ji ltar gsal
yang stong gsal gnyis med nyag gcig go/ nyag gcig 'khor 'das kun gyis gzhi lam 'bras bu gnas// de shes ye shes chen po lnga dang ldan// chen po lnga dang nyag gcig thig le lnga rdzogs so// tshig drug

dgongs nyams gnyis pa'o// s+ya/ rig stong sku la gsal zhing 'gyur ba med// stong pa mi 'gyur chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu'o// gsal ba mi 'gyur nyi zla gza' bral lta bu'o// thugs rje kun la khyab cing don
la 'gyur ba med// stong pa gsal la ma 'gags sna tshogs cir yang don mi 'gyur// rang byung rang shar rang grol rang rig rang sar rdzogs so// tshogs drug dgongs nyams gsum pa'o// gzhi rang bab rang
lugs bzhag pa dgongs pa'i gnad// spyod pa dran 'dzin dang bral ba dgongs pa'i gnad// tshogs drug dgongs nyams bzhi pa'o// nyon mongs rnam rtog gi rtsa ba skyang 'ded du thong// rig pa rang thogs su

grol ba dgongs pa'i gnad// sgom nyams snang gis rtag tshad rgya mtsho ru sbos// nang ye shes kyis sgron chen nam mkha' la khyogs// bar grul bum gyis bru gu grag bar du gsol// rang rig chos nyid du grol ba

dgongs pa'i gnad do// dgongs nyams lnga pa'o// mi dge rgyab tu bor na dge ba rang kha la/ 'khrul ba'i de nyid rtog na chos can rang sar grol// ngar 'dzin 'gong po thul na byang chub tshul mi dgos// gang yang
gzung 'dzin med na 'khrul pa ka nas dag/ chos rnams rgyud thog khal na chos can stubs// de las bslab rgyud med na dbyings las 'das// tshig drug dgongs nyams drug pa'o// tshig bar sum cu so drug
yod// zhal chems dgongs nyams drug pa 'di// zab phyir gter du sbas pa'o// phyi rabs las can bu dang sprod// s+ya mya ya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gza'i rgyal pos thub par srungs cig//
snang ba bkod pa'i zhing khams na// ma bkod rigs pa'i rang snang sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lo ni sum brgya nyer lnga na// s+yaMr gyi me tog pad gling la// 'jam dpal dpal bzangs rdzus

te 'khrungs// rdzogs chen 'bum phrag drug cu bzhi/ khyad par yang tig srog tig rnams// u rgyan pad+ma nyid la gtad// dur khrod 'jag ma'i gling gong du// phung po lhag med rang yal lo// pad+mas gdung ba'i smre
sngags rdungs// 'od kyis nang nas 'di skad shar// kye ma kye ma rigs ldan nyon// gsang sngags a ti 'di ltar spyod// zhal chems bzhag thabs bzhi la nyon// lus 'di bzhugs stangs gsum la gzhag/ ngag
bslab gnas dang la zla'o// yid ni gzeg bral ngang bzhag gdung ba'o// nang dbyings rgyang zhags lam la bzhag/ phyi dbyings lu gu rgyud la bzhag/ gnyis po dril la thig ler bzhag/ thig le dmigs gtad
bral bar bzhag/ gnyis pa'o// skyes gnas bar dor cig chod bzhag/ chos nyid bar dor rang snang bzhag/ srid pa bar dor rang log gzhag/ gzhag thabs bzhi pa rdzogs so//// gsang sngags gsang
ba'i yang gnad rnams// bzhag tshigs 'di las ma 'dus med// nyams su long zhig phyi rabs rnams// lnga ldan bu la 'di gtod cig/ s+ya mya ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya////

thig le nyag cig ngang du phyag 'tshal lo// rgya nag sho sha'i gling zhes par/ khyim bdag dge ba'i ming can du// rnam snang mkhyen la gnyis bu de// slob dpon shi ri sid+ha de/ mkhas par sbyangs pa'i don

dang ldan// 'khor ni rig ldan bsam mi khyab// rigs 'dzin u rgyan ye shes mdo// b+hi ma la mi tra b+ho te dang// mkhas pa'i thugs sras bzhi 'dzom ste// don rgyud rigs 'dzin gsum la snang// dpe rgyud b+he ro
nyid la snang// byang chub 'byung bar byed pa yi// shing drung lo brgya nyi shu bzhugs// de nas li yul lam khar 'das// thugs sras bzhi la gzer 'di gdab// le lo can snyoms las su mi 'gro ba mngon sum
gnyis gnad// mngon sum ltar snang du mi gel ba khred chod kyis gzer// chos rnams bzang rtogs su ma lus thags chod kyis gzer// ngan rtog the tshom du ma shor ba rtags tshad kyis gzer// gnyis snang
gnyis med du ma lus pa zhen med kyis gzer// zangs du 'dug pa rang grol gyi gzer// gzer bu bdun gyis dgongs pa 'di// bai ro'i lag tu bab pa yi// skal ldan las can cig dang 'phrad par
shog/ gza' bdud kyi rgyal pos srungs cig/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya////
thig me mnyam rdzogs ngang du phyag 'tshal lo// u rgyan yul 'khrungs bad la'o// las smon dag pas sing ha mjal// thugs rje'i stobs kyi bstan pa a ti bab// gdul bya'i stobs kyis bod du
'ong/ kha ba can rnams bde la bkod/ khri srong lde btsan bsam pa bsgrubs// sa 'og sa bla gter gyis bkang// brgya dang bcu gcig bod yul bsdad// nga ni srin po'i yul du 'gro/ bai ro nyid la gdams pa
gtad// chos rnams thams cad gcig tu dril// myong ba'i steng du rdo rus gtug/ zhal thems dus su zhun thag chod// yid kyis snang ba'i yul la bslad// gzugs kyis rig pa'i mdangs ma shigs// rtogs

pas rtogs pa'i dri ma khrus// stong pa skye med cig chod so// bdag 'dzin bral ba'i lung steng na// zhen 'dzin bral ba'i lus bor la// brtag spyad bral bar lam mer zhog/ rang mdangs nam mkha'i dbyings su
shar// mu ti rma bya dra ba ris// nyi zla gza' skar 'ja' tshon ris// rig pa'i rang sku brjod las 'das// yo ga bdun gyi lus spur la// snang ba bzhi yi zag bcas yal// 'di las med do tsit+ta thim// zhes
gsungs so// slob dpon srin yul bzhud// sho lo ka ni bzhi pa 'di// u rgyan dgongs pa'i zhal chems so// rtags kyi rtags kyis ngo bo 'phrod// sgom gyis bsgom gyis don khrol lo// gza' bdud kyi rgyal pos
srungs la// skal ldan bu la rim gyis gtod// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya//// rigs 'dzin rnams kyi zhal chems so// dbang ldan mngon sum ye babs klong la phyag

'tshal lo// bai ro tsa na mkhas pa ngas// blo 'das rin chen gter du gdam// rgya nag yul du 'gro ba'i tshe// zhal chems lhugs pa 'di bzhag go/ ho ji ltar ling bkan chos mang kyang// 'du shes ma zad blo ris
yin// chos zad klong du la zlos cig/ ji ltar tshig brjod thams cad kun// rtog pa ma zad sna khrid bo// brjod med ngang du la zlos cig/ ci ltar dmigs gtad bskyed rdzogs kun// bzang rtog phyogs rer
bstan pa tsam// dmag de klong du la zlog cig/ ci ltar byed spyod thams cad kun// nyon mongs gnyen por bstan pa tsam// spang blang bral bar la zlos cig/ sgo gsum khreg chod zab lags kyang// rlung sems
btson bzung bstan pa tsam// seng glang drang srong la zlos cig/ 'di ltar lta stangs brjod 'das kyang// rnam rtog 'gyu rlungs bzung ba tsam// zlog gam zur gyis la zlos cig/ 'di ltar sems 'dul khrims

mang kyang// yid spyod phyug mdzod smon dang mtshungs// yul gyis ye shes mngon sum ltos// e ma lus ma 'gul/ ngag ma smra/ sems mi spro/ yul nam mkha'/ byad mig 'bral/ khyug ge bring ngo// lam me/ lhang
nge/ khrol le/ shig ge rtog med du rjen ne/ phaT a/ hring hring hring/ e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ yang tig srog gi bcud thig rnams// gcig tu dril te yi ger btab// ma 'ongs don du gter du
stam// phyi ma dad pa shes rab can// 'jam dpal ci nas phyag rdor gyis// sprul pa 'byung gis 'phrad par shog/ rdo rje legs pas bka' 'di srungs/ s+ya mya ya/ a ti bla na med pa bstan pa'i snying/ mkha'

'gro'i srog skal ldan gyi nor/ don gyi mchog klong chen srog thig bya ba rdzogs so// rgya rgya rgya/ kha tham/ Ta bai ro tsa nas spre lo spre'i zla'i tshes bcu'i snga dro 'ching phu'i yang dben du/ chu shog rin chen zer 'phro la

bris///// rgyu rgyu rgyu/ gter brgya/ sbas brgya/ zab brgya de rgya'o//// u rgyan gyi skad du/ thArbAnya khwaswam na baT banang mang \u0f7f bod skad du/ bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das bde chen dri med 'od mi 'gyur ba
la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i ston pa/ gnas chos nyid mnyam nyid kyi pho brang na/ rang lus sprul pa'i 'khor tshogs

rnams dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la dus gsum bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang nas/ rang byung thugs rje ye shes rtsal langs nas/ gus pa'i lus/
snyan pa'i ngag/ dang ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la/ 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ bcom ldan dpal chen bde ba che// byang sems bla ma'i ting 'dzin de// ma
rtogs skyon ni ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs pa'i yon tan gang ltar 'byung// sems nyid bla ma ji ltar byon// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku chos kyi dbyings
las ma g.yos pa'i/ gsung ci yang mi 'byon pa'i tshul gyis/ thugs rtog pa med pa'i ngang nas dgyes bzhin du/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rang byung rang sems 'khor// byang sems bla ma'i ting 'dzin de// ma
rtogs skyon ni sems can 'gyur// rtogs pa'i yon tan sangs rgyas 'byung// sangs rgyas kun bdag bla ma yin// bla ma rang byung ye shes so// zhes gsungs so// de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol

ba/ e ma bcom ldan bde ba chen po la sogs/ byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// rtogs dang ma rtogs mtshan nyid gang// de don ston pa'i bla ma de// rang byung nyid du ji ltar 'byon// de don rgyas par bshad du
gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// chos nyid dbyings kyi nam mkha' la// de nyid rang rtsal ma 'gags pas// sprin bzhin bde gsal mi rtog gsum// rang
bzhin byang chub sems su shar// sems la nga bdag gzung ba yis// dus gsum shar nas gzhan du 'phrul// chags sdang rmongs pas khams gsum du// sems can lus ngag yid gsum

grub// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal byung ba yin// sems la bdag tu ma gzung bar// 'dzin med rang sar spyod pa yis// rang shar rang grol lhun grub tu// sprul sku longs sku chos sku'o// bde chen sangs rgyas 'byung

ba yin// sangs rgyas bla mas bstan pas byung// bla ma med pa'i gong rol tu// sangs rgyas bya ba'i byung sa med// thog ma'i sangs rgyas bla ma yin// bla ma sems las rang byung yin// sems nyid don gyi bla ma

yis// nang gi rang sems chos skur bstan// chos sku snang ba mtha' yas yin// sems nyid brda yi bla ma yin// phyi rol snang ba sprul skur bstan// sprul sku pad+ma thod 'phreng rtsal// sems nyid ye shes bla ma
yis// bar gyi rlung rig longs skur bstan// longs sku thugs rje chen po yin// sems nyid lhan skyes bla ma yis// nang rig sems gsum dbyer med bstan// bde chen 'od mi 'gyur ba yin// bla ma rang byung
sangs rgyas te// kun gyi bdag nyid ni 'dod pa'i don grub nor gyi mchog/ dug lnga nad sel sman gyi mchog/ thar bar 'dren pa skyabs kyi mchog/ 'khor ba las grol gru yi mchog/ ma rig mun sel sgron me
mchog/ bdag gzhan don grub dam pa'i mchog/ bde legs kun mdzad gter gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun 'byung pha yi mchog/ 'gro kun skyong ba ma yi mchog/ theg pa kun ston chos kyi mchog/ bar chad kun
sel srung ba'i mchog/ 'brel tshad don ldan byin rlabs mchog/ ya mtshan dngos grub ngo mtshar mchog/ gang la gang 'dul yi dam mchog/ las rnams kun grub chos skyong mchog/ thams cad bla ma mchog las

byung// bla ma kun byung kun mkhyen yin// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas so// gdod nas yin te glo bur min// rang byung yin te bcos ma yin// lhun grub yin te 'gyur ldog med// sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa

yin// zhes bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ gleng gzhi gleng bslangs bla ma byon tshul gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol ba/ e ma/
bcom ldan bde ba chen po la// rang byung sku gsum bla ma de// ma rtogs 'khrul ba'i sems can gyis// sku gsum bla ma ji ltar sgrub// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la ston// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// rang byung sku gsum bla ma de// ma rtogs 'khrul ba'i sems can gyis// gzhan nas bsgrubs pas mi 'grub 'khrul// rang sems bla mar bsgrubs pa yin// sems can sangs rgyas snying po
can// sku gsum bla ma'i ngo bos khyab// yin kyang bdag 'dzin sgrib pa yis// bla ma dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas dang// 'bral med gnas kyang ma rtogs pas// bdag med rang grol sku thob

phyir// thog ma'i sangs rgyas bla ma la// rang sems sku gsum smin pa yis// gzhi la byin rlabs rjes snang zhu// da lta'i bla ma sangs rgyas kyis// rang sems sku gsum ngo bo ru// lam gyi sgrub thabs nyams su

blang// ma 'ongs bla ma sangs rgyas su// sku gsum grub pa'i 'bras bu de// rjes kyi yan lag rtsal sbyangs te// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum// dus gsum sku gsum dbyer med du// sangs rgyas thog ma tha
ma med// ye shes mig gcig dri med gsal// bde ba chen por dngos sangs rgyas// sku gsum 'gro don lhun gyis grub// ces bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rang sems bla
mar bsgrub pa'i mdo byang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol ba/ e ma/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags/ ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i sems can la// gzhi la sku
gsum ji ltar gnas// thog mar bla ma'i byin rlabs kyis// gzhi las lam du ji ltar smin// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can ma
lus thams cad la// kun gzhi byang chub sems las byung// byang chub sems la sku gsum gyi// ngo bo ye nas lhun grub tu// sems nyid mi rtog chos skur gnas// sems nyid bde ba longs skur gnas// sems
nyid gsal ba sprul skur gnas// sku gsum bla ma'i dgongs pa de// sems kyis khyab tshad kun la khyab// ye nas 'bral med gnas gyur kyang// de nyid ma shes glo bur gyis// mkha' la sprin gyis bsgribs pa
ltar// bdag 'dzin zhan pas ma rig 'khrul// dug gsum spyad pas khams gsum 'khor// de nyid gzung 'dzin gsal ba na// rang sems sku gsum bla ma ru// na bun sangs pa'i nam mkha' ru// sngon du lhag
gis smin nas 'ong// de phyir bdag 'dzin grol nas su// snang rig sems gsum bdag med du// sku gsum lhun grub bde ba che// rang rig rang dbang bskur ba yis// rang dbang sems la thob pa na// 'dus
byas rdzas dang dkyil 'khor gyis// kun rdzob mchog dbang bskur mi dgos// bskur yang rig pa'i dbang mi thob// 'on kyang mos pa'i rten 'brel gyis// thun mong byin rlabs 'byung ba srid// yang dag sku
gsum mi rtogs pas// thog mar rig pa rtsal dbang bstan// sbyor dngos rjes gsum byin gyis rlobs// sbyor ba slob mas bla ma la// chos kyi sku ru mos byas la// rang sems chos skur ma rtogs pas// gti
mug 'khor bar 'khyams pa yis// sdug bsngal sems can snying re rje// de rnams chos sku thob par bya// snyam du mos pa'i sems bskyed kyis// phyag 'tshal me tog gtor byas la// rnam dag chos

dbyings pho brang du// skye med chos sku'i bla ma la// bdag nyid gus pas gsol ba 'debs// ma rig gti mug rang grol nas// rang byung ye shes lhun grub tu// chos sku'i byin brlabs dbang bskur zhu/ zhes pas
gsol ba lan gsum gdab// dngos gzhi bla mas slob ma la// ma yengs sems nyid rtse gcig la// rang byung chos sku'i dbang 'di bskur// chos sku'i pho brang chos kyi dbyings// cir yang ma grub yangs pa'i

klong// chos kyi sku ni spros dang bral// gcig tu ma grub gnyis su med// kun la khyab pa'i thugs rje can// ngo bo nyid du lhun grub 'dis// sems nyid chos skur dbang bskur ro// de bzhin nyid du byin gyis

rlobs/ khyod kyi sems nyid de ltar yin// rang sems chos sku'i dbang thob 'gyur// zhes pas chos sku'i dbang bskur la// rjes snang rang sems chos skur sgrub// chos sku'i rang rtsal longs sku'i dbang// rang
rig nyid la smin bya'i phyir// sbyor ba slob bus bla ma la// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i mos byas la// rang rig longs skur ma rtogs pas// 'dod chags srid pas 'khor bar 'khyams// 'dod log sems can
snying re rje// de rnams longs skur thob par byed// snyam du 'jug pa'i sems skyed kyis// phyag btsal me tog gtor byas la// gsal dag bde chen pho brang du// ma 'gags longs sku'i bla ma la// bdag nyid
gus pas gsol ba 'debs// 'dod chags zhen pa rang grol nas// rang rig ye shes rang grol du// longs sku'i byin brlabs dbang bskur zhu// zhes gsol ba lan gsum gdab// dngos gzhi bla mas slob ma
la// ma yengs yid kyis rtse gcig la// rang gsal longs sku'i dbang 'di bskur// longs sku'i pho brang bde ba can// zhing khams rnam dag bsam mi khyab// longs spyod rdzogs sku gsal la stong// dngos por
ma grub bzung du med// kun tu snang ba'i dal can la// rang byung ye shes gsal mdangs 'dis// rang rig longs skur dbang bskur ro// de bzhin nyid du byin gyi rlobs/ khyod kyi rlung rigs de bzhin
yin// rang rig longs skur rang dbang thob// ces pas longs sku'i dbang bskur la// rjes snang rang rig longs skur bsgrubs// longs sku'i rnam 'phrul sprul sku'i dbang// rang snang nyid las smin bya'i

phyir// sbyor ba slob bus bla ma la// sprul pa'i sku ru mos byas la// sdang sems gnyis snang 'khor bar 'khyams// log rtog sems can snying re rje// de rnams sprul skur thob par bya// snyam du don dam sems
bskyed kyis// phyag 'tshal me tog gtor byas la// skyon med pad+ma'i pho brang du// des med sprul sku'i bla ma la// bdag nyid gus pas gsol ba 'debs// log rtog zhe sdang rang grol nas// rang

snang ye shes rang gsal du// sprul sku'i byin rlabs dbang bskur zhu// zhes pas gsol ba lan gsum gdab// dngos gzhi bla mas slob ma la// ma yengs snang ba rtse gcig la// rang snang sprul sku'i dbang 'di

bskur// sprul sku'i pho brang u rgyan yul// rang rang gang mos zhing khams nas// sprul pa'i sku ni ngo mtshar can// nye ring med pa kun tu 'byon// gang mos der 'byon byin rlabs can// rang snang dag pa'i sku mchog

'dis// rang snang sprul skur dbang bskur ro// de bzhin nyid du byin gyis rlobs/ khyod kyi snang ba de bzhin yin// rang snang sprul skur rang dbang thob// rjes snang rang snang sprul skur bsgrub// sku gsum ngo bo
dbyer med pas// thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs dbang// lhan cig skyes par smin bya'i phyir// sbyor ba slob mas bla ma la// bde chen sku ru mos byas la// sku gsum dbyer med ma rtogs pa// der 'dzin shes

bya'i sgrib pa yis// sangs rgyas ma thob snying re rje// snyam du dmigs med sems skyed kyis// phyag 'tshal me tog gtor byas la// yang dag 'od gsal pho brang du// phyogs med bde chen bla ma la// bdag nyid
gus pas gsol ba 'debs// tha dad gzung 'dzin rang grol nas// rang byung sku gsum lhun grub tu// bde chen byin rlabs dbang bskur zhu// zhes pas gsol ba lan gsum gdab// dngos gzhi bla mas slob
ma la// snang srid sku gsum dbyer med cing// lhun grub bde chen dbang 'di bskur// bde chen pho brang rnam dag dbyings// lhun grub 'od gsal kun bzang klong// bde chen sku ni 'dus ma byas// ma bcos
rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// gsal la 'dzin med bde ba che// kun mkhyen kun shes kun rtog bral// sgrib med thams cad mkhyen pa 'dis// rdzogs sangs rgyas par dbang bskur ro// de bzhin nyid du byin

gyis rlobs/ khyod kyi ngo bo de bzhin nyid// sku gsum lhun grub rang dbang thob// rjes snang sku gsum dbyer med du// bde ba chen por rtsal sbyang ngo// 'bras bu myur du smin par 'gyur// 'di thob sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis// dbang bskur ma lus thob pa yin// bde gshegs bka' lung thams cad rdzogs// sku gsum bla mar rang ngo 'phrod// de nyid dbang gi mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// sku gsum
bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rang sems bla mar byin rlabs dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol ba/ e ma/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags// sems
can sangs rgyas rgyud nyid la// byin rlabs dbang gis gzhi smin pa// lam gyis nyams su blangs pa yis// 'bras bu sku gsum ji ltar 'grub// de don 'khor la gsung du gsol// ces gsol
to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang sems sangs rgyas sku gsum du// ma rtogs gzung 'dzin 'khor bar 'khyams// rtogs pa'i nyams len mngon sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma mchis
te// rang sems sangs rgyas sku gsum yin// yin la chags 'dzin med pa yis// de yi nyams len rtsol ba bral// ma bcos bzhag pas sku gsum grub// de phyir da lta sgrub pa bstan// lus ngag yid gsum sku
gsum du// rang bzhin nyid du 'od gsal bar// lhun gyis grub nas rtogs pa la// kun rdzob blos byas sgrub mi dgos// rang snang sprul skur gsal ba la// bskyed rim mi dgos dran pas gsal// rang sems

stong pa chos sku yin// stong gsal 'gag med longs sku yin// cir yang 'char ba sprul pa'i sku// de gsum dbyer med bla ma yin// byas pa med par kun la rtogs// rtogs kyang rtsal ni ma rdzogs pas// bu chung
mi ru rtogs gyur kyang// gso ran ma byas rtsal ma rdzogs// de bzhin sku gsum yin gyur yang// de nyid brtan pa ma thob pas// lus ngag yid gsum tha mal lus// de phyir sku gsum bla ma de// ma bcos
sems la ma yengs bsgrub// rang sems sku gsum rtsal rdzogs 'gyur// de nyid sku gsum bla ma dngos// sangs rgyas kun dang dbye ba med// de ltar ma rtogs gang zag gi/ sku gsum logs nas bsgrub 'dod
cing// 'dus byas kun rdzob cho ga yis// med la rtog 'dzin rtag lta dang// rtogs la med stong rdzogs rim dang// gnyis med gnyis 'dzin bsnyen bsgrub kyis// sku gsum bla ma 'grub mi 'gyur// yin kyang

mos snang mthu rtas kyis// tshogs rdzogs thun mong sgrib pa 'dag/ mchog gi don la gzhol bar 'gyur// de phyir bla ma rang la sgrub// thams cad rang sems 'di nyid yin// bskyed rim spyan drangs bzhugs su
gsol// phyag 'tshal mi dgos rang re yin// mchod 'bul mi dgos mnyes byed med// bstod bskul mi dgos gnyis su med// bsnyen bsgrub mi dgos ye nas grub// sku gsum rang nyid yin pa la// rang la
yin lugs gsal 'debs ni// rang sems skye med chos kyi sku// bde chen snang ba mtha' yas yin// gnas ni chos dbyings snying dkyil na// rtogs dus chos kyi dbyings yin te// ma rtogs snying la gnas par
bzung// cir yang ma grub stong pa la// kun tu gsal bas snang ba ste// phyogs ris med par mtha' las 'das// gzung 'dzin med par bde ba che// dbyings rig gnyis med ngo bo nyid// 'di dkar lhag ge
gsal ba yis// chos kyi sku zhes gsal ba yin// gzugs sku ma grub chos sku las// sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las byung// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo yin// rigs kyi bdag po bla ma

ste// rang sems bla ma chos sku la// ji ltar byas kyang 'gyur ldog med// ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// de la nyams len ci yang med// de nyid ngang du skyong ba yin// rang sems 'gag med gsal tsam
na// longs sku thugs rje rigs bzhi yin// gnas ni zhing khams rtsa la gnas// rtogs na mkha' spyod bde chen la// ma rtogs rtsa dang rlung du 'char// sgo lnga gsal bas sku yin la// dngos po med pas ye

shes te// sku dang ye shes longs spyod pas// phyi nang kun tu gsal ba la// gzugs nyid gsal stong 'dzin pa med// me long ye shes longs spyod pa'i// badzra thugs rje chen po yin// sgra ni grag stong gnyis su

med// mnyam nyid ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// rat+na'i thugs rje chen po yin// dri ni tshor stong 'du shes bral// kun rtogs ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// pad+ma'i thugs rje chen po yin// ro ni myong stong lhun gyis

grub// bya grub ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// karma'i thugs rje chen po yin// rang sems sku gsum nyag gcig la// ma 'gags sgo lngar gsal tsam na// zhi ba longs spyod rdzogs sku 'byung// gsal cha rags su

shar tsam na/ khro bo longs spyod rdzogs sku 'byung// snang la rang bzhin ma grub pas// ye shes sku yi dkyil 'khor can// ye shes zhen 'dzin med pa yis// bla ma longs spyod rdzogs pa de// ji ltar byas kyang

'gag pa med// rang byung rang gsal lhun gyis grub// de la sgrub rgyu ci yang med// rang gsal nyid du skyong ba yin// rang sems snang bar shar tsam na// nges pa med pa sprul pa'i sku// u rgyan pad+ma mtshan brgyad
yin// gnas ni u rgyan yul na gnas// rtogs na u rgyan ko sha la// ma rtogs tshogs brgyad yul de yin// rang sems gcig gi 'char tshul las// rnam shes tshogs brgyad byung ba yis// gang du 'char ni nges

med la// gcig las brgyad byung sprul sku yin// yin kyang sems nyid chos sku la// gzhan gyi skyon gyis ma gos pas// u rgyan pad+ma zhes pa de// mig gi rnam shes snang stong tshogs// dngos med sprul sku pad+ma

yin// rna ba'i rnam shes grags stong tshogs// bden med seng ge sgra sgrogs yin// sna yi rnam shes tshor stong tshogs// 'dzin med nyi ma 'od zer yin// lce yi rnam shes myong stong tshogs// zhen med pad+ma sam b+ha

yin// lus kyi rnam shes reg stong tshogs// chags med blo ldan mchog sred yin// kun gzhi rnam shes ye stong tshogs// gzhi med shAkya seng ge yin// nyon mongs rnam shes rig stong tshogs// rtog med pad+ma rgyal

po yin// yid kyi rnam shes 'gyus stong tshogs// gtad med pad+ma thod 'phreng yin// de ltar rang sems chos kyi sku// tshogs brgyad yul du shar tsam na// rang snang sprul sku pad+ma brgyad// de las kyang

ni ma 'gags pas// snang ba gang shar sprul sku yin// chos dbyings stong pa'i nam mkha' la// rig pa ye shes chos kyi sku// ma 'gags rol par shar ba yis// sprul sku dpa' bo mkha' 'gro yin// snang ba snod

kyi 'jig rten kun// bla ma sprul sku'i gzhal yas yin// 'gro ba sems can ma lus kun// bla ma sprul sku'i ngo bo yin// snang ba rang sems yin pa'i phyir// gang ltar byas pa de ltar yin// snang yang sems las

gnyis su med// gnyis med snang ba sprul sku yin// sprul sku'i snang ba gsal ba la// rig pa hur gdon byung rgyal gtad// rang snang mi 'gyur gzhan mi 'gyur// rang snang sprul skur shes pa na// thams cad sprul

skur 'char ba yin// ya nga'i phyogs su thog brdzis btang// snyems rtog khu 'khrig med par bya// dngos grub chen po bdud kyis ster// bdud kyang rang snang sprul sku yin// rang snang sprul skur ma shes na// lha yang

gnyis 'dzin bdud du 'khrul// snyems byed the tshom 'khor ba yin// snang ba ci shar rang snang yin// rang snang 'dzin med sprul sku yin// ji ltar shar yang 'dzin pa med// zhen med rang shar rang grol du// sprul

sku chu zla bzhin du gsal// rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub// de la bsgrub rgyu ci yang med// gang shar don de skyong ba yin// rang sems snang bar shar ba'i tshe// sprul sku yin pas gsal ba ltar// dngos por

'dzin pa'i rtag lta med// rang snang lus kyi 'dzin pa zad// lta byed rtogs pa rang grol yin// rang sems dngos med gsal ba'i tshe// longs sku yin pas de nyid spyod// rang rig rlung gi 'dzin pa zad// gnyis
'dzin 'dzin pa'i rtag lta med// gcod byed rtog pa rang sar grol// rang sems mi g.yo gnas pa'i tshe// chos sku yin pas de kar bzhag/ stong par 'dzin pa'i chad lta med// rang sems 'di yin 'dzin pa
zad// bsgom bya bsgom byed rang sar grol// rang sems sku gsum bla ma las// ji ltar byas kyang mi 'da' bas// rig pa gcer bu lding bar grol// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// bde gshegs ma
lus 'dus pa'i sku// bde chen thams cad mkhyen pa yin// de nyid don de bskyang ba las// gzhan gyi bya rgyu ci yang med// snang rig sems gsum dbyer med du// rtogs med sangs rgyas thams cad
'grub// mtha' yas bdag dang dbye ba med// yon tan ma lus thob pa yin// sku gsum rnam mkhyen lhun gyis grub// 'gro don 'phrin las ma lus rdzogs// 'khor ba dong nas sprugs pa yin// de nyid bsgrub
pa'i mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rang sems bla mar bsgrub pa nyams len gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal
gyis yang zhus pa/ e ma bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags// rang sems sku gsum bla ma ru// nyams len bsgrub pa ngo sprad nas// man ngag rtsal sbyong ji ltar byed// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khams gsum sems can thams cad la// sku gsum gdod nas lhun gyis grub// bde dang gsal dang mi rtog gsum// ma bcos gzhi yi sku gsum
yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// rtsal sbyong lam gyi sku gsum yin// chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum// mthar thug 'bras bu'i sku gsum yin// don la de rnams dbyer med de// gdod nas lhun
grub sangs rgyas kyi// ngo bo yin kyang ma rtogs 'khrul// dug gsum zhen pas 'khor bar 'khyams// bdag 'dzin rang khar ma zhen na// dug gsum sku gsum lhun grub kyis// lam gyi rtsal sbyong chen po
yin// dug gsum sku gsum ma shes na// spangs pas mi spongs rang sems yin// rang sems spangs pa'i sangs rgyas med// bsgrubs pas mi 'grub dngos po med// dngos po med pas 'dzin pa grol// 'dzin med spang
med dug gsum ste// zhen pa med pa sku gsum dngos// zhen pa rtogs na dug yin te// 'khor 'das zhen dang ma zhen phye// de phyir zhen med nyams len bsten// pha ni bde ba chen po yis/ bud med

'dul ba'i chos su byung// bud med stong pa bde la srid// 'dod chags pa yi thig le las// phyi ru dus dang khog pa grub// nang du thig le rtsa mdud grub// kun rdzob 'dod chags de nyid las// rten nas don
dam chags lam ni// phyi ru gzugs ma'i rtsa sna sprad// nang du thig le 'phen 'jug bya// gsang ba 'dod chags bde stong du// thams cad longs spyod rdzogs skur grol// zhen pa med par rtsal sbyangs

pas// 'khrul rtog skad cig yul ma grub// de nyid lam du 'khyer ba yin// ma ni stong shas phye ba yis// skyes pa 'dul ba'i chos su byung// skyes pa'i bde ba stong par rtogs// zhe sdang ma yi thig le las// phyi ru

sha dang pags pa grub// nang du rtsa dang rlung du grub// kun rdzob zhe sdang de nyid las// rten nas don dam thabs lam ni// phyi ru lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bya// nang du rlung gi dmigs pa gzung// gsang ba zhe sdang

gsal stong du// zhen pa med par rtsal sbyangs pas// 'khrul snang rtog pa mi 'char bar// thams cad sprul pa'i sku ru grol// de nyid lam du 'khyer ba yin// sems ni mi rtog shas che ste// zung du 'jug pa'i chos
su byung// gnyis med mnyam pa nyid yin pas// gti mug byang chub sems nyid de// phyi ru 'khrul pa'i snang ba grub// nang du bdag 'dzin sems su grub// kun rdzob gti mug de nyid la// rten nas
don dam grol lam ni// phyi ru snang ba'i rjes mi 'brang// nang du sems nyid ma bcos bzhag/ gsang ba gti mug rig stong du// zhen pa med par rtsal sbyangs pas// bdag 'dzin zhen pa kun zad nas// thams
cad chos skur grol nas 'gro// de nyid lam du khyer ba yin// gnad kyi man ngag 'di rtogs na// sangs rgyas kun dang dbyer mi phyed// de ltar dug gsum sku gsum du// rang sems bla mar rtsal sbyangs
pas// snang srid sku gsum ngo bor rtogs// de nyid man pa gzhan med pas// 'khor ba thams cad dong sprugs te// rang sems bde ba chen po ru// gsal stong 'dzin med mngon sangs rgyas// gzung 'dzin rnam

rtog med pa ru// snang srid thams cad gsal ba ni// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas yin// rang rig chos sku gzhan don du// longs sku sprul sku'i gzugs su shar// shar yang rtsol rtog med pa yis// bla ma

sku gsum lhun grub yin// chos nyid ngang la 'gyur ldog med// de nyid gdams pa'i mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rang sems bla mar rtsal sbyong gi
gdams ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol ba/ e ma/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags// rang sems bla mar bsgrub pa yis// cha rkyen thun mong yan
lag tu// las tshogs man ngag ji ltar lags// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang sems bla ma sku gsum gyis// thun mong 'phrin las bzhi
yin te// phyi rol gdon dang nang gi gdon// gsang ba nyon mongs rnam rtog kun// ma bcos 'dzin med rang sar gzhil// gtad med ngang du zhi gnas 'gro// chos sku zhi ba'i 'phrin las yin// phyi yi
longs spyod nang gi tshe// gsang ba ye shes 'khor rgyas pa// shin tu gsal bar mdangs ston pas// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rgyas// longs sku rgyas pa'i 'phrin las yin// phyi ru mi mthun rigs pas
gtor// nang du mdo don rlung sems bsdu// gsal la 'gyur ldog gang dgos pa// rang gsal rig pa'i stobs kyis bsgyur// dbang drag sprul sku'i 'phrin las yin// sku gsum 'phrin las dbyer mi

phyed// don la rang byung ye shes yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed mgon// 'gro ba'i don la ston pa po// de nyid 'phrin las mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang
rgyud las// thun mong las tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol pa/ e ma/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags// rang sems bla ma sku gsum
du// lhun grub gsang ba'i rgyud mchog 'di// dam tshig gtad rgya gang ltar byed// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dus bzhi sangs rgyas ma lus

rnams// sku gsum bla ma nyid la 'dus// sems nyid don gyi rgyud mchog 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po gtso// gsang sngags rgyal po kun gyi rje// 'di rtogs 'gro kun rdzogs sangs rgyas// gsang sngags
rgyud chen gzhan dag ni// byas bcos lam gyi rgyud yin te// 'di nyid 'bras bu da ltar 'byin// yang gsang snying po'i rgyud yin pas// skal ldan mthong thos reg pas grol// skal med log lta'i rang bzhin
bsgribs// log pa'i gdul bya thabs kyis 'dul// thugs rje chen po khyod la gtad// snyigs ma'i 'gro ba 'dren pa yi// bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong gi sras// mtha' yas sprul pa'i skur byon nas// mtsho
skyes pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// rgyud mchog 'gro ba'i don byed 'gyur// bstan pa mi mjed khams su 'byung// 'khor ba dong nas sprugs byed de// de bsgrubs sangs rgyas kun 'grub bo// sprul pa rnams kyi

mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// der 'khor thams cad sku gsum bla ma'i ngo bor yi rangs te chos nyid kyi ngang du grol lo// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ gtad rgya lung bstan rjes su yi

rangs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa mthar thug gcig tu dril ba/ bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud ces bya ba/ u rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/ u rgyan gyi skad
las bod kyi yi ge ru/ chos dbyings nam mkha'i rdzong du rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o// rdzogs so//// e ma ho/ bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas la// gsang sngags mchog gi bka' babs kyang// bla ma'i thugs

rgyud gsang ba 'di// de snga 'jig rten khams ma byung// pho brang bde ba chen po ru// 'phags pa bsgrubs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// thugs rje chen pos rgyud 'di gnang// 'di la brten nas 'gro la phan don du// bla

ma'i sgrub thabs mang du brtsams// gter kha du mar sbas nas bdog/ rgyud mchog gsang ba snying thig 'di// bdag nyid pad+ma'i thugs la bcangs// srin po'i yul du bzhud kha ru// snyigs ma'i 'gro ba drang don
du// yang gsang dgongs gter snying po ru// spel bar 'phangs nas gter du sbas// thub par bsrungs cig gter srungs tshogs// snying la phur cig sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ e ma/ bskal pa mar 'grib nye ba
la// gter 'di dbang ba'i las can ni// u rgyan gnyis med thugs kyi sras// skye ba lnga yi tha ma la// mon bod gnyis kyi so 'tshams su// me nyag ban chung shes rab can// sbas pa'i ngang nas

skal ldan skyong// 'khor ni khra mo rigs 'dus 'du// spyod lam ma nges kun gyi tshul// skye mtha' byang chub sems dpa' de// de la 'brel tshad u rgyan 'jal// gang zhig de yi ming dang rus// bla rtags gsang
ba'i mtshan thos kyang// byang chub mngon du byas pa yin// gang zhig bstod smad log lta spangs// nam zhig 'khor ba'i mtha' las grol// skal ldan slob bu bcu dgu 'byung// de la chos 'di rdzogs par

byin// 'gro ba mang po smin par 'gyur// kun gyi tsit+ta'i dkyil du bcang// 'khor ba rgyun gcod sku gsum thob// bdud kyi byin rlabs skur 'debs mkhan// u rgyan nga la rgyab kyis phyogs// dmyal ba sgrub la

sbyin mi bya// byin yang skal ldan sreg par 'gyur// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma de// rin chen gser snod ma gtogs pa// rdza shing snod du blug na 'gas// de phyir log lta can la gsang// byin na gsang ba'i dam

tshig nyams// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// de bas ma spel tsit+tar stim/ shin tu zab pa'i rgyud mchog 'di// rad na gling zhes grags pa yi// skal ldan de dang 'phrad par shog/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sa ma ya/
b-ithaM/ rgya rgya rgya rgya rgya/ gtad rgya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gsang rgya//// dramaca rnga: chamA :yang dag gsang ba'i skad du/ yang sdig b+ha tung pa ya/ bod skad du/ dgongs don

'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos dbyings ka dag khyab brdal klong yangs gis gnas su// ston pa kun bzang snang ba mtha' yas chos kyi sku la/ 'khor rang

byung ye shes lnga'i 'khor gyis bskor nas/ ngo bo nyid kyis bstan pa smra bsam brjod du med pa las/ gzugs brnyan gyis bstan pa skye ba med pa las/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul yi ge drug gi 'khor lo rang 'byung du shar

ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ ye shes lhun grub 'od lnga'i zhing khams su// ston pa pad+ma rgyal po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la/ 'khor sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' mang pos bskor nas/ rang shar gyis bstan pa nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ye shes kyi dgongs pa la/ gzugs can gyis bstan pa/ 'gags pa med pa la rang shar bar gsang rgyud 'di dag bshad kyi nyon
cig 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// thugs rje kun khyab 'jig rten gyi gnas su// ston pa gang la gang 'dul sprul pa'i sku la/ 'khor du skal ldan gdul tshogs kyis bskor nas/
rang grol bstan pa 'gro ba kun grol las/ gzugs can gyis bstan pa tshig dang yi ger gnas pa la 'dun par gyur to// de'i tshe sprul pa sku'i zhing khams 'dir/ sangs rgyas 'dus pa g+hu ru pad+ma
rgyal po yis/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'od de las sprul pa sku'i zhing khams chen po gsal bar gyur to// de'i tshe gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro gsol/ kyai/ bstan pa'i bdag po thugs rje che// chos rnams ston pa
pad+ma'i rgyal// rgyud rgyal sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i don// 'gro ba kun grol gsung du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ma e ma/ sku gsum sku lnga ston pa'i
bcud// smin grol gegs gsal po gsad byung nas// blo 'das don la sbyor ba'i rgyud// bshad kyis ma yengs yid kyis nyon// ces gsungs so// dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u

ste dang po'o//// yang de'i tshe bde chen sangs rgyas snying po bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ ston pa sangs rgyas gangs chen mtsho zhes bya ba'i drung du/ chos dbyings ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas 'di skad ces

gsol to// kyai/ chos kyi dbang phyug thugs rje che// bde stong zag med pad+ma'i rgyal// rgyud rgyal smin byed dbang gi lha// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsal zhu// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid
kyis bka' stsal pa/ hri/ thams cad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rang sems rig pa'i dbang thob nas// theg pa rim dgu la sogs pa'i// chos sgo ma lus 'dis phyed 'gyur// bla ma sangs rgyas 'dus pa

yis// thabs shes bdud rtsi thob pa na// rlung sems kun la dbang thob nas// stong nyid chen por rnam par grol// stong pa'i ngang las bde chen sku// shes rab mkha' 'gro dang sbyar na// bde ba sems bzung stong

la sbyar// gnyis med ngang du ye shes skye// chos kyi dgongs pa'i rang sems ni// stong nyid bde chen blo las 'das// rgyal bu rgyal sa zin pa ltar// don mthong tsam gyis smin par 'gyur// de ltar dbang bzhi'i
gdams pa yis// theg pa rims kyi 'jug par bya// de ltar yongs su smin pa la// grol bar byed pa'i gdams pa bstan// hUM me pad Ni ma oM/ oM A hUM hri/ zhes gsungs so// dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi

rgyud las/ smin byed dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// krash+yadA koha ha: cha na rtangadug :m+laniragaNanyak+to: matagArtashAh+yata/ yang de'i tshe bde chen rdo rje snying po bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba na/ ston pa rdo rje gangs

chen mtsho zhes bya ba'i drung du/ me long ye shes mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// kyai/ thar pa'i lam ston thugs rje che// mtsho rgyal chen po lhun rdzogs pad+ma rgyal// rgyud rgyal chos kyi phyag rgya'i
don// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsal gsol// 'di skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// hri/ thog mar sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso// bla ma sgom zhing gsol ba

gdab// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang yang blang// rgyun du 'brel med rjes su bzhugs// bla ma rdo rje sems dpa' la// maN+Dal 'bul zhing yig brgya bzlas// thabs kyi yan lag de dag gis// sgrib pa gnyis sbyangs
tshogs gnyis rdzogs// bla ma dkon mchog skyabs gnas la// byang chub bar du skyabs song nas// smon pa dang ni 'jug pa yis// 'gro ba'i don du sems bskyed do// de ltar gsol 'debs spel sbyangs
dang// skyabs 'gro smon 'jug sems skyed dang// phyi nang gsang ba'i sdom pa gzung// dam bca' smon lam rgyas par gdab// phyi nang rtogs pa'i mtshams bcad la// sgrib gnyis ma lus rnam dag cing// ye
shes dag ni gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor bskyed cing bsgrub par bya// bdag gi ye shes lha las ni// rang byung rang grol bde ba che// 'dod yon ma spangs rol pa'i rgyan// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi
mchog/ ting ni gsum las byung ba yis// bsod nams thams cad dkyil 'khor ni// ci bzhin rnal 'byor rang lus la// de bzhin dbang rlung thig le gnas// sgo gsum rnam dag ngang du gsal// de bzhin
rang gi sems la yang// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// thams cad 'byung zhing thams cad gnas// thams cad grol bar byed pa'o// de ltar bskyed rdzogs rdzogs pa che// phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor du// zung 'jug gtor ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub 'byung// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyang// chos dbyings don du ro gcig pa// bstod pa glu yi don gsol
'debs// e ma dbyings kyi rol pa 'dis// rtog pa med las kun mkhyen pa// sku bzhi'i 'phrin las lhun gyis grub// ma 'gags ye shes sgyu ma'i lha// 'gro ba grol ba'i don du bskul// ye shes lha dang nam du
yang// mi 'bral rtse gcig bsgrub pa la// za 'dug 'gro nyal thams cad du// yengs na ye shes lha spang 'gyur// nyon mongs 'khrul rtog skyes pa na// bar chad 'byung po la sogs pas// lus la nad rnams

gtong ba dang// 'chi ba'i rtags rnams ston par 'gyur// de na shes bzhin dran pa bstan// 'chi ba slu phyir tshogs gnyis bsags/ kha sbyor rlung gi tshe yang sring// blo 'das sgom na skye shi med// de ltar bar chad

yong spangs nas// tshe 'dir rang gzhan don la sbyar// tshogs bsag sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// chos spyod bcu la rnam par bslabs// 'gro ba rnams la phan don du// mchog dang thun mong grub chen brgyad// 'byung
ba lnga yi 'phrin las bzhi// yi ge bcu pa bzung bas grub// de ltar sna tshogs 'phrin las rnams// bskyed rim yan lag rdzogs pas 'grub// de yang dngos po rnam pa bcu// rgyud rnams kun gyi
dgongs pa rdzogs// oM A hUM hri oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes gsungs so// dgongs pa kun grol gyi rgyud las/ chos kyi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba'i bskyed rim gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// thatar+Takasakak+kaH

artan+TaTaglatharta/ ya tra/ khas zhor/ nyanyasabyacaha// yang de'i tshe bde chen rin chen bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba na/ ston pa rin chen gangs chen mtsho zhes bya ba'i drung du/ mnyam nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas

'di skad ces gsol to// kyai/ rlung sems rang grol thugs rje che// thig le chen po pad+ma rgyal// rgyud rgyal dam tshig phyag rgya'i don// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsal zhu// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs

nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// hri/ rdo rje lus kyi srog pa las// rtsa rlung thig le'i gar gsal nas// 'bar ba'i rtsa mdud grol rtags 'char// 'dzag pas dga' bde'i nyams myong 'char// yi dam lha

dang bdag nyid dang// snang srid thams cad bde ba che// ye shes sgyu mar rtsal sbyangs nas// gang ltar spyad kyang rol pa'i klong// rmi lam du yang dran pas zin// sbyangs spel bsgyur la gnas su 'phangs// thams
cad sems kyi cho 'phrul la// rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur bzhag/ gnyid dang mngon sum khyad med par// gsal stong bde ba chen po dang// nyon mongs rtog pa rang yal nas// 'od gsal lam du slongs par
'gyur// rlung sems gnad du 'byong pa'i tshe// 'byung ba dngos grub ro la sogs// dmigs pa gang dang gar gtad kyang// lus kyi dor len rang dbang thob// rlung sems ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis// 'od

lam ngang nas chos skur 'pho// sgyu ma lta bur longs skur 'pho// bskyed rim gsal bas sprul skur 'pho// a haM/ hri hri hri/ zhes gsungs so// dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud las/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang

sbyor ba'i steng sgo rnam par grol ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// shar yaM brda taM/[ \u0f7f]hasaTasagata: rad+yarbA: tsabataM/ saT+Tanar+Tarda: yang de'i tshe bde chen pad+ma snying gi bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba na/ ston pa pad+ma gangs

chen mtsho zhes bya ba'i drung du/ sor rtog ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kyai/ thabs shes zung 'jug thugs rje che// zag med bde chen pad+ma rgyal// rgyud rgyal las phyag rgya'i

don// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsal zhu// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// hri/ steng sgo rnam grol rtsal 'byongs nas// 'og sgo bde ba che la bslabs// bde chen grogs
su mi mo ni// mtshan ldan DA k+ki rigs can brten// de yang gsang ba ye shes lha// rtse gcig bsgrub pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbang du bsdus shing 'gug par bya// mos pas 'dus na sangs rgyas

zhing// gzhan gyis sgro skur gsal ba dang// gsang spyod gnad du 'gyur ba'i phyir// bdag dang phyag rgya bcas pa yang// mi snang sgrib pa'i sbyor ba bya// de nas mtshan ldan smin byas la// yab yum lhar bskyed

sbyor byas te// dbab bzung klog dgram bde ngos bzung// ma bcos ngang du glod par bya// rdo rje sbubs su nub pa dang// rdo rje blang zhing bde ba bskyed// yum gyi rtsa sna tshur la zhugs// dngas ma'i thig le blang
bar bya// de ltar rtsal 'byongs rnal 'byor pa// theg chen byang chub sems dpa' yis// gzhan don sprul sku gzhag pa'i phyir// byang sems spros la nyes pa med// oM hu ma g+ha ye na ma swAhA/ zhes gsungs

so// dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud las/ las kyi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba 'og sgo bde chen gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// wabasarasnga/ nardabaTasaSha'o/ shAtsasaSh+yartataT/ rkabasatuTaleg bayatrakas/ yang de'i

tshe bde chen karma bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba na/ ston pa karma gangs chen mtsho zhes bya ba'i drung du/ bya grub ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// kyai/ 'khrul pa ka dag thugs rje che// ye shes

lhun grub pad+ma'i rgyal// rgyud rgyal phyag rgya chen po'i don// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsal zhu// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// hri/ bden pa gnyis ldan rang gi
sems// ma byung mi gnas mi 'gro ba// 'khor 'das gang du'ang gyur pa med// don dam blo 'das dgongs pa la// thams cad yod cing thams cad med// 'gyur ba med cing brjod du med// gcig dang 'du

'bral grub mtha' gtor// chos rnams kun gyi snying po yin// thams cad bden pa gnyis kyi tshul// skye ba med las thams cad skye// skyes tsam nyid nas skye ba med// gang yang ma grub blang dor bral// de las

khyod kyi 'khrul pa de// dang po rgyu med byung ba med// bar du rkyen med gnas pa med// tha ma gnyen po 'gro sa med// yid la byed pa med pa ste// ye shes med cing 'khrul pa med// zhi ba med cing srid pa
med// zag pa med cing 'gyur ba med// yon tan kun la dga' spro med// sangs rgyas rnams la re ba med// sdug bsngal kun la 'jigs pa med// 'khor ba 'khyams kyis dogs pa med// de ltar brjod du
med pa la// chos kyi glu blangs gsang ba'i skad// rgyal ba'i dgongs don ma bcos pa// phyag rgya chen po gnyis med don// de nyid dus gsum rtsa ba bcad// sgo gsum ma bcos glod la sgrims// gzhi cha gsum
bral gnyug ma de// zhi gnas ngang nas lhag mthong sbyangs// zhi bar gnas pa ngos bzung la// yul drug rtog pa zil gyis mnan// nam mkha' nyid la rnam par bslabs// lhag mthong ye shes rgyud

la skye// rgyud du lhod kyis glod pa la// skye 'gag gnas gsum mtha' dang bral// yengs pa med pa'i shes bzhin rten// glod cing sgrims par byed pa yin// dper na rdzing gi bya ltar 'phur// dang po yengs med

skyong ba gces// bar du yan par btang yang ldog/ tha ma btang yang 'gro mi btub// ma bcos bzhag pas phyag rgya che// nyams la ma zhen mnyam bzhag la// rjes thob spyod pa'i rnal 'byor bya// lha yi bu yis

bdud bcom phyir// nyam nga thog rdzis byed pa dang// rkyen snang grogs su khyer ba dang// bar chad lam du longs par bya// phung po'i bdud ni lus 'di yis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs bskyed// mi
gtsang rdzas kyis yongs su gang// de phyir mi chags lings kyi skur// de la chags na chags mkhan su// dmod cing dor na dor mkhan gang// btang snyoms rmongs par su yis bzhag/ cer ltas rang bzhag stong
par grol// rang sems rig pa'i dpal sbyangs pas// srid pa'i 'khor lo las grol te// 'chi bdag bdud las mi 'jigs pa// skye med 'chi ba med par 'gyur// de bas bdud kyi dpung rnams kun// rig

pa'i dpal gyis brtul nas kyang// thar pa'i grogs su chod pa ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i lam du khyer// chos nyid don gyi snying po ste// rang la yod kyang ma shes pas// 'khrul snang rnam pa sna tshogs pa// zhe byed

gdams pa 'di lta ste// rang gi 'khrul snang gnod byed la// snying po'i stobs kyis lus sbyin cing// rjes su 'dzin zhing don la lta// 'byung po 'dul ba'i zhi byed yin// 'byung ba bag chags nad rnams la// rdzas

dang rten 'brel sna tshogs kyis// byin gyis brlab cing ting 'dzin sgom// nad rnams 'joms pa'i zhi byed yin// nyon mongs gnyen po bsten pa dang// gnas bsgyur ye shes bsten pa dang// rang grol chos nyid
shar ba yis// nyon mongs zhi bar byed pa'o// bag chags 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'di// gzung 'dzin med par rgya yis gdab// nyin mtshan 'dres pa'i sgom pa 'char// ngan rtog bzang rtog gnyis med

grol// gdon dang nad dang nyon mongs dang// bag chags phyi nang rtsad bcad de// stong nyid ngang du rang grol na// 'di phyi bar do sdug bsngal zhing// lus gnad rtsa rlung theg le'i nyams// mun pa'i nang na snang ba

gsal// srog chags 'chi med rdo rje 'gyur// bde nyams stong na sdug bsngal med// sgo yul rlung rig gnad kyis ni// chos nyid stong pa dngos su snang// nyams snang 'phel cing 'grib pa med// chos zad dus su
sangs rgyas so// thig le gnas pa lam dang sgo// dbang po bkag pas 'dod yon gsal// phyogs bzhir 'phangs shing slar la zlog/ ngal bso'i dus na lam kun byed// sgron ma phyi nang 'dzoms
pa'i dus// mgo bo gtums na rgyang mi gsal// mtha' nas dbus su rnam par lta// ye shes 'od lus ngang du yal// de ltar 'od gsal nyams kyi rten// rgyang zhag chu yi sgron ma gces// chu la chu yis gsos pa
na// skyon dag ye shes snang ba 'phel// ye shes mar me'i 'od zer las// thugs rje'i snang ba rab tu gsal// rtog med mkhyen pa'i rtsal rdzogs nas// srid las rnam grol zhi ba thob// thog ma med pa'i spe
bzhi las// nga bdag dbang gi 'khrul gyur te// mtha' ma sangs rgyas ma thob par// rang bzhin bar do chen por gnas// thog ma'i gzhi las 'khrul pa yang// skye gnas bar do'i dus 'dir ni// smin grol

rang ngo shes pa na// rgyal bu rgyal sa zin pa 'dra// de tshe bag chags rang grol nas// rmi lam bar do shar ba'i tshe// 'khrul snang dbyings su yal ba ni// sgyu ma mkhan gyi mig 'phrul 'dra// 'byung ba thems nas

'chi ka yang// rlung sems spyi bor ston nas kyang// rig pa'i rtsal kha stod pa ni// rgyal po'i bka' then bskur ba 'dra// bar do dang po chos nyid nyams// bar do gnyis pa lhun grub nyams// bar do gsum pa

sgra 'od zer// sngar 'gris mi dang 'phrad pa 'dra// de dag kun la ma grol na// 'khor ba rgyu zlog mngal sgo dgags// sangs rgyas sras su bskyed par bya// ngal ba dbugs phyung bskyed pa 'dra// a a a/ amasha/

a+yaM phya hUM/ zhes gsungs/ dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud las/ phyag rgya len dang sbyor ba bstan pa snying pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// kasngab 'bapaTar:sakatra/ nga'at+habakarkas/ yang de'i tshe 'khor yongs

grol gyis dur khrod ces bya ba na/ ston pa rigs lnga 'dus pa'i rgyal po thod pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i drung du/ sems kyi mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// kyai/ rang shar rang
grol thugs rje che// dreg pa 'dul mdzad pad+ma rgyal// rgyud rgyal yongs su gtad pa'i don// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsal zhu// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/
hrI:dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol rgyud// phun tshogs gsum bdun dgus bshad la rang cad cing// sangs rgyas sku gsum bstan pa yis// snying po'i bcud du rgyud 'di bzhugs// 'gro ba blo dman don du

ni// tshig don dbye bar mi bya zhing// stag mo'i mchong stangs lta bu yis// bsdus don sa rnams bcad de bshad// sku gsum ston pa'i bka' rnams kyis// dgongs pa gcig tu bsdus nas kyang// bung ba rtsi thog
lta bu yis// ngo bo kun bcud bsdus nas bshad// tshig don mgo lus thams cad kyang// gang zag rnams kyis go bya'i phyir// rang bzhin de yi stun bu ltar// le tshig 'bru rnams bcos nas
bshad// rgyud dang gdams pa'i khrid rnams kyang// ma nor rim bzhin bstan pa ni// mu tig tsar bskyus lta bu yi// dbye ba sngon du bsdebs te bshad// gzhan gyi bsgom pa tshar gcad phyir// rang gis sgrub
mtha' rnam par bskyangs// seng ge ngar skad lta bu yis// log lta sun rnams phyung nas bshad// e ma/ ye shes sku mchog thugs rje can// 'di nyid mthong ba tsam gyis ni// nyon mongs rnams med don mthong
zhing// ma bsgoms par yang mthong grol lo// chos nyid gsung mchog zab mo'i don// 'di nyid thos pa tsam gyis ni// ye shes 'gag med don rtogs shing// ma bsgoms par yang thos grol lo// rig
pa'i thugs mchog 'dus ma byas// 'di nyid btags pa tsam gyis ni// rang sems 'khrul med don rtogs shing// ma bsgoms par yang btags grol lo// dgongs pa don mthong bde ba che// 'di la reg pa
tsam gyis ni// bde chen zag med don rtogs shing// ma bsgoms par yang reg grol lo// 'dod pa'i yon tan rang grol ba// 'di nyid tshor ba tsam gyis ni// tshig gi rol pa'i don rtogs nas// sgom mi dgos

te tshor grol lo// thugs rje 'phrin las shugs 'byung ba// 'di nyid myong pa tsam gyis ni// blo dang bral ba'i don rtogs nas// sgom mi dgos te myong grol lo// rgyud 'di'i man ngag gab pa rnams// sprul pa

rigs 'dzin zhal nas 'byung// cha rkyen dgos pa tshang bar ni// phyi rabs skal ldan 'khor la ston// ma tshang kha skong theg pa rnams// bstan pa gzhan nas legs bsdus te// chos rnams dgongs don gcig pa'i

phyir// rgyud rgyal 'di yi grogs su bsdebs// bstan pa la ni zhugs pa des// phyi nang gsang ba rtsa lag gis// rang gzhan don du dam tshig ni// mi nyams rang gi zlog bzhin srungs// nga yi sprul pa phyag drug

pa// rgyud 'di khyod la yongs su gtad// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis bzung// phyi rabs rnal 'byor stong grogs kyis// gsang ba ye shes khros pa'i sku// lha mo tsit+ta dug mthur ma// rgyud 'di khyod la yongs su

gtad// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis skyongs// bka' gnyan las byed me spu gri// 'jig rten dregs pa mang por bcas// rgyud 'di khyod la yongs su gtad// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// badzra sa
ma ya/ hUM hri/ ha ha ha ha/ he he/ a a/ zhes bka' stsal nas// 'khor ba sgrol bar mdzad do// dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud las// 'dus don yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// rgyud
'di gang du gnas pa de nyid bde ba can ltar gnas so// rgyud 'di kha ton du byed pa la sogs pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa de ni// kun bzang snang ba mtha' yas ltar gnas so// rgyud 'di mthong ba

dang/ thos pa dang/ dran pa dang/ reg pa dang/ rlung dang/ rdul gyis phog pa rnams kyang ngan song du mi ltung zhing// mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i 'gro ba yang/ 'di thos nas ngan song las skyob par ma gyur na/

bdag pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yin no// bstan pa thams cad kyi dgongs don 'gro ba kun grol gyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// skal ldan dad brtson shes rab blo ldan snying rje can

dang 'phrad par shog/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ gnyan rgya/ g+huh+ya/ moMs mah+ya/ bdag 'dra mkha' chen bzang yis yi ger bris pa'o// r+ya na ma Ta/ d+hanam/ o rgyan dri med lhun grub kyis rtswa ri sprul 'khor gyi
shar sgo/ rdo rje sgom phug ces bya ba nas gdan drangs so// lcags pho sprel lo spre'u zla la/ tsa gongs chos kyi pho brang du bris pa'o////

rtsa ca thakag+ha cAb+hahra/ dgongs pa rang grol gyi skad du/ oMhu lhu lI/ bod skad du/ thig le yang zab 'bras bu ye grol chen po'i rgyud/ bla ma rang rig don gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku ka dag don

rig cing// longs sku lhun grub ngang du shar// sprul sku thos pa'i dus gcig na// chos sku'i gnas su longs sku'i gtso// sprul pa'i 'khor la ngo bo bstan// 'di dang phrad tshad 'khor ba sgrol// 'di yi rgyud 'dzin

sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'dren pa'i bla ma yin/ rgad+hagabra th+yar/ 'di ni rang 'byung thig le'i mdangs// gnyo 'khor gnyis su med pa'i phyir// ma brjod 'dra'i tshul du shar// dgongs pa gnyis med ngang du

grol// oM/ snang ba thams cad sems kyi rtsal/ a/ sems nyid gzhi med thig le stong/ hUM/ stong pa zag med bde ba che/ oM hU: bde chen blo 'das kun tu bzang// rtags dang tshig dang d+ha pa yi// dbang don go

na thob pa yin// ma ma ku ling sa man ta// rta/ thAka/ bla ma sku gsum rig pa'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag gi sku// tsit+ta dung khang zhi khro'i tshogs// ye yin gsal gdab don la blta// rtsa gnas rgyal ba'i lha

tshogs rnams// thig le 'od kyi sku ru bzhugs// rlung gi zhags pas gzugs byas nas// shes rab ldan pa'i bde ba bskyed// oMhU/ h+ya t+ya/ lta ba mtha' bral yangs pa'i klong// sgom pa 'dzin bral thig le'i
dbyings// spyod pa chags bral chos nyid grol// 'bras bu blo bral sku gsum rdzogs// gzhi la byung gnas 'gro gsum bral// ma bcos sems nyid chos kyi sku// lam ni rtog tshogs shar grol

te// mtha' bral thig le longs spyod rdzogs// 'bras bu bar do sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas sprul pa dpag med 'gyed// dbyings sgron ma dang ye shes mun pa rig pa lu gu rgyud gsum// gnyis med ngang du lhun

rdzogs 'gyur// rang byung nyag gcig ye shes don// rang shar lhug pa gza' gtad bral// de yi mtha' 'dzin grol gyur na// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kyang/ rang 'byung rig pa'i rtsal du shar// rta t+ya/
rgyud 'di bcangs nas bdud bzhi thul// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras gcig yin// til la stong gsal las kun byed// kun tu bzang po'i sa bon// thams cad 'di las 'byung zhing grol// rgyud 'di rin chen lnga
yis bris// mthong thos bcangs pas sangs rgyas te// sku gsum rtags kyi 'gro ba 'dul// rgyud 'di mkha' 'gro rnams la gtad// dam tshig bya ra rgyun du gyis/ sa ma yA/ 'bras bu ye grol gyi rgyud rdzogs

cam+tarA/ rkya/ rgya gar skad du/ thacablam+latA/ bod skad du/ lung bstan rjes su gnang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal ye shes snying po bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
gcig na/ 'og min thug po bkod pa'i zhing khams/ dkar/ ser/ dmar/ ljang/ mthing kha'i gzhal yas/ 'od lnga'i dal/ snang la ragrub pa na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la/ 'khor rigs lnga'i

sangs rgyas dang/ rigs gsum gyi bo d+hi sa twa dang/ ma dang TA ki ma'i 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs so// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// adamata/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyi 'od zer/ dpal bde ba chen po'i thugs khar 'dus par gyur te/ dpal bde ba chen po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i thugs kha nas yi ge hri dmar po khru gang ba cig mdun gyi nam mkha'

la thon par gyur to// de nas rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kha nas/ oM dkar po dang/ A dmar po dang/ hUM mthing kha dang/ traM ser po thon par gyur te hri la brgyan par gyur to// rigs gsum gyi bo d+hi sa

twa dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kha nas 'od zer dpag tu med pa byung nas/ hri de la thim par gyur to// de nas hri de skar mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du sprul sku'i zhing o rgyan yul gyi nub
byang mtshams dri med ko sha'i mtsho la thog babs pa ltar song ba gzigs so// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'od du 'bar te 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros so// lung bstan rjes su gnang ba'i rgyud

las/ gleng bslangs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gat+ya cata/ de nas pad+ma 'phreng 'dzin gyis// dpal chen po la 'di skad zhus// kye kye dpal chen 'od dpag med// yi ge 'od kyis rab brgyan pa// d+ha na ko
sha'i mtsho la babs// 'jig rten khams kyang 'od du 'bar// 'di yi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// mos pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// de nas dpal chen 'di skad gsung// nyon cig dri med pad 'phreng
'dzin// bdag gi thugs kha nas byung ba'i// hri dmar 'od zer 'dus pa 'di// ko sha'i mtsho la babs pa 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi sras gcig pu// snyigs ma'i 'gro ba

'dren pa'i dpal// pad+ma ge sar snying po la// 'das grongs mi mnga' rdo rje'i sku// 'gro ba 'dren pa'i lcags kyu mchog/ sdug bsngal nad sel sman gyi rgyal// pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/ khye chung lo brgyad tshul
du 'byung// mtha' yas bdag dang gnyis su med// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsum thugs kyi sprul pa yin// 'gro rnams sgrol ba'i gru chen yin// ma rig sel ba'i sgron me mchog/ thar pa'i

gnas skyel rin chen skas// snyigs ma'i skyabs chen 'khor lo sgyur// pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes byar grags// nor bu'i nang nas yid bzhin ltar// mtha' yas pad+ma'i rgyal po 'byon// sman tshogs nang nas rnam

rgyal ltar// mtha' yas pad+ma'i rgyal po 'byon// me tog tshon gyi u dum ltar// mtha' yas pad+ma'i rgyal po 'byon// skar tshogs nang nas nyi zla ltar// mtha' yas pad+ma'i rgyal po 'byon// 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyi

yab// ces gsungs so// lung bstan rjes su gnang ba'i rgyud las// 'byon tshul gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// kagabaD+ya/ de nas pad+ma 'phreng 'dzin gyis// mtha' yas nyid la yang zhus pa// de lta bu yi sprul
sku des// 'gro ba'i don ni ji ltar mdzad// bstan pa gang gi phyogs su 'byung// zhes zhus pas/ bde ba chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dri med pad 'phreng 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi// sprul pa pad+ma'i rgyal po 'di/ khams gsum kun tu 'gro ba 'dren/ khyad par rgya gar yul du bzhugs// kun 'jug sna tshogs mthar phyin mdzad// mtshan bdun du ni grags pa yi// rgya gar bal po 'gro ba'i

don// nyi zla lta bu khyab par mdzad// de nas bod yul dbus su 'byon/ khri srong lde btsan bsam pa grub// chos kyi bstan pa'i nyi ma shar// dregs pa ma lus bran du 'khol// rdo rje gro lod ces su grags// mtsho
rgyal zhes byas bka' rnams sdud// bstan mjug gter gyis rgyas mdzad cing// gter kha bsam las 'das pa sbed// de nas lho nub mtshams su ni// gdug pa srin gyi kha gnon mdzod// srin po

rag sha thod 'phreng zhes// 'jigs su rung ba'i cha lugs kyis// srin po rnams la dam chos ston// de yi bka' yi sdud pa po// srin po'i bu mo mthing 'bar 'od// g.yu yi zur phud rus rgyan gsol// mtsho rgyal
