ud pa la gyi lo ma 'drab la tshad dang ldan pa la bsgrub par byas te/ ral gri'i sna nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag la/ ral gri'i ngo la oM am oM ma mu/ zhes mtshal gyis bri'o// ral gri'i ngo nas lag pas

bzung la/ cho ga tshang ba bya zhing bsnyen pa byas pa dang/ ral gri de 'bar ba dang/ 'gul ba grub pa'i mtshan ma yin/ ral gri de la go cha'i sngags dang/ a ba rtse dung/ zhes rang bsrungs nas/ ral gri 'od

'bar pa de thogs na/ rigs 'dzin gyi ya tar 'gro ste/ stobs che zhing rlung la zhon pa 'grub par 'gyur/ mdog gser dang 'dra bar skra yang 'khyil ba dang/ lcang lo can du 'gyur ro// yang zla ba gzas zin

pa'i tshes bco lnga la ldong ros bsgrub pa bstan te/ mdog dmar ba las/ ba dmar gyi 'o mas sbyar la/ stegs bu'i steng du bzhag la/ grub ba'i mtshan ma tsha ba dang/ 'phar bar gyur te/ tsha bar gyur pas rkang pa
mgyogs par 'gyur/ du ba 'thul bas mi snang bar 'gyur/ 'phar bas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur te// rigs 'dzin du 'gyur ro// rkang mthil dro bas du bar bskus pas bsdu bar sku mi
snang ste// 'bar ba'i rigs 'dzin// 'phur bas rigs 'dzin mkha' la 'phur/ oM aM li ma mu mu ma a rtse dung/ zhes snying po bzlas so// yang zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe shu dag la bsgrub par bya'o//
bsnyen bsgrub mchod pa'i cho ga tshang bar bya/ shu dag de dag sngags pa'i lag mthil du bcug ste/ lag na 'dug bzhin du shu dag de 'gul zhing g.yo na 'grub pa'i mtshan ma yin te/ des mgo la bskus na
'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rim pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// snying khar bskus na sman dang/ rtsi dang/ ngo shes gtsug lag bon dang/ rgyu dang/ bzo la mkhas par 'gyur/ de'i
bsnyen pa dang sngags 'di dag bstan pas go bar shes bar bya'o// oM I i ma mu a pa tsi dung// zhes snying po 'di dag ma nor par byas na 'grub par nges so// gu gul nag po dang/ spra tshil dang/ dur

khrod kyi rdzas dang/ rta bon pho'i dug rdzas rnams sbyar ba yin no// 'jig rten skyong bas gzung du gsol/ ta ya na na/ i li i li/ mi li mi li pu pu ra sha li/ ri pu pu ta ka ya ma la tsa la ki la ya ki la bya
ka la khri sna phaT/ sngags 'di brjod cing zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe na dgra bgegs gsod nus so// 'di mar mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa bstan te/ de yang 'dzin rten las 'das pa'i mad nas 'byung ste/

drang srong rag sha nan zhes byas te/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bu yin te/ de'i ming ni rgyal po shes nyen can zhes bya ste/ lha dag drang srong ma lus pa sbyan drangs nas/ mchod pa byas pa dang/ lha ma hA de
wa kun gyis spyangs pa dang/ lha ma hA de wa'i dpral pa'i dkyil na mig yod pa las mchi ma thigs gcig zag pa las/ lha dang drang srong thams cad la rims nad byung ste/ mi la yang rims nad byung ste na
ba las/ lha ma hA de wa'i mig gi mchi ma rlung lha be ram ba'i lag tu bskur nas sa steng khyab par bskyed do// dang po rgya gar yul gyi phyir yang bskyed/ de nas 'phros te/ de ni bdud rtsi'i
mchog yin te/ bod skad du spang la skye ba'i sde tog bya/ rmu rkang gcig lug mig ces bya'o// rgya gar skad du ba hus ltas bya/ 'di ni sman dang bdud rtsi'i 'phrod du rab yin no// grib ma la bskams
nas bzhag na/ dug sna tshogs kyi 'phrod yin no// de la me tog lug mig dang/ byi la dang/ pu shud dang/ bya rog dang/ spyang ki dang/ bya rgod dang mi dang/ rta dang/ ba glang dang/ phag
rgod dang/ sprul de rnams la sbyar nas mig la bskus nas/ gsur chen la bdugs la/ tshes bcu gcig la skra bkrus na/ mgo la mchog ba glang gi rus sku ming chen zhes bya ste/ de yang bskus ba/

de la bsgrub pa zla ba nya gsum la lam po che'i bzhi mdo/ shing rkang gcig gi 'gur ma log par sngags 'di bzlas shing mig la bskus na/ nyin mtshan med par a tri sho de/ srid pa gsum gyi lha srin mthong bar

'gyur ro// oM ka la ka lin te pur ti si ti/ rba na du mu du mu/ da ni shi ni ris/ ma hA bu ra ka li le/ te log kya ne tsa na la swA b+ha dum ka ti swA hA/ badzra tsag na hUM hUM dza/ a tri sho hUM sa ti hUM si ti hUM ci ka sa ti/ hUM nya

na tsha la/ zhes snying po bzlas so// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ 'di na mar rmi lam mthong bar bya ba'i mngon shes bsgrub par bya ste/ da ci gong ma'i sman rnams chu khyor gang la sku glugs spang la mig la yang

bsku/ de'o 'og tu mtshan sna tshogs kyis lus bsku/ stegs bu dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du sngags 'di chu la sbyar ba'i sman rnams 'thungs nas nyal na/ rmi lam sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// t+yathA/ mu ga

le thA hA/ mu tsa ti thA hA/ dan sti li thA hA/ dun te li thA hA/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i tan/ tra las rna ba'i mngon shes bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ srin po pu sna'i rna ba zhes bya ste/ dur khrod kyi bdag po gshin rje rtsa mun tas

byas pas/ phag pa'i rna spabs byung bas/ phag pa'i rna bar bcug nas/ phag pa'i rna ba dang 'bras bu sngar bsgrul ba'i rna ba dang/ klad pa dang/ da ci gong du dmos pa'i rna ba dang sbyar nas/ ba spru ba dkar mo'i

'dab ma dang bsres nas mgo la bskus te/ sngags 'dis btab na/ 'jig rten gsum gyi skad dang sgra thos shing go bar 'gyur ro// hUM sho de bya sta gnya' na kro ta sam ni byi sta nas na zhes bsnyen pa bzlas

so// 'di ni mar sna'i mngon shes bsgrub pa bstan te/ shing sna ma'i 'bras bu ni/ sna chen me'i sna khrag yin te/ srid pa dang po chags tsam na skyes pas/ dpyid zla ra ba la smin pas sna ma'i 'bras bu dang/ dgral

ba'i sna dang sna khrag sbyar nas/ sna la bskus nas sngags btab na/ dri sna tshogs tshor ro// hUM nya nya bya ste/ snya se ga ti/ kha si ti/ bsnyen pa bzlas so// tshe'i mngon shes bsgrub ba/ thang shing

lo gsum stong lon pa'i lo ma 'thur du gug pa'i gseb na/ thang 'brum gyi gzugs can de'i yal ga 'thur du lo brgya 'am stong lon pa'i gseb nas yal ga drang po de gsum dang/ a ru ra sbyar te bcos la/ chung du nas tshom pa de

bkod ma khyor gang bsdus/ 'bras dang til mar dang zos na lo stong thub bo// zas za mi dgos 'phur ba thob bo// sngags la/ na mo b+h+ya rga si ti sa ga gnya' na'i b+han du/ a yu ra ga a yu byin du phus ma hUM/ zhes
bsnyen pa bzlas so// yang 'dir 'phrul thob pa bsgrub ste/ shugs pa phrag pa rgyas shug lo 'bras dkar po'i 'dab ma dang btsos la/ de tshos pa dang thang ru byung ste/ btang nas/ de legs par

bskus te/ 'das ma tsho bskams pa dang/ shug 'bras kyi snying po skang pa ston pa bskams te/ khre 'bras dang/ rgya sran dang/ a ru ra dang sbyar la/ de'i phye ma pho su re ka ra'i phye ma dang ti la mar sbyar ba'i pho tshoms

re/ nyin gcig la lan gsum za'o// 'phur yang thub/ zas kyang bza' mi dgos/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// sngags 'di bzlas so// na mo b+ha ga ba ga te/ si ti a yu ga dzA na a yu b+hin du/ a yu ma la tsa ya rba ya

rba la/ a yu ra ga sa ma ya hUM/ srin po dza la ya rag shan sha bsgral ba'i snying zhes bzlas so// 'di na mar sems mngon shes bsgrub pa bstan te/ sngon gnod sbyin bsgral ba'i snying yin te/ phyag na rdo rjes bsgral

nas/ tsit+ta skyur ba snying zho sha yin no// snying zho sha dang/ sngon klu'i rgyal po bya khyung kha ru nas khyer nas shi ba'i snying yin te/ na ga ge sar dang/ bya rgod kyi snying/ ne tsho'i snying dang/ mchog chen po lnga rnams kyi snying

dang sbyar nas bsgrubs te zos na/ srid pa gsum gyi lha srin gyi skyes gnas dang/ dus gsum gyi skye gnas dran par 'gyur ro// sngags 'di bzlas shing bsgrub bo// hUM tsit+ta sid+d+hi bo d+hi swAhA/ dz+nyA na kA ya ba tu badzra si

ti hUM/ zhes bzlas so// 'di na mar lce'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub ste/ me long kri khril lce'i ra zhes bya ste/ se ba'i me tog dang/ stang pal has zhes bya ste/ la phug gi me tog gnyis dang/ mchog chen po dang/

ne le'i lce dang/ klad pa go ro tsa na dang sbyar te bsgrubs na/ sngags 'di btab ste zos na/ ro sna tshogs kyi bro ba myong ba dang/ lce bde ba dang/ tshig lha srin gyis go bar 'gyur ro// hUM dzi ha bya gnya' ni ta hUM/

zhes bsnyen pa bzlas so// 'di na mar ma gnya' ba nyi shu gcig dang/ a ru ra nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ de las btsos te/ a ru ra sul bu rangs pa dang/ btsos pa'i khu ba a ru ra dang sbyar la btung/ sngags la/

byar su sha ta su ya hUM si swa ti/ rigs 'dzin thob/ phos 'thungs na bu khye'u bskyed/ bsnyen pa bzlas so// yang 'dir 'phrul thob pa dreg pa sta bsgrub ste/ zla ba gzas zin pa'i nub mo phur pa'i mngon shes bsgrub

par bya ste/ 'o lnga nas phur pa la 'tshal ba'i rdzas bsag sa la bskams la/ dkyil 'khor dbang dang zhi rgyas gang yang rung ba bzhengs la/ phur pa'i cho ga legs par byas la/ zla ba gzas zin pa sor chud chud

du/ phur bu lag tu 'dril zhing snying po 'di bzlas so// A+oM i i ma me mi mi/ kI li kI lA ya sa hUM/ badzra kI li kI lA ya si ti hUM/ kI li kI lA ya dz+nya na hUM/ zhes snying po bzlas pa dang/ ki la ya de dros nas
tsha 'ur 'ur song ba dang/ phur bu 'od gsal/ phur bu bsgrub pa yin pas/ bdud dang/ srin po dang/ dgra bgegs dang/ log 'dren gang la btab kyang thebs par 'ong bas 'di ltar sgrubs

shig/ dgra bo rtsa ba bdun brgyud tshun chad kyi gshed mar 'gyur ro// 'di na mar zor 'phang ba dang/ dgra bo gsad pa'i thabs bstan te/ zor gyi rdzas ldan la tshang bar bsham ste/ zla ba gzas zin pa'i nub mo

zor 'phangs pa'i skyogs kyi chu khal/ nas nag dang/ nyungs nag dang/ zor gyi skyogs kha rtsid pa nag pos bkab la/ skyogs kha bcad pa'i steng du yungs nag gi rgyal po blug ba'i snying po ni/ oM aM im ma ma na/

ga la khris sna sha ku la phaT phaT/ ces 'bum bzlas/ zla ba nag zlor chud pa dang snying po dang bsnyen pa byas nas/ zor skyogs sam/ yungs nag gi tshe dang/ nas dang/ mda' gzhu 'gul lam/ mda' 'am sgra

byung/ 'phangs nas grub pa'i bdud srin gang la 'phangs pa'i zor dang/ yang bstan du brlag pa'i bu tsha bdun brgyud yan chad kyi gnyen por 'gyur ro// 'di nas mar snga nas bshams la cong gzi dang/ lcong

gzi'i chu phul gang dang/ 'o ma bre gang gi nang du/ a ru ra nyi shu rtsa gcig blug pa'i chu dang/ cong zhi dang/ a ru ra gnyis dang/ a ru ra sul bu rangs pa dang/ 'o ma bde skye ru gyur pa dang/ cong gzi gsal/

shul ma blag pas skya song ba dang/ nyi ma'i gung la til mar dang bur mar dang bza' 'o// spyi bu khye'u skye'o// lo brgya thub/ sngags ni/ ir ma ta si ti/ be la li tshar chur na tsan d+ha lo swA hA/ 'jig rten 'das
pa'i mdo las/ chos thams cad kyi mdo la bzlas pa'i grub pa'i mngon shes bstan par bya ste/ chos kyi mdo nyi ma'i dmar thag chad nas/ nam sros pa dang bas chos kyis la la 'gying/ sangs rgyas lam bslab
dgos te/ rgyud re la gsang ba'i don re 'byung na/ de yang spyir mkhas pas gsungs/ bka' las 'byung ste mi 'gal legs/ bka' 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// spyi nyid blon pos kyang 'di

ltar 'dug pas/ rab tu dkon la legs pas don byos la/ slob ma snying dang 'dra ba la yang ston cing spyir ngan song du ltung bar byed pa ni mi dge ba bcu dang/ nyon mongs pa lnga dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byas

nas/ sems rgyud ma sbyangs pas ngan song du 'khrid do// mtho ris su 'khrid pa ni dge ba bcu dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ chos spyod bcus sna drangs nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni bsgoms pas 'don pa dang

'dra bar gar dmigs par phyin no// de'i phyir na sems la skye shi med pas sems gtso/ spyir sems ni rlung yin te/ gar phyin par phyin cing 'gro na/ ngal te zhe sdang gi dbang gis dmyal bar 'gro dgos na/
dmyal ba'i sgo bcod/ bcad pa'i sngags la/ sarba na ra gu du ma tha ma gi he ha byi ri ku/ zhes sgo bcad do// dmyal ba'i rgyal bo/ gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po a ba glang mgo can kha T+wAM kha thogs pa

phyir bskrad par bya'o// 'dod chags kyi dbang gis yi dgas su 'gro srid do// srid na/ sarba pre ta ma ge ste ha bya ra 'o ku/ zhes pas yi dwags kha 'bar ma sgrom bu thogs pa phyir bskrad do// gti mug gi dbang

gis byol song du 'gro srid na/ sngags 'dis byol song gi sgo bcad do// sarba ti ta ma ki he he ri bi sku/ zhes pas byol song gi rgyal po glang po che sa srungs kyi bu phyir bskrad do// nga rgyal gyi dbang gis mtha' 'khob

kyi gnas su skyes srid na/ sngags 'dis sgo bcad do/ sarba sra ni ma ke he ha bya ri bi sku/ zhes pas mi'i sgo bcad do// phrag dog gi dbang gis lha ma yin gyi gnas su skyes srid pas/ der skyes pa sngags

'dis sgo bcad do// sarba bi ga tra ya ste ba ma ke he ri ri ba ku/ zhes sgo bcad do// lha ma yin thags bzangs rigs mtshon cha thogs pa slar log go/ gal te drod gsher las skyes bar 'gro srid pas/ sngags

'dis sgo bcad do// sarba rtsa ma de he b+h+ya ti ti ku/ zhes sgo bcad do// dbyar gyi rgyal mo chu thog ma phyir bskrad do// gal te dmyal ba nas gyes nas mnar med par 'gro srid na/ sngags la/ tshe ra yam kye ho ha

bi ku/ zhes bcad do// srid pa'i rgyal mo mda' thogs pa phyir bskrad do// sgo nga la skyes par 'gro srid pas/ sngags ni/ a nya ma ga he ha ra byi kus sgo bcad do// nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig ni stod

mi la smad spyang kir 'dug pa phyir bskrad do// de nas lha'i sgo dbye ba ste/ sngags la/ a dang ma ma e ke ya phaT/ ces lha'i sgo dbye'o// tshangs pas lag nas drangs te/ de yan chad ting nge 'dzin gyi zas skom dang
longs spyod lus sems ye shes las 'gyur pa la/ rigs sems dpa' sems ma'o// rgyud 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ ye shes kyi ma mo'i pho nya ni/ shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed ma// mthing kha mchog
rnams gsang ba'i yum// kai ri nag mo dbyug to 'phyar// bdud bgegs 'dul ba'i las mdzod cig/ lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// gser gyi 'od 'phro mda' gzhu 'gengs// tse'u thabs kyi mda' gzhu
'phel// lho yi dgra bgegs dgug tu gsol// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs ma ni// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba mo// pra mo dmar mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed ma/ nag mo
ral pa thod pa 'gengs// pe ta nag mo rdo rje 'phyar// byang nas dgra bgeg dgug tu gsol// shar lho phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// bskal ba'i me 'bar rgyu 'phreng 'dzin// spu ka dmar ser 'jigs pa'i
gzugs// shar lho mtshams nas dgug tu gsol// lho nub mtshams nas 'gugs byed ma// ljang nag chen mo me 'bar ma// dkar mo rdo rje thod khrag 'thung// lho nub mtshams nas dgug tu
gsol// nub byang mtshams nas 'gugs byed ma// btsun mo zhe sdang spu gri'i so// sma sha mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nub byang mtshams nas dgug tu gsol// byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs pa
ni// kha T+wAM mtshon gyi char 'bebs ma/ tsan da ser skya char 'bebs ma// tsan d+ha has kya 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ byang shar mtshams nas dgug tu gsol// dza dza ang gu sha dza/ dpal chen thugs kyi pho nya
ste// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// badzra mu ste 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma rdo rje sku 'bar ma// dkar mo lag na rdo rje 'phyar// shar gyi phyogs nas dgug tu gsol// shar lho mtshams nas 'gugs
byed ma// mun ste a na 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma me khyer glog 'phreng 'dzin// mur ti drag mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ ser mo lag me tog bsnams// shar lho mtshams nas dgug tu gsol// lho yi
phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// mu ti ya ma 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma gshin rje skar ma stong// sdon mo 'od kyi mda' 'phen ma// lho yi phyogs nas dgug tu gsol// lho nub mtshams nas 'gugs pa
ni// mug ti drag sha 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma srin mo ral gri 'dzin// lho nub mtshams nas dgug tu gsol// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// mi ting nA ga 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma klu
mo lce 'bebs ma// dmar mo lag na thod 'bebs ma// nub kyi phyogs nas dgug tu gsol// nub byang mtshams nas 'gugs pa ni// mun pa yang ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma rlung bdag ba dan
'phyar// byang nub mtshams nas dgug tu gsol// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed ni// mun ti ba ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma gnod sbyin khyung thogs ma// ljang nag lag na khra thogs ma// byang gi
phyog nas dgug tu gsol// byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs pa ni// mun ting ru dra 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma 'jigs byed ban glang sna// mthing kha lag na mdung thung 'phen// byang shar mtshams nas
dgug tu gsol// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// mur sti su rgya 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ser mo lag na nyi zla thogs// stang gi phyogs nas dgug tu gsol// 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// mu sti
bab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma phag gdong sa bdag mo// nag mo lag na bum pa 'dzin// 'og gi phyogs nas dgug tu gsol// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyu las/ ye shes kyi ma mo dang 'bar ba'i pho nyas
dgra bgegs 'gugs pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i don la/ dang po bcom ldan 'das

zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi bcom ste/ sbyor ba ye shes kyis zin pas lha'i bu'i bdud bcom pa dang/ phung po lnga rigs lngar bsgoms pas phung po'i bdud bcom/ ting nge 'dzin thang lhod med par bsgroms pas las
dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom/ sgrol ba snying rjes zin pas 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom la/ rnam pa gcig tu 'dul ba tsham rngam gyi rigs bzhi he ru ka dang/ khro bo rnams dang/ lha chen po'i zhabs 'og tu

bcug cing/ sgal tshig bcom pas kyang bcom la/ yang rnam pa gcig tu 'jig rten gsum na mthu che la dbang btsan pas kyang/ bdud dang/ srin po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ de
rnams bcom pas kyang bcom/ ldan pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyis 'khor ye shes las las grub pa dang/ las grub dang lngan pas kyang ldan no// 'das pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas kyang 'das
so// theg pa dgu'i 'og ma kun la 'das pas kyang 'das pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i he ru ka'i gal po yin pas kyang 'das so// dpal he ru ka zhes pa la/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka'i dpal zhes kyang

bya na/ 'dis thugs rje chen pos bdud dang srin po 'dul bas kyang kun gyi dpa' yin la/ ma mo dang mkha' 'gro kun gyi dpal yin pas kyang dpal yin no// pad+ma zhes pa ni/ pad+ma 'dam nas skyes kyang 'dam

gyis ma gos pa dang/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin sbyor sgrol gyi chos spyod kyang bag chags dang skyon gyis ma gos so// he ru ka zhes pa ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha srin bdud dang bgegs kun

las kyang rab tu 'phags te/ gzhan gyis mi tshugs shing mthu che la dbang btsan pas lta ba dang spyod pa'i don/ a ti yo ga'i don bya btsal dang bral zhing 'das pas/ khro bo kun gyi thog ma yin pas kyang he ru

ka'o// dpal chen po he ru ka de 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang du/ rin po che ye shes las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang tshad dpag tu med pa yum gyi mkha' pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa ste/ rdo rje bla re

mig mangs ris su bres pa/ 'og rdo rje'i gzhal yas su bkram pa/ de'i 'og kyang 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho/ zhe sdang rus pa'i phung po/ gti mug sha'i ri rab kyi steng na/ rin po che'i khri rkang brgyad pa la/ khri

rkang gi bar re re na sprin med pa'i nyi ma bdun bdun brtsegs mar shar ba/ khri rkang de'i bar gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum gsum bdun bzhi nyi shu rtsa brgyad ye shes las grub pa'i tshul du kha phyogs bzhi tshams
brgyad du gzigs pa/ de'i bar bar khri rkang gi gseb seng ge gnas pas/ kun tu bzang po la 'khor ba btsal gyis ma rnyed pas/ dbye ba med pa'i sa la mnyam pa nyid kyi klong du gnas pas rgyu
'bras kyi chos dang/ las sdug bsngal dang/ sku dang ye shes kyi chos thams cad la sems kyi dbang bskur bas/ rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang rdzogs pas/ 'di ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbang bskur yang
mi 'gal/ ma bskur kyang dbang thams cad rdzogs pas/ gser sa dbung la kha blangs mi dgos/ blangs kyang mi 'gal ba dang 'dra'o// de'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so// yod cing rdzas su snang na
yang// snang zhing srid pa'i ye shes brgyan// med cing chad par snang na yang// khams gsum thams cad stong pa'i dbyings// yod med gnyis las 'das na yang// don gyi mchog ni bcom pas kyang/ gser gyi

mdog gzi 'phags rdo rje'i sing ha ma/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dpung 'joms/ rtags zhes bya/ pad+ma rtsa la brgyad pa'o// khri rkang de rnams la yang pad+ma he ru klu las grub pa yin pas sbrul nag chen mo'i

gdan byas nas bzhugs so// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas/ shar dri za/ lho gshin rje/ nub klu/ byang gnod sbyin/ me lha dang/ srin po dang/ rlung lha dang/ dbang ldan de rnams zhabs 'og tu gdan byas nas

bzhugs so// de nas 'khor der he ru ka'i sprul pa dang/ yum chen mo kro d+hI shwa ri la sogs pa yum gyi tshogs/ ye shes dang las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ pho nya dang/ dbang
phyug ma la sogs tshogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po la bskor ba byas nas brkyang phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu bkod 'khod de 'di skad brjod do// e ma ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sangs rgyas

bde chen nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mun sel he ru ka// dpal mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'khor ba/ dpal chen po badzra he ru ka yis bka' bstsal pa/ kye bcom ldan
'das pad+ma he ru ka/ tan tra 'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyud 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pa des thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ bsgom pa'i dgos ched dang/ thabs dang/ 'bras bu dang gsum mo// sgom pa'i dgos ched ni/ sems can
gyi gzung 'dzin gyi dbang gis/ dngos po dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba yin pas/ de'i gnyen por rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom par bya'o// bsgoms pa'i thabs ni/ 'khor ba dang mya
ngan las 'das pa thams cad rang gi sems las gud na med// gzung 'dzin dang bral ba ni mya ngan las 'das par snang la/ gzung 'dzin dang ma bral ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan du 'dug pa'i

gzhi'o// shes pa rnam pa gsum gyis snod rnam pa gsum gyi kha phye ste/ rnam par mi rtog pas rgyud sbyangs te/ skad cig ma rang bzhin med par dmigs te/ snga ma ni 'das/ phyi ma ni ma byung/ da ltar ni mi gnas

pas/ chos kyi sku las mi zhen par yang rig par byas pas/ rang bzhin med par gzung 'dzin gnyis kas stong ste/ gleng gzhi dang khungs kyis stong ste/ stong pa yang med/ mi stong pa yang med/ dbu mar yang mi
dmigs te/ rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po mi rtog pa'i sems yi ge a dang sbyar nas/ bdag gzugs brnyan yi ge a ci la yang mi dmigs/ mi sems par bsgom pa ni dgos ched do// bsgom pa'i thabs ni/
lus srang phyag rgya byas nas zhes pas/ bdag gi yi ge a de ltar bsgom zhing med pa kho na 'o// bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni/ bdag rgyu sems can gyi dus na de ltar bsgoms pas/ 'bras bu 'phags pa'i gnas

skabs su sku ni chos sku thob la/ ye shes stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes thob/ bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu'o// de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'byung ba 'di skad gsungs so// rnam par mi rtog ye

shes skye med cing// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtha' nyams ma chags dbyings// thams cad spros bral mnyam nyid ji bzhin dbyings// rnam rtog spros bral yul las 'das// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na sa

mA d+hi swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes snying po brjod pas/ ta thA ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// ma hA ni chen mo/ shU n+ya ta ni stong pa'o// dz+nyA na ni ye shes so// sa mA d+hi ni ting nge 'dzin no// swa b+hA wA a t+ma ko\u0f85haM ni

bdag kho na byin gyis rlobs shig pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o// de ltar bsgoms pas kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ bsgom pa'i dgos ched ni/ rtog pa

'byung ba dang/ chos 'phrul 'byungab bstan pa dang/ sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin bkod pa dag go/ don dam par ni bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i yi ge a snang ba las kyang/ chos sku las mi zhen par snang la/ kun rdzob
tu 'dus byas kyi snang ba la dgongs te/ gnyen por chos stong pa snang ste/ de go 'byed par snang ba'o// bsgom pa'i thabs ni/ gzugs 'dzin dang bral bar shes la/ bdag gi sems nam mkha'i dkyil na yi ge

a gza' skur ma pa wa sangs shar ba lta bu kun tu snang bas na kun tu snang ngo// bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyu sems can gyi dus na de ltar bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'phags pa'i dus na sku ni longs spyod rdzogs
pa'i sku thob la/ ye shes las so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi thob bo// de yang 'byung ba 'di skad do// ma ltar byams pa'i snying rjes kun la khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul

'byung bar bstan// kun la khyab pa'i ye shes gsal ba las// rin chen gter ltar che ba'i khyad par bstan// hUM s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra hUM/ sarba tsan+Da ni t-i/ d+harma d+hA tu/ sa mA na d+hi swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes kun

tu snang gi tir nge 'dzin nam langs pa'i kha dog dang 'dra bar bsgoms te/ de yan chad rang rgyud thabs kyi bsgom pa'o// de ni gnyen po rim par bsgom pa ni/ rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i dgos ched ni/
bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs so// bsgom pa'i thabs ni/ bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brnyan byang chub kyi sems ni/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos thams cad la
dbang bskur bas/ hUM dmar po gcig tu gyur pa las/ ye shes bskyed pa gcig gsal bar bsgoms te/ phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ 'phags pa'i thugs dam bskul/ 'gro ba'i rgyud sbyangs/ bdud btul/

bgegs bcom/ slar 'dus pa las/ hUM de las phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur/ rdo rje sku phyag rgya chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ de yang sprul pa'i badzra he ru kar gyur/ da ci dang la rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs su

zhugs tsam na/ mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur bzhugs pa las/ badzra he ru kar gyur pa ni/ dur khrod kyi rgya nad gus brgyan par bzhugs pa las/ de las kyang dpa' chen

po pad+ma he ru kar gyur te bsgom pa ni/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad/ zhabs brgyad par sprul pa las/ rdo rje'i gshog pa bzhis kyang bteg pa/ rta mgo lngas kyang mtshon pa gcig kyang gsal bar bsgom mo// rgyu'i

ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni sprul pa'i sku thob ste/ yang sprul dang sprul pa'i he ru ka thob la/ 'khor yang sprul pa mang pos bskor ba'o// ye shes las rang rig pa'i ye shes dang bya ba grub pa'i ye

shes thob bo// de yang dbang po'i rim pa bsgoms pas/ byung ba stab pa ni 'di skad do// yi ge hUM ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// chags pa'i skyon bral pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ pad+ma 'dam las skyes kyang 'dam mi

gos// sangs rgyas che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho rlabs ltar zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor 'byung// ha thun sa ma ti s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ zhes slar bsdus pa'o// de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum
po bshad cing bka' stsal nas/ 'khor der 'dus pa rnams la phyag btsal mchod pa phul lo//// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las bam po gsum pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bka' stsal
pa ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pas/ chos drag shul dang/ sprul pa dang/ pho nya dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ cho ga la sogs pa drag shul mang ba 'byung bas 'jig rten las 'das

pa'o// de yang sgras drangs na lo ga dang ra su dras bya'o// de nas dpal chen po lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i gtso bo yis/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs gnas rdzogs par bya'o// bskyed par bya'o// bsgom zhing

bskyed pa 'di skad do// gzhal yas khyad par yin zhing pho brang ni// rin chen mchog byin dbang gi yul du bstan// kun tu rol pas ca ri yang rol pa'i dbyings// thams cad chos dbyings yum gyi dkyil 'khor

du// dngos rnams thams cad nam mkha' mnyam pa'i yum chen kun tu bzang// cir yang skye med thabs kyi phyag rgya che// zhes pa dang/ rdo rje gzhal yas khang nam mkha'i cha dang mnyam// rkang pa yid bzhin rin
chen mchog las grub// sprin med nyi ma bdun brtsegs gsal ba'i rgyan/ 'gyur med 'jigs pas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// mgo po dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// mi g.yo brtan pas rdo rje lhun po

'dra// zhes pas gzhal yas khang ye shes gsal bas grub/ rdo rje rtsig pas gtams te/ rdo rje steng bla re rgya gram mig mangs ris su bris pa/ 'og rdo rje'i gcal du bkram ba/ nyi zla thod sprul gyis brgyan pa/

mdog dmar po/ dbyibs zla gam/ me ri smug nag 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bsam mo// oM d+harma d+hA tu ka ba na da sarba ba at+ma ko\u0f85haM/ snying po brjod pas/ yang hUM phyogs bcur 'phros/ slar 'dus pa las/

khri rkang rin chen 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung sku la ma bdun snyoms par 'khril// rang na ra ti tri/ zhes brjod pas/ rkang pa bzhi rtsig tu gyur to// khri rkang de bzhi ni he ru ka khrag 'thung chen

po bzhi'irang bzhin mngon du gyur ba'o// 'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na// stong gsum mun nag sel ba'i ma ma ki/ ma sUr+Ya maN+Dal hUM/ zhes brjod pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ sprin

med pa nyi ma bdun shar ba ni gsang ba'i yum bdun gyi rtags so// yang hUM de 'phros/ slar 'dus pa las 'di skad do// dbang phyug mar 'dus shing sing nga tsam la// mthu rtsal chags pas che ba'i dbang ldan

ma// oM pang tsam pa la bi ma la si ti hUM/ zhes pas gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ khri 'phangs bzhi la ma 'dres pa brgyad du snang ba'i phyogs bzhi na/ mtshams bzhi nas te nyi shu rtsa brgyad khyi
tshugs su kha phyogs bzhir bltas/ mjug ma dbus su bstan nas gnasas pa 'di rnams ni dbang phyug ma rnams kyi rtags so// 'jug skor rgyal la ni gtso bo la mnyes pa 'bul ba'i rtags so// sing nga tsam pa
la ni gser gyi seng ge yin la/ ba la ma byi mo yin la/ si ti ni dngos grub 'bul ba'o// yang hUM de phyogs bcur 'phros/ slar 'dus pas 'di skad do// 'dam gyi skyon bral pad+ma kha brgyad

pa// rigs mchog gzi ldan gsang ba yum gyi dbyings// oM pad+ma rak+ta ma hA rak+ta hri/ zhes brjod pas pad+ma le brgan kha brgyad par gyur/ pad+ma ni sangs rgyas rigs mchog brgya'i rang bzhin/ yul gyi mkha'
dbyings rnam par dag pa yin la/ rak+ta mtshal chen mo chags pa'i rtags so// yang de 'phros 'dus pa las 'di skad brjod do// rigs gnyis dbyer med gcig tu bsgoms pa las/ grangs med rgyal ba'i sku la

'phros pa yi// dbu gsum phyag drug 'bar ba'i thugs ka ru// rdo rje phra mo pad+ma'i thugs kar 'phro// sarba ta thA ga ta badzra/ sarba ta thA ga ta ta tha a hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
dpa' dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dkar/ g.yon dmar/ dbus mthing kha/ phyag drug ye shes drug gi phyag rgya/ rdo rje/ 'khor lo/ rin po che/ pad+ma/ ral gri/ dril bu bsnams/ de'i thugs kar ye shes

sems dpa' mtshon gang pa rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa dang/ de'i sgal tshigs nas brgyud shangs nas brgyud de 'di skad do// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed hUM sgra can// hUM gis srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// hUM
gis nyon mongs dug lnga gsum ka 'joms mdzad pa// hUM gis thams cad 'joms shing thams cad rdzogs// hUM gis ngan song gnas nas stong par byed// hUM gis bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol// hUM gis dus

gsum rgyal thams cad bskyed// hUM gis pad+ma ma hA shrIH he ru ka/ mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ pad+ma kro ti shwa ri de ba ti tams na dza la ni hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas// hUM dang pos 'jig rten gyi

khams khengs/ hUM gnyis pas ye shes kyi me spar/ hUM gsum pas bag chags kyis sgrib pa sbyangs/ hUM bzhi pas de dag kun gyi sems hUM du gyur/ hUM lngas de dag kun slar 'dus/ hUM drug pas de dag kun pad+ma he

ru kar 'gyur/ sku che la yan lag rags pa dang/ sku mdog dmar thag chad pa dang/ dbu lnga rigs lnga dbu la rta mgo dang 'dra ba/ dbu bzhi rigs bzhi dbu dgu/ phyag bco brgyad 'phra men bcu drug par bsam
mo// zhabs brgyad khro bo brgyad/ gshog pa bzhi 'phrin las bzhir bsam ste/ de la dbu dgu ye shes lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi mnga' gsol te 'di skad do// phyogs bzhir 'bar ba'i sku bstan pas// dbu dgu 'bar

ba'i dbu rgyan ldan// spyi mthun lnga lnga sku yi rgyan du che// tsakra oM bruM/ tsakra hUM bruM/ tsakra swa bruM/ tsakra hri bruM/ zhes brjod pas tsakra la 'khor lo// bruM las gzhal yas khang du gyur pa las/ yig 'bru lnga las rgyal ba'i
sku las so so'i yum dang ldan par gyur to// de nas rta mgos dbang bskur zhing mnga' gsol ba 'di skad do// dbang gi rta gdong 'phrin las mgyogs pa ni// rnam shes myur mgyogs glog gi rgyan

du bstan// oM shriHbadzra sa twa sa ta ma mu sa ku ka yo ga'i shwa ri/ ha ya g+h+ri ba/ zhes brjod pas dbu lnga'i spyi bor rta mgo ljang khu re byung bar gyur/ dbu gzhan pa rigs bzhi dbu rgyan re re byung ba'o// de nas thod

'phreng gis mnga' gsol ba'o// dung chen khong seng sgyu ma'i thod 'phreng ni// dbang po dbyer med shes rab rtogs pa'i rgyan du bstan// rangan ra tri kro d+hi shwa ri dza la sra dz+wa la/ mu ti ka sa la/ ma ku ta ma/ mu ti ra ta

ka la/ he he kha T+wAM kha badzra tri shu la ko'u ra/ hUM hUM he ma he ma ru tra ma ma hA sra b+ha ba hUM phags ma hA/ zhes pas thod pa tshar gsum gyi dbu rgyan dang/ mgur chu dang/ dpung rgyan/ phyag gdub/ zhabs gdub brgyan

par gyur/ de nas rdo rje gshog pa bskyed pa 'di skad do// yid bzhin rin chen 'byung ba'i gshog pa can// re ba skong byed dpag bsam ljon shing 'dra// 'phrin las rnam bzhi re skong rtogs pa'i rgyan// oM sum+b+ha ni

gr-i h+na gr-i h+na pa ya A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bA na bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ ma badzra sa ka a bi ra tsa/ ka ma ku ru shan ti swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje rgyu rin po che las byas pa/ grub pa ye shes las grub pa/ sgro'i khung sbrul nag
gi mgo thams cad rdo rje'i thu'i 'phran yan chad bltams pa/ 'jig rten 'gyed pa'i gzhis 'degs pa/ de ni zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi las bzhis sems can kun la ma ltar byams par 'gyur ro// de

nas pad+ma he ru ka klu las grub pas sbrul nag 'jigs byed rgyan du che// dug lnga ma spangs dbang gi thabs su rtogs// klu chen gdul ba dbang gi thabs su bstan// na kar tsa ha he ru lu lu hUM/ zhes brjod pas
sbrul nag gi chun pos dbu rgyan dang/ mgur chu dang/ phyag gdub/ dpung rgyan/ do shal dang/ zhabs gdub byas par bsam mo// de nas zhabs kyi rgyan chas kyi mnga' gsol ba 'di skad do// dpa' bo rab

brjid ting nge 'dzin snon pa'i stabs// rno sdug zlog byed rgya bye lcags kyi chas// shes rab ting 'dzin bcas pa'i chas// dbang gi bse khrab 'bar ba brjid pa'i chas// dpal brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khyim
ba'i chas// dmar zas dbang phyug zangs kyi mche ba can// gzi mdangs chu skyes chu gri sprul cing rol// gcan gzan rgyal po stag 'dul zhabs la gsol// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad khro rgyal 'dul ba'i

stabs// zhes brjod pas/ shi hi ra tsi tri a gar pa ya/ hri pad+mad ban ta ma/ dzim pa na ka ra byi ni he me tri ra na/ ting ling rba ram pa yaMswAhA/ zhes pas zhabs brgyad sems ma brgyad du gyur/ lA s+ya/ mA le/ gI rti/

nirti/ badzra d+hU pe/ puSh+pe/ A lo ke/ gan+d+he hUM/ zhes pas chas brgyad sems dpa' brgyad du gyur pas/ oM badzra sa ma ti sha ra hUM/ zhes brjod pas ting 'dzin brgyad du gyur/ de nas khro bo dag gdan du

'ding ba 'di skad do// tshad med che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// nga rgyal mthu mnyam bdun dpung rang bshig nas// 'jig rten skyod pa'i gdan ni che ba yi// stobs ldan dbang phyug che ba mnan// kro ti na ta

ni hAM/ ka ra bi dza ya/ ni la tan tra/ ya man ta ka/ Ar+ya a tsa la/ ha ya g+h+ri ba/ a pA ra tsit+ta/ a mr-i ta kun Da li/ trai lo kya bi dza ya/ mahA ba la/ a ka ni tsa ya/ ya ma hi ti/ bu run yaM ba bye/ ba tu tra/ swur+ya zan+d+ra a
ti b+ha/ sum pa ram pa nan/ zhes brjod pas khro bcu snod sgo bcad pa bzhin mnan par bsam/ khro bo bcu'i gdan du yang phyogs skyong bcu mnan te/ zhabs snying khar bol man chad nub nas/ sgal tshigs

'joms snyings 'byin te/ de'i byin rlabs kyis phyogs skyong bcu sgra 'byin skad ngan 'don te/ khro bo'i zhabs 'og tu bzhag pa bzhin no// de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs la 'di skad do// khro mdzub
phyag rgya 'di bcings pas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// bdud ni mar la sdig ces bya// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// phyogs skyong bcu rnams dbang du sdud// ces brjod pas/ in dra dang/

ag ni dang/ ya man dang/ ti ta rag sha dang/ ba ru na dang/ ya ma dang/ ru tra dang/ sUr+ya dang/ tsan dra dang/ a ti b+ha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin man chad/ skyes bu zhags pas btab pa bzhin du

dbang du 'dus par gyur to// de nas mtshon cha lnga'i char dbab pa 'di skad do// dpal chen rdo rje thog thog ser ltar 'bebs// hUM dang phaT sgras srid gsum 'khor ba 'jigs// sprul pa'i khro bo mang pos sprin
ltar 'khrigs// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// rdo rje mtshon chas gnam lcags thog pa la// gsang sngags log pa'i chos rnams thams cad 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar
yang// sdig pas sel cing nyon mongs gzhan rmongs med pa'o// bi ta lcags kyus bzung nas ye shes lnga byang chub sems su rtags byin pa dang/ ye shes gnyis su med pa dang// yi ge hri'i byin brlabs/

'phags pa mchod/ 'gro ba'i don byas/ rigs lnga'i sku bskyed/ hUM gi gzhal yas khang sgo bcad/ phyir ldog pa rdo rje rgya gram gyi sgo bcad do// sems mda' rtse la blangs la 'og min du kun tu bzang po'i gnas
su 'phangs la btang ngo// yum lnga bdud rtsi'i bum pa nas byang chub sems su dbang bskur/ rigs lngas ni byin gyis brlabs/ sems dpa' dang sems ma'i mchod pa byed/ ma mo mkha' 'gros ni dngos grub kyi
stong 'debs/ khro bo dang khro mos ni bar chad kyi bgegs 'jil zhing mtshams gcod/ 'phra men dang po nyas ni mngag gzhug dang las bsgrub/ tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa dbang phyug

tshogs ni las byed do// de nas dug gsum gyi mchod pa yang/ 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho la// 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol// oM pad+ma shriH he ru ka/ ma nA tsan dra swa b+hA ba duSh+ta na/ ta ka pa tsa hUM

phaT/ oM tsakra hUM bruM/ tsakra sa bruM/ tsakra hri bruM/ tsakra hra bruM/ zhes brjod pas mtshon cha shangs kyi rlung sgo nas mtshon cha'i phab ste/ lus kyi rtog pa sbyangs/ khams gsum bshig gril te/ sems ye shes su bskyed
do// de nas 'dud kha gcig 'di skad brjod do// chos nyid stong pa byang chub sems su rol// ye shes lnga ldan byang sems thugs su rol// gsang chen yab yum byang chub sems la rol// sems dpa' ye shes

rigs lnga'i sems la rol// badzra satwa rA dza/ bud+d+ha sa twa rA dza/ rat+na sa twa ra dza/ pad+ma sa twa rA dza/ karma sa twa rag ta dz+wa la ma hA kha raM kha'i/ zhes rus pa'i phung po 'khor bcas ma lus bzhes su gsol/ ma hA keng

ni rA dza la kha raM kha'i/ gti mug sha yi phung po la// 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol// ma hA rag ta dz+wa la kha raM khA hi/ de nas nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma la bstabs te/ rngam pa glog gi dkyil 'khor la/

rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul// dpa' bo rdo rje khro bo'i 'jigs bcas pas// rigs sngags don la yang dag sbyar// khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong khyil li li// rus pa'i phung po khrol lo lo// rdo rje zhing chen dri ngad

pungs se pungs// ban+d+ha ma mo'i tshogs ni rdza ltar spungs// mthong thos rnga ma pa mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang rol// kha kha lo ye pA sha ba ga a la la ho/ zhes brjod pas mkha' 'gro zhing la rol par gyur/ lhag ma

'dab kyi ri rab tsam/ dpal pad+ma ha ya g+h+ri bas bsdus/ byang chub sems su bsgyur/ yan lag nying lag bsrungs pas/ hri badzra pad+ma hUM/ ha he phaT b+ho ru lu ru lu hring hring/ ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM Ta/ e a ra li

hri hring/ bsnyen pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas so// cho ga yang zla ba gzas zin pa'i nub mo bya'o// de la gzhal yas khang rnam pa gsum ste/ yangs pa dang/ rgya che ba dang/ dbyings ye shes kyi khyad par can dang
gsum mo// de la yang yangs pa ni mtha' dbus med par las bya'o// 'dod chen ni ye shes lhun gyis grub/ dbyings dang ye shes kyi khyad par can ni/ gzhug pa dang/ pad+ma gsang ba la yab yum 'bral ba med

pa'o// de la mdog dmar ba med pa ni yum gyi mkha' rnam par dag pa'i tshul lo// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni pad+ma le brgan/ yum 'dod ma'i dbyings te/ pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos la/ yum gyi mkha' la yang bag
chags kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa'i tshul lo// dbyibs zla gam ni dbang gi rgyal po'i gzhugs gnas yin pa'o// nam mkha'i tshad pa med pa ni nam mkha' stong pa las 'phags pa'i sprul pa 'byung ba'i

rang bzhin stong zhing bdag med pa'o// stengs rdo rje'i bla re mig mangs ris su bris pa ni/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i byin brlabs rdo rje dbyings kyi pho brang gi rtags te/ de ltar sra zhing mkhregs pa rdo rje'i gur te/

de'i bar rin po che gnya' na zlum po ni/ sems can re 'dod yid bzhin du skong ba'o// rin po che khri rkang bzhi pa brgyan du snang ba ni/ khri rkang bzhi he ru ka'i rang bzhin la/ rta krid chen po bzhi'i rtags so// khri

rkang gi rgyu rin po che las byas pa ni/ rin po che sems can 'dod pa dang/ srog gi mi zin pa yang yin la/ ye shes gsal ba'i rtags so// bar de nas sprin med pa'i nyi ma bdun bdun 'char ba ni/ 'jig rten
na 'od gsal ba'i nyi ma yin la/ nyi ma ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yang yin la/ 'od gsal ba yin la/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin ma nor bar gsal ba yang nyi ma yin la/ gsang ba'i yum du byin gyis brlabs pas/

dkyil 'khor du bzhugs so// gza' dang skar ma la sogs pa mdun khung byas pa ni/ 'od gsal zhing ye shes kyi rtags so// bar bar na dri za dang/ gshin rje dang/ rlung lha dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ me lha dang/
srin po dang/ rlung bdag dang/ dbang ldan rnams gnas pa ni/ che ba'i rtags 'jig rten dbang mdzad pas/ de'i steng na khro bo gnas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtan no// bar na gser mdog rtsal

'phar sing ngam/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad bdud dpung 'dul zhing 'joms par mdzad ces pa ni gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa lhan cig pa ni dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la/ spyan gsum ni

ye shes bye brag tu yang bstan te/ khyi pho tshugs su kha phyir bltas pa ni/ dang po nas rang rang gis las khas blangs pas las byed pa'i tshul lo// mjug gor nang du bltas pa ni/ gtso bo la mnyes pa 'bul ba'i

tshul lo// de la rtsal brgyad ni/ chos nyid kyi rtsal ni thams cad gshig pa ni yin/ ye shes kyi rtsal ni ci la yang thogs pa med/ rdo rje'i rtsal ni phyogs med par byams pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal ni rtogs shing
goms pa'o// yon tan gyi rtsal ni ci la yang thogs pa med pa'o// dbang gi rtsal pad+ma he ru kas dbang du sdud pa/ 'phrin las kyi rtsal ni 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba sems can gyi don ji bzhin mdzad

pa'o// dngos grub kyi rtsal ni mngon shes lnga rdzogs pa las/ mthu dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ ci la yang thogs pa med pa'o// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad po des mdzad pa bstan pa'o// gdan de kun la yang phyi snod kyi
che yin no// gser mdog seng ge'i gnad ni dbang phyug ma yin la// nyi zla 'od kyi gdan ni gsang ba'i yum du bstan// dri ma med pa'i gtan ni gsang ba'i yum mo ru bstan/ dri ma med pa'i stan
ni yum gyi mkha' dbyings la/ ta krid brgyad po'i gdan ni 'jig rtenalas 'das pa'o// dbang gi rtsal ni 'jig rten dbang du mdzad pas/ thabs kyis che zhing phyogs skyong ba na/ 'jig rten 'das pa dbang du

sdud par mdzad/ thabs kyi che ba ni khro bo bcu gdan du byas pa'o// bla na med pa dbang du mdzad pa thabs kyi che ba ni/ ma hA de ba la sogs pa gdan du byas pa dang/ rigs lnga dbus rdzogs pa dbang gi rtsal
lo// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ dpal pad+ma he ru kas lha chen po gdan du byas pa dang/ pad+ma gnas kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// tan tra chen po 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ da rigs gcig tu bsgrub

pa bstan par bya ste/ dang po hUM las phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur/ de las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rdzogs pa gcig tu gyur/ de las dpal chen po pad+ma he ru kar
gyur pa'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms pas/ rigs gnyis gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ste/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje'i rigs yin la/ pad+ma he ru ka na pad+ma'i rigs yin pas/ rigs gnyis
las dbyer med par gcig tu snang bas gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya'o// de las gzhal yas khang de lta bu'i nang na bzhugs pa'i mnga' bdag gang lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku che la yan lag

rags pa/ dbu dgu/ phyag bco brgyad/ zhabs brgyad/ dbu gong ma lnga rta mgo las byung ba'i 'og ma bzhi mtshams bzhir gzigs pa/ gshog pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ sku mdog dmar po la dur khrod kyi rgyan chas sku

la gsol ba/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa gcig gzhal yas khang de'i dbus pad+ma'i lte ba la/ e gru gsum gyi steng na dbang phyug chen po ma hA de ba'i steng na/ yab yum ma hA kro ti shwa ri dang brkyang bskum gyi tshul du
bzhugs so// de'i 'khor rnams bsgom pa'i dus ni/ gsangs nas sbas pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ rdul tshon la bkod pa'i dus ni/ pad+ma'i phyi rim na ni ye shes dang las las grub pa'i 'phra men ma bcu drug bkod

la/ pad+ma la ni yab yum brgyad bkod/ khro bo brgyad kyi khri rkang la khro bo dang khro mo dang spel ma/ sems dpa' dang sems ma khri rkang bzhi'i rang bzhin la/ dbang phyug ma ni bar bar gyi seng ge'o// gsang ba'i
yum bzhi ni nyi mar bstan pa lags// de nas byung gdon pa 'di skad do// hUM/ khro bo rgyal po rta mgrin rta skad can// ral pa dmar la 'bar ba me mdog can/ khro bo 'bar ba'i zhal ni phyogs bzhir gzigs/
khros pa'i spyan bgrad khro gnyer sprin dmar bzlog pa bzhin/ glog stong 'gyur ba'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro// glog bang 'dzin pas mche ba dkar po gtsig/ sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra

las// zhing lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi sku la gsol// glang chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi sku la na bzar bsnabs// stag gi sham thabs g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// thod rlon 'phreng ba sku yi rgyan du byas// sbrul
nag stong gis phyag gdub sku yi rgyan// ba su ta yi zhags pa sku la bsnams// thal chen khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// pad+ma gsang ba yum dang gnyis med pas/ 'bar ba chen po pad+ma'i klong na

bzhugs// dpal chen ma yi 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho rnams// dkyil 'khor rim bzhin 'bar ba spyan drangs te// pad+ma'i rgyal po dbang mchog rigs kyi gtso// thugs rje chags pa'i dbang phyug sku mnga' ba/ khro
rgyal 'jigs byed ye shes thugs rje can// pad+ma'i rgyal po 'dir gshegs 'khor dang spyon// chags med chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la// pad+ma dmar po 'dam skyes mdog ltar snang/ khams gsum srid pa

gsum la mnga' mdzad pas// chags rab rgyal po 'dir gshegs 'khor dang spyon// 'od zer glog stong 'gyu ba'i byin rlabs sku skyod cig/ thugs dam hUM dang phaT kyi ser 'bebs shing/ khro bo sprul pa mang po
'khor dang bcas// ma tshogs 'phra men dbang phyug gshegs su gsol// 'od zer dmar smug 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// yum la rol pas brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// phyag char mtshon cha 'phra men

'bar ba thogs// khro bo'i zhabs kyis mnan nas 'dir gshegs shig/ rdo rje klong dgu dur khrod chen po nas// 'phra men rgya mtsho chu srin 'dzin par rol// he ru ma bdun dbang phyug 'khor dang spyon// ta krid

'khor bcas 'dir gshegs mchod par bzhes// da ni phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal ba'i sku ni chos sku pad+ma'i gdung// chos rje 'od dpag med pas rdo rje chos// spyan ras gzigs dbang hri las rngam chen sku// rtas

mgrin rta skad bzhad la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang chen kun 'dus dbang gi rgyal po ste// dbang gi mdog dmar bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// dbang chen rngam brjid nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// mnga' mdzad pad+ma'i gsung
la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid bdud rtsi mchog gi ngang gyur pas// dug gsum gtan du phung mdzad dpal 'bar sku// gdug bcas klu rnams brjid pa'i zhabs kyis brdzis// dug chen bdud rtsir gyur la phyag
'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal nas bstod de/ nam mkha'i ri mo thabs kyis phyag rgyas gnon pa'i gdan steng rngom// tsham rngam ma che ba gtsigs pa'i stobs chen rngom// zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags

kyang rngom// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i mche gtsig rngom// gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs sgra rngom// 'phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi rba rlabs rngom// yon tan rtsa bzhi ji ltar rngom// ru tra bsgral

bas mthu rtsal rngom// lha chen mnan pas gdan chen rngom// khams gsum bsgral bas zhing chen rngom// rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom// shugs kyi 'phro ba'i brtul zhugs rngom// 'dul byed dbang gi

'phrin las rngom// thugs rjes 'byung ba'i sprul pa rngom// sku che yan lag rags pa brjid re che// grangs mang rgyan dang ldan pas brjid re che// bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid re che/ khyad zhugs yid dang
'thad pas brjid re che// mdangs chen stong gsum gang bas brjid re che// tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid re che// thugs rje thugs dam ldan pas brjid re che// 'gro ba yongs la snyoms pas brjid re
che// srid gsum 'gran zla med pas brjid re che// ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dus bas brjid re che// med la zad mi shes pas brjid re che// gcig la 'dod dgur bsgyur bas brjid re che// thabs mkhas skyon
gyis ma gos brjid re che// 'dod spyod phan pas mdzad pas brjid re che// mi mnyes nyam bag rol pa brjid re che// mgon skyabs sta bon mdzad pas brjid re che// sku gsung thugs yon tan rngam pas brjid re
che// sku gsung thugs yon tan rngam brjid kyi bstod pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tan tra las/ dbu las rigs lnga 'bar ba'i

skur bstan pas// mi mthun lnga lnga bstan kyang nam mkha'i rgyan du che// dbu dgu 'bar ba'i thabs chen rgyur snang ste// theg pa mchog dgu kun la 'phags par bstan// sprul pa mang po khyad par bstan pa

ni// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil ba ni/ khro bo ye shes sprul pa mang po gzings// ral pa sprugs te 'khrigs pas stong khams khengs// da ni mchod pa spreng bar bya ste/ spyan gyi sdang mig glog stong rgyu ba

ni// gzigs pas spyan bgrad gzigs stangs rgyu dang ldan// smin ma khro gnyer sprul pa 'gyed cing 'dud// thabs rnams dpal chen pad+ma'i sku la rdzogs// byang chub sems kyi dbang phyug dpal chen he ru ka/

dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/ khri chen rngam pa kun gyi gtso// rigs lnga dpal chen khrag 'thung dang// yum chen kro ti shwi ri dang// ma mo chen po bdun rnams dang// de 'khor ba yi tshogs rnams la// bla med dam rdzas

bdud rtsi'i mchog/ mchod de kun tu dgyes mdzod la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pan tsa ma hA maM sa khA ti/ ma hA ba su ta khA hi/ ma hA kong ni dza la khA hi/ spyan bzhi bcu rtsa
gnyis dang ldan te/ dbu gong ma phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la spyan gsum gsum bco lnga/ rigs lnga'i sku gsum/ gsung gsum/ thugs gsum/ yon tan gsum/ 'phrin las gsum/ gsum

gsum dang sbyar/ rta mgo lnga la spyan 'bar ba bco lnga/ stong pa bco brgyad sku gsung thugs kyis mnan pas de ltar sbyor ro// dbu gong ma bzhi la spyan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ don du rigs bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang
sbyar ro// gzigs thabs bcu gnyis dang sbyar te/ gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni/ spyan stong khams la gzigs/ phyi nang skye pa med par gzigs/ spyan bgrad pa spa bkong bal gzigs/ sdang mig zhe la
gnon pa gzigs// zur mig glog ltar rgyu ba gzigs/ chos nyid rgyan du gzigs pa dang/ ye shes dbyings la gzigs/ ngan song 'thur du lta ba'o// smin ma ni sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang sbyar

ro// smin par mdzad pa'i 'phrin las ni/ 'gro ba ma lus rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs su smin par byed pa/ ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rje ni/ byams sdang phyogs med pa la bya/ dbyings las ma g.yos pa ni/ yab

yum thabs dang shes rab rol pa mdzad pa'i dus na/ ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yos pa'o// snyan ni dbyings kyi don ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang dbyings thob pa'i snyan ni/ gsan pa dang/ ma 'gag pa'i snyan ni
sprul pa'i sgras 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa thob pa'o// dmigs pa yongs su dam pa'i snyan ni 'gro ba rigs drug snyan mi snyan la ma chags pa'o// rol pa mthun 'jug 'jam pa 'phrin las/ ma bslad ye nas mthun

'jug 'jam pas sangs rgyas sku/ thugs rje 'byung byed sprul pa grangs med pa/ dbang drag 'joms pas 'phrin pas dmar bas dbang/ 'dod chags drag po zhe sdang drag po'o// shangs kyi rlung sgrom na rlung nag

tshub ma khams gsum khyab par 'dren/ khams gsum don du gnyer rdo rje chu'i rlung gis tshe dang zungs 'dzin/ gzi brjid dbang phyug che dri lnga ro ye shes dbyings su gcod/ rno dbal mche ba dkar po gtsigs
pas khams gsum 'khor ba'i skye shi gcod// ag tshom sku'i rgyan du gdengs pa me ltar 'bar/ gsum gyi brjod pa gdengs pa 'od dang 'dra/ thugs kyi yon tan nyi zla shar ba'i don/ he ru ka'i gal po las/

lhag pa'i rta mgo ci bya zhes pa las/ rta mgo ni theg pa 'og ma bas skal pa phyi ma grub ste/ theg pa yang rtse 'dis dus 'dir sangs rgyas te/ de yang shugs kyis grub pa'i brtson 'grus te/ rta la zhon pa dang/ lta
yud la phyin pa dang 'dra'o// sgrol bar byed pa mthu stobs ni/ sdug bsngal thar par byed pa'o// 'dul byed dbang gi 'phrin las ni/ chu srin dgod ma kha dang 'dra bas te/ rta mgrin gyis klu 'dul
bas rta mgo'o// dbu lnga rta mgo ljang khur byung ba ni 'phrin las kyi rangs bzhin yin la/ rngog ma le brgan ni dbang gi rtags su yang bstan pa la/ dpral ba zhur po ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin du bstan
pa la/ rta mgo ni drag po 'phrin las mdzad pas rta mgo'o// tan tra 'jig rten 'das pa las/ dbu'i don rtags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rtags 'jug ces bya bas/

nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dgongs nas gshog pa bskyed de/ 'jig rten pa yid bzhin du 'byung ba ni zhes pas/ rgyu rin po che las byas pa/ de yang grub pa ni ye shes las grub

pa'o// sprul pa ni pad+ma he ru ka'o// klu las sprul pa sprul du grub pa'o// re ba bskong mdzad dpag bsam ljon shing 'dra// zhes pa ni/ 'phrinalas rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don byed pas/ dpe dpag bsam/ shing du
bstan pa'o// rtogs pas rtsal gcod 'phrin las rlabs su che zhes pa ni/ rtsal chen shugs kyis 'phang ba gcod pa'o// nyi ma 'bum gyis brgyan pa ste'u gshog pa can zhes pa ni/ gshog pa ni gnam sa gcod pa

yin la/ nyi ma ni ye shes nyi mas tho gshog re re las ye shes nyi ma shar ba'o// nam mkha' nam mkha' rgyal po rgyal mo brgyad ces pa ni/ hUM badzra tsin d+ha dz+wa la sum+b+ha ni/ gr-i h+Na pa ya/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bA na/ sa ta

ra tsa hUM phaT/ gshog pa bzhi yang steng ma g.yas pa nga rgyal bskyed byas la/ g.yon steng ma gti mug bskyed pas zhi ba/ g.yas 'og ma nga rgyal bskyed pas drag po/ g.yon 'og ma sems can thams cad zhing dbang
du sdud pas drag po/ ste'u gshog pa ni bgegs dang log 'dren rdo rje lcags kyus snying nas 'dren pa yin la/ grol bar yang byed do// gshog pa ni rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med pa nam mkha' la 'phur ba yin

no// de'i phyir nam mkha' ltar yongs su khyab pa dang/ ma ltar kun la byams pa deng// thugs rje'i dbang gis sdud pa dang// rtsal chen shugs kyis 'phur ba dang// khyung chen sku la rdzogs pa dang// mkha'
'gro'i rgyal mo dbang byed pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje gshog pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po khro bo'i rgyal po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs so// dpa' ba rab brjid ting nge 'dzin pa'i stobs zhes pa ni/ rang bzhin gyi dpa' ba ni las/ pad+ma he ru ka'i rigs kyis dpal bstan dang/ seng gethabs kyi dpa' ba bya khyung ka ru na/ sprul pa las

dang khro ba yis/ shes rab kyi dpa' ba ni ye shes kyi lha/ rnam par shes pa brgyad sems ma brgyad dang sbyar ro// sems dpa' bzhi zhabs brgyad/ sems ma bzhi zhabs kyi rgyan brgyad/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
las 'das pa ni dbang du byas/ rgyan dang stang stabs su ldan pas dpa' bar brjid che bar/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas/ shar dri za dang bcas pa rnam par rgyal ba'i gnon rno gdug zlog byed rgyu

bye'u lcags zhes pa ni/ phyir mdo ba ni mtshon chen te/ des mi phigs zhing phyir ldog pas khrab rgya bye'u sngon po'o// nang sems kyi ma no ba ni/ gdug pa bsam pa ngan pa sbyor ba'i dug cis kyang mi tshugs shing de
zlog par byed pa'o// de ltar yang lhor gshin rje dang bcas nas/ khro bo gshin rje gshed kyis mnan pa'o// dbang gi bse khrab gzi brjid pa'i thabs zhes pa ni/ 'jig rten dbang du 'dus pa dang/ 'jig rten
las 'das pa dbang du mdzad pa dang/ cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i thabs su spa bkong ba dang/ ye shes kyi bse khrab tu bstan pa dang/ ye shes kyi me 'bar gzi 'bar te/ dug lnga bsregs nas 'jig rten las
'das pa'i gnas su bsgral nas/ nub phyogs klu dang bcas nas/ khro bo hUM mdzad kyis mnan pa'o// shes rab ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'chang ba'i chas zhes pa ni/ chos thams cad rtogs pa shes rab las byang

bas/ thabs mkhas pa spyod yul gyi chos dang/ chos nyid dbyings la ye shes kyi rgyan du snang ba las/ shes rab kyi rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs ris su ting nge 'dzin gyis/ bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pas mi

tshugs pa ni/ shes rab ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi te/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin dang khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba mnan pa'o// dpal brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chas zhes pa ni/ 'jigs byed kyi rgyan rlung

gi rgyal po sku bsrungs pa'i yang don/ rnam gcig tu yum sku la 'khril te/ lcug pa dang sbrul gdug pa zhe sdang tshar bcad nas/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon gyi zhabs kyis mnan pa'o// dmar gsal dbang phyug zangs kyi
mche ba can zhes pa/ dmar ba ni dbang gi rang bzhin yin la/ rak+ta ni chags pa chen po yum gyis kyang rtogs pas/ yum gyi lhums nas ma skyes pa gcig kyang med pas/ mngon sum du gsal bar dbang phyug
chen po'i zhabs 'og tu bcug la/ zhal 'bar ba las zhal gdangs mche ba 'byung ba/ zhabs 'og tu mnan snying khar zhabs mkhrig man chad nub nas/ snying 'byin cing dbyings su stobs shing chos la bkod pa'i
don yin pas/ lho nub srin po dang bcas nas khro bo mi g.yo mgon pos mnan pa'o// gzi mdangs shu kren chu gri sprul pa'i chas zhes/ phyi'i gzi mdangs kyis bdud dang mu stegs spa bkongs nas/ nang gi gzi
mdangs kyis mnyes pa dang/ dbang du sdud de/ snang la rang bzhin med de/ khro bo mi bzad kyis bdud dang srin po bsdus te/ gcan gzan gyi mgo can la bya ste/ des bdud srin 'dul ba'i zhabs la sogs
zhes pa ni/ de kun las rgyal bas yum gyi dbyings su che bas rgyal mo bya/ de bas na byang shar du ru tra dang bcas nas khro bo khams gsum rgyal bas mnan pa'o// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad khro bo

rgyal 'dus pa'i stabs zhes pa ni/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum dang/ phyogs bzhi'i ta krid bzhi dang/ mtshams bzhi'i khro bo dang// brgyad mnan pas ma rig pa'i log rtog dang bcas pa'i thugs rlom pa'i thugs

rlom pa'i phyogs skyong la khro bos mnan pa dang/ tshab dmar gyi 'dul stangs kyis khro bo yang dpa' bo chen por gzir bar snang bas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i don dang 'jig rten yongs las 'das pa'i khro 'phang ni

phyogs skyong ngo// 'jig rten las 'das pa ni khro bo brgyad/ yum gzi ldan du bstan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma/ dbyings ni mya ngan la 'das pas/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya/ gnyis su med pas dpal rdo rje
sems dpa'/ he ru ka'i thugs dang dbyer med pa'i don dang/ byang chub sems las 'dus pas bdag la 'dus pas rgyan du bshad do// de bas na byang chub sems su de ltar la bzla 'tshalalo// lus kyi rgyan

ni thabs he ru ka/ ngag gi rgyan ni gsung dbyangs chos kyi 'khor lo// sems kyi rgyan ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying rje/ byang chub rgyan ni ye shes lnga'i 'phro 'du/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni thugs rje dang ma bral

ba'o// zhabs brgyad ni ting nge 'dzin brgyad kyi chas kyis brgyan/ sems dpa' brgyad ni rang bzhin gyi gnas la/ chas brgyad ni sems ma ste brgyan pa'i lha mo/ phyogs mtshams brgyad ni khyad par gzi 'phangs

ting nge 'dzin brgyad dang/ zhabs brgyad dang/ khro bor bcas ces bya'o// zhabs la sbas pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad zhabs kyi 'og tu sbas ces bya'o// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ zhabs kyi chas rgyan gyi le'u
bcu bzhi pa'o//// pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka/ 'dod chags rgyal po rigs kyi gtso// sku mdog dmar ba dbang gis 'phags// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// zhabs kyang rdo rje brgyad du gdam// rdo rje
rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// shin tu mi bzang rngam thams cad// ma chags tshul du 'dul mdzad cing// dmar chen po ni phyag na bsnams// shin tu dgyes pa'i thugs dam can// rdo rje gshog pas brgyan cing
brlabs// g.yas dkar zhal gyis gzigs pa ni// de brgyal bas thams cad dngos grub stobs// g.yon mthing zhal gyis gzims pa ni// nyams pa thams cad bskong par mdzad// dbus ma pad+ma'i phyag rgyar

ldan// phyag g.yas gyen du brkyang ba yis// nam mkha'i khams kun phyag rgyas 'gengs// rnge'u chung bcu drug thabs kyis brdungs// lha yi gnas rnams dbang du bsdud// phyag rgya g.yon du brkyang ba yi// ban d+ha
rak+tas 'khyil ba ni// rgya mtshog ting nas 'khrug cing rlob// klu yi gnas rnams dbang du sdud// yab yum phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// ti ra'i dbyug pa chen po
bsnams// ke'u ri dang rol bar mdzad// bdud kyi dpung rnams zil gyis gnod// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje dung chen dmar gyis bkang// sing ngam dang rol ba'i sa// dmar chen rak+ta tsa ra
ra// tshogs chen gsum ka dbang du sdud// g.yas kyis rtse ri bsnams pa ni/ thabs kyi mda' gzhu 'gengs pa yin// rgyal ba yab yum thugs dam bskul// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// lcags kyi ral ka

dmar gyis bkang// byA g+h+ri ma dang mnyam par sbyor// thams cad kun la mnyam par sbyor// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni/ kha T+wAM kha yi rgyal mtshan bsnams// pra mo ha dang mnyam par sbyor// bgegs kyi

dpung rnams 'jims par byed// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnam pa ni// zhing chung bton nas za bar byed// sri la mo dang mnyam par sbyor// klu yi gnas rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo

rje rtse dgu 'bar ba ni// pe ta li dang mnyam par sbyor// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// spu gri so dang bcas pa yis// shwa na ma dang mnyam par sbyon// gnod sbyin rnams kyi sha

yang za// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// sti ra'i rgyu ma 'dren pa yis// pu ka si dang mnyam par sbyor// drang srong 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// 'gro rgyu zhag pa bsnams pa
ste// kri ta ma dang mnyam par sbyor// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal me la sreg/ g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// pad+ma rak+ta bcas pa'o// g+has ma ri dang mnyam par sbyor// srin po'i 'khor rnams dbang du

sdud// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// zhing chen phrag la 'khur ba yi// kang ka ma dang mnyam par sbyor// dur khrod bdud bgegs mang po 'dul// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// sti ra tsit+ta 'bigs pa

ni// sma sha ni dang mnyam par sbyor// srog skyong 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// ban d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba ste/ kha kha ma dang mnyam par sbyor// dgra bgegs ma lus dbang du

sdud// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// ti ra log rtog 'dral bar byed// tsan+Da li dang mnyam par sbyor// tu tra'i 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar ba

'dis// hu lu ka dang mnyam par sbyor// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// dur khrod rgyan dgu sku la gsol// rdo rje gshog pas brgyan pa ni// klu chen zil gyis gnon par byed// lhang lhang rta skad phyogs
bcur sgrogs// zhabs brgyad stabs stang brkyang bskum tshul// lha chen brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang/ gzhon nu rgyal la rol par
mdzod// dbang phyug kun gyi 'khor gyis bskor// khyed kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs las// glog stong 'byung zhing 'brug stong ldir// dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// he ru ka thugs kyi rgyud kyi

pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya mkha' 'gro 'phra men gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog rags pa de la/ dpal pad+ma he ru kas sbyin

sreg bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dbang gi hom chen po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba 'di la don lnga ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ dbang gi phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi las bya ba dang/

dbang gi gtor ma'i las dang/ dbang gi sbyor ba dang/ dbang gi hom thabs bya ba dang lnga'o// dbang gi phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bcus bstan te/ phyag rgya chen por gsal zhes pa ni/ dpal chen po

pad+ma he ru ka'i phyag bco brgyad/ zhabs brgyad/ gshog pa bzhi/ dbu gong ma lnga la rta mgo ljang khu 'tsher pa/ spyan bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa gcig tu dur khrod kyi chas brgyad dgus brgyan pa'o// phyag g.yas
dang po lcags sgrog/ g.yon dang po ban+da rak+tas bkang ba bsnams pa/ g.yas ke ri mal sogs pa brgyad pa snams pa/ g.yon sing nga ma la sogs pa brgyad bsnams pa/ dbu las rta mgrin sku las bdud rtsi

'khyil/ zhal brgyad khro bo brgyad 'jigs pa/ khro bos phyogs skyong 'jigs pa/ phyogs skyong 'og na yang rdo rje brag gi stengs la/ 'khor ma mo dang/ pho nya dang/ dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ye shes dang las la skyes

pa/ yum kro ti shwa ri ma yab dang mthun pa la/ yab ltar dbu rgyan mnga' bar bsgom zhing dkyil 'khor la bkod pa'o// bsnyen pa dbul ba ni/ pad+ma he ru ka bsnyen pa'i dus na/ grangs sam mtshan mar rtag tu

bzlas so// de yang ha ya gr-i ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ a ra li hring hring/ zhes ma mo brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa brgyad la bzlas la dbul lo// dus drug gam dus rtag tu bya'o// mtshan ma byung byung du bya'o// dkyil 'khor
dgod pa ni/ dang pos gzugs ma legs pa na ga ra ma tshig pa dang/ mi rung pa med par sa blud btang/ des nas stegs bu gzhug ste/ dbus su e gru gsum chag gang pa kha khyer nyis brtsegs/ de la thod pa

'og ma mnga' gzhu/ de'i phyir rim zla gam dmar po la pad+ma he ru ka yab yum bzhugs par bya'o// de'i phyi rim la thod pas bskor/ de'i blo ma phol rdo rjer ba/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma kha khyer bcu drug la lha mo bcu
drug/ de'i phyi rim bar khyams la dbang phyug ma/ zur gsum la he ru ka sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo bcu gzugs su bcas pa dgod/ mtha' ma rtsang dang 'od kyis bskor de la sgo ba yab yum bkod
la/ dkyil 'khor rgyan dang cha lugs gsal gdab/ byin gyis brlab cing gsal ba ni/ bdag pad+ma he ru ka bsgoms la/ yon bdag dkyil 'khor de'i lha ltar cho ga rnam par gsum gyis brlabs la/ sku lnga ye
shes lnga'i sngags dang phyag rgyas yon bdag byin gyis brlabs/ mchodapa dang bstod par bcas pa ni/ mchod pa'i yo byad dmar gtor dang/ dmar gyi arga dang/ gzhan yang tshang bar bya/ bud shing mar can
dang/ kyang mtsher can mchod pa gzhan dang mthun/ 'phrinalas bcol zhes pa ni/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don la mi ma yin pa 'gegs thams cad la pho nya dang mngag gzhug btang la dbang du bsdus so// zhal

zas brtag pa dang zhes pa ni/ zhal zas thams cad hrIH dmar las 'phros te/ bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// sid+d+hi gsol zhes pa ni/ dngos grub gsol ba'i dbyangs gtang bar bya'o// byin rlabs
nod pa zhes pa ni/ bdag pad+ma he ru ka'i thugs ka nas/ dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar bskul nas/ 'od zer dmar po thams cad dbang du gyur par bsam mo/ dkyil 'khor bsdu zhes pa ni/

dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sngon gyi bka' las 'byung ba bzhin du bsdu par bya'o// dbang gi rim pa hom ltar spyan drangs zhes pa ni/ me lha spyan drangs hom sbyar ro// hom gzar g.yon nas bskor ro// dbang gi
gtor ma don gsum dang brtag pa drug ste/ 'gyur med ye shes rgyan dang 'dra ba'i gtor ma dang/ thams cad yongs la bsngo ba spyi'i gtor ma dang/ dngos po gcig la bsngo ba bgegs gtor ro// gtor ma'i

las bya ba ni chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i ste/ spel ba ni nam mkha' mdzod/ bdud rtsir gyur pa ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor/ so sor thob pa ye shes skar mda'/ dbang du bya ba dbang sgyur 'khor lo/ thams cad mgu

zhing dga' ba lha mgon spyi'o// yang gtor ma ni mchod sbyin chen po ste/ phyi nang thag gnyis so// dbang gi phur pa pad+ma he ru kar bsgom/ phur pa ni sku/ dril bu ni gsung/ btab pa ni thugs/ phur ba'i rgyu dang ni

zangs gzhon zhing mar chags/ bya thabs mgo brgya mdud/ rtse mo rgya kham/ tshad ni sor dgu/ shing gi mgo la rtse mo bya'o// dgra bgegs nam phyed nas phur pa gdab bo// grub pa yon tan ci 'dod pa thob par

'gyur/ sbyor ba'i rigs brtag ni/ smad 'tshong ma lo grangs nyi shu lon pa'i sdong gcig ma zhes bya ba/ sbyor stangs ni byang shar nas mgo lho nub mtshams su bstan pa la sbyor/ dkyil 'khor ni pad+ma la bya/ sngags
tshig ni/ pa sham kar na ku ru pad+ma rag swA hA/ tshigs bshad ni/ chags pa zhe sdang/ thams cad tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ ces pas bya/ khro bo rol pa'i stangs stabs kyis gzir/ dug

gsum dbang bsgyur sbyin sreg dbul/ rngam pa glog gi zhes mchod pa dbul/ dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka zhes pas arga sbreng/ 'byung po'i khrag ni zhes pa dug gsum btab/ mtshal chen po dang ga pur zhes mchod
gtor/ 'phrin las rnam bzhi btang/ bgegs dang log 'dren 'gugs/ rgyud so so'i bka' lung nas 'byung ba'i pho nyas dgug/ bzlas pa bgyi/ de nas dpal pad+ma he ru kas 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba la// gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// zla gam dmar pos bskor ba ste// rta mgo rngam 'tsher phyogs bcur

sgrogs// pad+ma'i stong gsum ge sar la// ye shes lha dang ma mo 'khor dang bcas// mkha' 'gro dbang phyug tshogs kyis bskor// mchod pa che la sogs pa// thams cad ma lus mchod par bzhes// pad+ma rta mgrin

ha ya gri ba kha'i// de nas 'dul sbyor bya ba ni// bam chen dkyil 'khor zla gam la// hri yi phyag rgya dbang chen mchog/ 'bar ba chags pa dbang du sdud// pad+ma dmar po'i 'phreng bas bskor// pad+ma khrag 'thung

mchod pa sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// zas lnga po la dgra bgegs sbyin// ra dang khyi khrag dmar chen gyi// dgra bgegs gzugs dang snying po bri// pho nyas thams cad yongs nas ni// dgra bgegs
bkug la phur pas brdab// pad+ma dpal chen tshogs la btab// hri yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la// lag pa srin lag sbrel gdams la// rgyu 'phreng bcas pas bskor nas ni// gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par

'gyur// pad+ma chags pa'i gdul bya dang// rta mgrin rngam pa'i thugs mchog gis// thams cad 'phros pa'i tsham rngam gyis// dgra bgegs ma lus dbang du sdud// dpung dang bsgral ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// pA

paM pad+ma na ga ba shang ku ru na hUM phaT/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ dbang gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// khams gsum srid gsum bza' ba'i phyir// dpal gyi pho nya las la 'gyed// tshems ni sra snyi med

par rno// skad ni phyi nang med par zug/ zas ni maM sa sha chen za// skom du dri chu kha ru ra ma s+t+we// de phyir bdud kyi mel tshe ba// shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// dung gi khyi mo dkar mo la// 'brug skad ldir zhing

lha chen 'dul// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// glog stong 'gyur zhing gshen rje 'dul// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// zangs kyi khyi mo dmar mo la// rdo rje khyung gshog klu phrul 'dul// byang gi phyogs nas
rgyug pa'i khyi// mu men ljang khu'i khyi mo la// gnod sbyin gtum po'i sgal tshigs 'joms// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// gser gyi khyi mo ser mo la/ kha nas me 'bar srid gsum

'joms// drong bdud dgra bgegs me lha 'dul// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// ra ga dmar mo'i khyi mo la// ma mo 'khor gyi sprul pa 'gyed// srin mo rak+ta'i don snying 'byin// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug

pa'i khyi// mu men ljang khu'i khyi mo la// mgo brnyan mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor// rlung lha ba dan lce gcod ma// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// khro chu'i lus kyi khyi mo la// nyi zla gza' skar kha long len// ru

tra sngo skya bstan nas long// kun kyang mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// steng 'og phyogs mtshams rgyug cing za// mche ba lcags zor bkug pa 'dra// sder mo lcags kyu 'dril ba 'dra// spyan ni nyi zla shar ba

'dra// ral ba 'bar pa'i nyi zla bzhin// rnga ma dril zhags brkyang ba 'dra// lhang lhang khyi skad phyogs bcur zug/ las kyi skal du pho nya 'gyed// dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i pho nya mdzod// bcol ba'i las rnams
grub par mdzod// khyod kyis mi 'dul gang yang med// tan tra 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ he ru ka'i gal po dang tan tA 'di bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mdzad pa'i mdo las/ pho nya
'gyogs byed kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// tan tra 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ rdzu 'phrul rkang mgyogs gyi bsgrub pa yang 'di lta ste/ rnga lpags grib la bskams te/ sal ma reg par blangs te/

bya rgod gzhon nu'i tshil gyis bskus nas/ bcad tshigs nub pa'i lham bu bya/ sngags 'bum tsho lnga bsnyen pa bya/ de na lham la yang stong phrag bcu bzlas te gyon na/ des ni dgongs khrom stong phrag brgyar

'gro/ phyir yang stong phrag tu dgongs zlog go/ bya rgod kyi tshil bu la sngags stong phrag bcu bzlas so// des rkang ba'i snying po byugs na/ lus med bya ltar mkha' la 'gro// de ni tshangs pa'i cho ga ste// skye bo gang

zhig 'di bsgrubs na/ rkang mgyogs kun gyi mchog go zhes// 'phags pa rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// oM b+he ma ta ye swAhA/ zhing chen po bsregs pa'i sol ba dang/ mkhris chen du sbyar nas 'phrag par thig le

byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mig la bskus na gdon thams cad mthong ngo// rna bar bskus na lha ci zer ba thos so// nub mo yang nyin par bzhin du gsal ba khrom la dgongs brgyar 'gro nus so// slar

yang ldog nus so// dpral ba phyis na snang ngo// sngags la/ na mo tra ya ma ti/ hi ti mi ri swA hA/ 'di ni lha chen po'i cho ga'o// rta'i rje ngar gyi pags pa 'brug zer ba'i char gyis spangs te/ dgo ba'i tshil bu byugs
nas/ 'khrig ma nub pa'i lham bu bya/ drang srong bden pas gsungs te/ sngags 'di lan grangs bdun 'bum bzlas/ 'di ni rkang mgyogs dam pa ste/ khroms dgongs bzhi bcu nus slar zlog

go/ sngags la/ na mo badzra pan se/ tad+ya thA/ b+haM la bib+he/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ga he ye swAhA/ phag rgod kyi mkhris pa dang spu gnyis dud pa ma shor bar bsregs te/ sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/ mig la

bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rna ba la bskus na lha ci zer ba yang thos so// sngags ni/ na mo ma har gnan/ pa spu ya ta tsa ra ni nan/ i ra mi tang bal par ku ma nan/ kyi li kyi li/ ku lu ku lu swA hA/ mig

rnon sgrub pa'i thabs la/ khyi dang/ byi ba dang/ pu shud dang/ spyang khu dang/ bya rog dang// 'ug pa dang/ an dza kha thams cad 'brug ste/ zla ba nya gsum la 'di rnams cha bsnyams te bdar la/ tshes bcu gcig
gi nyi ma phyed nas mgo bsku bar bya'o// grong bar gsum la bsku bar byas na/ stong gsum gyi khams thams cad na ci yod pa shes par 'gyur ro// lus byed nus so// man ngag las gsal bar bstan/ 'jigs

pas mi tshugs par mthu dang ldan no// yang gdon mi za bar mthu dang ldan no// lus ni mi snang zhag bdun gyi rngon brtag mthong zhing grub par byas nas/ be'u snyi med kyi mig dang/ byi la nag tsam mig dang/ li

khri rnams sbyar te/ ban da'i nang du blug la/ rdo pha wang long bu dang/ rtag zil ma yang brdar te/ lag pa g.yas kyis gnas nas/ ston zla 'bring po'i tshes brgyad nas/ bcu drug bar du bskus te/ mig gnyis

kyi phyi nang gnyis kyi yang bsku/ nang re bzhin sngags nyi shu rtsa re gdab bo// sngags 'di skad do// oM ma thA mA thA tsa ka shu hUM phaT/ 'jig rten du 'dus pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ gzhan gyis mi mthong/ rim pa bcu gsum

gyi lha klu dang/ 'phags pa thams cad mthong zhing nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bya rog gi lce dang/ snying dang/ 'ug pa'i mig 'bras grib ma la bskams te/ skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par btags nas/ bya rog gi

khrag gis sbrus nas/ re lu kham gcig tsam gyis 'bras bu byas la/ lcags gsum kha zangs kyis dkris te/ khar bcu gnas lus mi snang bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad brgyar 'gro/ me chu mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ bya rog dang/

'ug pa dang/ sbrul dang/ sre mong gi rus pa dang cha bsnyam du btags la/ btags pa mal lam mgo la ba skus na/ gang reg pa dge bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo las/ sgrub thabs tha ma'i le'u ste bco brgyad

pa'o//// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud thugs kyi rgyud/ nam mkha' mdzod dpal 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdo chen po/ tan tra chen po gting zab pa theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po bzhi pa rdzogs so// mang+galaM//
khro bo'i lha tshogs rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du// kro d+ha de ba sha ta na mo bi ti/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i lha tshogs rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga khro bo 'bum gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shrI he ru ka 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dur khrod 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa la/ lha gnod 'dul gyis 'di skad
ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i snying po can yin pa la/ la la ni zhe sdang gi khams gsum du 'khor ro/ la
la ni phrag dog rang ga mas 'khor/ la la ni gti mug rang kha mas 'khor/ la la ni 'dod chags rang kha mas 'khor/ la la ni nga rgyal rang kha mas 'khor// la la ni ser sna dang
'jur 'geg gi dbang gis khams gsum du 'khor/ la la ni phyogs ris dang sgro skur gyis 'khor te/ la la ni cha cha bral gyis g.yeng spyo/ la la bkres skom gyis
g.yeng spyo/ la la ni bkol spyad kyis g.yeng spyo/ la la ni brgyad dang bcu gcig gis g.yeng spyo/ la la ni 'thab rtsod kyis g.yeng spyo/ la la ni le los g.yeng spyo/ la
la'i dgra ni la la'i gnyen du mthong/ la la'i zas ni la la'i dug tu mthong// la la'i bde ba la la'i sdug bsngal du mthong/ nyon mongs pa'i 'du byed kyi g.yeng bas dal skabs ni rmi lam na'ang
med/ chos nyid la dngos por bltas pas/ shong chos nyid la yang ma shong/ las dang rnam smin du 'dom pas 'thab rtsod ni gnyen drung dang yang sprod pas/ sdug bsngal brgyad dang
bcu gcig las thar pa'i dus med pa las/ de dag las thar pa'i thabs cing mnga' ba lags/ lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol pa dang/ ston pas bka' stsal
pa/ sdug bsngal de dag las thar par 'dod na/ khro bo'i lha tshogs rnams la sgo gsum zol gsog med pa'i sgo nas phyag tshol cig/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i
bskal pas rga rgud stongs// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// bud d+ha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes rdo rje nyon mongs 'khor ba 'joms/ thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pas dngos po

'jig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// badzra he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen dbyig ltar re 'dod kun skong zhing// bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pa 'phu// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal
'joms mdzad pa// rat+na he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i 'dam bu pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing// lhag mthong me chen bskal 'bar thams cad bsreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad

pa// pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// karma he ru ka la phyag
'tshal lo// sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// bud d+ha shwa ri ma la phyag 'tshal

lo// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing/ snying rje mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtog pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// sra brtan rdo rje ma la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan longs spyod sna

tshogs mi dmigs shing// sbyin pa mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ting 'dzin ro yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// rat+na kro d+ha mi la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// tshul

khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnams par dag gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// pad+ma kro d+hi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// bzod pa mthar phyin phrag
dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// karma kro d+hi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mthu stobs mnga' bdag gnas gyur pas// sgrol byed chen po bdud rnams 'joms// thod dbyug srin

po sgrol la brtson// rag sha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mor la tra gnas gyur pas/ khro mo yab kyi cha lugs 'chang/ yab yum thabs dang shes rab las// rag mo kro d+hi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje'i
mnga' bdag gnas gyur bas// yag sha he ru ka la snying rje'i bdag/ ser nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yag k+Sha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'jigs byed bdag mo gnas 'gyur pas// khro mo ma mo kun
gyi rje// sprul pa yang sprul kun gyi yum// yag mo kro d+hi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// smon lam mnga' bdag gnas gyur pas// 'gu ya dpal chen gsang ba'i bdag/ bskal pa brgyar yang gsang ba'i lha// 'gu ya

he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// yum chen 'gu ya gnas gyur pas/ khro mo gsang ba'i bya ra mkhyen/ sangs rgyas thams cad gsang bar mdzad// 'gu ya kro d+hi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mkhyen rab mnga' bdag gnas

gyur pa// dpal chen dam tshig mnga' mdzad pa'i// ljang nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ sa nu he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// yum chen dam tshig gnas gyur pas/ khro mo dam tshig bya ra mkhan// dam tshig dbyings

su skul byed pa'i// sa nu kro d+hi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs/ rlung byed ye shes lnga yi dbyug tho thogs// dran par rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum
'joms mdzad dbyug thogs ke'u ri ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs// mthu phrogs zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bden gnyis lta pas khro chul 'gro la gzigs// dam
tshig dbyings su skul byed tse'u ri ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung gis zil gyis gnon pas rmongs mi'i tshogs// mtha' gnyis mi spong dbang mdzad chu srin can// mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing

rmongs par lta// stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyas 'debs pra mo ha la phyag 'tshal lo// las rab byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs// kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// sa dgu'i rtoga'ajoms skye shi med par
gzigs// 'jigs byed thal byed rnge'u thogs pe ta li la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyer med shes rab mi rtog spos mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud sdom dbang sdud rgyu zhags 'dren// bro gar 'jigs tshul rgyun

gyi thugs rjes grol// bde mchog dbyings su 'dren mdzad pu ka si la phyag 'tshal lo// zhe sdang tshul gyis sgrol mdzad gtum mo'i tshogs// myos byed dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa// thugs rjes 'khrug cing
ro za'i tshul du gzigs// snod bcud dkrugs nas gsol mdzad kas ma hri la phyag 'tshal lo// chags pa'i tshul gyi don mdzad rme sha ni// ma ning rgyud 'dzin gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags// mtha' gnyis mi

spong rnam dag dbyings tshul bsrung// thugs rjes 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sme sha ni la phyag 'tshal lo/ thams cad 'byung byed ma chags kun gyi yum// kun gyi las mdzad chos kyi snying po 'dzin// kun la rol
mdzad gzigs tshul kun dang ldan// 'bar bas stong gsum tshim mdzad tsan d+ha li la phyag 'tshal lo// 'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum// gnyen pa'i stobs kyi thams cad zil gyis gnon// shes

rab thabs kyis bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod mdzad sing ngang he la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal brtul za byed ye shes dbyings kyi yum// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don
mdzad// thugs rje chen po'i ye shes sor sor gzigs// nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad bya kri ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dri med rnam dag dam tshig gsung gi yum// thams mkhas thugs rjes bdag dang gzhan
don mdzad// don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin sngags la gtad// 'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri la ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ mi phyed spyod pas las mchog rigs kyi yum// g.yeng ba'i 'phrin las 'gro
la thugs rjes srung/ chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// phrag dog las rnams grub byed sho na ma la phyag 'tshal lo// yid kyi rnam shes so sor kun la rtog/ gsod pa'i god 'brang tshul khrims

srung// 'khor ba'i rgyun kun spu gris gcod mdzad ma// mgyogs ma snyegs byed khrag 'thung kri ta pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'phrog mtshan ma 'joms// gsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pa'i pha
rol phyin// mtha' 'das chos skus gzung 'dzin spangs tshul 'dzin// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog kang ka ma la phyag 'tshal lo// thogs pa med pas yon tan bla na med// bslad pas mi 'gyur
bkrus pa'i mi 'dag pa// mi mthun gnyen pos mi tshigs bzod pa'i mchog/ yon tan yid bzhin kha kha ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyings las mi nyams 'gro la thugs rjes srung// mtha' la mi gnas shes rab

pha rol phyin// dbyings kyi yum las thugs rjes 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i hu lu ma la phyag 'tshal lo// spyin pas rig pa'i klong du mtsho ltar drangs// 'khor ba'i 'jings nas rig pa'i lcags
