kyus 'dren// dpal 'bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin 'gro don mdzad// thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma la phyag 'tshal lo// don dang mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar byed// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor

ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing// rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong// yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhan gyi don du spyad pa bdag gi don// shes rab sgron mes mun pa'i
sdug bsngal sel// don gnyis mi 'da' lhun grub dga' ba'i mchog/ kun mkhyen ma rigs sel mdzad nyin zla'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// snyam par smra pas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed// btang snyoms thabs

mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// phab na rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'ong/ chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril bu ma la phyag 'tshal lo// shar gyi phyogs kyi 'bar ma ni// rdo rje mun de 'jigs pa'i
gzugs// dkar mo lag na rdo rje bsnams// 'bar ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shar lho mtshams kyi 'bar ma ni// mun de ag ne 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma me khyer glog 'phreng 'dzin// 'bar ma khyod
la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs 'bar ma chen mo ni/ mun de ya ma 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma gshin rje skar mda' gtong// srin mo 'od kyi mda' 'phen ma la phyag 'tshal lo// lho nub 'bar ma chen mo
ni// mun de rag sha 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma srin mo ral gri'i sku// 'bar ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs 'bar ma chen mo ni// mun de na ga 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma klu mo lce
'bebs ma// dmar mo lag na thog 'bebs ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nub byang 'bar ma ched mo ni// mun de ba ya 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma rlung bdag ba dan 'phyar// 'bar ma khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo// byang gi phyogs kyi 'bar ma ni// mun de pe lha 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma gnod sbyin khyung thogs ma// ljang nag lag na khra thogs ma la phyag 'tshal lo// byang shar 'bar ma chen mo ni// mun de du tra
'jigs pa'i gzugs/ 'bar ma 'jigs byed ban glang sna// mthing kha lag na mdung thogs ma la phyag 'tshal lo// steng phyogs 'bar ma chen mo ni// mun de sur+ya 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ 'bar
ma nyi ma'i zhags pa can// ser mo lag na nyi zla thogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og phyogs 'bar ma chen mo ni// mun de nA ga 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bar ma sa bdag phag gdong ma/ nag mo lag na bum pa
'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// rngam pa'i gzugs kyis srin mo'i gzugs 'dzin cing// thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar zas su za// srid pa'i sems can snying khrag mtsho la gsol// dbang drag las mdzad ma nu rag

sha si ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtogs tshangs pa'i gzugs// zhal bzhis smrang 'don glong bzhi bkra shis 'bar// tshad med bzhi rtogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan// gti mug yid bzhin
rin chen pra mi na la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rig mchod ma// ma rig dug 'joms mdzad pa'i dpal rtser bsnams// bud med chags pas dbang dka' bzlog/ chags pa'i skyon bral lha

chen re'u tri ma la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel ba'i thugs rjes thams cad kun la rtogs// 'phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhad chen ma// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod drag mo
be sna be la phyag 'tshal lo// 'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen// rtag par 'khor bar ji srid gzhon tshul bzhugs// nyon mongs tha ba 'jigs pa'i mdung mthung 'phen// gzhon nu chags pas dbang

mdzad ke'u ma ri la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las mdzad kun gyi bla na med// lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang mdzad cing// chos dbyings rgyas mdzad ma dmigs sku mdog dkar// gso byed lce 'bebs in tra ma la
phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar// ban d+ha snod yangs bcud kyi khrag mtsho gsol// rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum zad mdzad cing// sdug bsngal dbyings su gsod mdzad
bing ka lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ khro bas 'dul mkhas khro mo'i mchog tu mkhyen// mun sel sgron 'bar 'jig rten nad gso mdzad// 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs kyang// chags pa'i skyon bral
dbang mdzad a mri ta la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen// zla ltar yon tan mthar phyin cha shas sku// gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgron 'bar zhing// bdag mchong thams cad
rtogs byed se'u ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyug pa'i 'tshogs pa 'dra bas gzhan med mkhyen// thabs kyis ma rmongs ljang khu 'phrin las mdog/ nan dbang drag shul spyod pa'i dbyug tho bsnams// dregs
byed spyi ni 'joms pa'i d+ha na haM la phyag 'tshal lo// log par lta ba 'joms byed sbyin gyi mchog/ skye ba 'joms byed skye dgu'i khrag mtsho gsol// las mdzad chags tshul gser gyi skyed chings

can// trag mo glog 'gyu rag sha sil ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ rgyan gyi nang na 'phreng ba mchog tu mdzes// snying rje rgyun skad thabs kyi zhags pa bsnams// chags med zhing du khams gsum 'dren mdzad cing// rgyun
gyi thugs rjes sgrol mdzad bag sha si la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshon cha dbyug pas chags pa'i mchog tu mkhyen// gtun bu gdug pas gdug pa 'joms mdzad pa// nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog byed
cing// stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ra ti ma la phyag 'tshal lo// ra ro 'dra bas dpa' bo gzhan na med// chos rnams gnyis med don rtogs rtags su myos// nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i gshol bsnams
shing// dge ba'i lo tog skyed mdzad ru ti ri'u ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam pas gzhan la phan pa mdzad pa'i mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad cing// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig
bu spyod// gsod byed 'dul mkhas e ka tsa ra ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bud med chags pas dbang mdzad 'gro ba'i don// thams ca ma lus dga' mgu byed pa'i las// 'dod pa'i lha mo mda' 'phen yid 'phrog
cing// thugs rjes 'dzin pa'i ma nu ra ga ha ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing// gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad rbod gtong can// mi zad gter ldan nor gyi bum pa

'dzin// sdug bsngal re skong khrag 'thung si ti ka la phyag 'tshal lo// reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbyugs kyi srog 'dzin tshe 'phel ma// bde gshegs rab bsgyur 'jig rten sgrol
mdzad cing/ khams gsum gnas nas skyod mdzad pa ya be la phyag 'tshal lo// snyigs ma lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// srid gsum 'khor ba'i gdug pa 'dul dka' ste// gsod pa nyi tshe'i las kyis 'dul bar
mdzad// sdug bsngal dbyings su sgrol mdzad ma ra na la phyag 'tshal lo// gzi brjid can ni me yi khams te mchog/ 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus sreg/ za byed bskal pas dus mtha'i tshul ston

cing// lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro ag ne ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi ba dag pas skye shing rtsad gcod cing// nyon mongs tha ba bzlog mdzad phag gi mgo/ 'og ni phyogs na srid gsum stobs kyis sbar// skye
shi rtsad gcod za byed pa ri hra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phros mkhyen// thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad// dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'chi bdag bzlog mdzad
cing// lung gi dur khrod dbang gi tsa mun ti la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs ni gzhan med mkhyen// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs la dbang mdzad cing// snang chen glang snas
bdud rtsi gi'u hang 'thor// sdug bsngal nad sos mdzad pa'i bu ta na la phyag 'tshal lo// chu las lhag pa'i ro ni gzhan med mkhyen// nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus sreg byed cing// gdug pa 'dul phyir dug
gtong sbrul zhags bsnams// zhi gnas dbang gi ting 'dzin ba ru na la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad rdo rje gdeng po bsnams// thugs rje shugs
kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams// 'khor bar thugs rje shar ba'i ma hA ka la ma la phyag 'tshal lo// chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo ma// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin

cing// gang la ci 'dul de la der ston pa// yon tan tshogs rdzogs badzra tsa ka ma la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam tshig gnyis// mi 'da' ma grub bar du brtan par bzhugs// dan grogs

mdzad pas sems can 'dul mdzad pa// ma rig nub mdzad badzra ku ma na la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las mthar phyin sku/ stong ba'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs// so so'i skad du

chos kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ bag chags byang mdzad lam po da ra ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems dpa' gnas gyur ba'i// nam mkha'i dga' byed rdo rje bsnams// mkha' 'gro dga' byed rigs dbang phyug/ ma

hA badzra d+ha ri ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal po gnas gyur pa// 'dren byed lcags kyu dkar skya ma// mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed mthu bo che// kri ta badzra tsa ka ta la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chags pa gnas gyur

pas// gsod byed thabs kyi mda' 'gengs ma// mkha' 'gro sgrol byed mthu dbang rdzogs/ badzra ma hA ma ba ti la phyag 'tshal lo/ rdo rje legs pa gnas gyur pas// spro ba dkar skya dri yi mchog/ mkha' 'gro sgrol

byed mthu dbang rdzogs// badzra ku ma ra la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen gnas gyur pas/ 'bar byed mthing nag ral pa can// mkha' 'gro sgrol byed mthu dbang rdzogs// ma hA badzra ma hi sha la phyag 'tshal

lo// rdo rje nyi ma gnas gyur pas// mkha' 'gro gzi brjod 'od thogs ma/ rnam rtog mun sel mthu rab rdzogs/ badzra tri sha ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gnas gyur pas/ khro gnyer mthing nag

zhing ltar 'phyang// mkha' 'gro bdud las rgyal ba yi// badzra ag ne ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa gnas gyur pas// 'joms byed zhing gi kha gdangs ma// dur khrod bgegs 'joms za byed ma// badzra
kro d+ha ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos mchog gnas gyur pas// chags chen dmar nag pad+ma bsnams// nyes pa'i skyon bral legs pa'i lam yang rdzogs// ma hA a mi d+hod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo
rje rnon po gnas gyur pas// chags bral dmar nag gri thogs ma// mkha' 'gro sgrol byed mthu dbang rdzogs// ma hA se'u mya ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'khor la gnas gyur pas// mkha' 'gro dmar ser

'khor lo 'phen// mkha' 'gro gcod byed mthu dbang rdzogs// ma hA badzra ta ti ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje smre ba gnas gyur pas// rgyas 'debs dmar nag lce 'byin ma// thogs med lcags kyu'i dbang sgyur

ma// ma hA ra ni ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las rab gnas gyur pa// sna tshogs lung 'chang rgya gram bsnams// mkha' 'gro 'phrin las rdzogs byed ma/ ma hA phri ti ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje go cha gnas gyur
pas// bsrung ba ljang nag go cha thogs// 'jigs pa kun bsrung mkha' 'gro ma// badzra bi ka ra la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mche ba gnas gyur pas/ gnod sbyin mo ljang mche ba 'dzin/ dam nyams gsod pa'i

mkha' 'gro ma// badzra se yi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje khu tshur gnas gyur pas// yang dag 'phrog byed ljang khu mu tig 'phyar// mkha' 'gro rdul du rlog byed pa'i// badzra bi la ki la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal bar
'gro ba gnas gyur pas// bya rog gdong la mig 'byin ma// lag na gri dang 'khar gzhong thogs// rnam shes 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// badzra bi ra bi la phyag 'tshal lo// kun bzang sems dpa' gnas gyur
pas// 'jigs byed dkar po mche ba gtsigs// thams cad 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// badzra sha ni sha la phyag 'tshal lo// zla 'od gzhon nu gnas gyur pas// bzhad mgo dkar skya snyinga'abyin ma// thams

cad sgro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// sha ni ga ti ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bzang skyong sems la gnas gyur pas/ 'ug gdong dkar skya rkang rus ldan// las su lhag sdud zhi ba mo// ba ya ba ti ma la phyag 'tshal lo// tra

'od sems dpa' gnas gyur pas/ khyi mgo mthur ldan rkang rus 'chang// dur khrod 'joms pa'i mthur ldan pas// badzra a na ya la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje snying po gnas gyur pas// mthing nag ma sa phag gi
mgo/ rus 'phreng bam gyi dri chen thogs// badzra pa ta ka la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' mdzod sems gnas gyur pas// sngo nag glog 'dren rnga mo'i gzugs// gsus po che la bum pa 'dzin// yi dwags gnar
'joms mkha' 'gro ma// dza ya dza du ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od dpag med pa gnas gyur pas// thod dbyug dgra sta bong bu'i mgo/ dbang med 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// ka bi ka ti ma la phyag 'tshal
lo// mya ngan kun 'joms gnas gyur pas// dmar nag spu gri ra yi mgo/ dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// badzra ta ra shi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i shes rab gnas gyur
pas// dmar nag rus 'cha'i bya la'i mgo/ ma lus sgrol byed mkha' 'gro ma// ki li phri la sha la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros mi zad gnas gyur pas// dmar ljang spre mgo keng rus dkar po 'dzin// zhe sdang
'joms pa'i 'joms 'gro ma// rus ting ma sa ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ spobs pa brtsegs pa gnas 'gyur pas// dmar ser rus 'phreng lce sbyang mgo/ dngos po kun 'joms mkha' 'gro ma// ka ran dzi ma la
phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa sems dpa' gnas gyur pas// mkha' 'gro srin mo bum sna ma/ rdo rje lcags kyu ka tar bsnams// sa bam a ti ka la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan songakun 'dren gnas gyur pas// mkha'

'gro d+ha sha 'gri ba ste/ lcags kyu spu gri za byed ma// a ba a ki ma la phyag 'tshal lo// don grub sems dpa' gnas gyur pa// mkha' 'gro chen mo 'bod 'gro ma// dril bu dgra sta dril zhing spor// badzra sa ban da

di ma la phyag 'tshal lo// spos kyi glang pa gnas gyur pas// mkha' 'gro gshin rje rnam par 'joms// zhags pa gri thogs 'dzin cing spor// ma hA ta ti ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rgya mtsho chen po'i dkyil 'khor
nas/ dpal ldan shugs sgrol gtso mo ste// ri rab bsnyil ba'i rngam stabs can// rdo rje hUM grags ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' stong gi dkyil 'khor nas// thams cad kun tu khyab mdzad cing// ma lus
yongs la dbang sgyur pa'i// kun tu bzang la phyag 'tshal lo// gzha' tshon 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mdzes pa'i tshul nas 'od 'phro zhing// ma rig mun pa sel mdzad pa// rdo rje kun gsal ma la phyag

'tshal lo// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// pho nya mo ste drug cu'i gtso// sha chen khrag la longs spyod pa'i// rdo rje ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje dra ba'i
'phreng thogs shing// 'phrin las 'byung po kun 'dul ma// rdo rje 'od grags ma la phyag 'tshal lo// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhags pa stong gi gdeng ldan zhing// byang phyogs rang gi 'khor

'dul ma// rdo rje 'od 'phro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog bdag/ dam tshig nyams na sgrol byed ma// bka' las 'gal ba'i snying 'phrog ma la phyag

'tshal lo// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi srid// sku la bya rgod thul ba gsol// thugs dam rnal 'byor grogs la brtson// lha yi sring la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring// sku la stag gi thul
pa gsol// thugs dam rnal 'byor grogs la brtson// gshin rje'i sring la phyag 'tshal lo// dmar mo g.yag thong klu dbang sring// sku la chu srin lpags pa gsol// dam tshig can la brtse dgongs

zhing// klu dbang sring la phyag 'tshal lo// nag mo sder chags gnod sbyin sring// sku la rma bya'i thul ba gsol// dam tshig can la brtse dgongs pa'i// gnod sbyin sring la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo chen po las

rnams kun byed pas// mthing nag ral gri ban d+ha bsnams/ gang la dmigs pa sgrol bar byed/ rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ khro mo chen mo khams gsum dbang sdud ma// sto nag thod khrag 'jam

dpal thogs// sgrol ba'i las la 'ba' zhig dges// rdo rje ging mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging chen 'joms pa ni// smug nag rdo rje tho ba thogs// bgegs kyi dpung yang yud kyis 'joms// rdo rje

ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging chen gshin rje ni// mthing nag be con dgra sta bsnams// ma lus sgrol ba'i ging chen po// rdo rje ging chen khyaud la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam mthu mo che// ljang

nag lcags kyi tho ba thogs/ rbod gtong bcol ba len par byed// rdo rje ging mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam rtsal mo che// mthing nag rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// 'phrin las rna snyan phra ma zer// rdo rje

ging mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam stobs mo che// ser nag lag na thod pa thogs// 'phrin las tshogs kyi phyag 'tshal byed// rdo rje ging mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ka tar ging ka ra// dmar

gnag ka tar ban d+ha thogs// myur du sgrol ba'i 'phrin las mdzad// rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging chen spyang ki ni// dmar nag sbyang mgo spu gri thogs// gsod pa'i las la rab tu

dges// rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging chen rol pa ni// dmar nag ban d+ha 'phal tshab bsnams// dgra bgegs ma lus nyal thag gcod// rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging

lcam dbang sdud ni// ljang nag rdo rje lcags kyus 'dren// gang la dmigs pa yud ky-is sgrol// rdo rje ging lcam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam dbang sgyur ma/ khams gsum zhing gi g.yab mos

'debs// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// rdo rje ging lcam ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam 'phrul mo che// gzugs med rlung ltar sgyur par byed// gang la dmigs par yud kyis khyab// rdo rje ging

lcam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam ro langs ni// ser nag zhing gi dbyug pa phyar// gang la dmigs pa yud kyis 'joms// rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam glog 'gyu ma// cir

yang 'gyur ba'i mthu mo che// rdzu 'phrul gar gyi glog stong bsgyur// rdo rje ging lcam ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging lcam sgrol byed ma// ser nag ban d+ha gri thogs ma// 'phrin las srid gsum sgrol

byed ma// rdo rje ging lcam ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging mo las kun ni// nag mo chen mo gshol gri bsnams/ 'khor ba rtsad gcod 'dug pa 'dul// rdo rje ging mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging chen

gnod sbyin ni// ljang nag phyag gnyis sdigs mdzub 'phyar// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol byed pa'i// rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging chen 'chi bdag ni/ ljang ser rdo rje gsor zhing brdeg/ drag

shul sgrol pa'i mthu stobs can// rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging chen dus 'tshams ni// ljang nag shag ti ban d+ha thogs// stobs kyis sha khrag za ba byed// rdo rje ging chen khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo// shar phyogs dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// sku yi 'od zer dkar po las// dung gi mi mo drug cur sprul// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya drug cu la// mi phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs dgra

bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// sku yi 'od zer sngon po las// g.yu yi mi mo drug cur sprul// rin chen rigs kyi pho nya drug cu la// mi phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i

phyir// sku yi 'od zer dmar po las// zangs kyi mi mo drug cur sprul// pad+ma gsung gi pho nya drug cu la// mi phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo/ byang phyogs dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// sku yi 'od zer
ljang khu las// lcags kyi mi mo drug cur sprul// las kyi rigs kyi pho nya drug cu la// mi phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// 'og phyogs dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// sku yi 'od zer ser po

las// gser gyi mi mo drug cur sprul/ khro bo pho nya drug cu la// mi phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// steng phyogs dgra bgegs bsgras ba'i phyir// sku yi 'od zer mthing nag las// ma mo las byed drug

cur sprul// ma mo pho nya drug cu la// mi phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// yang dran brgya bcu rtsa gnyis ni// za byed mche ba can gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dzin byed sder mo can gyi tshogs la phyag

'tshal lo// snyeg byed gshog pa can gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// gsod byed mtshon cha can gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rtogs pas mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas mchog dam pa nas/ rigs 'dzin rgyal ba brgya

mtsho 'khor dang bcas pa la// mi phyed dad pas phyag 'tshal lo// nges pa'i don ston rdo rje slob dpon dang/ rgyal 'theb spyan dang kar ma ging chen dang// brtse gdung shugs 'chang mched dang lcam dral la// mi
phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten ston pa'i dus gsum pha ma la// mi phyed dad pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// phung po dpal chen dgu ru ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sngug
bsngal nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan dpal chen dgu la mthol zhing bshags// 'byung ba yum chen dgu ru ma rtogs pas// ji lta bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// ka tar yum chen tshogs la mthol zhing

bshags// rnam shes khro mo'i tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa'i sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// ke'u ri khro mo'i tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// yul ni 'phra chen tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar

bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// sing nga 'phra men tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// yan lag sgo mo'i tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgaums pa bsdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// rta gdong sgo mo'i tshogs
la mthol zhing bshags// rtag chad 'bar ma'i tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// 'bar ma spor ma'i tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// sgal tshigs dbang phyug tshogs su
ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// mi sring dbang phyug tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// so ni mkha' 'gro'i tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du
'gyur// dga' byed mkha' 'gro tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// nang khrol ma mo'i tshogs su ma shes pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// brtse gdung ma bdun tshogs la mthol zhing bshags/

nam 'tshong sring mo bzhi ru ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// brtse gdung sring mo'i tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// sha ni pho nya'i tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa
sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// srog ni ging chen tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// skyes bu ging chen tshogs la

mthol zhing bshags/ khrag ni ma sring tshogs su ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mthol zhing bshags// sku bskyed phyag rgya yin par ma rtogs
pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// spyod pa kun tu bzang la mthol zhing bshags// bzlas brjod sngags tshig yin par ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du
'gyur// 'phrin las kun tu bzang la mthol zhing bshags// don rtog dgongs pa yin par ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bsgoms pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// lta ba kun tu bzang la mthol zhing bshags// ma hA
yo ga'i sgo nas bshags par gsol ba ni// chos dbyings dus gsum sbros pa med pa la// 'dzin rtog med pa'i rang rig ye shes kyis// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa la// yul dang
dbang po gnyis su med par bshags// yum gyi b+ha ga dges pa'i pho brang du// yab kyi rdo rje gnyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa la/ phyi nang snod bcud gnyis su med par
bshags// ting 'dzin rnam gsum sems la gdar bcad nas// phung po rnam shes khams dang skye mched la// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms pas// 'gro drug sems can rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor

du/ gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub par mdzod// a ni yo ga'i sgo nas bshags par gsol ba ni// rtsa sog tsit+ta lus ngag yid gsum rnams// g+hu h+ya gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi mdzod// rdo rje klong dgu
dpal chen he ru dgu// khams gsum sa dgu gnyis su med par bshags// ji ltar snang ba'i lha yi dkyil 'khor du// snying po brjod pas thams cad rdzogs pa'i tshul// dbyer med nyid mnyam ngo bo nyid kyi

sku// thabs la mkhas pa gnyis su med par bshags// phyi nang gnyis med snod bcud chos kyi sku// nga dang bdag med ngo bo nyid mnyam pas// mtho ris ngan song rgyu 'bras rnam gnyis po// gnyis med bde chen
klong du mthar phyin shog a ti yo ga'i sgo nas bshags par gsol ba ni// ji ltar snang ba kun bzang bde chen gnas// yod med rtag chad mtshan ma'i tshigs las 'das// 'di ltar ma gyur bdag rtogs gang
yin pa// de nyid ma spangs rtogs pa'i klong du bshags// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur tha tshig brtags pa med// btsal med bsgrub med nam mkha'i ngang du gnas// yongs la khyab pas kun la 'dod dgur

sgyur// phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam du bshags// rtogs pa'i man ngag don dang ma ldan na// tshig gi mtshon pas byang chub mi thob pas// rang sems gdod nas sangs rgyas yin shes pas// rang byung ye shes

klong de grub par shog/ ho/ mi gnas dpal chen bud d+ha he ru la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa ltar// sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// mi gnas dpal chen badzra he ru la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa
ltar// thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// mi gnas dpal chen rad na he ru la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa ltar// yon tan dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen pad+ma he ru la// ji ltar
bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa ltar// chags med gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen kar ma he ru la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa ltar// 'phrin las dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom
ldan dpal chen rag sha he ru la/ ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ltar// dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen yag+sha he ru la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa
ltar// dam nyams sgrol ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen sa nu he ru la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa ltar// sa rnams thob pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen gu

h+ya he ru la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa ltar// yi dam lha yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ka tar chen mo rdo rje yum rnams la// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ltar// ma ltar byams pa'i dngos grub stsal du
gsol// sngon mo dbyug thogs ke'u ri dza/ nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// tse'u ri ser mo mda' 'phen dza// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub gsol// pra mo dmar mo chu srin dza// nye bar
bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub gsol// pe ta nag mo thod bsgyings dza// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub gsol// pu ka dmar ser byis rgyu za// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub gsol// kas ma ljang mo thod phrag

dza// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub gsol// sme sha nag mo byi snying za// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub so// tsan d+ha ser skya mchog lus dza// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub gsol// 'phra men chen mo

brgyad la dngos grub zhu ba ni// seng ge brjid non che ba'i dngos grub dang// stag gi dpa' brtul che ba'i dngos grub dang// wa yi sgyu rtsal che ba'i dngos grub gsol// bya rgod rtog mdzems che ba'i dngos grub

dang// kang ka dur khrod 'joms pa'i dngos grub dang/ kha kha yid bzhin bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang/ hu lu spyan dang ldan pa'i dngos grub rnams// dus 'di nyid du dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol// rta

gdong sgo ma rnams la dngos grub zhu ba ni// rta gdong dbyings nas 'dren byed dngos grub dang/ phag gdong nyon mongs sdoms pa'i dngos grub dang/ dred gdong spyan dang ldan pa'i dngos grub dang/ spyang gdong

shes pa sgrol ba'i dngos grub rnams// da lta nyid du bdag la stsal du gsol// 'bar ma spor ma rnams la dngos grub zhu ba ni/ phyi ru dgra bgegs ma lus bsgral ba dang// nang du rnal 'byor rnams kyi las la

brtson pa yis// dngos grub dam pa dus 'dir stsal du gsol// dbang phyug tshogs la dngos grub zhu ba ni// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rnams ma lus bsgral ba dang// nang du rnal 'byor las la brtson pa'i
dngos grub rnams// dus 'di nyid du dngos grub stsal du gsol// mkha' 'gro rnams la dngos grub zhu ba ni// mtshan dang dpe byad rtags su ldan pa dang// rtogs pas mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub rnams//
dus 'di nyid du dngos grub stsal du gsol/ ma bdun sring bzhi rnams la dngos grub zhu ba ni// 'jig rten 'di ru ma ltar byams shing sring ltar gdung ba dang// phyi mar 'bras bu bla med go
'phang thob pa yi// dngos grub dam pa dus 'dir stsal du gsol// sum brgya drug cu rnams la dngos grub zhu ba ni// bsgral ba'i dmigs rnams dngos su bsgral ba dang// bsgral nas 'bras bu bla med go

'phang thob pa yi// dngos grub dam pa dus 'di nyid du stsal du gsol// skyes bu ging chen rnams la dngos grub zhu ba ni// 'jig rten 'di ru 'grogs shing gdung ba dang// phyi mar 'bras bu bla med go 'phang thob
pa yi// dngos grub dam pa dus 'di nyid du stsal du gsol// dngos grub stsal dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs nyid dang// 'gro ba bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum

gnyis// ye nas mnyam nyid don gcig yin mod kyang// ma rtogs dbang gis ye nas 'khor bar 'khyams// 'khor ba nyid kyang ye nas mya ngan 'das// skye shi nyid kyang ye nas byang chub sems// skye shi med pa'i
dngos grub dam pa de// dus 'di nyid du bdag la stsal du gsol// che bas bsgyings pa'i bar snangalha bran dang// dregs pas myos pa'i ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// mthun 'jug thabs kyis 'dul ba lags pas na/
khro rgyal mthu yis byin gyis brlabs 'tshal na// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang// mthu rtsal dbang gis dngos grub stsal du gsol// bar du gcod pa'i bdud bgegs 'dre srin dang// srog

dbugs sgyu ma'i tshe la bar gcod na// rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// nges pa'i don ston rdo rje slob dpon dang// rgyal 'theb spyan dang skar ma ging chen dang// brtse gdung shugs 'chang mched dang lcam

bral dang// 'jig rten ci 'dra ston pa'i dus gsum pha ma la// drin la len gyis ldan ngo ma 'tshal na// mngon shes lnga dang ldan gyur nas// rig pa gnas mchog bco brgyad la// mkhas pa'i dngos grub stsal du

gsol// ma hA yo ga'i sgo nas smon lam gdab pa ni// ho phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung pa chen po lnga yum chen lnga'i mkha' klong rnam bar dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas/ nang bcud kyi 'jig rten lam

rgyud lnga'i sems rgyal ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin gyis/ yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i khyad par las/ sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ sprul pa dang/ yang sprul la
sogs pa sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las bkod pa mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo mdzod bsgyings pa lta bus/ thabs la thabs rol/ ye shes la ye shes rol/ chos nyid la chos nyid rol pa'i tshul gyis/
'khor ba sangs rgyas par mdzad pa'i dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i byin rlabs las/ thugs zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par sku 'bar ba'i cha lugs kyis nga rgyal dregs pas khengs pa'i
bar du gcod pa'i bdud dang srin po tshar bcad nas// bla na med par sgrol bar mdzad pa rnams la 'dres pa chen po don gyis phyag 'tshal nas/ ye shes thugs rje'i ngang gis mkhyen par mdzad nas dgongs su
gsol lo/ 'byor ba thams cad ni longs spyod/ phul ba thams cad ni mchod bar bzhes nas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi gral thob shog/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi

sa la gnas stobs par gyur cig/ chos nyid la rtog pa med cing/ me lce la sbrang bu mi 'chags pa lag na 'ang/ kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam gyi dbang gis dam tshig nyams shing chag pa rnams dang/ phyogs bcu 'jig

rten gyi khams na rdo rje slob dpon dang mched dang/ lcam bral mtha' dag bzhugs pa rnams dgongs spyod rnal 'byor gyi don la thugs dam rtse gcig tu mdzad pa rnams kyi thugs dam skongs// bdag dang mtha'
yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dbyar dam nyams pa so so gsal nas/ thams cad rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas stobs bar smon to// a nu yo ga'i sgo nas smon lam gdab pa// ho khams gsum
chos nyid kyi dur khrod/ dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor/ tsit+ta mkha' mnyam gyi rgyal po/ kun gzhi ma bcos pa'i thig le/ yid ye shes sems dpar bzhugs pa/ thugs ye shes klong dag

na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub ste/ chos skur lhun gyis grub par gyur cig/ yod med rtag chad kyi chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i chos nyid du mchod par phul/ gzung 'dzin dang rtog pa'i
bag chags ma g.yos pa'i ye shes su gnas stobs/ nyon mongs pa dang rtogs pa'i sgrib pa thugs mnyam pa'i klong du thugs dam bskul bas/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho tshogs thams cad gnyis su med pa'i mchod pas

mnyes par gyur cig/ phyi nang snod bcud kyi bsdus pa'i chos thams cad che mchog he ru kar sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ g+hu ya he ru kar gsung gi dkyil 'khor grub/ sa nu he ru kar thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyin
pas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par ma hA su ka bde ba chen por sangs rgyas te lhun gyis grub par smon to// a ti yo ga'i
sgo nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ ho bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig tshogs kyi dmyal ba yan chad kyi kun gzhi byang chub sems ji ltar yin na/ yin yang gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ dngos po dang/
mtshan ma phyogs dang/ ris su mi gnas pa kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po yin la/ grub kyang kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad

kyang rgyu byang chub kyi sems las byung la/ sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu yin la/ yin pa'i don la rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po sangs rgyas par gyur

cig/ sems can gyi rnam par rtog pa nyi ma spangs par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ci byung ba nyid ma g.yos pa'i chos nyid du shes te bsgoms pas/ chos kyi dbyings gzhan du btsal mi dgos te/ rang la rang chas su ye

nas yod pa dang/ sems kyi sdug bsngal nyid ma spangs par sdug bsngal ci skyes pa ma bslad pa'i ye shes chen po yin te/ bsgoms pas rang byung gi ye shes gzhan du btsal mi dgos te/ rang la rang chas su ye

nas yod pa yin na/ yin kyang gnyis su med pa yin la/ grub kyang gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid byang chub sems su mthar phyin par gyur cig/ sems can nyon mongs pa nyid ma spangs par byung tshor dang 'du

byed ci skyes kyang de nyid thig le chen por las mi 'gyur te/ mi 'gyur pa'i g.yung drung ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i de'i don la rtogs te bsgoms pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma bslad pa'i sems nyid gzhan
du btsal mi dgos te/ rang la rang chas su ye nas yod pa de/ yod kyang bdag dang sems can thams cad la yod la/ grub kyang de nyid rtogs pa'i klong du mthar phyin te sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ yin kyang

sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad yod rang byung gi ye shes su btsal ba med par sangs rgyas yin la/ don kyang de bzhin du sangs rgyas par gyur cig chos thams cad yin kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su
med pa mnyam pa nyid yin la/ don kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ chos thams cad yin kyang bzang ngan dang bde sdug thams cad sems nyid

kun tu bzang po bzang ngan med pa yin la/ don kyang sems nyid kun tu bzang po bzang ngan spongs len med par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ chos thams cad bzang ngan dang spongs len med la/ phyi dang nang du
phyogs ris med pas yod med rtag chad las 'das te/ skye shi dang 'pho 'gyur med pa yin pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang don de bzhin du sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ chos thams cad gnas kun

tu bzang po yin pas phyi'i yul la chags sdang ma skyes/ chos thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang po yin pas nang gi sems la skye shi med/ chos thams cad dus kun tu bzang po yin pas dus la snga phyi dang 'pho
'gyur med/ chos thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang po yin pas rgyu 'bras dang/ phyogs ris dang/ nye ring med par la rbad kyis bcad de bstan pas don de bzhin du go zhing rtogs par gyur
cig/ gong bzhin rtogs pas bdag dang mtha' yas sems can thams cad sangs mi rgyas pa'i dbang med de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ bdag gis ston pa kun tu bzang po'i bka'

bzhin du/ rgyu gdod ma nas dag pas chags pa ni 'bras bu sku gsung thugs la yang ma chags/ 'bras bu btsal ba med par sangs rgyas pas bral ba ni sngags dang phyag rgya dang yang ma bral/ thams cad kun tu

bzang po yin pas spangs ni rtog pa gang yang ma spangs/ ye nas khyab gdal chen po'i ngang du sangs rgyas pas rig ni 'byung ba lnga la yang mi lus/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes la snang ba'i nyi ma shar bas rten ni ye shes
lnga la yang mi 'cha'/ rang byung gi ye shes ma bcos par kun gzhi gnas pas dngos grub ni sangs rgyas la'ang de las med pas/ 'di ltar rtogs shing tshig tu brjod pas/ 'pho 'gyur med pa'i gnas shes pas
skye shi med pa'i tsher gyur/ don 'di bstan pas kyang bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad sangs mi rgya ba'i dbang med de sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i

chos thams cad rang gi sems yin pa'i phyogs dang rigs med par rang byung gi ye shes su brdal/ phyi dang nang med par chos nyid kyi klong du shar/ steng dang 'og med par thig le chen po'i klong du brdal pas/
dmyal ba sangs rgyas su dongs sprugs/ sdug bsngal chos nyid du la zlas// rnam rtogs ye shes su lam gtod// rgyud drug bde chen du rgyas btab/ mthon dman klong chen du khod bsnyams/ rtag chad tshig las
'das par sun phyung/ sems ye nas sangs rgyas par bde brdal bas// don 'di tshig tu brjod pa dang/ rtogs pa dang/ klong du gyur ba lta ci smos ky-i/ bka' 'di zur tsam bstan pas/ bdag dang mtha' yas

pa'i sems can thams cad sangs mi rgyas pa'i dbang med de sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ de lta bu'i bka'i man ngag nying khu 'dis/ lung dang man ngag gi slob dpon gyi snga rabs 'das pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs
pa dang/ phyis 'byon pa dang/ man ngag gi don spyod pa'i mched thams cad zab mo'i don mthar phyin/ gsang ba'i man ngag gzhan la ma 'phel// nges pa'i 'bras bu mi slu ba thob// bka' thigs pa gter du

blangs nas/ kun tu bzang po dbyer med pa'i sa la bya btsal med par sangs rgyas par smon to/ khro bo'i lha tshogs rnams la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bshags pa'i cho ga khro bo'i spang skong rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi
mkhan po hUM ka ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs nam mkha' snying pos bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta swa/ b+ha b+hi sa sa tan tra/ bod skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud/ bcom 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid/ rigs lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo/ sku

gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ye shes chen po'i rol ba/ gnyis su med pa'i thig le/ yongs su bkod pa'i snying po thams cad du khyab brdal ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa med pa'i

sangs rgyas/ cis kyang btsal du med pa/ mi 'gyur ba 'gyur ba med pa/ ma bcos pa bcos su med pa/ mi snang ba snang ba med pa/ ma grub pa sgrub tu med pa/ gnyis su med cing tha mi dad pa/ thams cad du so so
ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid/ nyid la nyid gsung du med pa'i dgongs par 'dus pa gsung pa ni/ chos thams cad brjod du med cing brjod pa las 'das pas/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni chos
nyid ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin du 'dus so// chos thams cad bsam du med cing bsam pa las 'das pas/ da ltar gyis sangs rgyas thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems de bde ba chen por 'dus so// chos thams
cad 'gyur ba med cing 'pho 'gyur las 'das pas/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni rang byung gi ye shes btsal du med par 'dus so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad spros pa med pa'i thig le chen
por 'dus so// de la ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho/ snang srid chos rnams thams cad ye nas stong// 'khor ba'i chos la ye nas stong// 'khor ba'i chos la dngos po med// sems can 'di zhes brtag pa med// de
bzhin mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid dang// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ sus kyang ma byas sus byed yod// nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas la// de la mkhas pas bcos su

med// de ltar dus gsum 'gyur med pas// de ni chos sku rtag pa zhes// kun gyi bdag nyid yin par bshad// de yang ye nas rang byung du// ye shes chen po nyid yin pas// med cing stong bar ma gyur pas// ji
ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'byung// dper na yid bzhin rin chen rtogs// 'di 'dra rtag par mi snang yang// 'dod pa'i dgos pa 'byung ba bzhin// sems kyi chos nyid de dang mtshungs// nor par brtags pas
mtshan ma'i rdzas// bag chags skyes pa ci bsams kyang// de la rtag cing nges med pas// 'dus byas chos zhes de la bya// de bas thams cad 'dus pa'i chos// bde gshegs kun bzang bka' 'di ni// tshig
gcig thos pas sangs rgyas te// 'khor ba btsal yang mi rnyed do// sangs rgyas ma lus 'dus pa yi/ kun tu bzang po'i bka' 'di ni/ nam mkha' bzhin te 'gyur ba med// ye shes nyi ma dang 'dra
bas// gsal ba de la 'char nub med// ye nas yin pas 'dzin rtogs med// lhun gyis grub pas 'pho 'gyur med// de bzhin nges pas ma yengs bsgom// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ 'di 'drar tshig
gis mtshon du med// man ngag klong chen ye brdal bas// bde ba chen por ye sangs rgyas// cis kyang mi 'gyur byang chub sems// ma bcos ye nas lhun gyis grub// de la rtsol med ma bcos bzhag/ ces ched
du gsungs pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs dang po'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang

bzhin ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho/ snang dang mi snang 'khor ba'i chos// yod med rtag chad 'khor ba'i rgyu/ sangs rgyas sems can 'khrul pa'i tshig/ bde dang sdug bsngal nor ba'i lam// sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra bzhin
du// cir yang ma grub cir yang snang// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kun// thams cad de bzhin chos 'dra bas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// sangs rgyas nyid kyi rang bzhin las// sangs rgyas gzhan
nas btsal du med// log par brtson pa nor ba'i lam// nges par bstan yang ma go la// rang bzhin ba la 'jig rten pa// thar pa'i dus med sdug bsngal med// de ni grol bar ngas ma bshad// de bas sangs
rgyas rang bzhin ni// sems dang chos dang nam mkha' gsum// ye nas ma bcos don shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas rang bzhin yin// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// ye nas sems kyi rang bzhin la// tshig
dang yi ges sgro mi gdags// ma btsal ma bcos bde bar gnas// ye nas sangs rgyas rang bzhin ni// nam mkha' 'dra ste 'pho 'gyur med// ma yengs nges pa 'di thos na/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin rtsol mi
dgos// sems dang chos dang nam mkha' la// tshig dang yi ge 'di 'dra zhes// kun tu bzang po ngas ma rnyed/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin de nyid yin// med de chad pa ma yin te/ dgongs pa ting 'dzin nang na
gsal// gsal ba ma 'dres don gsal ba// ji ltar 'dod pa rang dbang sgyur// chos nyid nam mkha' yangs pa la// rang gi ye shes 'de brdal bas// khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin// gang du bsams
par ma bgrod phyin// kun tu bzang po bka' 'byung bas/ log lta nges pa ming yang med// 'dod bsgyur rin chen char 'bebs bzhin// yid la bsams pa bzhin du 'byung// mun rum snang ba'i 'od shar bzhin/
skyon rnams yon tan bzhin du snang// phra ma'i ting ni 'byongs ba ltar// gang ltar dmigs pa de bzhin snang// thams cad kun tu bzang por gnas// gzhan du smon na ye nas rdzogs// mkha' ltar
mnyam pa nyid du zhog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs gnyis pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi khyab par ni/ sems kyi mtshan nyid sangs rgyas

ni/ ma g.yos pa yi nam mkhar 'dus// mtha' dbus med pa'i chos nyid ni// ma bcos pa yi dbyings su 'dus// phyi nang med pa chos kyi sku// 'pho 'gyur med pa'i klong du rdzogs// bzang ngan med pa'i byang chub
sems// bde ba chen por mngon sangs rgyas// rdul gcig rdul snyed sangs rgyas kyang// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi ngang/ ye shes sems dpa' nyid kyi ngang// de las ma 'dus gcig kyang med// thams cad
gcig ste yongs kyis med/ khams gsum stong gsum la sogs pa// ji srid rdzas su snang ba dang/ mu mtha' med pa thams cad kun/ 'dus pas lus ngag yid gsum nyid// de yang rang gi byang chub

sems// chos nyid kun tu bzang po la// rang byung ye shes klong brdal bas// sangs rgyas don rnams 'dus zhes bya// tshig tu smra ba'i tshig mtha' med// tshig dang yi ge gang 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas mtshan yang de
nyid du// bgrang gis mi lang brjod las 'das// tshig dang yi ge las 'das shing// yod med rtag chad spros bral na/ sangs rgyas mtshan yang brjod med pas// brjod med spros bral tshig las 'das// sangs
rgyas sems can 'di 'dra zhes// btsal yang rgyal bas mi rnyed na// sangs rgyas ming du 'dogs pa nor// ma gsungs pa ni rgya cher bshad// nam mkha' bzhin du sems gdags pas// yod med rtag chad gnyis

kyi tshig/ ma smras pa de ci la gnod// rnal 'byor tshig tu brjod pas nyes// gtan tshig nges pa ma thos shing// chos nyid klong du ma phebs pa'i// tshig med tshig ni rnam grangs par// mkhas par re ba lung dang

'gal/ nges pa'i don nyid ma shes par/ kha bshad rang bstod che ba 'byin// nga rgyal sma khangs gang zag de// gol ba'i lam du ha ra ha na// ye nas rang bzhin med pa'i chos// lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas
par// rang gi sems nyid ji bzhin du// gzhan du smra byed nor ba'i lam// ye nas sangs rgyas ma yin na// bra mo nas su mi skye bzhin// btsal kyang tshi chad nyon mongs pas/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ga la
'grogs// thams cad ye nas bde ba chen// kun tu bzang por ye rtogs na// gser rdo 'dra ste 'gyur ba med// de bzhin rang sems gdod nas dag/ 'jig rten 'khor ba'i chos 'di ni// spangs pas spongs
par mi 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin shes pa na// mya ngan 'das pa de nyid yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang// gzhan nas thob byed nor ba yi// mi 'ching grol bas 'grub par

'gyur// ye nas sangs rgyas ma yin na// de la thog ma tha ma med// chos nyid rang bzhin sems nyid la// phyi dang nangadu grub pa med// mnyam nyid che chung med pa la// phyogs dang ris su phye ba med// sems nyid
gnyis su med pa la// bde dang sdug bsngal btsal du med/ nor bu rin chen dpe bzhin du// byang chub sems kyang kun gyi dngos// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'byung bas/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems la
bsngags// bde chen byang chub sems 'di ni// ye nas yin par sus mthong la/ ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du 'gyur// don 'dir ma 'das gang yang med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs gsum pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa ched du brjod pa/ sems can shes pa mi gcig na// sangs rgyas mdzad pa so sor snang// sems
can shes pa dbyer med na/ sangs rgyas mdzad pa de dang 'dra// sems can sred len 'khor ba la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad// le lo rtag du sun 'byin phyir// mdzad kyang mya ngan 'das par

ston// yul dang gzugs ni gar chags pa// sangs rgyas mdzad pa de don du// sku dang phyag rgya la sogs pa// byin rlabs cho phrul de bzhin snang// yang dag sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni/ ci mdzad rang bzhin med
par mdzad// ci gsung rang bzhin med par gsung// ci ston pa ni kun tu bzang// sangs rgyas mdzad pa khyad par che/ dngos rnams ye nas dngos med pas// 'khor ba thams cad mya ngan 'das// thar pa'i

gnas zhes de la bya// thams cad rang bzhin med rtogs na// sdug bsngal thams cad byang chub lam// skyon rnams yon tan shes pa na// nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes skye// phyin ci log tu ci bltas kyang// thams

cad grol ba rang las byung// rnam par rtog pa ci skyes kyang// de nyid thabs kyi bskul ma yin// mtho ris ngan song ci snang yang/ log rtog yin pas brdzun du snang// de yang thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// ye nas
lhun gyis grub par gnas// thams cad thig le chen po la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa ma shes na/ 'og min gnas kyang dmyal ba'i gnas// de bzhin skyon dang log par snang// de bzhin sems kyi mdzad spyod
ni// gser btso tshur dang phrad pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// de la sangs rgyas sems can med// mdzad pa thams cad sangs rgyas la// don la 'gyur med ce na// ma mdzad pa yang nges pa
med// mdzad pa'i don yang de la 'dus// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs bzhi pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye nas grub pa'i don
brjod pa/ gdod nas rin chen gser dang 'dra// ye nas de ltar gnas pa la// de la bzhu dang ma bzhu med// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas te// kun tu bzang por grub zin pas// de la sus kyang bcos su
med// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du zhog/ chos nyid rang bzhin med pa la// tshig dang yi ger bstan pas gol// sangs rgyas sems su dag pa la// gzhan nas thob byed nor ba'i lam// ji ltar snang ba sems
yin pas// sems ni rnam pa thams cad kun// kun tu bzang por grub zin na// gzhan du btsal du ci yang med// dper na glen pa'i rang bzhin can// glang po rnyed kyang rjes tshol ltar// nges par bstan kyang
yid ma ches// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yi// ye nas grub pas btsal mi dgos// gal te btsal yang skyon med de// mi 'gyur dbyings las gdod nas med// dngos med nam mkha' rang bzhin las// rdzas

dang dngos po dgos pa med// de bzhin sems kyi rnam pa la// gang yang mi dgos lhun gyis grub// pad+ma can gyi zhing khams na// bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis med cing// skye shi 'pho 'gyur med pa ltar// sems

kyi rnam pa'ang de bzhin no/ mi g.yo ba yi zhing khams na// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med cing// lha dang bdud kyang ris med cing// byang chub sems kyang de bzhin no// sa yi snying po gser gling na// thams

cad gser du snang ba bzhin// ye nas sems su grub zin na// ji ltar byas kyang kun tu bzang// mi 'gyur ba yi g.yung drung du// yod med rtag chad chos rnams kun// rang bzhin med par grub zin na// de ltar

rtogs pas skyon ci yod// byang chub sems kyi bde klong du// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis med cing// che chung phyogs ris gnyis med na// nga dang bdag tu su las byung// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa ste// thams
cad lam du gyur pa yin// gzhan nas btsal yang mi rnyed pas// ye nas grub pas thams cad 'dus// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs lnga pa'o//// de nas
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi btsal mi dgos pa'i 'bras bu brjod pa/ thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba la// bag chags tshan mas btsal mi dgos// dper na rtsi lo skor ma ni/ 'byung ba lnga yis ma bskyed

par// sman gyi 'bras bu rang bzhin skye// de ni rdzus te skye ba yin// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa 'di// theg pa gzhan nas ma btsal bar// ye nas sangs rgyas rang bzhin gnas// de ni bskal pa bzang zhes
bya// nam mkha' lta bur khyab brdal ba// phyogs dang ris su btsal mi dgos// chos nyid dbyings su klong brdal bas// rgyu dang 'bras bur btsal du med// byang chub sems su don rtogs
pas// sangs rgyas sems can ye nas med// bde ba chen por don rtogs pas// 'khor ba ngan song mya ngan 'das// chos nyid byang chub sems 'di ni// btsal bas rnyed pa ma yin te// bsgrubs pas sa thob ma
yin pas// mkha' ltar ye nas rnam par dag/ phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pas/ gnyis med thabs dang shes rab 'brel// bde ba rang la rdzogs longs spyod// 'khor

ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gnyis su snang ba thams cad kun// nam mkha' bgo bsha' byed pa bzhin// ris su phye'ang snang ba med/ rang bzhin bde ba chen po ni/ rgyu rkyen gang la 'ang ma bsten par// thugs kyi

snying po man ngag ste// thog ma nyid nas grub par bshad// de la ma rtogs phal ba rnams// sa thob bya sgro rlung bskyod bzhin/ nges pa'i don la ma bzhag par// rgyu 'bras chos la nges pa med// gang yang 'di zhes

sa ma zin// de 'dra'i gang zag rlung 'dra la// de 'dus pa yi don mi ston// bstan kyang mi go sgro skur 'debs// la las bzang po yid ches kyang// 'jig rten khe dang grags tshul gyis// tshig tu smod cing thabs
kyi tshol// de la 'di ni bstan pa min// dper na 'dzam gling gser gyi rgyu la btsal mi dgos// de bzhin kun bzang sems kyi chos// rgyu nyid ye nas 'bras bu yin// nam mkha' bzhin du gnas pa la// btsal
kyang ma btsal gdod nas med/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yis// dge bcu gling bzhir shar ba'i yun// se gol yun la snang ba bzhin// ye nas bde chain byang chub sems// btsal mi dgos pa'i 'bras bu
ni// yun du skad cig lhun gyis grub// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// btsal ba med par ye nas bde// sgrub mi dgos par kun tu bzang// ye nas ma bcos ye nas dag/ gser zhun bzhin du ye brdal
la// de la mkhas pas bcos su med// ye nas mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med/ de la tshig tu brjod na 'gal// smra ba mang po bdud kyi las// bab chos mang mo 'chal ba'i tshig/ brjod pa med pa'i ngang nyid la// nam
mkha'i ngang la ma g.yos zhog/ ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las// skabs drug pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i rnam pa 'dus pa

brjod pa/ yod de dngos po snang na yang// snang srid ye nas sangs rgyas rgyan// med de dngos po med na yang/ phyi nang snod bcu stong pa'i gzhi// mtha' dbus phyogs ris med pa'i gzhi// mu dang mtha' las
'das pa yang// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// ye nas chos sku 'gyur ba med// ji srid rdzas su yod kyi bar// sangs rgyas sku yang de bzhin yod/ ji sr-id dngos por ma grub na// sangs

rgyas sku yang dngos por med// de bzhin yul dang dbang po dang// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// sangs rgyas sku rnams chos skur 'dus// de yang ting nge 'dzin cho
'phrul las// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du// 'khor ba myang 'das longs spyod pas// de yang sems kyi longs spyod de// sems kyi ting 'dzin longs spyod kyis// ji ltar 'dod pa don rtogs
pas// longs spyod rdzogs skur thams cad 'dus// de yang chos nyid byang chub sems// byang chub sems la ris med pas// long bas nam mkha' 'dzin pa 'dra// gzugs 'dzin rtag chad 'dzin pa la// 'dzin

chags btsal med sprul pa'i sku// sprul skur 'di 'dra mi dmigs kyang// ji ltar 'dul ba de bzhin snang// byang chub sems kyang de bzhin pas// sangs rgyas sku rnams sprul skur 'dus// sangs rgyas sku dang rang
gi sems// ris su btsal yang mi rnyed pas// ye nas bcos med snying po'i sku// bya btsal med par 'dus pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud
las// skabs bdun pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rnam par 'dus pa brjod pa chos rnams tshig tu yod pa'i bar// de bzhin sangs rgyas gsung yang yod// gal te tshig tu smra med

na// sangs rgyas gsung yang brjod du med// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// tshig tu brjod las 'das pa rnams// sgra dang dbyangs kyi yi ger 'dus// de yang 'bras bu lngar 'dus pa ste// snying po nges pa
gcig tu 'dus// de yang brjod du med pa'i dbyings// chos dang sems dang nam mkha' gsum// 'di 'dra'i tshig tu brjod du med// brjod du med pa'i chos nyid gsung// sangs rgyas gsung du 'dus pa

yin// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// 'di 'dra tshig dang yi ge med// mi gsung ba ni rgya cher bshad// ye nas ma bcos chos nyid yin// thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin la// tshig dang yi ger gang gis
brjod// sus kyang ma brjod rjod pa med// brjod med nam mkha'i ngang du gnas// ye nas nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// 'di 'dra sus kyang brjod du med// de bzhin chos nyid 'gyur med pa// tshig dang yi ger
btags pa med/ sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun 'dus pas// chos nyid skye ba med pa'i klong// klong la 'di 'dra brjod du med// de yang ye nas byang chub sems// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs brgyad pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa 'dus pa brjod pa/ thams cad nam mkha' bzhin du shes// de nyid mi 'gyur chos kyi
dbyings// de ltar rtogs pa ye shes yin// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// byams pa'i gnyen dang phan pa'i grogs// sgyu ma lta bur mnyam shes pa// sangs rgyas thugs rje dbyer med
shes// rgyu 'bras theg pa kun las byung// 'di ni rgyu 'bras dbyer med pas// sangs rgyas sems can smos ci dgos// thams cad rang gi byang chub sems// thams cad nam mkhar shes pa la// phyogs char gtso
ba med ba bzhin// sems can rang gi sems yin na// de la grub dang ma grub med// la la kun tu bzang po'i bka'// nges pa di la mi gnas pa// rang shes mos brtson phyogs 'char la// dmigs pa bcas te
ngar 'dzin pa// de la nges pa'i don med pas// de bas bka' 'di ma bstan na// don gyi 'bras bu log par 'gyur// de bas kun bzang nga yi bka'// gzhan gyis spros par mi tshugs pas// nga nyid nga la
gsungs pa bzhin// de yang rnal 'byor las can gter// des kyang yongs la 'dod pa bsgyur// de bzhin du yang rang gi sems// skyon nyid yon tan yin par shes// de yang mi zad sems kyi gter// snang
ba thams cad byang chub sems/ mi snang ba yang sems yin pas// snang dang mi snang gnyis med pa/ 'di yang chos nyid byang chub thugs// bde dang sdug bsngal 'khor 'das dang// yod med rtag chad la sogs

pa// de yang gnyis med byang chub thugs// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos rnams dang// dngos po can la bstan pa yin// chos nyid brjod pa med pa las// tshig dang yi ger bstan pa med// sems dang chos dang nam
mkha' la// 'di 'drar rgyal bas ma rnyed chos nyid thugs// rang bzhin de ltar gnas pa yin// sus kyang bcos su med pa'i don// go zhing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// don ni dpe la blangs nas bstan// rnal
'byor kun bzang nga yi don/ blo ldan nges par rtogs pa la// snod ngan rnams kyi mi rtogs pa// dmigs med kha dog mi mthong ba// shes rab chung bas don ma rtogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi
mchog/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhi 'di// brjod pas bskal bar thob mi 'gyur// bsgoms pas yun du rnyed mi 'gyur// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa la// de ni ma bcos rang dag pa'i// ma btsal gnas pa'i
bsgom pa yin// de las sangs rgyas btsal du med// sems nyid dngos po kun tu snang// sems nyid cir yang med par bzhin// de ltar ye nas yin shes pas// sangs rgyas zhes kyang de la bya/ 'di ltar med
pa'i sems dang chos// btsal kyang bskal pa brgyar mi rnyed// ma bcos ngang la bde bar bzhag/ de la cis kyang bcos su med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs
pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs dgu pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba 'dus pa'i don brjod pa/ lta ba chos nyid nam mkha' 'dra// mi 'pho mi 'gyur phyogs ris med// bzang ngan
phyogs ris yang dog med// thams cad chos ni de lta bu'o// nam mkha' 'di la kun gnas bzhin// sems la dog pa ci yang med// sangs rgyas thugs kyang de yin pas// lta ba'i rgyal po zhes
bya'o// gang zhig rgun chang myong 'dra'i sems// nam mkha' lta bur mi shes par// srog gcod sdig la sogs pa la// lta bar gsal nas mi 'dzem pa// byin pa lta bur nam mkha' la// dgar re khung bu rtsig pa
bzhin// rnal 'byor de ni don med pas// gol ba'i lam du brlag par 'gyur// lta ba la sogs nges pa yi// rgya cher thos pas rtogs med pas// gang zhig bsgom bsgrub tshul byed pas// 'bras bu med de rlag
par 'gyur// de na nges par bsgrub 'dod pas// bka' yi dam pa 'di thos shing// gang la rnam par rtog med na// 'di ni nam mkha' 'dra bar bshad// phyi nang chos ni thams cad la// rgyu dang 'bras bu mi
'byed par// mnyam pa'i rje btsun kun tu bzang// bdag nyid ye nas de bzhin pas// lta ba kun gyi mdo 'dus pa// byang chub sems ni nam mkha' 'dra/ khyab brdal chen por gang shes pa// lta ba 'di las
gzhan la med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs bcu pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig dang spyod pa 'dus par brjod
pa/ lta ba nam mkha' bzhin du khyab// sems dang chos dang nam mkha' ru// thams cad kun la khyab cing brdal// des na sems kyi chos rnams kun/ kun bzang ngang las mi 'da' bar// bde ba che las nyams

med na// sa gzhi bzhin du 'dod pa 'byung// de bzhin sems kyi chos kun la// sangs rgyas nyid la nyid gol bas// gnyis med dus dang rgyun med na// spyod pa chu bo'i klung chen 'dra// snang ba de bzhin mi snang
dang// yod med rtag chad bde sdug dang// bzang ngan gtsang rme bde sdug rnams// ye nas kun bzang longs spyod dang// gang la gtsang sme mi dmigs zhing// ci la'ang rtog pa med pa des// ma sangs bde bar

longs spyod na/ sangs rgyas mdzad spyod ma nor bas// ci spyod skyon med pas// bde ba'i ye shes rang byung pa// gang ltar byas pa me tog skye/ ma spangs spyad pas sangs rgyas yin// dper na 'khor los sgyur rgyal
ltar// skyon la spyod kyang yon tan snang// sems kyi longs spyod gar skyes kyang// sangs rgyas ma yin gcig kyang med// la la blon po'i rang bzhin can// nyon mongs la sogs 'chal ba'i
tshig/ sems kyi spyod pa mi shes pas// sdug bsngal brgyad dang gtan du 'gro/ de ltar gol ba'i gang zag la// nges pa'i spyod pa 'di thos nas// mun pa 'od snang ji bzhin du// skyon nyid yon tan nyid du

snang// byang chub sems rtog spyod pa ni// zhi zhing dul bas chos nyid dang// gzhan dang mthun pas mnyam pa nyid// gang la mi rtog byang chub sems// bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med pas// bdag gir mi 'dzin
ngar mi 'dzin// skyon dang yon tan gnyis med pas// skyon dang yon tan mi spong ldan// chos rnams nam mkha' bzhin shes pas// rang bzhin med par yongs la brdal// byang chub sems su kun rtog pas// skye
'chi med par lhun gyis grub// chos kun ye nas 'gyur med pas// dus gsum thams cad dad don 'das// bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la// spyad pa'i thabs la rag pa med// 'khor ba'i chos la ci spyad
kyang// mi 'ching grol bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// kun tu bzang po nyid kyi rgyan/ 'dod spyod yon tan lnga la rdzogs// ma yengs ting 'dzin rgyan yin pas// spyad pas dngos grub dam par 'gyur// bdud rtsi

zhes kyang de la bya// nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i chos// rmi lam 'dra ste nam mkha' yi// mtha' ltar khyab par gnas pa la// las dang rnam smin gos mi 'gyur// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// ye

nas kun tu bzang po la// dus gsum 'gyur ba med shes na/ sangs rgyas zhes kyang de la bya// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'dir// byang chub sems rtogs spyod pa dang/ dus gsum sangs rgyas spyod pa kun// don
'dir ma 'dus gang yang med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las
brjod pa/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med la// log bar gol ba tshar bcad phyir/ sangs rgyas 'phrin las ci mdzad kyang// 'phrin las rdzogs zhes bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs pa ni/ skyon
nyid yon tan yin shes na/ 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// thams cad ma spangs lhun gyis grub// chos nyid sems nyid nam mkha' nyid// dbyer med ngo bo nyid mnyam pas// 'dus byas chos kyang de 'dra
phyir// sus kyang byas shing bcos pa med// rgyu rkyen las kyi ltos ma yin// thams cad ma bcos ye nas dag/ nam mkha' bzhin du gsal ba las// rang rig ye shes nam mkha' 'byung// ma chags mi g.yo chos
nyid las// mi 'gyur mi dmigs rig pa las// gsal la ma 'dres 'od bzhin du// shar nas nub pa'i dus med pa// dngos po thams cad chos nyid rkyen// las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal

che// rgyu 'bras ye nas mya ngan 'das// 'di ni 'phrin las rdzogs pa ste// chos rnams thams cad thog ma nas// rang bzhin ye nas rnam dag pas// 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir na klong// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du

gnas// sangs rgyas 'phrin las bcol ba ni// dper na rgya mtsho chu rlabs bzhin// rgya mtsho nyid las ma rtogs pa// chu rlabs gzhan nas 'byung ba med/ 'phrin las rgya mtsho rlabs dang 'dra// de bzhin sangs
rgyas 'phrin las kyang// byang chub sems las gzhan pa yi// 'phrin las logs su bstan pa med// sems dang sems byung 'phrin las yin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// 'di 'dra ci yang ma yin
pas// 'phrin las btsal dang ma btsal ni// ma spros ye nas 'phrin las yin// dper na phyi ma leb bu ni// rdzing bu mthong yang mtha' ma skor// de bzhin gang zag mi shes pa// bden pa bstan yang log par
rtsol// zin cing grub pa'i dus med pas// nges pa tshi chad brtson 'grus che// de bas rnal 'byor don 'dus pa// nges pa'i don phyir rgyud 'di byos// dper na gser khung phye ba la// gser zong zad pa med

bzhin du// rgyud 'di gang gis mtshan thos na/ byang chub don la zad pa med// dper na rin chen gling phyin na// 'dod pa'i nor la zad pa med// thams cad byang chub chen po brdal// phyogs ris btsal yang mi
rnyed pas// bsrung med dam tshig yang dag pa// yin pas kun tu bzang po yis// dam tshig 'di las ma gtogs pa// gzhan sangs rgyas pa med pa'i phyir// dam tshig ces bya rang gi sems// sangs rgyas nyid du
gnas pa la// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ming yang med// de la log rtogs phyogs med de// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin// ye nas bcos pa med pa la// 'thab rtsod nyams pa'i ming yang med//
'da' ba med pas nyams pa med// thams cad kun bzang nga yi zhing/ sangs rgyas sems can ris med na// rtsod pa'i chos can su yi chos// med las yod par 'dzin pa 'am// nam mkha' dngos por bzung ba
bzhin// gang yang thar med sdug bsngal che// dper na long ba'i mdun phyogs su// ci yang med pa yod par mthong// de bzhin log pa'i gang zag rnams// rang bzhin med pa phyogs ris 'dzin// sbur bu srin

bral bgrod pa bzhin// btsal zhing thar med 'ching ba'i rgyu// gzhan gyis ma nyes rang gis len// sdug bsngal thar med nyon re mongs// de bas dam tshig chen po 'di// sa la skye 'khrung kun skye ltar// sems kyi
dam tshig 'di yod na// dmyal ba'i gnas kyang chos nyid klong// sdug bsngal rgyu yang byang chub sems// 'dzin rtog nyid las ye shes skyes// dper na bong gling dkar po ni/ dug nang zhugs kyang

dug kyang rtsi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad 'byung zhing// kun gyi sems nyid dam tshig 'di/ 'khor ba'i chos la longs spyod kyang// 'khor ba ye nas sangs rgyas pas// nyon mongs lam du ye shes gsal// bde ba che
las gzhan med do// 'di ltar klong du gyur pa las// mi bsrung ma yin bsrung mi dgos// 'das dang ma 'das gnyis ka med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i
rgyud las/ skabs bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa gnyis su med pa'i rol pa brjod pa/ dper na shing mkhan mkhas pa dang// sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma yi// cho 'phrul rnam

pa cir yang ston// btags na cir yang ston pa med// de bzhin sangs rgyas 'phrin las la// ji ltar 'dul ba'i 'gro don du// mdzad pa bcu gnyis bstan pa dang// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku// sku yi

cha byad bsam pa dang// gsung gi chos la 'bum phrag dang// thugs kyi thams cad mkhyen pa yi// sangs rgyas 'phrin las brjod 'das pa// sgyu ma'i rnam pa de bzhin du// rdul cha tsam yang mdzad pa med// de
bzhin gzugs brnyan thams cad dang// 'phrin las tha dad mang po kun/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du// chos rnams thams cad snang ba las// gzhan du ston par 'gyur re skan// de ltar sems la nges

par zhog/ 'khor ba ci 'dra cir snang yang// dngos po rdul yang grub pa med// sangs rgyas 'phrin las mang mdzad kyang// rdul cha tsam yang mdzad pa med// de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can yang// ye gnyis rang
gi sems yin gyi// sems la phyogs dang ris med pas// de la sangs rgyas 'phrin las tshad// spyod pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun// chos nyid stong par ye shes na// sangs rgyas 'phrin las ma nor
bas// bka' 'di nges par ngas gsungs so// med pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun// rang byung ye shes chen po la// ye nas phyogs dang ris med pas// sangs rgyas 'phrin las 'di nyid yin// sems kyi
'phrin las ye rdzogs la// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsung du med// ci kyang ma gsungs chos de la// sangs rgyas thams cad de las 'dus// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa log par lta ba tshar gcod pa/ ye shes khro bo 'dus pa'i 'phrin las brjod pa// rgyal ba'i ye
shes thig le nyid// yon tan ye shes lhar shar te// sangs rgyas 'phr-in las byed po'o// skye med sems nyid don dam lta// de yi ngang la sku rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// ye

shes sku nyid rdo rje che// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku mchog gshin rje gshed nag go/ gsung ni gsod byed rngam pa'o// de bzhin rdo rje 'jigs byed thugs// sku rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo 'o// sku la dbang

mdzad pad+ma'i sku// chags med pad+ma ra ga'i mdog/ rgyal ba'i gsung mchog 'bar ba'i sku// mi 'gyur rdo rje khro bo'i sku// lag na rdo rje mthing nag 'bar// bde gshegs thugs kyi ngo bo nyid// yon tan lhun grub
rin po che// ye shes mkha' lding 'bar ba khyung// rdo rje gshogs pa gdengs pa'o// thogs med las mchog he ru ka/ badzra ku ma ra yi sku// bde gshegs 'phrin las ngo bo nyid// ma bcos mi 'gyur chags pa

med// kun 'byung bya ba byed pa yi// rigs kyi bdag po kun 'dus pa// sku lnga lhun gyi grub pa'o// sprul pa gyad gnon kun 'dus pa/ khyung gnyis kha nas lce 'bab cing// seng ge kha nas rdo rje 'phros/ stag gi kha

nas ral gri 'bar// sbrul gdug kha nas me 'bar zhing// 'ug pa'i kha nas lcags kyu 'phro// lce sbyang kha nas phur bu ste// dred ma'i kha nas bdung zhags 'phen// de yi gsang sngags brjod pa ni// yi ge rgyal

ba'i gsung yin te// ngag du brjod pa skur ru gyur// yi ge rgyal pa'i thugs yin te// 'khor los la nye ba'o// e a kro te ka ya man ta ka/ kri sna ka la ru pa/ hri te ya ma ye/ hri badza kro d+ha ha ya gri ba/ pad+ma ta kri

da ra ka tsan+Da/ badzra pa ni tsan+da ma hA ro Sha na/ ka li kri ta/ badzra ki li ki la ya/ bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyi// yang snying 'dus pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dgongs pa 'dus pa'i

rgyud las/ skabs bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas chos thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub par mdzad de brjod pa/ e yaM raM baM laM/ 'byung lnga ye shes lhun grub pa'i// ye shes sku ste nyon mongs 'joms// 'byung ba las

kyi dkyil 'khor te// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// thams cad skyed pas yum nyid klong// rten du gyur pa sku dang gnas// sna tshogs kun 'byung nyon mongs 'joms// rnam rtog gcod pas 'khor lo ste// gur

ram ra ba spyil ba'i tshul// cis kyang mi chod mi shigs pa'o// a i u e oM ri li aM/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ ya ra la wa// sgra dang dbyangs kyi yi ge ste// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// yid bzhin rin chen
'phreng ba ltar// ma lus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// du ru ye/ seng nga ye// 'bras bu dgu nam mkha'i thog 'dra bas// lus ngag yid kyi dbang po 'joms// tig sna dza la u
ne u ne hUM dza dza/ spu gri 'dod pa'i so yin te// mtshon cha med dpung lta bu yi// stobs kyi drag sngags dril ba'o// a mu ka myar rbad/ trig nan myor rbad// u nan shag rbad/ spur nan ril rbad/

gnas bzhi gcod pa'i spu gri ste// rgyal ba kun gyi byin rlabs rnams// bsdus nas 'gal ba tshar gcod pa'o// gcod pa'i spu grir bzhag pa'o// e hUr thums dza// breng shag raM yaM rbad e// kun gyi spu gri mtha'
sdud de// thogs me med par gcod pa'o// a ya ma du ru tsa sha na/ 'jig rten dregs pa thams cad kyi// srog gi ngo bo sgrol ba'i 'bru// sde brgyad srog gi rnam shes so// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs bco lnga pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las ye shes chen po'i rol pa brjod pa/ stobs bcu pha rol gnon pa po// 'khor

lo rgyal po re mig bcu// brgya phrag bcu gcig kha mig can// bde gshegs khro bo 'dus pa yi// drag po sngags kyi grong khyer yin// gsang sngags rgyal po brgya dang bcu/ srog dang snying po ldan par bya// thebs

dang spu gri ldan pas na// gang yang rung ste chan la 'bebs/ bka' yi 'khor lo sngags 'khrul na// spu gris rang la gcod par byed// mtha' nas dbus su sdud pa'i tshul// gsang sngags 'phreng ba'i dkyus 'di
nyid// mthar 'gyed bzlog pa lha gnod do// gtub cing dral ba dkrug pa ste// ma nor bzlas pas gang yang 'grub// bka' gsang 'khor lo'i las yin pas// bsrung dang bzlog dang gshigs pa
dang// gsad dang stobs mnan rang gshed dbab// dbye dang dral ba la sogs byed// gsang sngags bka' yi 'khor lo 'di// bde gshegs rgyal bas mi theg na// bdud dang mu stegs la sogs
pa'i// 'jig rten gzhan dag smos ci dgos// des na 'jig rten dregs pa can// thams cad 'khor lo'i dbang du bskor// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyu
las/ skabs bcu drug pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa rdzogs par brjod pa/ thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pas/ rgyu rkyen rtsol pas ma yin te// nam mkha' bzhin du gnas
pa la// de las mi 'gyur sangs rgyas yin// ye nas yin pa'i don 'di na// bstan pas ye nas yin par shes// de dag rtogs pas drod 'byung ba// don dang rtags kyi 'bras bu 'brang// gang zag 'khrul pa
mtha' dag ni// yin nges don la mi phyogs par// g.yeng ba 'du 'dzi'i chos la mos// byis pa bla na med las 'dral// byas kyang zin pa'i dus med pas// de bas rnal 'byor rdzogs pa che// kun bzang rgyal
ba'i bka' 'di ni// mos pa'i dad pa'i 'di tshol na// yid la bsams pa thams cad kun// kun tu bzang po nyid du 'gyur// thog ma nyid nas nges pa'i don// ye shes nyi ma rang la 'char// rang

rig ye shes nang nas 'byung// ji ltar byas kyang bde ba che// ma btsal ma bsgrubs ma bsgoms kyang// nges pa'i don nyid ma grub med// ye nas mkha' ltar mnyam par gnas// brtson zhing bsgrubs kyang skyon
med de// nges par 'di ltar yid ches na/ ma btsal na yang 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na// rgyud lung 'di la su gnas pa// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// chos nyid don bstan
sems mi 'gyur// yin par yid ches skyo dub med// nges par shes pas btsal mi dgos// nan tan btar bas gdod nas dag/ byang chub sems la lhan ne ba// bsgom du med de 'gyur ba med// btsal du
med de spang du med// de la bgrod du ka nas med/ sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bka' rnams kun// don du ma gyur gcig kyang med// de bas ma nor nges pa'i bka'// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di ni// 'di ni
gzhan la bstan pa bas// snod med rnams la bshad pa na// ltung ba'i nyes pa brjod mi lang// de bas bde gshegs dgongs pa'i don// sems kyi gting du rang rgyas gdab// ces bcom ldan
'das chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin brjod pa med pa nyid du brjod de// skye 'gag gnyis su med par gyur tau// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ skabs bcu bdun
pa'o//// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dgongs don khro bo 'dus pa'i yang snying rdzogs so//// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
dpal kun tu bzang po/ thams cad 'dus pa kun tu bzang po'i sangs rgyas su ma gyur pa med pa yi/ thams cad du khyab brdal ba'i 'khor tshogs thams cad la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas
pa med pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ chos thams cad gnyis su med cing tha mi dad pas/ thams cad du so so ma yin pa tha mi dad pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po'i sangs rgyas su gyur pas/
nyid la nyid gsung du med pa'i bka' 'dus par gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med cing brjod pa las 'das pa/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni chos nyid ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin du
'dus so// chos thams cad bsam du med cing bsam pa las 'das pas/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen por 'dus so// chos thams cad ni ji lta bur 'gyur ba med cing
'pho 'gyur las 'das pas/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni yid rang byung gi ye shes btsal ba med par 'dus so// des na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang spros pa med pa'i thig

le mi 'gyur ba'i g.yung drung du 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru kas nyid la/ ched du brjod pa/ de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin ni/ ji ltar mtshan ma'i dngos po thams
cad la// ye nas 'di 'dra zhes bya ba grub cing rtag pa med pa las chos thams cad chos nyid du sangs rgyas pas/ de stong zhing chad pa'i mtha' ma yin la/ go zhing rtogs pa'i shes rab nang nas rtogs
pas/ thams cad chos nyid bde ba chen po'i klong du sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin pas/ skye 'gro ming dang gzugs kyi bsdus pa thams cad ye nas phyogs dang/ ris dang/ gzugs dang/ kha dog tu grub cing

brtag pa gang yang med pas/ thams cad ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas shing/ tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa'i rigs pa rang dbang du gyur pas/ chos thams cad chos kyi sku 'pho 'gyur med pa'i rang
bzhin yin pa dang/ de ltar phyi nang snod bcud du grags shing/ bstan pa thams cad ye nas gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems yin la/ sems dang sems kyi rnam pa yang ye nas kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin

du sangs rgyas pa de la/ ye sus kyang ma byas/ ye sus kyang ma bcos/ don gyi nges pa phyin ci log tu cis kyang mi 'gyur ba'i nam mkha'i rnam pa bzhin du ye nas gnas pa de/ sangs rgyas zhes bya'i rang bzhin
yin par gsungs so// de las sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni// dper na nam mkha' la blun pos bgo bsha' byed pa dang 'dra ste/ gnas skabs la lar sems kyi mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin na/ sangs rgyas kyi

mtshan yang so sor snang ngo// gnas skabs la lar sems kyi mtshan nyid tha dad med na/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la yang tha dad med par bstan no// de'i phyir na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bur 'dul ba'i

don las mtshan du btags so// sangs rgyas kyi sku yi cha lugs dang/ yab dang yum dang/ btsun mo dang/ sras dang/ zhing khams dang/ pho brang dang/ 'khor dang/ gnas dang/ ris su bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas
la sku yi cha lugs dang yul la sogs pa ris su phye ba med kyang/ sems can la sde tshan dang/ yul dang/ gnas su 'dzin pa dang/ de 'dul ba'i thabs su bsten pa la sems kyi rnam pa phye ba med na/ sangs

rgyas la yang ris su phye ba med do// sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad mi mnga' bar bstan pa yang/ sangs rgyas dang sems can la tshe yi tshad dam// skye 'chi dang// 'pho 'gyur med do// log par 'dzin pa'i sems
'pho 'gyur dang/ le lo dang/ yeng bar 'dzin pa la bstan pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs phyag rgya chen po dkyil 'khor dang/ grangs dang rnam pa 'byung ba mang po sems kyi rang

bzhin las byung ba dang/ 'byung ba las gyur pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rdul snyed 'dzin pa'i bag chags mtshan ma dang bcas pa de/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par yod ces pa la/

sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba las gzhan ma yin no// de'i phyir na sems la mu med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma yang mu med par bstan/ yul gyi rnam pa rdul

dang rdul phran 'dzin pa la/ sangs rgyas kyang rdul gcig gi steng na rdul snyed la sogs par bstan no// tshig dang yi ge 'dzin cing brir yod na/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang tshig dang yi ger brir yod par bstan/

tshig dang yi ger brir med na/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung yang tshig dang yi ger gdags su med par bstan no// de lta bu rdul snyed cig gi steng du rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sprul pa'i sku 'bum dang/ khri
dang/ stong du 'dus/ de yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rim par 'dus/ de yang rigs lngar 'dus/ de'ang sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas su 'dus/ nam mkha'i gang nas gar khyab pa thams cad du lus sems
gnyis su 'dus so// de stong gsum du 'dus de khams gsum du 'dus/ de yang dus gsum du 'dus so// de yang lus ngag yid gsum du 'dus so// de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems su 'dus ste/ byang chub kyi

sems su mu mtha' dang bral ba'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don ni/ rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid la rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dzin pa'i phyir/ gnas skabs la lar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sems can thams

cad dang 'thun par spyod pa yang yod/ gnas skabs la lar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang ting 'dzin du mdzad pa yang yod/ de dag na sems kyi mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin pa'i don yin la/
yang dag par kun tu bzang por byang chub sems kyi mdzad pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad sku ci mdzad pa ni/ chos kyi sku dus gsum du 'pho 'gyur med par mdzad/ gsung ci mdzad pa ma bcos pa nyid du

mdzad/ thugs ci mdzad pa ma bslad pa'i ye shes su mdzad/ de yang thams cad byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du sangs rgyas par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de yin te/ sems
can ye nas sangs rgyas par mdzad/ 'khor ba ye nas mya ngan las 'das par mdzad/ sdug bsngal byang chub kyi sems bla na med par mdzad/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag pa'i lam du mdzad pa de yang
'phral du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bcos pa ma yin te/ nyi ma'i snying po la mun pa ngang gis mi gnas pa dang 'dra bar/ kun tu bzang po ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin la/ 'khor ba btsal bas kyang mi

rnyed do// rtsi ma ki ta'i sman gyis thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can la dug btsal yang mi rnyed do// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin du mkhyen pa'i klong la/ sems kyi byin rlabs las

ma gtogs pa/ ngan song sdug bsngal btsal yang mi rnyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa'o// de la ye nas grub zin pa ni/ lhun gyis grub pa'i chos bshad du med pa la/ ye nas grub zin pas

btsal du med de/ de la yang sems kyi chos thams cad phyi yang ma yin/ nang yang ma yin/ phyi nang gnyis ka yang ma yin/ rgyu yang ma yin/ yod med gnyis ka ma yin pa de dag la sogs pa thams cad ni/ yin
pa thams cad yin no// chos thams cad kyang yin no// chos thams cad dngos po dang mtshan ma'i rdzas su dngos po gang yang ma grub cing/ dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pas gang yang ma yin pa dang/ gang yang

ma yin pa de yang stong pa nyid gting chad pa ci yang med pa ma yin te/ yon tan gyi btsal gyi dgongs pa'i don rang bzhin du 'byung la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi byin rlabs kyis ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du snang ba de ni/

gang yang ma yin pa yang ma yin la/ gnyis ka yin pa yang ma yin no// des ni ris su 'dzin pa dogs pa'i phyir gnyis ma yin zhes bya ste/ de la gnyis ka ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ chos nyid la ris dang/ byang chub

la phyogs su 'dzin par dogs pa'i phyir gnyis zhes bya ste/ rgyu dang 'bras bu med de/ gdod ma nas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin las 'gyur ba med do// gnyis ka yang ma yin zhes bya ste/ rtag pa dang/ dngos po
dang/ yod par 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad ni grub cing rtag pa med de/ 'pho zhing 'gyur ba'o// chos thams cad ye nas rang bzhin med par byang chub kyang sems bde ba chen por grub la/ dus gsum du 'gyur
ba med par shes pa ni/ chos sku 'gyur ba med pa de ni gnyis ka yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o// gnyis ka ma yin pa sangs rgyas pa'i don bsdus pas/ ye shes grub zin pa zhes bya'o// de la btsal mi dgos pa'i
'bras bu ni/ dper na 'jig rten na klu'i rgyal po'i nor bu la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu btsal mi dgos par 'gyur ba'ang yod/ de ni bsod nams bsags pa las 'byung pa yin pas/ de rtag cing 'gyur ba med la/

'di ni de lta ba'i dgongs pa can ma yin te/ 'di btsal mi dgos pa ni/ dper na gangs ri'i klong na nag po btsal yang mi rnyed la/ dkar po btsal yang mi dgos pa bzhin du/ rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid la
chos rnams ji lta bu yang btsal du med la/ kun tu bzang po'i sems kyi rang bzhin la/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'bras bu btsal mi dgos te/ btsal yang tshi chad pa'i nad du 'gyur/ sems nyid ye

nas sangs rgyas pa med na/ btsal yang grub par mi 'gyur te mching bu ji ltar byi dor byas gyur kyang nor bu rin po cher mi 'gyur la/ sol ba la byi dor byas kyang dkar por mi 'gyur ba bzhin/ ye nas sems
nyid sangs rgyas pa ni/ dper na gser dang 'dra ste btsal mi dgos/ btsal yang 'gal ba med de/ sems dang/ chos dang/ nam mkha' ji lta bu'i rang bzhin du ma grub cing/ 'di 'dra zhes pa phyogs su btsal
yang mi rnyed pa/ sems kyi chos nyid btsal mi dgos par byang chub kyi sems kyi 'bras bu rang byung gi ye shes shar ba yin no// chos thams cad rang bzhin gnyis su med par gnas pa'i don shes pas/ btsal

mi dgos pa'i 'bras bu yin/ de yang rang gi byang chub kyi sems su nga dang/ bdag dang/ phyogs dang ris mes par yongs la khyab/ bzang ngan dang spong len med par lhun gyis grub/ de'i don la mi 'pho/ mi
'gyur/ mi dmigs par bde brdal bas/ btsal mi dgos pa'i 'bras bu yin/ kun tu bzang po'i bka' bden nges pa 'di rtog pa the tshom med par yid ches pa chos nyid kyi klong yin/ de yi don la ma yengs pa
bsgom pa'i don yin/ de la btsal mi dgos par 'bras bu rang la 'char ro// sems nyid chos nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pas/ bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu btsal mi dgos par/ byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu rang

la 'char ro// dper na dus dang nam zla la ring thung med pas/ mi bde zhing sdug bsngal ba la ring bar snang la/ bde zhing skyid pa la thung bar snang ngo// de bzhin du thams cad chos nyid du shes na 'gyur ba med

do// phyi ci log tu shes na sdug bsngal la grangs dang tshad med do// sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig la bltas pas smin pa ni/ nyin mtshan gyi yun la yang bskal pa tsam du nyams su myong ngo// sangs rgyas kyis bskal pa
