dang mtshan la yang dbyer med par mkhyen tau// de yang rang gi byang chub kyi sems yin/ bskal pa dang yud tsam pas/ dus gsum thog ma dang tha ma yang med pas/ ye nas kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po'i don

la 'gyur ba med pa'o// de bzhin du dngos po stong pa la rang bzhin snang ba'i chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems yin par shes/ btsal mi dgos pa'i 'bras bu yin no// de la sangs rgyas kyi sku yi rnam pa 'dus
pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku zhes bya ba gzhan ma yin te/ mtha' dang/ dbus dang/ phyogs dang/ ris su phye ba'i chos thams cad/ gzugs dang rdzas su 'dzin na sku yod de/ ji ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad
gzugs dang rdzas su grub pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yang gzugs dang rdzas su grub pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dper na lus yod na grib ma snang ba bzhin/ rdzas su yod par 'dzin na de

'dul ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi sku yang snang ste/ ji ltar snang ba thams cad la mtha' thug pa med cing 'byam klas te/ 'gyur ba med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku'o// de lta bu la yang yul gyi rnam pa kun la sogs pa

gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdul gyi bye brag gi grangs las 'das pa yod par 'dzin pa'i don du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams bgrang ba las 'das pa bstan pa/ sku la tshe tshad kyang med par rang byung

ba'i sangs rgyas rdzogs pa las 'das pa'i zhing brjod du med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o// de lta bu'i zhing khams 'gro ba tha dad par/ las dang sdug bsngal mi 'dra ba mang po phyogs bzhi

mtshams brgyad steng 'og yan man phan tshun gnas pa la ni ji ltar 'dus pa ltar snang zhing don mdzad pa ltar snang ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku'o// nam mkha' la mtha' thug med pa 'byung ba bzhi dang/ skye

'gro thams cad kyi gzhi'i/ de bzhin du thams cad du khyab brdal ba chos kyi sku ste/ sku gnyis 'byung ba'i rtsa ba'o// rgyu 'bras kyi chos 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' dang

lha'i dkyil 'khaur du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o// de snod du gyur pa ni yul sems dngos por 'dzin pa 'gro ba rigs drug go/ de ji ltar 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa sprul pa'i sku'o// de las mtshan ma tha dad pa

ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang/ sangs rgyas sku gsum du 'dus so// sku gsum yang chos kyi skur 'dus so// chos kyi sku yang ye nas skye shi dang 'pho 'gyur med pa'i byang chub kyi sems su 'dus

so// byang chub kyi sems kyang yid rang byung gi ye shes btsal du med par 'dus so// de'i don yang rgyud 'dir 'dus so// de yang bya btsal med pa'i skur blta'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rnam pa 'dus pa

ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung ji ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad tshig dang yi ger ma 'dus pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gcig la gsung yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang tshig dang yi ger 'dus la/ yi ge

yang yig 'bru bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su 'dus pa dang/ de yang dbyangs yig bcu drug tu 'dus/ de yang yi ge dpa' bo 'bru lngar 'dus de yang yi ge 'bru gsum du 'dus/ de yang yi ge hUM du 'dus/ hUM yang rang gi
byang chub kyi sems su 'dus so// sangs rgyas kyi gsung yang yi ge med par 'dus so// de'i don yang brjod du med pa'i gsung du 'dus so// de'i don yang gsung mi mnga' bar la bzlo'o// de yang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi thugs 'dus pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni sems can gyi yid yin pas/ sems can gyi yid ni ye nas rig pa'i rgyal po yin pas/ dag pa'i zhing la sangs rgyas dang sems

can du 'dod pa nor te/ dper na sman thams cad 'dus pa'i ro dang/ sman tsan dan rda ri'i ro dang mthun pa la khyad med do// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi thugs sems can gyi sems kyi chos nyid la khyad med

do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ye nas gnyis su med pa/ rang gi byang chub kyi sems su lhun gyis grub zin pa'o// de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sku gsung thugs su 'dus/ de yang lus ngag yid gsum

nyid ye nas btsal mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa yin/ de yang thams cad du rang gi byang chub kyi sems las gzhan ma yin/ gzhan dngos po dang rtog pa ci snang yang/ de nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes su rol pa ni/

dper na klu yi rgyal po dug can sa yi 'og rgya mtsho nas du ma yod pa'i dus na/ dug gi kha rlangs yod pa'i sa stengs su dug sna tshogs skye'o// de rnams rma byas mthong nas zas dang/ sman dang/ rtsir shes nas zos
pas/ kha dog gsal nas med do// dri mas kyang dug sel lo// de bzhin du gzung 'dzin rtog tu spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ dngos po chos thams cad rang gi byang chub kyi sems su rtogs pas/ de nyid bde ba

chen po'i byang chub las gzhan ma yin par rtogs pas/ slar byang chub kyi bskul ma ye shes chen po'i mdzad spyod du rol pas/ dngos po'i chos su btsal yang mi rnyed/ sdug bsngal ming yang med par shes pas/

sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dag pa yin/ thugs yang dag pa ni thams cad du ji ltar 'dod par sangs rgyas par spyod pa ni/ dper na rgya mtsho'i nang na klu yi rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che dang// nor bu mang po byin

rlabs so// so na yod pa de'i thad ka'i steng na/ gser gyi bye ma dang/ rin po che'i rdo rje dang/ rgyan rin po che sil skye'o// de bzhin du rang gi rig pa byang chub kyi sems ye nas grub zin pa'i don 'don/ las ma

yengs na/ de ltar ma rtogs pa'i yan man dang khor yug tu yang byang chub sems rtog pa'i don 'char ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyi ma dang mun pa bzhin no// de lta bas na rang gi byang chub kyi sems la mtha' dang/
dbus dang/ phyogs dang/ ris med cing/ cir yang mi rtog cis kyang mi 'gyur ba ni/ dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra'o// byang chub kyi sems ye nas sangs rgyas pa la btsal dgos pa na dper na gser dang

'dra'o// byang chub kyi sems don ma nor bar 'di ltar shes na ci 'dod par dbang bsgyur ba ni/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs 'dus
pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po// skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur med pa'i klong du ye nas yid ches pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs don de la yid ches pas/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i thugs de la skye

shi dang 'pho 'gyur med par shes pas/ thugs byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba 'dir 'dus pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ji ltar yin pa'i don thog tu phab ste/ nges

par yin par thag bcad pa la lta ba zhes bya'o// sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang mi snang zhing// cir yang mi 'gyur bar bcas pa la lta ba zhes bya'o// sems kyi rang bzhin la bzang ngan dang/ che chung dang/ rgyu

'bras dang/ gtsang sme med cing/ mtha' dbus dang phyogs ris med par bcad pa lta ba zhes bya'o// sems kyi rang bzhin la ye thog ma dang tha ma med cing/ kun nas zlum pa'i thig le chen po'i klong du bcad pa
lta ba zhes bya'o// dper na nam mkha' mtshan mar 'dzin pa bzhin/ sems gzung 'dzin du rtogs pa cis kyang mi 'gyur ba'o// nam mkha' cis kyang mi zin pa bzhin/ sems la skyon gyi sdug bsngal cis kyang mi
zin pa dang/ mi 'gyur ba dang/ mi 'pho ba dang/ rang bzhin dang/ phyogs ris med par bcad pa la lta ba'o// sems dang/ chos dang/ nam mkha' chos thams cad gnyis su med par lta ba'i don du 'dus

so// sems dang nam mkha' dang yang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po lta ba'o// de ni nam mkha' ltar yangs pas mi 'gyur ba'o// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig dang spyod pa 'dus pa ni/ dam pa

sangs rgyas yin pa la/ de yi zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig yin pas sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig las 'du byed dang nyon mongs pa rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ dam tshig 'bum ste las stong rtsa

brgyad du 'dus so// de nyon mongs pa'i nang mthun pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa'i phyir/ dam tshig gi rtsa ba brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dus so// de bsdus pas lta ba la mu med pa'i phyir dam tshig la mu med do// 'du

byed dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir shes na/ dam tshig kyang bsrung du med/ rang gi sems nyid du ma rtogs na gol ba'i nyen che bas/ 'og tu dam tshig 'dus so// zhes gsus so// ma rtogs pa gol pa'i g.yeng

ba 'bum yod pas/ dam tshig la mu med pa sa ya 'bum sder 'dus so// 'du byed dang nyon mongs pa'i rtsa stong rtsa bdud du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ dam tshig 'bum sde lam stong rtsa brgyad du 'dus so// de nyon mongs

pa'i nang mthun pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa'i phyir na/ dam tshig rtsa ba brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dus so// de bsdus pa'i lta log gsum brgya drug cu yod pa'i phyir/ dam tshig sum brgya drug cur 'dus so// de rtsa

ba brgya rtsa brgyad du 'dus so// de yang dug gsum/ dug lnga dang/ rtog pa lnga dang/ phung po lnga dang/ rtsol ba lngar 'dus pas nyi shu rtsa lngar 'dus so// de yang bco lnga las skyed du med pa'i phyir/
dam tshig bco lngar 'dus so// de thams cad kyi rtsa ba lus ngag yid gsum du 'dus pas rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum du 'dus so// de yang yid du 'dus pas gsang ba'i dam tshig 'da' ba med par gsungs
so// de la 'da' ba med pa yin no// thams cad du rang gi sems las gzhan du phyogs ris dang 'dus so// de las 'da' ba med pa zhes bya ba ni/ thams cad chos nyid las chos can du 'da' ba med pa yin
no// thams cad du rang gi sems las gzhan du phyogs ris dang 'da' ba med pa yin/ ye nas kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po las/ sangs rgyas dang sems can du 'da' dbang med pa yin no// de yi dam tshig
las 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// dus thams cad du chos nyid byang chub sems las ma 'das na/ dngos po'i chos nang gi ngan 'dzoms shing rdul du rlog pas/ de las 'das na grub pa thob pa'i lha yang

brlag par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// de bsdus pas bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig ces bya ste/ de la bsrung du med pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun tu bzang po byang chub sems las ma rtogs pa/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las

'das pa lta ci smos kyi/ 'dzin rtog ni rdul tsam yang med par 'gyur bas/ thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i klong ngo// de la 'phrin las bya btsal med par 'dus pa ni/ bya btsal med ces bya ba ni/ ye nas grub

pa la bya zhing btsal mi dgos pa ste/ dpe gser dang 'dra ste/ rig pa byang chub kyi sems kyi chos nyid/ ye nas kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po men na/ de btsal bas mi 'grub ste/ des na bde ba chen po kun tu

bzang po yin no// btsal yang sangs rgyas la/ ma btsal yang sangs rgyas pas dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser dang 'dra pas/ 'phrin las bya btsal med pa zhes bya ste/ lto 'grangs na kha zas kyi gtam yi gar mi

'ong ba bzhin dang 'dra bar rtsol skyon du gyur pas 'phrin las bya btsal med pa yin no// de ltar 'phrin las bya btsal med pas spong len med par 'dzin pa ni thams cad kun tu bzang po la/ bzang ngan dang che

chung yod med rtag chad dam phyi nang gi rnam pa btsal bas mi rnyed pa ngang gis shes/ 'phrin las bya btsal med pa spong len med pa'o// 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin par rig pa nang nas shar/ nyon
mongs pa rang sdug bsngal thar pa chen po'i lam du ting nge 'dzin gyis longs spyod mdzad/ phyin ci log tu bde ba chen po mi 'gyur ba'i gter btsugs pas/ dngos po thams cad bskal pa'i me bzhin bsregs
pas/ sgrib pa thams cad thal tshor rlung gi gtor/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad bar snang gi na bun bzhin sangs rgyas pas/ sems kyi rang bzhin ci yang ma yin pa'i dbyings la brdal/ ye

shes kyi rang bzhin rig pa spyi khyab tu shar/ gnyis su med pa'i don mtha' dbus phyogs ris med par klong du gyur pas/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas chos kyi sku 'gyur ba med pa'i rnal du/ sku gsum lhun gyis
grub pas mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan/ mi 'gyur ba'i gter bcug pas/ sangs rgyas dang sems can mnyam pa chen po'i klong du 'da' ba med par dam bcas/ ji ltar snang ba kun tu bzang po'i mdzad spyod dang
'phrin las su dus dang rkyen med par mnga' thang skyes/ sdug bsngal dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad ye nas mthar phyin pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyi 'phrin las/ ma nor ba 'gyur ba med pas

dgyes/ yab kun tu bzang po thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi sras su gyur pas/ thugs mya ngan chos nyid du sangs/ dngos po ma skyes pa'i chos nyid du sems mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gsal ba'i rig pa

rang byung gi ye shes btsal mi dgos pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas pas/ ngan song dang 'khor ba chos btsal yang mi rnyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma nor ba ma yin no// de la gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa ste/

chos nyid spyod pa gang yin pa rang gi sems yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dper na sngon po gang yin pa baiDUr+Ya la/ baiDUr+Ya gang yin pa kha dog sngon por snang ba dang 'dra bar/ chos nyid gang yin pa rang bzhin med
pa'i byang chub sems yin pas/ rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa byang chub kyi sems kyi chos nyid yin pa yang 'phral du byas shing btsal ba ma yin/ des na de ltar gnyis su med cing bcos ma ma yin/ sems
nyid spyod pa yin pa dang ji ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad mtha' la mi gnas pa/ dbus la mi dmigs te/ dus gsum du 'dus ma byas par sangs rgyas pa de la/ gnyis su med pa bde ba chen por longs spyod

pa yin pas/ rgyu 'bras dang phyi nang gi chos la ji ltar yod kyang rtag cing dngos su 'dzin pa med la/ med cing chad par stong zhing grol ba med pas/ sems kyi chos nyid ci la yang 'ching grol med par longs spyod

pa/ thams cad sems nyid chos nyid kyi spyod pa yin pa de ni/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yongs su chos skyong ba dang/ 'dam rdzab dang/ ngan skyugs dang/ khyi lud kyi nang na 'dug pa dang/ rin po

che'i khang pa na 'dug pa la/ bsod nams dang/ longs spyod dang/ 'dul ba'i zhing la khyad med de/ slar 'di 'dam rdzab dang ngan skyugs kyi nang na 'dug pa/ rin po che'i khang pa na 'dugs pas kyang longs spyod

rgyas shing che bar snang ste/ rgyal po'i rgyu dang gsog ma yin/ rgyal po gang la yang ma chags pa'i sbyin pa yin pa dang 'dra bar/ rang gi byang chub sems ni ngan song gi 'khor ba'i chos dang/ rnam par

byang ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i la ji ltar spyad kyang/ de la che chung dang phyogs ris su phye ba med de/ slar 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i rtsa ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsan/ kun tu bzang po btsal
ba med pa/ rang byung gi bcom ldan 'das su ye nas 'ub kyi chub par longs spyod pa de/ de 'phral du yid kyis smon te/ sems kyi mos pa dang bcos pa ma yin/ de ni ye nas rang gis sems ye nas rang bzhin

med pa'i chos nyid du longs spyod pa la/ ye shes chen po'i chos su ye shes chen po'i spyan gyis mi gzigs shing/ phyogs ris dang bzang ngan du kun tu bzang pos kyang mi rnyed/ skye 'chi dang 'pho 'gyur du phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mkhyen sems kyi spyod pa lta ba nam mkha' 'dra ba la/ sems kyi dam tshig 'da' ba med pa yin/ brtan pas gzhi 'dra bas/ sems kyi spyod pa gnyis su med par longs spyod pa chu

klung chen po bzhin du/ dus dang nyin mtshan du 'gyur ldog med par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod ma nor ba'o// chos nyid byang chub sems la bzang ngan med pas/ gtsang sme byang chub sems la med pa/

bzang ngan med par spyod pa dang/ chos nyid byang chub sems la phyogs ris med pas/ spong len med par sgrol ba la sogs pa yang/ byang chub sems kyi spyod pa spyad pa'i ngo bo med pa yin no// de la spyad pa'i ngo

bo med pa ni/ thams cad sems kyi ngo bo la 'di 'dra zhes bya bar grub pa med pas ji ltar spyod kyang spyod pa'i ngo bo med pa yin no// de ni dper na nam mkha' la 'dus byas kyi chos ji ltar spyod kyang spyod pa'i ngo

bo med de/ de'i skyon gyis gos pa med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems kyi spyod pa ni/ rgya mtsho dngas pa'i nang na nyi zla gza' skar gyi gzugs brnyan ji ltar spyod kyang de la dngos po dang mtshan ma med de/ chos

nyid rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i don zab mo thugs su chud pa yang de bzhin no// de la ma nor ba zhes pa ni/ ye nas yin nges pa'i don 'di ma bcos par shes pas na ma nor ba'o// thams cad la byang chub kyi sems

kyi spyod pa yin par ma shes na/ rgyu 'bras kyi rtsol bas sangs rgyas kyi rtsol bar rtsol spyad kyang slar 'khor ba'i rgyu tshi chad pa'i sdug bsngal yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems kyi don ye nas yin par mi shes

pas/ rmongs pa nam mkha' snyeg pa dang 'dra ba yin no// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin nas rin po che man shel bzhin du rnam par dag pa de bzhin du/ gdos pa can ma yin pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings
ltar spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de yang ye nas de ltar yangs shing rgya chad pa yang ma yin par// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gsal la mi bsgrib par rang byung

ba'o// de yang 'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos can lta bu ma yin te/ blta ru ni yod/ gzung du med/ snang ni snang/ dngos por ni ma grub ste/ gzha' tshon chu zla lta bu'i dpe mtshon/ yid ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'dod pa
bzhin 'byung ba nor bu dang 'dra bar/ don bstan pas ye nas rang bzhin med pa kun gzhi'i sems kyi rgyud thams cad la gnyis su med pa'i sems kyi longs spyod/ 'dod pa thams cad ma btsal bar lhun gyis
grub pa/ sems kyi 'bras bu las rang 'char ba yin pas/ de'i phyir sems kyi chos nyid byang chub sems rtogs na/ rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ye shes rol pa'i 'phrin las sna tshogs su zad pa med par

'char pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud 'dis thos pa dang chos thams cad ji lta ba'i rnam par yang dag gis ma shes snyam du sems na/ rgyud 'di thos pa'i drin yin par
rig par bya'o// de nas yang 'di snyam du/ sangs rgyas thams cad thugs ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang du gcig pa la/ phyogs dang ris med pa drod yin pa rigs par bya'o// de nas don de la dngos po cir

snang yang rang bzhin med par yid ches/ dus dang rgyun ji ltar 'gyur yang thog ma nas mtha' ma g.yos pa'i klong du chos nyid la 'thil du phebs pa'i drod yin par rig par bya'o// de ltar rnal du phebs pa
dang/ thams cad kyi rnam pa 'di la yod ces pas sems med ce 'am/ rtog ce 'am/ mi rtog ces pa'i rnam pa ci yang med par thams cad du mi g.yo ba'i ngang las/ mi 'gyur ba'i rig pas zin pas/ 'jig rten

ming yang med pa'i bde ba chen por gyur pas/ yod med rtag chad kyi chos las 'das te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge 'gyur ba snyam byed pa ni/ sems las su rung pa'i drod yin par rig par bya'o// de lta bu'i
don las ma yengs pa de las/ bdag gi rnam par rtog pa 'phrul gyi me long la gsal ba ltar/ rtag pa ming yang med/ gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa mtshon gyis mi 'jom pa ltar cis kyang mi 'gyur/ mi g.yo ba'i

klong du gyur pa ni/ sems las su rung ba'i don la drod rtags kyi blo phebs pa yin no// de ltar drod rtags kyi phebs pa'i kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas la ni/ sangs rgyas dang sems can dbyer med par lta ci

smos kyis/ tshig dang yi ge med pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ dngos po dang/ gzung 'dzin dang/ rnam par rtog pas thams cad sems kyi chos nyid du ye nas sangs rgyas pas/ de nyid byang chub kyi sems bde ba
chen po mi 'gyur ba'i g.yung drung du dus dang gnas skabs med par sangs rgyas pas/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba don las btags so// zhes ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa sbyi dril gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ b+ha ra ha'i brag phug tu bal yul gyi rgyal po nor 'dzin
zhabs dang/ rdo rje yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o/ sa ma ya kha thaM//// rgya gar skad du/ ta thA ga tA sarba ma hri da ti tan+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i

rang bzhin/ yongs su bkod pa'i snying po/ mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong rgya yaungs su ma chad pa/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ rdo rje snying po drags pa 'joms pa nyid/ dus gsum

gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ rigs lnga'i khro bo rnams dang/ dregs pa can lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis bskor te thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi rang bzhin/ chos nyid mnyam pa nyid ci yi ngo bor yang ma grub pa kun la khyab par gnas pa de la/ 'khor rnams sems 'phros par gzigs nas/ ma skyes ye nas gnyis su med// rgyu dang rkyen med rang byung
ba// de las kun 'byung thams cad yin// stong pa nyid las g.yos pa med// ces gsungs pas/ de nas rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// lhun gyis
grub pa'i ye shes khyod// 'khor gyi dregs pa dbang sdus shig/ ces gsol ba/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa la bzhugs nas/ 'byung ba lnga ni ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i

gzhal yas khang// mtha' dbus med par rim pa'i tshul du gnas// 'byung ba nam mkha'i chos nyid spros bral gur// 'byung ba me nyid ye shes rang gsal gur// 'byung ba chu nyid rnam rtog dag byed chu// 'byung ba
sa nyid kun gzhi ye nas dag/ sems nyid rmad du byung ba stobs dang ldan// rab tu khros pa'i tshul 'chang bas// 'jig rten khams rnams khro bos gang bar mdzod// 'jig rten khams rnams rab
tu g.yos// ldeg go rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem mo// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs la khad do// 'khor rnams thams cad 'gyel te dbang po nyams so// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyi bde gshegs spyi dril bas/ stobs kyi stobs khyad par du gyur pas srog gi dngas ma rnams gsal bar mdzad de/ de ma thag tu 'khor rnams dran pa rnyed nas/ rang gis srog gi snying po
mdongs gsol du phul lo// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad thugs gcig tu bsdus nas nus pa'i mthu dang ldan zhing// thams cad gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi
dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// gsang bdag rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sku 'khor gyi dregs pa
dbang bsdus nas// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dbang dang ni// dam tshig sngar rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// rdo rje 'chang gis nges gsungs pa// drag po sngags rgod sbyor ba la// bsnyen bsgrub byed
rtsol mthar ma lhung// re dogs bred pa'i g.yang sa med// bzlas pa tsam gyis rtsal shugs 'byin// dran pa tsam gyi kha 'ching mchog/ snang srid dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// ma bskur bskur med ye nas

brtson// skyes bu rig pa'i rtsal ldan pa// dbang mchog chen po ye nas gnas// dam tshig chos rnams kun gyi gzhi// ngo bo chos sku byang chub sems// chos rnams stong pa'i ngang la rdzogs// stong nyid snying rje'i ngo bo
can// dam tshig chen po de nyid bsrung/ 'phrin las rim pa ma 'gags pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i byin rlabs stobs// ma lus 'dus pa rdo rje'i bka'// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu'i rgyud/ lta spyod dkyil
'khor dam tshig dbang// las rim bsgrub dang gsang sngags dang// ngo bo 'brel bcas rgyu dang rkyen// rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa// gsang sngags rgyud kyi nges pa bshad// bde bar gshegs pa'i
dgongs rgyud las// dam tshig dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin 'dus// thugs rje lam la
bsgrub pa la// bsgrub pa'i ting 'dzin bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang gis nges gsungs pa// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sku bskyed la// stong pa'i ngang las rol pa'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug zhags bzhir
bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// mthing nag sku la me 'od 'bar// glang chen stag dang sprul gyis brgyan// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs ag tshom 'phyir// rigs lnga'i khro bos dbu la

brgyan// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// spyi gtsug mkha' lding rgyal po la// rdo rje sder gshog brgyang ba'o// mgrin par rta mchog ra ga'i mdog/ thod dbyug rta mgo

'phrin las zhal// thugs khar badzra he ru ka/ lte ba phyag na rdo rje la// gsang bar rdo rje gzhon nu'o// ro langs khro mos g.yon nas 'khril// phrag gong khyung dang 'ug pa gnyis// dpung khar stag dang

seng ge la// dred mo mthing skya mchan khung du// lta zur sbrul nag me 'bar gnyis// mdun du ya ma rA dza ste// sku stod khro bo chen po la// sku smad phur pa'i cha byad de// mgur gyi bum pa man chad nas// zhabs kyi
gong bu yan chad du// me rlung khro chung 'khor lo bsnams// de yi lus la gtams par bsgom// thams cad 'dus pa'i ting 'dzin des// lam sa de la gnas pa na// sgrib sbyong bde ba lta bur 'gyur// de nas
bsgrub pa'i sngags gsungs pa// rig sngags las su 'khyer ba la// ri mig bcu gcig rim pa bcu// 'khrul 'khor khro rgyal 'dus pa nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi thog go/ bde gshegs phyir dril gsang

sngags la// rnal dang bzlog dang dkrugs dang dal// gsang sngags rgyal po gsang ba gsungs/ e yaM raM baM laM/ a i u e o// ri li aM/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ ya wa ra la/ a kro te ka ya man+ta ka/ kri sna ka la ru pa/

hri sti ya ma ye/ du ru ye// bya tsa ye/ sing ha ye// hri badzra kro d+ha/ ha ya g+h+ri ba/ pad+ma ta kri/ ra ga tsaN+Da/ badzra pA Ni/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na/ ka li kri ta/ ya ma ra dza hri kri ra ya/ badzra ki li ki li ya/ hUM pa ra bi tan tig sna

dza la u ne u ne hUM dza dza/ rgyun du bgrangs pas las rnams 'grub// dus gsum rgyal ba'i snying po ste// mi 'gyur rtsa ba brgya dang bcu// bzlas pa tsam gyis dngos grub 'byung// de nas gsang bdag chen pos

zhus// 'phreng ba sngags kyi ngo bo dang/ bzlog dang dkrug dang dral ba rnams// dgos ched dpa' bos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi ngo bo bshad pa/ gsang sngags don gyi ngo bo

ni// skyob pa'i don gyi gsang sngags bshad// rang bzhin stong pa spros dang bral// skye ba med pa'i ye shes min// rnam pa yi ge'i gzugs brnyan te// ngo bo lha yi sku ru 'dus// lha dang yig 'bru gnyis med

de// dus gsum rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rnams// sngags dang 'khor los gsal bar 'gyur// de ni rnal ma'i bsnyen pa yin// bzlog dang dkrug dang bral ba rnams// kun gyi thun mong ma yin te// lnga brgya tha ma'i

las su gsungs// de nas sngags kyi grong khyer dkrug pa 'di gsungs so// e ra ra kra ye/ hri ta d+ha ya ling/ sna yaM li la sna/ du badzra khrid mA ma ki dza raM aM aM/ ka ru kro ra ha ra la la/ baM ka kro la ye/ ta ka ro tsa

ya/ u laM kha te ru/ bya ha tsa na shi hra hUM na/ a ga ka pa tsa ya/ d+ha na kri pa u i g+ha ya/ hri ye gri badzra ka ra ra ne u/ nga mang ti sing bal yi ya bi hUM/ e ya ta ya nga sad ni kri badzra stan dza/ oM wa ka ma ye/ ma tsan ta ki
tig dza/ a mu ka ma ra ya rbad/ drag sngags dran pas 'khor rnams khrag skyug cing// dgra bgegs srog rtsa mngon du khyer nas 'ong// lnga brgya tha ma'i dus su ni// las 'gyangs log na bya ba

las// lha srin srog 'phrog cho nges 'don// mangs na 'khor gyi dregs pa brgyad// ya bag sha yi las yin no// gral ba kha 'ching dkrug pa'i drag sngags ni// e yaM raM baM yaM/ a i u e o wa ya/ nga g+ha ga kha ka

aM/ li ra ra la/ a kro te ka ya man+ta ka/ ma ya ti hri pa ru la ka sna kri/ ye du ru ye bya tsa ye seng ga ye ma pad pa gri ya ha d+ha kro badzra hi/ ta krid ra ga tsaN Da badzra pA Ni/ tsan tra kri li ka/ na sha ro ha ma d+ha/ ya ma ra

dza hri kri ra ya badzra ki tig tan pi ra pa hUM ya la ki la sna/ dzra la u ne hUM hUM dza dza/ dkrug pa rtsibs kyis 'phreng ba nyid/ kha 'ching mchog tu dpa' bos gsungs/ khri las mang na lho phyogs kyi// gshin rje nyid kyang
khrag tu skyug/ gral ba sngags kyi ar gtad yin// sngags pas bdag dang bsreg dang bcing// dkrug pa 'di yis nges par 'grub// sngags pa nag po dgrar longs so// rtags 'gyangs las 'gor bya ba las/

kha 'ching mchog tu dpa' bos gsungs// bzlog pa ye shes spongs pa ste// thun mong ma yin 'gyungs na bya// slad kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi dregs pa rnams kyis srog

rang dbang med par phul ba/ ai ka he ki g+ha ma he ka/ tsa tur thar kang/ b+his sa ma dza ra kus ma dza ni dzis sad ka ru hUM phaT/ ya ma he sa sarba du ya tsit+ta sarba du sta/ byad bstebs spum khas srog rtsa tur thums/

dun he b+h+yo dun ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo u ne u ne u ne che ge mo'i rigs bzlog ma ra ya phaT/ e ha sa ma ya dza ra ma dza dza ti ka e su nan/ dag dza dza/ ti dzA tA ya ka sha rbad tshal bu dan d+he ma ma snying sto ma hu ra dza dza/ sho ma ma

ra ya rbad pa/ tsis su ti bya ni ya ni ya ma snying khrag dar ni b+h+yo/ myags myags rbad/ sarba duSh+tan la tri phyung/ phud phyung phyung/ sarba dus ban nan thun gzer rbad/ tsit+ta ya rbad/ mi shig thig shing/ kun dun ta dun

b+h+yo/ dun dun d+h+ri sha b+hi ma b+had tig na phye/ ur mo nang 'bras byung ba na// byas pa bshigs dang zhen pa bzlog/ gnas pa spo dang zug pa dbyung// bcings pa dgrol dang bshal kha bsgyur// drag sngags 'di yis
'grub par nges// ngos zin dregs pa re dang sbrag/ ngos ma zin na sde brgyad la// spu gri btab pas 'grub par nges// srung byed drag sngags kyi le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs

pa// dregs pa rang gshed ngan sngags bstan// srog dang snying po bstan pa ni// ya ya ma ma ma ma ru lu d+ha ta dun ting ki la ya du tir ti ka d+ha ru tra a d+he ba rang rag sha k+Sha yang sha rang rag mo/ k+Sha yag mo tsa ra tsa

shu la/ me dun ting ru ru tri ni/ tri haM shaM tri/ badzra sa du ru tri/ phus nag bstun gnod byed sde brgyad do// a ya ma du ru tsa sha na/ spu gri rang gshed dbab pa ni// yag shi snying kha rag dun dun rbad/ du

ru ru tra ma trang srog tig/ ma taM ru tri srog mA ra ya rbad/ nag po tsit+ta snying kha rag byin sna dun dun rbad/ hring sha b+his ma srog dun dun trig nan/ ma ru ra dza dun dun rbad/ ra tsa ha ste dun dun rbad/ tri tsa rag dun

dun rbad/ he le ru le baM ril dun dun rbad/ srog trig nan/ badzra sa sa du ru tra dun dun rbad/ badzra sa du a ni dun dun rbad/ rag sha yag sha snying kha rag dun dun rbad/ a kro ra dza tsit+ta srog ma ra ya rbad/ trig

nan/ ra hu la ma ra ya tsa na thun ril/ tsa pa ma ni ra hu lu bi sha mi ki ma ra tsa sha srog dun/ dun trig nan/ trag ma ma rag sha kha rag ru tri dun dun rbad/ ma ma ltag khung ma ma bdud srog tig nan/ rbad thum

ril rbad dug phrag mi ro ma ti/ srog d+hig nan/ ru lu ru lu thum ril nan/ a dun sa nan dza raM sad ka ra ya/ baM ma ra ya rbad/ thun gzir thun b+h+yau/ rag mo ru lu tri mug che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ khung tri dun dun khye
ma na trig nan/ sho khraM na mA ra ya rbad sa na ga trig nan/ phu hur thums dza/ sa na ga pu ma phu ya rbad/ dregs pa rang gshed rang gis 'bebs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges bshad
pa// phral la gnod pa'i bgegs chen la// byas pa bshig pa la sogs pa// brgya yis don rnams 'grub par nges// stong phrag gcig gis ma thul na// 'bros pa'i ri dang rno ba'i ngar// bsdebs pa'i grog dang
bsags pa'i mchog/ phyi nang drag sngags ting 'dzin stobs// gsang ba'i srog nyid bstan pa yang// snying po byang chub sems su shes// bde gshegs 'dus pa rang nyid yin// bde chen gnas nas pho nyar
'gyed// gnyis med ngang las mi g.yo bar// skad cig srid gsum dbang du sdud// ces pa'i 'khor lo rim pa ni// rnam dag gnas pa'i 'khor lo yin// bde gshegs ye nas brjod dang bral// sku lnga sems
kyi ngo bor 'dus// stong pa kun 'byung 'khor lo yin// gnas pa'i 'khor lo sems la 'dus// srid pa'i 'khor lo lus la 'dus// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'gro drug 'dus// gang la gang 'dul rim par
ston// gcod pa'i 'khor lo mtshon cha ste// yig 'bru gnad nas bskul bas gcod// stobs dang 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gsang bdag chen po des// dpa' bo che la 'di skad
zhus// kye kye dpa' bo chen po lags// bde gshegs dgongs pa'i las mtha' la// gsad dang gso ba bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// rdo rje 'chang gis yang gsungs pa// gsad gso rnam pa mang gis
kyang// las chen bzhi ru drul pa yin// klu ni chu la bsten te gsad// lha srin dregs pa srin rdo la// bstan pa e la bsten nas bsrungs/ ur mo nang 'dras tsa ra la// bstan la rang gshed dag

tu dbab/ rdo rje ur mo bgras pa la// rol po mtshan dang ldan pa la// pho brgyud g.yas la mo brgyud g.yon// ra yi bar tu b+ha 'dra'i gzugs// zhing lpags dril la mgo la brab// e ra ka de ba sha mo ha na ma a

ri sha b+h+yo/ de nas g.yas dang g.yon la bral// des na d+ha 'dra brlag par nges// klu yi gnas sa chu yin te// chu la bstan te rang gshed dbab// nad pa skom gyis gdungs pa la// klu ni phyi ru chu la thon// dkar
gsum bkang ba'i chu gtsang la// nad pa'i kha btad rgyab nas brab// gdag pa phyi ru thon pa dang// smag shad se ba'i mda' gzhu yis// bsgrun nas bsregs te gnas par ro// rnal 'byor can gyi byas pa
na// gdug pa'i klu nad zhi bar byed// lha srin dregs pa gdul ba ni// srin rdo dkar nag sran tshad la// dug dang khrag ni blug cing bsreg/ dregs pa de la mkhas gyur na// dregs pa mod la brlag par
'gyur// de nas bstan pa dam pa la// gnod pa'i dgra bo bsgral ba ni// mkha' 'gro gzan la babs pa bzhin// dregs pa dgra la dbab pa ni// 'brub khung gru gsum phung pa'i sa// ro sol dag gis nag por

byug/ snying khar ming bri dpral bar rus// bris la gru gsum nang du bcug/ nga rgyal bskyed la dregs pa bkol// ya ma trig nan nri hur thums dza/ dgra bo che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ ma ma ru la trig nan/ du na ting ki

la ya trig nan/ ra tsa trig nan zhes ni dregs pa kun la sbyar// rno myur 'dod na pho rbad cing// tshan chen 'dod na kun mo sbyor// dregs pa pho mo thams cad kyis// sha la srin bu gtub pa bzhin// brnag pa'i lus
srog 'brel bar bsam// thod pa mtshan ngan nang bcug la// dregs pa gnas sar gnas par bya// des ni dgra bo brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// las bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun

pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rang lus rdo rje spyi dril bsgom// brgya dang bcu po drang ba ni// rang lus rdo rje lta bur gnas// 'byung ba khrugs pa dngas snyigs 'byed// lha srin bran g.yog lta
bur 'gyur// rbod gtong gnod pa'i rtags bstan pa// ri nyil mkhar rdib bshags pa bya// mon pa zhib can mang po rmi// gshin rje yin pas rang gshed dbab// g.yag dang mun pa sos pa 'dud// rta pa khyi

dmar klu btsan te// zhang blon ban d+he dge bsnyen yin// btsun pa bu chung rgyal po yin// bud med mang po ma bdud yin// ban d+he mtshon thogs rbod gtong yin// nya lcag sa bdag sa srin yin/ khyi dang rga mo
dam sri yin// 'od dang me stag dkor bdag yin// rtags rnams mi gsal rtsub 'gyur na// sde brgyad dril la thems gsum gzhug/ des ni dregs pa zhi bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dregs
pa'i rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas dregs pa de rnams la// tshar bcad mnan pa dpa' bos gsungs// shog bu dag la bdud kyi gzugs// bris la g.yas su gdags par

bya'o// rgya gram lam du spus gang mnan// btsan la sha ru khram btod la// mtshon gyis dkris la gong gsum mnan// phur pa mkhan la mdzo rdol thod// rgyal po lcam dral gri dkar thod// rgyal po phug bdag la
bar gsal// dkor bdag dam sri them pa'i 'og/ rang rang gnas pa'i sa ru mnan// des ni dregs pa'i kha 'ching mnan// zhes gsungs so// dregs pa kha bcing ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas
dpa' bo chen po des// rnal 'byor bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bshad// dus khrod ras sam rgya shog la// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// ming gzhug drag sngags 'di yang gsungs// oM e ka ya ma/ he ka ya

ma/ dri ma ya ma/ sarba tsit+ta/ gzer thums/ big nan/ trig nan/ rbad ya/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ stong du bzlas na thams cad 'ching// drag po sngags kyi rtags rnams ni// chu 'brub dar chen 'phyar ba
dang// sems can gsod de mkha' la lding// nyi zla shar ram lus sems dpa'// gcan gzan bran du 'khol ba dang// lha srin bran du 'khol ba 'ong// drag sngags kyi rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po spu gri 'di gsungs so// yul khams bsrung na glang ru ru nyungs kar thal chen bsngags shing gtor na ser ba gnam mthar skyel/ a mu kha myogs rbad/ trig
nan shag rbad/ u nan shag rbad/ sbur nan thum ril rbad/ oM hur thums dza breng shag raM raM rbad e/ e bzlas bzlog pas yul khams thub par nges/ zhes gsungs so// yul khams bsrung pa'i le'u ste bcu
gcig pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bde gshegs dril ba'i lha tshogs la// bstod bskul mchod bstod gnang bar mdzod// ces gsol
pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bde gshegs 'dus pa'i lha tshogs la bstod cing thugs dam bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM mi rtog dbyings nas thugs dam skur bzhengs pa// 'byung ba gur chen phub pa'i
gzhal yas nas/ khro rgyal 'dus pa dpal chen rngam pa'i lha// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i sku// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing drag po'i zhal// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje g.yas// lha srin sde
brgyad zil gyi gnon// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// srin mo ma mo bran du 'khol// sdang mig lta zhing nga ro drag po sgrogs// klu rigs bran du 'khol zhing thams cad dbang du
sdud// mchod gtor bzhes la thugs rjes bdag la skyobs// rta mgrin rgyal po ra ga'i mdog/ rta mgo ljang khus 'phrin las mthar phyin mdzad// mchod gtor bzhes la sde brgyad dam du sdus// che mchog rgyal
po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// gdug pa'i stobs kyis gdug pa'i nga ro 'joms// mchod gtor bzhes la dregs pa nga ro chos// bya khyung rgyal po 'jigs pa'i nga ro can// lcags sder rdo rje gdug pa'i klu
gnyan 'dul// mchod gtor bzhes la gdug pa'i klu gnyan thul// 'phrin las rdzogs pas sras mchog ku ma ra// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// zhal gsum phyag drug phur pa 'dril zhing
'debs// mchod gtor bzhes la 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// bka' sdod ya ma ra dza ni// sku stod khro bo rgyal po la// sku smad phur pa gru gsum dpal dang ldan// gang la dmigs pa rlag par byed// mchod
gtor bzhes la sngags kyi dug mda' bzlog/ ces gsungs so// mchod bstod kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'khor mang po dga' mgu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon gsum du
bstod pa/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// bde chen ngang las thabs kyi bye brag 'char// gnyis med 'bras bus khams gsum rgyas btab nas// mi 'gyur lhun grub rdzogs pa'i sku la 'dud// skye
med dbyings las thugs rjes don mdzad pa// e ma mi rtog dbyings la khro rgyal dregs pa 'joms pa'i sku// dbang sdud gtum rngam chen po'i sku la 'dud// skye med dbyings las thugs rjes don mdzad pa// dug
gsum nad sel sman pa'i rgyal po ste// bdud rtsi rgyal po khyaud la 'dud/ ces stod do// bstod cing rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs rgyud 'bras bu yongs su
rdzogs pa zhes bya ba// gsang bar gdams pa rdzogs so// sA mA yA kha thaM////
rnal 'byor nang pa'i tshogs rgyud zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba// de lta bu'i tshogs rgyud chen po 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du snang bar 'gyur// sems can rnams
la ji ltar phan par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di ni 'dod khams dang/ gzugs khams dang/
gzugs med pa'i rigs thams cad du khyab par 'gyur ro// dang po 'og min gyi gnas su ting nge 'dzin gyi pU tsa'i mchod pa las rgyu blang ste// rnal 'byor gyi
tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ thams cad chos kyi skur sangs rgyas bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzugs khams kyi lha tshogs su tshogs sbyor gyi tshogs 'dis khyab pas/ dpal tshangs pa
dang brgya byin gyis rgyu byas te/ lha'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa las gzhi blangs te// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byam 'khor dang bcas pa la// rnal 'byor gyi
tshogs mchod chen po phul bas/ lha'i rigs 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ phung po mi gnas par mya ngan las 'das pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed do// de
nas drang srong rnams kyi rigs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud 'dis khyab pas/ drang srong rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa'i longs spyod rnams pa sna tshogs pas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la
mchod pa phul bas/ drang srong la sogs pa rim gyis phung po lhag ma med pa'i mi gnas par mya ngan las 'das par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed do// de nas klu'i

rigs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab pas/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ klu'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod kyis/ rgyal bsras dang bcas pa
ma lus pa la rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ klu'i rigs 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa lus ma bor bar/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las ma 'das par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur

ro// de nas mi'i rigs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab na yang/ mi gnas pa'i snod du gyur pa yang rig pa cha phra mo yod pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku la gnas pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dad pa dang/
rgyal po dang/ bram ze dang/ mgo ru dang/ sha ru dang// bstan pa 'jam dang/ khyim bdag gi ris su/ las kyi 'phro can la sogs pa rnams kyis dang du blangs te/ rgyal srid dang/ longs spyod dang/ grogs
mchog tu bcas te rab tu bde ba'i gnas su/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa sbyan drangs te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs

mchod chen po phul te/ 'phags pa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ste/ tshom bu grangs brgya dang stong la sogs pa dang/ pho mo rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa lus ma bor bar tshe 'di nyid la/ mi gnas ba'i mya ngan
las 'das pa'i gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// rgyu de la brten nas/ dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ byol song dang/ gshin rje'i sgo bkag ste/ rim gyis bla na med

pa'i sa la phyin par 'gyur ro// rgyu de lam la 'god par byed do// gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas te dmyal bar lhung nges pa yang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'di gzhung bzhin du phul na/

mnar med pa'i gnas su mi ltung ste/ bde ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa yang gzhan gyis mi bskongs te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'dis skongs
par 'gyur ro// gang zhig gzhan la phan 'dogs par 'dod na yang/ las gzhan gyis mi 'grub ste// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po phul nas gang phan gdags pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang zhig bar
du gcod pa sgrol bar 'dod na yang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'di phul na yid la bsam pa bzhin sgrol bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba dang/ mthu dbang phun sum tshogs par

'dod na yang/ rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di gzhung bzhin du phul na gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di yang snod ma yin pa dang/ zhe sdang can
dang/ dam tshig la mi gnas pa dang/ ngan sems can dang/ 'dod rgyal ba rnams ni ma gtogs so// de nas sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba/ rim gyis thams cad bla na med par 'grub pa lags na/ mi la
sogs pa thams cad kyis mthar rdzogs par spyod par 'gyur ba lags sam/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis/ rim gyis tshom bu mang po sangs rgyas par byed na yang/

kun gyi thun mong du ma gsungs te/ dper na til mar gyis rdzas gang la phog kyang sra zhing mkhregs par 'gyur na/ a rdza ga'i dog po la phog na tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ dam la mi gnas

shing gsang sngags tshig tsam la khungs phyung nas/ khe dang/ grags pa dang/ phrag dog dang/ nyon mongs pa rang rgyud du spyod pa rnams kyis spyad kyang/ slar nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud

chen po 'di mi'i 'jig rten thams cad du khyab na yang/ phal cher lta ba dang mi ldan par 'byor pa sna tshogs kyis mchod cing 'bul bar byed na yang/ don med pa ni ma yin/ 'byor pa'i tshogs rgyas par 'gyur
ba dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bskyed pa las/ 'di nyid du mngon par sangs rgyas pa yang 'byung ngo// phal cher khungs phyung tsam dang 'byor pa ma tshogs par 'bul ba dag yod na/ dmigs pa'i phan stobs
tsam du 'gyur ba yang yod do// gang zhig dgongs pa lhun gyis grub cing lta ba dang man ngag tu ldan pas/ dus gsum du 'phags pa'i tshogs la/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod phul ba lta ci smos

kyis/ slob dpon de nyid kyi karmar yang dro zhal gcig tsam drangs pa yang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod phul ba dang 'dra bar skal pa mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi rang bzhin

no// de lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di lha'i 'jig rten dang/ mi'i 'jig rten du mtha' yas par spyod par 'gyur la/ mi'i 'jig rten na yang bskal pa bzang po dang dus dang po la ni/ rgya gar
yul la sogs pa dang/ yul gyi dbus dang/ khrims dang gtsug lag la gnas pa'i rgyal po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag gi rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyud sbyar nas/ gu ru mahA la sogs pa rnams kyis
byin brlabs nas bshad cing bsgo la bsrung zhing mnyams par byas nas/ 'ga' dang 'ga' tsam las phal cher mi spro ste/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgo nas mthar phyin cing mngon du grub par 'gyur ro// bskal

pa dang dus bar ma la rgyal khams ris phal chen grags te/ rigs pa'i sa thob pa dang/ rgyud kyi don la mkhas pa dang/ man ngag dang snod dbang tshul bzhin du thob par byas nas/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i mi mo

dang nga/ gzhung dang mthun pa'i sbyor ba dang/ dad pa dang ldan pa'i sa ri ha dang/ khrims dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang/ blon po la sogs pa grangs kyi tshoms bsdus te bshad cing bstan pa dang/ rtog pa dkrol zhing
'khu 'phrig dang the tshom ma zos par byas te/ yid ches shing dad pa la skyo dub med par byas te/ phal cher dam la btags te/ gnas dben pa dang/ 'gol bar skye bo dang/ mi nag yongs kyis ma 'grims pas/
gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol nas/ dus gsum 'phags pa'i tshogs la rnal 'byor tshogs kyi sa la mchod pa chen po gzhung bzhin du phul na/ 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i don dus gcig tu
'grub ste/ gzugs mi yul nas ma 'phags par sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa dang/ yongs kyis gsang sngags mnyan zhing/ spyod pa blangs po ma 'phrog te/ ya ka dang sgro skur med cing gsang ba'i bka' thabs

kyis spyod par 'gyur ro// bskal pa tha ma dang dus tha ma la ni gang zag gi tha dad dang/ rgyal po'i bka' khrims nyams pas mi smad rim nas dbang che ba dang/ blon po ma byang bas so kha nang du ltas pa dang/
rnal 'byor pa ma grol bas bsrung mtshams las 'das shing/ gsang sngags 'chol ba'i dbang gis/ thang khob pa dang gda' mdo dang/ kla klo dang/ rtsi ra sa'i grong thams cad du brdal bas/ gsang sngags
bka' 'chol/ chos ni kun spyod/ chos bzhin du gang yang mi byed/ chos ni kun la yod par byas/ rtogs ni slob dpon rang gis kyang ma rtogs/ dam tshig kun nod/ bsrung ba gcig kyang mi
bsrung/ slob dpon ni kun byed/ dbang gang la yang med/ lad mo kun zlos/ nyams su gang gis kyang ma longs/ dbang kun la bskur/ chags pa ni gang la yang ma chags/ 'chad pa kun 'chad/ thog tu gang

gis kyang ma phebs/ rtsol ni kun rtsol/ mthar gang gis kyang ma phyin pas/ phal cher bgyid lug ste sngags las bzlog pa dang/ phal chen ma rtogs pas the tshom za ba dang/ phal cher ya ka dang sgro skur 'debs
pa mang ba dang/ rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs mchod kyi 'byor pa rnams mi 'bul bar/ mi'i 'byor pa dang 'du ba med pas/ de'i dbang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang mnga' thang dang longs spyod bri nas/ mtshams
tshad tsam 'bul bar byed pas bsod nams mi thob pa dang/ phal cher 'byor pa sna tshogs bsogs nas 'bul bar byed na yang/ gsang ba med pa dang grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag dus 'di tsam na
longs spyod 'di tsam bshams te/ tshogs mchod 'bul bar byed do zhes bsgrags pa'i dbang gis btag pa can dang/ brnab sems can dang/ 'dod sems can dang/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i skyon
dang/ mkhas pa rnams mi 'chad par/ mi mkhas pa rnams che 'dod pa'i phyir mchad pas/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bka' rgyud gsang ba'i man ngag rnams brnags te sbas pas/ bka' nges pa nub pa'i skyon gyis

phal cher nyungs par dogs nas rang bzo dang/ ke'u shang/ bsre bcos dang/ mi tshig bsres pas/ de la che bar mtshan rtags kyang/ rgyud la khungs med pa'i gang zag sbyin du re ba'i rang thad du brgyud pas ngal

ba'i tshi chad pa dang/ las brtsam pa gron tshigs su 'gyur zhing/ grub pa'i dus ring ba dang/ phal cher ra chod dang/ gzu lums dang/ rak+sha'i las smyos thabs su byas te snang snang ni sgrol/ 'phrad 'phrad ni sbyor/

rnyed rnyed ni za/ spyod pa 'chol ba'i dbang gis rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod du byed na yang/ dper na zangs ma gser tu bcos pa dang 'dra ste/ gser gyi dngos po min pa dang 'dra'o// phal cher bdag nyid kyi
'jug sgo dang/ thos phyogs dang/ mos btsan la 'di ni bzang la don dam pa yin la/ gzhan ni ngan pa yin no zhes/ chos nyid phyogs ris med pa la/ phyogs dang ris su bcad pa'i skyon dang/ 'khor dang/

bde ba dang bcas par phye ste/ phrag dog che chung gi dbang gis mnyam pa'i don la 'gal bar gnas pa dang/ phal cher theg pa'i ris so sor bzung ste/ rtsod pa'i chos bshom pa'i dus na ni/ kun gyis 'bras bu
blan med pa mi thob par ngan song gsum po sha stag tu lhung ba dang/ sngon gyi ston pa'i bka' nub pas/ ming tshig 'phel bas bsgrub thag ring ba dang/ dam tshig la zer shor bas bsam pa mi

'grub cing bar chad kyi rkyen 'byung ba dang/ dbang brgyud rim gyis mi bskur bas mthu byin chung ba dang/ bsgom bsgrub kyi don mthil du ma 'phebs pas drod tshad la ma bab pa dang/ shes pa'i rgyud nam grol

bas rtogs pa ma shar ba dang/ mchod rdzas ma 'tshogs shing phud nyams pas dngos grub mi thob pa dang/ las dang man ngag rdeng du ma chud pas bar chod 'byung ba'i dus na yang/ rnal 'byor pa 'ga' dang 'ga'

zhig gi rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di ltar spyod cing/ dang du len nus pa rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i tshogs rgyud chen po las/ bca'
lugs dang skyon yon gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa// de lta bu'i tshogs rgyud 'di la dam tshig gang lags/ dbang gang lags/ lta ba gang lags/ bsgrub pa gang
lags/ spyod pa gang lags/ lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag zhus pa legs so legs so// de la tshogs kyi dam tshig ni/

slob dpon ni bdag gi srog dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srog bcad na 'chi la/ srog ma bcad na mi 'chi brtan zhing// 'jig rten gyi bde ba rim gyis thob pa dang 'dra bar/ slob dpon dang 'thabs pa dang

smod pa lta ci smos kyis/ spang pa 'am bral na yang dge ba'i bar chad cing man ngag mi thob pas/ dper na srog dang 'dra bar lta ba dang/ rgyal theb dang karma la sogs kyang/ dpe mig dang dbang po ltar lta ste/

dper na mig dang dbang po nyams pa dang med pa lta ci smos kyi/ bag tsam ga zer ba yang mi bzod pa dang 'dra bar rgyal theb karma ging la 'thab rtsod ci smos kyis/ bag tsam ma dad pa skyes na yang sgrib pa'i rgyur

'gyur ba dang/ mched dang lcam dral yan lag dang phung po dang 'dra ste/ gang snang bas kun g.yo zhing sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba dang 'dra ba dang/ sku'i gnod pa tshabs po che lta ci smos kyi/ 'gal 'khrul tsam

byung na yang/ yongs mi bde zhing nyams pa'i chad par 'gyur bas/ sku'i dam tshig bsrung zhing rtse gdung byas la dad pa cher bskyed la yangs par bya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya dgongs pa gsum ni/ dper na gtam

dang/ zas dang/ gos ltar te/ phyi nang gtams gyis ma 'jal na gang yang mi 'grub la/ 'tsho ba zas kyis ma gsos na phung po mi theg dro ba gos ma gon na nyon mongs pa dang 'dra bar/ snying po dang sngags ma
bgrangs na grub pa'i rtags mi yong/ dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma srang na shes pa'i rgyud mi grol/ phyag rgya dam du ma bcas na nyon mongs pa dang phung po gnas mi 'gyur bas/ dam du bcas te dang

du blang ngo// thugs kyi dam tshig ni gter sba ba dang 'dra ste/ dper na rin po che gter sgrom du sbas na 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med cing/ sgrom kha phye na dga' ba bskyed cing/ 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed
pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man ngag thams cad snod ma yin pa la sbas te bdag gi blo la btags na rtogs pa mngon du gyur nas/ 'bras bu mthar phyin par 'gyur bas gter dang 'dra bar sba bar dam tshig
bca' 'o// gtan mi 'byung ba ni ma yin te/ gter la bdag dang bu spyod pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man ngag bdag dang bu dang 'dra ba la ma gtogs pa/ bshad pa'i grangs bzhi las mang na 'gal bar

gsungs so// dus tha ma la bab pa'i tshe/ rtsa ba 'di rnams nos nas gang yang mi bsrung ste/ sku'i dam tshig nyams te 'thab rtsod shor ba dang/ gsung yang nyams te sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ ting nge 'dzin

spangs te/ mdo sde bsam gtan gyi phul kyang bzhes su don spyod pa dang/ thugs kyang nyams te brgya dang nyi shu la bshad pa ni 'bras bu mnar med pa lta ci smos kyis/ dper na seng ge'i khog pa nang gi nang 'jig

pa bzhin// chos nyan du gang zag sngags pa rang gis ma ster te/ rang gis rang smas so// rtsa ba'i dam tshig ma nyams na yan lag ljon shing dang 'dra ste/ skye bas nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ sum

brgya drug cu dang/ sa ma ya stong 'bum sde la sogs pa'i gang spyod pa'i yan lag lo 'dab dang 'dra bas 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag nyams par gyur na tshogs kyi mchod pa dang/ longs spyod

rdzas su phul kyang bzhes su mi gnang zhing mnyes par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de las bsod nams med cing 'bras bu mi thob pa'i phyir ro// tshogs rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig nyams pa'i le'u ste bcu

pa'o//// de la tshogs rgyud chen po 'di la dbang rnam pa lnga ste// chos dang rgyud 'chad cing nyan pa'i dbang dang/ yi dam gyi lha bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang dang/ dkyil 'khor gnyan po zhal lta ba'i dbang

dang/ tshogs kyi zhal zas 'tshal zhing longs spyod pa'i dbang dang/ las kyi rdo rje las gang byed par ming gi dbang bskur ba dang lnga'o// de la d+harma tan+t+ra nyan cing 'chad pa'i dbang ni 'di skad do// gsang ba gsang
chen gsang mchog rnams// ston pas nges par gsungs pa'i don// nyan cing yid la 'dzin pa dang// ma 'dres ston pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas yi dam gyi lha bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad
do// bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas// bsgoms shing bsgrubs pa'i yi dam lha// me tog dbang gis phog pa 'di// bsgom shing bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas dkyil 'khor gnyan po
zhal lta ba'i dbang la 'di skad do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// dur khrod 'bar ba'i rdzas bkram nas// sku gsung thugs su gsal sgom pa// lta zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas tshogs
kyi zhal zas la 'tshal zhing longs spyod pa'i dbang 'di skad do// rgyal ba mchod pas dam skong zhing// mchod pa phul bas bgegs zhi nas// pham phabs longs spyod bdud rtsi'i bcud// rnal 'byor tshogs la

longs spyod shog/ de nas las kyi rdo rje las gang byed pa'i ming gi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// 'phrin las drag dal gang byed pa'i// las rnams che ge byed pa por// rdo rje
ming gi dbang thob shog/ tshogs rgyud chen po las// dbang gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas tshogs kyi lta ba la don rnams pa lngas bstan te/ tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du lta ba dang/ 'byor

ba thams cad longs spyod du lta ba dang/ mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba dang// dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba dang/ rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba'o// de la tshogs pa thams cad
dkyil 'khor du lta ba ni/ rdo rje slob dpon dang/ mched dang lcam dral tshogs pa yang/ rdo rje slob dpon ni dkyil yin la/ mched dang lcam dral ni 'khor yin par lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad

dgongs spyod rgya mtsho'i klong gi dkyil 'khor du rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'o// dam rdzas tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor te/ byang chub sems ni dkyil yin la/ dam rdzas gzhan ni 'khor yin no// de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ bde ba chen po'i don la skye 'chi med pa'i dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'o// dam rdzas dang lag cha tshogs pa thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor te/ ban+d+ha dkyil yin la/ dur khrod kyi chas ni 'khor

ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i rol pa chen pos/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad chos nyid du lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin no// de la 'byor ba thams cad longs spyod du lta ba

dang/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang nang bcud kyi 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi longs spyod du byinagyis brlabs pa'i dus su/ byol song thams cad kyis lus tshogs su

phul ba dang/ gshin rje thams cad kyis sha chen tshogs su phul ba dang/ srin po thams cad kyis thod rus dang 'bru mar tshogs su phul ba dang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis dza gad rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs su 'bul
ba dang/ ma mo dang mkha' 'gro khrag dang snum chen tshogs su phul ba dang/ klu rnams kyis snying po sna tshogs 'bul ba dang/ byol song rnams kyis 'o ma sna tshogs 'bul ba dang/ nam mkha' lding

rnams kyis shing tog sna tshogs su 'bul ba dang/ sman gyi lhas sman sna tshogs 'bul ba dang/ rtsi'i lha mos rtsi'i sman sna tshogs tshogs 'bul ba dang/ mkha' lding gis spos sna tshogs su 'bul ba dang/ sa bdag

rnams kyis 'bru sna tshogs tshogs su 'bul ba dang/ mi rnams kyis mis sbyar ba'i zhal zas sna tshogs tshogs su 'bul ba dang/ lha rnams kyis rin po che chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ lha'i me tog man dA ra

ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ lha'i 'dod pa'i gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro reg longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshogs su 'bul ba la sogs pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
rnal 'byor tshogs kyi longs spyod chen por byin gyis brlabs te gsol/ gzhan yang 'grangs shing tshim par mdzad/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pas/ 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod du lta'o// de la mchod

pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba ni/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes chen po'i ngang las byung ste/ phar mchod pas thugs dam bskul/ dngos grub nod/ slar 'dus pas sgrib pa

sbyangs/ dngos grub thob ste/ lha la lha thim/ ye shes la ye shes rol/ chos nyid la chos nyid thim/ phar mchod pas bdag nyid kyi sems dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes su mnyam zhing dbyer med par
mchod pa phul/ slar 'dus pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang/ bdag gis sems mnyam zhing dbyer med de/ ye shes mchod pa 'od zer gyi rgyan du bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi dngos

po/ rgyal ba'i chos la dang po longs spyod par mdzad pas// mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta'o// dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba ni/ mdun gyi nam mkha' las ye shes sems dpa' rgyal ba rgya mtsho
sras dang bcas par dmigs pa yang bdag gi phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rnam par shes pa nyid lha'i rgyud du snang ba las ma gtogs pa/ gzhan gud na med pa'i rtog pa'i lta bas rtogs par

byas la/ ji ltar gnam ri dang sa brag thams cad 'byung ba lnga la bsdus la/ skye 'gro thams cad kyang 'byung ba lnga dang phung po lnga bsdus pas 'byung ba dang/ phung po thams cad kyang lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi

rang bzhin yin la/ rtogs pa'i lta bas rtogs par byas la/ mdun dang shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo dang/ zhing khams dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ g.yas dang lho thams cad rin chen rigs kyi
lha dang/ lha mo dang/ zhing khams dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ rgyab dang nub thams cad pad+ma rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo dang/ zhing khams dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ g.yon dang byang thams
cad las kyi rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo dang zhing khams dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ steng dang nam mkha' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo dang/ sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/

khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ zhing khams dang/ pho brang dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ lha rgyud kyi rang bzhin du rtogs par byas la/ yid kyis dmigs pas/ dmigs pa rnams lha rgyud du lta'o/ rtogs pa thams cad

gzhal yas khang du lta ba ni/ phyi nang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad 'byung ba lngas bsdus la/ 'byung ba lnga po nyid yum chen mo lnga'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa chos nyid dbyings kyi rang bzhin pas/
dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa'i gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin yin pa las/ de ltar ma rtogs na gzhan nas gzhal yas khang gnyan pa ris su chad pa med pas/ rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du

lta'o// tshogs rgyud chen po las/ lta ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas tshogs kyi bsgrub pa la yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ sku'i bsgrub pa dang/ gsung gi bsgrub pa dang/ thugs kyi bsgrub pa dang/ yon

tan gyi bsgrub pa dang/ 'phrin las kyi bsgrub pa gang byed kyang rung ste/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi bsgrub pa dgos te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs 'di ni lan tshwa dang cha 'dra ste/ gang la yang mi tshang du mi rung ste/ sku'i

bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la tshogs kyi mchod pa gzhung bzhin phul nas/ sku'i bsgrub pa yang 'grub cing mthar phyin par 'gyur zhing/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan dang/ 'phrin las kyang de

bzhin du gang bsgrub pa tshogs kyis bsgrub pa'o// de'i don ni gzhung du ma dag las rgya cher byung ngo// tshogs rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas tshogs kyi spyod pa ni don

rnam pa gsum ste/ tshogs kyi spyod pa thabs dang shes rab tu spyod pa dang/ tshogs kyi spyod pa spong len med par spyod pa dang/ tshogs kyi spyod pa 'ching grol med par spyod pa'o/ de la tshogs kyi spyod pa thabs dang

shes rab tu spyod pa ni/ yo ga phyi ma man chad kyi sgor zhugs pa rnams kyis/ tshogs kyi mchod pa lta ci smos kyis/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gang la yang skyon du lta ba'i nang nas kyang/ thabs dang shes rab 'ching pa'i
bshal thag tu brtags pa ste/ rdo rje'i theg pa thabs la mkhas pa'i gnas skabs na/ thams cad thabs dang shes rab dbyings dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pa thams cad
ma spangs par 'jol nyog tu spyod par ma zad de/ chos nyid kyi rgyan du shar bas dga' bder longs spyod la/ de nyid kyi gnyis su med pa chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba'o// de la tshogs kyi spyod pa

spong len med par spyod pa ni/ yo ga phyi pa man chad kyis 'di gtsang ba'i rigs te 'phags pa mchod pa'i rgyu yin la/ 'di ni mi gtsang ba dang sme ba yin pas/ 'phags pa mchod pa'i rgyu ma yin no// zhes
spong len du spyod pa ma yin/ chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin rnam par rtog pa ming yang med pa las/ gtsang ba yang lha'i zhal zas yin la/ mi gtsang ba yang lha'i zhal zas gnyis su med pa'i don de nyid

'phags pa'i dgongs spyod dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku 'grub pas/ gang la yang 'di 'khor ba dang mi gtsang ba'i rgyu yin pas spong la/ 'di thar pa dang/ bde ba dang/ gtsang ba'i rgyu yin zhes dang du mi len

te/ spong len med pas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa yin no// tshogs kyi mchod pa 'ching 'grol med par longs spyod pa ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa la yang chags pa med par spyad/

mthar phyin par spyad pas/ 'khor ba dang nyon mongs pas 'ching ba med la/ de nyid rtog pa'i rgyan du rig nas chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin pas/ de ltar spyod na grol ba yang med la/ 'ching ba yang
med pa'o// tshogs rgyud chen po las// spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ rigs lnga yab yum dang/ sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ khro bo dang/ khro
mo dang/ sprul pa dang/ yang sprul dang/ ci bgyi dang bka' nyan dang/ dam la btags pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs la longs spyod sku nyams su bstar nas/ thams cad gnyis su med
pa'i chos kyi skur lhun gyis grub nas bzhugs so// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po las/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// rdzogs so////
tshogs rgyud chen po rtsa rgyud dang phyi ma 'di bod du 'gyur ro// gsang ba bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi phug thugs/ snubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te/
stong tshab 'phags pa rin po che la bshad//// de nas gsang ba thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyi mchod pa la yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ gzungs ma byin gyis brlab pa dang/ gnyis su med par sbyar
ba dang/ gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams cad gnas spar te dbang bskur ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la byang chub sems kyi mchod pa 'bul ba dang/ byang chub sems rdo rje lce'i dngos grub blangs ba
dang lnga'o// de la dang po gzungs ma byin gyis brlab pa ni/ gzungs ma nyid yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i rang bzhin du/ dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas gzhal med

khang du byin gyis brlab la/ gsang ba'i mkha' la dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshang bar bsgom pa dang/ gnas lngar yi ge 'bru lnga las rigs lngar gyur pa dang/ gsang ba'i yum bzhis bskor bar bsgoms pa byin gyis
brlab bo// de nas gnyis su med par sbyar ba ni/ dang po spyan gyi brda zhig mdzad de 'dis bskul lo/ mtshan mchog brgyan pa'i yum mchog shes rab spyan// shes rab don gyis rgyal ba'i thugs dam
bskul// mi dmigs snying rje thams cad yongs la snyoms// thabs dang shes rab tshul khrims kyis// sa ma ya s+t+waM// zhes bskul ba dang// yum gyis yab la 'di skad ces bskul lo// thabs la mkhas pas 'gro
ba 'dren pa'i gtso// 'khor ba spangs nas gnas su dag pa la// 'phags pa rnams la dges pa'i thugs dam bskul// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa rgyan du bzhes/ sa ma ya hUM// zhes bskul bas/ yab kyi phyag rgya

chen po bzhis mnyam par sbyar/ hUM las gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rtse lnga par bsgom// rdo rje'i rwa lnga la rigs lnga'i snying po dgod/ yum gyi mkha' las pad+ma 'dab brgyad la yum gyi snying po dgod/ pra be sha phaT kyis sgo
phye/ su ra ta s+t+waM gyis bskul bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dges pa gcig tu bdar te/ mnyes pa chen po thugs dam skongs/ don dbyings dang ye shes/ rtags thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par

lhun gyis grub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams cad gnas spar te dbang bskur ba ni/ nam mkha' gang dang gang du khyab par/ chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab la/ chos kyi dbyings kyis gang nas
gang du khyab par/ yum gyi mkha' klong rnam par dag pas khyab pas/ snod kyi 'jigs rten thams cad yum gyi mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'i nang nas mtha' yas sems
can thams cad kyi sems mar me rlung gis ma bskyod par gnas pa lta bu las/ kun gzhi a'i rang bzhin dang/ yid hUM gi rang bzhin du 'dus te/ yab yum 'od bsnom mar bstims pas/ AHdang/ hUM dang/
byang chub sems gsum du 'dres pa las/ thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ kun tu bzang po'i sras du gyur te/ sems can thams cad rgyal ba'i sras du bzhes/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang rdo rje'i

ming gis dbang bskur te/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'dzin cing byang chus sems kyis dbang byin te bzhag pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dbul ba ni/ me long rang yul can gyi
nang du bzhag la/ srin mtheb kyi phyag rgya bya/ gtso bo dang 'khor yan chad la mchod pa phul bas/ dges pa chen po bdud rtsis mnyes nas dngos grub stsol zhing byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'o// de

nas byang chub sems las rdo rje tshe'i dngos grub blang ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad yab yum gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub kyi sems kun dkar tsa ra ra zags pas bdag gi byang chub

kyi sems dang 'dres te/ lce la blangs pas tsit+ta la thim pas/ ye shes sems dpa' sku mtshon gang bar gyur te/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung du gyur to// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//// tshogs kyi
mchod pa'i rgyud chen po las/ tshogs kyi mchod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa'i grangs ni/ rab kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dbul bar bya'o// 'bring gis dus bzhir

dbul bar bya'o// tha mas kyang nyin lan re mtshan lan re dbul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyad thang re zhing grol thang re dang/ smin pa'i mchog re re 'grub par gsungs so// de la tshogs kyi mchod pa'i

'bras bu ni/ rgyud mtshan nyid kyi theg pa ltar dka' ba da ltar spyad nas 'bras bu phyis 'ong du re ba ma yin te/ tshogs kyi 'bras bu ni yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la sa bcu rim bgrod mi dgos te/ da lta
nyid nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni// phung po 'di nas mya ngan
'das// rigs 'dzin sa la bde bar gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun mnyes te// byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur nas// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar mdzad// chos kyi sku dang gnyis su med// ces
sangs rgyas rnams gsung ngo// de la tshogs kyi mchod pa 'dis// yun ji tsam gyis 'grub ce na// rab kyis zla ba gcig na 'grub// 'bring gis lo gcig dag na 'grub// tha mas lo gsum tshun chad du// tshogs

kyi mchod pa phul byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring// zhes gsungs so// tshogs phul ba'i yon tan ni/ 'jig rten khams 'dir yang rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i

zhal mthong bar 'gyur ba dang/ ma mo dang mkha' 'gro thams cad sprin spung bzhin du gtibs te/ ci bsgo ba'i bka' nyan cing dngos grub kyis stongs dang grogs byed cing mthu dbang phun sum tshogs par byin

te/ thams cad du bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ longs spyod thams cad 'phel ba dang/ 'khor thams cad 'du zhing nad dang duHkha mi 'byung 'jig rten gyi lha ma srin thams cad kyis kyang bka'
nyan cing byin che bar mthong ba dang/ de la gar gyi spyi gtsug ltar len pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang mig gi 'bras bu ltar mthong ste/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/

'jig rten phyi mar rigs 'dzin thams cad kyis mdun bsu ste lcang lo can gyi gnas su phyin par skyel bar 'gyur ro// tshogs ma phul ba'i skyon ni bsgrubs kyang don med cing/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang
zhal 'dzum pa mi mdzad cing// bsod nams kyi skal ba'i shas chung ste/ dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ byol song gi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po rdzogs so////
de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ de lta bu'i tshogs rgyud chen po 'di/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du snang bar 'gyur/ sems can rnams la ji ltar phan gdags par
'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di ni/ 'dod khams dang/ gzugs khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i rigs thams

cad du khyab par gyur to// dang po 'og min gyi gnas su ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa las rgyu blangs te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ thams cad chos kyi skur sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas

gzugs khams kyi lha tshogs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab bas// dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis rgyu byas te/ lha'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa la gzhi blangs te/ rgyal ba'i dkyil
'khor rab 'byam 'khor dang bcas pa la/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po phul bas/ lha'i ris 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ phung po mi gnas pa'i mya ngan 'das pas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs

rgya bar byed/ de nas drang srong rnams kyi ris la rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab pas/ drang srong rnams kyis 'byor ba'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi mchod pa

phul bas/ drang srong la sogs pa rim kyis phung po mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed do// de nas klu'i ris su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab pas/

klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pas/ klu'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod kyis/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa ma lus pa la tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ klu'i rigs
'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab ba lus ma bor bar/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur par gyur to// de nas mi'i gnas su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po

'dis khyab na yod/ mi'i gnas na snod du gyur pa dang/ rig pa cha phra mo yod pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku la gnas pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dad pa'i rgyal po dang/ bram ze dang/ go ru dang/ sha drang
dang/ bstan 'jam dang/ khyim bdag gi ris dang/ las kyi 'phro can la sogs pa rnams kyis dang du blangs te/ rgyal srid dang/ longs spyod dang/ grogs mchog tu bcas te rab tu dben pa'i gnas su/

gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs gsol te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po phul te/ 'phags pa'i zhal mngon
sum du mthong bar byas so// tshom bu grangs brgya dang/ stong la sogs pas/ pho mo'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ lus ma bor bar tshe 'di nyid la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// rgyu de la brten nas dmyal ba dang/ byol song dang/ yi dwags dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sgo bkag ste/ rim gyis bla na med pa'i lam la bkod par byed

do// gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas te/ dmyal bar ltung nges pa yang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'di gzhung bzhin du phul nas/ mnar med pa'i gnas su mi lhung ste/ bde bar 'gro ba'i gnas
su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig rtsa ba dang yan lag dam tshig nyams pa yang gzhan gyis mi skongs te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'dis skongs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig gzhan la phan gdags par
'dod na yang las gzhan gyis mi 'grub ste/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'di phul na/ gang phan gdags pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang zhig bar du gcod pa sgrol bar 'dod na yang/ rnal 'byor gyi
tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di phul na// yid la bsam bzhin du sgrol bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'jig rten 'di na bde ba dang mthu dbang phun sum tshogs par 'dod na yang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di

gzhung bzhin du phul na gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di yang/ snod ma yin pa dang/ khye'u rngam can dang/ dam la mi gnas pa dang/ brnab sems dang/
'dod pas brgyal ba rnams ni ma gtogs so// de nas sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba/ rim gy-is bla na med pa'i bsgrub pa lags na/ mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mthar rdzogs par 'gyur lags sam/

rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di/ ris tshom bu dang grangs mang bar sangs rgyas par byed na yang/ kun gyi thun mong du ma gsungs te/ dper na til mar gyi rdzas la phog
kyang sra zhing mkhregs par 'gyur na/ a tsa ka'i dog pa mgo la phog na tshal ba brgya ru 'gas par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ dam la mi gnas shing gsang sngags tshig tsam khungs phyung nas/ khengs dang/

grags pa dang/ phrag dog nyon mongs par rang rgyud du spyod pa rnams kyis spyad kyang slar nyams pa'i gzhir 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di mi'i 'jig rten khyab par 'gyur na yang/ phal cher lta

ba dang mi ldan par 'byor ba sna tshogs kyis mchod cing 'bul bar byed na yang don med pa ma yin te/ 'byor pa'i tshogs rgyas par 'gyur ba dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs skyed pa tsam las/ 'di nyid du sangs

mi rgya ba yang 'byung ngo// phal cher khungs phyung tsham dang/ 'byor ba ma tshogs par 'bul ba dag kyang yod na/ dmigs pa'i phan stobs tsam du 'gyur ba yang yod do// gang zhig dgongs pa lhun gyis grub cing lta

ba dang man ngag tu ldan pa la/ dus gsum du 'phags pa'i tshogs la/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs 'bul ba lta ci smos kyis/ slob dpon de la ka ma ra bzhes dro zhal gcig tsam drangs pa yang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs

mchod chen po phul ba dang 'dra bar skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin to// de lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di/ lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten

du mtha' spyod par 'gyur ro// mi'i 'jig rten na yang/ bskal pa bzang po dang dus dang po la ni/ rgya gar gyi yul la sogs pa la yul gyi dbus dang/ khrims dang tshul la gnas pa'i rgyal po dang/ bram ze dang/
khyim bdag gi rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyur spyad nas/ gu ru ma hA la sogs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs bshad cing bkrol/ bsrung zhing ma nyams par byas nas/ 'ga' dang 'ga' tsam las phal

cher mi spro ste/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgo nas mthar phyin cing mngon du 'grub par 'gyur/ bskal pa bar pa dang/ dus bar pa la rgyal khams ris phal cher grags te/ rig pa'i sa thob pa dang/ rgyud kyi don

la mkhas pa dang/ man ngag dang/ gnang dbang tshul bzhin thob par byas nas/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i mi mo dang/ gzhung dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang/ dad pa dang ldan pa'i pha ri ha dang/ khrims dang ldan

pa'i rgyal po dang/ blon po la sogs pa grangs kyi tshom bur bsdus te bshad cing bstan pa dang/ rtog bkrol zhing khu 'khrig dang the tshom ma zos par byas te/ gnas dben pa dang 'gol bar/ skye bo dang mi nag
yongs kyis ma 'khrigs par/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs gsol nas/ dus gsum 'phags pa'i tshogs la/ rnal 'byor gyi mchod pa chen po gzhung bzhin du phul bas/ 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i
don dus gcig tu bsgrubs te/ gzugs mi yul nas ma 'phags par sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa dang/ yongs kyis gsang zhing gsang sngags gnyan zhing spyod pa rlabs po che ma 'phrig ste/ ya ka

dang sgro skur 'debs shing gsang ba'i bka' thabs kyis smod par 'gyur/ bskal pa tha ma dang dus tha ma ni/ gang zag gi tha dad dang/ rgyal po'i bka' khrims nyams pas/ mi smad rim nas dbang che ba dang/
blon pos byas pas/ so ga nang du ltas pa dang/ rnal 'byor pa ma khrol bas bsrung mtshams las 'das shing/ gsang ba 'chol ba'i dbang gis/ mtha' 'khob dang/ snod med pa dang/ kla klo dang/ tsi ra ba'i

grong thams cad du gdal bas/ gsang sngags 'chol te chos ni kun spyod/ chos bzhin du ni gang yang mi byed/ chos ni kun la yod par byas/ rtogs ni slob dpon rang gis kyang ma rtogs/ dam tshig ni kun nod/

srun pa ni gcig kyang mi srun/ slob dpon ni kun byed/ dbang ni gang la yang med/ lad mo ni kun zlos/ nyams su ni gang gis kyang ma lon/ dbang ni kun la bskur/ chags pa ni gang la yang ma chag 'chad pa

ni kun la 'chad/ thog tu ni gang gis kyang ma phebs/ rtsom pa ni kun rtsom/ mthar gang gis kyang ma phyin pas/ phal cher sgyid lug ste/ sngags las log pa dang/ phal cher ma rtogs pas the tsom za ba dang/

phal cher ya ka dang skro skur 'debs pa dang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod 'byor pa rnams mi 'bul bar/ mi 'byor pa 'bul bar byed pas/ de'i dbang gi 'byor ba rnams kyang mnga' thang dang longs spyod bri
nas/ 'tshams chad tsam 'bul bar byed cing/ bsod nams mi thob pa dang/ phal cher 'byor pa sna tshogs gsogs te 'bul bar byed na yang/ gsang med pa dang/ grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag dus 'di
tsam nas longs spyod 'di tsam bshams te/ tshogs mchod 'bul bar byed do// zhes bsgrags pa'i dbang gyis/ gtan pa can dang// brnab sems dang// gnod sems dang/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i
skyon dang/ mkhas pa rnams mi 'chad par/ mi mkhas pa rnams che 'dod pa'i phyir 'chad pas/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bka' rgyud gsang ba'i man ngag rnams brnags te sbas zer bas/ bka' nges pa nub pa'i

skyon gyis/ phal cher nyungs kyis dogs nas/ rang bzo'i dang/ ke'u shang dang/ bsre bcol dang/ ming tshig tu bsdebs pas/ de la che bar mtshan brtags kyang rgyud la khungs med pa'i gang zag sprin du re ba'i

rang thad du gyur pas/ ngal ba'i tshad pa dang/ las brtsams pa'i gron tshogs su gyur cing grub pa'i dus ring ba dang/ phal cher ra cod dang/ gzu lums dang/ rag sha'i bsnyon thabs su byas te/ snang snang la ni
sgrol/ phrad phrad la ni sbyor/ rnyed rnyed ni za/ spyod pa 'chol ba'i dbang gis rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod du byed na yang/ dper na zangs ma gser du 'chos pa dang 'dra ste/ gser gyi dgos pa med

pa dang 'dra'o// phal cher bdag nyid kyi 'jug sgo dang/ thos phyogs dang/ 'dod btsan la/ 'di ni bzang la don nam yin la/ gzhan gyi ngan pa ma yin no/ chos nyid la phyogs ris med pa la/ phyogs dang ris

su bcad pa'i skyon dang/ 'khor dang sde ru cha phye ste/ phrag dog dang che chung gi dbang gis/ mnyam pa'i don dam la 'gal bar gnas pa dang/ phal cher theg pa'i ris so sor bzung ste/ rtsod pa'i chos shom pa'i

dus na ni/ kun gyis 'bras bu bla na med pa mi thob par/ ngan song gsum po sha stag tu ltung ba dang/ sngon gyi ston pa'i bka' nub pas/ mi tshig 'phel bas bsgrub thag ring ba dang/ dam tshig la sel shor bas

bsam pa mi 'grub cing/ bar chad rkyen 'byung ba dang/ dbang sgyur rim gyis ma bsgyur bas/ mthu byin chung ba dang/ bsgom bsgrub kyi don mthil du ma phebs pas/ drod la ma phebs pa dang/ shes pa'i rgyud ma
khrol bas/ rtogs pa ma shar ba dang/ mchod rdzas ma 'tshogs shing phud nyams pas/ dngos grub mi thob pa dang/ las dang man ngag gdeng du ma chud pas/ bar chod 'byung ba'i dus na yang/ rnal 'byor pa
'ga' zhig/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di ltar spyod cing/ dang du len nus pa rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro//// sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol
pa/ de lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud 'di la/ dam tshig gang lags/ dbang gang lags/ lta ba gang lags/ bsgrub pa gang lags/ spyod pa gang lags/ lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas lung
bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ de dag zhus pa legs so legs so// de la tshogs kyi dam tshig ni// slob dpon bdag gi srog dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srog bcad na 'chi la/
srog ma bcad na brtan zhing/ bde ba ris kyi thob pa dang 'dra bar/ slob dpon dang 'thab pa dang smos pa lta ci smos/ yengs sam bral na yang/ dge bar bar bcad cing man ngag mi thob pas/ dper na srog
dang 'jal bar lta ba dang/ rgyal theb karma la sogs pa la/ mig dang dbangapo ltar bltas te/ dper na mig dbang po nyams pa dang med pa lta ci smos kyis/ bag tsam gzer ba yang mi bzod pa dang 'dra bar/

rgyal 'theb karma ging la 'thab rtsod dang smod pa lta ci smos kyis/ bag tsam ma mnyes na yang sgrib pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang/ mched dang lcam dral yan lag dang phung po 'dra/ gang snang kun g.yo zhing sdug bsngal
mnyam par myong ba dang 'dra bar/ gnod pa tshabs po che lta ci smos kyis/ 'gal 'khrul tsam byung na yang yong mi bde zhing/ nyams pas chad pa'i rgyura'agyur bas/ sku'i dam tshig srung zhing brtse
gdung byas la/ dad pa che bar skyed la yangs par bya'o/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dgongs pa gsum ni/ dper na gtam dang/ zas dang/ gos 'dra ste/ phyi nang gtam gyis ma 'byal na/ gang yang mi 'grub

ste/ 'tsho ba zas kyis ma gsos na/ phung po mi theg/ dro ba'i gos ma gyon na nyon mongs pa dang 'dra bar/ snying po dang sngags ma bzlas na/ grub pa'i rtags mi 'ongs/ dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gsal na/

shes pa'i rgyud mi khrol/ phyag rgya dam du ma bcas na/ nyon mongs pa dang phung po gnas mi 'gyur bas/ dam du bcas te dang du blang ngo/ thugs kyi dam tshig ni gter sba ba dang 'dra'o// dper na rin po che gter

sgrom du sbas na 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med cing/ sgrom bu kha phye na 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man ngag thams cad snod ma yin pa las spangs te/ bdag gi blo la btags
na/ rtogs pa mngon du gyur nas/ 'bras bu mthar phyin par 'gyur bas/ gter dang 'dra bar dam du bca' 'o/ gtan mi 'byung ba ni ma yin te/ gtan bdag dang bu spyod pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man ngag
bdag dang bu dang 'dra ba las ma gtogs pa/ bshad pa grangs bzhi las mangs na 'gal bar gsungs so// dus tha ma la bab pa'i tshe/ rtsa ba 'di rnams mnos nas gang yang mi srun te/ sku yang nyams te 'thab

rtsod shom pa dang/ gsung yang nyams te/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin spangs te/ mdo sde bsam gtan gyi don la spyod pa dang/ thugs kyanganyams te/ brgya dang nyi shu la 'chad pa ni/ 'bras bu mnar med pa

lta ci smos kyi/ dper na seng ge khog pa nang gis nang bshig pa dang 'dra bar/ chos nyan du gang zag sngags pa rang gis mi ster te/ rang gi rang dmas so// rtsa ba'i dam tshig ma nyams na/ yan lag ljon pa dang

'dra bar skyes pa las/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ sum brgya drug cu dang/ sa ma ya 'bum sde la sogs pa'i/ gang spyad pa'i yal ga lo 'dab dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag nyams par
