gyur na/ tshogs kyi mchod pa dang/ longs spyod rdzas su phul kyang bzhes su mi gnang zhing mnyes par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la bsod nams med cing 'bras bu mi thob pa'i phyir ro// tshogs rgyud

chen po las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o//// de la tshogs rgyud chen po'i dbang la don rnam pa lnga ste/ d+har ma tan tra nyan cing 'chad pa'i dbang dang gcig/ yi dam lha bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang dang
gnyis/ dkyil 'khor gnyan po zhal blta ba'i dbang dang gsum/ tshogs kyi zhal zas la 'tshal zhing longs spyod pa'i dbang dngabazhi/ las kyi rdo rje las gang byed pa'i ming gis dbang bskur ba

dang lnga'o// de la d+har ma tan tra nyan cing 'chad pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog rnams// ston pas nges par gsungs pa'i don// nyan cing yid la 'dzin pa dang// ma 'dres
ston pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas yi dam gyi lha bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas/ bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i yi dam lha// me tog dbang gis phog pa
'di// sgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas dkyil 'khor gnyan po zhal lta ba 'di skad do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// ngur khrod 'bar ba'i rdzas bsgral nas// sku gsung thugs su
gsal bsgoms pa'i// lha zhi bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas tshogs kyi zhal zas la 'tshal zhing longs spyad pa'i dbang 'di skad do// rgyal bas mchod pas bgegs zhi zhing// mchod pa phul bas bgegs

zhi nas// pha pham longs spyod bdud rtsi'i bcud// rnal 'byor tshogs la longs spyod shog/ de nas las kyi rdo rje las gang byed pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang// 'phrin las
drag dal gang byed pa// las rnams che ge byed par shog/ rdo rje dbang gi ming thob shog/ tshogs rgyud chen po las/ dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas tshogs kyi lta ba la don rnam pa lnga ste/

tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du lta ba dang/ 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod du lta ba dang/ mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba dang/ dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba dang/ rtogs pa thams cad

gzhal yas khang du lta ba'o// de la tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du lta ba la/ rdo rje slob dpon dang mched lcam dral tshogs pa dang/ rdo rje slob dpon dkyil yin la/ mched lcam dral 'khor yin par lta

ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad dgongs spyod gcig tu rgya mtsho gling gi dkyil 'khor du rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'o// dam rdzas tshogs pa thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor te/ byang chub sems ni dkyil

yin la/ dam rdzas gzhan ni 'khor yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde ba chen po'i don la/ skye shi med pa dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'o// rdzas dang lag cha tshogs pa thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor te/ ban d+ha

bde bar gshegs pa'i don la/ skye shi med pa dkyil 'khor yin pas/ dur khrod kyi chas brgyad gzhan ni 'khor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i rol pa chen pos rnam par rtog pa thams cad chos
nyid du lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin no// de la 'byor ba thams cad longs spyod du lta ba ni/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang/ nang bcud kyi 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi tshogs kyi longs spyod du byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus su/ byol song thams cad kyis lus tshogs su phul ba dang/ gshin rje thams cad kyis sha chen tshogs su phul ba dang/ ma mo dang mkha'

'gro yis khrag dang snum chen tshogs su phul ba dang/ srin po thams cad kyis thod rus dang 'bru mar tshogs su phul ba dang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis 'dza' gad rnam pa tshogs pa tshogs su phul ba dang/ ma mo klu

rnams kyis snying po rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshogs su phul ba dang/ byol song rnams kyis 'o ma rnam pa sna tshogs su phul ba dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams kyis shing thog sna tshogs su phul ba dang/ sman gyi lhas sman sna

tshogs su 'bul ba dang/ rtsi'i lha mos rtsi sman sna tshogs su 'bul ba dang/ nam mkha' lding gis spos sna tshogs 'bul ba dang/ sa bdag rnams kyis 'bru sna tshogs pa tshogs su 'bul ba dang// mi rnams kyis

mi'i zhal zas su sna tshogs pa tshogs su 'bul ba dang/ lha rnams kyis rin po che sna tshogs pa dang/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ lha'i 'od dod pa longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs
pa/ tshogs su 'bul ba la sogs pa thams cad/ dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi longs spyod chen por byin gyis brlabs te gsol/ gzhan yang 'grangs shing tshim par

mdzad de/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mngon sum du bkod pas/ 'byor pa thams cad tshogs kyi longs spyod du lta'o// de la mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba ni/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad thugs

yang dag pa'i ye shes chen po'i ngang las byung ste/ bar chod pas thugs dam bskul/ dngos grub nod/ slar 'dus pas sgrib pa sbyangs/ dngos grub thob ste/ lha la lha thims/ ye shes la ye shes rol/ chos nyid
ma chos nyid thim ste/ bar ma chod pas bdag gi sems dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes mnyam zhing dbyer med par mchod pa phul/ slar 'dus pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang/

bdag gi sems mnyam zhing dbyer med de/ ye shes kyi mchod pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyun/ bdud rtsi'i ro bzhin byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la/ rgyal ba'i cho 'brang zer dang ye shes la spyod pa mdzad pas/ mchod

pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba'o// dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba ni/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la rgyal ba'i ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la dmigs la/ yang phung po dang/ khams
dang/ skye mched dang/ rnam par shes pa nyid lha rgyud du snang ba las ma gtogs pa/ gzhan gud na med par rtogs pa'i lta bas rtogs par byas la/ ji ltar gnam ri sa brag thams cad 'byung ba

ltar bsdus la/ skye 'gro thams cad 'byung ba lnga dang phung po lngar bsdus la/ 'byung ba lnga dang phung po thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yang yin la/ rtogs pa'i lta bas rtogs par byas la/

ting nge 'dzin gyis yang bsgoms te/ mdun dang shar rdo rje rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo dang/ zhing khams dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ g.yas dang lho thams cad rin chen rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo'i zhing khams

dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ rgyab dang nub thams cad pad+ma rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo'i zhing khams dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ g.yon dang byang thams cad las kyi rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo'i zhing khams dang/

pho brang gi rang bzhin/ steng dang nam mkha' sku thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi lha dang/ lha mo'i zhing khams dang/ pho brang gi rang bzhin/ sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/

zhing khams dang/ pho brang dang/ dkyil 'khor lha rgyud kyi rang bzhin du rtogs par byas la yid kyis dmigs la/ dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba'o// rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba ni/ phyi

nang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa thams cad 'byung ba lngas bsdus la/ 'byung ba lnga po nyid yul chen mo lnga'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ dpag cing gzhal ba las
'das pa'i gzhal yas khang yin pa las/ de ltar du ma rtogs na gzhan nas gzhal yas khang gnyan ris su bcad pa med pas/ rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba'o// tshogs rgyud chen po las lta

ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas tshogs kyi bsgrub pa lnga yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ sku'i sgrub pa dang/ gsung gi bsgrub pa dang/ thugs kyi bsgrub pa dang/ yon tan gyi sgrub pa dang/ 'phrin las kyi sgrub pa

gang byed kyang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyis sgrub dgos te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs 'di ni lan tshwa dang 'dra ste/ gang la yang mi tshang du mi rung ste/ sku'i sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la tshogs kyi mchod pa

gzhung bzhin du phul na/ sku'i sgrub pa yang 'grub cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ gsung dang thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyang/ de bzhin du gang sgrub pa tshogs kyis grub pa'o// de'i don ni gzhung du ma

dag las rgya cher 'byung ngo// tshogs rgyud chen po las/ sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas tshogs kyi longs spyod pa la yang don rnam pa gsum ste/ tshogs kyi spyod pa thabs dang shes rab tu spyod pa dang/
tshogs kyi spyod pa spong len med par spyod pa dang/ tshogs kyi spyod pa 'ching grol med par spyod pa'o//// de la tshogs kyi spyod pa thabs dang shes rab tu spyod pani// yo ga phyi pa man chod kyi

sgor zhugs pa/ tshogs mchod lha ci smos kyi/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gang la yang skyon lta ba'i nang nas kyang/ thabs dang shes rab la 'ching bas bshal thag gtad pa ste/ rdo rje theg pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i
gnas skabs na/ thams cad thabs dang shes rab dbyings dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin pas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pa thams cad la/ ma spangs par 'jol nyog tu spyod pa ma zad/ de nyid chos nyid dag

pa'i rgyan du rig nas/ dga' bde longs spyod pa nyid kyi/ gnyis su med pa chos kyi chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba'o// de la tshogs kyi spyod pas spong len med par spyod pa ni// yo ga phyi pa man chad kyis 'di
gtsang ma rigs yin te 'phags pa mchod rgyu yin la// 'di mi gtsang ba dang sme ba yin pas 'phags pa mchod rgyu ma yin zhes// spong len du spyod pa ma yin// chos la bdag med ba'i bzhin la// rnam bar

rtogs pa'i ming yang med pas// gtsang ma yang lha yi zhal zas yin la// mi gtsang ba yang lha yi zhal zas// gnyis su med pa nyid 'phags pa'i dgongs spyod dang// 'phags pa'i skur sgrub pas// gang la yang

'di 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyu yin pas spong ngo// 'di thar pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba'i rgyu yin zhes dang du mi len te// spong len med pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa yin na// tshogs kyi spyod pa 'ching

grol med par spyod pa na// 'dod pa'i yon tan rna pa sna tshogs pa las// chags tsam na chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pas// 'khor ba dang nyon mongs pas 'ching ba med pa// de nyid rtogs pa'i rgyan du rig

cing// chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin pas// de ltar spyod pa grol ba yang med// 'ching ba yang med do// tshogs rgyu chen po las// spyod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas de skad bka'
stsal pas// rigs lnga yab yum dang// 'khor sems dpa' dang// sems ma dang// khro bo dang// khro mo dang// sprul pa dang// yang sprul pa dang// ci bgyis pa dang// bka' nyan dang// dam la btags pa'i
'khor thams cad kyis// dgyes pa chen po tshogs kyi longs spyod du bstar nas// thams cad gnyis su med pa chos kyi skur lhun gyis grub par bzhugs so// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po rdzogs

so//// 'di'i rgyud phyi ma 'di 'gyur ro// gsang ba dasum gyi phub tu// snub sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches// skad bsgyur gyis yang bcos te// stong tshab byang chub rin po che la btsas su bzhag pa'o// mya nga
ha ta pa ri las// 'phags pa rgya mtsho yis bris// bkor du mi 'tshal ba'i rgyud gsum bzhug so// rgya gar skad du// badzra a mri ta tan tra// bod skad du/ rdo rje bdud
rtsi'i rgyud// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs kyi snying po rdo rje

bdud rtsi gsang ba'i pad+ma la bzhugs so// mA ma ki sogs thabs gcig tu// grong du bcom ldan rdo rje rol// de la lha mo des zhus pa// gsang ba la ni rnam gnas pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi chog/ sngon du lha
khyod kyis gsung ba// bdud rtsi mchog ni sgrub pa'i thabs// dpa' bo chen pos bshang du gsol// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di skad gsungs// bsam gyis mi khyab zab pas phyir mi

phung// don yod dbang po bral ba dang// mchog tu zhi ba rnam dag pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi brdzod pa yin// de las bcom ldanardo rje yis// mA ma kil chags ldan pas// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba

mngon du mdzad pa'o// rgyung rnams kun tu gsang ba yi// ye shes rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// dam du 'khyung dang 'o byed dang// dka' ba'i rol pa mnyam sbyor dang// glu gar rol

mo'i sgra rnams kyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog/ de ltar myur bar 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi khu ba zhes gsungs te// de las 'gro ba gsum skyes pa// de nyid kyi ni bgrub pa bshad// khyod kyi dga' phyir
bzhin bzang ma// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// de ni nga yis brdzod kyis nyon// sems can kun la phan don du// sbyor ba'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ rnal 'byor gang gis shes 'gyur na// 'khor ba'i

bcings las myur bar grol// bstan du med cing ye shes che// dngos grub 'jig rten gsum pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi grub don du// 'grub pa po ni bde ba spyod// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje bdud

rtsi dbyung bar bya// b+ha ga'i pad mar 'o bya zhing// bdag mos rdo rje 'o bya ba// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rje de gsungs so// b+ha ga'i pad mar 'o byas pas// de tshe dga' ba'i lha mo des// rdo rje
bdud rtsi las byung ba'i// nyams dga' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhus// cho ga'i rim pa gang gis ni// mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsams par bya// de la mchod pa ji lta bu// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar

lags// dga' ba chen po rnyed dka' ba// rab tu dgyes nas bka' stsal 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// 'o mdzad pas ni mnyes 'gyur te// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don
dang// 'khor ba'i rgyu mchog bsgral ba'i phyir// dga' ba chen po sbyor ba yis// mA ma kis ni 'dir dris pa// bzhad nas 'di skad bka' stsal to// zur gsum dkyil 'khor bris nas su// gsang

ba'i 'dab ma mA ma ki/ snying po gsang ba'i spyod yul gyi// pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bya// de dbus khyod dang nga yod de// gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yas pa dkar po ru ni

brjod// g.yon du dmar por rab tu gsungs// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang// lha yi na bza'i me tog 'phreng// lha yi dri yis byug pa dang// lha yi dngos grub zhi byed pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// phyi
rol du ni nag po ste// g.yas pa sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ shar du khro gnyer ma bzhag ste// lhor ni 'jigs 'jigs byed ma// nub tu rta yi gzugs can ma// byang du tshogs kyi 'dren ma mo// mkhas

pas pad ma 'dab brgyad la// rig ma brgyad ni mnyam por bri// zhi ba dang ni zhi zhal ma// zla ba mo dang ri bong can// ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor ma// ri bong can 'dri shes rab ma// yid la 'dod par byed pa

dang// dge ba rig ma brgyad mnyam bri// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug ma// sna tshogs gzugs ma yid dga' ma// phyogs rnams dang ni mtshams rnams su// rtag pa ru ni bri bar bya// mchod pa gling bu rnga de

bzhin// de bzhin spos dang me tog sogs// dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa yis// dka' ba'i rol pa spyod pa yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// ma dang chung ma bu mo

dang// sring mo snying mo de bzhin de// rdo rje bdud rtsi de dag las// blangs nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod// ma lus bdud rtsi blangs pas ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi dang mnyam 'gyur// sring mo na med na so
gzhon// bu mo yis ni 'di kun sbyong// gnyen mtshams kyis ni don yod grub// dkyil 'khor gsang bar 'dod par bya// lce ni dril bar byas nas su// kha yi pad mar blang bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba

che// de nas myur bar 'grub par 'gyur// bung ba rtse ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med thams cad 'dod pa spyad// 'khyog dang brla sha bskyang ba dang// lang tsho shin tu rgyas pa yi// byed pa'i bcings pa'i sbyor ba

yis// gnas gsum dag gis bsgrub par bya// sha chen dang ni khrag chen dang// de bzhin bshang gci khu ba dang// de dag rdo rje bdud rtsi lnga// nyin dang mtshan du bsgrub par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gal
te dngos grub bdag 'dod na// de yis don rnams thams cad ni// bsgrub pa pos ni mchog tu bsgrub// dbang dang dgug dang zhe sdang dang// gsod dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen
pos// bya ba thams cad kun tu bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje bdud rtsis de skad gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje can/ rdo

rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas lha mo mA ma kis// pad ma sngon po de dgyed nas// dam por 'khyud pa byas nas su// dbang po
kun la 'o mdzad cing// ma mchu so yis bzung nas ni// si zhes bya ba'i sngags brdzod do// de nas rdo rje bzhad mdzad nas// rdo rje bcings pas sgra bzung bas// pad mar rdo rje bcug nas su// chags pa'i

chags pas 'dod chags mdzad// si zhes bya ba'i sgra snyan dang// khu byug dang ni bung ba'i sgras// lha mo dag par 'dod spyod cing// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// nu ma gnyis ni mnyed par mdzad// sen mo'i ri
mos 'debs mdzad cing// de yang gos ni phud mdzad de// steng dang 'og tu gzigs par mdzad// pad ma sdom por sro mdzad cing// dkyil ba'i tshig kyang brdzod par mdzad// sbom po'i pad ma mA ma ki/ lha mo

chen mo legs so legs// shin tu 'dod la chags pa yis// yid 'ong khyod kyis nga mnyes pas// gang zhig 'dod pa rab tu myos// mchog kyang khyod la ci zhig sbyin// de nas lha mo mA ma kis// tshig 'di dag ni
ched du gsol// bcom ldan bdag gi de nyid ni// byang chub sems kyi rnam sprul ba// 'phra bas shin tu 'phra ba yi// zag med ye shes ji ltar rol// de lus dbang gis spyod par 'gyur// de la the tshom pa

dang// bdag ni ngo mtshar mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje 'di gsungs te// nyon cig de nyid mA ma ki/ ye shes sbyor bas sang byed pa// shin tu 'phra bas gsang chen po// ye

shes shes bya'i ngo bo nyid// de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// rtag tu zag med zag med pa// thog ma med cing thog ma sangs// yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid// dbang po dang

bcas dbang po med// 'byung ba kun tu ma mthong ba// sbyor ba'i lam gyis mthong ba yi// sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// phyi dang nang du gnas pa'o// phyi ni gzugs kyi phung po sogs// 'byung ba'i rnam pa

kun rdzob ste// nang gi lha yi sbyor ba ni// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo rnam par gnas// sna tshogs g.yo dang mi g.yo ba// khams gsum la ni ma g.yos par// de gcig pus ni khyad par te// rnam bar shes pa thams cad
ni// gang phyir sems can bdag nyid bdag/ rnam par shes pa'i phung por gnas// skyes pa'i tha ma sems rmongs pa// 'gas kyang rab tu mi rtogs so// sems dang sems byung sems kyi gzugs// ye shes
rnam par shes pa pos// bya ba rnam la byed pa nyid// chos rnams kyis ni chos can bsgom// gang phyir chos rnams mang po yis// chu rgyun bzhin du rgya mtsho la// thar pa gcig tu kho nas 'gyur// mang

po nyid ni mi skye ste// ji ltar de nyid mi gnas pa// bla ma'i zhal las thos par 'gyur// b+ha ga'i nang du nam mkha' gang// nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste// snying po ze ba rnam ldan zhing// 'dab ma brgyad kyis

rnam par brgyan// de dbus rdo rje can bzhugs te// byang sems bdud rtsi dang yang ldan// cha dang cha med rnam grol ba// thig le ma mo rnam par sangs// der gnas rtag tu zag pa ni// bdud rtsi byang chub sems

kyis gzugs// khams gsum kun gyi gnas yin te// steng dang 'og tu'ang rnam par khyab// des ni mthong dang thos pa dang// bsnam pa ngang ni brgyangs pa dang// reg dang bde ba'i longs spyon ni// zas dang me

tog 'phreng ba dang// rgyan dang gos kyis rab brgyan te// ngag gi sna tshogs grags pa yang// bla ma dang ni gzung ba rnams// rol dang kun tu 'gro ba dang// 'dug dang de bzhin nyal ba dang// sad pa dang ni

log pa dang// thams cad rmi lam mthong pa dag// gzhar dang de bzhin cho nge dang// shin tu yid 'phrog gar dang ni// rnga rnams kyang ni brdungs pa ste// sna tshogs skang ni brjod pa dang// smyon pa dang ni smyos pa
yi/ gzugs dang gti mug 'dod chags de nyid ni// gzugs med mang po'i gzugs can te// pho dang mo dang ma ning rnams// du ma'i gzugs can kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs ni nor bu bzhin// khyab

dang khyab byed dngos po yis// de nyid dam pa rnam par gnas// bdag mo de yi de nyid ni// bzlas med 'dzin pa'ang yod ma yin// bgrang 'phreng ba ni gang yang med// bgrang 'phreng ba yang mi bya'o// b+ha ga'i

pad mar mchod par bya// mkhas pas bdud rtsi bza' bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de yis de nyid grub par 'gyur// gang de bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// b+ha ga'i dbyings su rnam par gnas// rtsa gzhan
sum cu rtsa gnyis la// de yi dbus su gtso bo de// de dag las gzhan shin tu mchog/ rtsa dgu dag ni rnam par gnas// sgo dgu la gnas rig ma dag/ sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya// de dag gsang chen mchog
rab ni// zhal bzangs ma skye sbyor bar bshad// sna tshogs rnam snang mdzad sogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes te// shin tu dga' ba'i yid bde bas// sbyor ba dam par bstan pa'i sa// gsang ba'i pad

ma mthong pas na// shin tu sbom po mA ma ki/ de phyir rdo rje bdud rtsi yi// bde chen de nyid bdag gis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde
ba chen po'o rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen po las// de kho na nyid sbyor ba'i ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas mgu ba'i lha mo des// ha ra nu phur gyis brgyan te// 'di
dag dbyangs kyis bskul nas ni// sems dpa' chen po dgyes par byed// spung mdzad rdo rje bde chen pas// bdag gis dam pa'i don 'tshal lags// b+ha ga'i pad mar bde ba chen po ste// rdo rje'i don de bde

ba chen po lags// khu byug dang ni skad phrad dang// rol mo skad drug grangs dang ni// sna tshogs thun mong rnam dag ni// snyan pa'i sgra yis blang bar bya// 'dis ni glu ni len pa dang// dga' ba'i bde ba byed

rnams kyis// rdo rje can bdud rtsi bde ba che// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pas// de nyid kyis ni the tshom bcad// rdo rje can khyod bka' drin bdag/ ye shes kyis

ni bya ba byas// shin tu chags pas bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje bdud rtsi byung ba 'di// rdo rje theg pa 'byung ba yi// sbyor ba bdag gis bstan lags kyang// sngags dang phyag rgya byed pa la// nga rung bdag la the tshom

mchis// ji ltar phyag rgya yang dag 'byung// de dag sngags ni ji ltar lags// sngags rnams gang las skyes pa lags// khyad par du ni lha rnams kyang// lha de bdag gi the tshom 'tshal// mdor na de ni bdag la

gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'di gsungs// phyag rgya sngags dag 'byung ba ni// bshad do nyon cig mA ma ki/ phyag rgya rnam pa gsum gsungs te// sku dang gsung dang thugs las

'byung// skus ni lag pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// gsung gi phyag rgya sngags mtshan nyid// thugs ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste// bsam gtan ri mo gnyis med gnas// rdo rje bdudartsi rgyud chen la// lag pa'i phyag rgya

rnams spangs la// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya rtag shes bya// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mi bri'o// lha yi lha mo bud med do// dbang po thams cad bde ba ru// b+ha ga'i pad mar mchod pa bya// rdo rje pad mor mnyam sbyor

zhing// las rnams thams cad 'grub par bya// ji ltar dpag bsam shing chen gyi// yal ga phyag rgya stong ldan pa'i// rtsa ba de las bzung nas ni// skyes pa'i skyen du gyur pa bzhin// de ltar bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i

rtsa// sngags dang phyag rgya yum yin te// sngags rnams kyis ni skyong byed do// b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas pa 'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje gtsug nas mA ma ki/ nyin gcig

sngags rnams mtshan nyid na// dang po rnam par snang mdzang sbyor// badzra a mr-i ta mahA su kha/ sa bon bzhi dang mnyam ldan la// sba yi yi ge yang sbyar ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi snying po ni// 'dod ba thams cad rab bsgrub
pa// sdig pa dag ni thams cad 'dag/ ngan 'gro rnams la snying rje skye// yang ni rnam par snang mdzad spyan// gnyis pa dang ni bzhi pa la// bzhi pa'i sa ni mnyam ldan pa// mA ma ki yi snying po

mchog/ brgyad dag kho na'i dbus su gang// brgyad la brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// 'dab brgyad la ni sbyor byas te// lha mo rnams kyi sngags bsdu 'o// sgo sngags dag gi sngags rnams ni// nyon cig skal bzang

mA ma ki/ sde tshan mtha' yi sngags btus te// sa bon brgyad kyis sngags rigs pas// stong pa'i lha yis non byas te// rnam par snang mdzad dang ldan ma// swA hA yi ge mnyam por ldan// dngos grub thams cad

rab 'byon ma// bzhi ni sgo bsrungs bzhi yin te// bzhi ni me tog spos me sogs// ma ning yi ge grwa bzhi la// swAhA rnam par snang mdzad kyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mA ma ki/ rol mo'i sgra ni kun gyis

mchod// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje can/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen
po las/ sngags 'byung ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas sbyin sreg las dag gis// cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// rnam 'byor rgyud kyi cho ga las// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub pa

yis// zhi ba dang ni rgya pa'i las// de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang// zhe sdang skad dang de bzhin du// sngags dang phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa rnams// de kun bdag gis bshad par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdud rtsi
'byung// rdo rje sems dpa'i gying byed ba// rkun rten bcas pas gnyis gnas pa// thams cad brgyad pa kyis brgyan pa'i// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal 'gyur na// rkang
pa g.yas pa brkyang bar bya// g.yon brkyang ba yang skyin par bya// rkang mnyam sna tshogs thams cad kyis// sa ni yang dag sbyar bar bya// sa la reg 'jam skyes phyir dang// de nas bdud dang lus srul

po// bgegs rnams kyang ni bskrad par bya// gzhan yang lus srul po la sogs// gong du bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// phyi nang dang por dgug par bya// oM e h+ya hi ma hA de ba spri to be lo ka ma re sarba ra ta na su sang

bu// de bA la ka ra pu shi te// ha ra nu su ra nir g+ho sho badzra swa ra pra shu dza te// gri hi tra ru ma ma rga hom karma du d+ha ye ra hri hi hi ha swA hA// bshang gci khrag dag khu ba yis// dkyil 'khor sa la gtor bar
bya// bdud spos nye bar bya ba'i phyir// sha chen gyis ni dbul bar bya// de nas rigs ma 'jug par bya// gdol pa mo dang g.yung ba mo// gar mkhan mo dang bram ze mo// rgyal rigs ma dang rje'u rigs
ma// dmangs mo rgyal rigs dus ma ni// dri dang spos kyis mchod byas te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// yan lag lnga la yi ge hri// b+ha ga'i dbus su yi ge nu// spyan ma sgrol ma gos dkar

sogs// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// b+ha ga'i dbus su slob dpon gyis// me tog dor la bskur bar bya'o// de nas sngags pas hom khung ni// tshang mar kun tu bri bya ste// zhi la zlum por bri ba ste// khru gang

tsam du thig gdab bo// khru phyed sa la brkos nas su// dkar rtsi mtshon gyis byugs par bya// kun tu 'khor lo tshul ltar yang// ngos su mnyam por bri ba'o// rgyas pa la ni khru gang brko bar bya// thams cad kyi ni

khru bzhi ste// mugs mtshal dang btsag gis bri ba'o// mngon spyod la ni zur gsum ste// sor ni nyi shu yangs pa'i tshad// nyi shu phyed ni brko byas nas// dbusasu rdo rje rgya gram yang// 'phreng ba'i 'phreng gis dkris

pa bri// de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa la// zla gam yang dag bri ba 'o// hom khung yang dag bstan nas su// phyogs kyi cha yang bstan par bya// byang du mngon par kha bltas te// sngags pas zhi ba'i las brtsam

bya// rgyas pa la ni rtag tu shar// mngon spyod la ni lho ru ste// nub tu dbang ni nyid du brjod// dgug dang bskrad dang de bzhin no// mngon spyod rtag par nag po ste// mtshon sna lnga yis dbang sogs bya// 'bras

dang til dang 'o ma dang// mar dang sbrang rtsi ldan cig par// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// zhi ba rgyas par sbyin sreg bya// mnyam pa'i shing dang du ba dang// 'o ma'i shing dang dri zhim dri// bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs
dbul// gtor ma 'byung po thams cad la// gtor ma gang zhig bsgrub pa pos// he ru ka yi phyag rgyas sbyin// gang zhig cung zad yid 'dod pa// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// ston gyis dus na zhi ba

ste// rgyas pa de bzhin dgun gyi dus// dpyid ka mngon spyod las rnams ni// sgrub pa por ni thams cad sbyin// rgyas pa de bzhin srod la ste// nyi ma phyed la'am nam phyed na// rtag par mngon spyod bya ba 'o// hom

khung dbus su yi dam lha// yi ge hUM gis bskyed nas su// zhal ni gdangs pa bsam bya ste// sbyin sreg de la dbul bar bya// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag phul gyur na// mngon du mngon sum kho nar 'gyur// dang po me

ni dgug bya ba// lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa nyid// 'od zer 'phreng 'khrugs drag po'i lha// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa/ auM me h+ye hi// tra ya ma ba sh+ya b+ha su ta k+Sha si d+ha hre lo kya shu dza ta bra bi/ Sha na ma kri

tang gri hi swa ma tra yi dang marga pa nyA tra// bya sa badzra ni// hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dang po la ni mchod yon dbul// phyis ni lha bshos me tog dbul// lha yi me tog shin tu dmar// dri zhim shin tu mdzes pa yi// me
tog de ring bzhes nas su// 'di la byin gyis brlabs par mdzad// hUM me tog gi sngags so// mar me 'od zer 'bar ba ni// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa 'joms byed pa// lha yi mig 'byed bkra
shis pa// mar me khyod kyis bzhes su gsol// hUM mar me'i sngags so// tsan dan ga pur bcas pa yi// dri zhim spos me tog bdun pa ni// mthu dang bcas pas byed pa'i spos// khyed kyis bzhes nas byin rlabs

mdzad// hUM spos kyi sngags so// sna tshaugs lha yi dri zhim pa// sna tshogs ga pur rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs yi ga hUM las byung// dri ni bzhes nas byin gyis brlabs par mdzad// hUM hUM yi sngags so// dang por

mchod pa'i tshogs ni// the tshom med par me la bya// phyis ni rang gi yi dam lha// sngags kyi bzlas brjod rig par bya// dbyangs dang gar dang zas rnams kyis// rnam pa du mas rol byas te// rim par sgrub pa po
nyid dang// tshogs la mchod pas mnyes par bya// gal te dngos grub bdag 'dod na// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub pa'o// 'dis ni mar dang bdug spos dang// ras ni gnas su dbul bar bya// rtse lnga ba yi me
mchog ste// bdag 'dod na/ rtse gsum pa ni 'breng du brjod// 'bar ba'i rtse mo du ba dkar// g.yas su 'khor ba don grub bcas// me lha bla ma rdo rje 'dzin// mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar

bya// oM// me yi lha ni grub par mdzad// sems can thams cad bde ba 'dren// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don du// lha rnams las ni rjes su bskyob// ye shes zhi ba gshegs nas su// sa gzhi zhi bar rab mdzod
cig/ rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas pa yi// bsgrub pa po dang thams cad dang// bdag gi bsod nams 'bras 'gyur dang// sngags kyi dngos grub rab gsol cig/ a A i I u U+-i r-i rA l-i l-I e A+ai o o a hUM na

swA hA/ hUM/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rje de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje can/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun chen
po las/ sbyin sreg cho ga bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyud chen po rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du// bruM a nu ma hA pra ban ta// bod skad du// gnas lung chen po bstan pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhi khro 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag
'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang pos/ thams cad du 'og min pa'i steng phyogs na/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba dang/ ngan song las sgrol ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs cad du 'og zer gyi dra ba phyogs bcur bkye ste/ sems can thams cadakyi lus ngag yid gsum la khyab pas de dag thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang/
ma rtogs pa dang/ ma ldan pa'i rtogs pa thams cad mun sros pa'i nam mkha' la ye shes kyi nyi ma shar ba bzhin/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas/ rtog pa'i bag chags brtas pa'i sems can/ nga bdag dang bdag
tu phyogs ris su rtogs pa'i dbang gis khams gsum du 'khor zhing/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyur gyur pa rnams la/ thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rje chen pos/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i chos dngos po can las/
mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can las/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos dngos po med pa snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sku dang/ gsal la mi rtog pa'i ye shes ye nas gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su bsgral
ba'i thugs ye shes kyi rang gnas yin parabyin gyis brlabs so// de yang 'phral du brlabs pa ma yin te/ dper na me long g.yas gos pa phyis pa bzhis/ chos thams cad ye dang po nas/ byang chub sems bde

ba chen po'i snying po/ ye nas ma bcos pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par thams cad du/ sangs rgyas par rgyas bar rtag pa'i nges don dang/ gsang sngags che ba'i rkyen gyis byin gyis brlabs khyad par du kun tu

bzang por grub par mdzad do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang srid thams cad chos nyid kyi gnas yin la/ rang rig pa'i ye shes ni chos nyid kyi ston pa yin pa la/ skye 'gro thams cad ni chos nyid bde ba chen por

bsgral ba ni/ 'khor ba chos nyid yin la/ rnam rtog thams cad ye shes la/ sdug bsngal thams cad byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/ de ltar bu'i theg pa 'di/ dper na shong yangs che chung gis nam mkha' yangs pa
kun la shongs pa dang 'ad bar/ theg pa thams cad las gong du 'phags pa 'am/ theg pa thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pas/ kun gyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir/ 'di'i nang du ma 'dus pa gang yang med

pas/ theg pa thams cad 'di'i 'khor du 'dus pas/ theg pa gang dang yang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir/ dang po rnal 'byor gyi gnas gzhung dang mthun zhing tshul dang ldan pa btsal ba dang/ de yang sems ma skyes
pa'i dbyings ye nas rnam par dag pa shes na/ gnas btsal kyang mi dgos/ rnyed cing yod na yang mi 'gal ba dang/ de lta bu'i gnas su las dang bya ba gzhung nas byung ba kun bya'o// de yang kun

gzhi'i kun tu bzang po bzang ngan spong len med par rtogs na/ las dang bya ba byas kyang mi 'gal// ma byas kyang ni dgos so// de ltar las dang bya ba gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin byas pa'i sar gnas gsang
ba'i dkyil 'khor zhi khro 'bar ba'i gzugs brnyan bri ba yang go rim ma nor bar bri zhing/ bzhengs su gsol lo// de yang phyogs thams cad ni dkyil 'khor/ 'byor pa thams cad ni lha rgyud/ snang ba thams

cad ni rang gnas/ rtog pa thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin par yid ches shing mthar phyin na dkyil 'khor bya ba yang mi dgos la/ byas kyang mi 'gal lo// de ltar gzhung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bris
pa der mtshams bcad par byas te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po yid la bkram nas/ phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ril dug gsum gyi dbang gis snang

ba'i skye 'gro dang/ rdo shing sa brag la sogs pa'i zung du thams cad kyang/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i khro bo chen po'i rang bzhin can yin la/ 'di dag blta bas kyang thugs su chud par blta la/ ril khro bo'i rang

bzhin du bsgoms la/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang/ khro bo chen po'i sku rags par bsgoms shing gsal bas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la nga dang bdag tu blta ba'i rtog pa 'jom pa dang/ sems skye shi

med pa las/ rnam par rtog pas skyes shing snang ba'i bag chags thams cad spyod ngo// 'di las khro chen zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur pas/ smad lcags phur zur gsum gyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
dbus su/ phyogs mtshams steng 'og gi phyogs dang dregs pa can pho mo bsnol mar mnan te/ btab pas 'jig rten na gnod pa'i bar chad dang/ mi mthun pa'i bgegs kyi phyogs zil gyis mnan par

bya'o// de yang phyi thams cad ni ye nas sems nyid kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang/ ye phyi mo nas sangs rgyas pa'i bzhugs gnas yin par rtogs pa mthar phyin la/ nang thams

cad kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po// bzang ngan spong len gyi dpung gnyen med cing/ yod med rtag chad kyi mtha' las 'das/ rgyu rkyen las ma ltos pa ye nas sangs rgyas pa/ gnyen po dang thabs kyis ma
bcun par yon tan gyi 'bras bu lhun gyis grub par/ dngos por mi snang bar rtogs par gsal zhing rig pa rang shar ba/ chad pa ma yin par mtshan ma med cing/ gnyen po gang gis kyang mi zin par/ nor bu
rin po che ltar 'dod pa bsgyur du btub pas/ don gyi nges tshig las rtags kyi 'bras bu rang la rang shar bas/ dper na 'dzam bu gser gling du phyin pa ltar gyur na/ mtshams bcad kyang a ti la
mi dgos/ ma bcad kyang mi 'gal lo// de ci'i phyin zhe na/ don rtogs pas mi dgos// khog shong yangs che bas gang yang rtogs pa med do// de yang mtshams bcad pa 'di ltar bcad do// hUM// rang bzhin dag
pa'i ngo bo la// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis med kyang// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// sgrib pas sa 'phangs dma' ba dang// sems kyis rtog pas 'ching ba

dang// gzhi stong ci la'ang bar chad byed// sems kyi de nyid ma rtogs pas// ji ltar bshad kyang mi go bas// 'di ru 'dug pa'i skal med pas// sa phyogs gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// lung chen 'di las khyed ma
'da'// gsang ba 'di las khyed 'das na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// zhal nas gsungs pa'i chos kun la// bka' bcag pas kyang 'di nyams thu// ma 'da' rang rang gnas su dengs// sa ma

ya ka pa tsa ra rag sha hUM phaT// byang chub sems kyi klong bdal bas// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin la// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// lha yang med cing 'dre yang med// 'khor ba med cing myang 'das
med// ngan song med cing mtho ris med// rdzogs khyab rang byung ye shes la// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang// 'di la gzung cing bsad du med// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal to// zhes bya ste// de lta bu'i mtshams kyis gnas kyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas stod par bya ste// yi ge rnam pa gsum gyis sgrib pa sbyang nas// lung gi 'phro 'du rnam pa gsum gyis// thugs rje sprul
pa'i gnas su sgrib pa sbyangs nas// rtog med chos kyi dbyings la bzhugs gnas bcas nas// rtog 'joms khro rgyal matams kyi dbang 'di yang bskur ro// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kyi// lha dang lha mo'i
dkyil 'khor yin// khro rgyal mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// che ge rtog 'joms dbang bskur ro// 'di zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i sras// 'khor ba ngan song lta bas bsal// rnam par rtog pa dgongs pas
bcom// rang rig ye shes lung gis bstan// rnam par mi rtog chos nyid gnas// sngar 'das sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin// rnal 'byor rdo rje che ge nyid// rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa mdzad// sngon gyi de
bzhin dbang gnas mchog/ ces gnas rim cig bstod// dbang rim cig bskur nas// 'dis kyang 'khor pa sa 'das nas sangs mi rgyas pa'i dbang med do// zhes kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de yan
chad khro rgyal mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor cig rdzogs so//// de bzhin du ye nas gnas sangs rgyas pa'i gnas su// de ltar rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas// mtshams bcad pa'i phyin

ci log gis bslad pa'i gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa rnams ni/ 'khor ba'i bgegs chen po yin la// 'di dag kyang bdag gi rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis sbyong zhing/ de dag thams cad rang gi sems snying po byang chub kyi

rang bzhin yin par rtogs nas/ rdul phra rab tsam yang dngos grub kyi bar chad byed pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i bgegs ming yang med par byas nas// 'di ni theg pa gang yang mi 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil
'khor brgyad pa tshul bzhin du byas te/ sems can lakhor ba'i rgya mtsho sgyu mar snang ba thams cad/ gdod mtha' nas dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin gnas pa las/ phyin ci log gis bslad pa rnams 'bar ba'i

'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad kyi 'od zir gyis sbyong zhing/ rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyang/ khro bo brgyad du byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe 'phos pa dang sems can thams cad khro bo'i sku gsung thugs/ phyag rgya chen
po'i dkyil 'khor du bsdus te/ thugs rje che ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i 'phrin las mngon sum du mdzad do// de yang dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yang/ bka' yang dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ khams gsum 'khor
ba'i chos ji srid rdzas su snang ba thams cad brtags dben/ dmigs na don byed ma nus pa gang yang med pa ni/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor yin la/ de thams cad kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems su 'dus

pas/ kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems la/ chos thams cad nas thams cad sangs rgyas pas/ sgom du yang med cing// yengs su yang med pa nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yin la// de yang kun tu bzang po ye

phyi mo nas sangs rgyas pa la/ btsal ba med par sangs rgyas pa dang/ sems can gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub pa ni/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la/ de gsum yang tshig gi rnam grangs tsam las
ris su ma gsungs shing/ byang chub sems bde ba chen por mnyam zhing dbyer med rtogs na/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri yang mi dgos la/ thams cad shong yangs che ba las bris kyang mi 'gal lo// de
la yang 'di skad gsungs so// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams ma lus kun// dbyings las ma g.yos sku dang phyag rgyar gsal// gsal tsam nyid na yod med tshig las 'das// snang srid thams cad rgyal
ba'i dkyil 'khor las// yid kyis sa bcad sems kyi lha bkod nam// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas sa la bkod// 'du 'dzin mang po bus ba'i las 'dra bas// rang sems gdod nas dag pas nam
mkha' bzhin// mtha' dbus phyogs ris med par yongs la khyab// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mtha' gnyis bral ba la// skye 'gag med pa'i thig le chen por 'dug// 'od bzhin mtha' dbus med
par rgyal bas gsungs// bdag med skye shi med pa'i klong bdal gyis// 'du 'bral med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ phyogs ris med pa'i thigs rje chen po yis/ 'khor ba spyis phung dmyal ba dong sprug

go/ oM gu h+ya sa ra oM// dz+nyA na sa ra o// bo d+hi tsit+ta a/ zhes bya ba 'di rtogs shing brjod pas/ skye 'gro mtha' dag pa rnams kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na/ gang la bya ba de lta ci smos/ de
ni thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ste/ bka'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa rdzogs so//// de ltar gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bris pa der/ gang la don bya ba dang/ bdag dang sems can thams
cad kun tu bzang po'i gnas su phyin cing snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ gzung 'dzin rtag chad kyi dngos po khro bo yab yum gyi thabs dang shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgral dgos te/

oM badzra tsakra ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas/ gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyi dbus su/ dpal chen po yab yum gnyis/ shar gyi rtsibs la pra dz+nyAn ta krid/ shar lho'i rtsibs la nI la dan Da/ lho'i rtsibs la ya mAn

ta krid/ lho nub mtshams la Ar+ya a tsa la/ nub kyi rtsibs la ha ya gri ba/ nub byang mtshams su Ta ki rA dza/ byang gi rtsi bas la a mr-i ta kun+Ta li/ byang shar mtshams su ma hA ba la/ 'og gi phyogs su 'khor lo sgyur

ba de/ ka ma la/ steng gi phyogs su hUM ka ra/ 'di rnams khro mo ki ri ma brgyad dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// yab yum de dag gnyis su med par 'khril ba las/ steng gi hUM ka ras thabs 'phros/ 'og gi
ma las ni shes rab ston/ de la 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro dang/ sprul pa dang/ mngag gzhug rim gyis/ gang don bya ba de dang/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas/ dngos po la rtag

par lta ba'i gzugs dpung gi gdos bsgral/ rnam par shes pa'i yi ge nri las/ hUM du gyur nas yab yum gyi thugs khar thim nas/ mkha' la rten te ma 'ongs pa'i don du/ rigs nges pa'i sras su cha la reg par

'phrin las mdzad pa'o// de ltar ting nge 'dzin las gsal bar bya ba ni/ sa bcu mthar phyin pa'i gnas zhes bya'o// de yang khams gsum thams cad ni stong pa chos nyid kyi zhing yin la// srid gsum thams cad

ni thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes yin la sngug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod du gyur pas/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ mun pa btsal gyis mi rnyed pa bzhin/ sangs rgyas
kyi dgongs spyod bdal bas/ 'khor ba'i rgyu btsal gyis mi rnyed par gyur nas// sgral bya yang mi dgos la/ sgral ba byas kyang dgos pa med do de'i phyir na 'di skad ces gsungs so// kun tu
bzang po'i ngang nyid las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// srid gsum zos kyang nga ma 'grangs// khams gsum 'thugs kyang nga ma ngoms// stong gsum thams cad sgral ba'i zhing// ma skyes phyir na

btub ba'i rdzas// rang bzhin mod pas bsgral ba'i rgyu// sems nyid yangs pa'i mkha' klong du// stong gsum ma lus ston pas ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// nam mkha' gar khyab chos kyis khyab// chos
kyis gar khyab sems kyis khyab// phyi nang gnyis ka sems su bsgral// sems ni ye nas mya ngan 'das// skye shi gnyis kyi rgyud las rgal// yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// cir yang snang la gzung du

med// med pa ma yin snying po 'byung// 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das// gcig pur rab tu che ba'i lha// blo ldan gang zhig skal che ba// 'di ni bsgral ba'i lung zhes grags// hi ti bsham// yongs la dbang
sgyur dbang gi mchog/ gang la ma chags 'dod dgur sgyur// gnyis su med pa'i pho brang du// spong len medapa'i dbang bskur ro// zhes gnas par cig bstod/ dbang lan cig bskur bas/ sems can gyi ming
yang med par gyur to// gang gi don bya ba lta ci smos so// 'di ni dkyil 'khor drug las/ rgyud drug bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor dang// dkyil 'akor gsum pa rdzogs so// de ltar gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor

chen po bris pa de las zhal bsgyur te zhi ba'i lha bung+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gzhung dang 'thun par 'khor lo bris pa 'am/ yang na pad ma bris kyang rung/ sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa rdzogs par bris

pa der/ rgyan rnams bkram// dbus su bum pa yum kun tu bzang mor byin gyis brlabs/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa der ni yangs shing rgya che ba/ 'jig rten gyi ltos thams cad rgyas shing khyab pas/ yum gyi
mkha' dbyings rnam par dag par/ thams cad sangs rgyas par bsgom mo// de yang dper na srog gi sbubs thams cad rtsas gang ba 'am/ til gyi gang bu 'bras bu dang mar gyis gang ba bzhin/ thams cad du

khyab ste khab rtse gang yang gzugs pa'i sa med par phyi nang snod bcud thams cad ye shes bum pa bdud rtsi chu/ byang chub sems kyi sangs rgyas par snums par mdzad pa bsgom pa ni/ kun tu bzang mo rgyan du

bzhag pa de/ sems can thams cad dang gang don mdzad pa de la/ thams cad kyis legs par sbyin par mdzad pa'o// de yang chos nyid ma skyes pa skye ba med pa/ kun tu bzang po'i mkha' klaung rnam par dag ba'i
dbyings su/ phyi nang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen por sangs rgyas pa der// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung du rtogs na// bum pa bsham yang mi
'tshal// 'di ltar klong du gyur nas bshams kyang mi 'gal lo// de'i phyir na 'di skad ces gsungs te/ bum pa zlum bo'i pho brang du// snod bcud ma lus dbang du bsdus// thig le chen po rgyas btab

pas// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin// zhes bka' stsal to// de la gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha bung+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub kyi sems/ bdud rtsi

bum bar gyur nas bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems des/ thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor lags pas/ lha la lha thim/ chos nyid la chos nyid rol pas mchod pa dang/ gang don ba de yang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing/

byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'byung bas/ rang rig bzhin du sgom mo// de yang dbang po yul dus la sbyor ba ni/ chos nyid dang 'du 'bral med par ye shes dbyings las sbyor

ba ni/ chos sku 'gyur ba med par rtogs na sbyor ba yang mi dgos so// sbyor ba dngos su byas kyang mi 'gal lo// der rgyan bkram nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ yi ge bruM gser btso ma'i

mdog 'dra ba la/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang rgya khyon dpag tu med pa cig/ gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur bar skyed do// de'i nang tsakra las 'khor lo// baM las pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan par

gnas so// dbus su badzra d+h+rig yab yum/ shar du dzi ni dzig yab yum/ lhor rat+na d+h+rig yab yum/ nub tu a ro lig yab yum/ byang du pra dz+nyA d+h+rig/ sgyu 'phrul dang mthun/ de dag kyang thabs dang shes rab gnyis

su med par rdzogs shing/ gzhan yang sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo sgo srungs su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i 'og phyogs su yang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor drug cu rtsa drug kyang thabs dang

shes rab gnyis su med/ drug kyang zhi ba'i lha rnams dbu rgyan du bsnams nas/ de rnams kyang thabs dang shes rab tu sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// de lta bu'i zhing khro bo'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams

kyis/ sems can ma rig pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar gyur pa rnams chos nyid kyi gnas su sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jog pa mdzad do// de lta bu'i sangs rgyas de yang gzhan gud na yod pa ma yin te/ rang gi snying po
byang chub kyi rang bzhin yin pa la/ phyin ci log gis bslad pa rnams/ sangs rgyas su grub par semasacan gzhan gcig na yod par re ba gzhag nas/ 'dzin chags su rtogs pas gol ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi
rgyu ni slob dpon dang lung gis bkrol nas/ rang byung dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes lhu mi gnyis par go ba'i dus na/ ye shes rang gnas kyi lhun gyis grub rdzogs pa'o// de yang lta bas chos thams

cad snang na ni/ sku gsung thugs phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang la/ mi snang na yod med rtag chad 'khor ba ngan song du mi snang bar rtogs/ dkyil 'khor gyi thams cad rang gis rdzogs par bsgoms pas

sangs rgyas la/ ma bsgoms kyang sangs rgyas so// de yang 'di skad ces gsungs te/ mu tig dkar po dri med dang// tsan dan smug po rma med gnyis// byang chub sems kyi thig le gsum// rtogs pa'i klong du su

'dris pa// mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ btsam kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// rtogs med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// gzung du med pa 'ja' tshon 'dra// gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor zhes bya ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag gis// byang chub sems las ma yengs na// thams cad dkyil 'khor 'di la rdzogs// dper na mun las snang 'byung bzhin// dkyil 'khor nges don 'di

bsgoms pas// rgyu drug sems can thams cad kun// sangs ma rgyas pa cig kyang med// ces bka' stsal to// 'di ltar rtog pa dang ldan zhing tshig tu brjod na/ rgyud drug gi sgo yang gtan chod par gyur na/ gang

don bya ba lta ci smos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba de la/ gang zag shes rab chung ba rnams the tsom mi za bar bya ba'i phyir spyan drang zhing phya btsal ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gzhan dang mthun par

bya'o// de nas lha rnams byin dbab pa dang/ gzi byin bskyed pa dang/ gsal gdab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yang bya'o// de yang phyi 'byung ba lnga la sogs pa'i ji ltar snang ba'i chos 'di dag thams

cad/ yong gi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin pas/ thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi don la mi phyed par ril rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur bar don mdzad de/ de yang dus thams cad du rang
gi byang chub kyi sems de ltar yin pas/ 'di ltar sus blo la gsal bar rtogs pa'i dus na/ bdag don gzhan don thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o// de ltar cho ga'i rim pa tshang bar gyur nas/ ma nor bar lha

rnams bsnyen cing bsgrub par bya ste/ gzhung gzhan dang mthun par bya'o// de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems/ ye dang po nas sangs rgyas pa med na/ bsnyen cing bsgrubs kyang mi 'grub na// ye thog ma nas
sangs rgyas pa ma nor ba yin pas/ sems can thams cad ye thog ma nas 'khor ba las grol bathar pa yin par rtogs te/ gdod ma nas bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'o// yang thig le chen po byang chub kyi sems las
ma g.yos ma bral na/ 'khor ba ming yang med nas bsnyen pa'i mchog go/ de yang mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las ma gyur pa med pa ni bsgrub pa'i phul lo// de lta bu'i lta ba'i klong du bdag dang
don bya ba de mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ye nas kun tu bzang po bzang ngan spong len med par sangs rgyas par rtogs pas/ bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i gnas yang dag pa yin no// de yang 'di skad ces
gsungs te/ 'khor ba'i chos nyid yin shes shing// sems can ye nas sangs rgyas pas// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rang bzhin ma bsgoms gsal// sangs rgyas ma bsgoms gcig kyang med// nam mkha'

bzhin du skus khyab pas// spyan drangs slar gshegs gang yang med// bdag nyid bdag la mchod la mchod shes pas// rgyal ba mchog ni gzhan na med// tsit+ta thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang byung ye shes klong

bdal bas// ji ltar snang ba kun tu bzang// bsnyen cing ma bsgrubs gang yang med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs ngan sangs// ngan song 'khor ba'i mig yang med// lha yi

lha de ye shes sems// oM shri sa man ta b+ha dra// bud+ha s+pha na o/ zhes bstsal pas// gang don bya ba dang sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ rdo rje
dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi pa rdzogs so//// de la thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyi'i spang skor dang/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang/ tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa phyogs skyong ba dang/
rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang/ 'jig rten na ci yod pa ma lus par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ so so'i gzhal yas khang dang// gnas chen po ltar dag cing bde bar phyi'i dkyil 'khor bshams pa'i dbus su/
bdag gi thugs ka nas rdo rje bton te// gtor sbyin chen po btang bas// phyi'i sbyin pa rnam gsum gyis/ 'gro ba rigs drug dang/ skye ba rnam bzhis bsdus pa las/ kun tu bzang mo'i rgyan la bkod nas/ mi
gnyis lhun gyis bsdus nas/ byang chub mchog gi sbyin pas tshim par bya ba dang/ tshe rabs kyi lan chags kyi gdon bgegs rnams// chod pa dang dam gsal nas bka' mi 'da' bar bya ba ni/ lung 'di khong
yangs pas thams cad du shong shing yangs pa dang/ thugs rje sbyin pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga pa rdzogs so//// de ltar dkyil 'khor rnams bsnyen cing bsgrubs nas/ gang la don bya ba de dang sems can thams

cad kyi don bya ba'i phyir/ rgyud chen po'i gzhung ltar/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can gyi srog gi sa bon a nr-i su tri pre du lnga las/ yi ge dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i thugs rje'i ye shes kyi 'phro 'du
yis/ rigs lnga so so'i lam rgyud lnga'i sgo bkag nas/ rgyal ba rigs lnga'i gnas su 'dus nas/ hUM mdzad gnas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad do// de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du

rol pa las 'di skad bskul lo// ngan song gsum gyi phung po la// yi ge 'bru lnga'i gnas bkod nas// rgyud lnga 'khor ba'i rgyun lam bcad// rgyal ba'i sras su thams cad bskyed// sa yi 'og tu mda' 'phangs

pas// gnam gyi lha bran thamad cad 'chi// pha rol phyin bcu shes rab dbyings ma'i gzhu// cang shes 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin mda' dang gzhu// dam tshig ldan pa'i mchog ma rin chen gter// gsung gi ka la ping

ka'i rgyud 'brengs shing// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i ye shes snyug ma la// yid bzhin nang du sgron ma'i mkha' 'gros gzhag/ tshul bzhin thugs las 'byung ba'i spar gsum ma// nga dang bdag dang lta ba'i ngan song
bcom// rgyud drug nyon mongs 'khor ba'i gnas bsgral te// byang chub snying dril yig 'brur byin brlabs nas// sku la sim zhing rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// ye shes mchog gi sa la gnas thob nas// gsang
ba'i thugs rje'i gnas la gzung bar bya'o// zhes brjod nas ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal gdab pa dang/ phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang/ sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// de yang lung ltar na yig

'brus don bya mi dgos na thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes/ ye shes chen po lnga 'am drug dang ldan pas/ thugs rje'i bdud rtsi'i char gyis 'gro ba rigs drug gi re ba yid bzhin du skongs/ de la yang sems bo d+hi

tsit+ta'i lha ye shes mchog sems dpa'i gnas su/ thugs ye shes kyi thig la zlum por gsal ba dang/ tsit+ta rin po che dmar por gur phub pa 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor du gsal
bar gyur pa'i dbus su/ bdag gi sems dang/ gang don bya ba dang/ mtha' yas ba'i sems can thams cad kyi dran byed kyi sems/ ye shes sems dpa'i 'od mtshon gang ba cig tu lhan ner gsal bar
bsgoms pa'i dus na/ chos thams cad smra bsam gyi yul las 'das nas/ don gyi snying po ye shes mchog gi dkyil 'khor ye shes sems dpa'i skur gsal te/ 'od mtshon gang ba la sogs pa rgyan gyi lung chen
po las gsal bar smos pa bzhin du bsgom mo// de yang bka' yang dag pa'i gzhung gis din gsal bar ma 'dres pa/ snang ba dngos po med pa la/ gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba'i
chos yod med rtag chad du snang ba 'di thams cad ye nas mya ngan las 'das par 'dres pa mchog gi yon tan du 'gyur ro// de yang thabs chen po'i nang nas shar ba'i ye shes kyis/ thams cad du bdag tu
sangs rgyas par rtogs pa'i dus na/ gzhan du dbye zhing gsal bar bya ba'i don gzhan na med do// tsit+ta sems la thams cad gnas pa yin par bsgom mo// de yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// lha
zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang/ tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad/ sems kyi lung la gnyis med pas/ rtog pa'i don la gcig tu bstan/ tsit+ta'i dkyil du gnas byas pas/ stong gsum thams cad rin chen gzhal yas

khang/ yid kyi dkyil 'khor du lha bkod pas/ skye 'gro ma lus rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems su dbyer med pas// ji ltar snang ba kun tu bzang// kun gzhi ye nas sems su mnyam// phyi nang snod chos kyi

sku// 'di las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas ni// gzhan du bu cig ma tshol cig/ ces bka' bstsal to// de yang thugs rje chen po'i rgyud nyid phyi'i yul gnas par bya ste/ tsit+ta lnga'i rtsa ba thams cad 'du 'bral med pa'i
rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bsam yas par bsdus pa'i b+ha ga 'dus pa'i spyi bor gtsug tu gzhal yas khang mtshon gang ba cig bsgom/ nang du bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs so so'i yab yum/ gtso gzungs dang
ldan par bsgoms/ yum gyi mkha' la gang don bya ba dang/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad lngar 'dus te/ gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems dgyes pa'i ro bstar bar bya'o// de yang don chos nyid
du gsal bar byin gyis brlabs yun ring por bya'o// de nas yang ston pa'i chos nyid du gnas bsdus pa'o// de nas las su rung nas gsal zhing 'dris par gyur pa dang// gnyis su med par byin gyis brlabs
pas/ sprul pa phra men ma/ sgrol bar byed pa'i tshogs mang po/ yab yum gyi 'od zer dang 'phros 'dus nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i'ajig rten gyi khams gnas pa thams cad/ ngan song gsum na gnas
pa thams cad ma lus par bsgral bas/ ye shes chen po'i thig le la sbyor zhing sdud do// de yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// tsit+ta la ni lhan ne bos/ bder gshegs rigs rnams so sor gsal/ thabs dang
shes rab gnyis med pa'o// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro/ gnyis med rol pa'i byin rlabs pas/ gru gsum las ni bsgral bar bya/ ngan song gsum po kun bsrungs nas/ thig le dbyings las dgod par

bya/ zhes bka' stsal to// de las 'od zer gyi 'phros 'dus dbang du bsdus pa de las/ bdag nyid khro bo hUM mdzad dam bla na med pa'i he ru kar bsgoms pa'i thugs ka nas/ thabs kyi rgyal po thugs yang dag
pa'i ye shes kyis/ ngan song gsum 'jig par byed pa'i yig 'bru rnams bskyed/ yig 'bru thugs ye shes kyi rtse mos don du bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kun bsdus nas/ nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil
'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/ gser zhun ma bzhin du 'dril zhing 'tsher ba/ dag cing gsal ba gcig yid la bsam la/ byang chub sems kyi sems mngon du dran par bya'o// gzhal yas khang gi

dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi thugs ka nas kyang dang po gsung yig 'bru 'phros/ gnyis pa las thugs phyag mtshan 'phros/ gsum pa las sku phyag rgya 'phros pa las/ gang don bya ba dang/ sems can ril
gyis phung po dang/ khams dang/ rnam par shes pa thams cad la khyab pas/ bskal pa gdod mtha' med pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ yod med rtag chad dang/ gzung 'dzin dang/ phyogs su

lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad/ dper na bya sgro me yis bcom pa bzhin du thul gyis sregs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i chos mgar ba'i zhi ga kong bu na gser chu dngul chu bzhus pa bzhin/ kar lhang nge lhang nge

gnas pa la/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du bzhag/ 'og yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bteg nas yab yum sbyor ba'i thugs kar phaT kyis 'phangs/ sku'i dbyib tu \u0f84thim nas gsang ba

gnyis gnas kyi mkha' la byang chub kyi sems babs pa las/ bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra sa tA zhes brjod pas/ rigs nges pas rgyal ba'i sras su gyur to// de yang lung chen po'i gzhung gis/ me long gi dkyil 'khor dang/
sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsum du rgyud lnga'i gnas bcas/ ji ltar snang ba thams cad thugs ye shes kyi snying po nyid du bsdus nas/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo yin pas/ rigs
kyi khyad par ni yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa'i mtshams su zhes gsungs so// de la yum gyi mkha' gsang pad ma ni// ye nas dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin la/ khams gsum gyi sems

can thams cad kyi gnas bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yang yin pas/ ye nas chos nyid gsang ba'i rang bzhin la/ ye nas gsal ba'i skyon gyis ma gos te/ pad ma 'dam nas skyes na yang skyon dang bral ba bzhin du/
chos nyid la skyon mi mnga' ste/ rigs lnga'i rgyal po dang rgyal mo gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ ngan song 'khor ba 'dren cing sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// del tshig bshad kyis 'di skad

do// oM// sngon gyi thugs dam chen mo ni// sems can 'byam klas ma lus kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du 'byor pa na// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ gser zhun bzhin du gsal ba las// sngags dang phyag rgyas
byin rlabs pas// gsung gi byin rlabs 'od kyi 'bru// yab yum gnas su btegs nas kyang// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang// thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyings// rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi
mkha'// gnyis med dbyings su gnas spar nas// lha rnams so so'i snying po smras// 'di las byin gyis brlab tu gsol// zhes bskur bas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med
pa'i thugs rje chen pos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ril rnams kun/ dper na til gyi gang bu 'bras bus gang la/ 'bras bu mar gyis khyab pa bzhin du/ nam mkha'

gar khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab la// chos nyid kyis gar khyab pa byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen por sangs rgyas pas khyab cing/ thig le chen por bsnams pas/ de'i don la gzhan du mi stongs pa'i rang

byung gi ye shes/ kun tu sangs rgyas pa las yengs pa med pa'i rtse gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid kyi dbang bskur nas/ yab yum ril kyang gnyis su med par gyur nas/ rgyal ba'i sras su bya ba dang/
de la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing/ bsngags pa mdzad nas/ de la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rigs lnga yab yum dang/ dus gsum gyi bde bar
gshegs pa thams cad dang/ 'khor sems dpa' dang sems ma/ khro bo dang khro mo/ ril gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems gcig tu gyur nas/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ sangs rgyas kun

gyi thugs rdo rje 'phro 'du gsal ba las/ gang don bya ba dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin du/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni/ dus gsum
gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu gyur pa'i spyi gtsug nas/ oM dkar po 'phros pas don bya ba'i gnas kyi sems yab yum gyi mkha' la gser zhun ma bzhin du 'khod pa la/ zhal nas a dmar po

'phros pas/ yang de bzhin du thon/ thugs ka nas hUM mthing ka 'phros pas/ yang de bzhin du 'phros pas/ de bzhin dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAg

tsit+ta badzra sA b+hA pa Ad ma ko\u0f85haM// zhes brjod pas sku gsung thugs rdo rjer gyur te/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras rab dam par gyur nas/ bdag don mtha' phyin nas/ gzhan don lhun gyis grub par bya
ba'i phyir/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi don yid du 'ong bar mdzad par mnga' gsol nas/ rnal 'byor gyi sdaung grogs su zhal gyis 'ches par bsgom mo// de yang 'di skad ces brjod do// don rnams bya 'os

gang yin pa/ gnyis med dbyings nas b+ha gar thim/ yum gyi mkha' la gnas pa la/ bo d+hi tsi t+tas dbang bskur nas/ yi ge 'bru gsum byin brlabs pas/ rigs nges rgyal pa'i sras zhes bya'o// phyin chad 'gro
ba'i don bya ba'i phyir/ ngas bskul ba'i sa la gzhag par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad thams cad

ye gdod ma nas sangs rgyas pa la/ rgyu rkyen la rag ma lus la/ de nyid btsal ba med par lhun gyis grub pas/ 'bras bu la rten mi 'tshal te/ 'khor ba chos nyid du dag/ sdug bsngal byang chub tu gyur/ nyon

mongs lam du shar bas/ 'di ltar gyur pa'i skyes bu'i lam rgyud lnga thugs rdo rje chen pos gzung yang mi dgos/ de ltar rtogs na thugs rjes gzung yang mi 'gal/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po bya btsal dang
bral zhing kun shong la/ gang dang yang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po ye nas sangs rgyas la/ dpe gser dang 'dra ste/ 'gyur ba med pa yin la/ gnas nas
gnas su bstod kyang mi 'gal/ ma bstod kyang mi 'gal/ ma bstod kyang don gyis tshang bas/ sems can thams cad kyang kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems dpe nam mkha'/ don chos nyid/ rtags bde ba chen po skye

shi 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad/ chos nyid dbyings su 'pho 'gyur med pas/ sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad thig le chen po'i rang bzhin du 'ub chub pas/ gnyis su med pa'i ngang du gyur/ rtag chang rtog

pa'i mtha' las 'das/ dpe gser gling du phyin pa ltar/ kun tu bzangapo la 'khor ba btsal gyis mi rnyed pas/ dbye ba med pa'i sa la mnyam pa nyid kyi gling du gnas pas/ rgyu 'bras kyi chos dang/ las dang/
sdug bsngal dang/ sku dang ye shes kyi chos thams cad la sems kyi dbang bsgyur bas/ rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang rdzogs pas/ 'di ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbang bskur yang mi 'gal/ ma bskur kyang

dbang thams cad rdzogs pas/ dper na dbyung la khas blangs mi dgos/ blang nas kyang mi 'gal ba dang 'dra'o// de'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so// yod cing rdzas su snang na yang// snang zhing srid pa'i ye
shes rgyan// med cing chad par snang na yang// khams gsum thams cad stong pa'i dbyings// yod med gnyis las 'das na yang// don gyi mchog ni dbu ma yin// tshig dang yi ge thams cad kyang// sngags kyi
rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings// dran rtogs thams cad ye shes la// sems kyi dkyil 'khor nang nas gsal// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas pas// rgyal ba'i sras po ye nas bsngags// gti mug nyid kyang
chos kyi sku// ma rig nyid kyang yang dag lam// yang dag ma spangs thar pa'i lam// gang yang ma spangs thar pa'i gnas// bde ba gzhan du rag mi lus// byang chub sems kyi 'od gsal gyis// 'khor ba'i mun
nag gnas nas gsal// rdzogs pa chen po'i don ston pa// ngan song sdug bsngal ming yang med// theg pa chen po'i klong bdal bas// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin// rtog pa 'dod
dgur dbang sgyur bas// rgyal dang spyi blugs rang dbang thob// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin las// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i phyir// yin pa'i don la yengs med pas// dbyer med sa las phyir mi
ldog/ ma bcos ma g.yos bde bar gnas// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'phrin las phrid// lung 'di tshig tsam thos pas kyang// de dbang sems kyi gnas rnyed 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa dang/ tshig 'di yos pa dang

grags pa tsam gyis/ kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i gnas/ lhun gyis grub pa nyid thob par gyur to// gang don bya lta ci smos so// des ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po drug las/
gnas chen po'i rtsa rgyud rdzogs so//
@#// da ni phyi ma'i 'jug la lhag ma ma lus pa'i las ci bya ba chen po drug las ci bya ba don gsal bar smos pa ste/ de yang 'di skad ces gsungs te// rgyud drug sems can gnas sbyangs nas// rigs

nges rgyal ba'i sras bskyed pa// dus gsum phung po sbyangs nas kyang// lhag ma bshags byang bskang bcos bya// kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas// snod kyi khyad par shes bar bya// zhes byung bas rgyud phyi ma 'di la
don rnam pa bzhi ste/ las kyi lhag ma bsdu ba dang/ snod kyi khyad par shes par bya ba dang/ gnyis su med bshags pa dang/ smon lam btab pa'o//// de la las kyi lhag ma bsdu ba la don bdun te/ ma 'ongs

pa'i rgyal ba thams cad bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par smon lam gdab pa dang/ snang ba dang ni snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi gral thob cing bzhugs par bya ba dang// rnal
'byor dngos kyi rgyud las tshor ba dang ma mtsho ba'i nyams chags thams cad bshags par bya ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sems can khams gsum 'khor ba na gnas pa rnams/ snying po byang chub la dgod
pa'i thugs rjes gzung zhing las bcol ba dang// tha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa'i re ba skongs pa dang/ khyad par gyi las nges pa sor byed pa dang/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'o/ de la dkyil
'khor bsdu ba ni/ snying po ni gnas pa'i ngang du dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing/ snying po gsal ba'o// dran pa tsam gyis rig pa gsal bar bya ste/ las thams cad kyi gzhung bsdus nas/ don mthar phyin

pa slob dpon gyis bstan par bya'o// de yang man ngag gis byang sems bde ba chen pos/ ye nas sangs rgyas pas phyogs ris dang steng 'og med par khyab cing bdal bas/ dus la snga phyi med la/ gnas la mtho
dman med la sems la skye shi med pas/ man ngag rdzogs pa chen po ye nas bya ba btsal dang bral bar rtogs na/ lhag ma dang 'jug bsdu ba yang mi dgos so// byas kyang mi 'gal lo// de'i phyir na 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to// rdzogs pa chen po'i klod gdal ba// mtho ris med cing sems cing ngan song med// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// med pa ma yin snying po'i don// zhes gsungs so// de la

snod kyi khyad par shes par bya ba ni/ rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba ya tha yin pas gang yang mi shong ba med ces te/ kun gyi thun mong du ma gsungs so// dper na nam mkha' la yangs dogs med cing kun la khyab pa
yin kyang/ mig nad can dug gis zin pas ltas pas// nad dang dug gi kha dog tu snang ba bzhin// rdzogs pa chen po'i chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin kyang/ nyan thos dang theg pa 'og ma pa srag

cing sngangs te/ de nyin ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis/ 'phya zhing skur pa btab pas dmyal khams la sogs pa'i 'bras bu log par smin pa'i skyon dang/ skye bo dang bus pa la sogs pa/ yang dag pa'i nges don mi
shes pa'i dbang gis/ las kyi sgrib pas thos pa'i dbang med pa dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ bus pa dang/ gsang ba theg pa gsum po ma ros pa dang/ dam med cing dam nyams lha smos kyis/ dbang ma
bskur ba dang/ bskur ba dang/ ma hA' yo ga man chad las ma thos pas kyang/ gnas 'dir bya bar mi 'byung ste/ de'i phyir ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu bzang po'i thugs las ni// nor bu rin chen
'di 'byung bas// skal ldan rnams las ma gtogs pa// nyan thos byis pa'i spyod yul min// nyan thos rang rgyal dgra bcom dang// dge slong ming yang ma gtogs so// phyogs rtogs yang dag ma rtogs
pa// 'di dag lung du ma bstan no// mu stegs mur thug la sogs pas// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// skye bo la sogs rmongs pa la// bstan kyang mi go rtogs par 'gyur// dregs shing sdig pa'i las byed
na// rgyal po yin kyang sdod ma yin// dper na seng ge'i 'o ma bzhin// snod ngan zhos 'chag bcud 'bo bas// bus pa'i skye bos mi shes pas// yid la gcags kyang bya 'os med// yid la gnas stod dbang
bskyur kyang// thar pa mi thob sgrib par 'gyur// skyes pa dregs shing khengs pa dang// bud med 'dod pas zhen pa dang// bus pa 'da' las shed ma byed// don 'di bstan kyang go mi 'gyur// yid

dang rna ba'i dbang po yis// rgyud lung man ngag ma thos pas// don med rnal 'byor phal pa yis// man ngag snod du ma gyur pas// nams kyang gnas mchog thob mi 'gyur// rtsa ba nyams pa'i chal pa dag/ gso

la brtson par mi byed par// gnas 'dir thob par mi 'gyur gyi// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar nges// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rnams dang// gang zag grangs dbang ma mthong zhing// kha dbang tsam yang ma thob
na// de yang lung du ma bstan no// rgyud kyi 'phrin las tsam la ltos// gong ma'i chos la sgros 'dogs shing/ glu dang sdebs sbyor khe shags mkhan/ de ni gnas 'di thob mi 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// de'i

phyir theg pa chen po'iganas 'di thun mong ma yin pa'o// man ngag chen po 'di'i gnas kyi snod yod par bstan pa ni/ skye bo na yang rang bzhin gyi don dang mthun pa dang/ bud med na yang dad pa dang tshul du shis

te/ gzugs kyi don dang ldan zhing blo dang rig pa che ba dang/ bus pa na yang lung dang man ngag gi rigs su gyur nas/ don chos thos shing 'gags pa'i don shes na yang legs/ ma shes na yang 'di dag phal

'ga' shes na bar chad du 'gyur ba dang/ dbang dang dam la gnas shing tshul bzhin spyod pa dang/ gsang sngags rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi don spyod pa rnams la/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin 'dis ma bstod

na/ gzhan dge ba ci byas kyang yang dag pa'i don du mi 'gyur ba dang/ lung dang man ngag la mkhas pa'i skyes bu lta ci smos kyis/ tshul dang mi ldan pa'i rgyal po dang/ bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum gyi don la dad
pas phyogs pa tsam la yang/ rgyal po gnas 'dir bstod na/ nges pa'i lam thob lags/ de dag thams cad la bka' yang dag pa 'dis bzhugs bshams nas/ dper na lha dang klu'i dbang po la nor bu rin
po che'i dbang bskur nas/ 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa bzhin/ lung 'dis gser la nag tshur gtong bar gyur pas 'di skad ces btsal nas// mtha' dbus med pa'i chos nyid la// skye shi med pa'i sems
bdal bas// gdod nas dag pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// phyogs ris med nas dang che na// skye ba yin yang don dang mthun// rang sems dag pas mtshan dang ldan// dad pas chags med chags dang bral// yang
dag don nyid rtogs gom na// gsang ba'i bud med gzhung las 'byung// rigs kyis btsun rgyud mkhas pa'i sa// dbang po ma gsal na yang thos// 'di la dad mos phyogs dga' na// yul min bus pa 'ang
rung bar bshad// dbang dang dam tshig ma nyams shing// tshul dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor dang// mkhas pa'i yon tan brdzod las 'das// ming gis gnas 'dir bya bar gsungs// rgyal po chos la
mos pa dang// gsang ba'i don la dad cing 'dun// sngags kyi rgyal po mnyan nges dang// de yang gnas 'dir bya bar gsungs// de las gzhan pa gang yin pa// nyams dang chad las 'byung ba dang// shan pa
mtshams med la sogs dang// mgon btsun 'di las gnas gzhan med// ci'i phyir zhe na khrus kyi dpe// nan tar phung na'ang skyabs 'di tshol// gzhan las grol ba'i lung yod pas// 'di yang mkhas pa'i lung
du gsungs// thabs las btsal gyis mi rnyed pas// rtags la thugs rje'i gnas 'dir mkhas// zhes gsungs pas gzhung dang mthun pa dang// thabs gzhan gdug pa srid tsam las gar song song du ma
gsungs so//// de la gnyis su med pa'i bshags pa dang/ smon lam gdab pa ni gnyis su med cing/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa la bshags mi dgos na yang/ dper na nam mkha'i khrigs sam/ khu rlangs

sam/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs sam/ me long gi g.ya' dang 'dra bar/ blo'i sgrib pa stug pos non pa rnams/ rang bzhin gyis dag cing byang bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos dbyings dus gsum spros

pa med pa las// 'dzin rtog med pa'i rang rig ye shes kyis// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa la// yul dang dbang po gnyis su med par bshags// yum gyi b+ha ga dgyes pa'i pho brang du// yab kyi gnyis

med rdo rje byang chub sems/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa la// phyi nang snod bcud gnyis su med par bshags// ting 'dzin rnam pa bzhi yis bdar bcad nas// phung po rnam shes khams dang skye mched
la// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms pas// 'gro drug sems can rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dang// gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub par mdzod// rtsa srog tsit+ta lus ngag yid gsum rnams// gu h+ya
gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi mdzod/ rdo rje klong dgur dpal chen he ru dgur/ khams gsum sa dgur gnyis su med par bshags// ji ltar snang ba lha yi dkyil 'khor du// snying po brdzod pas thams cad

rdzogs pa'i tshul// dbyer med nyid mnyam ngo bo nyid kyi sku// thabs la mkhas pas gnyis su med par bshags// phyi nang snod bcud ngo bo nyid kyi sku// nga dang bdag med ngo bo nyid mnyam pas// mtho ris ngan

song rgyu 'bras rnam gnyis po// gnyis med bde chen ngang du mthar phyin shog/ ji ltar snang ba kun bzang chen po la// yod med rtag chad mtshan ma'i tshig las 'das// 'di ltar ma gyur bdag rtogs gang yin
pa// de nyid ma spangs rtog pa'i klong du bshags// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur tha tshig rtag pa med// btsal med bsgrub med nam mkha'i ngang du gnas// yongs la khyab kyang kun la 'dod dgur
bsgyur// phyin ci log rnams byang chub lam du bshags// rtog pa'i man ngag don dang ma phrad na// tshig gis mtshon pas 'bras bu mi thob pas// rang sems gdod nas sangs rgyas yin shes na// rang byung ye
shes klong de 'grub par shog/ ces gsungs pas/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ gang don bya ba sdug bsngal gyi rnam par rtog pa dang/ ma rig pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad bshags nas ma dag pa
gang yang med/ ma bshags na yod nas dag nas/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshig tu brdzod pa dang rang bzhin gyis dag/ de la rtogs te gling du gyur na bshags mi dgos pa'i tha tshigs so// de la smon lam gdab
pa ni/ dper na rgyu gser yin na/ spyod kyang gser du spyod pa dang 'dra bar/ bdag dang sems can thams cad yin yang gdod ma nas kun tu bzang po bde ba chen por sangs rgyas pa yin la/ smon lam yang

de'i ngang du gdab pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa chen po'i smon lam 'di skad brjod do// ho phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung ba chen po lnga yum chen mo lnga'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa/ chos dbyings kyi pho brang na/ nang bcud

'jig rten lam lnga'i sems can rgyal ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin gyis yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i khyab pa las/ sems dpa' sems ma dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ sprul pa yang sprul la
sogs sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan dang/ 'phrin las bkod pa mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo mdzod/ 'gyings pa lta bus thabs la thabs rol/ ye shes la ye shes rol/ chos nyod la chos nyid
rol ba'i tshul gyis/ 'khor ba sangs rgyas pa'i dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang/ thugs zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos bar sku 'bar ba'i cha lugs kyis/ nga rgyal dregs pas khegs
pa'i bar du gcod pa'i bdud dang srin po tshar bcad nas/ bla na med pa'i sgrol bar mdzad pa rnams la/ 'dres pa'i chos nyid kyis phyag btsal nas/ thugs ye shes ngang gis mkhyed par mdzad pas dgongs su
gsol/ tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor/ 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod/ phul ba thams cad mchog par bzhes/ don bya ba'i gnas dang mtha' yas sems can thams cad rdo rje 'chang ba'i gral thob nas/

yi ge 'khor lo rdzogs chen gyis la gnas stobs par gyur cig chos nyid la ma rtogs pa med cing me lce la sbrang bu mi chags pa lags na/ kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam gyi dbang gis/ bdag cag dam tshig nyams pa ci
mchis pa rnams dang/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdo rje slob dpon dang/ mched lcam dral mtha' dag bzhugs pa rnams/ dgongs spyod kyi rnal 'byor gyi don la thugs
dam rtse gcig tu mdzad pa rnams kyi thugs dam skongs/ gang don bya ba dang// mtha' yas ba'i sems can thams cad kyi g.yar dam nyams pa sor bsal nas/ thams cad rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du
gnas stobs nas/ sangs rgyas par sman to// ho khams gsum chos nyid kyi dur khrod/ dus gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor/ tsit+ta mkha' mnyam gyi dkyil 'khor/ kun gzhi ma bcos pa'i thig le/ yid

ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs nas/ thags ye shes kyi klong thog na/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub pa ste/ chos kyi sku ru gyur te/ yod med thams cad ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyi mchad
par 'bul/ gzung 'dzin dang rtog pa'i bag chags g.yos par ye shes su gnas stod/ nyon mongs pa dang rtog pa'i sgrib pa thugs mnyam pa'i klong du thugs dam bskul bas/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs thams

cad gnyis su med pa'i mchod pas mnyes par gyur cig/ phyi nang snod bcud bsdus pa'i chos thams cad/ che mchog he ru ka sku'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs/ gu bung+d+ha h+ya he ru ha gsung gi dkyil 'khor du grub/ sa nu

he ru ka thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du mthar phyin pas/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ gang don bya ba de rnams rdo rje sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du mthar phyin nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob nas/

ma hA su kha bde ba chen por sangs rgyas te/ lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas par smon to// ho bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas man chad nas/ 'jigs tshogs kyi dmyal ba yan chad kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems ji ltar

yin kyang gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ dngos po dang/ mtshan ma phyogs dang ris su mi gnas pa kun tu bzang mo bde ba chen po yin la/ grub kyang kun tu bzang por bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas
par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sems can la 'byung la/ sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgya pa'i rgyu yin pas/ yin pa'i don la rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems bde ba chen por

sangs rgyas par gyur cig sems can gyi rnam par rtog pa nyid ma spangs par rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ci 'byung ba nyid ma g.yos pa'i chos nyid du shes te bsgoms pas/ chos nyid gzhan du btsal mi dgos/

rang la rang chas su yod pa dang/ sems can nyid kyi sdug bsngal nyid ma spangs par sdug bsngal skyes kyang ma bslad pa'i ye shes yin te/ bsgoms pas rang byung gi ye shes gzhan du btsal mi dgos te/ rang la
rang chas su ye nas yod pa nyid kyang// yin kyang gnyis su med pa yin la/ grub kyang gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid/ byang chub kyi sems su mthar phyin par gyur cig/ sems can gyi nyon mongs pa

ma spangs par byung tshor dang 'du byed ci skyes kyang/ 'di nyid thig le chen po las ma gyur te mi 'gyur pa'i g.yung drung du lhun gyis grub pas/ de'i don la rtogs te bsgoms pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma

bslang pa'i sems nyid gzhan du btsal mi dgos te/ rang la rang chas su yod pa de la/ yin kyang bdag dang/ don bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad la yod la/ grub kyang de nyid rtogasapa'i klong du sangs rgyas

par gyur cig/ yin kyang sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad yid rang byung gi ye shes su btsal ba med par sangs rgyas pa yin la/ don kyang de bzhin du sangs rgyas par gyur cig chos thams cad yin kyang

rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid yin la/ don kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ chos thams cad kyang bzang ngan bde sdug thams
cad sems nyid kun tu bzang po bzang ngan med pa yin la/ don kyang sems nyid kun tu bzang po bzang ngan spong len med par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ yin yang sems kyi chos nyid bzang ngan spong len
medad par/ phyi dang nang du phyogs med la/ yod med rtag chad las 'das la/ skye ba dang 'chi bar 'pho 'gyur med pa yin la/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ gang don bya ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas
par gyur cig/ chos thams cad gnas pa kun tu bzang po yin pas/ phyi'i yul la chags sdang ma skyes/ chos thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang po yin pas/ nang gi sems skye 'chi med/ chos thams cad kun tu

bzang po yin pas/ dus la snga phyi dang 'pho 'gyur med/ chos thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang po yin pas/ rgyu 'bras la phyogs ris dang nye ring med pa yin par lta bas la rbad kyis bcad de/ don de bzhin du
go zhing rtogs par gyur cig/ gong bzhin rtogs pas bdag dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ gang don bya ba'i sangs mi rgyas ba'i dbang med de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ bdag gi
ston pa kun tu bzang po'i bka' bzhin du rgyu gdod ma nas dag pas/ chags ni sku gsung thugs la yang ma chags/ 'bras bu 'tshal bas rnyed par sangs rgyas pas/ bral ba ni sngags dang phyag rgya dang ma

bral/ thams cad kun tu bzang po yin pas/ spangs ni rtogs pa gang yang ma spangs/ ye khyab bdal chen po'i klong du sangs rgyas pas/ rag ni 'byung ba lnga la yang ma lus/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes la snang ba'i nyi ma
shar bas/ rten ni ye shes lnga la yang mi 'cha'/ rang byung ye shes la ma bcos par rang gsal bas/ dngos grub ni sangs rgyas la yang de las med de/ 'di ltar rtogs shing tshig tu brjod pas/
'pho 'gyur med pas gnas shes pas/ skye shi med pa'i tshe ru 'gyur/ don 'di bstan pas kyang/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad dang/ gang don bya ba'i sangs mi rgyas pa'i dbang med de/

sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad rang gi byang chub kyi sems yin pas/ phyogs dang ris med par rang byung gi ye shes su bdal/ phyi dang nang med par chos nyid kyi
