klong du shar/ steng dang 'og med par thig le chen po'i dbyings su bdal bas/ dmyal ba sangs rgyas su dong sprugs/ sdug bsngal chos nyid du la bzla/ rnam rtogs ye shes su lam ston/ rgyud drug bde chen du
rgyas btab/ mtho sman klong chen du khod mnyam/ rtag chad tshig la 'das par sun dbyung/ sems ye nas bdal bar sangs rgyas pas/ don tshig tu brdzod pa dang/ rtogs pa klong du gyur pa lta ci smos/ bka'
'di zur tsam byung bas kyang/ bdag dang/ gang don bya ba dang/ don tshig tu brjod pa dang/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad sangs mi rgyas pa'i dbang med de/ rgyas par gyur cig/ bka' 'di lta bu'i
khungs 'dis/ lung dang man ngag gi slob dpon/ snga rabs dang/ da ltar dang/ phyis byed pa dang/ man ngag 'di'i don la spyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ sems skye mched mtha' dag zab mo'i don mtha' phyin/
gsang ba'i man ngag spel nges pa'i 'bras bu mi slu ba'i sa thob/ bka'i theg pa gnyer du blangs nas/ kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i sa la bya btsal med par sangs rgyas par smon no// zhes
smon lam 'di brjod pa tsam gyis/ gzhan ma lcogs kyang gang don bya ba dang/ bdag dang gzhan gnas kyi don mtha' phyin te/ 'bras bu thams cad 'dis thob ste/ 'khor ba'i chos btsal gyis mi rnyed pa yin

no// kun tu bzang po nyid la yang dgongs pa las gzhan mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs phyung ba 'di las med do// bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi don 'di gting phyung bas thugs kyi brnag pa chen po

'dis/ nam nam zha zha bskal pa grangs med par byung zhing bstan par mi bya'o// gal te snod dang ldan pa med na yang zhugs la 'bul lo// zhes bka' stsal pa 'dis/ gsang ba'i tshad bstan par lung gi ston pa tho

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// khro bo hUM mdzad chen po'i tan+t+ra'i gting thogs su/ bde ba chen por bkrol ba'i gnas lung bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum gyi gnas nyi tshe tsam zhig/ mahA gu ru chen po rdo rje gro lod
dang// lo tsa ba rdo rje zhang drug gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du// sa ma ya sa ma ti kra ma gu h+ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra// bod skad du// dam
tshig rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsang ba zhes bya ba// theg pa chen po'i mdo// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
dang// gsung dang// thugs kyi gsang ba// dur khrod chen po'i gnas na/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la sogs pa/ 'dodachags dang bral ba dang/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bskor
nas bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tshe ba dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzad pa/
gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig ni dbye ba med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das sdug
bsngal thams cad las thar pa dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsil pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad las
skyob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bgye ba de gang lags/ bcom ltan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po gang la yon tan mchog 'byung ba
dang/ bsrung ba'i sa bon 'phel ba dang/ gsol ba 'di ni bsrung bar bya'o// 'di ni 'da' bar bya bar ma yin pa'o// gsol pa/ bsrung bar bya ba ni du zhig lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung bar bya ba dang/ 'da' bar mi bya ba ni gsum ste/ 'di ltar gzhi'i sdom pa dang/ spyi'i sdom pa dang/ khyad par gyi sdom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhi'i sdom pa bya ba de gang
lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhi'isdom pa zhes bya ba ni// mas cad du thun mong du gyur pa dang/ thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ thams cad kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ste/ de legs bar

nyon la yid la zung zhig/ gzhi yi sdom pa rnam gnyis te// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// de la so sor thar pa ni/ dus dge ba dang dge bsnyen dang// dge tshul dang ni dge slong gi/ gnang ba med pa de nyid
do// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni// sbyin gtong ser sna rtsad nas gcod// 'chal pa rab spong tshul khrims ldan// 'khrug pa med cing bzod pa ste// le lo'i skyon bral brtson 'grus
ldan// g.yeng med bsam gtan dag dang ldan// gti mug rab spangs shes rab ldan// sems can kun gyi don la brtson// skad 'ga' rang gi don dang bral// yon tan thob pa gzhan la gtong// lus dang ngag

yid dag pas khyab// khengs med snying rje'i sems dang ldan// zhi ba dang ni des pa dang// gsongs por smra zhing 'jam por smra// rgan pa rnams la gus par byed// zhum pa yi ni sems dang bral// smra pa'i dge
ba'i don du gtong// sdig pa kun ni yongs su spong// de la sogs pa'i yon tan tshogs// dpag med mtha' yas thams cad kun// gnang ba med par blang bar bya// 'di ni gzhi yi dam tshig go/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba spyi yi dam tshig ni// dang po rdo rje slob dpon dag/ mnyes par byas la thams cad blangs// bslab pa dag la rab tu 'bad// dgos pa kun gyi 'byung gnas spyir// 'jig
rten rin chen bdun gyis bkang// 'phangs med 'gyod pa med par dbul// gang gi srog lus 'bul byed na// 'jig rten rdzas sogs ci zhig smos// ngag gi tshig 'khyal la sogs min// longs spyod dag kyang
lang ba min// dge ba de yi mdun du spyad// de yi ming nas brjod mi bya// rang gnas mtshan brjod de bzhin te// kun gyis bkur na rjes su 'brang// de las bzlog la rang gis 'bad// chibs dang chags
gdan la sogs pa// de la mgo min 'og tu min// de yi bzhon pa kun la'ang min// rang che gzhan la smod mi bzlas// de bzhin bsad pa ral gris min// mdun du 'dug dang steng du min// glo dang sngon 'gro
la sogs min// gang dang gang gi sbyor ba kun// bla ma dang ni 'gal bas min// mdor na mi dge'i chos rnams spang// dge ba'i chos rnams dang du blang// bla mas thos par chos min brjod// de la sogs pa

mnyes par bya// 'di ni bla ma'i dam tshig go/ de la rig ma'i dam tshig ni// nan gyis len dang thabs med dang// rtogs med dbang dang phyir byung dang// 'dod chags stobs chen ma gnang dang// yul dus khams

dang mi mthun spang// de la gzhan du mkha' 'gros gsod// thams cad dus kyi dam tshig ni// lus ni sku yi dam tshig bsgoms// ngag ni gsung gi rdo rje ste// rnam shes thugs kyi rdo rjer bsgom// 'di dag bzhi
dang rab ldan na// bsod nams de las gzhan la min// sngags pas dus rnams thams cad du// tha mal spyod byas mi 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i dam tshig bshad bya ste// ming 'chang lhag par gnas ma byas// rgyu
dang tshad dang las 'khrul zhing// 'chang dag 'gong sogs spangs bya ste// dril bu 'phreng ba la sogs pa// de bzhin du ni shes par bya// 'di las gzhan du nyams par 'gyur// bde gshegs sgrub

pa'i dam tshig ni// gzhan du 'gro ba gzhan la sems// the tsom dang ni le lo dang// de bzhin bzang ngan spong len byed// 'di la gnas pa nyams par 'gyur// gsang ba sngags kyi dam tshig ni// mi zlos bar du

bcad pa dang// ngag gi nyes dang 'dres pa dag/ mi dge ba dang sgra che dang// chu dang skyen bul mtha' sogs ldan// 'di yis dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// gang zhig grogs kyi dam tshig ni// tha mal grogs dang
sdig pa'i grogs// mkhas pas nam yang spang bar bya// 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang// langs dang sa ris 'dri la sogs// ma 'dris ma snang yid mi bde// sems 'khrul pa la sogs pa spangs// rnal 'byor

grogs kyi dam tshig ni// sems 'khrul la sogs de bzhin te// khyad par rang rang de bzhin bsam// dge slong grogs dang ldan gyur na// nyon mongs dgra ni skyed mi bya// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas dag tu// mi

tshangs spyod na nyams par 'gyur// gang tshe spyod pa la rten nas// mi tshangs spyod dang dus min dang// grangs dang rdzas sogs 'khrul na nyams// man ngag sdom pa'i dam tshig ni// mi len dman la snyan pa
dang// rang gi ral gris gcod pa dang// ma byin len dang bsam pa nyams// kun gyis bston na bsnyen bkur zhing// gzhan gyis smad na zhum par byed// ngag rtsub pa la brnyas pa skye// thob na gzhan spel
bsam dang ldan// ma thos don ma spogs pa dang// mngon shes ldan la smod par byed// yon tan mi la yon tan 'dzin// grags pa thob na rang che 'dzin// 'dug pa'i nang du ston par smod// gang la nyon mongs

dbang gis nyams// snod kyi dam tshig chen po ni// mi 'chang dam la dman par 'dzin// gang yang gzhan du ston pa dang// lhag par byed na nyams par 'gyur// zas la rten pa'i dam tshig ni// dus min za dang
dman pa za// rnal 'byor med dang rnam rtog ldan// de yis nyams par 'gyur ba yin// tshogs kyi dam tshig chen po ni// lha dang grangs dang rdzas la sogs// ma tshogs bsam gtan bral sogs spangs// gang
yang gtor ma'i dam tshig ni// mchog min la bsngo 'jig rten don// rnal 'byor mi byed rdzas rnams dman// gzhan gyis mthong dang sbyor ba log/ 'di yis nyams 'gyur gzhan gyis min// sdang ba'i dus kyi

dam tshig ni// myur du lang dang sngon du las// langs ma thag tu 'gro ba dang// der ni yang dag bsam dang bral// slob dpon lha la phyag mi byed// de dus sdig pa sems pas nyams// 'gro ba'i dus kyi dam tshig
ni// rgan pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang// rnal 'byor me dang blo gros dang// rings par 'gro zhing dmigs rtsa dgod// sa dmigs rgyun spyod dbyar dus 'gro// phyin bas srog gcod khus 'debs
dang// gcig pu 'gro dang dus chig 'gro// brtson 'gro bud med dang grogs dang// dge ba'i grogs spang sdig pa'i grogs// phal che'i nang du 'gro ba dang// mtshon thogs rta sogs bzhon pa la// nyes yod

shes kyang 'gro ba dang// gang zhig zas dang 'grogs pa dang// mtshan mo 'gro na nyams par 'gyur// 'dug pa'i dus kyi dam tshig ni// dge slong bla ma'i gong 'dug la// 'dug sa rgya chung gcig pu 'dug/ bud
med sdig grogs lhan cig 'dug/ rnal 'byor med dang rings 'dug dang// rkang brkyang lag bskum dag gis 'dug/ gdan med 'od ma'i gdan dang ldan// pus gtsug thal mo sbyar ba spangs// sems dpa'i
'dug stangs dag gis 'dug/ sta zur ston dang rgya cher lta// 'di ltar nyams pas mkhas pas spangs// yid la byed pa'i dam tshig ni// ma byin len sogs yid la byed// dge spongs sdig la gnas par

byed// mtshang 'dru ba yi bsam dang ldan// 'di yis nyams par 'gyur ba yin// spyad bya'i dam tshig de nyid do// bzang dang btung ba'i dam tshig ni// las dang dad pa mchog gi phyir// bsam pa dngos su 'gyur

ba yin// 'di dag nyams par 'gyur na ni// gang zhig ston pa 'bras bu med// ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar// de srid ngan 'gror bar 'gyur// khyad par dam tshig bshad bya ste// gang du rang gi bsgrub pa

yi// phyag rgyar smra bar byed pa dang// phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan ston par byed// gang zhig sngags rnams smra bar byed// sngags kyi gzugs brnyan ston par byed// gang gi cha rkyen phyogs su rtogs// thams cad

ston par byed pa dang// gsang ba'i bdag po smod par byed// lha la mchod pa rgyun gcod dang// tshogs dang grogs kyi nang du byed// gzhan du yid kyis byed pa dang// man+Dal tsha tshwa la sogs spongs// rtags
rnams 'chang bar mi byed pa// skyes bu'i dam tshig nyams pa yin// zhes gsungs ma thag tu// 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang// phyag 'tshal zhing me tog gtor
te// 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi man ngag nyams pa zhes bya ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po man ngag nyams pa zhes bya ba gsum ste/
slob dpon la brten pa dang/ yi ge la brten pa dang/ bshad pa la brten pa'o// gsol pa/ slob dpon la brten pa'i man ngag nyams pa gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ slob dpon la brten pa'i man ngag nyams
pa ni bzhi ste/ dman pa las nyams pa dang/ nan gyis len pa dang/ g.yo la sogs pas len pa dang/ 'di ni slob dpon la brten pa'i man ngag nyams pa'o// gsol pa/ yi ge la brten pa ste
man ngag nyams pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ye ge la brten te nyams pa zhes bya ba ni// yi ge mkhan gyis len pa dang/ g.yos 'dri ba dang/ dman pas nyams pa dang/ gzhung nyams pa 'di
ni yi ge la brten te man ngag nyams pa'o// gsol pa/ bshad pa la brten te man ngag nyams pa zhes bya ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bshad pa nyams pa dang/ bshad pa log pa dang/ lung gcig la gcig

gtong ba ni bshad pa nyams pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ thams cad la nyams pa med pas thub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang/ yon tan gyi 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang/ dgos pa'i rten zhes
bya ba dang/ 'bras bu'i spong zhes bya ba dang/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das man ngag gi dam tshig nyams pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang lags/ bka' stsal
pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad ngan sems can gyis bsad pa ni sla'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi man ngag dang dam tshig nyams pa ni de lta ma yin

no// sems dpa' chen po srog dang bral ba ni sla'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi man ngag dang dam tshig nyams pa ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srog dang bral bas ni tshe 'di nyid kyi skye ba zad

par 'gyur gyi/ dam tshig nyams pa ni tshe rabs dang bskal pa chen po skar ma nam mkha' bye ba'i dus grangs su sdug bsngal las mi thar par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po dam tshig nyams pa ni tshe 'di dang phyi

ma la sogs par bde ba'i skabs mi 'byed cing/ thub pa chen po ji skad du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par mi 'gyur ro// man ngag nyams pa ni/ de'i sgrub pa dang bzlas pa la sogs pa ci byas kyang 'bras

bu skye bar mi nus so// sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang ma rtags pa'i dam tshig kyang yod do// pags pa gyon pa dang/ sha za ba dang/ khrag 'thung ba dang/ ta mal pa'i longs spyod chen po byed pa dang/ btsong
dang/ la phug dang/ sgog pa la sogs pa za bar byed pa 'di dag kyang dam tshigs nyams pa'o// gzhan yang sdom pa thams cad la legs par gnas pa ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde

ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sdom pa thob pa'i dus gang lags/ bla mas gnang ba dang/ byang chub sems bskyed pa dang/ blo mchog dang ldan pa dang/ bla ma la tshig brdzod pa gsum gyi tha
ma la'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi gang zag ces bya ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rten gyi gang zag ni nyan thos kyi rigs can dang/ rang byang chub dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can/ theg pa
chen po'i 'bras bu'i rigs can te/ 'di dag rang rang gi sdom pa la gnas par bya'o// gong ma ni ma yin no// sems dpa' chen po so sor thar pa'i bslab pa tsam la gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i

bslab pa tsam la gnas pa dang/ phyi'i bslab pa dang/ nang gi bslab pa dang/ brda mi byed pa dang/ tshogs pa dag ma 'dus pa ston pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems don mi gnyer ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems spong ba

'di ni/ gsang ba dang gsang ba chen po'i snod ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na so ma btang ba dang/ snod ngan pa'i nang du seng ge'i 'o ma blug pa na/ snod des kyang phan mi thogs/ bcud des kyang phan mi thogs
te/ snod ma yin pa lagasang ba yang de dang 'dra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po'i mdo rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po'o// rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ bi ma la uSh+Na Sha/ su pa ra

b+hi b+hi sha kar ma si te tan ta/ bod skad du/ gtsug tor dri ma med pa sku gzugs mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa las 'das pa/ yon tan mngon par bstan pa/ sku'i rang bzhin du ma 'gags par gsal ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bya ba la sogs pa

gcig dang bsam yas pa bgrang ba'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo oM gyi rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad chen po dang/ rdo rje hUM las bskyed pa rdo rje'i rigs dang/ rin po che traM las skyes pa rin chen
'byung ldan dang/ pad ma hri las bskyed pa snang ba mtha' yas dang/ ral gri a la sogs pa don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mai tri dang/ sgrib pa sel ba la sogs pa bsam

gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang ba'i tshogs yum dang sems pa dang bcas pa de dag nyid du sku mi mnga'/ gsung brjod pa dang bral ba mi rtog pa'i ngang nyid las mchod rten du gyur pa'o// de dag kyang chos kyi
dbyings brjod pa dang bral ba'i 'og min gyi gnas dmigs pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor na gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe de dus na dus dang mtshams med par chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan mchod rten du rnam par
gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi tshe/ rtogs pa rnam par bral ba'i tshe/ bsam gyis mi khyab gnas pa kun/ gang de rig pa'i don grub dang/ de dag rnam

kun 'dus pa'i tshe/ yang dag don de 'di skad du// rang bzhin lhun grub mchod rten dang// tshad med bzhi yi mchod rten dang// pha rol phyin pa'i mchod rten dang// sprul pa bstan pa'i mchod pa'i mchod rten
dang// rig pa las grub mchod rten dang// dpe las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang// rigs las gyur pa'i mchod rten dang// brtags pas snang ba'i mchod rten dang// don du bsgrubs pa'i mchod rten

dang// mtha' ru phyin pa'i mchod rten dang// theg pa'i bye brag mchod rten dang// rdul bsags dag gi mchod rten dang// mtshon du med pa'i mchod rten dang// mtshon pa thabs kyi mchod rten dang// byang chub
sems dpa'i mchod rten dang// ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod rten dang// gzugs brnyan dag gi mchod rten dang// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i mchod rten dang// dngos po tha dad bris pa dang// khams gsum mchod rten
la sogs pa// bsam gyis mi khyab ngas bstan to// dam tshig spyod dang dkyil 'khor dang// lta ba rang bzhin gnas pa dang// spyan 'dren mchod 'bul bstod pa dang// khrus dang smon lam dbang bskur

dang// bsgrub dang grub pa'i sangs rgyas kun// chos kyi sku ru ye nas gsal// skye ba med pa chos kyi sku// de nyid mchod rten zhes su grags// chos nyid gcig dang bsam yas ba// don dam nyid las bgrang med

de// ji snyed 'di la tha dad bstan// bstan pa nyid na brjod las 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kun// chos sku'i mchod rten de las byung// byung ba nyid na rtog las 'das// khams gsum rgyud drug

sdug bsngal kyang// mchod rten ma rig de la yod// las dang sdug bsngal sbyong ba yang// mchod rten 'di las grub par bshad// mchod rten mngon par bstan pa las// gling gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i
le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs bzhi pos 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kun mkhyen ston pa dgongs su gsol// sems can kun
gyi don slad du// mchod rten dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can nyen pa'i don gyi phyir// gzugs sku'i mchod rten bshad du gsol// gnod pa'i rgyud nas bzlog pa'i phyir// sprul pa'i mchod rten bshad du

gsol// bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir// bsgrub bya'i thabs rnams bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa de thos pa dang/ ston pa de dge nas bzhad pa mi mnga' bar spyan gdangs nas ljags brkyang ste bka' stsal
pa// don de 'dod na legs par nyon// mchod rten rnam pa nyi shu po// nga yis phye ste bshad par bya'o// khyed rnams gang la 'tsham pa de// mthun par bstan pa 'di kun yin// sprul pa'i thabs su
khyad par mang/ don du gcig las mi chad do// de skad ces glengs bslang ba de ma thag la/ bcom ldan 'das de'i thugs ye shes las g.yos pa mi mnga' bar/ tha dad pa'i dbang gis snang ba mi mthun pa 'di

ltar gyur te/ la la ni 'og gser gyi sa gzhi/ de'i steng du rlung gi dkyil 'khorade'i stengadu chu'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du rin po che las grub pa'i ri rab dang gling du bcas pa'/ stong gsum gyi chen po'i mi

mjed kyi lo ka'i khams su snang ste/ de nas dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol du snang ste/ rtsa ba dmyal ba'i yul du zug/ sdong po klu yul du skyed/ lo 'dab yal ga sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i yul du skyes te/

del phyogs bzhir tshal chen po bzhi/ phyogs bzhi nas ngad ldang ba/ rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad lnga brgya ldang ba/ yal ga brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan par snang bar gyur to// la la ni me tog u dum 'bar ba'i rgyu sa bon
dang/ sa la myu gur gnas pa dang/ sdong bu dang/ yal ga dang/ lo 'dab dang/ 'bras bur smin pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sman dang rtsi bcud du 'gyur ro// la la na phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad mchod

rten chen po brgyad rang snang bar 'gyur ro// lho'i 'dzam bu gling du sprul pa'i mchod rten ka ni ka snang bar gyur to// lho nub mtshams su yid bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i ka ni ka dang/ nub tu dpe med bsam las

'das pa'i ka ni ka dang/ nub byang mtshams su rin chen brtsegs pa'i ka ni ka dang/ byang phyogs su smad grags chos kyi ka ni ka dang/ byang shar mtshams su khams gsum bde rgyas sgrol gyi mchod rten ka ni ka

dang/ shar phyogs su byams ldan btang snyoms gtar gyi mchod rten ka ni ka dang/ shar lhor don grub brgya khram brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ka ni ka cig 'byung bar gyur to// la la ni shAkya dang po yum gyi lhums su

zhugs pa dang/ shing la 'jus na bya snyengs mdzad nas bltams pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ dka' thub mdzad pa dang/ grong khyer du bsod snyoms mdzad pa dang/ de nas li'i yul du sbal lcong mi ru bsgyur ba

dang/ yul wA rA Na sir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ de nas rtag tu re ba sun dbyung ba'i don du rdo rje gdan la mngaun par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa nyid du snang bar gyur to// la la ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gad+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ byams pa rdo rje brtsegs pa yis mchod rten chen po cig rang byung// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+gA klung gi bye ma snyed na/ snying rje rang na brtsegs pa'i ka ni ka
cig byung/ nub phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+gA klung gi bye ma snyed na/ dga' ba rab snang pad ma brtsegs pa'i ka ni ka cig byung/ byang phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ma snyed

na/ btang snyoms rgya gram brtsegs pa'i ka ni ka cig rang byung du byung bar gyur to// la la ni ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ rdo

rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ dkyil 'khor bsam yas pa de snyed du snang bar gyur to// la lar ni lha dang lha mo'i tshogs brjod pa las 'das pa ji snyed du snang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

kun gyi bdag nyid ston pas bka' stsal pa// rtogs dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa'i// de bzhin nyid du gnas pa la// chos kyi sku zhes ngas bstan to// rtogs dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// tha snyad ma 'gags de

btags pas// gzugs brnyan zhes ni de las byung// ji ltar rgya mtsho dwangs pa la// gzugs brnyan sna tshogs snang ba bzhin// rgya mtsho gzugs brnyan gnyis ka la// snang dang snang bya'i rtog med de// tha dad

rtog pa de ltar snang// chos sku nyid dang mchod rten la// tha dad rtog pa mi mnga' ste// sems can rtog pa tha dad bzung// yang dag pa ru bstan pa med// phyi nang snod bcud dag rtogs na// mchod rten gcig
btab kun la gsal// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// skye med dbyings las thams cad skyes// rang 'byung mchod rten ye shes sku/ thugs rjes byin rlabs rmad po che// sems can yongs la sman pa 'byung// mi
bde'i sdug bsngal yongs bsal nas// sems can kun la byams sdug ldan// la lar ston pa dgyes par snang// la lar kun la 'chad par snang// la lar 'jig rten chags par snang// la lar dpag bsam
shing la spyod// la lar me tog u dum 'bar// la lar mdzad pa bcu gnyis 'byung// la lar rang 'byung mchod rten mthong// la lar rdo rje'i 'khor lor mthong// la lar de bzhin gshegs par mthong// la
lar dkyil 'khor dag tu snang// la lar theg pa dgu yi dbyibs// la lar logs spyod mthar spyod mthong// la lar yab yum rol par mthong// la lar sangs rgyas nyid du mthong// la lar las rnams
rdzogs par mthong// la lar sangs rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad du mthong// la lar mchod rten nyungs 'bru tsam// la las 'jig rten khams dang mnyam// la las bang rim bgrang du med// la lar bang rim bgrang du

yod// la las mchod rten gzhal yas khang// la las rdzu 'phrul ston par mthong// la las tha dad mang por mthong// mchod rten sku gdung bde ba la// dbye dang mi dbye gang yang med// ston pa mchod rten chos
kun la// tha dad bstan pa'i gsungs mi mnga'// zhes gsungs par snang ba'o// mchod rten mngon pa'i rgyu da las// gleng bslang ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas// dgyes pa cig las 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos rnams ye nas dag pa la// log rtog dbang gis ci zhig sgrib// chos sku skye med mchod rten la// gzugs brnyan sna

tshogs cir snang yang// kun kyang mchod rten rang bzhin no// phyi yi snod nyid gling rnams kyang// chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa la// skye med chos kyi sku zhes bya// de las mchod rten gzhan na med// bcud kyi
'jig rten 'gro ba kun// rin chen skye med rtogs pa las// rig pa'i ye shes gsal bas na// don dam mchod rten de nyid do// phyi nang snod bcud gnyis med la// dbyings dngaye shes gnyis med la// chos sku
zhi rtog med la// gzugs sku mchod rten dbyings su bstan// yul dang dbang po rnam shes rnams// thams cad ye nas ye shes la// mchod rten dbyibs su snang ba las// gzhan du rtog pa ga la yod// sa dang

me dang chu dang rlung// thams cad kyi ni nam mkha' rnams// gnyis med chos skur gyur pas na// mchod rten dbyings su tha dad gsal// skye 'gro g.yo dang mi g.yo rnams// las kyi dbang gis tha dad kyang// yang
dag don du rtag byas nas// mchod rten tha dad bsam yas so// dngos rnams nyid nas dngos med pas// brtags pa'i snang ba'i dngos po med// mchod rten dngos po med pa'o// gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas
sku// khams gsum srid gsum dus gsum rnams la snang// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// mchod rten sku gsum lhun grub pa// rtsa ba byang chub sems rtogs na// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// chos
sku mchod rten rtsa ba ste// rang gi sems las gzhan na med// bdag dang gzhan dang dngos po rnams// ye nas chos nyid yin shes na// chos nyid dngos dang bral ba de// kun gyis mchod rten gnas so// las

rnams rgya mtsho spyad byas kyang// don mchod rten chos sku 'grub// las kyang mchod pa yin pas na// las la rton pas mchod rten no// lta ba che la bdag gnas na// mchod rten kun gyi mnga' bdag yin// bdag
la mchod cing bdag la rten// gzhan gyi mchaug rten tha snyad yin// bdag gi mchod rten don dam yin// gzhan la ma bskor bdag la bskor// gzhan la ma mchaud bdag la mchod// bdag la bdag nyid

dbang thob bya// bdag la bdag nyid sku khrus gsol// rang 'byung mchod rten bya ba de// rang las byung bas rang byung ngo// sprul pa'i mchod rten sna tshogs kyang// bdag gis spyod pas gzhan la 'dul// sprul
pas 'dul ba'i mchod rten ni// dbyings kyi bye brag de dag kyang// bdag nyid chen po 'di las 'byung// bdag nyid ces pa gnyis med don// tha dad byung bas chad pa sel// sna tshogs snang la

rang bzhin med// rgya mtsho me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// snang yang tha dad rtog pa med// sa 'jim la sogs byams pa dang// rmang dang khri 'phang bang rim rnams// bum rten bum pa srog shing dang// 'khor lo
char khab tog bum dbu// thabs dang shes rab gnyis po la// sku gsum rtags su bstan pa kun// tha snyad yin te mtshon pa'i phyir// thabs kyi dbyings dang mtshan du bstan// yang dag don la kun
med// gser dngul 'khar zangs la sogs pa// lugs dang brdungs dang bstod la sogs// sems can don du bstan mod kyi// yang dag mchod rten de dag min// dar dang za 'og tshon rtsi dang// shing la

sogs pa bris pa de// mtshon pa tsam du bstan pa las// chos kyi sku la bstan pa med// skor phor gzugs dang phyung ba ste// mtshon pa yin te don du med// btabs pa gzhan yang sna tshogs la// ston pas bstan
te mthun pa'i phyir// ston pa'i ston pa de nyid dang// ston pa'i bka' brgyud de dang tshig/ sems can bstan pa'i gnas rnams dang// de la sogs pa bsam yas kun// de dag thams cad sgyu ma 'dra// sgyu mas

gzhan dag tshim byed kyang// gzhan dang sgyu ma gnyis ka la// don du grub pa gang yang med// gzugs su bstan pa'i mchod rten yang// dam pa'i don du dngos po med// lta ba 'di la gnas pa ni// sangs rgyas

nyid du nges pa'o// mchod rten mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// lta ba'i ngang la gnas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun dang mthun pa ru yong bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces

gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// rtog bral chos nyid ngang las ma g.yos kyang// sems can don du chos kyi sku ru bzhengs// yid bzhin lhun grub bkra shis gzhal yas 'dir// rang 'byung ye nas

dag pa chos kyi sku// nges par mkhyen pa'i rmad 'byung ka ni ka/ rnam dag pad ma rgyas pa'i gdan stengs na// 'og gi rmang khri ya mtshan rdo rje brag/ gyen du khri 'phang ya mtshan dkon mchog gsum// shel gyi bum pa

dri ma med par dag/ srog shing ma skyes byang chub sems kyi ngang// mi gnas mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings dang 'dra// khams gsum mi 'gyur g.yu rung byang chub mkhar// skyon bral yang dag don gyi mchod rten
yang// thugs rje'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings nas gzigs// sngon gyi smon lam dbang dang da lta'i thugs rje yis// shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten na// rin chen ri bo dag pa'i mchod rten
bzhugs// gzhi rmang dge bcu pad+ma dag pa na// dran pa nyer gzhag rmang gi khri 'phang gdan// sdig pa spangs pa'i rim pa gnyis pa lags// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi rim pa gsum pa dge/ rnam

grol dbang po lnga yi rim pa bzhi pa bzang// stobs lnga byin bsdus bum pa kun tu zlum// thugs rje tshad med srog shing gzhung btsugs 'dra// bdus bzhi pham mdzad chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzi// bla med mnyes
pas gdugs mchog kha la 'phags// rnam dag tshul khrims me tog 'phreng ba bzang// des par mkhyen pa'i rmad byung ka ni ka/ khyad bar cir yang 'phags pa'i sku gzugs sna tshogs bstan// rnam dag zab mo
chos dbyings dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// 'khrul pa ting 'dzin chags phyir sku bstan pa// 'khor lo brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// byams pa
chen po tshad med yangs pa'i chos// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad cing// me long lta bu'i chos kyi don rtogs pa// byams pa brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// dga' rab don phyir
'phrul pa'i sems spangs pa// 'jig med rin chen bang rim brtsegs pa la// sprul pa'i yon tan tshogs kyi 'phreng bas brgyan// rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs rtog bral
pad+ma 'byung ba'i gnas// dga' ba brtsegs pa'i mchod rten bdud bzhi 'joms// bum pa chos dbyings spros pa med pa'i dbyings// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i
sdug bsngal las kyis sbyongs// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma kun bcom nas// bsod nams dge tshul 'phags rnams mchod rten brtsegs// byang chub rdzogs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// rigs lnga ye

shes lnga dang sku mtshan lnga// rang bzhin lhun grub ngang las ma spros kyang// bden pa'i ye shes bzhi yang lnga lngar ldan// rigs bzhi sems dpa' bzhi bzhis bskor ba yang// 'gro ba'i don du mchod rten lnga lngar

sprul cing gshegs su gsol// shAkya thub pa sprul pa'i sangs rgyas te// sku yi 'od zer sprul pas sgrib pa sbyong// sprul pa sna tshogs mchod rten dbyings su bstan// 'dod 'byung sprul pa'i mchod rten gshegs su
gsol// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed bsod nam bsags// yid bzhin dpag bsam la sogs mchod rten brgyad// dge tshul bsod nams bsags pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// theg pa sna tshogs
sgo nas bgrod pa yang// byang chub sems mchog gang la skyes pa de// theg pa kun gyi mchod rten gshegs su gsol// byang chub gzhan yang mgron gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang// la las chos kyi srungs ma
dang// dad pas nyan pa'i 'khor tshogs dang// chos kyi kun nas 'brel ba las// byang chub sems 'di dmigs pa mchog/ sems can don du gnas par bya// chos kyi dbyings nyid rtogs dang
bral// de rtogs mchod rten gnas pa yi// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang dag na// mchod rten gnas pa ye nas gnas// spyan drangs byon pa mi mnga' ste// bkur sti rim gro'i tshul gyis na// dngos su gzugs
brnyan mchod rten bzhugs// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// tha dad mchod rten gnas nas bskyod// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa rnams// dus gsum dag tu mtshon nas 'dren// byang chub sems
dpar grags pa rnams// dbyings nas spyan 'dren mchod kyi gshegs// yang dag don du gshegs bzhud mi mnga' yang// sems can dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir// rdo rje'i gdan dang pad+ma'i gdan// rin chen khri la
sogs pa'i gdan// rig pa'i byin rlabs dag gis gding// gdan dang mtshan ma'i rigs rnams bzhugs// mchod rten bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos su dad pas dmigs shing bsam// yang na chos sku

gcig tu bsdu// mang por bshad kyang bsdu ba de// chos sku nyid la rtog mi mnga'// 'dul ba'i dbang gis snang ba yi// zhes gsungs so// mchod rten mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// spyan drangs pa ltar bstan
pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhen gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'dus nas 'di skad gsungs so// gsang sngags don du bsngags pa ni// dam tshig don du bsngags pa ste// yon tan
bsam yas 'di las 'byung// lta bas bstas nas gcig las med// bsrung dang bsgrub phyir dam tshig ste// 'das pa rnams la skyon du gzhag/ bsrungs na mchod rten sku ru gzhag/ dad la slob dpon mnyes
par bya// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// shes pas phyag dang gus pas bkur// sems la sel med dad pas gdung// da lta'i slob dpon dngos la yang// dngos su bkur du yod pa de// med na ji lta
bkur bar bya// bla ma'i bla ma de la bskur// de yang med na bla ma'i bla ma grogs// bla ma dngos su bsam la bkur// ci ste zhe na don dam cig/ gal te lan cig bla ma yi// bla ma gang yin bdag ces

'dzin// de la bkur bar byar rung na// bla ma'i dam tshig dbang yin pas// bla ma'i bla ma gong mar gsal// slob dpon sku la mnyam pas na// chos sku bshig pa'i sdig pas che// bla ma'i grib ma 'gom byas na/

sangs rgyas sku bsad sdig pa mnyam// bla ma'i gsung la sgros btags na// lce yi dbang po brgya bar 'gyur// de re zhe re slebs pa la tshal pa'i zhing rmo lta bur 'gyur// bla ma'i gsung la skur btab na// lce yi
dbang po mi ldan zhing// dam pa'i chos dang gtan du 'bral// sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab bo// slob dpon thugs la smod pa ni// rang gi sgron me rang gsod 'dra// bskal pa brgya ru mun par

'khyams// thar pa'i skabs med rigs chad yin// de bas smad par mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor ngo ston dbang bskur pa'i// slob dpon de la smod pa ni// ro myags mtsho yi nang du skye// me tog gling la dmigs ltas
te// ro myags sdug bsngal las kyis mnar// steng nas lcags kyi tho lum gyis// sdig cing khong du sreg par byed// me tog gling du ga la phyin// de bas nges par slob dpon bkur// ston pas gsungs pa'i
bka' las ni// slob dpon mgo la dam tshig dmigs// slob dpon mgo ltar bkur bar bya// rang mgo bcad pas smad pa tha// bka' stsal mig ltar bkur bar bya// rang mig rang gis bcar ba bas// slob
dpon tshad ma'i mgo bcad thu// de bas bkur ba'i rim pa gyis// bkur ba mgo ltar yun du khur// man ngag mig ltar yun du tshos// snying gi dkyil du kun tu zhog/ mched lcam gcig la gcig srung
na// 'jig rten 'di la lhan cig tu// lus mchog bzhin du thugs mchog bskyed// thugs mchog dus dang rnam bzhi ru// mi 'bral khrag dang chu ser 'dra// lhan cig mnyan bsam bsgom byas pa// de rnams don

la dbyer med pas// dus dang bskal ba'i mtha' med cing// de rnams brgya la ngan smod na// rang srog rang gcod dpe dang 'dra// rang gi don la rang smod pa// bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du// tsha grang brgyad
kyi sdug bsngal myong// mchod rten dag la smod pa ni// rang gi sems nyid gtan spangs nas// rigs chad gnas su sdug bsngal myong// chos sku gzugs brnyan ma rtogs na// legs par dge bcu spyad byas

kyang// lhar skye lan cig lhung bar 'gyur// thugs kyi dam tshig mchod rten yin// byang chub sems nyid spros bral bas// chos sku gzugs brnyan mchod rten yin// de ltar rtogs na nyams pa med// phyi nang snod
bcud ma lus pa// rang bzhin dag pa gsum du shes// kun rdzob gzugs brnyan dag pa dang// don dam dngos med dag pa dang// gnyis su med pa chos kyi sku// de ltar rtogs na dam tshig yin// phyag rgya

mchod rten yin pa ste// mchod rten nyid kyang phyag rgyar gsal// rigs dang lha rnams phyag rgya rnams// mchod rten dbyings su tha dad bstan// de nyid srungs na nyams pa med// dkyil 'khor ri mo'i gzugs la

sogs// tha dad mang por ston pa yang// de rnams nyid ni mchod rten yin// de ltar bsgoms na nyams pa med// kri ya'i mchod rten bzhengs pa na// mchod rten dbyings don rtogs pa dang// gru bzhi dag par bya
ba dang// dmigs pa yan lag ldan pa rnams// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lngar ldan dang// nya sha la phug sgog btsong spang/ cho ga'i yan lag tshang bar bya// de ltar bsrungs na dngos grub thob// mtshan

nyid theg pa skur bzhengs na// sdom pa nyi shu phyi nang bsrung// byang chub mchog gi chos rnams dang// sum cu rtsa brgyad rtogs pa las// de 'dra'i sku ni gzugs bzhengs na// dus gsum sangs rgyas dmigs byas
la// de la mchod pa lugs mthun 'bul// de las gzhan gyur skyon rnams spang// de ltar gzhung lugs ma nor na// dngos grub gang 'dod de ltar 'grub// sdom pa gnas pas gnas pas byas na 'grub// rang
sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la// rten 'brel zab mo rtogs pa dang// sder langs blo can gang yang rung// sku yi gzugs brnyan bzhengs gsol nas// rten 'brel snying po bris btsug na// rten 'brel rtogs na

sdom pa yi// sa yang sdom pa gnas pas 'grub// nyan thos sgor zhugs dge slong dag/ mchod rten bzhengs su gsol ba na// rmang dang khri 'phang bang rim rnams// bum rten bum pa la sogs pa// srog shinga'akhor
lo tog dang bcas// nyan thos theg pa chos kyi lugs// mchod rten de la tshang bar bstan// nyis brgya lnga bcu bsrung byas nas// mchod la nyan thos lugs bzhin dbul// de gzhung ldan de de bdag
'grub// dkyil 'khor mchod rten bsam yas kyang// dam pa'i don du gzhung bzhin dpyad// dam tshig bsrungs pa de ka bzhin// sdom pa med na dam tshig gang// dam tshig med na yon tan gang// dam tshig

ces su bshad pa de// sgrub pa po yi snying po'i yin// 'di la gnas pa'i sgrub pa po// myur du dngos grub thob par byed// dam tshig med par gyur pa na// mchod rten gzhung ltar bshad byas kyang// 'bras bu yon

tan mi 'grub ste// dmyal bar nges par lhung bar bstan// dper na sa bon tshig pa las// chu lud rkyen gyis bran byas kyang// myu gu 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// yid chad nyon mongs skye bar 'gyur// rtsa ba rtsa ba'i

dam tshig ni// sems nyid dag pa chos kyi sku// mchod rten gzugs su shes pa 'o// rtsa ba'i yan lag dam tshig ni// slob dpon mched lcam khur ba yin// yan lag rtsa bar bstan pa ni// sngags dang phyag rgya

bcing bzlas pa// dbang ma thob par 'chad pa dang// theg pa dman pa smad pa yin// rtsa ba'i yan lag tu bshad// mngor na so sor ma shes na// bsrungs kyang nyams pa'i bag la gnas// ngo ma shes na ming mi

shes// mun pa sros nas nam mkha' 'gag/ lta ba'i dam tshig spyi ru bzhag/ spyod pa gnas na spyod pa bsrung// 'phrin las byed na las kyi bsrungs// 'tsham par bsrungs na dam pa yin// nyams pa'i bzhi ni de
las med// dngos su bsrungs par bya ba la// mchod rten mi spang rtag tu spangs na sems nyid spangs// mchod rten rtag tu bcangs pa de// rtsa ba sems nyid rtogs pa yin// mchod rten spangs par

gyur pa na// yan lag cho ga tshang byas kyang// mchod rten spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// chu shing rul pa dngos dang 'dra// mchod rten yangs pa'i gang zag de// kha yis theg pa kun 'chad kyang// bra kha nas kyis
bcad pa 'dra// spre lcam dgongs med mchod rten spong// kha yis bzlas pa byed pa yang// ting 'dzin mchod rten ma gsal na// dmus long mdog la 'chad pa 'dra// rang bzhin mchod rten rtogs par bya// ting
'dzin mchod rten sems kyi bsgom// gzugs brnyan mchod rten bzhengs par bya// mchod rten bsam gyis mi khyab kyang// sems can rnams kyi don phyir bstan// don dam mchod rten chos skur bstan// theg
pa'i bye brag med pa la// mchod rten bye brag bstan mi bya// gzugs brnyan mchod rten bzhengs pa la// rab tu gnas pa'i mchod pa yis// dngos grub zhal gso ma byas na// rin chen rnyed nas blangs bskur

'dra// rab gnas byas pa'i sku gdung 'dra// dngos su bskor ba ma byas na// chos sku ma rtogs spang bar 'gyur// bskal pa'i sgrib pas sgribs pa yin// bskor bas bskal pa'i sdig sgrib byang// dam tshig mchod

rten bskor ba yin// sku gdung dag la phyag mi 'tshal// byang chub sems rtogs chos kyi sku// chos kyi sku la mi gus pa// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams dang 'dra// dngos su phyag byas dngos grub thob// dam tshig med
par gyur pa na/ chos sku'i gzugs brnyan med par 'gyur// dam tshig yod par byung pa la// nam yang bde ba med par bshad// mchod rten mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// mchod rten gyi dam tshig bstan pa'i
le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas// mchod rten 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs pa// chos la dmigs pa
bdag med pas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan dpag med tha dad bstan// theg pa gcig dang theg pa lnga// gzugs brnyan mchod rten de ltar 'byung// mchod rten dag la gcig tu mnyam// theg pa'i dbyings la
so so'o// mnyam nyid chos skur mchod rten mnyam// de la dbye ba'i rtog pa med// gang zag blo la dbye ba snang// don dam nyid du gcig las med// lnga bstan blo yi rim pas snang// de las gzhan yang bsam

mi khyab// de la nyan thos mchod rten cha lugs ni// chos gos bzhi bltab byas pa'i steng// spar bu kha spub dag tu bzhag/ gseg shang bgreng lta bu ste// 'phags pa nyan thos mchod rten yin// rang rgyal dag gi
mchod rten ni// rmang la khri 'phang med pa ste// bang rim bzhi pa bden pa bzhi// bum rten bum par bcas pa ste// srog shing dang ni tog gis brgyan// 'khor lo brgyad pa sa brgyad yin// 'di
ni nyan thos 'khor lor bzhag/ 'dir ni 'khor lo bcu gnyis pa// rang rgyal rnams kyis bzhengs gsol pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i mchod rten ni// gdan khri bang rim gcig par bcas// bang rim bzhi pa

bum rten bcas// bum pa bre ga kha khyer bcas// srog shing tog dang char khab bcas// 'khor lo zla ba bcu tshes bcas// byang chub sems dpa'i sku gdung yin// kri ya'i mchod rten bya ba ni// rmang gi khri 'phang
gsum par bya// dbus kyi snying po zur bzhir bstan// bang rim gsum gsum dgu brtsegs gtang// dang po gsum ni yid tsam dgye// bar pa gsum ni yid tsam sgu// tha ma gsum ni yid tsam dgye// 'khor
lo bcu gnyis rim par ldan// bum rten bum pa bre gar bcas// srog shing tog dang char khab bcas/ kri ya'i sku gdung yin par bshad// rnal 'byor sku gdung mtshan nyid ni// rmang gi bang rim gnyis pa

ste// dbus kyi snying po zur bzhir bad// bad kyi snying po zur bzhir bad// bad kyi tshad ni 'bur bzhir dgod// de steng kha khyer gnyis pa dgod// kha khyer la yang 'bur tshang gtang// de nas mchod rten lnga par

bya// rdo rje rtse lnga bgreng ba 'dra// bang rim lnga dang bum rten lnga// bum pa lnga dang srog shing lnga// me tog char khab lnga rnams bya// 'khor lo bcu gsum rim par bya// zla tshes rtse la lnga lnga bya// gzhan yang 'khor lo

lta bu brtsegs// pad+ma brtsegs rin chen brtsegs// rgya gram brtsegs pa la sogs rnams// rdo rje brtsegs pa bshad pa bzhin// rim pa gtang ba tshang bar bya// tha dad mchod rten bshad pa ni// sgo mangs bkra

shis mchod rten ni// mchod rten bzhi yi chen por bya// de la glo 'bur che chung bzhi// ngos bzhi nas ni bskyed par bya// bang rim lnga lnga gtang bar bya// dbus kyi cha yi snying po ni// ngos bzhi dag la bcu bcu sgo//
'dor na sgo ni bzhi bcu yod// ngos gcig dag ni 'bur la yang// ngos gsum yod de sgo gnyis gdod// 'bur gyi g.yas g.yon gnyis bzhi ru// sgo ni rnam pa gnyis stod nas// mdo ru bzhi dang drug la

bcu// bcu phrag bzhi la bzhi bcu tham// bang rim lnga yi 'og ma la// sgo ni nyi shu gzhug par bya// de yi de las re re gzhag/ de ltar gzhag pas nyi shu yod// de ltar gnyis la drug cu'o// phyi ma bang rim bzhi po

la// nyi shu yod pa rim pa bzhin// de las gzhan ma mthun par bya// 'khor lo lnga ru bstan pa'o// bum pa zlum po'i mchod rten ni// 'og gi rmang yang zlum po la// rim pa gcig tu bshad pa yin// bzhi yang
zlum la bang rim yang// zlum po nyid du bstan pa yin// nam yang bang rim phyi bzhin bya// bum pa char khab 'khor lo rnams// phyi nang nang med par gsal bar bya// nang na chos sku gzugs brnyan

rnams// lnga bcu zur dang bang rim lnga// bcu zur bang rim bco lnga pa// 'khor lo lnga bcu yang na lnga// zur bzhi bang rim bzhi pa de// rgyas pa'i las te bum rten ni// rin chen zur brgyad dag tu bshad// zur
gsum zla gam la sogs rnams// mchod rten dbyings su gang yang bstan// rdul gcig rdul snyed la sogs rnams// mchod rten gzugs su ye nas bstan// sku yi mchod rten sna tshogs te// dbyibs dang sku
mdog la sogs rnams// mtshon pa thabs kyi rgyal po yin// ma 'ongs pa yi sems can la// sku yi mchod rten bstan pa'o// gsung gi mchod rten cha lugs ni// man ngag tshig gi snying po brjod// bshad pa mdo
sde gsung rab brjod// don dam nyid du dngos med pas// gsung gi mchod rten gzung du med// thugs kyi mchod rten cha lugs ni// dpe med bsam 'das nam mkha' che// ting nge 'dzin pas cir yang
gsal// ye shes nyid las cir yang 'phags// thams cad mkhyen pas sku gsum 'grub// chos sku rtogs med kun las 'das// byang chub sems la dmigs pa med// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs te// nam

mkha'i mtha' dang rgya mtsho'i rdzings// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten bris// 'ja' tshon lta bur dngos po med// snang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal// sku gdung mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// mchod rten gyi
dbyibs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rigs lnga dang/ rigs gsum dang/ rigs brgya phrag mtha' yas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang/ lha dang/
mi dang/ 'jig rten pa dad pas nyan pa bsam yas dang/ rtsol ba byed kun 'dir rang rang gi dad pas ston pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du 'dus nas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems
dpa' rnams/ rtog dang bral te mnyam pa'i ngang/ khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba kun/ rgyal chen lha dang phyogs skyong rnams/ mi yi dam pa khom ldan kun// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan 'di dag ltos/ zhes brjod pa
las/ la la ni dus de nyid du bde ba thob/ la la ni rtog pa skyes nas sems bskyed/ la la ni brgyal ba las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis langs nas/ ston pa la zhu pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so/ bde bar
gshegs pa legs so// zhes zhus pa dang/ ston pas bka' stsal par dgongs te/ ko'u shi ka gang de'i lo// ko'u shi ka zhes gsungs nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa des/ brgya byin dad
nas/ bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ ston pa chen po lung bstan du gsol/ zhes gus pa bskor ba byas/ zhabs la gtugs nas zhus pa

dang/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka ngas bshad kyis/ rna ba lhogs la nyon ces bka' stsal pa dang/ yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis zhus pa/ ston pa chen po thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas byang chub
sems dpa' rnams/ rtog dang bral te mnyam pa'i ngang/ khams gsum gnas pa'i 'gro ba kun/ rgyal chen lha dang phyogs skyong rnams/ mi yi dam pa khom ldan kun/ chos sku'i gzugs brnyan ji ltar lta// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// ston pa chen pos lung 'di ston// zhes zhus pa dang/ de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'di ni thugs yang dag pa'i yang dag pa/

mchod rten thams cad mngon par mthong bar rtogs par byed pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ oM dan d+harma/ a sho ka bi ma le dza yA/ d+harmA d+hA tu gar b+he swA hA/ i dan te pus pa/ a lo ke g+han d+he sarba big nan/ ma ha

ya sha dz+nyA na/ e ha hi ma hANi ka ho sa kA ru rba big dzA// sarba bi gar pa ti sta badzra ya sa na swA hA/ zhes gsungs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnams su/ chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan
gyis gang bar gsal bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/ lha dang klu la sogs pa kun 'jigs/ skrag/ brgyal/ breg par gyur to// rgyal po mig mi bzang gi mig g.yas pa bltas pas/
'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad 'jig pa ltar mthong// mig g.yon pas bltas pas// sems can thams cad 'jir par mthong// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi mig gnyis bltas pas// 'jig rten
gyi khams su mi nad dang phyugs nad mang po 'phel ba dang// sems can ma dad pa dang mchod rten la ma gus pa rnams ni shin tu sdug bsngal// dad cing gus pa rnams ni dus de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas par gyur to// de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gzigs nas// yang bcom ldan 'das la// bcom ldan 'das zhes bos nas zhus pas// thugs rje chen po ji ltar na// mchod rten lung tsam ji lta
bu// sems can nyon mongs ji lta bu// sems can nyon mongs gang las byung// rgyal po bde bar gang gis byas// ston pa chen pos bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang// yang bka' stsal pa// snying po brjod
pas chos sku yi// gzugs brnyan mchod rten gsal bar 'gyur// sems can skal ldan bde ba thob// thugs rje yongs la snyam snyoms bskyed// rang 'byung mchod rten sprul pa'i gdung// thams cad mchod rten
dag tu bstan// dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// ma dad pa yis sdug bsngal myong// sdug bsngal chen po nyes pa de// las kyi mchod rten spangs pa dang// rtog pas sgrib pa de las byung// rgyal
po rnams kyis de ma rtogs// zhes gsungs pa dang// sems can thams cad las gyur// rgyal pos bdag gzhan sdug bsngal snyed// ston pas mchod rten byin rlobs gsungs// sdug bsngal 'di las skyab tu
gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ de nas yang 'og tu yang phyag btsal te gus pas/ kye ma bcom ldan bshad du gsol// bstan du gsol/ ston pas yang bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po gnyis mig ltas pas 'jig pa dang/
la las ni ltas pas mi nad phyugs nad sel/ nyon mongs pa 'di rnams la nga yis phan par bya yis/ mig ltos/ rna ba lhogs la/ sems ma yengs par gus pas nyon cig/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyed

cag dang/ phyogs skyong ba bcu dang/ lha dang klu la sogs pa kun/ sngon yang dge bshes 'ga' spyad pas der grub pa ste/ chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan ma mthong ba dang/ ma gus pa dang/ ma dad pa las byung
ba'o// zhes gsungs pa dang/ de'i mod la bcom ldan 'das kyis gdung sha ri ram cig/ ring bsrel mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs nas/ mig mi bzang gi smin phrag tu bzhag pas/ mig mi bzang gi mig nad
sel te/ bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// gcig ring bsrel mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs nas/ rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi phyag tu bzhag pa dang/ lo ka'i khams kyi mi nad phyugs nad kun chad nas/ bde ba

dang ldan par gyur to// de ltar gyur pas 'dod khams kyi lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis mngon sum du phyag btsal/ bskor ba byas te bde ba thob par

byas so// de nas mi yul du bzhengs su gsol ba ni/ rgyal po chen po d+harma ag sho ka bya ba de pho brang gdab par gnad ste/ rgyal po de la sras gsum mnga' ba las/ 'bangs mang po mnga' pa las/ lan cig na
sras kun dang 'bangs mang po bsogs nas bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis nga'i thugs dang 'thad pa'i pho brang cig rtsigs shig gsungs nas/ thugs dang gar 'thad ces glengs pas/ rgyal pos gsungs pa/
ri gsum gyi rtse/ lung gsung gyi rtse/ lung gsum gyi mdo gle'u can dang/ de gsum du rtsigs shig zer te/ ri gsum gyi rtser brtsigs pas bdud kyi byar sar babs/ lung gsum gyi mdo ni bgegs kyi rgyun rang

sar babs/ gle'u gsum ni srin po'i skur sa bcar te/ rgyal po nyid kyang snyung gis zin/ mi nad phyugs nad yang 'phel te/ rab tu sdug bsngal/ nyon mongs/ duHkha par gyur pa la/ der rgyal po 'gyod pa skyes
nas/ rgyal po nyid kyi la na re/ nga yi pho brang gdab nyes sam/ 'chi bdag bdud kyis cher zin te/ 'jig rten khams yang nyon mongs nyen/ sras 'brangs mang po 'dir 'dus dang/ zhes gsungs
nas/ mchi ma yang zags pa las/ der sras 'bangs kyis zhus pa/ bka' stsal dang zhes zhus pa dang/ rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ dam chos yang dag bden pa la/ chos sku'i gzugs brnyan gsogs med na/

sprul pa'i mchod rten don byed na/ nga la thugs rjes gzigs su gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang// srod la zhal ches bor ba'i tho rangs mnal ma'i rmi lam na/ gsung rab kyi nang nas khyad du shel gyi glegs shing la

mthing shog gser gyi yi ge bris pa/ bai DU r+ya'i zhun mas rang chas su gsal ba cig sngas su babs shing rmi ba dang/ snyun yang dwangs pa snyam byed pa las las/ mnal sad nas bltas pas de bzhin du 'dug
nas phyag tu bzhengs nas ltas pas/ mchod rten chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs baAHna du bzhengs su gsol ba'i rgyud/ sku mngon par bstan pa' rgyud 'di bzhugs par gyur to// de
nas rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ sras dang 'bangs rnams bsogs nas/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i don rtogs par gyur to// nga'i rgyal srid kyang khyed cag zung zhig nga'i thugs yang dag pa'i

mchod rten sku gdung mchod rten brgya tham pa yang phyogs bcur bzhengs su gsol cig ces gsungs pa dang/ sras 'bangs kyang dga' bas rab tu dad par gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo// zhes byas pa'o/ de nas sprul pa'i mchod rten
de nyid ni/ sprul pa'i shAkya thub par gyur te bka' stsal pa/ sprul pa'i mchod rten bdag nyid kyis/ rgyal po'i gros 'khrul sdug bsngal bsal/ ri gsum rtser brtsigs bdud kyi bya ra zhi// lung gsum mdor
brtsigs bgegs kyi rgyu srang gcod// sde'u can gsum srin po'i lkugs sa gshig grong khyer phyogs bzhir sku gdung bzhengs gsol pas// grong khyer bkra shis nad rnams kyis mi tshugs// rgyal sras tha chung

grongs pa yang// spur sbyongs thal rus tsha tshwa btab pa yis// mchod rten brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzhengs pa yin// da lta sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams ston pa mdzad// de yang sprul pa'i mchod rten byin rlabs
yin// don de rigs pa'i sngags 'chang gis// sku gdung mchod rten bzhengs zhal gso// gzugs brnyan mchod rten shes rab sku// bdud kyi sde dang gshin rje'i 'khor// srin po'i 'khor dang lha ma
yin// gnod sbyin ma rungs gnod byed dang// gzi byin stobs chen mi zad pa// gnod byed mang po'i lam srang gcod// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dag gis byed// ces 'byung ngo// rang 'byung gi mchod rten
bsam yas dang// rang bzhin gyi mchod rten bsam yas dang// byang chub sems pa'i mchod rten bsam yas dang// sprul pa'i mchod rten bsam yas pa de snyed ji snyed cig/ de las 'byung bar

'gyur bar kun gyis dus gcig tu mkhyen par gyur to// chos kyi gzugs brnyan sku mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las/ byung khungs kyi gleng gzhi dang/ gleng gzhi'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas

rigs lnga'i sangs rgyasa'adus nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid ston pa rnam par snang mdzad la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bstan du gsol/ zhes bya ba de thos ma thag tu ma 'ongs
pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// chos nyid sku yi gzugs brnyan ni// sems can rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir// mchod rten
dkyil 'khor bsgrubs las 'brel// thabs kyi bre brag bstan pa la// sa gsang mthon dman med pa la// sgang dang rgyang gzhungs legs pa dang// dgongs pa'i bye brag yin na gang// de ru sa la mtshams gcod

bya// nyungs kar dang ni drag rdzas te// de la khro rgyal sngags kyis bzla// las mkhan gtso bor bskyed byas nas// drag tu sngags bzla mtshams gcod bya// g.yog po'i thig skud sna nas drang// las kyi lha ru

bsam pas bskyed// oM badzra su tra hUM phaT// ces brjod pas// thig skud rdo rjer bsams la// mchod rten gyi sa khyon ji tsam ran par des gdab pa'o// de nas gnyis ka langs byas nas// dbang ldan phyogs su
rdo rje 'gros// rnam 'joms bzlos shing lan gsum bskor// de nas dbus dang grwa rnams su// bgegs rnams med cing bstan pa'i phyir// grwa bzhi dbus dang lnga rnams su// de ru sngags pa'i phur pa

gdab// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba Sh+tan hUM phaT// de lan bdun dngos grub tu bzlas so// de nas las rnams nges bya'i phyir// nyungs kar khro rgyal sgom byas la// sngags kyis drag tu bskul bar bya// oM a mri ta

kun+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT// ces brjod la de'i tho phyi kun tu gtor// de nas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// sa yi cho ga rgyal par bya// mchod rten lnga dang gtor ma rnams// sa bdag lha klu kun la 'bul// 'tshe ba

med na dngos grub myur// de nas sa brko legs par sbyang// oM badzra kha na kha na hUM phaT// ces brjod pas sa gzhi de nyid rin po cher gyur par bya'o// de nas mchod rten mngon bzhengs nas// tshad rnams gzhung
bzhin legs par brtsigs// de yang dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// rang bzhin lhun grub mchod rten de// ting nge 'dzin gyis drangs bzhugs na// rtag chad gnyis kyi dbang du 'gyur// bris nas zhal gso dngos
pa gsum du gzhal// snam bu ngos su cha gcig gzhag/ de las tshad rjes gcig tu bya// ngos gsum po yang de bzhin bya// tshad bzhi rjes bzhi ngos bzhi dang// zur la zhugs kyi tshad re'o// bya tshad

rjes kyang de la bya// gru bzhi lham par byas pa dang// da ci'i zur gcig dbyi bar bya// phyi ma thig bcu rim par gdab// gnyis ka btab pas re mig rgya// mchod rten khol ma rgya zhig dgod// ngos kyi 'bur du

gnyis gnyis brgyad// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzhengs pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// de nas mtshon la mchod pa ni// 'breng la thabs rnams brgyad du bya// mchod rten brgyad du nang du bri// tha na gcig ste

dbus su bri// yang na gling bzhi gzugs brnyan bzhi// theg pa'i dbyibs kyis bshad pa ste// bzhengs su gsol na khol mas bya// yang na re mig lnga par bya// yang na mchod rten zlum po la// bang rim nang du

gtang bar bya// 'phrin las bzhi dang sbyar ba ni// mchod rten dbyibs kyang de bzhin 'gyur// dbus mi mthun la phyi rol mthun// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad byas la// mchod rten brgyad du bri bar bya// mchod rten

dbyibs nyid dkyil 'khor 'dra// brgyad dang bzhi dang lnga dang gsum// brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong 'bum kun// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan yin par bstan// mdor na phyi nang snod bcud rnams rnams// mchod rten
bye brag sna tshogs snang// dbyibs dang kha dog gzugs la sogs// mtshan ma'i gzugs brnyan yin pa las// mchod rten dkyil 'khor gzhan na med// de ltar rtogs nas mngon mchod na// don du mi 'gyur
gang yang med// de ltar ma rtogs mchod byas kyang// las su 'bad na don dam med// dngos su bzhengs su gsol mchod na// yong bar brtan na rtag par 'gyur// med par brtag na chad par 'gyur// rtag
chad gnyis las 'das pa ste// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rtag chad med// mtha' dbus med la rang bzhin gsal// de las mchod rten bsam yas 'gyur// mtshon pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa las// don dam

nyid du gang yang med// de skad dag pas bka' stsal to// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang
mi mthun par bstan pa'i phyir// ston pas sku rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsgyur te bzhugs pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thanas cad 'dus nas zhus pa// ston pa thugs rje ldan pa khyod// sems can don du
bshad pa shod// ces zhus pa dang/ de nas ston pa de tig nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// mi mthun pa 'di bka' stsal pa// sems can rnam pa mang po la// dad pas gang 'dod 'dir bstan gyis// shes
pa dam grub myur// yang dag don gyis gsungs pa 'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i lnga de nub// thig pa'i don du bsgrubs// dam pa'i don du gcig las med// la la don la la la rtags// gnas
skabs 'di ru 'di dag bshad// dang thog skor phor snod kyi gzhi// gzugs brnyan 'byung gnas chos dbyings la// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan gsal bar gnas// de nas bzhengs su gsol ba ni// sngags

mkhan ting 'dzin ldan byas la// dang po chos dbyings stong pa ru// byang chub sems kyi bsgom pa las// de nas snying rje bskyed bya'i phyir// yi ge a ru dmigs pa gsal// a las snying rje zla ba'i gzugs// de

la bdag pho gnas pa 'o/ de dkyil hUM las bskyed pa'i rgyu// bdag po'i sems kyang de la gnas// de las rdo rje sems dpa' ru// bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa// rdo rje de las bskyed pa'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa'
nyid du bsam// sku mdog phyag mtshan sngags rnams dang// gdan khri la sogs bdag nyid bsgom// dkyil 'khor mdun du mchod par brgyan// de nas las byed g.yog po rnams// dkyil 'khor lhar bskyed

rbad la bya// de nas sa bsgo mu tra nyid// ye shes rtogs pa'i mu tra yin// sa gzhi rin po che la brko// phur pa bsrung phyir dbyung mi bya// las byed las kyi lha ru bsgom// oM badzra kha na kha hUM phaT// ces
brjod la// sa brkos la blangs la// rnam phying ngam rdo leb kyi steng du gzhag de nas gdung ba yang/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// rdo rje rtse gsum phyag na bsnams// bgegs dang rnam rtog tho bas

gdung// chos kyi dbyings su gyur par bsam// oM badzra mud ka ra a ko ta ya hUM phaT// ces lan bdud du brjod la brdung ngo// de nas 'jim pa spru ba yang// bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// spos chab dag

la sngags bzlas te// dag cing gtsang bar byin rlabs phyir// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyas spru// oM badzra a mr-i te hUM phaT// ces lan bdun brjod do// de nas 'jim pa rdzi ba dang/ bdag nyid khro rgyal chen po

ste// sngags dang phyag rgya bcings bzlas pas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dzi las bskyed// bgegs rnams kyis kyang ga la tshugs// oM badzra pra mar ta ya pra mar ta ya hUM phaT// ces lan bdun brjod do// de nas
'jim pa de la bgegs kyis mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid rdo rje sems par bskyed// 'phro 'du byas pa yis// khams gsum sems can don byas nas// slar 'dus rin chen sna lngar 'gyur// na mo

rat+na tra ya yA// tad+ya thA// oM sug sme shan te sug sme shan te// han han te// ni ra ku le// ya sho ya sho pa ta// te tsa te tse ba hi// shud d+he bi shung+d+he// sarba ta ta thA ga ta a mr-i ta// a nu ma ti ye swA hA// zhes lan nyi shu
rtsa gcig rjod do// de nas 'bi 'bi bya ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos nyid la// rtog pa mi mnga' shel sgong ltar// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// sems can dri ma'i sgrib sbyang phyir// mchod

rten byas pas byang bar 'gyur// oM badzra A yu She swA hA// zhes lan bdun brjod do// mchod pa byed pa'i las mkhan ni// shar nub gang rung cig tu bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos nyid kyi// pa spu'i bu ga la
sogs nas// 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'phro// de yis sems can don nyid byed// slar yang bdag nyid dngos la 'dus// dgongs pa dag pas bsgom pa'i thabs// zhi ba dkar la rgyas pa ser// dbang la
dmar po drag po nag/ mchod rten dngos la de ltar bsam// sems can don la dmigs pa des// de ltar so sor shes pa dang// rdzas dang mchod khang chos gos dang// dgongs pa'i yo byad gzhan rnams

kun// so sor bsags pa dngos grub sgrub// snying po gzhug pa ni// chos nyid stong pa dngos med las// ye shes rtogs phyir ye shes brtags// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// 'bru 'am phyag rgyas sngags

gsal lo// oM hUM traM hri a// oM badzra gar b+he swA hA// zhes brjod pa'o// de nas skor phor nyungs mar bsku ba'i tshe// chos nyid dbyings dang ye shes gnyis// gsal bar gnyis med rtogs pa'i phyir// thugs rjes
gtul gnyen gsal ba yis// sems can rnams kyis rtogs pa'i phyir// mkhas pas 'di dag gsal bar gyis// oM a ra tse bi ra tse swA hA// zhes brjod pas// thugs rjes til gyi bsku bar dmigs so// de
nas phor bu'i nang du ni// 'bi 'bi gsal te chos skur dmigs// thams cad kun tu gsal bya'i phyir// nang du gsal la sngags kyigadab// oM badzra a yu she swA hA// zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas mchod

rten gdab pa ni// sngags 'di brjod nas de ma thag/ thams cad mchod rten nyid du gsal// de nyid sangs rgyas zhal mthong yin// oM trai yag d+he sarba ta thA ga ta hri ta ya dzA la garbe dza la// d+harmA d+hA tu garbe// sang

ha ra A yu saM sho ta ya pa paM sarba ta tha ga ta uSh+Ni Sha bi shud+he swA hA// zhes bi ma la uSh+Ni Sha'i snying po 'di gsungs pas// mchod rten du gsal bar gzugs brnyan dod tsam na// dus gsum gyi 'phags pa zhal mthong

bar bsam// skor phor nas dbyung ba'i tshe// rgyu rkyen tshogs las byung ba yi// sangs rgyas nyid du 'byung ba'i rgyu// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan de dag yin// oM d+harma d+ha rde ye swA hA// zhes brjod pas// bdag dang
mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi don du gcig tu byed par bsam mo// de nas 'khor lo gzugs pa ni// rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs ni// sangs rgyas nyid du dus gcig rdzogs// 'phang lo 'khor lo btsugs
pas thob// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA// zhes lan gsum brjod la gzugs so// de nas bzhugs pa ni// chos dbyings ngang la dbyer med bzhin// rtse mor byas pa'i phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje dbyings ma'i

phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab ste gzhag/ oM badzra a mr-i te sti ta hUM// zhes brjod de// rtse lnga'i phyag rgya byas te// sngags bzlas phyag rgya btug go/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bsam bya ba// rin chen lnga yi gzhal

yas nas// rin chen lnga yi gdan bting nas// de'i steng pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmigs par bya// de nas seng ge'i khri yi steng// rim pa bzhin du dmigs la 'o// de'i steng chos sku'i
gzugs brnyan gzhag/ skye med dbyings las skyes par bsam// don dam nyid du bdag po med// rang byung lhun gyis grub pas na// ting nge 'dzin gyis spyan drangs pa// sprul pa'i mchod rten gshegs su
gsol// gdan la rim pa med par gnas// bdag rtogs gzhan rnams rim bzhin bskyed// mngon par byang chub sems skyed la// bdag gi don du sna tshogs so// chos nyid mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir// sna
tshogs thabs kyi mchod pa 'bul// 'bras can 'bru rnams mang po dang// na bza' gdugs dang lan 'phan dang// bu ram ka ra la sogs pa// spyan gzigs sna tshogs bkod pa dang// bdug pa mar me spos

chab dang// dri chab yon chab lha bshos dang// kha tshar ma nyams ras yug dang// dar sna'i bye brag sna tshogs dang// chu gtsang 'o ma mar la sogs// gzhan yang bla rgyan 'og rgyan dang// lda ldi la sogs mang pos

bskor// rnga dang gling bu pi wang dang// gar dang rol mo la sogs pas// mchod rten sku yi gzugs brnyan la// sku \u0f84gdung khrus gsol zhal bsros pas// sangs rgyas byang chub de la gnas// ka ya ni oM sarba pu
tsa u she swA hA// zhes lan bdun brjod pa byas la 'bul lo// gzhan yang kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa ni// dngos por yod pa cir snang dngos po rnams// rtsi shing la sogs dngos por snang ba rnams// rang

bzhin sna tshogs dngos por snang ba rnams// gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs pa ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs snang ba ste// kun kyang mchod pa'i grangs su bstan pa ste// chos nyid dngos po'i mchod pa chos
sku dag la 'bul// chos nyid ngang las g.yo ba med bzhin du// mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs ji snyed pa// rang bzhin ngang las mchod pa'i bye brag 'bul// ting 'dzin yid kyis dmigs byas te// dngos su
'byor dang yid kyis rnams bshams la// snang ba dngos po med par byin brlabs te// 'das pa rnams la 'das pa'i mchod pa 'bul// da lta rnams la da ltar dus kyi mchod// ma 'ongs rnams la lan cig
mchod par 'gyur// chos nyid don dam mchod pa chos sku'i ngang la mchod// de ltar mchod pa mchod pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud
las// skor phor du mchod rten bdag pa dang mchod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga la sogs pa thams cad 'dus nas zhus pa// bka' stsal du gsol zhes zhus pa
dang// bka' stsal pa// ston pa chen po 'di lta bu// yang dag don du bka' stsal pa// bdag la bstan pa gang yin no// khyod las ma byung gang yang med// dus kyi snyigs ma gang las gang// de dus sems can
gang dang gang// gnas par bstan pa gang yin lo// de skad ces// don grub pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa rnams kyis ston pa de ci'i phyir zhes zhus pa dang// ston pa kun
mkhyen gyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// bstan pa'i chos ni gang yang med// bstan pa'i gnas dang bdag gzhan med// rang rang dag gi rig pa gsal// dus la thog ma tha ma med// ma rtogs
rnams la sems can gdags// mchod rten sna tshogs dbyings bstan pa// sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sna tshogs thabs su bstan pa'o// mkha' dbyings yangs pa'i mchod rten la// ci dang tha dad dbye

ba med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod la// tha dad rtog pa mi mnga' ste// las kyis spyod pa'i sems can la// tha dad de snyed 'phrin las bstan// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la// mchod rten bzhi ru

nges par bstan// gleng gzhi'i rgyud dang 'phrin las kun// sna tshogs rnam pa gcig las med// zhi ba'i mchod rten gru bzhi ser// dbang gi dmar po zla kham dang// drag po'i mchod rten nag po gzugs// thang
chen dkyil dang ri gsum rtse// lung gsum mdo dang lam srang kun// tsher ma 'dun sa'i 'gram rnams dang// ngam grog mdo dang sna zur dang// gzhan yang gnas rnams ma lus par// mchod rten sbyin sreg la
sogs bya// sa rtag mchod pa'i thig la sogs// las kyi cho ga tshang bar bya// ro zhig dngos su yod pa la// ming dang rus su bcas pa gzhag/ dang por dkyil 'khor mchod rten byas// yar rtsig mar brko

mnyam po la// mchod rten dbyings su rim par bya// 'khor lo srog shing char khab kun// 'phrin las bzhi ni phyi yi dbyibs// gang ltar byed kyang dri bar bya// khro bor bskyed pa sngags bzlas pas// ro de dag
par spos chus bkru// mtshams bcad las kun byas pa dang// ro la gshed dang dbral la dril// mchod rten snying po snying khar gdags// 'phrin las bzhi yi snying po de// yan lag bzhi la gdags par
bya// rten 'brel snying po bris pa de// spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdags par bya// ro la chas kyis brgyan pa dang// dbang yang rim gyis bskur la bzhag/ de nas de yi nub mo la// bsrung skud tshems shing
ku sha'i stan// rmi ltas brtag cing cho ga bya// theg pa lnga yi mchod rten dbyibs// sangs rgyas kun dang bcas pa la// ro de dngos las spyan drangs gzhug/ thugs rjes dgongs la byin gyis brlabs// 'jig

rten pa dang btsas pa kun// spyan drangs byin gyis rlobs par nges// las kyi sgrib rgyun gcod pa dang// dngos grub gang yin thob bya'i phyir// las kun dngos su byas nas 'grub// dus dus dag tu mtshams kyang

bcad// nang par nam langs nyi shar dus// dbang rnams snang la bskur bar bya// chu gtsang lnga la sogs pa yis// chos nyid ngang du dag bya dang// mtshon pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// dngos su rgyan gyis

brgyan pa la// rim pa bzhin du byas pas 'grub// shing khri mchod rten thabs su bya// de yi steng du ro de gzhag/ shing rtsig mchod rten dbyings su rtsig/ shing gi nang na bang rim lnga// phyi yang mchod rten bang rim

dbyibs// mchod rten bum pa'i nang du ni// ro de bcug la bzheng tshul du// steng du shing la 'khor lo'i dbyibs// steng nas bkab la gzhag par bya// sngags mkhan ting 'dzin ldan par bya// cho ga'i bye brag

bshad bya'i phyir// chos gos lnga dang ldan pa yis// me dang bud shing yam shing dang// sreg rdzas mchod rdzas kun dang ldan// dang po mchod rten cho ga nyid// bzlas brjod yan lag rdzogs pa dang// de nas bzod
cing las la 'jug/ dam tshig sems dpa'i me lha de// shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa la// de yis sbyin sreg sgo kun dbye// dad pa bskyed phyir snyan gsan gsol// de nas mnyes phyir mchod pas mchod// spyan
drangs me dang gdan la bzhugs// de phyir ro de dngos po las// me lha phyung la dbang por gnas// las kun byed pas phyag tshang bya// ye shes las bskyed me lha yin// dkon mchog gsum dang yi dam
lha// mchod rdzas sreg rdzas kun gyis mchod// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan la// bris pa'i gzugs brnyan dag la bstim// gzhan du gshegs par mi bya'o// 'jug dang dbang dang dngos grub
gsol// ma dag bzod par gsol ba dang// sbyangs spel bya phyir yang cig mchod// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gi/ tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'bar ba'i gdan// drangs srong me lha sbyin sreg lha// mchod rdzas

sreg rdzas 'di bzhes la// til gyi bsgrub rdzas 'di bsregs pas// sdig pa ro la med par bsreg/ sbyin sreg dam pa 'di yis thob// na ma sa man ta bung+d+ha nan// ma hA shang ka te shan ting ka ra pra sha ma ni// a

b+ha ba swa b+ha ba d+harmA te swA hA// shan ting ku ru ni swA hA// zhes brjod pa'i sngags 'di ni sdig pa tshe rabs brgya tshun chad bsags pa dang// ma rungs pa lha ma yin stong phrag brgya dang// gdug pa can
klu yan chad med par zhi bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa bya ba dang// las dngos grub tu bya ba dang// mchod pa 'bum ba dang// sems can mang po bsam yas ba'i don byed pa sngags 'di yin pas// de la

brgya dang// 'bul dang// bye ba bzlas pa'i thabs dam pa de yin pas// sngags 'di la ni kun gyis dad par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten gyi sbyin sreg spyan drang ba gsungs pa// rnam
dag zab mo chos dbyings dkyil 'khor nas// nyon mongs skyon gyis mi gos nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// 'khrul pa'i ting 'dzin chags phyir skur bstan pa// chos sku zab mo'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// sa

ma ya e ha hi hi sta dza// byams pa chen po tshad med yangs pa'i chos// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad cig/ me long ye shes chos kyi don rtogs pa// byams pa rdo rje brtsegs pa'i mchog chen
gshegs su gsol// dga' rab don 'grub 'khrul pa kun spangs pa// 'jig med rin chen brtsegs pa'i bang rim la// sprul pa yon tan tshogs kyi 'phreng bas brgyan// rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten
gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs rtogs bral pad+mo 'byung ba'i gnas// dga' ba brtsegs pa'i mchod rten bdud bzhi 'joms// bum pa chos dbyings spros pa med pa'i dbyings// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten
gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las kyis sbyong// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma kun bcom nas// bsod nams dge tshul 'phags lam mchod rten brtsigs// byang chub rdzogs pa'i

mchod rten gshegs su gsol// shAkya thub pa sprul pa'i sangs rgyas te// sku yi 'od zer sprul pas sgrib pa sbyong// yon tan tshogs kyi cha lugs skur bstan pa// thugs rjes sprul pa'i pa'i mchod rten gshegs su
gsol// byang chub rab 'joms rab tu rgyas pa yis// 'dzam gling kun tu bsod nams sprin tshogs 'dus// mi mthun sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams kun gsal ba// dge bcu bsod nams mchod rten gshegs su

gsol// rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed snang ba ste// sprul pas thugs rje dang las gcig tu med// srid rtse man chad dmyal ba'i gnas yan chad// sprul pa'i ston pas mchod rten sna tshogs snang// brgya rtsa brgyad po ma
lus gshegs su gsol// theg pa'i bye brag khyad par snang ba ni// so so'i lus su bzhengs su gsol ba yi// mchod rten mi mthun sna tshogs chos sgo'i dbang// tha dad mtshan ma'i dbyibs kyis gshegs su
gsol// gzhan yang brtsig dang brdungs dang bstan dang byas pa dang// bris dang klugs dang gzugs dang dbyibs mi mthun// sna tshogs 'dod pa tha dad mi mthun dbyibs kyi snang// sprul pa mi
mthun dbyibs kyi gshegs su gsol// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs mchod rten rnams// dad pa'i dbang dang thugs rje'i shugs// sems can nyon mongs nyes pa na// las dang

nyon mongs sbyang slad du// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs par bgyi// rtog sgrib bag chags sbyang slad du// sreg rdzas mchod rdzas bzhes su gsol// pad+ma sa ma ya raM// spa ra s+t+waM// sems can ma lus gnas pa

las// thugs rje ldan pa'i dgongs pa can// gshegs shing bzhugs pa mi mnga' yang// sems can rnams kyi don slad du// ye shes gtsang ma'i chu 'dis bkru// bi shung d+he dz+nyA na bi shud+he swA hA// de nas mchod pa
rnam pa lnga dang// mchod rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bul// sreg rdzas la sogs rim du dbul// mchod rten lha rnams re re la// sreg rdzas bdun gsum nyi shu gcig/ me lha dag la tshul bzhin 'bul// mchod

rten la ni bstod pa bzhin// bar bar dag la me lha bstod// tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras// me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog/ zhi ba zhi ste mya ngan 'das// me yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs skyong bcu
dang rgyal chen bzhi// dkyil 'khor dag tu bstod de bzhag/ las la goms pas rim bzhin mchod// de ltar lhag pa'i lha yang mchod// tha ma ru yang me lha mchod// de nas ma dag pa kun bshags// mchod pa'i

las rnams ma grub pa// spogs thabs byas na 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi lhag ma las ma las// nang par gdung dang rus pa lta// sran ma 'bring yo ga la// nyungs kar tshang ni kri ya la// nyungs nag tshad ni

mtshan nyid la// sku gzugs ma hA yo ga yin// byang chub sems ni gdung gi rgyu// mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis// dag par bya ba thob par byed// go ro tsa na sems kyi rgyu// de la gnas pa ma yin

te// rtog pa can dang rtog bral kun// kun gzhi dag la gnas par bstan// de dag dag pa pad+ma 'dra// me 'od de 'dra 'dod pa legs// dka' la me lce lnga bzhin 'byung// rdo rje rigs kyi mchod rten thob// me

'od 'khor lhing 'bar ba de// 'khor lo snang mdzad chos sku'i gzugs// me lce gcig la rtse rno ba// kha don lnga ka tshang ba ste// don grub mchod rten dngos grub thob// me lce mang ba ma gyes par// me la dri bsung

ldan gyur na// rin chen mchod rten grub pa'i rtags// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// me yi mdog kyang de 'dra bshad// me lce med la mdog 'gyur na// sgrib pa las tshan che ba yin// me 'od chung la ngams
gnag na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje yis// sdig can de ni ma zin bstan/ me 'od dkar zhing 'chi 'dod na// bsod nams zhan te sdig sgrib chung// me 'od 'chad cing 'bar ba ste// lha

dang mi yi rgyu bsog 'dra// zhi la dkar la mdog dang ldan// spyi rgyu me de legs par 'dod// me lce 'chad cing rdung che lo// drag 'bar skad 'don byed pa ste/ da lta dngos su sdig zhad yong// me lce zhil dkar

'khyil ba// 'jug la je zhan dkar zhan pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i me// me yi mtshan nyid gzhan yang bstan// me de shi zang thal rus de// sngags mkhan gtsang mas sngags bzlas la// btu dang phyag pa

byas nas ni// ras gtsang ma ni skor phor du// blug la sngags 'di btab byas te// mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa la// btab pas byang chub 'grub par nges// rgyu bsags mchod pa lugs bzhon 'bul// seng khri 'am rin chen
khri la gzhag/ zhal gso mchod pa byas pa dang// sdogs bu'i nang du bzhag par bya// sku gdung mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// mchaud rten ro bsreg gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas yang de

bzhin gshegs rnams lus nas// 'di skad ces brjod pa 'di brjod do// bstod pa'i rgyal po yis 'di bsrod do// don dam spros dang 'das pa yis// rang bzhin rtog las 'das pa yi// dmigs su med pa chos kyi sku//
chos kyi sku la bstod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos po med dang dngos snang ba'i// longs spyod rnam nyid dbyer med pa'i// longs spyod sku la bstod phyag 'tshal// u dum

'bar ba'i me tog bzhin// dkon pa'i bstod pas don mdzad ltar// shAka thub rang 'byung mchod rten brgyad// nyid kyi thugs las sprul pa brgyad// ston pa'i sprul pa bstod phyag 'tshal// ston pa'i sprul pa'i
mchod rten nyid// thugs las snang ba'i yid bzhin lhun grub dang// dpe med bsam 'das thugs la snang// rin chen bsregs pa'i yon tan dang// smang grags gsung gi sprul pa dang// bde rgyas mgon gyi

'phrin las snang// btang snyoms gter gyi thugs la snang// mthar legs g.yung drung sku yi sprul// sprul sku'i mchod rten brgyad po yang// dad pa'i sems kyis bstod phyag 'tshal// dpe med gzugs kyi khyad
par lta bas mi ngoms pa// ye shes thugs kyis brgyan pa'i sku legs te// mchod rten mchod gnas chen por grags pa brjod du 'o// gzugs kun dngos med chos kyi dbyings kyi sku// chos sku dngos med sprul

pas mchod rten tshul du sprul// spros med dngos las 'dul ba'i dbang du skur bstan pa// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rmang gi khri 'phang mtho// brtson 'grus yang dag sprul ba'i khri 'phang gnyis pa legs// ting
'dzin rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i khri 'phang gsum pa dge/ rnam grol dbang po lnga yi khri 'phang bzhi pa brjid// bum rten stobs lnga byang chub yan lag bdun// bri legs gru bzhi 'phags lam yan lag
brgyad/ srog shing shes bcu gdugs kyi char khab lding// rnam dag gdugs 'phreng me tog 'phren bas mdzes// bla med go 'phang mnyes pa'i seng ge'i gdan 'phangs mtho// thugs rje chen pos 'phags pas

gdugs kyi char khab ld-ing// dbyangs zab tshangs pa'i gsung gi dril bu sgra snyan sgrogs// yang dag rdzogs pa dar gyi cod pan 'phur// bla med tshul khrims bsrung ba'i 'phred babazang// skyon bral bsrung ba med

pa chos kyi thegs skras mdzes// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ba dan dka' po spa// bdud bzhi'i rgyal mtshan snyol ba'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan grags// mi 'jigs bzhi yi seng ge'i rdo rings brjid// 'di 'dra'i

dam chos rmad du 'byung rnams kyis// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i dbang gis mchod rten tshul du sprul// nam mkha'i kham la mtshon skye gsal ba bzhin// yon tan blo yi khyod kyis bstod phyag 'tshal// dpal gnas

rin chen 'byung gnas ya mtshan mang po la// dus gsum rgyal ba'i mchod rten chos kyi sku// dpal gnas ka ni ka dang rang bzhin tshul gcig pas// bsod nams gzi brjid phung po rang bzhin tshul chags shing//

sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'phr-in las rdzogs par mdzad// sa bcu'i rgyal tshab bcom ldan byams pa gtsug gi rgyan// phyogs bcu dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid chen po la// ri lung nags tshal gnas pa'i lha tshogs
kun 'dus pas// mngon par de kun dag pa'i ngang las sprul// tshogs rnams kun la 'khril sdom brtson// rgyal sras 'khor dang khyim bdag tshong dpon dang// dbus mtha' rgyal khams mang po'i mi tshogs kun

'dus nas// me tog 'phreng ba spel legs mdzes pa sna tshogs dang/ tsan dan dri spos bshos dang mar me rol mor bcas// bkra shis glu gar bstod pa sna tshogs dang// gdugs dang ba na lhab lhub rgyan tshogs

dang// 'dzam gling gser gyi bar gyi gzhong pa chen po'i nang// gser dang rin chen mu tig gcal bkram zhing// byug ba'i chu rgyun byin rlabs a dkar dmigs// 'byung ba sa yi bye brag sna tshogs mchod rten ye
gsal la// 'byung ba me yi tshon gyis bris pa'i gzugs brnyan gsal// 'byung ba rlung nyid ting 'dzin gsal bskyod ting 'dzin mchod rten dmigs// 'byung ba nam mkhas de bzhin dmigs phye nas// rang
bzhin bdag gzhan med par thams cad chos skur dmigs// ye nas tshogs pa'i mchod rdzas sna tshogs kyang// dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten tshul gnas pa// bdag mchod dag par dmigs la
dag pa nyid la 'bul// rgyal ba'i rgyal por dmigs pa'i sems can rgyal po yis// chos skur rtogs pa'i rgyal po mchod rten dbyibs su bzhengs// de la dmigs te mchod pa'i bye brag

'bul// sangs rgyas sku nyid mya ngan 'das te mi snang bas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan de yi rten du ston pas bzhag pas na// mchod rten de la yid ches dad skyed mchod rten bgyi bskur bar bya// nyan thos theg
pa'i chos rnams grangs dang gar 'thad la// chos gos bzhi bltab steng du bum par spar bu 'dra ba'i dpe// bden pa bzhi dang gang zag bdag med la sogs brgyad kyis brtags// 'khor lo brgyad du bstan te
de 'dra'i mchod rten brtsigs// gzhung du khrims rdzogs lnga yi mchod pa yis// dkon mchog gsum dang gtsang rigs mgon po la// dngos su mchod pas nyan thos gzhung lugs rdzogs// khrims dang mchod dang
arga mgo la bkon pa dang// mchod rten rang gzhung brtsigs pa 'di rnams kun// sems can don du 'gyur bar ston pa nyid kyis de rnams kun ka 'dra// gang la dad pa de kun dga' ba'i chos rnams spyad na

nyan thos gzhung// nyan thos mchod rten de la gus par phyag 'tshal bstod// rang sangs rgyas kyi sgo bzhi'i rtags su 'og gi khri 'phang zur bzhi bstan// spyod pa gnyis la khri 'phang gnyis 'gyur bstan pa
brjid// 'khor lo bcu gnyis rten 'brel bcu gnyis rtags// chos nyid rtogs par gcig pas bum pa gcig/ rang rgyal chos kyi lugs su de 'dra'i mchod rten brtsigs// de la dngos su gtsang ma'i rdzas
rnams 'bul// rang rgyal chos kyi gzugs brnyan de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// mchod rten kri ya'i lugs su ni// dag pa gsum la bang rim gsum// ye shes bzhi rtags gru bzhi zur// rigs gsum
