rtags su kha khyer gsum// dag pa lha bum pa zlam// 'khor lo bcu gnyis sa bcu gnyis// thugs rje cher bskyed char khab yin// rtogs dbu don gyis 'khor bar nub pa'i dus mtha' med// kri ya'i gzhung

rdzogs mchod rten la// gtsang ma'i mchod pas bstod phyag 'tshal// u pa ya yi mchod rten ni// rmang gcig chos dbyings dag par gcig/ zur bzhi ye shes bzhi yi rtags// 'phrin las bzhi'i rtags su kha khyer
bzhi// de nyid bzhi rtags bang rim bzhi// lha ba gcig la bum pa'i dbyibs// rigs bzhi bum rten zur bzhi'o// 'khor lo bcu gsum sa bcu gsum// thugs rje'i char khab kun la skyob// tog ni lta ba gong
du snyeg/ ra gnyis gnyis med gong ma ltar// u pa ya yi gzhung tshang bas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan mchod rten yin// de la dad pas bstong phyag 'tshal// yo ga dag gi dbyibs bstan pa// mtshan ma yod
med rmang la gnyis// stong pa nyid la bzhi tshang bas// zur bzhi logs bzhi lham par bstan// ting 'dzin rtags su kha khyer gcig/ mngon par byang chub lnga yi rtags// bang rim lnga pa rim gyis

brtsegs// tshad med bum pa zlum par 'khyil// cho 'phrul phyag rgya bzhi bum rten// 'khor lo bcu gsum sa sa bcu gsum// gzhan kun tha dad gong du bstan// de lha'i chos sku'i gzugs brnyan la// rnal 'byor

'jug pas bstodaphyag 'tshal// ma hA yo ga la sogs pa// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ye nas gsal bar snang ba ste// mchod dang bstod pas mnyes par bya// yang na mchod rten dbyibs nyid ni// dkyil
'khor mchod dang dngos grub rnams// gcig gam lnga 'am dkyil 'khor brgyad// mchod rten dag las \u0f84gzhan na med// thams cad bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// thams

cad ma lus ye shes lnga// thams cad dbyer med dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nyid sku gsum lhun grub la// sku lnga sku brgya tha dad pa// thams cad mchod rten sku nyid do// de las gzhan pa'i sku bstan med// shar

phyogs byams pa brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ni// zhe sdang gnas 'gyur me long lta bu yi// ye shes rtags su rdo rje rigs kyi sku// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ji snyed pa// dga' ba byams pas mchod cing bstod

phyag 'tshal// lho phyogs rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ni// nga rgyal gnas 'gyur mnyam pa nyid du gnas// ye shes rtags su rin chen rigs kyi sku// rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ji snyed pa// dad

pa'i sems kyis mchod cing bstod phyag 'tshal// nub phyogs pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ni// 'dod chags gnas 'gyur so sor rtogs pa yi// ye shes rtags su pad+ma rigs kyi sku// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod

rten ji snyed pa// dag pa'i sems kyis mchod cing bstod phyag 'tshal// byang phyogs rgya sgram brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ni// phrag dog gnas 'gyur bya ba grub pa yi// ye shes rtags su las kyi rigs kyi sku// rgya gram

brtsegs pa'i mchod rten ji snyed la// brtson 'grus dag pas mchod cing bstod phyag 'tshal// ye shes lnga yi chu bo dag pa yis// nyon mongs lnga yi rtog pas sgribs pa las// byang chub mchog gi chu bos sku khrus
gsol// khams gsum gnas pa'i bag chags dag gyur cig/ sku gdung mngon par bstan pa'i brgyud las// mchod rten la bstong pa'i le'u ste bcu gcigapa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
'dus nas dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te// ston pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal pa dang// las kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa// ston pas tha dad bstan pa las// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs// yang
dag nyid du bstan pa med// zhi gnas dbang phyug mnga' mnyes la// las dang dngos grub bsgrub mi dgos// mchod rten sku yi gzugs brnyan ni// ma rtogs sems can mang po la// thabs kyi bye
brag mang po bstan// zhi bar 'dod la rtog pa med// rgyas par 'dod la rgyas par 'gyur// dbang du bya ba thams cad bsdu// bsgral dang brdeg bskrad las kun yang// dad pa che la de bzhin gnas// zhi ba'i
mchod rten dkar por bya// thabs kyi dbyibs zlum yar mar mnyam// bang rim mchod rten nyid dang 'dra// yam shing bud shing dkar po ste// stag pa la sogs dag la bya// snying po bzlas shing mjug nyid

la// zhi ba shan ting ku ru zhes// ming gi mjug la btags la bsregs// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan byas na// zhi bar 'gyur ba the tshom med// rgyas par 'dod pas ser por bya// thabs kyi dbyings dang mchod rten

gnyis// gru bzhi bang rim bzhi dang bcas// yaM shing bud shing rdzas rnams kun// ser porabyas la mchod bya ste// rgyas par 'dodapa'i ming byang cig/ bris la sngags kyi 'jug la gdags// de ltar byas na gang

'dod rgyas// dbang la dmar po'i mchod rten mtshon// mchod rten nyid dang thabs dbyibs 'dra// 'og rim 'dra ste gong ma bsgyur// zla gam dag tu brtsig par bya// rdzas rnams kun ka dmar por bya// dbang du
'dud pa'i ming rus rnams// gro ga dag la bris nas ni// mchod rten 'gram gyi 'og tu bzhugs// de nas sbyin sreg dag la yang// bris te sngags dang bcas pa bsreg/ de ltar byas na dbang du 'gyur// drag

po'i mchod rten dag la ni// gru gsum bang rim gzhan yang mthun// tshon rtsi sa rnams nag shas che// sreg rdzas shing la sogs pa rnams// nag po dag tu bsgyur la bya// bsgral bskrad gang 'dod bya ba de// dug
gi lo ma shog shog shing// de la bris la bzhag ste dgug/ mchod rten nag po'i 'og tu bzhugs// sbyin sreg la yang de bzhin bsreg/ dbang phyug lha chen lha rnams kyang// bsreg par 'gyur bar gdon mi
za// 'phrin las byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mchod rten dngos su brtsig pa dang// las kyi hom thabs bya ba dang// sngags bzlas la sogs byed pa la// the tshom med par byas na 'grub// yang na mchod rten
chos sku'i gzugs// mchod rten gcig tu brtsigs nas kyang// ngos bzhi dag la 'phrin las bzhi// dngos su mchod rten bzhengs gsol nas// sngags mkhan bzhi mi ngos bzhi nas// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i

las rnams bya// de ltar byas na dngos grub myur// mchod rten gru bzhi sgo bzhi la// tha dad dbyibs kyi bang rim lnga// bum pa bum rten 'khor lo bcas// dbyibs kyi chos nyid mtshon pa gzhan dag bstan// mi
dmigs lhun grub mchod rten las// dmigs pa don dang ldan pa yis// gzugs brnyan mchod rten lhar dmigs bas// sprul sku'i mchod rten bzhengs su gsol// gzugs brnyan mchod rten
dngos nyid la// tha dad mang po rtog med de// blo yi rim pas so sor snang// dper na bzhin dngos gcig nyid la// chu dang me long mang po snang// theg pa tha dad re re la// gzugs brnyan mchod rten re
re snang// don dam mchod rten de la ni// rtog pa'i dngos po gang yang med// mchod rten dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgrub// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'dod pas// mchod rten mchod pa byas pas 'grub// dbang
dang dngos grub thob pa de// mchod rten bsgrub pa'i dbang las 'byung// gang zhig dngos grub 'dod pa nges// dbang nyid rim par nod par bya// bdag nyid dad pa med pa la// bla ma dbang mchog snang ba'i

rgyu// bdag nyid dad dang ldan pa la// dbang bskur rim pa tshul bzhin bya// slob dpon dam pa med pa ru// mchod rten dbang nyid bskur ba dang// yan lag dbang rnams nod pa'i phyir// dbang rdzas tshang bar
bsogs pa des// slob dpon dgongs pa med pa des// bskur yang slar la nyams par 'gyur// gang gis gang la gang lta zhes// slob ma las 'phro ldan pa la// dad pa shes rab 'byor pa dang// sangs rgyas mi slu
yon 'bul dang// bka' ngag gzhung du byed pa la// de 'dra ba la bshad par bya// gzhan la bskur na nyams pa che// sgying ma lhas par khal 'gel 'dra// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan mchod rten dang// gzhan

dbang dag dang 'dra ba min// mchod rten spyi ru nyi shu las// mdor na mdor bsdus lnga ru bstan// chos sku don gyi gzugs brnyan dang// tshig gi gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan// longs spyod sku yi gzugs brnyan
dang// sprul pa sku yi gzugs brnyan dang// don gyi chos sku'i dbang 'di ni// las 'phro ngan pa dngos mi bskur// ting nge 'dzin gyis bskur la gzhag/ shes rab las 'phro ldan pa la// dbang mchog 'di dag
bskur bar bya// don dam spros pa med pa yi// chos nyid rtogs bral ma spros pas// rang sems 'dus pa de la zhon// skye med rtog pa gsal bas na// dbang yang dus der thob ces bshad// dbang mchog dam

pa thob par shog/ d+harma a si d+hi A// tshig dang gzugs brnyan mchod rten la// khyad par mi mthun bdun du bshad// de dag so sor dbang nyid ni// slob ma rang nyid gang 'dod bshad// blo yi rim pas bskur

bar bya// mi shes rnams la rdzas kyis bskur// nyan thos bden bzhi'i sgor zhugs seng khri zur bzhi la// bar bu kha spu gseg shang 'khor lo 'greng// nyan thos sa brgyad 'khor lo rim pa brgyad// de dag la sogs sgo/
nas zur bzhir 'bras bur rtogs thob shog/ rang rgyal sgo nas mchod rten dbang thob ni// rig pa'i bskyed rabs bzhi rtags seng khri zur bzhi la// ye shes gsum gyi rtags su bang rim gsum pa
dgye// chos nyid rtogs pa'i rtags su bum pa zlum// rtogs pas cig pa'i rtags su srog shing gcig cig la// rten 'brel bcu gnyis rtags su 'khor lo bcu gnyis brtseg/ sems can don du char

khab thugs rje che// de ltar rang rgyal chos sku'i don rtogs shog/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang mchog ni// dran pa nyer gzhag rmang gi khri 'phang zur bzhi la// yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul dbang po'i
stobs// bang rim lnga pa de ltar bstan pa yin// de ltar rtogs na dbang dang dngos grub yin// bum rten bum pa breg 'phags pa'i lam dang bden pa'i dbang mchog thob// 'khor lo bcu gnyis khyad par bcu

gcig la// bum pa chos sku de la gnyis gnyis med rtogs pas rwa gnyis dang// de ltar mtshan nyid theg pa chos sku dbang thob shog/ kri ya'i mchod rten dbang nyid ni// dag pa gsum rtags rmang gi khri 'phang
gsum// dngos grub gsum rtags dbu la bang rim gsum// lta ba dag pa'i rtags su bum pa zlum po yin// sa rnams bcu gnyis dag la dbang// rtags 'khor lo bcu gnyis yin// kri ya chos sku'i de dag

dbang thob shog/ yo ga yu pa ya nyid ni// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang// rin chen ral gri la sogs pa// de dag rtogs pa'i dbang rnams ni// gcig gam kun gyis bskur bar bya// gzhan yang tshig gi dbang nyid
ni// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// gsung dang rdo rje tshig gi ljags// bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// 'khor bar ji srid chos 'chad pa// ston pa'i sgron mar dbang thob shog/ bag u ti
haM// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dbang ni// bcom ldan don grub de nyid ni// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// nor bu brtsegs pa'i khang pa la// seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa na// zhal ni kun la gzigs pa

yi// dbang mchog dam thob par shog/ mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya che// bdag nyid kyi ni bsam par bya// oM badzra tsi t+ta dpe ta ka ro ya mi// bo d+hi tsi t+ta u pa ta ya mi// stis

sta badzra ya sta badzra// sarba badzra ad ma ta a haM yo ti// sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi dbang na ni/ don thams cad grub par dbang ji ltar thob ce na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub chen po thugs kun tu bzang po/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dper na lag mthil du gang
bu yongs su gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te// rgyal bu don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par bya'o snyam du
sems shig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang// de nas don thams cad grub pa des// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur bar rig nas dbang thob pa'o// yang sngon gyi rgyal bu don grub la// sangs

rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur bzhin// shAka thub sprul pa mchod rten brgyad// sna tshogs sprul sku'i mchod rten gyis// dbang bskur sprul sku thob par shog/ shAkya mu ne na ma sa man ta a ko tra ya mU ti// gling bzhi rin

chen sna bzhi la// dbang bskur dbang byed rgyal po yi// zab cing rgya che rgyal po yi// longs spyod dpal ldan dbang mchog thob par shog/ dbang phyug chen po rdo rjes dbang bskur ro// mthu bo chen ni rjes rgyu'i rdo

rje'o// sgra la bzhon ni rdo rje dril bu'o// thub pa'i rdo rje tshangs pa'o// dbang po rdo rje mtshon cha ste// dbang mchog des kyang dbang bskur ro// nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa'o// zla ba rdo rje 'od chen no// 'byin pa'i rdo rje

'byin pa'o// mig dmar rdo rje ser smug ste// de rnams rdo rje khro bo ste// rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur ro// oM badzra kro d+ha yug ti// sbrang rtsi myos pa rdo rje glang po sna// sbrang rtsir byed pa rdo rje 'greng ba'o// rgyal ba rdo rje

dbang po'o// rnam rgyal rdo rje rgyal po'o/ 'dis ni tshogs bdag gtso bor bskur// mdzad skyong rdo rje thub pa'o// me lha rdo rje 'bar ba'o// rlung ni rdo rje rlung 'byin no// gu ber rdo rje 'jigs byed do// yang 'di
skad do// mngon par sangs rgyas dus de ru// zhal mthong bka' la rgyas pa yis// lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pas// rdo rje khro bor bsgyur ba yis// mchod rten dkyil 'khor bkod pa yis// slob ma dag la
dbang bskur na// longs spyod rang dgar dbang thob shog/ rin chen sna bdun la sogs pa// sangs rgyas nyid dbang thob pa yi// rtags su dbang ni bskur bar bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thamad cad

kyang// dbang ma thob par sangs mi rgya// dbang mchog thob nas sangs rgya'o// mchod rten chos sku rtogs pa na// dbang mchog thob ces de la bya// sku gdung mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// las kyi khyad par
bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dgyes pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis// 'jug gi don bka' stsal pa// 'khor du 'dus pa de rnams kun// chos nyid dngos po mang ba la// 'dus pa mchod rten

chos kyi sku// sgra dang tha dad la sogs pa// kun kyang mchod rten chos skur bshad// de skad gsungs pa'i mod la yang 'dus nas phyag btsal ba// thams cad mchod rten rigs nyid la// bde chen dngos po med
pa yi// rang bzhin rtogs na mchod rten yin// dad pas rtag tu de la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams na// rdo rje ri bo brtsegs pa'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer

'tsher bas nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// shar phyogs rdo rje 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs dpal ldan dga' ba'i zhing khams na// rin chen ri bo brtsegs pa'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od gsal 'tsher bas nyi ma
'bum gyi gzi// sangs rgyas rin chen 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs bde dang ldan pa'i zhing khams na// pad+ma ri bo brtsegs pa'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od gsal 'tsher bas nyi ma 'bum gyi

gzi// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// las kyi ri bo brtsegs pa'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od gsal 'tsher bas nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// sangs rgyas
las kyi 'khor la phyag 'tshal/ lo// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa// dge don legs kyi gzhi// chos tshul rab kyi dbyings// rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan sku// mchod rten thams cad la gus pas phyag

'tshal lo// bcom ldan shAkya seng ge'i byin rlabs kyis// srid rtse rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal yas nas// rigs gzhi phyag rgya'i mchod rten bzhir snang ba// 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad pa'i mchod rten la// dga'

dang gus ba'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin// sangs rgyas mdzad pa mthar phyin grub pa'i rtags// 'khor ba zad mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i gtso// bla med mchod rten brgyad
la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag dbyings kyi byin rlabs rgyal ba'i gdung// ma rig mun sel nges par legs pa'i gzhi// sprul pa'i mchod rten bzod par bkur ba'i gnas// ring bsrel 'jig rten rgyal la phyag
'tshal lo// thabs mkhas thugs rje 'gro ba'i ched bzhengs shing// bden gnyis don rtogs sa bcu'i mchog mnyes shing// gzhan don rnam par grol ba'i gsung mnga' ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo// mchod rten don nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang// 'di las grol bar mdzad pa'i 'jig rten dam can la// ma 'ongs 'jug 'dod rnams kyis gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig
rten chos sku'i gzugs brnyan la// sbyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang// dbang bskur sku khrus gsol ba dang// chos sku nyid la rtogs med de// sems can mi shes pa rnams la// thabs kyis mthun par
bstan pa yin// mi mthun bstan na 'dul mi 'gyur// las rnams gang ltar byed pa'i dus// phyag rgya gcig gis chog pa ste// rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya 'di// khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong
'greng// mthe'u chung gzhib la mi sbyar bar// bsgrengs la mdzum mo gnyis po nyid// mtshe ba'i tshul du byas pa 'di// las rnams kun byed phyag rgya'o// de nas sngags ni badzra pa sha hUM// yang na
bsang gad byed po dang// phyag rgya 'di yis byas na 'grub// bzlas brjod yan lag dmigs pa med// rang la rang bzhin med pa ste// dmigs pa sngags dang mchod rten dang// bsgrub pa po dag gsum ka
ste// ye shes gzugs brnyan 'dra bar dmigs// de ltar rnam pa gsum ka yang// rtog med dbyings las ma g.yos par// de ni mi dmigs sgom pa yin// re mos pa dang cig car ba// blo yi khyad par dag tu
bshad// bzhugs su gsol ba de nyid ni// don gyis bzhugs par bsam pa ni// gnyis med chos kyi ngang la bzhugs// de ltar rtogs na bzhugs pa yin// thabs kyi drang srong bzhugs pa ni// mgron rnams
gral du bzhugs pa dang// 'dra bar dkyil 'khor gdan dag la// mchod rten rim par bzhugs par bsam// dngos grub gsol ba de nyid kyang// dngos pos mchod rten chos skur rtogs// de ni don dam nyid

du bshad// gzhan gyis byin du re ba de// yang dag de la btags pa dang// khyad par che ste blo yi dbang// rdzas dang tshan nyid la sogs pa// don du mi 'gyur gang yang med// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen
lnga// mchod rdzas dbang rdzas bsgrubs pa rnams// chu gtsang bdun po de nyid rnams// bstan pas sku gsum mchod rten la// khrus byed rnams kyis phul bas na// bkra shis gtsang ma'i rdzas su gzhag/ dbang

bskur rdzas rnams gong du bshams// phan yon che bas bstan pa'i sku// dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas gang// mchod rten chos sku 'di las byung// mchod rten chos sku sangs rgyas yin// rgyu dag rkyen dang 'bras bu
gsum// gzugs brnyan mchod rten 'di la bshad// dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas// tha mar mngon par sangs rgyas te// bkra shis rtags kyis don byed pa// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan mchod rten

yin// rgyu yi chos su gyur pa rnams// tshig dang grangs dang bshad pa dang// bshags dang dbang dang mngon spyod pa// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan 'di la tshang// sa dang chu dang dgos grub kyang// yon tan mthar
phyin la sogs rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub pa yang// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan de nyid do// phyogs bcu dang ni dus bzhi rnams// phyi nang sno bcud ma lus pa// byang chub sems rtogs gang yin
la// mchod rten chos sku nyid du bstan// phyogs bcu kun tu gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas bsam yas mang po la// mchod rten chos skur snang ba las// gzhan du log rtog gang yang med// chos sku de nyid ma
rtogs la// gzugs sku sna tshogs skye bar bstan// ma rtogs sems can rnams la ni// gzugs dang rdzas kyi ngo bor snang// la las rtsed mo rtsol bar mthong// la las gnas dang rten du

mthong// la las sgrib sbyong la sogs snang// la las tshig chad don med snang// rtog pas ji ltar btags byas kyang// chos sku nyid la rtogs pa med// dper na chu zla'i gzugs brnyan 'dra// mchod rten tha dad

bstan pa yang// sems can blo rnams tha dad phyir// mi mthun bye brag tha dad snang// snang ba nyid na dngos po med// dngos med de nyid don dam gzugs// rmang dang bang rim la sogs kyang// chos nyid tha dad

dbang gi bstan// sku khrus gsol ba de nyid kyang// chos nyid chos skur rtogs phyir bstan// zhal so byas par snang ba ste// chos sku bskyed de mi 'gyur ba// rig pas brtags pas 'gyur ba med// de nyid zhal so
byas pa'o// sku la na bza' gnas pa ni// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus la// ye nas chos skur gnas pa de// gang gi gsal bar rtogs pa'o// dbu la sbyang du gnas pa ni// khams gsum thams cad chos kyi
rje// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan mchod rten de// gzhan la sgrogs shing snang phyir min// zur dang bang rim dbyings rnams dod// chos nyid tha dad gsal ba ru// gnas skabs mi mthun bstan pa yin// dbyibs
dang kha dog mang po yang// sangs rgyas rol pa'i thabs las med// sems nyid dbang gis cir snang yang// sangs rgyas rnams ni sku gdung yin// gzugs brnyan mchod rten zhes su bstan// bstan pa'i
gzugs brnyan ring bsrel yin// dam pa'i don gyi mchod rten la// gzugs brnyan tsam du snang ba med// de nyid rtogs pas sangs rgyas 'grub// gzugs la mi rten chos nyid ni// chos sku de nyid gud na
med// med pa ma yin mi rtogs yin// dkyil 'khor ri mo gzugs la sogs// byas pa ma yin chos kyi sku// byar med rtogs na chos sku thob// sangs rgyas nyid la rtog pa med// mchod rten dbyings la tha dad
bstan// rtsi shing nags tshal tha dad pa// mchod rten dbyings su bstan yang rung// gzugs sku ri mor gtod pa la// mchod rten dngos su brtsig pa dang// snod kyi 'jig rten chags pa yi// ri rab gling du
gsal ba dang// rnam pa mang por bshad pa yang// ming du 'dra ste don du min// mchod rten dbyibs la 'dra spyad na// bar snang sprin la mchod rten gzugs// mu stegs dag gi rtags mchod
na// dngos grub thob par ga la 'gyur// mchod rten dbyibs nyid mi mthun pa// rang dgar byas la ma yin te// chos kyi don la mtshon par byed// sems can rtog pas bcings pa la// chos sku'i dbyibs kyi
rtog pa dgrol// sku gdung mang por dbyibs bstan pas// don la bye brag rtogs par byed// ye shes bye brag rtogs pa la// tha dad med de tha dad snang// ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin la// don du

mi 'gyur sku gdung min// mtshon gang tsam gyi mchod rten la// nyung 'bru tsam gyi bum pa btags// khu byug lce tsam 'khor lo byas// ba li tsam gyi char khab byas// des kyang snang srid ma lus gang// sangs rgyas

nyid du 'grub par nges// byang chub sems kyi gsal phye na// rdul cig tsam gyi sku gdung la// mchod pa thang cig mchod pas kyang// da lta nyid du dngos grub thob// rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin ma gsal na// ri rab
tsam cig bzhengs gsol yang// sang rgyas dngos grub chos sku med// las la 'bad pas lha mi tsam// ting 'dzin rtogs pas zin 'gyur na// gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra// rdul phran tsam gyi mchod rten
gyi// 'jig rten khams rnams khengs par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar 'gengs// mchod rten grangs las 'das pa rnams// sku gdung rdul phran tsam du 'dus// skye med chos sku gcig las

med// lam srang dngos kyi rdo dngos dang// g.ya' gangs gtsang ma'i gnas dag tu// ri phug sa phug khyim la sogs// rdo shing sa phag 'jim pa rnams// de la sku gdung byas sam stod// rab gnas mchod pa byas

pa na// bskor ba lha phyag byas pa na// brgya rtsa brgyad po byas pa dang// don la khyad par gang yang med// skor phor mchod rten byas pa dang// dngos su brtsig pa byas pa gnyis// rtogs pa'i dbang la 'dra ba
ste// blo che gsal ba rnams la yin// blo dman shes rab chung ba la// dngos su brtsegs na las kyis 'bad// 'bad pa tsam na shes rab skye// dkyil 'khor cho ga la sogs pa// rang gi rtog pas ma zin

na// rang gi sgrib pa byang ba dang// sangs rgyas thugs rjes dgongs pa dang// slob dpon shes rab bshad bstan gyis// blo chung dngos grub thob pa na// cung zhig khyad par yod par bshad/ skor phor snod kyi
'jig rten dang// chos kyi dbyings su gsal bas dag/ nang du gzugs brnyan bzhugs bzhag pa// phyogs bcur chos sku'i gzugs brnyan gsal// sa la btab dang chu la btab// me dang rlung dang nam mkha'
dang// phyogs dang mtshams dang steng 'og tu// dngos su btab cing bzlas pa dang// ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal ba na// kun kyang chos sku'i gzugs brnyan yin// chos rnams thams cad de la gnas// ting
'dzin gzugs brnyan zhes su bshad// thams cad chos sku'i rang bzhin du// ma gyur pa ni gcig kyang med// mchod rten dbyings su thams cad gsal// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan thams cad bshad// mchod
pa'i rdzas dang sgra rnams kun// bkra shis don du bshad pa ste// re re la yang dgos ched re// chos sku dag la mchod pa yis// yon tan bsam yas thob pa'o// chos sku'i nang du gdung bzhugs

pa// gdung ni don dam rtogs pa'i rtags// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rtogs phyir dang// byang chub 'dod pas gzhug pa bstan// rdo rings zhes su bstan pa bzhi// sngon gyi chos kyi zhal bzhes pa// rgyal chen bzhi

po yin par bshad// don du gzugs brnyan mchod rten la// ma tshangs pa dang ma 'dus pa// chos nyid ngang la dbyer bshad med// sa dang chu dang me dang rlu// nam mkha' la sogs 'byung ba lnga// lnga po de nyid mchod

rten yin// chu yi phra rags de nyid kyang// mchod rten dag tu gnas pa'o// me dang rlung gi phra rags nyid// gzugs brnyan mchod rten bye brag ste// bang rim khri 'phang rmang la sogs// mchod rten nyid du ye

nas gnas// phra rags rdul nyid chags pa ste// gzugs brnyan dbyibs su ye nas bstan// rdul phran tsam gyi mchod rten de// rmang dang khri 'phang bang rim kun// dbyibs rnams tshang bar bzhengs pa'o// 'byung

ba lnga la gnas pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// 'byung ba lnga la macod rten 'bad// yang na don gyi dbang gi na// dngos su rten pa mtha' dag pa// sa la mchod rten btab ces bya// sdud par byed pa

chu yin pas// chu la btab ces de la bya// mchod rten dngos su gsal byed pas// me la btab ces de la bya// rlung gi dngos po mtshon byed pas// chos rnams rlung yod pas// rlung la btab ces de la bya// chos
nyid ngang la don gyis na// gcig la lnga tshan kun ka tshang// de ltar rtogs na mchod rten gdab// nam mkha' dngos po med pa la// gsal zhing go 'byed mtshan mar snang// mchod rten gsal zhing gzugs

brnyan byed// 'byung ba lnga po ye nas gsal// mchod sku'i mchod rten ye nas gsal// rang 'byung mchod rten 'byung ba la// ye nas 'byung bas rang 'byung ngo// phyogs dang mtshams nyid chos nyid la// chos nyid

ngang las rang 'byung ngo// ston pas sprul pa don mdzad de// 'gro ba tha dad snang ba la// sprul pas mthun pa'i don byed pas// sprul pa'i mchod rten zhes su bstan// chos nyid dngos po med pa la// las kyi dbang
gis dngos po'i gzugs// gzugs brnyan mchod rten zhes su bstan// chos nyid don dang 'dra ba'i gzugs// don la brnyan pas gzugs brnyan no// rtags pas snang ba'i ngos po la// sku yi gzugs brnyan

zhes su bstan// khyad par de snyed bstan pa yang// gdul bya'i ngang ste tha dad med// mtshon dang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// ji snyaid 'dod pa de snyed bstan// bstan pa nyid na dngos po med// yod med gnyis las
'das pa yi// chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan 'di// ma 'ongs skal ldan don gyi phyir// thugs las ljags su phyung ste bstan// bstan pa'i rgyud chen rgyal po 'di// skal ldan rnams kyi gdeng du
zhog/ dga' dang gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// rab stod sku la phyag 'tshal lo// don grub yod pas gzhan na med// thugs rjer ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsungs so// chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan sku gdung
mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud las// las kha bskang ba dang yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// mchod rten gyi cho ga/ btsan pos phyag sbal nas// lo tsA ba ban d+he rin chen mchog gis bsgyur
ba// gzugs chen po ma yin pa// rgyud chen por rtogs pa'o// bi ma uSh+Ni Sha'i sku gdung mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// dad ldan sems can rnams kyi las// sku gdung bzhengs pa'i las byed
pas// rgyud 'di'i rjes su 'brangs byas te// las kyi rim pa ma nor bar// yan lag tshang bar byas nas ni// mchod rten sku gdung las byas na// gcig btab bye ba btab dang mtshungs// dpung bzangs zhus
pa'i rgyud dag la// gang gis sbyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis// rang gi 'dod pa'i lha de ma 'grub cing// gsang sngags 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na// de tshe bder gshegs sku gdung sa tshwa gdab par
bya// yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag la gdab// des ni bskal par bsags pa'i srid zhan rnams// grol bar 'gyur te nyes pa kun zad nas// gsang sngags 'bras bu tshe 'di nyid la thob// de nas sku
gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa yang// de yi las byas 'byang bar te 'bras bu ni// mchod rten chos sku'i yon tan thob par 'gyur// zhes 'byung bas phan yon ni// dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das par
gsungs so//// @#/ rgya gar skad du// de ba hu ye shes ya man hri// b+hU ti tan+t+ra nA ma// bod skad du// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud ces bya ba// dpal kun tu bzang po thig le lhun
gyis grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bshad pa'i dus// chos bzang lha yi bdun sa na// rnam dag yangs pa pad+ma'i gnas// bde ba chen po'i zhing khams su// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas pa
yi// kun tu bzang po ston pa'i gtso// 'khor ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga// bstan pa kun 'byung dkyil 'khor du// yongs la khyab pa gdal ba'i gnas// gzhi po gnad shes 'khrul pa'i dus// dbang po rang
snang me long lnga// yid ches rang snang sangs rgyas lnga// ye shes gzung 'dzin rang sar grol// 'bebs dus mun pa glog gi mtshams// dbab pa kun 'byung kun gyi lam// phebs pa sangs rgyas kun gyi
mes// tshad ni 'gyu ba rang grol yin// rtag ni bar snang 'od kyi gnas// drod tshad gzung 'dzin rang sar dag/ 'bras bu chos med rang sar grol// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i 'khor gyi bskor// grags
pa ma yin snang ba che// snang chen rang snang dkyil 'khor de// kun 'byung ye shes rig pa'i gnas// gnyis med ye shes 'dzin med gnad// thig le chos med dngos po'i gnad// gnyis med zang thal ma rig
gnad// 'gyur med rtse gcig 'gyur ba'i gnad// thig le nyag gcig 'khor lo'i gnad// ye shes rang snang 'byung ba'i gnad// skye med zang thal rtog pa'i gnad// btsal med rang 'byung blo yi gnad// lhun
grub ye shes gzhi ni gnad// 'bras bu rang sa 'khrul pa'i gnad// gnad kyi gdags ngag ma shes na// dga' bo gtsug gi nor bu 'dra// gtan la phebs dus ma shes na// long bas long ba khrid pa 'dra// tshad
dang rang rtags ma shes na// gser la bungs tshong byed pa 'dra// 'khrul pa'i dus tshod ma shes na// kha brag lam du 'choms pa 'dra// gzhi yi gnas lugs ma shes na// grogs po bskam por chu 'tshol

'dra// lam gyi sa mtshams ma shes na// rgyus med thang stong lus pa 'dra// 'bras bu rang sar ma shes na// rgya mtshor gser sbram lhung ba 'dra// de don ma rtogs ya yang cha// 'khor ba'i gnas las thar pa'i sa

bon stor// byang chub myu gu rtsa nas bcad// chos nyid brlan la than chen 'bar// chos sku skye med lo thog las// gnyis med zang thal blo yul shor// thos mangs sgra tshad tshig thog shar// skye med ye shes

gzhi thog shor// yid smon blo yul gnas pa ya re cha// chos sku rang sgo sad pa'i dus mi mchi// skye med kha gtam mkhan po nyon re mongs// rtsol bas rtogs med 'dod pa tshe re chad// dus dang las la ltos pa e

re 'khyams// skye med rnam rtog nyid la ma khel na// gnyis med ye shes ngo yis zin mi srid// gzung 'dzin rang sar grol ba'i gnad med na// mkha' la mdud 'dor 'dra ste byung ba med// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye

shes skye med do// lhan skyes ma rig de la ma khel na// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'char mi srid// ye shes zang thal rtsol sgrub med pa de// rtsol ba blo yi thog tu ma khel na// rtsol med rang grol 'char ba'i dus

mi srid// ye shes zang thal bar mtshams med pa de// mtshan ma sna tshogs du mar ma shar na// ye shes bar mtshams med par 'char mi srid// chos sku skye med kun khyab de// chos can 'khor ba nyid la ma khel

na// chos nyid skye meda'achar ba'i dus mi mchi// mnyam nyid rtog med chos kyi sku// mi mnyam phyogs rtogs can la ma khel na/ mnyam nyid blo yi yul du shor ba nyon re mongs/ srid rang grol ma shes pas/ sku
gsum yid smon blo thog shor// blo las 'das pa dka' bar mchi// de don ma rtogs ya re cha// zhes pa kun tu bzang po yis// 'khor ni yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sku gsum rang snang khyab pa la/

byin gyis rlabs kyis bshad pa yin// byin gyis brlabs kyis mngon sangs rgyas// byin gyis brlabs las longs sku snang// rang snang byin rlabs longs skur shar// de yi byin rlabs sku lnga pa'o// sangs rgyas sku

lnga'i bdag nyid grub// kun la snyoms pa'i byin rlabs 'byung// thugs rje lce spyang mig bzhin 'char// sprul sku rang shar kun la snyoms// mkha' la nyi ma shar ba 'dra// mun pa'i mtshan ma rang sar dag/ sku

gcig kun la khyab pas chen po'i sku// khyab pa'i bdag po ye shes lnga dang ldan// kun la rang chas gnas pas rang snang che// byin gyis brlabs la 'phebs 'grib med// ye shes rang snang kun la snyoms// zhes
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs su bshad pa'o// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// kun tu bzang po chos las 'das pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yangakun tu bzang po

la// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang// de'i sprul pa rdo rje chos kyi blo gros kyis// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po lags// chos las 'das pa ji lta bu// bdag cag chos kyi ngo bo 'di// 'di las grol
ba gsung du gsol// ces gsungs so// ston pa'i chos min yangs pa can la bzhengs nas/ bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'khor sangs rgyas lnga dang// de'i sprul pa ston pa 'od zer 'gyed pa dang stabs cig tu

byon no// byon par gyur nas/ byin gyis brlabs kyis/ ston pa rdo rje chos kyi blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ legs par nyon cig/ ma zhum la ma skrag/ ma dngangs/ dngangs par ma byed par thang cig gam/ yud cig

gam/ skad cig la bshad par bya'o// zhes gsungs nas bka' stsal pa/ bde gshegs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang ye shes lngar ldan pa// ye shes sku ste rab snang ba// sprul sku rdo rje blo gros dang// kun kyang

don ldan ye shes sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan mnga' ba// sku dang ye shes gcig pa la// tha dad du snang ba e re 'khyams// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sku lnga ni// gcig la khyab pas gcig gi ngang// phyogs su ma

lhung rang sar grol// rgya ma chad kyi ye shes yin// yon tan lnga ru rang byung bas// chen po lnga ru snang ba'o// de ma rtogs pa sku lnga ni// phyogs med ma rtogs phyogs cha byung// phyogs rtogs gol ba'i 'bras bus
mthar mi 'phyin// rang song 'bras bu gnas skabs chos// 'bras bu mthar thug shin tu dka'// dka' bas ngo sprod bstan par bya// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum rnams// rnam par snang mdzad yab yum
la// rtags kyi gdan khri bstan pa ni// 'jigs med rang grol seng ge'i khri/ stobs kyi 'gro don mdzad pa'i glang po che// shugs kyis rang sar grol ba'i rta yi mchog/ dug lnga rangasar grol ba'i rma
bya yin/ phrin las rtsal chen rdzogs pas mkha' lding yin// 'phrin las phyogs med mnga' bas rin po che// shes rab stobs lnga rin rin po che// thabs kyis chos rnams 'byung bas zla ba'i gdan// 'gyur med

rnam snang sku mdog mdog dkar// skye med bskyod pa med pas rdo rje sems dpa' yin// byin rlabs rtsal med ldan pas rin chen 'byung ldan sku// skyon dang dri med 'od dpag med// 'phrin las rang las byung ba

don yod grub// 'gro drug rang sar grol ba'i 'khor lo dang// de don mi 'gyur rdo rje dang// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba rin po che// dri ma rang sar dag pas pad+ma dang// 'khor ba'i rgya thebs rtags su rgya gram
yin// don dag rtags su dbang lnga rdzogs pa'i phyir// rigs lnga cha mthun dbu yi dbang rtags rnams// de don rang chas yin pa las// 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la sogs dang// sems bskyed spyan

drangs la sogs bya min bya mi dgos// sems dpa' rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// gzhi la lhun grub rgya ma chad pa yin// yon tan phyogs gcig rtsal snang yin// phyogs su bzang bas gol sa rab tu che// nyi ma
sprin gyis sgrib pas gsal ldan don ma nus// longs sku snang bar shor bas rang grol 'char ma nus// thams cad blo las ma 'das 'khrul pa'i lam// yid smon blo chung rnams la ngas ma bshad// phyogs ris

rang sar grol ba'i gnad med na// rtogs pa'i sgom byas pa yi 'bras bu mthar mi phyin// ne tsho chos 'chad sbur chu 'thung ba bzhin// kha yis bshad pas phyogs med grol mi 'gyur// kha dog rgyan cha yon tan

snang bar ma shes na// rgyan dang cha lugs sgom pas sangs mi rgya// spre'u la sgom pa slabs de don go med rtog pa kha brid rtsa ba chod mi 'gyur// snying po'i rtsa ba 'bru gcig gnad med na// rgyal ba rigs lnga nye ba'i

dus mi mchi// smig sgyu ded sa 'dra ste shin tu ring// lha skyes ma nyes gnyis med 'byung bar ga la 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa'i lha yi gnad med na// rgyal ba rigs lnga mchaud pas 'grib pa'i don ma mchi// chos
nyid byin rlabs phyogs tsam 'byung ba la// mchog gi dngos grub 'byung ba ga la 'gyur// thugs rje chen po rang la snang ba'i gnad med na// gsol btab skyabs 'gro'i thugs rje mthar mi zin// thugs rje

bkrag mdangs nyi ma stong gi gzi// zer tsam cig la rten pas blo chung 'gyur// sku lnga'i rta mchog dug lnga ma rtogs na// sku lnga bsgom nas dug lnga zhi zer ba// gti mug chos sku rnam snang sdong po rul// lo ma skyes
byed rtsa ba dgos pa yin// de bzhin dug lnga zhi bas sku lnga'i sa bon brlag/ sa bon med na 'bras bu mi 'byung bzhin// dug lnga med na sku lnga ga la 'grub// dug lnga dngos su snang ba don rtags

yin// sku lnga rang snang ba de dbang po yin// dug lnga med na sku lnga med pa yid ches yin// dug lnga gtan la phebs pas sku lngar shar ba dgos pa yin// thar pa'i sa bon shes pas sgrub mi dgos pa'i yon tan
yin// dug lnga skyon du mi lta rang 'byung lngar gsal la// gsal ba gdams pa yin// dug lnga gnas 'gyur mi dgos rang 'byung 'char ba brgyud pa yin// dug yul med na rtsa ba'i gnad chod 'bras bu yin// ma
'dres yongs su rdzogs pa gtan tshigs yin// phyogs lhung rgya chad med pa dam bca' yin// gcig la thams cad rdzogs pa bsgrub bya yin// gser la gzugs brnyan snang na mthun dpe yin// zhes gsungs

so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// sprul pa'i sku lnga rdo rje chos kyi blo gros byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag dgongs pa las// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros
kyis// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po lags// rgyal sras sprul sku bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// nga yis khyod la bstan

par bya// rgyal sras longs sku'i mtshan brjod na/// rgya mtsho'i thigs pa bgrang bar nus// ri la 'ja' bzhin gzhal bar nus// 'di yi mtshan ni brjod par ga la nus// rdul phran gcig la'ang rgyal ba grangs

las 'das// bsdu na rdul phran gcig la rgyal ba rnam lnga snang// rdul phran gzugs kyi rnam pa ste// rgyal sras rnam par snang mdzad yin// de yi kha dog gsal ba de// rgyal sras rdo rje sems dpa' yin// de yi
rang bzhin snang gsal ba// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan yin// gzugs dbyibs kha dog snang ba de// rgyas sras snang ba mtha' yas yin// thams cad yongs la phyogs med grub// de la don yod grub pa

yin// de ni rgyal sras longs sku yin// 'byung lnga rgyal sras sprul pa'i sku// dbyer med rnam dag 'ub chub ngang// de ni rgyal sras chos kyi sku// dbang bskur ma byas gcig kyang med// dbang ma thob pa gcig kyang

med// de la go mtshams med pa'i phyir// dbang rnams thams cad dus gcig rdzogs// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// rgyal sras sku gsum dbang bskur ba// skad cig tsam yang ma 'gul cig/ skad cig tsam yang
ma ldegs shig/ gal te 'gul cing ldegs srid na// rgyal ba'i sras la pan mchongs byas// sangs rgyas mgo mchongs byas pa yin// bskal par thar pa'i sa bon stor// sangs rgyas zhal mi mthong ba e re
'khyams// rgyal sras sprul sku yin pa ngo ma shes// der snang longs sku yin par yid ma ches// cir snang chos skur shar ba thag ma chod// thams cad rang las grub pa gdengs ma rnyed// e ma

ho// snang srid sku lnga'i ngo sprod gdams pa yin// thams cad sku lngar snang ba thag chod yin// byin rlabs phyogs bcur 'char ba yid ches yin// thams cad rang la shar ba thag chod yin// rang ngo rang gis shes
pas gdeng rnyed nges shes yin// rdul phran gcig la grub pa yon tan yin// rdul phran kun la snang ba khyab pa yin// thams cad kun la grub pa 'brel ba yin// thams cad sras su gyur pa bsgrub bya
yin// gzugs med sku lnga mi srid gzugs yod gtan tshigs yin// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs skur shar ba dam bca' yin// rnam snang skye ba zhes pa su la snang// srid pa'i gzhi ma gzugs la snang ba

la// gzugs nyid med na rnam snang ga la grub// srid pa'i chu bzhi rnam par snang mdzad yin// de spangs rnam par snang mdzad rtsa ba rul// chu bzhi spangs pas sku yi sa bon gtor// skye rga 'chi ba bzhi nang gi chu

bzhi'o// rnam par snang mdzad 'chi ba su yis mthong// chu bzhi rgyal sras sprul skur shes na ni// rgyal sras sprul sku 'byin pa skye sgo 'thabs// thugs rje sprul sku'i rtsa ba rabs brgyud chad// sprul sku rabs chad 'khor

ba'i ston pas su// rdzus skyes mngal skyes la sogs rten med pas// sprul sku'i don mi 'byung bas ya re cha// de la gnas pa e re 'khyams/ sprul sku rtag na sprul pa'i dam bca' nyams// cir yang sprul pa rang la

'byung ba bsgrub bya yin// thub drug ma nges 'byung ba gtan tshigs yin// zhes gsungs so// sems nyid skye ba med pa rgyal sras chos kyi sku// chos sku rang snang 'byed pa med pa dang// snang ba du ma'i gzugs nyid
ma spangs gnas su grol/ chos sku gtan la phab pa snod dang bcud// gtan la phebs pas chos sku khong du chud// tshad ni rig pa yul la med pa yin// drod tshad rtog pa rang dag yin// rtags ni yul du gyur
pa'o// 'bras bu rtogs med mnyam pa nyid// dbang po yul can rang grol yin// dbang po mi gsum spyi khyab yin// zhes gsungs so// chos med dgongs pa ma sad na// rig pa yul med 'char mi srid// skad

cig rang grol ma shar na// dus ltos dwangs sangs 'byung mi srid// rig pa rang grol ma shar na// yul med zhing khams 'char mi srid// snang rtags gtan la ma phebs na/ rtags 'dod dgongs pa 'char mi srid//
rig pa'i drod tshad ma shes na// sangs rgyas dgongs pa tshad mi zin// 'bras bu chos min rang chas ma shes na// dus kyi bsgribs nas thob mi srid// dbang po dpang du tshugs na/ yid smon blo yi grol mi
srid// spyi khyab dbangapor ma shes na// 'gro drug rangagrol 'byung mi srid// tshad zin pa ni shin tu gces// tshad ma gtan la phebs tsam na// gzugs can gtan la ma phebs na// gzugs med

'char ba'i dus mi 'chi// gzugs med tshang la ma phebs na// rang grol 'char ba'i dus mi mchi// rang grol tshad la la ma phebs na// dgongs pa rnam dag 'byung mi srid// snang ba tshad la ma phebs na// 'od gsal

'char ba'i dus mi srid// 'od gsal tshad la ma phebs na/ rang snang rnam dag 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhi sa tshad la ma phebs na// 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus mi srid// 'bras bu tshad la ma phebs na// gzhi las

'das pa 'byung mi 'gyur// du ma gtan la ma phebs na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dus mi mchi// kun mkhyen gtan la ma phebs na// du ma rang grol 'byung mi srid// 'gro drug tshad la ma phebs na// snang srid rnam

dag dus mi mchi// snang srid rnam dag ma shes na// 'gro drug g.yang sa chod pa ga la 'gyur// 'khrul pa tshad la ma phebs na// rang grol 'char ba'i dus mi mchi// rang grol tshad la ma phebs na// 'khrul med

'byung bar ga la 'gyur/ 'khrul ba'i rtsa ba tshad la ma phebs na// 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu ldog pa'i dus mi mchi// 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu tshad la ma phebs na// rtsa ba chod pa'i dus mi mchi// de rnams kun gyi 'brel

pa dang// khyab pa lhun grub tshad zin gces// tshad ma zin par chos 'chad pa// long bas long ba khrid pa 'dra// 'bras bu'i dus su ma shes na// sgo nga rul ba'i byi'u phrug 'dra// lag len dus tshod ma shes
na// 'ba' sam sa yi thugs pa 'dra// gnad kyi gdams ngag ma shes na// rgyus med mig gi thur thogs 'dra// log non gdams ngag ma shesan// ltag gi steng du sgangs byung 'dra// tshad kyi gdams ngag ma

shes na// ga bur mangs te 'byams pa 'dra// rtags kyi gdams ngag ma shes na// long bas gser sbram sbas pa 'dra// drod tshad gdams ngag ma shes na// sngags can dug la tshad po 'dra// byin pa tshad la ma phebs
na// rdo la dngul chu byug 'dra/ thugs rgyud tshad la ma phebs na// mun nag lag yug byed pa 'dra// bka' rgyud tshad la ma phebs na// sna chad me long lta ba 'dra// 'chi ltas tshad la ma phebs

na// b+hi ha tsi yi rmi lam 'dra// dran po gsum po tshad dang ma ldan na// lag rdum brag la 'dzeg pa 'dra// lhun grub tshad la ma phebs na// rin chen cig la bstod pa 'dra// rgya tshad tshad la ma phebs na// grub
mtha' rang sa'i dus mi mchi// phyogs med tshad la ma phebs na// rgya chad grol ba'i dus mi mchi// gnyis snang gtan la ma phebs na/ dbyer med 'char ba'i dus mi mchi// dbyer med tshad la ma phebs
na// gnyis snang rang grol dus mi mchi// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// rgyal sras sku gsum byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang

dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// bdud kyi gcod yul bstan par bya// bdud ces bya ba ma rig pa// bdud kyi gzhi ni gti mug go/ rgyu ni lhun skyes ma rig pa// 'bras bu bdud bzhis

kun la rgyu// lta ba bdud du babs pa yod// lta ba stong pa'i yul du shar// lta ba yul can yid smon mkhan// sdug bsngal rkyen thub gnad ma shes// blo yi bdud kyi rkun bus khyer// lta ba rkun mor shaur ba
de// rtsa ba chod par ga la 'gyur// gcod mkhan rkun mos yin pa'i phyir// lta ba stong pa 'dod chags can// chags pa'i bdud kyis brkus pa yin// lta ba sdug bsngal rkyen gyis 'gyur// zhe sdang bdud kyis
brkus pa yin// gnyis med sre thabs ma shes pas// gti mug bdud kyis brkus pa yin// blo yi lta ba bzang snyams nas// nga rgyal bdud kyis brkus pa yin// grub mtha'i rang gzhung lta ba srol// phrag dog

bdud kyis brkus pa yin// rkyen thub rang grol ma shes pas// khong khro'i bdud kyis brkus pa yin// rkun ma mi drug sdong pos chas// lta ba rang sangs rkun mos brkus// rku mkhan rtsa ba ma chos na// lta ba rnyed
pa'i dus mi mchi// chags pa'i bdud dang ma bral na// 'bras bu yan lag skye bar 'gyur// zhe sdang bdud dang ma bral na// nges par dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// gti mug bdud dang ma bral na// byol song

'jig rten skye bar 'gyur// nga rgyal bdud dang ma bral na// mi yi 'jig rten skye bar 'gyur// phrag dog bdud dang ma bral na// nges par lha min 'jig rten skye// khong khro'i bdud dang ma bral na// lha min 'jig

rten skye bar 'gyur// de yang rgyu gcig rkyen drug yin// rgyu ni gtso bo rkyen gyis sgyur bar byed// rig pa stong par ma shar na// rkyen drug rang grol dus mi mchi// rkyen drug rang sar ma grol na// bdud drug choms

pa'i dus mi mchi// brku mkhan ngo yis ma zin na// bdud ngo shes par ga la 'gyur// bdud ngo shes par ma gyur na// lta ba rnyed par ga la 'gyur// lta ba phyogs lhung med pa la// bdud kyis brlabs nas phyogs

su khyer// bdud de phyogs med na shes na// lta ba phyogs med 'byung mi 'gyur// nga ni bdud kyi srog rtsa gcod// ye shes srog med yod pa'i phyir// lta ba'i bdud kyi srog rtsa gcod// ltar med rang grol yod pa'i
phyir// rkun mo'i srog gi rtsa ba gcod// brkur med nyag gcig yod pa'i phyir// snod bcud gnyis kyi srog rtsa gcod// rang grol zang thal yod pa'i phyir// shes rab mkha' la bya ltar lding// theg
pa'i bdud kyis khyer ba yin// zhen cing chags pa snang ba'i bdud// 'du 'dzi g.yeng bas khyer ba yin// nga rgyal kheng grags g.yeng ba'i bdud// longs spyod g.yeng bas khyer ba yin// nyams myong
smra bcad blo chung bdud// bka' bsgo zhen pas khyer ba yin// thos mang don mjed grags pa sgra yi bdud// doms med bdud kyis khyer ba yin/ rang snang kha dog 'od kyi bdud// zhes chags bdud kyi khyer ba
yin// shes rab rnam gsum gnad shes pas// theg pa'i bdud sgribs grol bar byed// zhen chags rang snang gnad shes pas// 'du 'dzi rang sar grol bar byed// nga rgyal mnyam nyid
gnad shes pas// gnyis med rang snang grol bar byed// chags zhen lam du grol bar 'gyur// nyams myong blo las 'das par byed// bka' bsgo rang grol 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa longs spyod rang sar grol
ba'i gnad// sgro 'dogs rang sar grol bar byed// rang snang bar do'i gnad shes pas// chags zhen lam du grol bar 'gyur// bdung kyi so mtshams ma shes na// bdud las rgyal ba'i dus mi mchi// bdud

kyi ngo sprod ma shesan// sgro 'dogs chod pa'i dus mi mchi// sgro brtags rang grol ma shes na// grod tshad rang grol dus mi mchi// bdud kyi ngo sprod byed tsam na// mgo lus med par mig tu 'gro/ mig gcig mig

stong phyogs bcur blta// bdud kyi rgyal po mig gcig po// bdud kyi blon po mig brgya po// mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// mig gi ngo sprod ma shes na// sangs rgyas ngo sprod tshig gis na ya yin// sangs
rgyas rang grol 'char ba'i dus mi mchi// phyogs med mthong ba mig gi gnad med na/ ye shes spyan chen 'char ba'i dus mi mchi// mig gcig phyogs bcur lta ba'i gnad med na// ye shes mig gcig 'char
ba'i dus mi mchi// rkang rdum mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnad med na// sangs rgyas yul med slebs pa'i dus mi mchi// lag rdum srog gcod gdams ngag ma shes na// 'khor ba'i srog rtsa chod ba'i dus mi
mchi// gzugs med snying 'dod gnad med na// bla ma'i gdam pa 'char ba'i dus mi mchi// lus med mgo lus dbral ba'i gnad med na// sems dang ye shes phyed ba'i dus mi mchi// dngos med 'khor lo
bskor ba'i gnad med na// ye shes 'od gsal 'char ba'i dus mi mchi// sa med rdos thag gcad pa'i gnad med na// kun bzang rang sa slebs pa'i dus mi mchi// phyogs med rang sar grol ba'i gnad med
na// lte ba'i bdud sde choms pa'i dus mi mchi// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// ltab ngos bzung rang grol ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje
chos kyi blo gros khyod// bdud kyis thams cad bar du gcod// sgoms pas bdud du babs pa yod// bdud kyi rgyu ni 'dzin pa yin// bdud kyi rkyen ni gzung ba'i yul// 'bras bu 'jig rten
'khor ba'i gnas// 'khor ba'i gnas la ma thar na// bdud kyi dbang du song ba yin// bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni// chags zhen nyams su myong ba yin// de la bsgoms pa bdud du babs pa

na// mtshan bcas sgom dang mtshan med sgom// bde zhing zhen pa chags pa'i bdud// bying rmugs phrag dog zhe sdang bdud// rang grol ma shes gti mug bdud// zhe la gsal ba nga rgyal bdud// stong dang gzugs

can phrag dog bdud// sre ma shes pas khong khro'i bdud// bdud kyi rtsa ba ma rig pa// ma rig rang byung bdud du babs// bdud kyi srog rtsa ma chod na// bsgoms pa bdud kyis rlabs pa yin// nyams myong bde ba

skyed 'byin pa// bdud kyi dbang du song ba yin// shes pa rkyen gyis gyur tsam na// bdud kyis shes pa phrogs pa yin// nyams myong bdud la khel snyam byed// shes bya bdud kyis byin brlabs yin// nyams myong

bstan pa snyam byed na// bdud kyi dbang du 'dus pa yin// shes pa mi mthong snyam byed na// bdud kyis shes pa phrogs pa yin// bying shing khro ba snyam bya na// bdud kyis shes pa bsgyur ba yin// de la gseng dang
sdud pa ni// bdud kyis byin gyis rlob pa yin// de nas gsal ba snyam byed na// bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin// bdud kyi tshad zin shin tu dka'// thams cad bdud kyis brlabs pa'i phyir// bdud

kyi srog rtsa gcod pa la// re dogs snyam byed 'phrang rgal dgos// rgya mtsho'i gting du gsad pa dang// ri rab rtse la gsad po dang// nyi zla'i bar du gsad pa dang// gangs dkar rtse la gsad pa dang// ri brag
bar du gsad pa dang// ri brag rmang du gsad pa dang// srid gsum rtse mor gsad pa dang// rgya mtsho'i gting gi gnad med na// bag chags 'dzad kyi dus mi mchi// ri rab rtse yi gagad med na// rang grol

'char gyi dus mi mchi/ nyi zla gnyis kyi gnad med na// gnyis med 'char gyi dus mi mchi// gangs dkar rtse yi gnad med na// dri med dag pa'i dus mi mchi// ri brag bar gyi gnad med na// zang thal 'char gyi dus
mi mchi// ri brag rmang gi gnad med na// nyams las grol ba'i dus mi mchi// srid gsum rtse mo'i gnad med na// sku gsum rang grol dus mi mchi// sems dang ye shes bag chags gsum// gzhi dang lam dang
'bras bu gsum// 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa dngos po gsum// zlog thabs sa mtshams 'bras bu gsum// byin dang rlabs dang rten dang gsum// sangs pa rgyas pa 'das pa gsum// sad pa sangs pa dwangs pa
gsum// ye dang shes pa shes rab gsum// chos dang sku dang rtog med gsum// chos dang sku dang rtog med gsum// chos dang chos can chos nyid gsum// las dang 'phro dang 'thud dus
gsum// bag dang chags dang 'gyur ba gsum// rang dang byung dang ye shes gsum// de gsum gdams pas ma brgyan par// spyi sdom tsam yang ston pa la// rgyab dkar gnad dang log non ma shes na// chos

nyid spyi sar 'chor ba yin// spyi dang bye brag dbye ba gces// gnad dang log non gegs sel gsum// ldem bor dgongs pa'i khyad par gyis// sgom pa'i 'dre rkun ngos gzung bya// sgom pa'i 'dre yis khyer tsam

na// nga rgyal bdud kyis brlabs pa yin// bdud kyi rtsa ba chod la// 'khrul pa'i dri ma 'dag du med// 'dre yi srog rtsa ma chod na// khams gsum rtsa ba chod dus med// 'dre ni thar pa'i sa bon yin// thar pas

grol zhing zag pa med// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal ba// thar pa 'dod na rtog pa skyed// thar pa'i sa bon rtogs pa yin// rtog med rtog pa su la yod// byang chub 'dod na sgrib pa yin// zh-i gnas sgoms
pas lhag mthong rtsa ba rul// sems 'dzin sgoms pas rang grol rtsa ba rul// bde ba sgoms pas gnyis med rtsa ba rul// mtshan bcas bsgoms pas zang thal rtsa ba rul// kha yan bsgoms pas kha 'gugs rtsa
ba rul// kha 'gugs bsgoms pas kha yan rtsa ba rul// gnyis med bsgoms pas zung 'jug rtsa ba rul// sgoms pa byas chos mi rtag gnyis 'dus pas// 'dus byas rang sar grol du ma ster ro// de ltar

gnas pa don la rmongs// rnam rtog rang byung ye shes ngo sprod shar// thar ba'i lam chen byang chub sdong po tshugs// rtog med mnyam nyid blo yi rnam par grol// byang chub mi 'dod chos skur lhun gyis grub// zhi

gnas rang grol ces zin ye shes shar// 'dzin pa dwangs sangs rang 'byung chos skur brdal// bde chen ma sgom chos sku khong nas shar// mtshan ma sgom rang snang sku lngar gsal// kha yan mi sgom rang snang yul

med shar// kha 'gugs ma sgom yul med rang grol shar// gnyis med mi b+hai rang snang thig ler brdal// b+hai pa mi byed byed mkhan dwangs sangs 'das// gnyis med rang shar chos sku rang la shar// de ltar

rtogs pas thar pa'i 'bras bu thob// thob pa mthar mi lhung zhing rang sar 'gro ba gces// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// b+hai pa ngos bzung ba dang bdud srog rtsa gcad pa'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// thams cad bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs// spyod pa bdud du babs pa yod// bdud ces bya ba ma rig pa// spyod pa'i mkhan po
ngo ma shes// ma rig rang la bdud du babs// phyi yi chos spyod bcu po dang// lta sgom spyod pa'i shes rab kyis// phyi yi yul du spyod par byed// thabs kyi snang ba chags pa'i bdud// rtsa rgyud zhags
pas bcings pa yis// 'dod chags bdud kyis rla??bs pa yin// bde bar gshegs pa nga rgyal rgyud// rtsa rlung ma gsal zhe sdang bdud// rang grol ma shes gti mug bdud// gzhan sum 'don pa phrag dog
bdud// rtsa rlung sbyong ba khong khro'i bdud// bdud kyi mkhan por shes par bya// rig pa yul med gnad med na// rtsa yi 'khor lo dang du long// dmigs pa'i bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs// rtsa yi stong ra

'joms snyams byed// bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin// rtsa yi nang du shes pa tshud// bdud kyis shes pa phrogs pa yin// bde ba stong par rgyas 'debs pa// bdud kyi dbang du song ba yin// snang ba stong

par shes tsam na// rtsa yi stong ra chen por 'byongs// rig pa zang thal shar tsam na// a wa d+hu tir shes pa tshud// khong gsal yul med shar tsam na// bde stong zung du chud pa yin// 'gyu ba rang grol shar tsam

na// gsal stong khong du chud pa yin// rang bzhin stong pa'i gnad med na// lte ba'i rtsa grangs gol ba yin// stong ra sbyong ba sgrib pa yin// thugs rje 'gag med gnad med na// gsang ba'i rtsa sgo gol ba
yin// bde ba ngos 'dzin sgrib pa yin// yon tan 'gyur med gnad med na// snying kha rtsa 'dab spyod pa gol// stong pa rgyas 'debs sgrib pa yin// 'phrin las thogs med gnad med na// sgrib pa spyi bo rtsa

grangs spyod pa gol// bde stong rgyas 'debs sgrib pa yin// thugs rje 'gag med rtsa med na// thugs rje sprul sku ma byung na// thub pa 'gro drug drang thabs med// gti mug 'byed med rtsa med na// chos sku kun

khyab bstan thabs med// ngo bo gsal ba'i rtsa med na// longs skur rang snang 'char thabs med// longs sku rang snang ma shar na// chos sku yon tan rgyun chad 'gyur// chos sku'i yon tan rgyud chad na// gzugs
sku gnyis po 'byung thabs med// 'phrin las thogs med rtsa med na// sku gsum yon tan mtha' nas chad// chos sku dbang po yul med// mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gags par 'gyur// yon tan 'gyur med rtsa med
na// sku gsum mi rtag 'dus byas 'gyur// sku gsum 'dus byas mi rtag na// ngo sprod 'bras bu dgos pa med// gti mug 'byed med rtsa med na// chos sku'i dbang po su yis byas// chos sku'i sa bon rtsa ba

rul// gti mug rang grol ma shar na// chos sku'i nges shes su yis byed// gti mug zang thal ma shar na// chos sku rkyen thub ga nas btsal// gti mug yul med ma shar na// chos sku'i mkhyen tshad ga la bya// gti
mug rang dag ma shar na// chos sku'i 'bras bu su la bstan// thugs rje 'dod chags rtsa med na// sprul sku'i bdag po su yis byed// sprul pa sku yi sa bon rul// 'dod chags rang grol ma shar na/

sprul sku'i ngo shes su yis byed// 'dod chags zang thal ma shar na/ sprul sku rkyen thub bu la 'byung// 'dod chags gnyis med ma shar na// sprul sku'i mkhyen tshad su yis gzung// 'dod chags rang dag ma shar

na// sprul sku'i che ba su la bstan// ngo bo gsal ba'i rtsa med na// longs sku'i dbang po su yis byed// longs sku'i sa bon rul ba yin// zhe sdang rang grol ma shes na// longs sku'i nges shes ga la bya// zhe sdang

zang thal ma shar na// longs sku'i rkyen thub su la re// zhe sdang khong gsal ma shar na// longs sku'i mkhyen tshad ga la bya// zhe sdang rnam dag ma shar na// longs sku'i ngo sprod ga la bya// rtsa gnyis yon tan cha dang

ldan// zhe sdang rang grol shes pa la// zhe sdang log non dmar khrid dgos// dmar khrid log non gnad shes na// longs sku rang snang 'char bar 'gyur// thun mong ma yin mchog tu 'gyur// gti mug rang grol
shes pa la// log non don skor gdam ngag dgos// don skor log non gnad shes na// chos sku yul med 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod chags rang grol shes pa la// brda skor gnad kyi gdam ngag

dgos// gnad dang brda skor don shes na// sprul sku rang chas 'byung bar 'gyur// de rnams drug gis gnad shes na// nga rgyal med pa'i yid ches 'char// nga rgyal rtsa nas chod pa'i phyir// 'dod pa med pa'i

rtags mchog chang// sku gsum rang la shar ba'i phyir// yul med pa yi thugs rje 'byung// sangs rgyas yul med yin pa'i phyir// rig pa yul med ma shar na// sangs rgyas yul med shin tu dka'// nga rgyal rang

grol ma shar na// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'char ba dka'// zhe 'dod rang grol ma shar na// sku gsum rang grol shin tu dka'// bka' ba'i phyir na sla ba yin// sla ba'i phyir na dka' ba yin// thung ngu thung ngu ring

po yin// ring po ring po thung ngu yin// chen po chen po chung ngu yin// chung ngu chung ngu chen po yin// des na dpag par rab tu dka'// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// spyod pa'i bdud ngos
bzung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// bdud dang 'dre yi spyod yul dang// byin gyis brlabs pa bstan par bya// 'bras bu bdud du
babs pa yod// 'bras bu yul can dus la ltos// gti mug bdud kyis byin gyis rlabs// 'bras bu zhe 'dod yul du gyur// 'dod chags bdud kyis khyer ba yin// 'bras bu dus ltos ring 'gyur ba// zhe sdang
bdud kyi khyer ba yin// theg pa'i ngang gzhung 'bras bu ste// phrag dog bdud kyis byin gyis rlabs// 'bras bu rang la thob snyam byed// nga rgyal bdud kyis byin gyis rlabs// 'bras bu rang la ma

rtogs pa// khong khro'i bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs// bdud kyi so pa mi drug byung// so pa re res so btsugs nas// bdud kyi kha las thar pa med// theg pa'i 'bras bu'i rang sa dang// mthar thug ba yi 'bras

bu gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor bar mchi'o// thun mong khyad par sku gsum dang// mchog gi sku gsum zang thal gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor bar mchi// rig pa'i rtsa rlung sbyong ba dang// thabs kyi rtsa rlung sbyong

ba gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor bar mchi// zhe la 'dod thob 'bras bu dang// rig pa rang snang 'bras bu gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor bar mchi// grangs chen spyi khyab sangs rgyas dang// rang snang don gyi sangs

rgyas gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor mchi// 'bras bu phyi dus mi 'debs te// ye shes snga phyi med pa'i phyir// 'bras bu bar do mi 'dod de// gnyis med zang thal yod pa'i phyir// 'khrul pa ldog tu mi 'dod

de// 'khrul med nyag gcig yod pa'i phyir// sems 'dzin 'bras bu mi 'dod de// 'dzin pa zang thal yod pa'i phyir// nyams myongs bde ba mi 'dod de// bde ba zang thal shar ba'i phyir// 'khrul med pa'i snang

ba dwangs tsam na// 'khrul pa med pa dbang po yin// 'khrul pa skye med yid ches yin// 'khrul par shar ba rtags mchog yin// 'khrul pa zang thal drod tshad yin// 'khrul pa rang snang nges shes yin// bdud ngo
shes pa tshad ma yin// 'khrul pa ye shes dbang bskur yin// phyi nang med pa 'bras bu yin// rang snang rnam dag shar tsam na// nyon mongs bdud choms dbang po yin// rang snang zang thal yid ches

yin// snang ba rang grol drod tshad yin// rang snang skye med rtags mchog yin// rang snang ngo sprod nges shes yin// rang snang ngos zin tshad ma yin// rang snang ye shes dbang gi bskur thabs yin// rang snang yul

med dbang gi spyod thabs yin// chen po lnga dang ldan pa dbang gi 'bras bu yin// rang snang phyi nang med pa dbang gi yid ches yin// snang ba dbang du 'dus pa drod dang tshad ma yin// rang snang sna tshogs 'char ba
dbang rtags yin// nyag gcig shes pa dbang gi ngo sprod yin// de ltar shes pa snang ba'i dbang bskur yin// tshogs drug rang sar grol tsam na// lha'i bu'i bdud choms dbang po yin// tshogs drug 'gyu bar

'dus pa yid ches yin// 'gyu ba rang grol drod dang tshad ma yin// 'gyu ba sna tshogs 'gyus pa rtags mchog yin// 'gyu ba ngo yis zin pa ngo sprod yin// 'gyu ba dbugs med ngo shes yin// thogs med zang thal
dbugs med dbang gi bskur thabs yin// 'gyus tshad rang sar dag shes dbang thob yin// 'gyu ba zang thal 'char ba dbang gi spyod pa yin// 'gyu ba yul ma rnyed pa dbang gi 'bras bu
yin// 'gyu ba dkar nag dbang gi yid ches yin// snang ba rnam gsum 'gyu ba'i 'dus pa drod dang tshad ma yin// 'gyu ba med na sangs rgyas med pas dbang rtags yin// 'gyu ba phra rags cir 'gyur zang thal

ngo sprod yin// de ltar log non shes na tshogs drug dbang bskur yin// gnyis med ye shes shar tsam na// phung po lnga yi bdud choms dbang po yin// ye shes rang snang shar ba yid ches yin// gzung 'dzin sna
tshogs skye ba drod dang tshad ma yin// gzung 'dzin skye med 'char ba rtags mchog yin// gzung 'dzin gnad la phebs pa ngo sprod ye shes yin// gzung 'dzin gnyis med dbang gi bskur thabs yin// 'dzin pa
rang 'byung rang snang dbang thob yin// 'dzin pa skye ba med par shes pa dbang gi sprod pa yin// sangs rgyas yul med shar ba dbang gi 'bras bu yin// gnyis med ye shes zang thal dbang gi yid ches

yin// gnyis med rang sar dag pa drod dang tshad ma yin// 'dzin pa'i shes pa sna tshogs skye ba dbang rtags yin// 'dzin med rang grol shes pa dbang gi ngo sprod yin// de ltar shes pa dbang gi 'bras bu bla na

med pa yin// dri med zang thal shar tsam na// 'chibadag bdud choms dbang po yin// 'khrul pa zang thal yid ches yin// skye med zang thal drod dang tshang ma yin// skye dang 'chi la rtags mchog yin// skye med

nyag gcig dbang gi nges shes yin// chu bzhi zang thal ngo sprod yin// skye shi rang grol dbang gi bskur thabs yin// skye 'chi rang dag shes pa dbang thob yin// skye med ye shes 'char ba dang dbang gi spyod pa

yin// chu bzhi rang sar grol ba dbang gi 'bras bu yin// skye 'chi rgyu?n chod dbang gi yid ches yin// snang dang mngon zhes log pa dbang gi drod dang tshad ma yin// chu bzhis 'gro kun khyab pa gtan tshigs dbang

rtags yin// chu bzhi dri med 'char ba dbang gi ngo sprod yin// chu bzhi rang grol nyag gcig thig le'i dbang bskur yin// snang ba rang grol rgya ma chad pas rgyud kyi dbang bskur yin// thams cad rang la khyab

pas dbang gi thob tshul yin// phyogs med rgya ma chad pas rgyud kyi spyod pa yin// de yi gong na med pa rgyud kyi 'bras bu yin// thams cad gcig la rdzogs pa rgyud kyi ngo bo yin// thams cad 'brel zhing tshang ba nges

tshig yin// rang snang rnam par dag pas yang dag dbang bskur yin// rig pa dri ma med pa yang dag dbang thob yin// 'gyus chad dri med yang dag spyod pa yin// 'gyus pas rang dbang sgyur ba 'bras bu yin//
thog med rang gsal chen po med// thugs rje kun la snyoms pas til mar 'dra// lha dgus rang chas tshogs brgyad 'gyu ba'i lha// dus gsum dbyer med thig le nyag gcig ka pa la// thams cad

rang la grub pas grub pa gcig bu nyid// rig pa dri ma med pas yang dag grub pa'o// snang srid nyag gcig shar bas phur pa'i dbang bskur yin// bdud bzhi ngo sprod gcig tu shar bas bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur

yin// snang ba bdud du babs pas bdud rtsi'i yid ches yin// bdud lnga rang la snang bas rtsi ru shes pa dbang po yin// dug gi rtsa ba chod pa sangs rgyas rtsi ru shar ba drod dang tshad ma yin// dug lnga nyon mongs

brgyad khri bzhi stong shar ba bdud rtsi'i rtags chen yin// dug lnga 'gyu ba'i rtsa ru bstan pa bdud rtsi'i ngo sprod yin// bdud rtsi ma lus shar ba bdud rtsi'i bum pa'i lung// thams cad yongs la zin bas lung gi
dbang bskur yin// thams cad rang sar zin pas lung gi dbang thob yin// thams cad rang 'byung shes pa lung gi spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas lag bcangs rtser zin lung gi 'bras bu yin// bdud rtsi don la

rnam gsum ste// rdzas kyi bdud rtsi sman du sbyar ba phyi yi bdud rtsi yin// dug lnga lha ru bsgyur ba bsgrub pa'i bdud rtsi yin// 'gyus tshad bdud du babs pa rtsi ru ngo sprod gsang ba'i bdud rtsi yin// bdud ces bya

ba ma rig pa// rtsi ni rang rig ye shes yin// 'gyu ba med pa bdud rtsi'i bcud// bcud len sman chen 'di yin pas// rdzas ni 'gyu ba sna tshogs so// rtsi ni ye shes zang thal lo// rdzas ni bdud rtsi zhes kyang

bya// rtag tu lag tu blang ba'i phyir// sgrub pa'i bdud rtsi zhes kyang bya// bdud ngos zin pas rtsi ru shar// don gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya'o// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni yab kyi mkha'// yab ni kun tu bzang po

yin// bdud rtsi bze ba'i snod ni kun tu bzang mo yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni byin dang rlabs// bdud rtsi bze ba'i snod ni sprul pa 'byung ba'i gnas// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni 'gyu ba yin// bdud rtsi

bze ba'i snod ni 'gyu ba zang thal yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni tshogs brgyad 'gyu ba yin// bdud rtsi bze ba'i snod ni tshogs drug har gzhag yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni dug lnga khong khro yin// bdud

rtsi bze ba'i snod ni rangasnang rang grol yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni gzung 'dzin yin// bdud rtsi bze ba'i snod ni gnyis med thabs chen yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni ma rig ma rtogs pa// bdud rtsi sre

ba'i thabs ni rig cing rtogs pa yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni chags dang sdang ba yin// bdud rtsi sre ba'i thabs ni chags dang yul med yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni dug lnga drug gsum yin// bdud rtsi
'dres pa'i tshad ni sku gsung thugs sprad yin// bdud rtsi'i dbang po dug lngas byed pa yin// bdud rtsi'i yon tan ye shes lnga yis byed// bdud rtsi nges shes 'gyu ba rang grol yin// bdud rtsi'i

drod tshad 'gyu ba'i so pa yin// bdud rtsi'i rtags ni nyon mongs brgyad khris byed// bdud rtsi'i yid ches sku gsung thugs phrad yin/ bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dri med zang thal yin// bdud rtsi'i ngo bo mkhyen pa'i ye
shes yin// bdud rtsi'i nges tshig dri med rnam dag yin// bdud rtsi'i dbye ba rnam gsum gong ma yin// bdud rtsi'i mthun dpe ma shes dri med yin// thams cad gnad la phebs tsam na// man ngag dbang bskur
zhes su bshad// thams cad gdeng rnyed gnad du phebs// man ngag dbang thob ces kyang bya// a ti yo ga'i dbang bskur yin// snang ba dbyings kyi a ti 'bur du bkod// grags pa sgra yi a ni khong nas

'byung// yang dag don gyi as ni kun la khyab// snang ba skye med a ti dbang bskur yin// a ni skye ba med pa yin// ti ni rig pa rdo rje'i sku// tshogs drug skye med a ti'i dbang bskur yin// a ni tshogs drug

rang grol yin// ti ni tshogs drug 'gyur med sku// a ni 'gyus pa skye med yin// ti ni zang thal brtan pa'i sku// man ngag ngo bo don dang ldan// gzhi ma tshegs chung don chen yin// nges pa'i tshigs nithams cad
gnad du thebs pa'o// dbye ba thabs dang shes rab bo// mthun dpe dur byed sman dang 'dra// de ltar shes na man ngag dbang bskur yin// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// 'bras bu gtan
la dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig gsang ba'i bdag po khyod// snang ba rang snang 'byung ba lnga// nam mkha' a dang rdo rje gsum// snang ba'i dbang bskur
bshad par bya// nam mkha' rnam gsum don shes na// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma lus// rdo rje rnam gsum don shes na// sku gsung thugs la rten mi bya// a yi gnad gsum don shes na// ye shes lnga la rag ma

lus// de ni nam mkha'i bshad pa yin// nam mkha'i ngo bo go 'byed pa// nges pa'i tshig ni khyab pa yin// dbye ba kha dog nam mkha' dang// theg tsher bu ga rgyan gyi nam mkha' dang// chos nyid don gyi nam mkha'
'o// mthun dpe til dang mar bzhin no// mtshon pa dpe yi nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba lnga las gtso chen med// rig pa rtsal gyi nam mkha' ni// sku gsum thugs kyi gtso chen yin// yang dag don gyi nam mkha'

ni// sku gsum brtsegs pa'i yang rtse yin/ rig pa rtsal gyi nam mkha' ni/ 'byung ba lnga dang dbang po yin/ rig pa rang la shar ba ngo shes yin// phyi nang med par shar ba drod dang tshad ma yin// 'byung lnga lam du
slong ba rkyen thub yin// 'byung lnga rig pa bstan pa ngo sprod yin// 'byung lnga yul med shar ba 'bras bu yin// zhes gsungs so// yang dag don gyi nam mkha' ni// thig le nyag gcig dbang po

yin// rig pa zang thal nges shes yin// snang ba zang thal drod dang tshad ma yin// yul sems rang sar grol ba nges shes yin// rang snang rang la shar ba rkyen thub yin// rang snang ye shes 'od gsal shar ba ngo

sprod yin// chos can rang snang 'od gsal shar ba 'bras bu yin// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa/ a yi ngo bo chos can skye med yin// nges pa'i tshig ni 'gyur ba med pa yin// dbye ba gzhi lam 'bras

bu'i a// gzhi yi a ni brjod bya'i gzhi// a yi khong nas thams cad 'byung// snang ba rnam gsum skyed pa'i ma// a yi mgo la dpung pa lag pa dang// lus po rkang pa lnga// thams cad skyed pa'i phyi mo yin// skye

dgu'i bdag nyid gnas nas skyod/ skye dgu'i rtsa ba ma chod na// grub pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// skye dgu'i rtsa ba chod tsam na// grub mtha'i thag chod nges shes rnyed// 'gro drug a yi lus la tshang// a nri pre du
su tri zhes pa'i// gsang ba'i sa bon bzhi la rdzogs// a ni yi ge thams cad bskyed// dngos su med par don la rdzogs// dper na lam shes 'ja' tshon 'dra// chu shel me shel sbud pa ltar// dngos su med de
gzhi la grub// rten 'brel bcu gnyis lugs na lags// 'khor ba lugs na gnas pa yin// dper na zhun khung spra tshil ltar// rgyu la khyad med rkyen la bsgyur// bsgyur yang gser gyi ngo bo gcig/ gser
mkhan dag gi ngo shes bzhin// ngo sprod pas ni chos kun gcig/ chos kun khong du chud ces bya/ dper na rus sbal gre bar nor bu chud pa ni// yar kyang mi skyugs mar kyang mi 'byung bzhin// chos kun yul

med shes pas ni// sangs la rgyas sa med cing dmyal bar 'gro ba med// 'gro 'ongamed pa 'das pa rnam lnga a la tshang/ longs sku oM 'gyur sdong po gsang ba'i sa bon rdzogs// oM A \u0f7fhUM swA hA rdo rje 'das pa

rdzogs// thig le skye med mo yi sa bon yin// skye med spros gcod pa na ro yi sa bon yin// skye med 'od gsal 'od lnga zla tshes sa bon yin// chos rnams zang thal a yi sa bon yin// skye med nyag gcig mtshon

pa a yi sa bon yin// thams cad gzhi la 'dus hUM gi sa bon rdzogs// gzhi mo rang sa mi 'gyur swA yi sa bon rdzogs// mi 'gyur mi 'gags hA' yi sa bon rdzogs// oM 'gyur sku lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// sku dang

ye shes 'od kyi sa bon rdzogs// thig le stong pa yi ge lnga// a ni mthing ka hUM dkar po// swA ser aM dmar hA ljang khu// gsang ba 'od lnga'i sa bon gzhi la rdzogs// a ni thams cad rdzogs pa'i spyan// kha dog

lnga ru grub pa gzhi nas rdzogs pa'i spyan// pad+ma lnga ldan spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// rtags kyi spyan la 'od lnga shar ba ni// gzhi mo'i ha yi gnas kyis grub pa yin// sku dang ye shes rtags la lta ba'i ngo

sprod gces// 'od lnga rtags dang don ldan pad+ma'i spyan// pad+ma rgyal pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba rig pa'i ye shes spyan mnga' ba// ci t+ta rA dza gu h+ya pra sa ra// sku dang ye shes gsal ba ye

shes spyan// pad dkar rgyas pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// gu h+ya ma hA pradz+nyA pha la e ka ti la pra sa ra// 'bras bu sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa yi// ye shes zang thal spyan mnga' ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan

mnga' khyod la bdud// dz+nyA na tsak+Shu sarba e ka ti la gu h+ya ta n+t+ra u pa de sha/ ma hA tsak+Shu pra be sha ya// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byedapa// thugs rje 'od mdzad de yi spyan mnga' ba// ye shes mig gcig dri med khyod la

bdud// a bi ma nu pra sa ra tsak+Shu bid+ha dz+nyA na ma hA// sangs rgyas ye shes lus 'chang ba// ye shes chags med spyan la 'dud// 'das pa rnams lnga gsang ba'i sa bon lnga// nri 'das gsal ba'i sa steng 'gyu ba
de// a 'das oM 'gyur rang bzhin chen po lnga// su 'das a yi rang bzhin khyab// pre 'das aM 'gyur thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dren// su 'das ltar 'gyur gsang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan// gsang ba'i sa

bon dbang bskur shes pas 'gro drug g.yang sa chod// ma nu sha pre ta ka tir ya na ra ka sur+ya ka/ de wa a k+Sha lo ka/ ka ra ku ru swa sti ma hA' pradz+nyA pha la// e ka thi la bad+yi dz+nyA na tsak+Shu/ zhes gsungs so// da ni rdo rje'i

don bshad de// badzra kA ya dz+nyA na rat+na pha la pa ri shu ng+d+ha a// rdo rje don nyid rnam gsum ste// mtshon bya thabs kyi rdo rje dang// 'gro 'dul rtags kyi rdo rje dang// yang dag don gyi rdo rje 'o// mtshon bya thabs kyi rdo rje

ni// gser dngul lugs dang ris su bris pa'o// badzra zhes bya rdo rje 'o// kA ya chos kyi sku yin no// dz+nyA na ye shes chen po'o// rarna rin chen pha la bzang// pa ri shu d+ha dri med dag pa'o// a ni chos nyid skye ba med

pa mtshon pa'o// badzra tri kA ya pany+tsa bu ng+d+hA ya// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum mtshon// mar bltas sku gsung thugs gsum mtshon// lnga ldan ye shes lnga lngar mtshon// sku lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// rtse gcig zang thal

'das pa rnam lnga mtshon// lte ba zlum pos thig le nyag gcig mchon// khro zhal gzugs sku rnam gnyis mchon// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rang 'byung thabs kyi brda// rtags kyi rdo rje rang lus rdzogs par bstan// rkang mthil lag

mthil sbyar bskyed la// badzra ka la tri dz+nyA na pany+tsa bu ng+d+ha'o// lta ba chos sku zug rngu med// dri med chos sku kun la khyab// lag pa yar bltas mthil sbyar sku gsum rtags// rkang pa mthil sbyar thugs
gsum rtags// sor mo lnga ldan ye shes lnga yi rtags// zhal ldan gzugs sku gnyis 'byung rtags// de ni rang 'byung rtags kyi rdo rje 'o// yang dag don gyi rdo rje ni// rig pa'i ye shes sku gsum

rdzogs// bi d+ya dz+nyA na ka si tra la yo gi// sarba pany+tsa gu h+ya sa ma ya mu dra ma hA pa la rat+na tan+t+ra e ka/ dug lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// dug lnga sku gsung thugs yin no// rig pa rang grol thig le zang thal 'das pa

lnga// 'gyu ba khro zhal gzugs sku gnyis// sku gzhi lte bar zug rngu rang sar grol// 'gyu ba zang thal sku gsum rtse mo thams cad gcig/ sku lngas sku dang ye shes lnga yi dpang po ma byas na// sku dang ye shes don ldan

nges shes gdengs mi rnyed// dug lnga chags sdang lhag gis ma skyes na// dug lnga rkyen thub lhag mthong ye shes su la 'char/ dug lnga rang 'byung chags sdang ma skyes na// rangabyungaye shes drod tshad su yis zin// dug

lnga sku dang ye shes yin par ma shes na// rang rigs ye shes ngo sprod dbang po gang gi byed// dug lnga nyon mongs brgyad khri mi 'char na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ngo sprod gang la bya// dug lnga nyon mongs

rtogs pa brgyad dang brgyad cu mi 'char na// rnam kun mkhyen pa'i ye shes su la 'char// sarba dz+nyA na pany+tsa bi d+ya a/ dug gsum dag gi sku gsum ma shes na// sku gsum dpang po ngo sprod gang gis bya// dug gsum

rang byung rtsa ba ma chod na// sku gsum ngo sprod nges shes ci la bya// dug gsum rtogs pa rang brdol ma shes na// sku gsum rang chas rtags mchog su la bstan// dug gsum rang grol zang thal ma shar na// sku
gsum 'bras bu'i drod dang tshad ma su yis byed// chos sku'i 'bras bu thar pa'i bon dang// gzugs sku gnyis kyi sa bon so mtshams dpang po gang gis byed// dug gsum med na sku gsum tshad ma ci// 'gyu ba

med na sku gnyis dpang po med// 'gyu ba sgyu ma lta bu'i spyan med na// longs sku thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa bon med// sgyu ma lngar mthong zhing khams snang ba yang// 'gyu ba sgyu ma'i spyan gyis gzigs pa

yin// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis snang ba yang// dbyangs yig bcu drug bzhi la grub pa dang// de nyid lam du bya bas snang ba yin// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rtsa gnyis bo// gsal byed bzhi bcu rtsa

gnyis gzhi lam 'bras bu shar// bsdus pas yon tan snang cha lnga// dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa// rang bzhin sgyu mar mthong ba yin// sen mo shin tu dmar ba yang// thugs rje sgyu mar mthong ba yin// tshems

dang mche ba dkar ba yang// ngo bo sgyu mar mthong ba yin// sku ni n+ya gro ltar gab pa// yon tan sgyu mar mthong ba yin// mtshan dang dpe byad snang ba yang// 'phrin las sgyu mar mthong ba yin// 'od zer thugs
kar nub pa dang// 'od zer thugs ka nas 'char pa// ye shes snang ba'i 'od du shar ba yin// 'od lnga zhing khams snang ba dang// 'od zer bde ba 'phro ba ni// thugs rje bkrag mdangs 'byung ba

yin// sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'ja' tshon lta bu'i sku// 'gyu ba med na longs sku'i sa bon stor// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// chos sku las longs sku byin rlabs su bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad

pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig chos kyi blo gros khyod// 'dzam bu kri shi'i lo ma la// pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa la// sgyu ma lnga ldan thugs rje'i sku// rdzus te ro langs bde ba byon// lha

yi dbang po brgya byin dang// lha yi bu rnams mang po la// thugs rje 'byung ba'i tshul bstan nas// lha yi skad dang klu dang ni// grul bum skad dang gnod sbyin lha ma yin// 'gro ba mi dang 'byung po mi ma

yin// thams cad skad du byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad// bshad do 'chad do 'chad par 'gyur ba'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na// sprul sku thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// skye 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal rlag sha la sogs

pa// thams cad chos nyid sgra sgrogs so// lha yi skad du bshad pas ni// thams cad rang rang sgra ru go/ sgra gcig kun la khyab pa'i brdar// dgu po rgyud mangs dpe dang sbyar nas bshad// sprul pa'i sku la 'gyur

ba'i khro zhal ma grub na// rdzus skyes dpang po su yi byed// chos bshad nges shes su la skye// byin rlabs drod dang tshad ma su yis 'dzin// byin rlabs rtags mchog gang la 'char// sprul sku'i 'bras bu su la

'byung// 'gyu ba med na sprul sku'i yon tan ci// mkhyen bya thabs chen gang gis bya// 'gro drug 'gyu ba med pas na// thar pa'i sa bon su la re// mkhyen pa ye shes dpang po gang// nges shes drod dang tshad ma su
yis 'dzin// 'gyu ba rang grol 'bras bu su la 'char// 'gro drug gnas na gti mug gnyid med na// bying rmugs sel ba'i dpang po su yis byed// bsam gtan gnyid kyi gdams ngag nges shes dpang po

gang// bying med zang thal drod tshad gang gis bya// ye shes rang gsal rtags mchog gang la bya// gti mug rang grol chos sku'i 'bras bu stor// chos sku kun khyab thos par byed pa la// bsam gtan gnyid kyi
gdams pa gces// gnyid kyi log non gdams ngag ma shes na// bsam gtan drod tshad gzung thabs med pa na// gti mug rang 'byung gnad med na// chos sku rang 'byung 'char thabs med// gti mug rang
grol ma shar na// sgoms pa gti mug grol mi 'gyur// gti mug rang grol ma shar na// chos sku rang shar dus bzhi mnyam sbyod dka'// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// sprul sku'i byin
rlabs bshad pas 'gro drug la chos sku ngo sprad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig lha yi dbang po khyod// 'gro drug sems can dag la chags su med pa

dang// bsam gtan 'phro rgod gnyis kyi dbang po gang gis byed// chags sdang rang sar grol ba'i gnad med na// longs sku'i nges shes skye ba'i gdams pa gang la bya// chags sdang rang grol drod tshad su yis
byed// bsam gtan zang thal rtags chen su la bstan// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi thar ba'i sa bon stor// chags sdang rang sar grol ba'i gnad med na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi ngo sprod su la

bya// bsam pa rang 'byung rang grol gnas med na// longs sku mkhyen pa'i ngo sprod ji lta bu// rgod 'phro rang grol 'gro ba'i gnad med na// bsam gtan phra mo sems gzung bya ba yis// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i

sku yi thar pa'i sa bon brlag par bya// gzung 'dzin zang thal gnad med na// longs sku'i nges tshig ci la bya// longs spyod snang pa sna tshogs te// rdzogs chen rang snang thig ler ro// sku ni zang thal ma bcos

rang 'byung sku// longs sku kun gyi nang na mchog/ rang 'byung sprul pa'i sku lngar snang// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i sku 'changab// sku gcig kun la khyab pas

rang snang sku// khyab pa rang 'byung chen po lnga// rnam rtog rang grol cir snang sa le ba// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sku// rang snang dri ma rnam par dag pa'i sku// ma 'dres rang gsal thugs rje 'od dpag med// srid

pa'i drwa ba 'joms mdzad pa'i// rang 'byung rang snang gtso bo'i sku// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas sku lnga rang 'byung ba// rang snang ma bsgrubs ma btsal bar// rang la shar ba e ma ho// kA ya tri

la e ka pra sa ra// d+hA tu dz+nyA na bo d+hi tsit+ta pra dz+nyA tsak+Shu ra sa ya na ma ma ki a/ byang chub sems sems dpa' lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang// 'khor lha byin rnams ma dngangs ma skrag par legs par thugs la chongs

shig/ rtogs pa rang snang longs sku dang// thugs rje 'byung ba'i longs sku dang// khyab pa spyi yi longs sku dang// rdo rje dbyings kyi longs sku dang// 'khrul snang 'od kyi longs sku dang// sprul snang longs spyod

rdzogs sku rnams// longs sku sgra mthun khyad par che// 'gyu ba 'od kyi snang ba dang// 'gyu ba 'khrul pas sgyu ma'i snang ba dang// 'gyu ba ye shes rtse gnyis rang snang dang// 'gyu ba rang snang rang grol dang// 'gyus

te ngos ma zin pa'i lung ma bstan 'gyu dang// bzang rtogs ngan rtogs yid 'gyu zer 'gyu dang// phra rags dngos por 'gyu ba rnams// 'gyu ba sgra mthun khyad par che// 'od la 'gyu dus ma shes na// sangs rgyas
sems can so mtshams dka'// spyi sa 'od kyi so mtshams su// dbang po yid gsum snang ba gces// 'gyu ba 'khrul par ma shar na// 'khrul pa rang grol dus tshod dka'// 'gyus nas gzung
'dzin ma shar na// ye shes rang snang dus tshod dka'// lung ma bstan du ma 'gyus na// lung ldan ye shes 'char ba dka'// bzang rtogs ngan rtogs ma 'gyus na// rtogs med mnyam nyid tshad zin dka'// 'gyu

ba phra mor ma 'gyus na// phra mor 'khrul pa chod pa bka'// yid gsum 'gyu bar ma shar na// shes rab rnam gsum tshad zin dka'// zer gyi 'gyu ba ma 'gyus na// thugs rje sku gsum 'byung ba dka'// shin tu

rags par ma 'gyus na// dug lnga rang grol shin tu dka'// dngos po sna tshogs ma 'gyus na// mtshan ma rang grol shin tu dka'// 'gyu ba sgra mthun ma 'gyus nal// 'gro drug g.yang sa chos pa dka'// 'gyus

tshad rtsa ba ma chod na// phung byed srog rtsa chod pa dka'// 'gyus nas ngo yis ma zin na// tshe brten mchod pa shin tu dka'// 'od la 'gyu ba ma shes na// srog brten chod pa shin tu dka'// yid dang 'gyu ba 'od

dang gsum// rang snang ngo sprod ma shes na// khams gsum rtsad nas gcod pa dka'// dbyer med rang snang ma shar na// srid gsum rtsa nas chod pa dka'// 'gyu ba rang grol ma shar na// ma rig rtsa nas chod pa
dka'// 'gyus nas dwangs ma ma shar na// sangs rgyas zhal mthong shing tu dka'// gzhi yi thig le ma 'gyus na// gzhi las 'das pa shin tu dka'// gzhi nas 'gyu ba ma shar na// zang thal zad pa shin tu
