dka'// 'gyus nas rangasnang ma shar na// sgom pas grol ba shin tu dka'/ 'gyus nas srog rtsa ma chod na/ 'khor ba dong sprugs shin tu dka'// 'gyus nas dwangs ma'i gnad med na// srid gsum rgyas
'debs shin tu dka'// 'gyus nas khong shar ma shes na// ma rig mig phye shin tu dka'// rtogs med 'gyu ru mi 'dod na// ye shes rang shar shin tu dka'// mngal kha rgyas 'debs shin tu dka'// 'gyus
nas yul med ma shar na// sa bgrod yul can sangs rgyas dka'// 'gyus nas lam du ma shar na// lam lnga 'byongs par shin tu dka'// 'gyus nas rang rdzogs ma shar na// tshogs gnyis bsags pa shin tu
dka'// 'gyus nas dri med ma shar na// sgrib pa sbyang ba shin tu dka'// bgrod mkhan rtsad nas ma bcad na// sa rnams non pa'i dus mi mchi// lam lnga 'gyu bar ma shes na// lam lnga'i dus tshod zin pa

dka'// 'gyu ba gnyis med ma shar na// tshogs gnyis gcig tu rdzogs pa dka'// 'gyu ba dri med ma shar na// sgribs pa 'byongs pa'i tshad shes dka'// dka' phyir sla ba 'gyu ba'i spyan// 'gyu ba'i spyan cig rtsa
ba chod// sa non lam sbyong tshogs chen rdzogs// sgrib sbyongs sangs rgyas rang la shar// rnam par kun la spyod cing dus la ltos pa rnams// mkha' la yang tshod zin pa 'dra ste bstan par
dka'// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// longs sku ngo sprod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'dzam bu pri sha'i rtsa ba ru// dmag dpon rin po che la bka'
stsal pa// bag chags med na sprul sku 'byung ba med// thog mtha' bcad pa 'od kyi bag chags dang// thig le dkar dmar 'dus pa'i bag chags dang// rtags chags ming dang yul gyi bag chags

dang// thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba'i bag chags rang grol dang// bag chags sgra mthun khyad par che// bag chags rtsa ba chags dang rnam pa gnyis// gnyis 'dus dug lnga'i rtsa ba ma chod na// dug lnga'i rtsa ba

chod pa'i dus mi mchi// zhes ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa dang// de'i tshe de'i dus na// shing 'dzam bu pri sha zhes bya ba'i rtse mo la// g.yu bya khu byug gis skad lan gsum sgrags// bud+ha tsak+Shu rat+na pha la

a// zhes pa dang/ lo ka tsa a byid d+ha phya la zhes pa dang/ h+ye gu h+ya radan bu d+ha karma bud+ha/ badzra bud+ha/ ta thA ga te bud+ha de/ pad+mad bud+ha tsak+Shupha la pra sa ra/ zhes pa'i skad lan gsum sgrags pas// lo ka'i khams na

gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus// lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa dang// lha ma yin gyis rgyal po ljon pa dang// mi'i rgyal po d+har ma ra tsa dang// byol song gi rgyal po seng ge rab brtan dang// yi

dwags kyi rgyal po tshangs pa dang// dmyal ba'i rgyal po thod dbyug gsum pa dang// de la sogs pa lha srin sde brgyad dang// 'gro ba drug gi bsdus pa'i tshogs// g.yu'i bya la bskor ba lan bdun bdun byas

te// bdag cag rnam la rang skad re gsung bar zhu zhus pas// g.yu'i bya de khye'u chung mdzes pa cig tu gyur nas// nga la spro ba skyed cig/ sprul pa'i skad du mas don bya'o// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// de

nas khye'u chung des thugs ka nas 'od zer mang po phyogs bcu thams cad du 'phros so// 'phro'o// 'phro bar 'gyur ro// phro bar gyur to// de nas 'od zer de las phyogs bcu thams cad du// 'od kha dog lnga'i

tshom bu bar ma chad par gyur to// rig pa 'od kyi thig le las// 'od la grub pas sprul pa'i sku// rdzus te sprul sku bsam yas byon// de la 'dus pa'i lo ka rA dza rnams// shin tu dga' zhing spro bar 'gyur// spro

bar gyur nas rgyan bkye bas// lha yi rgya la pos lha yi dbang po brgya byin thob// dbang rtags rin chen sna bdun gyis// lha yi gnas su dbang bskur byas// phyi nang sbas pa'i dbang yang bskur// dri med dag phyir
khrus rdzing bum pa'i dbang// longs spyod tshogs rdzogs rin chen sna bdun dbang// ye shes tshogs rdzogs nor bu rin chen dbang// theg pa stobs rdzogs glang po chen po'i dbang// rdzu 'phrul
stobs ldan rta mchog rin chen dbang// rtsal gsum rdzogs pa dmag dpon rin chen dbang// sna tshogs kha lo sgyur ba blon po rin chen dbang// gdan thog gcig tu thams cad 'dus pa rgyal po rin chen
dbang// sna tshogs 'byung ba btsun mo rin chen dbang// thams cad 'dus pa 'dod khams lha yi nor bdun dbang// skad cig yud tsam cig la rdzogs par dbang bskur bas na// lha'i dbang po brgya byin

gnas las grol bar byas pa'o// de'i tshe rigs 'od kyi thig le las// lha yi gnas su sprul sku 'byung ba'i dus// khams gsum lha la dbang rtags dbang rdzas dang// dbang gi dngos po byin pas brgya byin zhes

su gtags// zhes gsugs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// rig pa 'od kyi thig le la sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo

gros khyod// rig pa 'od kyi thig le las// lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs ris// lha ma yin du bcas pa la// 'dzam bu pri sha'i rtsa ba la// sman gyi rgyal po ga bur dang// shing gi rgyal po tsan dan dang// rdo

yi rgyal po khab len dang// bya yi rgyal po rma bya dang// sems can rgyal po chu srin dang// de rnams kun la dbang bskur byas// ga bur lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// rig pa'i rgyal po lhun grub dbang// tsan

dan dri dang bcas pa'i dbang// sku gsum rang chas dbang bskur rdzas// rdo yi rgyal po khab len lcags 'du ltar// yon tan thams cad 'dus pa'i dbang// rma bya dug rnams za ba ltar// dug lnga dbang gi mchog tu
bskur// chu srin bskam la mi 'byung ltar// ri dbang thob pas 'khor bar mi 'khyams bskur// lha ma yin gyi dbang rdzas dbang rtags dang// dbang gi dngos po rdzogs par bskur// yon tan rang 'byung skyon
las grol// 'jug pa'i sgo lnga ma shes na// 'khor lo mchod bskor dbang bskur dang// dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i dbang bskur dang// thun mong dbang du bstan pa yin// khyad par dkyil 'khor bstan pa
ni// kun gzhi rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// 'jug thabs ngos bzung med pa yin// yid ni zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// 'jug thabs rang 'byung 'khor lo yin// sgo lnga mngon spyod dkyil 'khor
yin// 'jug thabs rnam shes 'khor ba yin// lus kyi rnam shes drag po'i dkyil 'khor yin// 'jug thabs lha mthong dkyil 'khor yin// yid kyi rnam shes dbang gi dkyil 'khor yin/ 'jug thabs 'od kyi
dkyil 'khor yin// re re la yang dkyil 'khor lnga brtsegs rdzogs// 'jug thabs lnga yang re rer tshang// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug pa la// me tog kun mkhyen 'od gsal dgos// dam
rdzas chos dbyings ye shes yin// dbang bskur gnyis med dri med sku// thob dus skad cig gcig rdzogs yin// 'bras bu thig le zang thal yin// yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa yin// zhi ba'idakyil 'khor
'jug pa la// me tog rang 'byung 'od gsal dgos// dbang bskur shes rab dri med sku// thob dus skad cig rang grol sku// 'bras bu ye shes zang thal yin// yon tan rang byung ye shes yin// dbang gi dkyil
'khor 'jug pa la// me tog dri med 'od gsal dgos// dbang rdzogs kun rdzogs ye shes dgos// bskur thabs ye shes 'od gsal sku// thob dus skad cig rang rdzogs sku// 'bras bu chos min zang thal
lo// yon tan rang rig ye shes yin// mngon spyod dkyil 'khor 'jug pa la// me tog snang gsal dri med dgos// dbang rdzas kun 'byung ye shes dgos// bskur thabs snang gsal dri med dgos// thob dus
skad cig rang snang sku// 'bras bu gnyis med zang thal yin// yon tan zhing khams rnam par dag/ drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'jug pa la// me tog rang grol 'od gsal dgos// dbang rdzas nan tan ye shes
dgos// bskur thabs ye shes khong gsal sku// thob dus skad cig rang 'byung sku// 'bras bu lha mthong ye shes sku// yon tan gzugs la rang grol yin// mig ni mngon spyod dbang rtags yin// rna ba zhi ba'i
dbang rtags yin// sna ni rgyas pa'i dbang rtags yin// kha ni dbang gi rtags chen yin// 'og sgo drag po'i dbang rtags yin// dpe dang rtags su 'brel ba dang// rtags dang don du 'brel ba gces// re re
la yang thams cad 'dus// mig la dkyil 'khor lnga rdzogs pa// dkar po zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// ser po rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// mthing ka drag po'i

dkyil 'khor rdzogs// ljang khu mngon spyod dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sprul pa sku yi dkyil 'khor yin// shel gyi sbu gu'i 'od lnga la// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// tsit+ta rin chen 'bar ba
nas// rig pa'i ye shes chen po rdzogs// chos kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// snying la sku gsum ngo sprod pas// dkyil 'khor gsum brtsegs de la rdzogs// de yi yon tan ye shes rtsal gnyis la// dkyil
'khor gsum brtsegs rdzogs pa yin// sprul sku dngos su bstan pa ni// rin chen mig la shar ba yin// longs sku gzhi la gab pa de// rin chen rtsa la gnas pa yin// chos sku rang chas gnas pa de// rin chen
snying la gnas pa yin// de yi mthun dpe ngo sprod pa// rin chen man shel zang thal de// chos sku'i ngo sprod mthun dpe yin// de yi nang na 'od gnas pa// longs sku gzhi la grub pa'i mthun dpe
yin// de las rgyus phran snang ba de// sprul sku 'byung ba'i mthun dpe yin// rin chen shel la 'od shar ba// longs sku'i dkyil 'khor mthun dpe yin// bar do chos nyid 'od gsal mthun dpe yin// de la
dkyil 'khor lnga rdzogs pa// yon tan rang la shar ba rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// thams cad rang la grub pa'i lhun grub dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin rnam par grol
bar 'gyur// thams cad thags su bstan pas thags// de yi gong na med pa bzangs// dpe rtags don dang bskor tshoms bcad pa ris// de la thags bzang ris su thogs// zhes brjod do// lha 'dre gnyis
med kyi rgyud las// thags bzangs ris sprul pa'i skur thon pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// rig pa 'od kyi thig le las// bcom

ldan thub pa don grub sprul// de yis 'gro ba rkang gnyis 'dren pa'i gtso// de yis yang dag don bshad pa// rtags shing chags pa'i don bshad de// 'dzam bu pri k+Sha la gzigs nas// dang po 'khrul pa'i gzhis

bstan// rgya chad phyogs lhun med pa yis// lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas chen la// rgya ma chad pas phyogs ma lhung// phyogs su ma lhung rgya ma chad// lhun gyis grub pa'i spyan mnga' ba// mi la lha dang 'dre rnams

ni// rnam rtog skye ba'i don rnams la// dang po gzhi sa brtsi ba gces// rgyu dang rkyen dang dngos po gsum// tha ma ngo sprod ro snoms pas// sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// thar pa'i lam mchog 'di yin

no// spyi la khyab pa'i bdud drug dang// khyad par bdud ni rnam pa bzhi// ngo bo nyid kyi bdud kyis ni// thams cad rlags pa ma tshor ba// 'dre yis bar du gcod par 'gyur// gzhi mo rnam lnga 'dre lnga'i
gzhi// 'phrin las 'dre srin thams cad bzhi// de dus 'dre srin mir ma phyed// thams cad gzhi la tshangs pas 'babs sam thug pa 'dra// de la ma ning rnam pa gsum// dpe dang rtags dang don gyi ma ning

gsum// de la yid kyi dpe rtags sbyar// yid 'gyus pa ni 'dre yi rgyud// 'odalnga 'dre lnga'i rkyen du shar// ljang khus 'dre srin mi ru phyed// thams cad 'byed pa'i 'od po che// kun la 'byung ba'i 'od zer can// lha

mo'i 'od zer can zhes bya// de la dngos po'i 'dre lnga ni// 'od las sha khrag dngos skyed las// dngos po'i 'dre de rang la 'byung// de la rnam shes tshogs brgyad gsal// lha srin lde brgyad dngos por rtags shing
chags// mig bdud rna ba rgyal po dang// rna rmu lce btsan lus ni gnod sbyin dang// yid gza' klu dang ma mo dang// sna tshogs lha 'dre kun gzhir shar bas dngos su smin// da ni 'jug ldog don

bshad de// 'dre la bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'dre de bdud du babs pas ni// 'dre bdud ces kyang bya ba yin// sbyi bdud ces kyang bya ba yin// kun gyi bdud chen ces kyang bya// bsdus pas 'dre srin rnam pa
brgyad// 'dre 'dre srin mig gcig dngos dmar dang// rnam pa dgu zhes rab tu grags// sgo dgu dag la 'jug pas na// 'dre yi 'jug sgo zhes su bshad// da ni bsdus pas 'dre lnga sgo lngar 'jug/ de las

bsdus pas rtsa ba'i 'dre// rtags chags 'dre ru 'dus pa yin// ldogs mkhan 'dre ru ma shes na// 'dre la thar pa'i dus mi 'ong// 'dre la thar par bya ba'i phyir// phyi yi 'byung po nyams myong ro snyoms pa

dgos// 'byung po snyoms rnam pa gsum// bcos thabs rdzas la rten 'brel dang// lha sgom pas ni zhi ba dang// ngo sprod pas ni ro snyoms/ 'byung po kun 'dul zhes su brjod// 'byung po'i gdon thabs ngo sprod
gsum// rtags dang chags pa gnyis med gsum// bcos thabs rdzas dang rten 'brel gsum// bla rdo bla gnas bla rten gnas// 'dre dang bdud dang gnod lug gsum// gnod rtags gdon thabs thon dus
gsum// bcos thabs 'chos tshad 'chos dus gsum// 'jug sa 'jug dus thon dus gsum/ 'dre dang mi dang srin po gsum// dbye ba phyed pa phyed dus gsum// phyed pa'i rtags dang dpang po gsum// yon
tan 'bras bu grol sa gsum// 'dre gzhi 'dre nad 'chos tshad gsum// ro snyom ro snyoms dpang po gsum// des shes rkyen thub 'bras bu gsum// rkyen thub tshad dang drod tshad gsum// 'bras bu nges shes yon
tan gsum/ sprad pa phrad pa phrad dus gsum// dbang po nges shes sa mtshams gsum// rkyen thub drod dang rtags dang gsum// 'bras bu yon tan sad pa gsum// gzhi dang rgyu rkyen dngos sad gsum// rtags
dang chags dang 'dres sad gsum// sad pa'i dpang po nges shes rkyen thub gsum// 'bras bu yon tan sad tshad gsum/ gzhi lam 'bras bu chos pa gsum// chos pa chos dus chos tshad gsum// dbang po nges
shes rkyen thub gsum// thub pa'i 'bras bu drod tshad rtags dang gsum// de yi yon tan 'byung tshad grol dus gsum// grol ba'i dpang po rkyen thub nges shes gsum// 'bras bu'i dus dang yon tan rang sa
gsum du 'dus// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// phyi 'byung ba ro snyoms pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros
khyod// chags sdang nad las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// chags sdang nad kyi ro snyoms bstan par bya// de la dang po nad kyi gzhi bstan pa/ nad lnga gzhi la grub pa ni// gzhi la lhun gyis grub pa
yin// gzhi mi 'gags pas sna tshogs nad// rgyu ni 'gyus nas 'dzin pa yin// rkyen ni nad du 'dzin pa yin// bar du 'od la lus su chags// 'od la chags pas sdang ba skyes// gnyis med ma shes gti mug

skyes// des na chags sdang lus po dngos su smin// de las 'dus pa'i nang lnga dang// ngo bo nad dang drug gis gdung// ngo bo nad la rnam pa gnyis// rgas par byed pa sems kyi nad// 'chi bar byed pa lus po'i

nad// rnam pa gnyis su 'dus pa yin// rkyen kyi nad la bsam mi khyab// grang ba'i nad la rnam pa lnga car tshangs// nyi shu rtsa lnga nad kyi sdong po la// lhun grub chos re la yang mtshan nyid 'dzin pas len// de las

bsdus pas 'byung ba'i nad// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i ro snyoms pa/ rdzas kyi bcos dang lha sgom dang// ngo sprad pa yi ro snyoms pa/ dang po bzhi pa ngo sprad pas// nad kyi gzhi mo zhes par 'gyur// bar du gcod
pa'i dus bstan pas// nad kyi mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur// tha ma nad kyi zhugs bstan pa// bcos thabs gdon thabs shes par 'gyur// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa rkyen kyi nad// skye med ngo sprod bstan par

bya// tshad pas zin na khong gsal sprad// grang bas zin na 'od gsal sprad// rlung gis zin na zang thal sprad// mkhris pas zin na rang grol sprad// 'dus pas zin na yul med sprad// spyi bo na na ljang khus

dbyung// mgrin pa na na ljang nag dbyung// snying kha na na ro stod nas// de la ser bos dbyung bar bya/ ro smad mkhan tsa khol mar na// de la mthing kas dbyung bar bya// gsang ba spyi mig na ba na// de la dmar

po'i dbyung bar bya// rkang mthil pus mo na ba na// de la dkar po'i dbyung bar bya// de ni thabs dang dbyung ba yin// 'byung ba'i sgo ni 'di rnams so// dri med sgo dang zang thal sgo// dmar po'i sgo dang srid pa'i

bug pa dang// rdo rje'i sgo dang pad+ma'i sgo// lde ba pad+ma'i sgo ru dbyung// snying mi bde na mig la'o// glo ba mi bde sna la 'od// mkhal ma mi bde gsang bar ro// mchin pa mi bde kha la'o// mkhris pa mi bde rna ba

'o// da ni lha yi ro snyoms te// tsha ba na na mi bskyed pa// grang ba na na don yod grub// mkhris pa na na rnam snang sku// bad kan na na rin chen 'byung// 'dus pa na na 'od dpag med// tsha ba na na ma ma ki/ grang ba

na na gos dkar mo// mkhris pa na na dbyings phyug ma// bad kan na na sangs rgyas spyan// 'dus pa na na sgrol ma 'o// des ni lha yi ro snyoms so// nad kyi ngo bo sems kyi nad// sems dang ye shes ma phyed
na// 'chi ba'i nad las thar par dka'// dngos gzhi rnam gnyis ma phyed na// rgas pa'i nad las thar par dka'// nad rnams ro snyoms ma shes na// nad kyi 'khrul pa choms pa dka'// nang

'khrul rtsa nas ma mchod na// ro snyoms 'byung ba shin tu dka'// nad kyi ro snyoms dpang po sems kyis bya// nges pa'i shes pa na ba zangathal yin// rkyen thub 'byung ba 'khrugs dus yin// drod rtags na tsha

zang thal yin// 'bras bu na ba rang grol yin// yon tan phyis nas rjes chod yin// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// bar du chags sdang gi nad ro snyoms par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi

pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// bar du rnam rtog ro snyoms bstan par bya// dang po rtog pa'i gzhi bstan pa// rtog pa dug lnga gzhi la tshang// khong khro ma

rig rtog pa'i gzhi// ga bur sman la dug tshang bzhin// rtog med gzhi la rtog pa tshang// nyon mongs rtogs pa thams cad kyang// gzhi las thams cad 'khrul pa yin// rtog pa'i rgyu ni yid 'gyu ba// rkyen ni ma

rig 'od las skye// gzhan snang ma rig rang snang rkyen// rang 'byung ma rig 'dzin pa dgu// gnyis med ma rig du mar 'khrul// ngo bo nyid kyi ma rig pa// gab pa sbas pa'i ma rig pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig

pa// kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa// mthong snang log pa'i ma rig pa// rkyen 'gyur 'phro med ma rig pa// rgyu rkyen dus tshod ma rig pa// 'khrid pa rang snang gi ma rig pa// 'byed pa las dbang gi ma rig

pa// rtogs pa dngos por shar ba yin// rtog pa nyon mongs brgyad khri po// bsdus pa nyon mongs lnga la 'dus// lnga po chags sdang gnyis las 'dus// dngos po 'khrul pa'i snang ba nyid// da ni rtog pa'i ro

snyoms pa// rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// rtog ni ma rig 'khrul pa la// ngo sprod sku gsum gyi sre thabs bstan// snang ba rnam par rtogs pa la// rig pa rtog med ngo sprad bstan// 'bring la 'od gsal 'khor

o bstan// tha ma log non 'khor lo bstan// kha 'byams snang thog shor srid pas// snang ba 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor// rig pa rang snang ngo sprod bstan// snang ba rang grol 'char bar 'gyur// snang snang ba
rang grol shar tsam na// snang ba rig pa'i rang sgor gsal// mkha' la 'ja' tshon thim pa ltar// rig pa'i ngang du snang ba grol// cir mthong cir grol rig pa'i ngang// rang 'byung rang grol sre thabs

gsum// snang ba rig pa sre ba dang// rig pa ye shes sre ba dang// ye shes thig ler sre ba 'o// dbang po rang snang grol ba yin// nges shes rig pa rang snang yin// gtan tshigs thig le nyag gcig yod// drod
tshad rig pa 'od gsal yin// rtags mchog snang ba yul med yin// 'bras bu thig le zang thal yin// yon tan thig le chos min yin// thugs rje yul med rang 'byung yin// zhes gsungs
so// kha 'gugs sems 'dzin snang thog 'chor srid pas// kha 'byams kha 'gugs bsre bar bya// tshogs drug 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor// tshogs drug rang grol dbang po yin// rnam shes 'od gsal nges
shes yin// 'dzin med zang thal yid ches yin// 'dod yon rnam lnga rkyen thub yin// chags sdang ri rab drod rtags yin// chags pa 'dod yon rang sar grol// 'bras bu mchog tu de bshad do// yon tan
tshogs drug lhun pa yin// mthun dpe nyi ma shar ba yin// zhes gsungs so// kha 'byams kha 'gugs sre ba la// 'gyu ba 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor// 'gyus tshad 'od gsal dpang po yin// 'gyu ba rang grol
nges shes yin// 'gyu ba dwangs sangs yid ches yin// 'gyu ba gar 'gyus rkyen thub yin// 'gyus nas rtogs pa drod rtags yin// 'gyu ba dkar nag rang sar grol// 'bras bu'i mchog tu grags ba

yin// yon tan 'gyu ba rang sar yin// mthun dpe rlung gi ra tsa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// sre ba 'dres pa 'dres tshad gsum// drod dang rtags dang dbang po gsum// nges shes yid kyi rkyen thub gsum// 'bras

bu yon tan mthun dpe gsum// spyi yi gdams pa ngo sprod yin// zhes gsungs so// da ni 'gyu ba 'chug med ngo sprod de// 'gyus dang cer ltos cer mthong dang// nges zin ye shes rang shar bas// chos sku yul

med dmyal khams stongs// khyung la bstod pa mi 'bul pha wang skur mi 'debs// e ma ho// rang 'byung rang grol rang 'khyams pas// chos sku skyabs sa ma rnyed dmyal bas gnod ma nus// thar skus drangs sa ma
rnyed dmyal dpon gnod ma rnyed// 'gyu ba cer zin sangs rgyas rang la shar// ma shes ma rig 'khor ba rang la shar// rang shar gnad shes shin tu dka'// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa// mun snang

gnyis su ma phye na// nang nub drod tshad su yis 'dzin// dbyar dgun ston dpyid ma phye na// lo zla dus khrims su yis 'dzin// nad lnga'i dbye ba ma byas na/ 'tsho mdzad sman sbyor gang la btang// 'dre srin dbye ba
ma byas na// bar chad nges yis gangs thabs med// lha 'dro'i dbye ba ma byas na// dngos grub blangs thabs gang la byed// sangs rgyas sems can ma phye na// zag bcas zag med su la mtshon// gzugs 'dzin

gnyis su ma phye na/ gnyis med zangs thal su la bstan// snang srid/ rang snang rnam dag su la bstan// sems dang ye shes ma phye na// blo dngos gnyis med su la bstan// kun gzhi 'das pa ma phye na// rtogs pa
mngon 'gyur ga la bya// ye dang shes pa ma phye na// ye shes zang thal su la bstan// bag dang chags pa ma phye na// lus kyi spo lugs su la bstan// chags dang sdang bar ma phye na// dug lnga'i 'khrul
pa su la bstan// thabs dang shes rab ma phye na// gdams pa'i mthar thug su la bstan// spyan gyi dbye ba ma byas na// ye shes mig gcig su la bstan// lus kyi dbye ba ma byas na// sku las 'das pa su la

bstan// thugs kyi dbye ba ma byas na// gnyis med zang thal su la bstan// yul gyi dbye ba ma bya sa na// yul med zang thal su la bstan// yon tan dbye ba ma byas na// chos med zang thal su la bstan// ye
shes dbye ba ma byas na// ye shes zang thal su la bstan// ces gsungs so// dbe yi dbye ba ma byas na// lce spyang nag po su la bstan// mun snang gnyis kyi phan gnod med// phan med gnod med ma

bstan na// rig pa'i rang sgo su la bstan// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// rnam rtog ro snyoms kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo

gros khyod// gsang ba bla med lha yi ro snyoms bstan pa ni// thog ma lha yi gzhi ma ni// rang bzhin lhun grub lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ de ba rA dza na mo pU dza ran+ta karma nud+ha ta thA ga ta sa mu dra ma hA gu h+ya a ti// dz+nyA na

rat+na pha la tsakra/ thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// rig pa lhun gyis grub pa'i lha// bar du g.yu rkyen 'od gsal grub pa'i lha// dbang lha'i dkyil 'khor lha dang bcas// tha ma btags pa ming gi lha// yid la

sems pas bsam bya gzugs kyi lha// de wa sa mA d+hi// pA dza mahA gu h+ya pha la pha la// dbang gi lha ni 'od dpag med// zhi ba'i lha ni mi bskyod pa// drag po'i lha ni rnam snang yin// rgyas pa'i lha ni rig 'byung

yin// mngon spyod lha ni don grub bo// de ni de ba rA dza phyi'i lha// mig la kha dog lnga gnas pa// mthing ka dkar po ser le brgan// ljang khu rnam pa ma 'dres rdzogs// rdzogs rim lha yi dbang bskur yin// rang

grol lha yi dbang bskur ba// tsak+Shu zang thal mi bskyod dbang// tsak+Shu 'od gsal 'od dpag med// tsak+Shu rang snang rnam snang yin// tsak+Shu mi 'gyur rin 'byung sku// tsak+Shu rang 'byung don grub chen po yin// rtags kyi

gdan lnga bstan pa ni// seng ge rma bya glang po rta dang mkha' lding gdan stengs na// ye shes sku lnga'i dkyil 'khor ma sgoms rdzogs pa'i dbang// A be sha ta thA ga ta dz+nyA nabu d+ha rarna pa ri shud+ha yA// zhes sgra dang bcas
pa'i dbang bskur ro// gzhi dang lam dang dngos po gsum// de yi ngo sprod gdams pa gsum// dbang bskur rgyal po ye shes dbang// skad cig gcig la rdzogs pa yin// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med
kyi rgyud las// gsang ba bla na med pa'i lha'i ro snyoms pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// 'byung ba ro snyoms bstan par

bya// thog ma kun gzhi lhun grub na// 'byung ba lnga po ye nas 'phags// g.yo bar byed pa rlung gi gzhi// skyed par bya pa sa yi gzhi// smin par byed pa me yi gzhi// sdud par byed pa chu yi gzhi// yangs shing go

'byed nam mkha'i gzhi// thams cad 'dus pa 'byung chen bzhi// 'byung chen g.yos pas rig pa 'gyus// de yi snang ba 'od lnga rkyen// gzhi nas 'byung ba 'od kyi gzhi// 'od gsal gdangs kyi snang ba las// nang

'byung lus la rnam pa lnga ru 'khrul// gsang ba'i 'byung ba 'gyu ba 'khrul phyi mi 'byung ba yul lnga 'khrul// de ni 'byung ba'i 'jug lugs yin// da ni zlog lugs gtan la dbab// rnam pa 'gyu bar ngo sprad
pas// chen po lnga yang ro yang snyoms// sa la ro snyoms rig pa bstan// chu la ro snyoms rig pa gsal// me la ro snyoms rig pa smin// mkha' la ro snyoms zang thal shar// rlung la ro snyoms dbugs med

shar// chu yi ro snyoms ma shes na// rig pa chad pa'i gol sa yod// sa la ro snyoms ma shes na// rig pa 'gyur ba'i gol sa yod// me la ro snyoms ma shes na// yul dang yul can gol sa yod// rlung la ro snyoms
ma shes na// dbugs la sbyar ba'i go sa yod// mkha' yi ro snyoms ma shes na// rtag pa ther thug gol sa yod// 'byung chen ro snyoms ma shes na// 'byung chung mtha' yi gol

sa yod// phyi 'byung ro snyoms byed pa la// ngo sprod rnam bzhi'i dpang po dgos// 'byung ba rang grol nges shes dgos// 'byung lnga rang snang yid ches dgos// 'byung lnga 'od gsal rkyen thub dgos// chags 'dzin

stong nas drod rtags dgos// 'bras bu 'byung lnga rgyas thebs dgos// yon tan 'byung lnga 'das pa lnga// mthun dpe 'khyag pa chu lta bu// nang 'byung ro snyoms zhes bya ba// lus la 'byung ba lnga tshad ba// rig pa'i
ro snyoms shin tu gces// dbang po 'byung lnga chags dang 'jig dang stong// ri rab 'jig pa lus po yin// gling bzhi 'jig pa ma thil bzhi yin// gling phran 'jig pa rkang brgyad yin// mtsho bdun 'jig pa

yul bdun la// ri bdun 'jigs pa tshogs bdun yin// shing chen 'jig pa srog pa rtsa// shing bzhi 'jig pa rtsa bran bzhi// rgyu skar rtsa brgyad sgal tshigs la// nyi zla 'jig pa mig gnyis po// gza' brgyad
'jig pa tshogs brgyad do// dgu tshigs 'jig pa gzhung yin te// dgu ni sgo dgu rang chas so// sa 'jig pa ni sha yin no// me 'jig pas ni drod yal lo// rlung zhig pas ni bkrag stor ro// chu zhig pas ni
lus gyes so// nam mkha' zhig pas sems dwangs so// 'byung chen zhig pas 'gyu ba med// de ni 'byung ba 'jig 'dus so// chen po de la 'byung lnga 'dus// dper na lcags len rdo bzhin no// zhes gsungs
so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// srid pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// zhig nas stong pa

bshad par bya// sa zhig pas ni rten med do// rlung zhig pas ni g.yo ba med// me zhig pas ni smin byed med// chu zhig pas ni sdud byed med// mkha' zhig pas ni rgyu skar gza' dang nyi zla med// yongs la khyab
pa'i nam mkha' dang// mthun dpe sgrub pa'i nam mkha' dang// chos nyid rang byung nam mkha' dang// ngo bo nyid kyi nam mkha' dang// nam mkha' sgra mthun khyad par che// khab mig bu ga'i nam mkha'

dang// then tsher mig gi nam mkha' dang// bu ga snang ba'i nam mkha' dang// kha dog dbyibs kyi nam mkha' dang// 'byung ba khyab pa'i nam mkha' dang// theg pa sgo dang sbyar ba yin// 'byung ba lnga la thams

cad snang// phyi nang 'jig dang nang snang 'jig/ gsang ba'i 'byung ba dngos gzhi gnyis// dngos po la yang rnam pa gnyis// 'khrul pa dngos dang grub mtha' dngos// 'khrul pa dngos po phyi nang gnyis// 'byung

ba lnga po 'jig pa ni// las kyi me bdun chu gcig dang// tha ma rlung gis de bzhin no// tha ma stong par gnas pa ni// lhun grub rang rlung ma g.yos par// de bar 'byung ba'i ming yang med// sangs rgyas thugs

rje'i ming yang med// sems can 'khor ba'i ming yang med// ming med sbrum pa'i tshul du gnas// nang gi 'byung ba zhig tsam na// sems can skye 'gul mi snang bas// khams gsum 'khor ba ming yang med// rlung

bzhi spyi btsan sgo btsan yin// rang rang ma mthun 'jig chags dang// gnas dang stong pa de bzhin no// gnas pa'i dus na spyi sa ba// kun gzhi mi zad mdzod chen nas// thams cad tshangs pa'i sbru ma de// de

yi thams cad chags par byed// chags pa'i rtsa ba ma chod na// 'khor ba'i dong sprugs shin tu dka'// 'byung ba chen porgyu gcig po// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus
gsum kun gyi mes po yin// yang mes rtsa nas chod na// 'khor ba dong sprugs mi srid pas// srid gsum sbyor ba'i ri bo yin// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun mkhyen pa// ye shes sgrol ma khyod la bstod// khyod ni
'gro ba'i mgon po yin// ngo bo lhun grub 'brel pa yod// 'brel med nor bu rin chen no// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i spyi gtso yin// kun gzhi yang mes chen po byed// gus sapas phyag 'tshal bstod par
bgyi// zhes ston pas bka' stsal to// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las/ zhig nas gnas pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// stong pa
ma yin kun gzhi yin// de la chags lugs bstan pa ni// bdag cag gtso 'khor ma lus rnams// dang po gzhi la lung ma bstan// bar du 'khor ba'i rtsa bar 'khrul// tha mar rang grol 'bras bu thob// rang
grol rgyal po ye shes spyan// de yi spyan gyis gzigs pa las// rmongs pa'i mig gis de mi gsal// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes stobs kyi bdag/ bdag gis khyod la bshad par

bya// khyod ni gus pa'i tshul gyis nyon// rgya chad phyogs su ma lhung ba'i// de nas lhun grub chen po lags// de la srid pa chags pa ni// srid pa sbyor ba las byung ba// chen po nga yi rtsa ba de// srid pa gsum du
'byung bar byed// srid pa'i gzhi rtsa rnam pa gsum// gzhi mo rnam gsum gnad la dbab// rtsa ba rnam gsum lam du gces// de las bar do rnam gsum 'byung// de la rtse mo rna ma gsum 'byung// de yi thams
cad gces par byed// gces par byed pa'i rtse mo lnga/ rtsa ba gsum po bar do gcig/ srid pa sel ba'i 'od po che// thugs rje 'byung ba'i so mtshams yin// lam la skye bo gnyis gyes pa// stag

dang seng ge dom dang gsum// de gsum rgyu ba'i lam po che// de la srid chags lugs bstan// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du srid// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// srid pa

chags pa'i rtsa ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// sar+b+ba kar+m+ma lo ka ku ru a b+hi She ka la b+hi d+ha/ zhes sgra ston no// thams cad 'phrin las mi
'gags pas// 'jig rten dngos por srid pa'o// skye med ma rtogs rang dbang ma rig pas// lo ka sar+b+ba ts+tshad na// 'khor ba'i gnas la thar du med// khyod ni legs par yid la nyon// nang gi chags 'jig

bstan par bya// gzhi dang dngos po bar dang gsum// de ni thun mong ma yin te// khyad par chags pa 'di lta'o// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las srid pa// dang po rang snang longs sku de// de la longs spyod spyod tsam

na// rnam shes sems pa tshor dang 'du shes chung// snang ba'i 'od de rang snang ma shes chags// de las rang rtsal ma shes sdang// rang grol ma shes gti mug yin// de las thig le gcig tu 'gril// ma rig sgo

lnga'i sbubs su tshud// srid pa'i drwa ba rang la byung// thig le dkar dmar gcig tu 'brel// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon du shar// de nas 'brel bas mig tu gsal// gnyis po nyi zla zung gcig yin// mdzod spu nag

phra sgron me yin// klad pa dung khang zhes bya ba// rtsa rnams gdugs kyi tshul du yod// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang yin// de las spyi bo bde chen la// rtsa yi mgo bo bzhi 'byung ba// bdud rtsi gnyis

dang gtsug thag gnyis// lag na rdo rje bzhi yang gnas// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang na// rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhugs// sprul sku lha dbang brgya byin bzhugs// dbus

kyi rtsa mdud ste ba la// lha yi dbang po bde ba 'bar// de yi byin rlabs lha rnams kun la 'phro// lha rgyud chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub thob// rin chen sna bdun brda chos bshad// mig

dang rna ba sna dang lce// glo ba snying dang lus po bdun// nor bu rin chen dgongs pa bshad// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// lha'i gling chags pa bstan te// de la chos bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi

shu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// mi yi chags lugs bstan pa ni// rtsa ba gsum po'i rtse mo la// thig le gsum du 'dus pa las// rtsa brgyad gling brgyad
rtsa bzhi gling chen bzhi// dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab snying// shel gyi sbu gu dpag gsam shing// snying po lcags ri nag po chags// ri bdun thil bdun mtsho bdun zur// thams cad 'dus pas snod du

chags// thugs rje yas babs shed bu rgyang ma yin// shed la rogs ni ro ma yin// de la nga rgyal mi ru chags// rje'u rigs nga rgyal can du lho na bzhugs// rgyal rigs zhe sdang can de shar na bzhugs// bram ze
'dod chags khrus dag pa nub na'o// dmangs rigs phrag dog can de byang// gdol pa gtum po las ngan spyod// de dag gnas nas kun la rgyu// de yi dbus kyi thig le las// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa

yis// rigs lnga gnas pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las bshad// de yang byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad// sar+b+ba pradz+nyA dz+nyA na u pa de sha kra ma gu h+ya e ka ti la bra sa ra ka la d+hu ha// zhes bshad do// thams cad shes rab ye
shes kyis// man ngag rim pa ma nor ba// gsang ba'i don rnams ma shes na// thig le nyag gcig spros la bstan// spros kyang don la gcig las med// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud

las// mi'i gling du thugs rje rang 'byung du chags pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// lha min mi min chags lugs bstan pa ni// snying

la srog rtsa chags pa las// 'bras bu spyi bo bde chen smin// 'dab ma pad+ma lta bu ste// mgrin pa'i rtsa chen bcu drug la// lha min mi min bcu drug yod// 'od dang nye ba'i 'od dang ni// snang ba dang ni snang gsal
dang// byin dang bde dang 'thab dga' dang// 'thab byed dang ni 'thab bral dang// bsod nams skye dang bde ba ldan dang bzang skyong dang// drwa ba can dang drwa 'od dang// nyi ma lta dang nyi med

'od// shing dang 'dra ba'i rtsa la gnas// de yang thugs rje yas babs nas// lha min rgyal po thags bzangs ris// lha'i 'thab mo khong khro rgyal de// de dag dug lnga thugs rje 'khor lo bskor// lha min g.yul

zlog rgyud chen 'di// khong khro rtsa bzhi rtsad nas bcad// nyi ma lta bur lha yi rang 'od bstan// rang 'byung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'byung po ro snyoms chags sdang grol// mtshon cha ro snyoms bde ba 'bar// go cha

ro snyoms rin chen 'bar// sdug bsngal ro snyoms rang grol shar// 'thab rtsod ro snyoms chos skur 'char// shing thog ro snyoms bdud rtsir 'char// bde ba chen po chos kyi klong// rang byung ye shes rang la

shar// sar+b+ba lo ka de ma yin// kar+m+ma ku ru d+hA tu dz+nyA na e ka ti la rat+na dai tsa kra ma hA d+ha thim// zhes sgra bshad do// thams cad 'jig rten rang snang la// lha ma yin gyi 'phrin las rdzogs// dbyings dang ye shes
gnyis su med// thig le nyag gcig rang la snang// rin chen 'od 'bar rang la yod// 'khor lo chos kyi thugs rje yis// mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa yin// thams cad chos kyi dbyings su thim// zhes gsungs

so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// lha ma yin gyi chags lugs dang// de la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros

khyod// byol song srid pa'i chags lugs bstan pa ni// de yang yas babs rtsa ba gsum po las// drug cu rtsa bzhi lung ma bstan gyi gnas// lung ma bstan de skye ba'i rtsa ba ni// mnga' skyes gzhogs skyes rdzus

skyes dang// sgo nga drod dang gsher skyes dang// gnas dang las dang zas dngalus// de dag thams cad lung du ma bstan no// de yi dbus kyi thig le la// byol song seng ge rab brtan byon// thugs rje chos kyi
'khor lo ni// lung du bstan dang gleng gzhi bstan// lung ma bstan pa'i sgo rnams la/ lung du bstan pa'i sgo rnams bshad// gti mug lung bstan chos kyi sku// skye gnas lung bstan nyams myongs ye shes

shar// 'bras bu lung bstab rdo rje'i sku// las kyi lung bstan rang 'byung ye shes spyod// zas kyi lung bstan snang srid zas su zos// lus kyi lung bstan mkha' khyab dang ba'i lus// sar+b+ba bI t+ta mu la ti wa badzra he gu

h+ya rat+na pha la tan+t+ra d+ha r+m+ma rat+na/ tsak+Shu tir+Ya ka dz+nyA na tsakra pha la ma hA bo d+hi swA ta swa b+hA ba bi shung+d+ha dz+nyA ka ya a// zhes sgra bshad do// thams cad ma rig rang snang la// byol song ma rig gti mug che// rdo rje sku bstan
dgyes pa'o// gsang ba chen po rig chen bzang po 'dra// rgyud kyi chos nyid don rtogs nas// rin po che yi mig phye bas// byol song ye shes 'khor lo bskor// bzang po rang 'byung byang chub
sku// byang chub sems dpa' chen po yin// dri med dag pa ye shes sku// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// byol song gi 'jig rten chags lugs dang// de la yang thugs rje yas babs kyi
le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// yi dwags srid pa chags lugs bstan par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// dang po'i rtsa ba gsum po

las// rtse mo chod par byed pa'o// gsang ba'i gnas su rtsa gsum chags// phyi nang sgrib dang sgrib pa can// mkha' la rgyu ba'i 'byung po yi dwags dang// las kyi rnam smin yi dwags dang// gnas pa rten gyi

yi dwags dang// 'bras bu grub pa'i yi dwags dang// bsam gyis mi khyab bsam las 'das// de nas thugs rje yas babs pa'i// kha 'bar rgyal mo thub pa yis// rtsa gsum dag la ngau sprad pas// phyi yi sgrib pa

dag par byed// lhan cig skyes gsum ngo sprad pas// nang gi sgrib pa dag par byed// rang gros gsum la ngo sprad pas// phyi nang sgrib pa dag par byed// yul med rang snang chen po yin// de rnams mkha' phyogs
med par rgyu// 'od gsal chen por ngo sprad pas// rang grol 'bras bu chen po thob// lus la gnas shing dbugs la rgyu// gnas pa gnod gyi yi dwags de// 'gyu ba dngos med ngo sprad pas// gnas pa'i yi
dwags rang sar grol// las rnams thams cad 'gyus nas byed// rtogs pa shes rab las byed dang// ma rtogs ma rig las byed gnyis// las su 'dra ste dngos mi gcig/ rnam par smin pa'i yi dwags

dang// rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gnyis// 'bras bur 'dra ste khyad par che// rnam smin 'bras bu mthar thug pas// chos nyid yul med dgongs pa shar// ces gsungs so// sar+b+ba lo ka pre ta ka kar+m+ma ku ru dz+nyA na

gu h+ya rat+na tsak+Shu/ pa ri shung+d+ha A/ zhes sgra bstan no// thams cad 'khor ba yi dwags te// 'phrin las myur du rdzogs par byed// ye shes gsang ba rang la bstan// rin po che yi spyan chen phyi// sgrib pa thams cad

dag par byed// skye med chos sku rang la snang// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// yi dwags phyi srid pa chags 'jig bstan pa dang// de la thugs rje yas babs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u
ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// dmyal ba'i srid pa chags lugs bstan pa ni// dang po rtsa ba gsum po las// rtse yi bla rtsa nag por
gyes// g.yon pa med yi dkyil 'khor la// rkang mthil rtsa brgyad bdag nyid la// tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad du srid pa chags// de yi dbus kyi lte ba la// thugs rje a wa glang mgo byon// a me ri

'bar ma'i 'phreng ba yin// zhes gsungs so// na ragaka a g+ne dz+wa la pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta triHda dz+nyA na ma hA tu A/ zhes sgra bshad pas// tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad po de// rang rang rang byung gnas las grol// dmyal
ba'i me lce 'bar ba las// shes rab kyis ni snying por gsal// ye shes chen po'i dbyings na skye ba med// ces don gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// dmyal ba'i gnas su thugs rje chos kyi

'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// grang ba'i dmyal srid chags lugs bstan pa ni// dang po rtsa ba gsum po las// g.yas
pa chu yi dkyil 'khor du// rkang mthil rtsa brgyad pad+ma'i gnas// zla ba nyi ma'i bdag nyid can// de la rtsa dag chu yi 'khor lo shar// de las grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad// de yi yas babs rtsa gsum

las// thugs rje chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// thugs rje chos kyi rgyal po'i phyir// chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'o// grang ba chu yi dkyil 'khor yang// zhi ba chos kyi sku ru bstan// na ga ra

tsa ma nu pre ta ka yan+ne pra dz+nyA pAr mi tA hri da ya// zhes sgra bstan no// de'i don ni// dmyal ba'i rgyal po thub pa'i gtso// sems can yi dwags chos kyi rgyal// ye shes snying la gnas par bya// zhes gsungs
so// shes rab ye shes sdud bar byed// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal chen pos de skad gsungs// grang ba'i dmyal ba ye shes sku// dmyal ba rang grol thig ler gdal// ces gsungs so// nyi
tshe nye 'khor dmyal ba ni// mthil gnyis srid pa chags pa yin// gnyis gnyis log pas nyi tshe yin// thub pas gnyis med bstan pa yis// nyi tshe rang sar grol bar byed// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre

gnyis med kyi rgyud las// grang ba chu dmyal ba dang nyi tshe nye 'khor gyi snang ba la thugs rje rang 'byung gi 'khor lo bskor// ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi

blo gros khyod// rdo rje dmyal ba'i chags lugs bstan// dang po rtsa ba gsum po las/ rdo rje bum pa'i rtsa ba rgyu/ rtsa gsum rdo rje'i dbyibs su shar// rdo rje dmyal ba'i brten pa yin// de la thugs rje yas bab

pas// rdo rje'i sku de 'dus ma byas// rdo rje dmyal ba 'dren mdzad pa// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i brten sa yin// de la thugs rje yas babs pas// rdo rje'i skya de 'dus ma byas// rdo

rje dmyal ba 'dren mdzad pa// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang// dga' bral chen po thub pa'i sku// thugs rje yas babs zhes su bshad// de ni dga' rab rdo rje sprul pa'i sku// thub

pa bdun du byung ba yin// dga' rab rdo rje zhes su bstan// sprul sku dga' rab rdo rje de// thugs rje rtsa yi lam du byung// longs sku rdo rje sems dpa' de// 'od gsal ngo bo rtsa yi lam du byung// chos sku kun tu bzang po de// ye shes rtsa

yi lam du byung// de gsum gcig tu 'dus pa ni// a wa d+hu ti zhes su brjod// a ni skye med kun tu bzang// rtsa ni sku lnga ye shes lnga// rdo rje mi skyod pa zhes bya// d+hu ti sprul sku thugs rje 'byung// sprul sku dga' rab rdo rje yin// sku

gsum 'dus pas rdo rje yin// rdo rje sku de 'dus ma byas// rang lus rtags kyi rdo rje ni// sku gsum rang la yod pa'i rtags// nang gi bcud la ngo sprad pas// sku gsum rang la 'byung ba'i rtags// gsang ba'i don la ngo sprad pas// sku

gsum thugs rje rang chas yin// des ni rdo rje dmyal ba yin// rang grol ngo sprod bstan pa yin// na gar badzra adz+nyA Na ti la mu la ma hA// kri ka pra du a si// zhes yis rtsa bshad do// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// dmyal ba rdo rje skye med

bstan// skye med ye shes chen po yin// thig pa chen po ma btsal shar// sprul pa'i go cha chen po yin// skye med dbyings sku gcig par thil// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// rdo rje dmyal ba'i chags lugs bstan

pa dang// de la thugs rje chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// thugs rje byin rlabs yas babs pa// lam dang gnas dang gang zag

gsum// de la dgongs nas 'byung ba yin// thugs rje yas babs 'byungaba'i dus// srid pa yas mar chags pa yin// dang po rlung yang yas babs pas// de la rtsa bstan thig le byangachub sems// sems la 'byung ba lnga shar

ba// thugs rje yas mar chags pa yin// nam mkha' rlung dang chu dang me sa lnga// rang snang yas babs phyi ru chags// phyi 'byung lnga po'i gnad med na// longs sku'i thugs rje 'byung ba med// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// nang gi 'byung

ba lnga yi gnad med na// chos sku'i thugs rje 'byung sa med// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// gsang ba'i rtsa gsum yas babs yin// gsang ba'i rtsa gsum gnad med na// lhan cig skyes gsum 'byung sa yin// rtsa rnams gcig tu

ma 'dus na// rdo rje chos sku'i 'byung sa med// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// rtsa rnams 'brel ba'i gnad med na// don gyi rgyud la 'byung sa med// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// rtsa rnams gcig tu ma 'dus na// man ngag

lung la 'byung thabs med// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// rtsa rnams rang 'byung ma shes na// man ngag gnad du 'byung thabs med// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// rtsa rnams 'khrul mig
gnad med na// rgyud lung man ngag rtsa bral 'gyur// de yang thugs rje yas babs yin// rtsa gsum gcig pa'i gnad med na/ thig le nyag gcig 'byung thabs med// de yang thugs rje yas bab yin// gcig po rang

grol gnad med na/ gzhi lam 'bras bu rang grol med// de yang thugs yas babs yin// thugs rje thams cad yas mar babs// dper nam mkha' la sprin dang char babs 'dra// sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ag+ne sa ne rat+na dz+nyA na gu h+ye ma hA d+harmA d+hA tu

b+hi d+ha ma hA mU la sa ma yA badzra kA ya// ti la e ka a// zhes sgra bshad do// nyi ma me ni shes rab rtags// zla ba chu ni thabs kyi rtags// thabs dang shes rab rin chen 'phreng// sa 'di ye shes gsang ba chen po yin// chos dbyings rig

pa'i ye shes de// theg pa chen po'i don yin pas// dam can la bstan par bya// rdo rje'i sku de 'dus ma byas// sku gsum thig le nyag gcig go/ skye ba med par bshad pa yi// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud

las// chags dang 'jig dang stong dang gnas pa gsum// thugs rje chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bstan pas// gnas chen po rtag pa mi 'gyur ba'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyan cig rdo rje chos

kyi blo gros khyod// mthong rtags theg pa'i grub mtha' dang// rang grol chos min grub mtha' gnyis// phyogs rtogs phyogs med rtogs pa gnyis// lam du sgra mthun khyad par che// gzhi yi grub mtha' phyogs rtogs dang// phyogs med

lhun grub rtogs pa gnyis// rtogs ba sgra mthun khyad par che// 'bras bu phyogs rtogs grub mtha' dang// mtshan ma rang grol phyogs med rtogs pa gnyis// rtogs pa sgra mthun khyad par che// gser la sogs pa'i rin chen dang// nor

bu rin chen phun tshogs pa// rin chen sgra mthun khyad par che// theg pa sems can bden pa dang// rdzogs chen rang sems 'khrul pa gnyis// sems su sgra mthun khyad par che// dbu ma sgyu mar bden pa dang// gsang sngags sgyu ma brdzun

pa gnyid// sgyu ma sgra mthun khyad par che// nyan thos rdul phran bden pa dang// rang rgyal rdul phran sgyu ma gnyis// rdul phran sgra mthun khyad par che// a nu dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa dang// rdzogs chen rang shar gnyis med

gnyis// gnyis med sgra mthun khyad par che// tsan+d+ra 'od ldan 'char ba dang// sUr+ya 'od ldan 'char ba gnyis// 'char ba sgra mthun khyad par che// tshogs gnyis bsags nas rdzogs byed dang// tshogs gnyis rang rdzogs chen po

de// tshogs kyi sgra mthun khyad par che// ma hA mu la ti la e ka pra sa ra sa dru ka la pa ny+tsa d+ha raM// sa ma ya ma hA mu la a si a// zhes sgra bshad pa// de'i don ni// theg pa chen po'i khyad par las// thig le nyag gcig spros pa

las// gnyis med don rtogs rang grol gnad// sku lnga thams cad rang la grub// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// skye ba med par rang la grub// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// theg pa'i rang gzhung grub mtha'

ste// de la thugs rje yas babs nas// mthar thug 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// de ni gnad kyi ngo sprod bstan par

bya// 'gyu ba lta ltangs phyi yi gzer// 'dre kun ngo yis bzung ba dang// sems 'dzin dmigs gtad mi dgos dang// 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor ba ni// phyi ltar bshad pa'i gdams pa yin// lta thabs gcig gis thams cad

mthong// dper na za 'og gur khyim la// ma 'dres rdzogs par mthong ba ltar// lta thabs gcig po'i man ngag gces// chos rnams spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi// lta thabs gcig gis sgro 'dogs gcod// dper na me long bzhin

bstan ltar// thams cad rang bzhin sa le rtogs// lta thabs gcig gis 'gro drug mthong// 'gro drug spyi btsan sgo btsan rnams// nam mkha'i gza' skar mthong ba ltar// ma rig bdar sha chos par rtogs// lta thabs gcig

gis thig le nyag gcig mthong// lag tu man shel bzhag pa ltar// phyi nang med par zang thal shar// shes bya'i sgrib rdzogs rang grol rtogs// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// phyi nang gnyis la gzer gdab pa'i

gtan tshigs kyi gzer// bstan pa dper gzer/ mthong ba tshig gi gzer/ tshigs rnams don gyi gzer gdab pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// gsang dang yang

gsang gzer bshad do// de la tshul drug dpe dang don dang gsum// gsang ba bskur tshul nyams dag las// rang 'byung ye shes thig le'o// bla na med pa'i gzer chen ni// dpe yi gzer gyi ngo sprod gces// rtags kyi gzer thabs

'brel ba gces// brda gcig bstan pas don rnams 'char// brda yi gzer ni rtags la bstan// rtags de don la 'char bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las// phyi nang gsang ba gab pa thugs rdol ba'i

le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros la// thar pa'i lam chen rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// byin rlabs rgyal po'i rgyud du zung// lha dang 'dre srin mi grol bas// lha 'dre

gnyis med rgyud du zung// thams cad ma lus rdzogs pas na// kun 'dus thig le'i rgyud du zung// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros dang// mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i seng ge rjes su yi rangs so// lha 'dre gnyis med kyi rgyud las//
rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// chos las 'das pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/ mang+galaM
dpal gsang ba snying po'i phyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
bod skad du// dpal gsang ba'i snying po'i phyi ta// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs rdo rje yum gyi b+ha ga la// rang bzhin
lhun gyis grub pa'i 'khor thugs la gnas pa rnams dang// btsun mo rnams kyi b+ha ga nyid la zhugs pa gyur to// de nas de nyid sngags kyi bdag por mdzad nas// rang bzhin gyi
chos 'di dag bka' stsal ba/ sgyu'akhrul la ni mnyam gzhag dus// snying khar spyi khyab a bsam la// de nyid zla ba'i 'khor lo yin// hU~M dbus rang bzhin bod gnas sa// 'dod
chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// zla ba theg le'i ha yig go/ sma rdo rje 'khor lo yi// hU~M gsum gsang ba rnams su'o// gnyis nod byang chub kun khyab pa// lasu nyid stong par rnam
brtags la// rgyu yi sa bon m-i dmigs par// byin rlabs 'dus pa sh+ya n+ya ta// mtshon pas chos kyi dbyings su grags// mthar phyin grub nas phyag rgya rdzogs// lus
ngag yid gsum hU~M gi rgya// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin dpal gsang ba snying po'i ma ta las// sku gcig las thams cad du sgrub pa'i thabs skabs dang po'o// de nas bro gar
gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyaums par zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid la bka' stsal pa// dpal chen glu dang gar byas pas// thams cad kun gyi bdag por 'grub// ko ri
la sogs bro gar gyis// 'du dang 'phel ba rab tu ster// pu ka la sogs bro dang gar// rang lhan gzhan rnams rmags pa 'grub// si d+ha la sogs bro dang gar// za zhing rdul cha
med pas 'grub// kri rta la sogs bro gar gyis// 'byin zhing nyams pa rab tu 'grub// rta gdong la sogs bro gar gyis/ 'gugs dang 'chings dang sdom pa dang// nges pa byed pa'i sgra 'byin 'grub/ slas

dang byi mo'i tshogs// rbad cing las rnams mthar phyin 'grub// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'bras bu'i rgya// mngon par byang chub rnam lngas bskyed// shes 'jug yul sar mthar phyin pa// 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur

pa'o// rgyu dang yi ge rnams dang ni// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa 'bras bu yul gyi sad dkyil du/ gzhal yas bsnyen pa rnam bzhi bsten/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ser po la// gru chad sgo khyud gru bzhi pa// bar
khyams gnyis ldan thod pa sprul// nyi ma 'phreng bas rab tu brjid// khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag// dom pa la sogs gdan rnams la// lha chen la sogs nri bsnol steng// smug nag sngon nag ser nag
dang// dmar nag ljag nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ko blon rngan pa'i sgra chen dang// thod sbrul dung dang dgra stag shol// rdo rje ral gri pad ma 'bar// 'jigs pa'i

btsun mo rnams kyang 'khril// ha ho dza hU~M baM ho dang// b+h+yo ni bcu gnyis brgyad dang ldan// dkyil 'khor yab yum kha nas bslab// byang chub sems kyi 'byung khung yin// dpal gsang ba snying po'i ma
ta las// dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas yang ma lus sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bka' stsa la pa// sems can ma lus kun sgrol
ma// sems ni skye ba med pa yis// yum rnams kun dang sbyor byed pa// ye nas skye med sems kyis sbyar// ma skyed pa yi dbyings nyid las// sems can kun gyi don rnams gnas// rten pa tsam du gnas pa

ste// sems can bya ba ming yang med// rdul tsam yang ni bsgral ba med// oMlas bud+d+ha he ru ka// stong nyid ye shes las byung ste// rna ru kun rtog ye shes so/ pad ma rigs su shes par bya/// zla tshes mnyam nyid

ye shes ni// rin chen rigs su shes par bya// klad gor nan tan ye shes te// las kyi rigs su mkhas pas bya// 'o na stong nyid me long ye shes te// rdo rje rigs su rnam par grags// oM ni bud+ha he ru ka yi
sku// thams cad lha yi dkyil 'khor ro// oM las sogs pa rlung zhon nas// phyogs bcur 'phros pa rab zin pa// yab yum kha nas bzlas pa bya// de ltar rang don grub nas ni// gzhan don phyag rgya chen po
bsam// lus ngag yid gsum rang bzhin hUM// de las 'od 'phros slar 'dus pa// rdo rje sems dpa' kho na'i sku// sems kyi rang bzhin thig le ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o// ye shes sems dpa' de

bzhin gshegs// brtan par bya phyir tse gcig pa// phyi dang nang dang gsang pa gsum// phyag rgya bcing zhing snying khar bsam// dri sh+ya ho su ra ta s+t+waM// mo ha ra ti dzA// dges pa'i lha mo de las byung// snying khar chos
kyi 'khor lo la// bde bar gshegs dang dges pa mdzad// dkar dmar lus las khyab pa'i don// ye shes phebs nas byin gyi brlob// dges pa'i lha mo bde gshegs la// zhabs bskyed d+har 'dus ho zla
tshes// de nyid chos kyi dbyings su dges// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dpal gsang ba snying po'i ma ta las// thig le 'byung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
'di dag bka' stsal pa// ye shes 'byung ba'i rlung rnams ni// rdzogs pa'i tshil du yang dag rdzaugs// dges pa'i pa hU~M lte bar gnas// lcags kyu ma ni phyogs bcur 'phros// rang bzhin gnas nas bkug pa
yi// rnam bzhi'i 'khor lo las byung ba// rdo rje nas byung par dkyil du// dkar dmar gcig tu 'dres pa de// rdo rje yar drangs gcig tu zhu// gong bu 'od kyi rang bzhin de// yab yum thad kar 'ja' tshon

a// gsal ba'i ye shes nyid kyi dbyings// 'khor ba'i rgyun ni rab tu gcod// de las phyin nang rlung gnyis ni// phyir 'gro ba dang nang du 'gro// kun bzang lugs las phyir mi gdon// thig le sran ma 'bring
tsam ni/// ljags kyi dbus na gnas pa ste// de tshe a ru gsal// thim pas mtha' gnyis dbus mi gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dpal gsang ba snying po las// rlung gi

man ngag gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nges 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rdzogs pa dad pa rnam sa la ni mtshan ma med
pa'i ting 'dzin dang rten byin gyis brlabs pa dang// bzlas dang mchod pa don gsal ba/ khyab pa'i sangs rgyas thabs shes rab// dmigs pa'i dngos po ci zhig bsgom// pad can 'od 'dres kun tu 'od//

chos sku bde chen zhes bya'o// skal med rnams la shin tu gsang// lha'am stong pa'i thig le la// blo phab tshogs chen ye shes nyid// dang ba pad ma can du 'dres// chos kyi sku ni bde ba'i rlung// kun tu 'od las

rab 'das pa// de bzhin nyid dbyings rdo rje'i sku// gsal ba pad ma byang chub sku// byin rlabs 'byung ba longs spyod sku// rim pa sprul pa'i sku ru grags// bzlas dang mchod pa 'du ba rnams// phyag rgya'i sku

ni bsgoms nas kyang// yum gnyis gsal bas spro bsdu bya// phaT kyis sgo phye b+h+ruM du gsal// a ni mkha' gsang byang chub sems// so so'i tsa ba rab brjod pas// byang chub sems kyi sprin las ni// yig 'bru
gzhal yas khang dang bcas// skal ldan mi yi tshogs rnams la// du pu aka rab tu bsam// zhal zas steng du khrag 'thung tshogs/// ma lus snying po bsam nas ni// yab yum zhal zas yig 'bru la// thim
pas 'od kyi zhal zas bsregs// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid la// rang rig ye shes 'od 'bar bas/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// thabs la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad khro bar rab
bsam nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// ye shes rol pa'i mchod pa 'bul// gnyis su med pas thams cad dges// A be sha dang khA khA ci 'dra ba ni dbul bar bya// me lha la ni rdzas bdun
bdun// tshom bus byas te bstod pa'o// hU~M las yi ge 'bru gsum po// 'od zer breng ma chad pa yis// ro yi dngos po bsregs nas ni// shes pa dngos med stong pa las/ yig 'bru zhu nas gser zun tshul// rdo
rje yab yum sbyor mtshams nas// lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis thams cad bkug/ ra ga ya mi brda bsnol mar// ye shes yang dag sbyor ba'i mchog// phaT kyi mchod pas dgyes 'gyur ro// de nyid byang chub sems su
bya// 'od zer phung po sregs nas ni/ ma dmigs pa ru bsam pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dpal gsang ba snying po'i ma ta las// phung po sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// dpal
gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na rba dang// lo tsA ba be ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o//// gsod pa rgyal bar 'gyur grags// des na nam mkha' chen po'i

sku// sdig med yon tan kun ldan pa'i// de bzhin rgyud mchog rgyal po yi// bdag nyid chen po rgyud rgyal 'di// sems dang mchod par byed pa dang 'dri zhing gang zhig 'drir 'jug la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i

bdag nyid bzhin 'dzin pas/ de dag la'ang rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang 'di 'chang ba 'ang bdag nyid chen por 'dzin pas// de la'ang rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// mos shing gus dang shin tu 'dzin pa dang// dad

dang mi gtong khyad par phyogs pa la'ang// kun tu bzang po nyid du 'dzin pas de dag la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// cis kyang mi gos rgyal ba nyid las gzhan du ma mthong yang// sangs rgyas par 'dzin de dag la'ang

rta tu bzhin phyag 'tshal lo// dpe 'am tshad mas dpag tu med pa'i gsang chen 'dir/ dang por sems bskyed tha mar de bzhin gnas pa de// kun tu bzang po nyid du bdag nyid du lta ba'i phyir// rdo rje can rtag
tu de dag la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mgon mo sgron med kyis// gsang ba chud ma zos bya'i phyir// rdo rjai sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku// lag na rdo rje thogs pa po// gsang ba'i 'dzin par rab bsngags
phyir// gsang ba'i mchog rgyud 'di nyid ni// yang nas yang du gtad par bya'o// de bzhin da ltar gtod 'dzin pa// de bzhin du ni gtad byas so// rgyas pa chen po rgyud phyi ta don 'dzin pa rdzaugs so//

rgya gar gyi pan+Ti ta bi ma la mi tra dang// bod kyi lo tsa ba rma rin chen mchog dang gnyags dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du// ma ya dzal shI dz+nya nag r+b+ha Tan+Ta nA ma// bod

skad du// dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes kyi snying po'i rgyud ces bya ba// dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das gsang ba'i longs spyod chen po kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang// thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid can ma lus// mi

lus// lus pa thams cad dang// so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thig le chen po ye shes snying po'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba'i 'og min chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rang bzhin// tshad
dpag med pa gsang ba'i ye shes 'khor lo gsal ba la// gsang ba'i ye shes rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// rgya nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yongs su ma chad pa// ye shes yon tan
kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyibs dang ldan pa// gsang ba'i lhag pa'i blo 'bur gyis mdzos pa// tse mo gcig tu 'dus par byer med pa'i ro dang ldan pas thig le zlum pa// ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab
pa// ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa// rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa// dpags pa// tshad dpag tu med pa// ye shes rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang// chun

'phyang dang// shar bu'i rgyan dang// gzugs sna tshogs dang// sgra sna tshogs dang dri sna tshogs dang// ro sna tshogs// reg bya sna tshogs pas 'khrig par rang byung la// mi sgrib par rang rig gsal ba'i rgyan bsam

gyis mi khyab pa klubs pa// gsang ba'i rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo khyud can// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa// phyi dang nang med par kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na// mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri

dang// stobs glang po'i khri dang// rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang// dbang rma bya'i khri dang// thog pa med pa'i nam mkha' lding gi khri dang// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang// gos pa med pa pad
ma rin po che'i gdan la// sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byang du ldan pa// bsam gyi mi khyab thams cad du/ sku gsung thugs thams cad du// sku

gsung thugs kun tu snang ba// thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa// ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can// sku gsung thugs bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang// de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po

dang// de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang// de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang// de dag kun kyang mthing kha dang// dkar po dang// ser po dang// le brgan dang// ljang khu'i mdog tu

'tsher ba// btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang// sra pa'i dbyings dang// mnyen pa'i dbyings dang// dro ba'i dbyings dang// bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa// btsun mo'i dbyings dang gnyis su med par

chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni// 'di lta ste// dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang// byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa

dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang// byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang// btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang// gnya na par bya ba dang// bsnam par bya ba dang// myong bar bya bar bya ba'i chogs dang/ byang chub

chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang// byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang// byang chub chen po rdo rje snom byed dang// byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang// btsun mo 'das pa dang// da ltar dang// 'byung ba

dang// ma byon pa'i tshogs dang// 'joms pa chen po reg pa dang// 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang// 'joms pa chen po reg bya dang// 'dzom pa chen po reg shes dang/ btsun mo rtog pa ma yin pa dang// chad

par ma yin pa dang// bdag tu ma yin pa dang// mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa dang// de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyi mi lang pa dang// gnyis su med par bzhugs so// sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes snying po'i rgyud

las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// lnga phung yan lag bde bzhi'i zhing// gsar ba'i rtog tshogs bzhi bcu lnga// dgyes pa
gar la bzhugs pa yis// ye shes nyid las gzhan ma yin// zhes gleng ngo// de nas kun tu bzang mos ched du brjod pa de brjod do// b+ha ga bde ba'i pho brang ni// rgyal ba kun gyi gzhal yas khang// kun
kyang thig le nyid du gsal// zab mo lhums su zhugs par brjod// ces gsungs so// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
pa'i// bde ba chen po'i gsang ba yis// bde mchog dbyings su dbang bskur ro// zhes ched du gleng ngo// de nas yang bcom ldan dpal le shes rgyal po nyid// ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sku dang/ gsung

dang// thugs las phyung ngo// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang// skye ba med pa thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang// 'gag pa med la thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med/ e ma ho ngau mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang// gnas pa nod la thams cad
gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa nod// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun kyi gsang/ dmigs pa med la thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma ho ngo
mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gro 'ong med la 'gro dang 'ong// 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// sems lnga sbyor ba'i rang bzhin
nyid// bde chen gnis med ngo bor gsal// gsang ba'i thig le dga' ba'i 'od// rang bzhin 'brel bas kun la khyab// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// sku gsung thugs kyi lhums nas byung// bde ba chen po'i
gnas su 'khyil// dbab dang gzung dang brtags pa yi// bde ba chen po mtshams sbyar te// gnyis med rig pa'i rang bzhin gsal// sku gsum thig le rdzogs pa'i ngang// sgyu 'phrul lhun grub
gsang ba'i mkha'// ye shes rang byung mnyam pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab dbyings kyi 'od// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dben pa phog// 'jug ldog bstan pa'i gar thabs kyis// sla yang bde chen dbyings la
gsal/// thig le rim gsum bskyed pa'i tshul// rdzogs chen ngang la rim pa med// gnas bzhi gcig tu 'khyil ba las// ye shes lnga ru gsal bar 'char// gsang ba'i rtog pa ma lus pa// rang rig ye shes
mchog tu bskyed// zab mo'i dbang la kun rdzogs pa// gdams pa lung gi gsal par shes// bzhi bcu tsa lnga'i rang bzhin nyid// phyi nang gsang ba tshul du bzhugs// sems lnga'i rim pas mtshams sbyar

zhing// bsnyen sgrub bzhi la gnas bcas pas// sa bcu lam lnga'i bag chags sbyang// bde chen rig pa'i kha lo sgyur// nyams myong thig le'i rig sbyong// rim med pa gsum gcig car gnan// mi skyod sgyu 'phrul
zab mo'i dbyings// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'byung gnas yum// kun 'byung thig le zab mo'i dbyings// kun 'dus 'phro 'du'i mtshan nyid can// sgo gsum 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yi// ye shes zab mo 'byung bar
'gyur// g.yas g.yon 'khor lo rang bzhin ltar// gyen du sgyil zhing thur du 'phro// bsdu bas sa bcu drug tu gsal// 'byung 'jug sum cu tsa gnyis las// thig le gcig las rdzogs par ltar// bcu drug
phrag gnyis sbyor ba yi// bsnol lam rkyang pa gang rung ba// gar thabs bde bo'i tshul gyis sbyar// me long gzugs brnyan ji bzhin du// ma brjod rang bzhin gsal bar 'byung// sprin med gsal ba'i nam
mkha' ltar// rang byung ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur// til 'bru tshad ldan bde ba'i rten// 'byung 'jug rim pa kun gyi gnas// bcom ldan 'das shes bshad pa ste// bden gnyis bral ba'i ye shes so// bskyed

rdzogs bzhi sogs sbyor ba yis// mngon sum ye shes rang gnas la// shes rab 'brel bas mnyam sbyar nas// rang 'byung thig le grub par 'gyur// zhed ched du gleng ngo// sgru 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud
las// sems lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gyes pa chen po'i thugs rje chen po snang ba'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas// ched du brjod pa 'di

brjod do// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la thim// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag
dog ser sna yis// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par sgyur// ye shes drug gi ngo bor gnas// snying po drug nyid 'od 'bar nas// ye shes drug gi mtshul dang 'thun// 'khor bar pung bcom brlag

pa'i phyir// thub pa chen po'-i chos kyi sku// rang rig chos 'byings gnyis med par// thabs dang shes rab don la rdzogs// sangs rgyas snying po kha sbyor las// rang 'byung ye shes gsal bar 'char// kun rdzob
sgyu ma'i khyad par las// ye shes zag med mngon par 'phrul// thos bsam sgom pa'i thabs nyid las/ ye shes gsum nyid gsal bar 'byung// ting 'dzin gsum po dus gcig gsal// bskyed rdzogs bzhi la

mnyam sbyar nas// 'bras bu bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// grangs las 'das pa'i phya rgya ste// bsdus pa'i nyi shu tsa lngar thim// thabs dang shes rab 'gyis pa'i 'od// bdeb chen po'i 'ben la phog// dus gsum rgyal
bas byin rlabs te// byang chub sems kyang ngo bor gnas// sku gsung thugs su mngon phyung nas// sems kyi 'khor lor thim par bya// sems kyi ka ba kun bkang nas// gsang ba'i 'dom gnas son pa

las// sa ya bcu gsum bde bas rgyan// sa sgra theg chen zab mo yis// a yi khyad par rtog par gnas// de nas ho dang gnyis su med// gsang ba rdzogs pa'i ye shes lnga// 'khor lo kha sbyor snying po can// bde

chen 'phen pas mtshams sbyar nas// dngas ma ye shes snyingapor 'brel// 'khor ba'i snyigs ma rang dag nas// ye shes gsal ba'i rtags byung ste// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang// bkrag dang g.yo dang yang ba
dang// bying ba'i skyon med dga' bas khyab// de nas las rung goms pa yin// g.yo zhing 'phar bar 'gyur na glod// bde bas snod bcud kun byang nas// tsa phug nam mkha' ltar snang nas// ye shes khyab

brdal kun tu bzang// 'phen dang sdud pa gnyis med pa// thabs dang shes rab yin par bshad// sangs rgyas kun 'byung 'khor lo can// ye shes snying po za ma tog// kun 'dus snying po'i gnyis su med// rgyu ba
gsum gyi dngas ma nyid// 'go min rigs pa mu mtha' yas// tsi T+Ta'i dkyil 'khor rin po che// ye shes lnga rdzogs rgyan dang ldan// rdzogs pa hU~M nyid sngon nas pa// thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam

yas// thabs chen ye shes rdzogs pa'i sku// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan nyid// phyi nang snod bcud mtha' yas pa// tsi T+TI'i snying po rdzogs par gnas// ye shes me long 'od gsal ba// dran pa'i snying
por bskul gyur nas// rnam thar brgyad kyi lam bgrod de// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la sbyar// bde ba'i dbang phyug 'du dbral med// sbyod la ma chags pad ma can// rang rig bde ba chen po'i gzugs// ma lus
ye shes khyab par gsal// ma lus mkha' gang thig ler gnas// thig ler rang bzhin med pa thim// lam du zhugs dang ro tshar dang// thun mong bcad dang byed pa sdom// rtog pa kun bcas bde
mchog la// thams cad khyab nas ye shes goms// mtha' bral ye shes mya ngan 'das// ma brjod thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// bde chen rang byung gsal bar 'char// phyi nang chos kun ma lus pa// thams cad rang
rig bde bar gsal// de nyid snod bcud mtha' yas par// rang snang thig le de nyid do// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// snod bcud bde ba ye shes nyid// ma rig mun sel ye shes 'bar// thams

cad ye shes snying por 'dus// bde chen rdzogs pa'i snying po las// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po nyid// nyid la gnyis med tshul gyi 'chad// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu 'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud
las// thugs rje ye shes 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom lda 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bde ba chen po sprin bkod pa 'di

sku gsung thugs rdo rje las mngon du phyang ngo// a// ka kha ga g+ha nga// tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya// Ta ThaT Da d+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na// pa pha ba b+ha ma// ya wa ra la sha Sha sa ha// a k+Sha a A// i I// u U// e ai// o au// r-i

r-I// l-i l-I+-i// aM A// a nri su tri pri du// oM A hU~M// ka kha ga g+ha nga// tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya// Ta Tha Da D+ha Na// ta tha da d+ha na// pa pha ba b+ha ma// ya ra la wa Sha sha sa ha// k+Sha/ ka kha ga gag+ha nga// tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya// Ta tha da d+ha

na/ ta tha da d+ha na// pa pha ba b+ha ma// ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha// k+Sha// zhes mngon du phyung ngo// khyab par gyur// gsal bar gyur// 'bar bar gyur te// ye shes chen po'i ngo bor gnas so// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad
kyis chos// brjod med gsung gi kun la khyab// sgra dang ming tshig 'dzin pa'i gnas// thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// sku dang thugs kyang de bzhin te// bsam gyi mi khyab dus bzhi gnas// byin rlabs
rig pa'i yi ge gsung// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brjod bya brjod byed kun dang 'brel// gsung gi bdag nyid 'khor lo can// brjod pa kun gyi dngos gzhir gnas// oM haM// bde chen gsang
ba'i 'khor lo nyid// yongs su rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid// thabs chen ye shes rgyas 'debs pas// de bzhin nam mkha'i khams su gnas// sum cu rtsa gnyis sgra yis brgyan// dbus nas 'khyil ba'i yi ge
gnyis// rin chen sna tshogs tshul nyid du// thur la 'dzag pa'i tshul gyis gnas// 'di dag kun la gnas pa'i phyir// bde ba cen pos rgyas btab bo// oM hU~M// longs spyod chen po gsang ba nyid// rang rig
bde mchog longs spyod rdzogs// gnyis med rdzogs pa'i kha sbyor can// 'brel bas thabs dang shes rab nyid// bcud ldan dbyings kyi 'khor lo can// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i ngo bonyid// 'bus na

gsung gi ngo bo nyid// 'bur du gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'phar dang 'phro ba'i bu gas brgyan// thams cad sbyong bzhin ma chags pas// longs spyod 'khor lo mtha' dbus med// hU~M// d+harma tsak+ka chosakyi
gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs dbyibs su gnas// chos nyid ye shes yon tan tsa// rang rgyud bzhi la yan lag brgyad// rnam shes ye shes gnyis su med// dngas ma bzhi dang rnyigs ma bzhi// sa bon drug dang

snying po gsum// thig le'i rang bzhin 'od du 'bar// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du thim// rgyu ba bzi tshul dang mthun// dngas ma dga' ba'i bde mchog 'od// 'phro dang khyab pa nyid du lta// ye shes snying por kun

'dus nas// thig le'i rang bzhin med pa thim// kun kyang lnga yis rgyas btab nas// bde chen po nyid du 'gyur// hU~M// sbrul pa bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid// bcu drug bzhi yi mtshan nyid can// bskyed pa 'byung
ba'i yi ge bzhi// a li ka li bdag nyid can// kun 'dus snying por gnyis su med// zab mo 'byung ba'i snying po la// thig le rdzogs pa'i tshul du gnas// gdod nas dag pa gsum gyi ngang// ye shes thig le

rang bzhin la// 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs par ldan// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin nyid// gzhal dang 'phreng ba'i rang bzhin can// sgra sbyor 'khor lo bzhi'i rang bzhin// me long btsegs pa'i tshul du
gnas// bskyod pa dbang gi dbyibs ldan pa// bstod dang smad dang srog ldan pa// ye shes bskyod pa'i sa bon can// dbye dang zlum pas don 'grub pa'o// e yi dbyibs ldan 'od kyi ni// 'bar dang 'byung
'jug bdag nyid can// rgyu ba gnyis kyi bde bar mdzad/ 'phel dang 'grib pa'ang de las byung// thig le bzhi yi sgo nas 'jug// thar pa brgyad kyis khyad par 'phags// stong pa bcu drug tshul dang

mthun// brtan pa a yi rang bzhin can// gyen dang thur gyi rang bzhin gyis// bde ba'i rang bzhin khyab par spro// rgyu ba gnyis kyi tshul bzhin du// bkug dang bsdam pa nyid dang ldan// rang bzhin grub pa'i

mtshan nyid la// bde ba chen po khyab par brdal// brjod med thabs kyi rang bzhin las// nam mkha'i ye shes gsal bar 'char zhes ched du gleng ste// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i

rgyud las// yi ge 'khor lo le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gyes pa chen po nyid kyis// de dag bsgrub pa'i tshul 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// chos rnams ca ba bde chen
nyid// de dag mngon pa bsgrub pa nyid// bdud tsi'i rang bzhin chen po dang// bzhi brgya tsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing// mi mthan sbyong zhing dbang du byed// 'byung lnga ye shes bdag nyid can// 'bab

dang 'bar ba'i de bzhin te// bskyod dang gyen gyi rang bzhin gyis// 'phen dang sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can// de dag 'bar ba'i rang bzhin gyis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'ben la phog// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor
ba yis// sa ya bcu gsum bde bas brgyan// kun kyang ye shes rgyas thebs pas// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang// mdog gsal bde bas khyab gyur nas// rgyu ba rlung la dbang thob cing// ye shes snying po
gnas su thim// rim par sprod pa'i thig le nyid// bde skyid snying por thim pa dang// thig le zin pa'i 'bad bar bya// thig le 'byongs par gsal 'gyur nas// tsa phug nam mkha' ltar gsal na// ye shes

khyab brdal kun tu bzang// mkha' ltar khyab pa nyid du mthong// thig le bde ba'i ro myong na// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// dus gcig ma chags pad ma can// sangs rgyas kha sbyor snying po las// rang

byung yi shes gsal bar snang// thugs rje bde chen rang bzhin khyab// 'byed pa'i rlung dang srog gi rlung// stod dang smad du byung ba'i rlung// gnas pa'i rlung yang de bzhin no// gzung bas mi g.yo gsal bar

'gyur// de nas goms par gyur pa yi// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yin// rang rig rang snang byang chub sems// snang ba nyid na stong pa ste// chos sku stong pa dbyer med pa// bde cen longs spyod rdzogs pa

ste// khyab par gsal bar sprul pa'o// bde chen gsang ba'i 'khor lo nyid// zig med rnam shes rgyu ba'i rten// thun mong rtog pa'i dri ma bcad// shes dang sbyor dang nyams len dang// zag med skyes pa rnam bzhi
ni// bsnyen dang nye bsnyen sgrub dang 'grub// khyad par bzhi ru gsal ba yin// 'di dag goms par gnas 'gyur na// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gnyis med pa// gsang ba byang chub sems dge ba// rang bzhin med pa

der snang ngo// sgyu ma thabs kyi rang bzhin las// 'phrul pa shes rab zab mo'i dbyings// drwa ba gnyis med bde chen nyid// rang 'byung blo la 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes snying po kun gyi gter// dbang bskur
byin rlabs thugs kyi mdzod// nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes ni// rgyu bral gsal bar khyab pa yin/ yang dag gnyis med rtog pa yis// legs par blo yis gting du byos// gsal ba'i 'di nyid med pa na// sgyu
'phrul drwa ba rdzogs par 'char// kun kyang thabs dang shes rab kyis// ma lus rgyas btab rdzogs pa yin// sgyu 'phrul dngos grub 'di 'grub na// ma lus kun tu 'grub par 'grur// zhes gsang ba'i tshig
tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos// ye shes phyag rgya chen po 'byung ba'i
ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// 'di skad ces gsungs so// rang byung 'khor lo'i lte ba la// bdechen rang rig byang chub sems// bde ba sgyur ma'i rang bzhin la// thabs chen drwa bas mtshams sbyor

nas// ye shes sgyu mas mngon par 'phrul// sgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i ngang// rkyen bcas rang 'byung 'khor lo drug/ thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing// sku gsung thugs kyi lam las byung// bde ba chen

po'i 'ben la phog// zab mo shes rab pha rol phyin// bde chen gsal bar byed pa'i sems// 'ju dang 'pho ba'i rang bzhin can// khyab pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin nyid/ sa ya bcu gsum khyab par spro// dbab dang 'dzin
dang dkyil ba yis// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su nges// rgyu dang dngas rnyigs 'byed pa dang// srog ces bya bar gnas pa ste// dang po gzung bas bde 'gyur zhing// gnyis pa lus bzung 'dzin pa

ste// thabs 'tsho ba'i rang bzhin can// las de mtshan nyid rgyu ba'i rlung// mi shig thig le bde chen po// rang byung bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// rgyu ba rlung gi mngon shes can// 'phen dang sdud dang gnas ba
dang// thabs kyi khyad par ston pa yin// rang byung 'khor lo thugs kyi gnas// phun sum tshogs pa kun kyang gnas// gsang ba pha rol phyin pa dang// sa bcu rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin can// rgyu ba gsal te
bkag te shes// thig le rdzogs pa'i rang bzhinagyis// thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par blta// ma lus bde chen khyab pa yis// gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin can/ snyoms 'jug pa ni bsam par bya/ tsiT+Ta'i

'khor lo rin po che// thugs kyi 'khor lo rten dang yul// tsa ba yan lag kun gyi bdag// tsa ba sku gsung thugs su 'brel// bde chen gnyis med khyab pa'i 'od// 'phrul mig lha yi spyan gyi blta// thabs dang
shes rab snyoms 'jug la// bde chen rang byung gsang ba'i lam// ma chags pad ma lta bu'i spyan// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dbus med pa'i sku gsung thugs// thabs bral rnams la rgyas btab
pa// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas rtogs// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin la// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// longs spyod bde sdug kun rdzogs kyang// bstan rtag dga' ba'i rang bzhin te// bde

chen phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// gdam ngag steng dang 'og gi sgo// dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs chen po// shes rab las kyi phyag rgya la// byed pa sdom pa'i man ngag gi/ rol dang chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid// lha
mo bcu gnyis tshang pa las// kun rdzob sems kyi rang bzhin 'byung// sdem dang brtul ba'i mtshan nyid dang// gzung ba'i thabs chen las byung bas// don dam ye shes gnyis med 'char// bden
gnyis dbyer med dga' ba ni// dngos po lhan cig skyed pa gsal// dag pa gsum gyi rang bzhin ni// sku gsung thugs su'ang mtshon pa yin// las bzhi rdzogs pa'i gsang ba'i las// yon tan gdul bya'i

stobs la snang// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud las// bde chen phyag rgya bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes ba chen

pos zab mo byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sangs rgyas pho brang rin chen snod// til 'bru gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang// sangs rgyas kun 'byung

snying po can// sna tse thig le zhugs pa'i gnas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshan nyid do// 'jug pa'i sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan// brtag par dka' ba'i phya rgyas btab// pho brang dkyil 'khor bzhi rdzogs par// rin chen

dkyil 'khor gser gyi sgo// 'byed dang sdom pa'i phyag rgya can// rig pa'i ye shes rdzogs pa'i ldan// 'dod yon gsang ba mdzes par brgyan// nyi zla pad+ma'i rin chen gyis// che ba'i khyad par stobs ldan
pa// gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// sa bon yi ge bde ba can// kun tu khyab par bzhugs pa ni// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i bdag nyid can// ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pas// zag med ye shes khyad

par 'phags// me rlung 'phrul gyi lcags kyu yis// bskyod pa rlung gi phyag rgya yis// ye shes sa bon zhu ba yis// dbab pas bde ba thim par 'gyur// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// rab tu phra ba'i snal ma

'am// migayo gzung ba'i rlung stobs kyis// gzung dang dkyil dang drangs pa las// bde ba'i rtags rnams 'byung 'gyur te// gar thabs rlu nga la dbang sgyur zhing// byed pa sdom pa'i man ngag gis// bde ba'i

sa bon dbang sgyur na// rang byung ye shes 'bar ba 'byung// thabs kyi zin dang ma zin pas// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba snang// zab mo dbang gsum thob bya zhing// bla ma'i man ngag ldan gyur nas// rgyu ba'i

rlung la dbang thob na// 'khor ba sangs rgyas nyid du sbyor// ma ni dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i don// ma nu 'khor ba rnyog pa'i yid// tra zhes bya ba skyob pa nyid// zag med ye shes dkyil 'khor gnas// gnyis
med thabs dang shes rab ste// snyoms 'jug bsgoms pas bstim pa las// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab ste// sku gsung thugs su gsal bar snang// skyob pa bde mchog mtshan nyid kyis// ma lus dkyil 'khor
nyid du sbyor// dbang thob rig pa 'dzin pa yis// spyod yul phyi nang ma lus pa// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'ibade chen gsang ba'i rgyas btab bo// khyab dang gang ba'i bdag nyid can// ye

shes chen po mu mtha' med// rgyu ba rlung gi stobs dang bral// rnam rtog ye shes nyid du 'gyur// zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam// lo gcig zla ba bzhi tshun chad// bde ba'i ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs

rgyas sa la the tsom med// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrulaye shes snying po'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi rig pa byin gyi rlobs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po

nyid kyis// phyag rgya chen po rangasnang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// ye shes snying po gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab
