gnyis med pa'i// 'jug pa'i thabs mkhas 'byor pa yis// phyag rgya'i tshogs chen gsal bar ldan// 'khor lo 'dus pa'i snying po la// rgyal ba'i ye shes rdzogs par ldan// dbang po yul dus gsang
ba'i sems// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin la/ yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs// gdams ngag steng 'og las byung ba'i// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// 'phel ba'i rang rigs bsam mi khyab// spro
bsdu gnas pa'i 'dzin pa dag/ rjes dran yan lag bzhi dang ldan// zhal dang pad+ma dbang po dag/ gsang ba'i ro dag ldan 'gyur zhing// goms pa'i lto bas las byung ba'i don// sgyu 'phrul dra bar nges par
brjod// ye shes snying po byang chub sems// ma lus bde chen rang bzhin bshar/ bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma lus gnyis med 'bral bar bslab// snying po sgrib med dag pa ltar// dbang po yul

sems dag pa yi// byang chub sems de gzung ba yis// rang byung ye shes gsal bar snang// snang stong dbyer med rjes 'thun pa'i// rdzogs pa'i skye med byang chub sems// ma lus mkha' ltar dag par snang// ye
shes lnga rdzogs byang chub sems// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i sems// bde chen rang rigs gnyis med bas// de bzhin nyid du rnam par snang// bsdams dang bkug dang glod pa yis// ye shes nam mkha' lta
bur 'gyur// skye 'jig gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong dag/ sems lnga rdzogs par ldan par 'gyur// snying po sems dang ldan pa na// yal ga lo 'dab zhen pa med// bde ba phyi nang gsang ba yis// phyogs bcu kun

tu khyab pa dang// gar thabs 'byung 'jug rlung gi tshogs// thabs dang ldan par nan tan bya// kun rdzob don dam gnyis med pa'i// byang chub sems su mnyam sbyor nas// don mthong 'jug pas mthar phyin na/
gnyis med rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub// sha lnga bdud rtsildan pa yis// longs spyod 'byung lnga byin brlabs la// bdag nyid rgyan dang longs spyod pas// mnyam pa'i rgyal por the tsom med// bde chen

dpa' bo mdzad pa yis// bdag nyid ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin// blang dor med par spyad par bya// brten pa lnga dang mi spang lnga// shes dang grub pa'i rang bzhin dag// 'jigs pa med par dang du blang// rtsa ba'i

mtshan nyid smos ci dgos// a ho// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud las// phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gcig dang

du ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi ting 'dzin la mnyam par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// bdag nyid byang chub sems shes shing// ma lus ye shes sgyu ma'i tshul// shes shing

phyag rgya kun rdzogs pa// thabs shes rab dbyer med pas// bde chen sa gzhi dam pa dag// lha klu gnod sbyin mi la sogs/ lhag pa'i skye bo dam pa la// yid 'ong snyed dang tsod gzhi phyir// tshig dang bden pas

sgo la blang// sbyor pa'i cha las byung ba'ithabs// nges pa'i tshig gi dbang du byas// tshad med tshad las bab ba dag// rig pa 'dres pa'i thig btab nas// rdzas dang tshig dang ting 'dzin gyis/ sbyang ste dri med dag
par bya// 'byor pa'i yo byad dam pas mchod// phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ yab yum gsal ba'i khyar par gyis// gzhi dang bcas pa lhar gsal nas// gsang dbang pad+ma byin brlabs nas// dbang skur
byin rlabs dam tshig dpog/ gsang ba'i dam bsres gdams ngag phog/ ye shes dkyil 'khor byin phab la// phyag rgya bzhi ldan brtul zhugs dag// rtag ldan gsal bar snang ba'i tshe// 'pho 'jug thun

mtshams brtag par bya// dbang po rtog pa'i khyad par gyis// rlung gi stobs dang ldan pa yis// gzung dang zlog pas dbang bskur te// bde chen thig le khyab 'gyur na// ye shes snying po rang gnas pa// ji
bzhin gsal bar snang bar 'gyur// snying po'i rnal mas bcing bar bya// bde chen 'phel zhing rig pa nyid// zhi ba skye 'gag med pa thob// bstan na bar chad med pa yis// nges pa'i don la 'jug par

bya// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can// don dam ma skyes 'jig pa med// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// stong ba rgyas btab rig par bya// ye shes sgyu 'phrul rang bzhin can// thig le bden gnyis

dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i don la thim par bya// mi g.yo brtan pa'i dbang thob nas// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'o// a ho// gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud las// thabs
dang shes rab rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de// ye shes dbab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba 'od/ bskul ba'i thabs chen kun 'dus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi lam las byung// de nas ma lus khyab pa'i 'od// bde chen snying po bstim

pa las// lus kun bde rgyas 'gyur nas// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang// 'phar ba sgra brtag byung na brtag// tsa phug khyab cing stong 'gyur na// brtan pa glong pas the tsom med// bcu gnyis bcu drug bco lnga
dang// bco brgyad nyi shu lnga yi bar// ye shes dbab pa'i sa bon can// phyin chad dngos grub yal ba yin// dngos grub gnyis med sku gsung thugs// ma lus dri med dag pa la// dngos po log pa'i kun

brtags kyis// gzung dang 'dzin par zhen pa'i phyir// gang yang de dag mkhyen mi 'gyur// de dag legs par bstan pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba lhun grub pa// zab mo dbang gsum khyad par gyis// rang byung
gtan la 'beb par bya// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// de bzhin dbu ma 'ang ma yin te// gzhi tsa med pa'i sems nyid de// mtshan nyid gsum ldan nyams su blang// bsnyen sgrub dgos 'brel bzhir ldan
nas// dag pa rnam gsum goms pa yis// 'brel ba'i ye shes bsgrub par bya// steng dang 'og las phye ba yin// rang rig gsang ba'i mtshan nyid dang// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin can// rdzogs dang

rdzogs chen rang bzhin brtag// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rtogs 'dod pas// bla ma'i lung dang man ngag dang// dbang dang thabs kyi khyad par dang// rgyu ba'i rlung la mkhas par bya// de dag don la mi mkhas shing// tshad

ma bzhi dang mi ldan par// rang rig gom pa med pa yis// srid pa'i sa bon mtshams sbyor nas// nyon mongs lnga yi bdag po 'gyur// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// ye shes dkyil 'khor zhing du dag/ snyigs
ma ye shes 'od 'bar nas// thabs dang shes rab mnyam bar gnas// srid gsum thig le khyab pa'i phyir// chos dbyings sku gsum sku gsung thugs// skad ldan rnams la bstan par bya// a ho// gsang ba'i

tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po rgyud las// dbab pa dang ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos// lhun gyis grub pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa'i yid// zad med bstan pa ye shes las// lhun grub dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'byung// phyi nang gsang
ba las phyung ba'i// bsnyen sgrub bzhi yi rim pa yis// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las// 'phrul ba'i drwa ba cir yang snang// rang byung rig pa'i 'khor lo la// sku gsung thugs kun rdzogs par
gnas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i mthus// ma chags thabs chen rdogs par ldan// khyab pa a yi rang bzhin la// ting 'dzin 'phen pas mtshams sbyar te// dga' dang bde ba chen po yis// nam mkha'i

ye shes cir yang gsal// dwangs ma ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin can// 'bras bu lhun grub rdzogs par ldan// r+g+gu ba rlung gi 'phar la gnas// snying po lam chen mtshams sbyar te// dwangs

ma rnyigs mar phye byas te// dwangs ma'i ye shes 'od du 'bar// rgyu ba ye shes tshul dang mthun// gsang ba'i rtog pa gang snang ba ye shes chen po lhun gyi grub// kun 'byung sgyu 'phrul zab mo'i dbyings// ye shes
'byung gnas mu mtha' med// rdzogs pa'i thig le rang bzhin dag/ steng dang 'og dang gang byung ba// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med lam// khyab pa a yi rang bzhin te// rin chen 'bar ba'i khong na

gnas// rin chen 'phrul gyi thabs ldan pas// shel gyi sbra gur grangs sbyor ba// ring po thung ngu gang yin pa// yi ge de nyid mtshams sbyar ba'i// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ye shes lhun gyi grub par
nges// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// brten pa las kyi khyad par las// thig le ye shes rdzogs par gsal// dug 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin// rgyu ba gnyis dang bzhir shes pas// ye shes
brgyad dang bcu drug dang// yang dag ye shes bzhar shes bya// thabs dang shes rab goms pa yis// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang// dug chen sman du gyur pa ltar// thabs la mkhas pas shes pa

yin// lhun grub ye shes sbyor mkhas pas// 'khor ba ma spangs zhing du dag/ aho// gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud las// lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa des// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug// gnyis med tshul du
bzhugs pa ste// thabs dang rkyen la rag las pas// de dag gnyis su snang ba yin// sku bzhi 'khor lo rang bzhin can// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// thabs kyis shes rab las sbyor ba// a li 'phreng

ba'i bdag nyid can// ka li gnas pa'ang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas kha sbyor snying po las// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu yongs kyis 'byung// chod nyid ye shes yon tan tsa// rang rgyud tsa ba'i yan lag brgyad// sa bon
drug dang snying po gsum// 'od la snod bcud tshul du gnas// ma rtog 'khor ba'i sa bon te// rtogs pas ye shes gnyis su med// sa bon drug dang snyigs ma dag/ byin rlabs ye shes 'od du
'bar// snying po dwangs mar byin brlabs nas// thig le rang bzhin med par thim// g.yo zhing 'phar bar gyur nas glod// gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi dngos// yon tan rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can// thabs
dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin rgyud// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// dwangs ma lnga 'dus kun gyi gtso// mi shig thig le bam dbyibs bdag/ rang byung bde ba gsal byed pa// thabs dang bcas pas bstan
par gces// lnga 'dus drug bdag brgyad dkyil bzhugs// dri med mkha' ltar rnam par dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag/ thabs bral rnams la rgyas btab kyang// skal ldan thabs chen rnams kyi
rtogs// bde skyong rin chen 'bar ba'i gnas/ ma lus khyab pa'i snyong po can// spri bsdus thig le kun gyi gnas// drug cu tsa bzhi 'dab ma la// ka li gsang ba'i bdag nyid can// tsa gsum 'dus pa'i yan

lag bdag/ rdo rje nu ma'i snying por 'brel// sku gsum rnam par rdzogs pa'i dbyings// nyi ma rkyen dang bral ba ltar// lus can kun gyis gsang bstodanas// mi mthong bde dang bral ba yin// sa bon rlung gi
bdag nyid de// bshang pa'i lam la rgyas btab bo// gdam ngag 'byed 'dzum sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i rang bzhin rtog par bya// bde chen snying po phrad pa las// bde chen rang byung gsal bar 'gyur// a
ho// gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud las// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mthar phyin pa'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'dibarjod do// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon tan lhun rdzogs bdag nyid de// sangs rgyas sems can kun

dang 'bral// thabs dang ldan dang mi ldan gyis// nus pa'i khyad par so sor snang// nyungs kar tshad ldan rdo rje sems// tse nas tse ru phyin pa yis// 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs par ldan// rdzogs pa'i dbang

dang shes par bya// sa ya bcu gsum ldan pa'i bcud// lus rnams kun la rgyas btab ba// nyungs 'bru lta bu'i gzhal yas su// gzung nas rang byung ldan par bya// byed pa sdom pa'i man ngag gis// gsang ba'i

sems kyi kha lo sgyur// sangs rgyas kun 'byung snying po nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyi grub// gsang ba bde mchog 'og min du// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal btab la// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus
pa// bde ba chen po brtag par bya// gsang ba'i thig le zab mo'i dbyings// che bas rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal// thabs dang 'brel pas thig le che// ma lus gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor ro// bde chen yum gyi dkyil 'khor la// 'byung 'jug med par bstan 'gyur nas// ma lus rang rig gzugs su snang// 'bras bu rang rig rdzogs par rol// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i rgyas pa na// 'phel
'grib bral ba'i ye shes de// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ khams lnga ye shes rdzogs par gsal// sems lnga pha rol phyin bcu dang// lam lnga kun rdzogs bar chad med// 'jug dang zlog dang bstan pa'i
sems// 'jug pa'i rim pa gsal bar bya// gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku// bam gyi thig le khyab pa'i gnas// tsa yi thig le gcig la 'dus// yang dang yang du bstan pa las// ye shes dkyil 'khor sgyu
'phrul che// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// man ngag mchog la sbyor ba'i tshe// grub par nges te the tsom med/ khams gsum gsang ba'i longs spyodardzogs// rab tu bstan pa'i thig le yis// chos
rnams kun la khyab gnas pa// thabs bral rnams la rgyas btab pa// thabs dang bcas pas yongs su shes// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i yid// spang med blang med sangs rgyas zhing// lhun gyi grub pa'i
dkyil 'khor la// rnal 'byor chen pos btson par bya// dpag med 'og min bde chen du// thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas pas// yon tan chen por bsngags pa yin// rtog pa nyid las 'bras bu
rdzogs// rang byung 'khor lo man+Ta la// sa bcu dbang phyug lhun grub nas// de nas gnyis la goms sbyababs// skad cig gcig la rdzogs sangs rgyas// sku lnga kun rdzogs dbyer med do// zhes gsungs

nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa'i chos kyi dbyings lhun grub stug po'i zhing nyid du bzhugs so// sgyu 'phrul ye shes snying po'i rgyud las// mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu
gsum pa'o//// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes snying po'i gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ tan+t+ra rA dza ma hA ma ya ga r+b+ha ku la nA ma// bod skad du// rgyud kyi rgyal

po chen po sgyu 'phrul snying po bkod pa zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das zhi khro rang snang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi bshad pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sku dang// gsung dang// thugs rdo rje// yon tan 'phrin las su lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ dpal kun tu bzang po rang snang ba'i sku// dkar dmar mthing ka'i
zhal gsum du snang ba rdo rje dang// 'khor lo dang// rin po che g.yas na 'dzin pa// pad+ma dang// dril bu dang// ral gri g.yon na 'dzin pa// rdo rje skyil mo krung gi kun tu bzang mo dang 'du 'bral

med pa de nyid kyi khyad par las// rdo rje 'chang rin po che 'byung ba dang// chos kyi dbang phyug dang// don yod pa'i dpal dang// rnam par snang mdzad dang// sangs rgyas spyan dang// ma ma ki dang// gos dkar

mo dang// sgrol ma dang// chos kyi dbyings ma dang// gzhan yang sa'i snying po dang// nam mkha'i snying po dang// spyan ras gzigs dang// phyag na rdo rje dang// lA s+ya dang// ma le dang// gi rti dang// ni rti
dang// byams pa dang// kun tu bzang po dang// 'jam dpal dang// sgrib pa rnam sel dang// me tog ma dang// spos ma dang// mar me ma dang// dri chab ma dang/ gzhan yang thub pa chen po srid thub 'dzin

dang// thub pa chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang// sha kya seng ge dang// rnam par gnon dang// rnam par snang byed dang chos kyi rgyal po dang gzhan yang stobs po che dang// gshin rje gshed dang// rta mgrin
dang// bdud tsi 'khyil ba dang// lcags kyu dang// zhags pa dang// lcags sgrog dang// dril bu dang// de lta bu 'khor dang bcas par gnas so// de dag kyang bde stong dbyer med pa'i gnas// ye shes lnga'i
rang bzhin 'phrin las lhun gyi grub pa'i gnas na/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa mi 'gog par gnas pa'i tshe na// nam mkha' las chos nyid kyi sgra de yongs su grag go// ma rig rmongs pa sgron mes gsal ba'i

phyir// gnas lugs rang bzhin zhi khro dang// gdul bya sbrul pa'i zhi khro dang// phung po rang rgyud zhi khro dang// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i bdag nyid rnams// thabs la mkhas pas gsung du gsol// ces yongs su

sgrogs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de nyid zhal bzhad pa 'od zer las// stod pa nyid kyi glu 'di grag go// gnas med gnas la 'od gsal ba// rang 'byung ye shes 'od gsal sku/ bya byed med pa'i sku snang

ba// sgyu ma'i mig 'khrul rnam par snang// zag bcas gdos pa'i khung po yang// ma skyes snyingapo chos kyi sku// byung bgrod gnas par gang snang ba// 'bras bu nyid du nges pa'i lam// zhes gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul
dra ba'i snying po bkod pa las// rgyu dang rkyen gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gnas lugs rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang
ni// stong nyid rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// bem stong dngos bral gdol ba dag// rang gi ye shes rang gdangs la// 'od gsal stong pa rnam dag gsal// bde stong kun 'byung zag pa med// snang stong ye shes

snying po'i sku// ma bcos sprol bral byang chub sems// rig stong mtha' brgyad spros dang bral// stong gsal pad+ma skyon bral dang// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can// snang stong rdo rje chos kyi sku// skye

med dam brjid rnam par ldan// stong nyid ma bcos chos kyi sku// mtshan dang dpe byad longs spyod rdzogs// dngos po snang spyod mngon byang chub// snang stong dbyer med rdo rje rgya// ma spangs gang mos de 'dul

sku// ma skyes skye med de bzhin ngang// dgongs pas snang ba brda dang mjal// rig ma sgyu mas go par byed// grag stong dbyer med brag cha 'dra// kun la tshig tshogs rnam par snang// gsal la rtog med don rig
cing// 'byed med shes rab mnyam par gnas// bdag med dngos po so sor gsal// bya ba gang yin mngon du grub// nam mkha' lta bu rab tu rtogs// rgya dang bral ba'i zhing khams dang// spyod yul dpag
dka'i gzhal yas dang// sna tshogs ma spangs ngang gi brgyan// lnga btsegs rang snang dag pa'i gdan// 'od zer phung po blta na sdug/ zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// kun tu ma lus yongs su
gang// 'dod pa'i bsam pa kun dang mjal// mun pa drag pos gnod pa bral// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub gnas// me long nang nas rdo rje rigs// zhe sdang can la khro bar gsal// mnyam nyid dang gnas

pad+ma'i rigs// nga rgya 'dzoms mdzad zhi gnas chu// sor rtog ngang nas pad+ma'i rigs// 'dod chags sreg pa'i lhag mthong me// byang chub ngang gnas las kyi rigs// phrag dog 'du byed 'thor ba'i rlung// chos
dbyings ngang gnas de bzhin rigs// ma rigs mun sel dar rgud stongs// ye shes lnga yi rigs 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas lnga yi gdung du gsal// nyon mongs lnga yi zhi sbyong ba// he ru ka yi phyag rgyar

gsal// chos sku skye med snying po ru// rang bzhin zhi khro lhun gyis grub// dper na nyungs kar mar khyab 'dra// til gang lta bu gang gnas pa// gang gi gang mthong dar snang ba// snang gsal nam mkha' shar ba

la// re re zhing la re re snang// gcig las tha dad snang bar zad// 'byung rgyu lin par der snang ngo// zhes brjod do// chos thams cad rang bzhin gnas lugs kyi zhi khro gsal bar 'gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
snying po bkod pa las// gzhi dang rang bzhin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya la snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// rnam dag phung po

lnga 'chang ba// zag bcas rgyu la 'bras bu gnas// mi bskyodardo rje'i phyag rgya ni// yul la spyod pas sangs rgyas mig// sa snying sgeg mo rdo rje bran// kun bzang me tog mthing ka'i r-igs// gshen rje lcags kyu
'dzin pa yum// zhe sdang khong khro'i thub pa gnyis// rang gi gdangs la rigs su grub// yon tan rin chen ma ma ki// nam mkha'i snying po 'phreng ba ma// kun bzang spos me stobs po che// zhags pa
'ching mdzad nga rgyal rigs// yi dwags 'dul byed gser gyi mdog// snang ba gos dkar spyan ras gzigs// glu ma 'jam dpal mar me ma// sha kya seng ge rang gi rigs// le brgan pad+ma ra ga can// don
grub dam tshig sgron ma che// phyag na rdo rje gar mkhan ma// sgrib pa rnams sel dri chab ma// phrag dog can las ljang khu 'phro// snang mdzad dbyings ma gti mug 'dul// kun bzang yid chos dkar gsal

zhing// kun la rigs bdag mi 'gyur mdog// dbang po rnam shes yul dang bcas// bzhi bcu tsa gnyis ngo bo ni// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma

dkar po rdo rje 'dzin// me long rin chen 'phreng ba 'dren// pi wang gar bsgyur dung du gsal// mun nang klung shing po ti chos// rin chen snye ma ut+pal// spos dang me tog mar me dri// thod dbyug rdo rje thod sbrul

'dzin// rgya gram ban d+ha lca kyu zhags// lcags sgrogs dril bu las bzhi rgya// pi wang sreg pas go mtshon sgrom// me chu po ti mnyam gzhag 'phro// tsa btsegs gsum dang gnyis rkyang pa// snang ba phye na snang ba
ste// dud dang ku mu nyi zla 'dra// bai DU r+ya dang kar ka ri// le brgan gser sbyangs in+Ta ni// gnyis las gnyis 'dzin drug na drug/ rigs las mi 'da' chaul par 'dzin// ma bcos mi 'da' ma nges
'brel// ma skyes ma 'gags yul mtshon pa// mtshan ma nye bar brtags pa dang// zin mdzad mi bskyod 'dul dbang phyir// mtha' yas tha dad dam par 'brel// las su 'brel bas dgongs pa dang// rdo rje
pad+ma mkha' 'gro yis// skyil klung rang bzhin dang du gnas// babs bzhon bzhengs thabs dor thabs bgrad// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon gsal 'tsher// lhun sdug gzi brjid 'bar ba dang// sku dang
gsung thugs yon tan las// mtshan dang dpe byad sprad kyis brgyan// ting 'dzin tsol bas gang dag pa// rtog pa las mtha' lta ba dang// 'tsho ba dran pas bkra shis 'khyil/ chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa
dang// dga' ba shin tu sbyang ba dang// ting 'dzin dran pa btang snyoms dang// rtson 'grus mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan// bzhugs bzhengs gshegs gzigs 'khug pa dang/ dgongs bstan rten 'byor bdud pa

dang// lcam me ma le lhan ne ba// sa le zhi ba ngang tshul can// phyi nang med par gsal na ngan// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad cing// sa yi khyab par kun bgrod nas// yon tan che ba bcom nas gnas// zhes
brjod pas// 'jig rten drug tu sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud zhi bar snang ngo// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba snying po bkod pa las// chos nyid bzhi ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis drag po rtogs 'joms kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing// gdug pa srid gsum 'dul ba la// nga rgyal chen po bstan pa'i phyir// sgyu

'phrul dra ba'i khro bo snang// rdo rje khros pa khrag 'thung mthing// khro mo dbyings phyug 'du 'bral med// dkar dmar zhal du nyon mongs 'dren// tse dgu tse lnga sti ra dang// dril bu dung dmar 'jig rten

'chang// shes rab 'khyud pas chags pa stobs// sangs rgyas khrag 'thung khro mo 'khril// dkar ser smug nag gti mug 'dren// 'khor lo rdo rje sta ri dang// dril bu dung dmar tri shul 'chang// rin chen khrag

'thung khro mo 'khril// sngo dmar ser nag nga rgyal gsol// rin chen rdo rje sti ra dang// dril bu dung dmar dgra sta rol// pad+ma khrag 'thung 'dod chags 'joms// khro mo dbyings phyug nyer gnas pa'i// dkar ser

dmar nag brjid pa la/ pad+ma rdo rje sti ra dang// dril bu dung dmar rnge'u chung can/ las rab sgra 'thung yum dngasbyor// dkar dmar ljang nag 'bar ba la// rgya gram rdo rje sti ra dang// dril bu dung dmar thong

gshel rol// stag gzig dom dang ma he dang/ khyu mchog dregs pa gnon pa'i steng// 'gying stabs mdzes pas tshar gcod mdzad// ka ri tse ri bra mo ha// pe ta li dang pu ka si// ka sma ri dang sman sha ni// tsan+da

li ste ma mo tsho// sngo ser dmar dang nag pa dang// dkar ser ljang khu mthing ka dang// ser skya lus kyi mdog 'dzin cing/ ban+d+ha byis dbyag mda' gzhur bcas/// kha T+wAM chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin// rdo rje bying

sha byis rgyus 'dren// dung dmar rdo rje byis snying za// mchog gi mgo lus 'brel bar mdzad// seng ge wa sbyang rta gdong dam// bya rgod dkang ka bya rog dang// 'ug gdong 'jigs pa'i mgo brnyan sbrul// dkar

dmar ser ljang mthing ka dang// sna tshogs lus su gnas pa ste// kha na ro 'dzin zhing gnas blta// byis pa'i khong bldag gri khug 'bral// zangs gri ban+d+ha dmar gyi bkang// zhing khrag khur ba nar skye'i

mdog// kha na ro thogs ban+d+ha gri// rdo rje lcags kyu ban+d+ha 'dzin// rta yi mgo can lcags kyu dkar// phag gi gdong pa zhags pa bser// sbre gdong lcags sgrog dmar mo dred// sbyang gdong dril bu ljang nag

khro// kun kyang zhing gi gdan la bzhugs// slas dang byin mo bran mo rnams// srin mo tshangs ma lha chen mo// gtogs 'dod gzhon nu rgya byin ma// rdo rje bdud tsi zla ba mo// pe cin sin mo za byed ma// dga' ba
stobs chen rdo rje mo// 'dod pa nor bsrung rlung lha mo// gsod byed me mo phag mo dang// rgan byed sna chad chu lha mo// nag mo ser mo dmar ljang mo// phyi yi mkha' 'gro rang rgyud ma// nang gi mkha'

'gro rang rgyud ston// gsang ba'i sbrul pa mgo brnyan ma// bka' rtags rdo rje rang rtags 'chang// zhing kyang rang gi gdan la bzhugs// dpal gyi pham phabs lhag ma len// gdug pas phye nas snang ba'o// ri bo

rgya bcu tsa gcig dag/ snang bar ston pa bdag nyid ni// ming mtshan brda dang tha snyad dang// yod med the tsom nges pa 'jog// sbyor pa 'di dgu 'gyur ba ni// sbyor zhen dngos gzhi skyed pa dang// rkyen las
mtshan ma mngon pa dang// sbyor pa rtags kyi mtshan ma bcu// mi rtogs ma rmongs mo 'gog pas// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// mi dmigs ma grub ma skyes pas// gzhi lam 'bras bu rang sar
gnas// dgu spyod rang bzhin gcig pa yis// khro ba drag shul dam rdzas len// gang dang gang las gang phyir gang// ngang shug bcas dang bcos par 'gyur// yul gnas las dang 'bras bu dang// rgyu dang
'bras bu dang phyir 'gyur bas// rgyu gnas thabs las 'bras bu'o// rdzings bshig za dang stobs pa dang// sdud dang bde dang snang ba dang// mtha' yas thogs med mi bskyod las// mi 'da' rol pa che ba
ni// gdul bya rang bzhin shes rab thabs// thams cad thugs rje dam pa dang// 'phrin las ye shes chos nyid dgongs// grub pa dang ni mdzad pa ste// ma skyes ma rmongs mi g.yo ba// ma 'gag ma chags ma
bcings dang// mi bskyod pa dang mi thogs pa// ma lus mi 'grod grub pa'o// gdul bya gzigs dang sprul pa 'gyed// ci gsol gsan dang mgon skyabs dang// dug chen zad dang thig chen ston// skye zhing

gcod dang rgyu drug 'don// mtha' drug rdzogs dang las bzhis sgrol// gnyen pa 'gran zla med pa dang// khyad 'phags che btsan gcig pu dang// 'tsham ngam bslab dang rmad du 'byung// thabs mang ma phab mnga'

yang rdzogs// kun la rgyal dang yong mi nus// sku gsung thugs dang mthu yi rngom// ri bo gar thabs khyad 'byung stobs// ci ltar snang bas cir yang 'grub// zil gyis gnon pas 'tsham rngam tsheg/ zhal dang

ljags dang tshems dang gsung// gang du rngubs pas cir yang 'gyur// yongs su gcod pas go bas sgrogs// nam mkha'i skar tshogs rgya mtsho'i rlabs// tsi shing nags tshal gar gyi 'phreng// dgongs pas 'phrin

las de tshul dang// yon tan sa gzhi thugs rje'i dpe// 'byung bdud dur khrod sba bkong pa// bla na med pa cir yang 'grub// gnas dang gnon pa zhing sbyor kyi/ khyad par tshul du de ltar snang// sku gsung thugs
yon 'phrin las ni// seng ge 'bum gzugs 'brug stong ldir// nam mkha'i gtos chen nor bu rin chen dang// 'byung ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// sku chen yan lag rags pa dang// grangs

mang rkyen dang 'tsham pa dang// bkur 'os gtso bor mthong ba dang// khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pa dang// gdangs chen stong gsum gang ba dang// tshig myur the tsom gcod pa dang// don dam nye tsher gcod pa
dang/ khyad par yon tan mthong ba dang/ yang la re dogs med pa dang// gsal bas mtha' gnyis spangs pa dang// thugs rje thugs dam rdzogs pa dang// ma smos thabs kyisa'adul ba dang// med pa zad mi
shes pa dang// gcig la 'dod dgur ston pa dang// gnod sbyor phan par mdzad pa dang// thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos dang// mi snyems nyams bag rol ba dang// 'khor ba yun ring mi snyem dang// mgon
skyabs rgyun du mdzad pa dang// dgongs don lhun gyi grub pa dang// chos rgyal snyems pa mi mnga' dang// nyams bag chen po rol pa dang// gang gi dpung gis mi snyel dang// yun gyi don srid snyems pa

dang// stobs kyis gzhan gang gnon pa dang// rdzu 'phrul mi gnas bskyed pa dang// ma zid pa yi mdzod mar 'dang// skye bo yo byad mos pa dang// rdzu 'phrul ches dang ye shes dang// sems tsho las dang smon

lam dang// mnyam nyid sku dang thugs thigs dang// gsung dang 'brel ba 'phrin las brlabs// sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs dang// gshe dang bzhad dang snying rje dang// rngam dang ngo mtshar zhi ba dang// byams pa'i

blo dang snying rje'i gros// dga' ba'i thabs dang gtang snyoms mod// snying rje chos nyid mi 'byed pa// grub pa ma spang ma g.yos pa// smon lam sprul pa mi gtong ba// ma chags pa yi stobs rnams rdzogs// chos

nyid ye shes thugs rje dang// sbrulapa'i rdzu 'phrul mi gnas bskyod// 'dod pa skong dang mi bzad 'byung// mun bsel dang rgyun mi'achad// ces brjod pas// thams cad khro bo'i phyag rgyar gsal lo// sgyu 'phrul
dra ba'i snying po bkod pa las// rtog 'joms khro bo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang rgyud yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te 'di gsungs so// sems can tsa ba med pa

ni// skye rgyu med pa'i skye ba can// spang la sha mo rdol ba 'dra// sgyu ma'i lus po khong steng ni// snying po med pa'i pags pa can// shing shing sdong po'i 'bras bu 'dra// ma rig rang nas 'byung ba ni// me long dag la

g.ya' gnas 'dra// rnam rtog 'tshol kro byed pa dang// khyi kun khyim du zhugs pa 'dra// bag chags snod du sogs pa ni// rgyal po bang mdzod kha phye 'dra// rkyen ngan 'bras bu ngan pa ni// bza' rgyu med pa'i
khyim thab 'dra// sangs rgyas 'khor bar lhung na ni// bya rgod gshog pa chag pa 'dra// sems can sangs rgyas rgyur gnas pa// til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa 'dra// rang rig bag chags sgrib pa

ni// nyi ma sprin gyi khebs pa 'dra// rnam rtog rkun bur ldang ba ni// nam mkha'i ngang nas sprin byung 'dra// 'jig rten brtan g.yo dngos po kun// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i
dkyil 'khor gyis// srid gsum sems can thams cad la/ srog shing gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi// brgyad dang drug tu ldan par gnas// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// la la na dang re sa na/// a
wa d+hu ti'i mnyam gnas pa// dri chu khrag dang dkyus par gnas// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'// g.yas dang g.yon dang dbus na gnas// skyes bu bud med gnyis gnas dang// khug pa kha brgyad har ba
ste// pad can dung can ri mo can// ban glang can dang lcug phran can// gdong gcig mi reg 'phyar bar gnas// ro ma rkyang ma kun 'dar ma// a li ka li mnyam gnas dang// tha dad yod pas dam rdzas

rgyu// spyi bo mgrin pa snying dkar dang// lte ba lte 'og 'gro med dang// zhal dang phrad pa gnas pa ni// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang// de nyid longs spyod chos dang ni// sbrul pa mes dang rlung dang bi// steng nas
sor dang 'og nas sor// kum la dbyangs dang gsal byed khyab// 'bru brgyad drug pa sngags kyi mda'// a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha// dga' bzhi tshogs pa rnam bzhi tshogs pa yis// 'bebs par byed pa ye

shes ro// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rinachen smugapo gur khyim na// chos nyid ye shes rang rgyud dang// yon tan bzhi las brgyad du gnas// 'od dbyibs tshul dang snying po dang// sa bon yid dang

shes par bya// chos nyid lhan cig dud 'gro zlum// kun bzhi oM gyi snying por ldan// pu tri dngul chu 'jon mar tsi// za 'og gur khyim nang na bkra// ye shes lha mo gru bzhi yi// a nri hUM ni bde chen thugs// shes

sgo le brgan brgyud pa 'dra// yon tan dmyal ba yi dwags aM// zla khams gsung gi rang bzhin yin// dri du nyon mongs yid dang bcas// dmigs sgyu tsa skya zil chags pa// zang zhun rwa gan tsi song 'dra// rang
rgyud dmar nag o gshol dbyibs// de ni blo dbug smod yin te// shes pa gsum la snyoms par 'gebs// drag po ljang nag sgo lnga'i rten// mdom dud ye shes snying po'i tsa// de dbus ye shes snying po'i

sku// dar skud 'tshal khu gser gyi blangs// nyi ma me long ngar dag ni// 'byung ba bzhi yi dwangs ma ste// bde ba'i dngas ma nam mkha'i khams// 'phrin las bzhi dang bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// dbu rgyan cod pan 'phreng

ba dang// go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang// gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang// snying po lnga yi dbang lnga dang// nyan dang 'chad dang sgom sgrub dang// 'phrin las rdo rje rgyal po dang// gsang ba
chen po bde chen po// lta ba dang ni sbyor pa dang// sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa dang// ting 'dzin rol ba'i rgyur gnas pa// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi
yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs// dbang pos yul dus rig pa rnams// kun tu bzang po dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta
zhing// ka ra na bcings chos bdun gyis// nam mkha'i ba bzhos ye shes ni/ snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes dang mchod par dbul// zag pa med pa'i bsod
nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang pa// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ 'gro ba zhing 'gyur mtha' yas 'dren// 'das pa'i glong nas mun pa mkhyen// mun pa'i gling nas 'das pa shes// rang
rig ye shes gdangs la bzhugs// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i snying po bkod pa las// man ngag dra ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa brda'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te 'di

gsungs so// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// brten dang 'byug 'jug gnas sbyod dang// srog shing dbang po myong ba dang// za byed kun tu rgyu ba dang// klu dang rul sbal rtsangs pa dang// lha sbyin dang ni

gzhu las rgyal// tsan+d+ha li ni lus kyi mchog/ rdo rje hU~M gi 'dug tshul ni// gling bzhi ri rab logs la bsdu// chu 'khor steng na me 'khor mnan// rlung gis 'khor lo gtsag cing spos// tsan dmar rgya mtsho'i gting
nas gnas// me lce ri rab lo gsal spar// du ba nam mkha'i dbyings su gnas// 'dab ma thal ba bshad lam bor// mi gdon 'bar bas mkha' la khyab// klad dkar mtsho rlabs srub shing gis// rlung dang

mkhris pa bad kan sbyar// rkyal pa kha bcing li ri bcud// log gnon rdo rje mda' gzhu brdeg/ pho mo ma ning rlung gnas pa// drag po nad kyi gnad gcod pa// keng rus 'dzin pa'i lus kyi ni// phyi dang nang gi
don kun 'dzoms// skyug dang sbrug pa'i bcud phur gyis// sangs rgyas sems can 'dres par byed// oM gyis 'khor lo gnas la dbab// oM gyis gsung gi rol par bya// swa ni 'dod pa ster ba'i rgya// ha yis
mi gnas gnas nas gdon// sgyu 'phrul snying po bkod pa las// drag po sbar ba'i 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snang ba'i bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
la bzhugs te 'di gsungs so// stong nyid don dam rgyu yi mchog/ ma 'gag kun rdzob 'bras bu shar// ji snyid skyed pa'i rgyu mchog ni// ma skyes rig par rang 'byung sku// kun rdzob sna tshogs sgyu ma'i

mchog/ don dam stong nyid 'bras bu 'byung// dper na til mar khyab pa 'dra// ma bcos yongs kyis 'od gsal ba// stong nyid bskyed pa'i rgyu mchog ni// stong nyid snying po bla na med// yid bzhin rin chen phung
por gnas// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'o// ma rtog pa dang log par rtog/ phyogs rtog yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang// rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// lnga dang gnyis
dang gcig la bgrod// gsum gyi spyod yul shes par bya// de shes na ni ye shes te// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong
ba// dbang bskur mchog gi dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor

bas// thugs rje'i byin rlabs yongs kyi 'byung// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med pa dkyil 'khor spyod// sgyu 'phrul snying po bkod pa las// gzhi
lam 'bras bur bsdus pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// de nas 'khor thams cad dgyes te bstod pa// e ma'o 'dren pa mchog la dga'// stong gsal chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag ye shes thugs la phyag
'tshal lo// grag stong chos kyi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba dngos med gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyen gsal mnyam pa'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// don yod gnas pa'i don la phyag 'tshal
lo// zhes brjod pas nyid la nyid dgyes te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa chen po chos dbyings ni 'gyur ba med pas smra bsam las grol te// rdzu 'phrul snying po bkod pa las// bstod pas
mnyes pa chen po ste le'u brgyad pa'o// rdzogs sau//
rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po rtsa ba'i rgyud de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du/ badzra gu h+ya gar+b+ha mu la tan+t+ra da he shan/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po rtsa ba'i rgyud de kho na nyid nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad thos pa'i dus gcig na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad
dang 'grogs nas/ nyid dang dbyer med pa rnams kyis// nyid la mchod pas kun tu bzang po nyid dges te/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas/ gzhal
med khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ rab tu rgyas pa/ mtha' dang dbus med par kun tu khyab cing/ 'od zer sgrib pa med bar
rang byung ba la bzhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs dang// 'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam
yin pas// nges pa med par yang dag gsungs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang// ji snyed brtan g.yo la sogs pa// sgyu ma mig yor tshul
yin te// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing// sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa// de dang gnyis med dbyings su sbyor// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid
de// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje'i mchog/ ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang// yang dag don gyi snying po ni// gang
nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te// de ni ma nor lam yin par// byang chub sems kyis rab tu bsdus// de bzhin nyid
kyi dbyings nyid ni// gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du med// gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'gro// byin brlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog don bsdus gsung rab bzhi

bcu gnyis// de las lhag pa'i don smra ba// de ni rnam dag lam min te// rang blos bsam pa'i 'khrul pa yin// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// tshad bzhi phab pa'i don
yin te// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing// 'bru lngar 'dus pa'i thabs chen te// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// bya ba byed la byas pa med// zad pa'i dus med ye shes te// bum pa bzang dang yid
bzhin mdzod// za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// lha srin la sogs yod pa yi// nor 'dra rin chen ma yin te// bo d+hi'i dkor ni

rin po che// sku gsung mi zad par ldan pa'i// rgyan gyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// dang po'i don rtogs mtha' mi gtong// chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin du// spyod yul kun tu tshad
dpag med// rang gi byang chub sems shes na// dngos grub mchog ni gzhan na med// phyogs bcu dus bzhi snod bcud kun// byang chub sems su 'dus rtogs na// sku gsung mi zad par ldan

pa'i// rgyan gyi 'khor lo thig ler 'khor// stong smon rgya chad 'od gsal bar// rin chen tshogs kyis brgyan pa yin// rang byung nyi zla pad rin che// brtsegs nas rgyal ba'i gdan nyid la// mnyam rdzogs lhun la

rol ba'i phyir// rtog med byang chub rdo rje'i skus// nga dang bdag med dbyings mkhyen pas// mi gnas nyam nyid ngang la spyod/ ces nyid la nyid kyis gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu 'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba
las/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med par ston pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi nges pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa dang/ thams cad byang chub sems su 'dus par bstan pa/ gleng
gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa chen pos/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las/ chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan pa'i
phyir// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod// yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni// bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te// nga dang bdag med dkyil 'khor las// nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin
rin chen gsal 'bar bar// de las byung nas slar yang thim// a thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings// mi 'gag thig le'i mchog nyid las// sku lnga'i yig 'bru lnga po kun// thams cad yum gyur dbyings
su thim// slar 'dus phyag rgya 'od 'bar ba// gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por gyur// byang chub sems su thim pa las// kun la khyab cing mi gnas shing/ kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin// yon tan mchog

gi snying po ni// rtog ge'i spyod yul yong ma yin// zab cing rgya che rab sbyangs pa'i// skal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// sna tshogs
'jig rten khams g.yo dang// rgyal ba mngon 'byung thams cad kun// nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na'ang med// dus gsum bde gshegs nyid mi mnga'// sngon gyi bde

gshegs thugs chud pa'i// nam mkha'i ngang du thams cad thim// thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid pas// dbyings la dbyings kyis rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings gnyis sbyor ba ni// byang chub rdo rje'i thig
le yin// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub pa// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhas yas kyis// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma byas gang
yang med// rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// log par mthong ba'i mu stegs dang// gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// rtogs dang ma rtogs las byung
ba'i// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kyis// de la bsad cing gzung du med// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas// de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis// de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni// rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus
gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par 'gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor bsdus// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ro// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la
bzhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor bsam yas kun// rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim// thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus// ho/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor
ni// dus bzhi mnyam nyid mchog gi yul// rang rig dag pa gsang ba'i mkha'// kun 'byung snying po bdag med pa// ye shes rang rig mkha' ltar gsal// rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas snying po las// chos sku
brjod pa gud na med// rnam rtog nyid ni gdags pa'i chos// rnam par rtog dang mi rtog las// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba med// snod bcud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ byang chub chen po rgyal sras
lam// bzhi bcu dag pa'i rtsa gnyis rdzogs// des ni phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsdus// thams cad ming tsam a la thim// a sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa de kun yum gyi
dbyings su 'dus pa gsang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa chen po de/ ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod

do// lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang// 'bru lngar gnas pa'i byang chub ste// oM dang muM du 'brel ba yi// byang chub rdo rje dril las 'byung// spyir ni brjod pa thams cad kyang// kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a// skye
'jig nyid ni yi ge lnga// de ni byang chub sems yin te// gnyis med byang chub mchog 'byung ba// gsum shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa// zad med rin chen gter yin te// mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzod

spags// e las 'phros shing ar 'dus pa// gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin 'byung ba// kun la khyab cing sna tshogs sman// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yi/ khong nas bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// yon tan mi zad gter du gyur// ho/ ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog gi dbyings// dbyings las mi gzhan ye shes
rab// dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul// snang byed nyid na bya byed med// mi gnas gnas pa'i ye shes nyid// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub
kyi// gnyis min thabs shes mnyam par gnas// dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs pas// de yi ngo bor bsgom byas shing// mnyam pa rnam bzhi'i don rtogs pas// de ni sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas// rgyu
'bras dbyer med lhun grub pa// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ni 'dus// ye shes lnga ni rdzogs pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyis thams cad bsdus// chags med bzhi yi lam nas ni// skye 'gag med pa'i thig ler
'jug/ kun rdzogs spyod yul maN+Dal la// 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan// thams cad rang rig rgyal po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po dag mnyam pa'i// khro bo khro mor rnam par sbyor// chos rnams

rang bzhin nyid kyis stong// nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yin// dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam// phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste// ma rig pa ni
ye shes la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/ thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas// a ho/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// nges don bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus// bsdus pa'i don nyid 'bru
lngar bsdus// lnga po 'bru gsum nang du bsdus// gsum po yi ge ar 'dus te// a nyid ma skyes dbyings su thim// a ho/ stong nyid mi dmigs brjod mi lang// mi gnas de bzhin nyid kyang ni// tshad dpag
med de bsam mi khyab// skye med dbyings kyis kun la khyab// ma 'gags byang chub sems nyid ni// dngos po med pas skye 'jig med// 'gro med 'ong med mig gnas pa'i// thugs rje'i byin brlabs rnam par

'phro// zhes nyid la nyid kyis gsungs so// dbyings dag pa las dbyings kyi sku phyag rgyar gsal ba ngo mtshar che nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di skad brjod do// dbyings la thabs kyi dbyings phyung bas// sku yi phyag
rgya chen por gsal// thabs las dbyings phyung yum gyi rgya// dbyings dang ye shes 'byor pas na// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor yas// a ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don/ dngos po
med pa'i sku phyag rgya thim pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen pos/ 'gro ba thams cad la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang/ 'gro ba
rnams kyang rigs rnam pa drug tu bshad do// de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yod// dper nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyang kun la khyab kyang/ mngon
par thar pa de'i don nam rtogs na/ me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste/ ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so// zhes gsungs nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen

po rdo rje thogs pas ched du brjod pa 'di skad brjod do// mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal pos ni// rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun 'bab ltar// bla med snying po rgya mtsho lta bu 'dir// rnam thar theg pa bsam
yas ma lus bsdus// a ho/ mi dmigs bdag med don rtogs pha rol phyin// sa bcur kun rdzogs bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis kyis rab
tu thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten 'brel ma brlan shes pa'i phyir// dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/ dge shes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs// byang chub sar 'gro rdzu 'phrul khol bur

ston// bden bzhi'i don rtogs rab tu spong pa yi// ye shes bcu drug chas sbyangs zhi ba yi// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni// nyon mongs sa rnams bzhi ba'i sa ru 'gro// dge bcu spyod cing mi dge

spong byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mir ni skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no// theg pa gang du'ang bstan par ma nges pa'i// nges med theg pa de yi
skye gnas na// skye gnas smin pa med par rgyal bas gsungs// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab gyur kyang// rang gis rtogs dang skal dang mi ldan na// ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di

ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa'i phyir// bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs 'dra yang// so so rang rig blo la snang bar zad// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba
yang// 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med// rang rig mi dmigs goms byas bla med mchog/ log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na// dngos med
dbyings las rtog pa sna tshogs 'char// yang dag shes pa'i rang rig bla med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong// theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni// ngan song gnas nyid 'og
min dga' ldan gnas// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i dbyings khyab na// nyi zla gza' skar mtshan mo glog 'gyu dang// gzha' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs 'gyur yang// nam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyur
cing nyams pa med// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas nas// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las rmad byung dang// 'jig rten 'di yi chos rnams sna tshogs dang// 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal rnam ma cir snang
yang// de bzhin nyid la zhu zhing bri ba med// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod cing kun la khyab pa dang/ rigs brgyad so sor phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi
pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang/ rdo rje thogs pa dges pa chen po nyid kyi 'khor du bsdu ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi
ma lus par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi bzhugs gnas/ gzhal med khang ni tshad dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'bar bas mtha' dbus med par khyab cing/ 'od zer
sgrib pa med pa rang 'byung ba la bzhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sku yi 'od zer 'phro ba tshad dpag med/ kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i// srid gsum yongs dag mnyam
sbyor spyod yul te// mtshan 'dzin 'das pa'i mchog gi rgyu las byung// dbang sgyur de bzhin gshegs pa dges chen de// shin tu rnam dag 'og min rgyas pa na// rang byung nyi zla pad rin gdan la
bzhugs// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'od dang// 'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bskur dbang phyug dang// gzhan yang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams 'ongs kun// bdud rtsi ro yis dka' bde 'grub

mdzad de// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad nas// 'das dang ma 'das de bzhin nyid du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don byung ba// rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du sgom// stong smon
mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// zad med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po'i lhun la rol par mdzad// bde gshegs
dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa// dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las byung// spyod yul 'phrog med
brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa// mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje
can zhes bya// rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje'i sku// shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus nas// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par thar pa
yis// dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings su mtha' gtugs pa// rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par
'gyur// zhes nyid la nyid brjod de/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gzhal med khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen
pos/ thugs rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// nam mkha' mkha' dkyil dngas pa nas// yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam 'byung ba// sna tshogs 'byung
zhing 'od 'phro 'bar// raM/ srid gsum bsreg pa'i me yin pas// yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar// raM/ dbang po dwangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni// lhan ne lhang nge 'od du

zhu// a/ zhi gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// thugs rje byin brlabs rmad po che// hU~M/ 'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa// 'di ni byang chub mchog tu gsungs// ho/ bzhi po 'joms shing ngan song sbyong// tra Ta/

sman bcud len gyi dug sbyong bzhin// phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag/ bdag med gnyis kyis 'dag par byed// hri/ bsal zhing gzhag par bya ba med// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka
med// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor// oM/ rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// 'byung ba khams rnams dbang bsdus nas// thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su bstim// ma

lus khro bo'i tshogs su gyur// rtog bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa// shes rab yum gyi dbyings su thim// thabs shes gnyis med dbyings gyur pa// chos rnams dbyings kyi khro mor gyur// chos thams cad khro bo

dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang/ rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi mes sbyong ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa chen pos khro bo'i rgyal por spros nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
brjod do// byang chub mchog gi snying po ni// mtshan mas btsal ba ma yin gyis// dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing// rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// drag po gtum po
sgrub pa ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su ling ga gzhag/ mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung// lan gsum lan bdun rtag bsgoms shing// mngon byung zhal ni 'bar byas pas// sngags

bzlas dkyil 'khor lhar gyur nas// ling kha yang nas yang bsdus te/ khro bo'i zhal du bstim par bya// hU~M gis bsdus zhing phaT kyis 'phang// zhal du rang sngags khri 'bum du// rnam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nas
su// yang nas yang du gsal bar bya// 'gro lnga'i sems can thams cad kun// dbang med zhal du thim par gyur// ya man+ta krita lhag par 'jebs// sku mdog dud kha la sogs dang// mche gtsigs khro gnyer
bsnyen pa dang// zhal bgrad phyag rgya 'bar ba'i sku// gang la goms pa bsgom par bya// bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste// mtshan ma bzung nas rang sngags 'don// mngon par dbang pos bltar
yod par// ril bur bsdus nas zhal du mchod// the tshom med par 'grub par nges// dam chos 'jig pa ma rungs pa// gtum po dregs pa nga rgyal can// dpa' bos rab tu bsad pa ni// sems can kun gyi

don gyi mchog/ kun la phan pas las de gyis// ho/ hU~M dang paM dang yo la sogs// 'dren pa'i mchog tu de gsungs so// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa yang// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin du// smon pa'i byang chub lam
du gzhug/ mtshan ma bag chags med par bya// dbyings nas spro zhing a la stim// a ho/ rig pa 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor der// gtum po ma rungs gsad pa ni// skyes bu chen po'i las kyi mchog/ nam mkha'
la ni nam mkha' rol// rdo rje thogs pas thugs brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ shin tu gsang ba'i khro bo nye bar sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ khro bo

'bar ba gtum khro'i tshogs chen por bsgyur nas// 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa ched du brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa yis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus pa// hU~M gyis gzhal yas 'khor
lor sprul// 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na// 'od 'phros 'bar ba'i tshogs chen rnams// gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// rAM/ nyi ma thod sbrul mang po'i gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba

bzhin// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// phaT/ khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar// raM/ khros ba'i me dpung rdo rje 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs pa'ang 'bar// tsakra/ khro bo khro mo tshogs kyis

bskor// gnas dang yul gy-i phyag rgyar mdzes// ha he/ slas dang byin mo bran mo'i tshogs// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// ti ra rgyu ma zhags pa dang// nr-i yi tsit+ta za zhing
rgyug/ shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs su gnas// ral pa mun dza cod pan 'bar/ khro rgyal rdo rje thogs pa ni// phyogs bcu khebs pa'i gshog pa gdengs// rdo rjes gtams pa'i brag ri 'bar// ra~M/ 'khor tshogs

rngam gzugs gnas pa rnams// rdo rje'i gshog gdengs 'bar ba yis// so so'i rang sngags smre sngags shing// sgra skad nga ro drag tu 'don// rang sngags hU~M phaT b+h+yo ru lu/ khro tshogs ma lus bzlums pa
yi// dkyil 'khor kun zhal 'bar ba dang// bdag nyid gnyis su med bsgoms pas// so so'i ring sngags bzlas nas su// rgyud drug sems can thams cad dang// ma rungs gdug pa thams cad kun// dzaHhU~M
baM hos bkug nas su// lan gsum lan bdun zhal du bstim// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas ni// 'byor pa sna tshogs kun gyis mchod// nri yi tshil dang tsha
ba'i mar// dmar gyi argaM rgyun du 'bul// a ho/ stong dang 'bum ni dbul bar bya// yang na lan gsum brgya rtsa brgyad// mchod pa rab tu dbul bar bya// bzlas pa'ang dbul grangs bzhin du shis// nag po
tsher can dug gi shing// gzhan yang bsreg rdzas gdug gsum dang// mnan pa'i cho ga kun gyis bya// ma mkhal khyi la ya mkhal ra'i// bar du ming rus bcug byas nas// bzlas pa'i mtha' mar phyin pa

dang// bdag gi 'og tu bcug nas ni// rdo rje can gyi sngags bzlas nas// mnan pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gro/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thugs rje'i rol pa spyir bstan pa'i hoM/ hoM thams cad 'dir 'dus pa'i le'u

ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgoms pa// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan par
gnas// thams cad hU~M du bsdus nas ni// dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar bar bsgom// med pung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// me lha ag ne dzas bkug nas// raM zhes bya ba'i me sbar te/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor

ma lus kun// zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par bya// hU~M/ gtum po tshogs chen rab tu 'bar// dung kha nag po'i mdog 'dra la// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'khrug/ nyi ma thod sbrul mang pos brgyan// seng ge glang chen

stag rngam dang// phyag cha sna tshogs 'bar ba bsnams// hU~M dang phaT dang ha la'i sgra/ drag skad phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' 'khrug/ phaT/ khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya

mdzes// slas dang byi mo bran mo dang// b+h+yo/ ci bgyi la sogs tshogs kyis bskor// so so'i stan dang lag cha dang// rngam pa'i nga ro rang sngags dang// mi sdug gtum pa'i gzugs can dang// shin tu khro bar

bsgom par bya// bdag nyid phaT kyi ngang nyid du// gsal 'dris blo goms rtag tu bsgom// dzaHhU~M baM hos bsdus nas su// rgyud drug sems can kun bkug nas/ khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya// lha yang rung ste
brlag par 'gyur// yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang mthun// gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma bzhin// mchod pa'i grangs kyang spyi dang mthun// a/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor yab yum bcu// hU~M/ zhal gdangs spyan

bgrad khro bo'i zhal// gru gsum dbus su mchod bar bya// 'khor lo rtsibs la brgyad 'bar te// thod pa lcags kyu rnams kyis bskor// hU~M/ sgra grag tshogs ni mer 'bar bar// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas bkug nas
su// zhal du bstim nas lhag par 'grub// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// 'khor gyi tshogs kyang snga ma bzhin// bstod pa'i tshul du sbod gtong bya// hU~M/ gtum po dmar smug mchu rings po// rdo

rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas bskor// 'od chen 'bar ba khro ba yis// 'jig rten khams rnams dus gcig rngubs// hU~M/ khro bo'i tshogs kyis sngags rnams dang// gnas dang yum gyi phyag rgya dang// slas dang byi mo

bran mo'i tshogs// so so'i rang sngags rdzogs pa'i don// ha he b+h+yo/ gzhan yang bstod tshig 'di dag gis// hU~M/ rdo rje thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten khams rnams kun bkang ste// gtum 'khrug ma
lus thams cad kun// rdo rje mthu yis kun bsregs te// btul bar ma gyur gang yang med// 'das dang ma 'das rdo rje'i sku// 'jig rten khams na rab 'byams kun// zhes sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// skad

cig yud la brlag mdzad de// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ drag po hom gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po pad+ma sdud pa zhes bya bas/ 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir
ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus// dbyings nas ye shes 'od 'phro 'bar// thams cad ma lus dbyings su sbyor// hri/ dkyil
'khor zla gam gdangs pa la// 'od zer mang po 'bar ba dang// rdo rje lcags sgrog bsdams pas bskor// gzhan yang rgyan gyi dam pa'i mchog/ kun gyis de la brgyan cing bskor// me lha spyan drangs snga ma

bzhin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// pad+ma'i rigs kyi khro bo sgom// dmar smug drag po'i mdog dang ni// gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bskor// rngam pa'i
rang sngags drag tu sgrogs// hrI/ bdag nyid ma chags rdo rje ste// dkyil 'khor gong ma gsal bsgoms nas// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba thams cad dang// gdug pa'i yid can ma lus kun// dzaHhU~M baM hos bkug

nas su// dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya// dgos pa 'grub cing ngan song sbyong// hrI/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mang po'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i zhal 'dra la// tha ma pad+ma ljon shing dang// pad+ma rdo rje
'od 'bar bskor// gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// bdag nyid pad+ma'i lhar gyur pas// mchod pa lha rdzas sna tshogs dang// zhal zas bza' btung mchog rnams
dang// dmar po'i shing dang dri zhim pa// lan grangs gong du smos pa bzhin// rtag tu mchod pa byas na ni// 'jig rten 'di dang 'das pa yi// ci 'dod las de grub par 'gyur// sngags ni yi ge raM dang
hri// mdog ni dmar smug 'od po che// phyogs bcur khyab cing hri la bsdu// dges pa'i glu dang gar gyis mchod// rdo rje pad+ma 'bar ba yis// phyogs bcu mtha' klas rab 'byams kun// dpal dang
gzi brjid che la sogs// pad+ma 'bar bas de bsdus nas// sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang// gzhan yang longs spyod mchog la sogs// ci 'dod las rnams dbang du 'gyur// lha srin la sogs smos ci
dgos// hri/ 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la dbang du bsdus// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// hri/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thams cad ma

lus par dbang du bsdus te hom gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag/ nyid kyi dbyings nas phyung nas ched du brjod pa
'di ched du brjod do// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ bsod nams zhing gyur mchog tu 'bar// rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' dang mnyam// traM/ ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus

'od 'bar// dkyil 'khor zhags pa rin chen bskor// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i/ khro bo kun kyang rgyas 'phros te// 'od chen dkar ser 'bar bar ba dang// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur//

lha dang lha mo'i 'khor gyis bskor// mchod pa yo byad sna tshogs dang// dkar la dri zhim shing rnams dang// gzhan yang mchod yon thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor la ni rgyas par dbul// traM dkar yi ge 'od 'bar

ba// bdag nyid rin chen phyag rgya bas/ khro bo kun kyang de bzhin te// mngon du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// ba sha ho dang dzaHhU~M gis// phyogs bcu'i lam lnga kun bkug ste// dbyings su thim pas 'od 'phro

bsgom// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// sgyu ma'i ye shes brtan pa yin// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas ni// rin chen dbyibs la rdo rje 'bar// dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis
'khor bar bskor// gzhan yang lha dang lha mo yis// phyogs bcu khyab par mchod cing dbul// yon tan rgyal ba'i zhing dang mnyam// traM/ glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// yon tan sangs rgyas

zhing dang mnyam// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus kun// mchod yon rin chen dpal 'phel gyis// phyogs bcu gang bar rgyas phul nas// thugs rje dbyings kyi rgyas par rol ho// tra~M/ nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas
pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la rgyas mdzad de// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ rgyal po rgyas mdzad kyi rgyas pa hom gyi le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen pos/ thams cad dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen por bsgyur nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod// ye shes dkyil 'khor
mtha' dbus med// bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// bde gshegs nyid las mi gzhan shar// oM/ dkyil 'khor zlum po 'bar ba la// 'khor lo 'bar bas rab

bskor zhing// 'od ni ser po rab tu 'bar// rmad du byung ba'i sku la sogs// bdag nyid chen pos bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sa bon yi ge oM dkar po// me lha spyan drangs snga

ma bzhin/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// kun kyang gti mug rdo rje ste// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang// 'khor lo phyag rgya 'bar ba dang// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis brgyan// gdan dang gnas kyang
dbyings nyid de// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu// phyogs bcu gnas pa'i gdug pa kun// tsakra'i lcags kyus bkug nas su// dkyil 'khor dbyings su bstim byas na// gtum 'khrug gdug pa ma rungs

pa// lhan ne lhang nge zhi bar 'gyur// oM/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba yi// oM dang seng ge'i mgos bskor te// brgyan pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kun// rdzogs ldan zhi

bas bskor bar bya// rgyal po lus mdzes 'khor lo 'bar// rgyan rnams zhi ba dkar ba dang// byang chub mchog 'bar lhan ner bsgom// mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo// gzhan yang 'gro drug ma lus kun// zhi
gyur 'di la the tshom med// gar dang glu yis mchod byas te// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma rungs pa// gdug pa'i yid ni rab bor nas// lhan ne dkar po'i 'od du gyur// bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar
ho// oM/ gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur

nas/ zhi bar byas pas zhi ba hom gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa chen pos rgyal po tshe mtha' yas su sprul nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba

brtan bsdus te// b+h+ru~M dang bi shwa'i dkyil 'khor du// ma dang a yi dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'khor lo rab bskor nas// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te// de yis phyogs bcu gang 'bar nas// b+h+ru~M dzaHhU~M dang baM
hos dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/ lus ngag sems la bstim par bya// nri nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa mchog ni bzang po nyid// tshe bzhag gnas ni 'di yin te// yang nas yang du
bkug byas la// mngon du smin par gyur pa dang// dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje go cha bsrung ba pos// cho brtan bya phyir sgo bsrungs la// 'khor lo rgya ni sgo la gdab// tshe gnas dkyil
nas rta mgo shar// b+h+ruM dzas bkug pa'i bzhi bcu lnga// yi ge 'bru gsum nang du bstim// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun bsdus pa// 'od dpag med pa'i gnas lnga bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus dkyil 'khor

kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med par gyur// dgos pa sgrub phy-ir de bsgom pa// sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba dang// yid bzhin rin
chen za ma tog/ rin chen rkyal dang bu bzangs bsnams// 'jig rten bsod nams brtan pa yis// gzi brjid b+h+ruM dzas bkug byas la// ci 'dod 'byung ba'i snod blugs nas// dkyil 'khor lus la rdzogs pa
yi// bsod nams sku phran yungs 'bru tsam// 'dres nas rta mgo'i khar bstin bya// tshe gnas 'od kyis gang ba dang// gzhal yas rgya chad dpag med gyur// sku bran 'od zer 'phro rgyas te// 'jig rten dkyil
'khor mtha' klas pa// de ni tshe yi bsnyen pa'i mchog/ rang sngags bzlas pa brtan byas pa// bsnyen pa chen po'i mchog kyang yin// gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas
mchog/ bgegs kyis nri rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po bton nas ni// thams cad ma lus thul bar byed// tshe dpag med pa'i

dbang du bsdu// tshe bsnyen dang ni bsnyen pa dang// tshe bsgrub dang ni tshe grub pa'i// thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// tshe ring ji ltar 'dod pa dang// 'jig rten dga' bde sna tshogs pa// 'grub 'gyur 'di

la the tshom med// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma// dkar ser mdog la 'od 'phro 'bar// phyag na rin chen gang ba yis// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// gnas pa'i 'gro

drug ma lus la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin te// de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med// de yi bzlas pa'i 'phrul chen ni// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'phrul bar// sngags bzlas cho ga bar ma chod// 'dris gsal

bstan pa mchog gis bya// oM hUM swA a hA/ b+h+ruM badzra A yu Shi hUM a a a/ tshe 'phrog dbang du ma gyur na// bde gshegs lnga yang tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i
khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro lnga'i tshe rnams dbang du bsdu// phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs
nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams bskor te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang// bar snang

bgegs rnams rgyu ba las// tshe ni rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo 'bru la bstim nas ni// de nas yi yi ge 'bru lnga de// nr-i yi gnas lngar bstim par bya// oM badzra ka pa tsa rak+Sha hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a d+hi

tiSh+Tha A yu She a/ phyag rgya chen po bsrung ba'i mchog/ rdo rje go cha'i mchog yin te// 'bru lnga yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru gcig dmigs med dbyings su thim// a/ yid bzhin bum pa rin po che// rgyan dang rin

chen 'phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang// 'bru lnga spos lnga nyungs kar bcas// sngags mkhan rab ldan blo brtan pas// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom// rgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas
nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub bar 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu de yis// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba

las/ tshe'i cho ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa chen po rdo rje sdud pa por sprul te/ 'gro ba lnga rang dbang med par smra ba zhes bya bar
bsdus nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings// kun tu bzang po'i thugs rje'i ngang// sku gsung thugs ldan yon tan rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar

bya// rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis// rdo rje khams kun zhing sbyar te// oM dang muM du 'byor bar bsgom// thams cad dbyings su thim par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// thig le man+t+ra de dag tu// nr-i thal

man+t+ra bzang po'i thig/ rta babs sgo khyud bzang po dang// rdo rje rtse gcig 'od 'bar ba// 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu dam pa yi// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum bri// dkyil 'khor rgyud dang ldan par bya// mchod yon sna

tshogs mchod par bya// yaM dud ye shes 'od 'phros nas// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dza las lcags kyu grangs med pas// de yi snying du gzhug par bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dza las lcags

kyu mang po yis// gang 'gugs de yi snying kha nas// rangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya// oM dzaHhU~M baM ho a nr-i su tri pri du ming pra be sha ya/ ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya// lag

gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te/ khu tshur dam du bcings nas ni// srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bong gnyis// bar du mthe bong de drangs te// oM ming pra be sha ya a// thal ba nyungs kar drag tu brdeg/ ming de khong du
gzhug par bya// babs na phyag rgya bzhi yis bcing// gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni// lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa// lha zhig na ni mchod par bya// gdon zhig na ni tsan dan dang// gur kum
bsres blud sngags brjod bya// oM yak+sha badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gal te smra ru mi btub na// lag gnyis sor mor phyir bsnol te/ khu tshur bcang 'theb zur sprad de// gyen bsgreng dbab ba'i

khar gtug bya/ khar dbab sngags ni 'di brjod bya// oM badzra ba shA ho/ pra d+ha be sha hUM a/ mang du bzlas pas 'dar bar 'gyur// ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'// bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam// lce yi thor to a
dkar po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du// oM de dmar po bsgom byas na// gdon mi za bar smra bar 'gyur// bdag nyid Da ki'i hUM bsgoms la// A dang nr-i la sogs pa yi// laM lnga'i sems can gang yang

phung// DA ki hUM dang rang sngags kyis// lan 'bum bzlas zhing dgug par bya// gong gi sngags kyang bzlas par bya// gzhan yang dzaHhUM baM hoHste// gzhag cing dbab ba'i sa de ni// byis pa lo grangs bcu gnyis

pa// gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya// thig le bum pa me long par// gzhan yang gnas rnams thams cad la// smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs// phyag rgya rdo rje spar mo ste// dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis

dgug/ dzaHhUM/ dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdus// bcol zhing bya ba de bzhin no// Da ki hUM dzas mi btub na// ha ya gri dang gnas dang yul// zur phyin mgo mjug mnan nas ni// drag tu bzlas shing lcags
kyus dgug/ srog gi snying po ma nor bar// gzir zhing drag tu drang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dgug pa'i thabs yod ci yang rung// nem nur med par dgug par bya// bya ba sna tshogs

las zin nas// sngar byas bum pa lnga po la// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// rigs kyi yul dang bdud rtsi 'khyil// ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang// gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang rung// grub pa mngon du

gyur pa dang// 'ongs pa'i gnas la slar gtang phyir// sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya// oM badzra a mr-i ta hUM tha/ oM bud+ha lo tsa ne swAhA/ oM a mr-i ta gats+tsha gats+tsha/ oM badzra ha badzra a mr-i ta phaT dza swAhA/ gsang ba'i

dkyil 'khor dam pa de// ye shes lnga rdzogs nyid la brjod// ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ sngon goms blo brtan 'dris pa yis// yang dang yang du mngon gsal bar// byang chub mchog gi rtag sgoms shig/ de

ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brda phrad skad kyi dngos grub thob// nyid kyis nyid la rab brjod pa// 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang brjod// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
tu'o// pra dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen po de rig pa'i dkyil 'khor du sprul nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
do// dkyil 'khor gang la bdag gnas nas// dang por stong pa'i de bzhin nyid// gsal 'dris goms par bsgom bar bya// de nas bdag gi snying khar a// dkar zhing 'tsher ba rab tu bsgom// a de shin tu
gsal ba dang// phyogs bcur 'od kyang 'phro bar bsgom// 'od de a la slar bsdu bstim// a dang ma las nyi zla gnyis// dkyil 'khor ltar 'tsher gsal bar bsgom// hr-i las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor
yang// 'od 'phro gsal bar rab tu bsgom// shin tu hUM yang 'bar bar bsgom// hUM gi 'phro 'dus snying dkyil du// rdo rje sems dpa' tshon gang ba// phyag rgya ldan par rdzogs par bsgom// bzhi bcu rtsa

gnyis sngags bzlas pas// phyag rgya nyid du rab tu 'bar// 'bru gsum 'bru lnga gang rung bzlas// dzaHhUM baM hos spyan yang drangs// tha mar phaT bsnan mtshams yang bcad// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba

la// spyan drangs dkyil 'khor rab tu bstim// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams bzang po yang// dkyil 'khor de la dbul bar bya// tshogs kyang byas la drag po'ang bsdus// rtag tu hom bya shin tu shis// mang po bsgom

mi nus don du// mdor bsdus phyag rgya rnam pa bdun// sku mchog phyag rgya chen po dang// brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya dang// 'dzin pa dam tshig phyag rgya dang// kun sbyor thabs shes phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin dbang
sgyur phyag rgya dang// lhag pa ting 'dzin phyag rgya bdun// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di
gsungs so// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor phyir// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub mchog la su gnas pa// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing// byang
chub sems su brtan par gzung// bya ba byed la byas pa med// mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a// shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas// 'od 'phro 'bar ba thams cad
khyab// dug gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim// a ma las ni nyi zla 'bar// phyogs bcu 'thibs ba'i mun sel cing// nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman// thugs
rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mkha' la gzha' tshon sprin mang yang// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen pa bsam yas kyang// chos kyi
dbyings su thams cad 'dus// thams cad yi ge hUM du bsgom// hUM nyid gsang ba'i thugs kyi dkyil// 'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste// yang na yi ge 'bru lnga'o// lnga po don spros bzhi bcu
gnyis// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog/ ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa la// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// sen zlum zla ba gang ba yi// thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya// nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor gang ba yi// gzhan yas 'od zer 'bar ba'i khang// pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che// de dkyil yi ge hU~M gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing nyungs 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum
dang// gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom// shes rab can la 'dres pa dang// nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par// shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom/ shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong

khams rdul snyed du// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam yas 'phro// spros kyang hUM la nyams pa med// bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med// spros med bsdus med de bzhin las// yi ge muM du thim par 'gyur// thim

gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing 'dris pa dang// phyag rgya sku nyid gsal bar bsgom// sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar nas// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed

bsgom// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis sam// zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom// gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul te snga ma bzhin// mtshan dang dpe

byad thams cad ldan// dbu rgyan ye shes lnga dang ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar// phyag rgya chen po de dag las// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor
gdan dang rgyan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// thugs rje'i byin brlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi ba phyogs gcig shes bya sbyong// sa bcu mnyam par sbyor byed cing// bde gshegs 'khor yang
dag par byed// 'di ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur yang// sdug bsngal thams cad yong mi 'byung// lha mo'i mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub// theg pa dman par yong mi skye// bde

gshegs 'byung dang bkol ma 'gyur// byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin// zhes nyid la nyid kyis gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas

de bzhin gshegs pas sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho ye nas
dag chos las// log rtog rnam pa gnyis su grub// thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes// kun kyang gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam rtog mi mthun so sor gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du
ma gyur gang yang med// dug tu ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las// mi mthun khyad par so sor snang// sus kyang ma byas su byed yod// rnam rtog gzhags pa dam po yis// so sor
bcings pa'i dbang gis ni// lus gnas longs spyod sna tshogs dang// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor ma lus dang/ khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang// dus gsum 'gro lnga kun tu mthong// bdag med bdud rtsi

chen po des// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong// rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas rdzogs// de phyir sman 'di rab bsgrub bya// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// de phyir

nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog bor// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung// bdud

rtsi'i mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi'i gnas ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi'i lam ni rnam rtog sbyong// dpal tshogs 'dus shing 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin

brlabs bsam mi khyab// ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris sgrub// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub// rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang// rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i
dug/ klu dug sbod gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dug rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom// gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim// oM hUM traM

hriHA la sogs// yang na yi ge oM gyis bya// yang na yi ge hri yis btang// dug rnams bdud rtsir gyur par bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya// a ho hUM/ bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// thugs rjes bdag
rtog 'dul bar byed// nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyong zhing// byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// oM bdag nyid gti mug chos sku ste// rmongs pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i

ngang// thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'o// traM/ bdag nyid nga rgyal yon tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hri/ bdag nyid
'dod chags gsung mchog ste// nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed// nyon mos sdug bsngal rnam par dag/ chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o// a/ bdag nyid las ni sems dpa' ste// don rnams ma
lus grub par byed// log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhir 'phro ba'o// muM/ bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// me long g.yeng ba sel bar byed// thugs rje myur ba'i

las byung ba// rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o// ye shes drug gis nyon mongs sbyangs// dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug gsum sbyong ba sku gsum ste// lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga// 'khor ba rtsad
gcod shes rab mtshon// hUM du bsdus shing ho yis g.yeng// raM gyis bsreg cing phaT kyis 'phang// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// thig le dbyings su thim par bya// de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur
nas// ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// yang na 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal// de nas kun spyod

lnga kun la// lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom// oM hUM traM hriHaH oM badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM sarba bi shud+he d+ha rmA d+ha du bi shud+he a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ sngags des thams cad dag par 'gyur// dbyings

su thim nas bdud rtsir gyur// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams// rang bzhin med pa'i gshig pa'i phyir// gcig la'ang lnga lngar dbye bya zhing// muM gyi dbyings su bstim par bya// 'byung ba chen rnams de dag

la// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rags pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing// 'byung po so so'i mtshan 'dzin te// yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de rigs ye shes lnga nyid
do// rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'dus na// de las gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a ho/ kye ma lhag
pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge oM dang muM// bdag dang gnyis med dbyings su thim// a/ de nas bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor
