bsgom// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// shar gyi rtse la rdo rje nyid// lho yi rtse la rin po che// nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas// byang gi rtse la don yod grub// lha dang lha mo'i

tshogs kyis bskor// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya gzhan yang gsal bar bsgom// gtso bo'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// zla ba pad+ma'i gdan khri la// nyi ma

stong gi gdan khrir ldan// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// khro bo'i 'khor lo de bzhin te// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dbus bsgoms te// gnas yul slas byi'i tshogs kyis bskor// snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar
zlas// de la bdud rtsi phyag rgya ni// bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar// re ba yid bzhin skong bar byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// 'dod yon lnga yang ldan par byed// dngos grub

chen po zla med pa'o// bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed// sgo bzhi phyag rgya dag dang ldan// a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid ni// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang// dri chen dri chu maM sar bcas// pad+ma rak+ta la sogs

dang// gzhan yang 'dod yon sna tshogs rnams// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye ba// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlabs// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sme med par bza' bar bya// dbyings su yang
ni bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing// dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang// bskal ba yun rings gnas pa dang// dngos grub chen po thob 'gyur
te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsungs// bdag nyid yi ge hUM du gnas// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// oM hUM oM du gyur par bsgom// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro// slar 'dus 'od
'phro bdud rtsir 'bar// shin tu gsal bar rtse gcig bsgom// gzhan yang yi ge tshogs pas gdab// 'thungs na ngan song sgrib pa 'byang// tra Da/ rtag brten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// lus kyi nad
rnams thams cad 'byang// lha la rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na// drag po gtum pa'ang lhan ner 'gyur// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad

no// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob 'gyur na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// the tsom med par bsgrub par gyis// rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu

'phrul dra ba las/ sman bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las/ lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sngags 'chang

rnams lhar bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho ye nas rnam dag pa'i// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla
shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams cad gnyis min pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal// gcig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i

tshul// de nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor// thugs rje'i byin brlabs 'phros pa yis// ye shes bzhi yi
dkyil 'khor spro// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab// rang snang ba yi thabs las byung// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyas pa'i
gzhal yas khang// mtha' dbus med par rgyas par gnas// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye gnas 'od
gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma chags pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan// zad med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gnas// ye nas

mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas// re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir// dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen rgyal gyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang sgyur
phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang ba de nyid nges pa las// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtse gnyis kyis// thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'dis ni rang
bzhin dkyil 'khor dang// gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog bstan// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// shin tu gsang

ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs/ phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dbang po yul dus rigs pa rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing// mnyam pa'i ngang nyid gsal rtogs na// thams cad bde ba chen
po'i rgyud// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms nas// bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// bla med chen pos de skad gsungs// yan

lag snying po rtse gcig dang// rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re bskyod na ni// pad+ma

chags med re re 'byung// rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor na// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chub shing drung skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas
te// dbu yi dkyil 'khor bsgul bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyed byas na// rigs 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen gnan mchongs
na// sdug bsngal mi bzod thams cad dang// bdud dang log 'dren thams cad mnan// yan lag thams cad bsgul gsigs na// ba spu'i bu ga re re nas/ khro bo grangs med rdul snyed spro// de

dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu'i khams mang rdul snyed du// khro bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// thugs rjes 'dul zhing dbyings su bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang// khro mo'i dkyil
'khor rab tu 'dus// thams cad rdo rje brag chen dang// me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar// 'di ni spyi rgya chen po yis// steng gi bgegs chen 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo nri mgo gdengs// 'og gi
'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje thong gshol nr-i bar dang// rdo rje gtun chen 'dril pa'o// shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang// tir chen po'i dbyug pa'o// lho yi bgegs

rnams 'dul ba ni// rin chen nr-i mgo'i dbyug pa dang// gshin rje chen po'i rkang pa'o// nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// sbrul dang ti ra nya dbyug dang// khyung chen gshog gis rab tu brdebs// rgya mtsho
chen po'i sked par gtub// byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin po che yi dbyug tho dang// nr-i mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can// gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams
'dul ba ni// phyogs bzhi dag gis 'dul bar 'gyur// gal te de yis ma thul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo gdengs// i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// 'byung po'i

sde kun rab tu 'dul// shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje ye shes me chen 'bar// me nyid kyang ni 'tshig par byed// drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams// me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdus// lho
nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje srin po mgo can te// rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar// bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus// nub byang mtshams
kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rlung gi ba dan nr-i mgo gdengs// shin tu drag po'i glang po'i brjid// tshig bsrungs nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdus// 'og tu 'jig rten bgegs

'dul ba// phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste// phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams// 'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba po// gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis// tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// me yi dkyil 'khor
chen po yis// thams cad ma lus sreg par byed// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed// rdo rje ral gri

'khor lor bcas// mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang// rdo rje dung chen dgra star bcas// mche gtsigs spu gri so dang ni// rnga dang mdung thung sta re dang// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so// dbus kyi

he ru'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra'i dbyug to chen po dang// 'khor lo chen po rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis gang ba la// rdo rjes 'khrug tsing rab tu gsol// shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa
dang// rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar// nr-i mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol// lho yi phyag rgya chen po ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhas yas

su// dmar gyi arga rab tu gsol// nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// pad+ma chags med rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen

po'i dbyug pa dang// rdo rje rgya gram rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol/ khro mo rnams kyang khro dang mthun// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// rgyud gzhan dag dang mthun par bshad// ma mo

rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// 'jig rten 'das mdo che las bshad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po dpal shrI he ru kas/ yum kro d+hi

shwa ri dang gnyis su med par 'dul bar mdzad nas/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang por spros nas/ 'jig rten pa'i dbang po dang/ bdag po dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal po'i yang rgyal
po dang/ blon po dang/ sde dpon dang/ 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis ma khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te/ 'jigs byed chen po yis/ lha chen po rnams dang/ da ltar dang/ phyi
ma'i dus su/ la la ni tshe 'phel ba'i las su bskos/ la la ni longs spyod 'phel bar bskos/ la la ni 'byung ba chen po la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos/
la la ni gzugs sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur bar bskos/ la la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos/ la la ni nyams shing rmos par bskos/ la la ni skams shing 'pho bar bskos/ gzhan yang bya ba
rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'dod par bskos nas// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// 'jig rten gtso mchog dbang bsdus nas// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro

ba'i don rnams sna tshogs bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// 'di ni rang byung lha yi lha// byams dang snying rjer ldan par rol// thugs rje chen po'i thabs mkhas
pa// thams cad kun la spyod gyur kyang// bag chags la sogs mi 'gyur te// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs 'gyur// thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs pa// gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtog rdul
tsam med// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir// rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// de nas bdag gis rgyud kyi don// gong nas 'byung ba'i zhi khro gnyis// gang goms gsal ba bsgoms byas nas// ting

'dzin las su gsal 'gyur dang// rang sngags bzlas pa 'bum 'bum gdon// lha yi dbang po dgug pa'i phyir// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta baM// in+Da ya swAhA/ in+Da a mr-i ta/ hUM hUM dza dza dza/ lha yi dbang po'i

snying kha nas// yang nas yang du rnam ra drang// dbang po gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// lus ni rin chen kun gyis brgyan// gtsug na yid bzhin rin chen 'bar// mchod sbyin 'od zer brgya dang ldan// rdo rje in+d+ra g.yas

kyis gdengs// yid bzhin bdud rtsi'i bum chu g.yon// dbang po'i btsun mo sha tsi dang// bcas pa bsgrubs pas ci 'dod 'grub// lha chen dgug pa'ang sngar bzhin te// ma hA de ba hUM dza/ dzaHhUM baM hoH ma ma trag
sha ma hA tsa/ hUM hUM hUM/ lha gzugs mdog ni dkar la 'tsher// rin chen 'phreng bas se ral brgyan// yid bzhin bdun rtsi bum chu gsol// g.yon pa rin chen bgrang 'phreng ste// gzi 'dod rnams kyi re ba

skong// btsun mo 'od can dbu ma dang// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan// bdag nyid bud+d+ha he ru ka/ lha yi gzugs ni snga ma bzhin// srog dang ldan par bzlas pa bya// mdun nas dzaHhUM baM hos drang// rgyab nas
rdo rje can gyis phul// je nye je nye gnyis med par// lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ lha chen 'khor rnams thams cad kyang// de grub dbang med 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod
las rnams byed par 'gyur// de nas dges pa chen pos// rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po 'di sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs so// byang chub sems mchog ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// rigs
sngags 'chang gi don grub tu// rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdu// bdag nyid rigs bzhi he ru ka/ gang don 'byung ba bzhin du bsgom// lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing// lha yi gzugs tshul gsal bar
bsgom// bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par// yang dag don du ldan par bsgom// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung// sku mdog dkar ser 'od 'bar zhi// dung tshul lus la shel rmog gsol// snyan pa'i pi wang

phyag gis 'dzin// oM bai shra ba Na ye swAhA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH dza dza dza/ hUM hUM hUM/ zhes lan 'bum du bzlas/ bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka/ 'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis// rgyal po yul 'khor snying nas drangs// rdo rje
can gyis rgyab nas phul// 'di yis rgyal po dbang gyur nas// las ni gang 'dod byed du gzhug/ thams cad thams cad grub par byed// kun las 'byin cing kun la za// rgyal po'i 'khor

rnams thams cad kun// ma lus pa ni yang dag 'du// bran bzhin du ni phyi bzhin 'brang// rgyal po 'phags skyes sgrub pa ni// bdag nyid rin chen he ru de// sku mdog rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin// phyag rgya rnams

kyang de bzhin te// 'od kyi 'phro 'du'i byin brlabs kyis// 'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus// oM ti sta ra tra ya swAhA// dzaHhUM baM ho/ g+hi Na g+hi Na/ durga byed ta tang/ hang hang hang/ rat+na dzaHhUM baM ho/ zhes/ rang

sngags 'bum du bzlas byas te// srog dang ldan par bya// bdag nyid rat+na he ru ka/ 'phags skyes po yi snying kha nas// dza yis rab tu bzung nas ni// bdag gi mdun du dgug par bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis
phul// de nas mngon du gyur pa na// gang 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu 'bar// 'khor rnams thams cad bdag dang ldan// yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub// rgyal po mig

ngan sgrub pa ni// bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka/ sku mdog btsag gi snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te// snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bsgyur rung zhing// lha nyid du ni gsal
gyur nas// rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni// shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste// lag g.yas bdud rtsi'i bum pa gsol// lag g.yon 'dod yon lnga yi tshul// nub phyogs klu rnams re ba skong// sbrul mgo 'bum

gyi gdengs kha can// de ni rab tu dbang bsdu'i phyir// sngags kyi snying po 'di bzlas bya// oM bi ru ta ka ye swAhA// pe pa ka ya ka swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ nA ga shi ni b+hi pa ga ka b+him kang/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ 'bum phrag du ma
bzlas na ni// de ni bdag gi dbang du 'du// bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas// mig mi bzang gi snying kha nas// dza yis rab tu bzung nas drang// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nas bdag dang
gnyis med par// dbyer med par ni gyur pa dang// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus pa// bdag gi las rnams rdzogs par byed// rgyal po rnam thos sgrub pa ni// bdag nyid khro bo
bdud rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin// gsal zhing 'od 'phro 'bar bsgom zhing// gsang sngags snying po 'bum phrag bzlas// ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang// rnam thos dag ni rtag tu

sgrub// gzugs ni rin chen bai DUr+Ya// yang na mdog ni sngo zhing 'tsher// phyag g.yas rin chen dbyug to thogs// g.yon na 'dod yon bum chu gsol// dbu la rin chen sna tshogs mdzes// oM be shra wa NA ya swAhA/
dzaHhUM baM ho// ku be ra baM b+ha ba ka ra yang yaM/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ 'bum du bzlas shing srog yod par// yang dang yang du bzlas par bya// bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/ dza yis rnam thos snying nas

drangs// dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin 'khor rnams dbang du bsdu// rin chen sprin zhing las rnams sgrub// ci 'dod las

rnams byed par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ lha chen po sgrub pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bkod cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra
ba las/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor las// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po
yis// thams cad ma lus maN+Dal la'i// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la// rig pa rang dbang gyur pa yis// mnyam la mnyam par mi gnas pa'i// chos sku phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'jig rten brtan
g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis// rang gi bsgribs shing rtag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos sku
gzugs brnyan bstan// rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang// yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang// 'byung ba bzhi las gyur pa kun// thams cad byang chub mchog gi
rgyu// gzugs sogs ri mo bris pa dang// ye shes chen po rab 'byams kyis// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid

kyi thugs la bstim byas te// thams cad sku yi phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis// thams cad chos sku phyag rgya

che// yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms na// mA ma ki ni rgyun chags la// yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phyo ba'i
dkyil 'khor du// dri med chos sku phyag rgyar gsal// dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas/ kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs 'phrin las rnam par

rol// don gyi snying po mchog rnams dang// byang chub chos rnams rab tu rdzogs// 'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor// a ho/ chos sku phyag rgya de dag las// las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub// ting
nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// drag pa gtum po gtul ba'i phyir// bdag nyid drag por bsgoms nas ni// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis// bgegs kyi
ling kha mnan par bya// drag po gtum po'ang brlag par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog/ 'di dang 'gro ba thams cad du// shin tu stobs drag cher ldan 'gyur// thams cad gnyis med dbyings
bsdus phyir// bdag nyid ha ya gri bar bsgom// dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te// mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gding// ting 'dzin gsal bar byin brlabs na// thams cad ma lus dbang du
'du// mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'breng// ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdo 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom// gang
'phel chos sku'i gdan du bzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs nas// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i
byin brlabs kyis// gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom// gang zhig gtum khro zhi bya'i gdon// de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na// gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar
'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// lhun

grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// a ho/ chos sku'i phyag rgya chen po ni// dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges// nye ba'i lha ni gang sgrub pa// phyag rgya snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgoms the tshom med par
'grub// de ni rgyal ba kun dang ni// mnyam par nges 'grub the tshom med// 'jig rten pa yi lha sgrub na// lha yi snying po gang yang rung// bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// lha de nye bar 'grub par

'gyur// chos nyid rten cing 'bral bris na// chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te// rang dang spyi yi don rtogs na// skye rgas na 'chi med par rtogs// phyag rgya chen po de dag la// nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed

pa'i// snying po ma nor don bris na// ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang// tshad dpag med pa'i phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi 'chad// zhing khams bye
ba rdul dang mnyam// a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dngos grub len pa'i thabs te/ mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud de phyi pa dang nang pa thams cad kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bco brgyad du bstan/ gtsug

lag thams cad la yang bco brgyad du bstan pa yin/ lung gi spyi 'di shin tu zab pa'i phyir/ khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi dang/ rgyud dang/ gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin/
gsang ba'i dbang po dang/ gsang ba'i yul gnyis gang yang skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhin yin pa'i phyir/ shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsang bar bstan
pa'i phyir// nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma ho ye nas gsang ba'i chos// thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin

gsang// gzhan du min las shin tu gsang// don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsungs// 'di ni byang chub snying po mchog/ a ho/ gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul dus gsang

ba'i rnams// byang chub pa yi dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor// skye mched khams rnams bco brgyad po// byang chub sems dpa' sems ma nyid// dkyil 'khor

nyid kyi dbyings yin te// rang byung rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang// yul nyid ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang// thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid

de// de yis ma bskyed gang yang med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te// bde ba'i byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas// de las bskyed cing de las

spros// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i gnas// dbang po rdo rje pad+mar ldan// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro na// mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang ba'i lha mo

bzhi rnams dang// mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi// 'jig dang ldang gnas smon pa yis// g.yo bskyod 'jug dang bde gnas pa// gsang ba'i dbang po byed pa po// shes bya pad+mos thob par 'gyur// de phyir
gsang sngags mchog rdzogs pa// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang ba las/ khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang po dang// pad+ma bde gnas 'byung ba

dang// gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen 'phro// 'di ni rtsa gcig yin par gsungs// shin tu gsang ba zab pa'i phyir/ khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// sgyu 'phrul dra ba kun
ldan pa'i// rdo rje la sogs kun tu yang// gsungs pa mi 'gal 'dir yang brjod// 'jug ldan gnas smon byang chub sems// g.yo dang bskyod dang ldang dang gnas// bkug dang 'dzin dang de
bzhin te// bsdus dang 'phris pa'i don grub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang sgyur te// bde dang sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba
'bar// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// kun tu tshim byed dri bsung thim// lhag mdzes rin chen phung po 'bar// 'od gsal 'phro bas kun tu
'phro// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// a la la ho/ gsang ba'i dbang po pad 'byor na// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bkod med
rdzogs// kun tu 'od gsal spyan yang rdzogs// gnyis ldan bla med sa yang rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen la// brtan pa nyid du rdzogs par rol// a ho/ de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las/
khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bco brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin// gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ bco brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// byang chub 'grub pa'i gzhi yang yin// bde ba sbyin pa'i rgyu

yin te// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal// yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur na// gsang ba mchog
gi 'phrul chen spro// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang// phun sum tshogs pa lhun grub rnams// gsang dbang mchog gis 'byin par byed// 'di ni rtsa gcig yin par gsungs// gsang mchog don mchog
'di dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas nas// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang 'tshig par 'gyur/ khab longs kyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// bskal

par ngan song gnas par 'gyur// de phyir 'di ni shin tu gsal// shes rab rgya che blo yangs pa'i// snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// zhes nyid la nyid brjod de/ shin tu zab
pa'i phyir rgyud gzhan gyi nang du ma bshad do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas/ thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bsdus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ chos thams cad yid bzhin chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang/ shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir 'dus/ yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so// thams cad ni
rigs bzhir 'dus so// rigs bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te/ thams cad dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas/ tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod

do// don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no// thams cad ma lus mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de// de bzhin nyid dbyings sna tshogs mang po thabs su snang// thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin// de
nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas// ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis grub sgrib mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas

rol pa yin// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste// rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas// 'bras bu lam du gyur bar dus gcig mnyam par spyod// 'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad
'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad 'du ba'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod// gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// nga dang bdag med sna tshogs mtshan ma dbyer med pa// stong dang mi stong
mi gnas de bzhin nyid du rngubs// rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med gter chen 'phro// 'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs
pa// skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal 'phreng ldan mgo/ ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig ngang gis gsal// thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen nang du bsdu// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad
kun 'dus dang// zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen mchog chen kun// skye med dbyings dang rang rig gnyis su yang dag 'ub// mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa// ye
nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas// ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs// lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras spyod// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo

rje thabs chen yang dag ldan// 'gro med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad// a ho/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po las/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/ sa bcu dang/ sa gnyis
dang/ thabs kyi sa mchog dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa/ yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// rgyud mgo mjug ril 'dir 'dus she'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis// mi 'chi ba rdo rjer bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje zhing chen sgrub 'dod pas// thams cad skye shi med tshul du// mnyam zhing dag pa nyid du bsgom/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// dzaHhUM baM
hos dgug par bya// bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par// yang nas yang du bsgom par bya// sku rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang// zhing chen 'og tu gzhug par bya// dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod

nas/ khro bo khro mo 'khor du bsgom// mngag pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur gtang// 'jig rten mi rnams dbang bsdus te// nr-i yi tshogs rnams kun bkug nas// zhing la yang nas yang du 'jug/ ting 'dzin che bas zla

gcig ste// 'bring gi zla ba gnyis dang gsum// tha mas zla ba lnga ru ni// rtse gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga pas// 'du 'phro yang nas yang byas pas// snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung// de nas ting 'dzin bdud rtsi

yis// lan grangs 'bum phrag mang por bzlas// bzlas pa'i tshul ni rnam gsum dang// rdo rje sngags zlos rtse gsum pa// de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung// 'od zer lnga dang ldan par bya// zhing de ltem ltem por

gyur dang// bdud rtsi lnga yis bsku bar bya// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga dgod// yan lag lnga la yul lnga ste// dbang po lnga la sems dpa' dang// sems ma 'khril ba'i tshul gnas bya// rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
ni// gsal zhing 'tsher bar bsgoms nas ni// sngags kyi 'byung 'jug zhing la gzud// de nas zhing de 'gul gyur nas// shin tu zhags pas bsdam par bya// yan lag rnams kyang gzhum par bya// phyogs bzhi

dag tu thod pa bstan// de nas nub tu thod pa bstan// ha ya gri ba'i skur bsgom zhing// sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas// phyogs bcur spro zhing zhing la bstim// de nas zhing de drag 'gul na// rdo rje ting

'dzin de yis ni// brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya// de nas spar spar byed pa dang// a N+ri pri du tri gang yin// hri nri ar bsgyur ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje drag tu brdeg cing dbab// thod pa'i kha nas hri byung

nas// rdo rje ting 'dzin so yis bcad// rdo rje'i sngags zlos khong du bstim// gnyis su med par bsgom par bya// de nas zhing de langs pa dang// rdo rje byin nas dbang yang bskur// bdud rtsi'i chu yang blud par
bya// las rnams thams cad byed du gzhug/ de ltar bsgrubs pa'i rigs mchog gis// thal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur// sgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang// ri brag gnyan po bgegs gnas dang// gnas
khrod gnyan po tshor ma can// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i gnas// de dag tu ni bsgrub par bya// dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang// bcu drug man chad bsgrub par bya// phyi nang mchod pa'i yo byad
rnams// lam lnga'i zhing dang sman rnams bcang// 'bru rnams sna tshogs bcang bar bya// rtag tu tshogs kyis mchod par bya// rtag pa dag tu ma ldan na// nyin gsum mtshan gsum bar mi bcad/ kha zas rnams

kyang thob par bza'// btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te// mar me rtag tu gtang bar bya// rgyu ni nr-i yi mar las byas// yan lag bsku ba'ang de bzhin no// sdong po pad+ma'i rgyu las bya// snod ni dung chen

srubs med pa// lung po yod dang med kyang rung// de byi pu tra ma byung ba// mdog ni ban glang can la yod// rdo rje sgrub pa bar gcod phyir// rtag tu mtshams ni gcad par bya// nr-i yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon

nas// sbom po ma yin phra ba nyid// de la kI la ya byas la// phur pa'i sngags dang khro sngags dang// lan 'bum du ni bzlas nas ni// lag pa g.yas g.yon thal sor la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'od 'bar
gzugs kyi sku ru bsgom// de nas gnyis med sbyor tshul du// sgrub pa rdo rje bsgom par bya// sgrub pa dngos las ma gtogs pa// phyogs bcu rnams su mtshams yang gcad// dngos grub ma thob bar du
ni// bsgom dang bzlas dang phyag rgya gsum// bag yod mgo la me 'bar bzhin// bar mtshams med par bsgrub par bya// de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// lha ma srin rnams bran bzhin 'khol// 'jig

rten dbang phyur dbang du sdud// rdo rje rigs mchog 'khor rkyen rnams// yid bzhin du ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag ni// lus sdud nas ni mngon du phyung// de ma yin par shin tu gsang// rgyud

kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ ro langs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las ting nge 'dzin gyis rim par sbyong zhing/ dngos grub myur du
len pa'i thabs dra ba las 'di skad ces gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub pa// mi dmigs dbyings las don 'byin te// ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil
'khor 'byung// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang sgyur nas// ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams cad maN+Dal// ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed

skyong// longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing// de ltar 'dod pa smon na 'grub// yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid de// 'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin
no// dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na// shin tu phra zhing zab par bsgom// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom// ting nge 'dzin de goms pa dang// thams cad sgyu ma

mig yor dang// sprul pa'i tshul du shes bar bya// de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas// de nas phra ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang sgrub yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgom kun tu
'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'du// yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid// yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdu// nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod bar// yang nas yang du 'dis pa dang// 'od zer mang po spro bar
bya// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang// slar yang hUM la bstim par bya// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su thim// thim gyur dbyings nas a dkar 'bar// shin tu 'tsher bar gsal bsgoms la// thams cad a
ru gyur par bsgom// de bzhin nyid du 'dris gyur nas// a las ma'i dkyil 'khor spro// a ma gsal bar 'byor gyur nas// nyi zla gang bar sgril mar bsgom// hri gsal pad+ma chags med bsgom// rin chen
'bar ba'i gzhal med khang// nyi zla gdan dang bcas par bsgom// thams cad 'dus shing 'phro bar bsgom// de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa// mthing kha 'tsher la gsal ba yi// 'od zer 'phro ba rnam par
bsgom// 'od 'phros dbyings su slar bsdus nas// shin tu rdo rje 'phro bar bsgom// rdo rje 'od 'phros gsal 'bar nas// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas// shin tu phra
zhing 'dus par bsgom// de bzhin gnyis med gsal gyur nas// sku gcig rdo rje dril 'bar bsgom// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang// dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom// gzhan yang khro 'dul sna tshogs
bsgom// blo yi shes rab che chung las// rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya// yang na gcig char bsgom par bya// nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig tu// chu dkyil dngas par gsal ba bzhin// de ltar goms rtogs
rigs mchog des// ji ltar dbang sgyur bzhin du 'grub// mkha' lta 'phyo dang rigs 'dzin gnas// chu rgyun zlog dang rlung mi 'gul// ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul// chu la mi 'bying mes mi 'tshig/ dug

dang mtshon gyis 'jigs mi 'gyur// mi snang ba dang mang por sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur dang// tshe dang dus la bsring bstung dang// stong gsum nyungs 'brur shong
ba dang// yungs 'brus stong gsum khengs pa dang// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams// khyi bzhin phyi nas 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud dang gdug pa la sogs
pas// tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa// ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog brnyes// thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlabs
kyis// so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston// 'gro ba ma lus don yang byed// las rnams thams cad kun byas na// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan// bsod nams ye shes
tshogs chen ldan// mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub// sgrub med spangs med chos kyi dbyings// 'ong med 'gro med de bzhin nyid// 'di ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur

kyang// tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur// theg pa dman par yongs mi 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// shin tu gsang ba dngos

grub myur du thob par bya ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi

dbyings ldan te// rgyu dang dra bar 'brel gyur nas// rgyu mchog rdo rje 'od snang ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba// rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo// de bzhin sku mchog dri
bral dang// bde gshegs sku lngar mdor bsdus te// bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs// bla med gzugs dang rdo rje'i sku// de la sogs te sku bsam yas// phyogs bcu kun tu dus bzhir ni// thabs

kyis 'gro 'dul skur ston te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i sku// chags med zhing du sku ston pa// dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du snang// sku snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// rnam dag sku ston ma yin te// log

'gro rtog pa thams cad la// so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston// de tshe skye shi med pa'i sku// las dang ma chags pad+ma'i sku// thar dang ma thar sna tshogs kyang// sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med// snang dang mi snang
gnyis ka min// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// rdo rje zhes ni gdags pa yin// ji snyed sku ston bsam yas pa// thams cad ma lus rdo rjer bsdus// 'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa yis// de la sogs te
sku bsam yas// byang chub thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang// gzha' tshon chu zlar 'drar shes na// dbyings nyid la ni dbyings snang zad// thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor
snang// gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te// dbyer med de bzhin yong gis so// dkyil 'khor bzang po sgrub 'dod las// rtag tu dus gnas thams cad du// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med par// ye nas

dkyil 'khor yin par rtag/ 'di ni dngos grub mchog yin par// kun tu rgyal gyis de skad bshad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de

nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig sum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas/ sngags 'chang rnams kyi don ched du/ ched du brjod
pa 'di ched du brjod do// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang// rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yos
shing spros med kyang// rang rig 'phrul pa'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir bsam par bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtog nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na// de la

bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo yod yin na// nyon mongs spang zhing byang sgrub med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla ltar yin pas// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// rnal
'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// gnas ngan dus na log rtog nyid// gzung 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs na// bdag med ye shes rang rig
nyid// snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// so so'i rang bzhin nges she na// yang dag lam gyis bcos su med// de bas yang dag blo chen gyis// thams cad dngos po
med par bshad// dper na dug gi rigs shes pas// dug gis mi tshugs thabs yod ltar// ha la ha la'i dug rnams kyang// bsgrubs na ra sa ya na'i sman// bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub// nyon mongs

rang dang spyir bstan pa// mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang// gang na'ang med de de nyid yin// nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang// rang

dang spyi yi don brtags na// mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag/ so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du ni rnam par 'phro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes rab dbyings su rnam par
sbyong// gti mug ces ni brjod pa yang// ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te// gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad// rang gi mtshan nyid spyod pa ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo yod la sogs

brtag pa// rtog pa sgyu ma'i klung gyur te// log rtog spros pa'i rgyun yin la// thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste// bzod pa'i chos nyid dmigs can yin// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal
stong bdag med// ma rig pa ni spang du med// rig pa yang dag sgrub tu med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig thim// sgyu ma'i dngos por rtog pa ni// sgyu mar rtog nyid mi dmigs pas// mi dmigs de nyid sna

tshogs snang// skye pa nyid na chos nyid gcig/ dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// de nyid chos sku'i phyag rgya che// mi dmigs sgyu ma'i dngos po la// rtog pa'i yul gyis dngos nyid kyang// chos nyid mi
dmigs ye nas dag/ sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// yod med gnyis ka dbyer med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// chos nyid dmigs su med pa

ste// mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spro// gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// de ltar gti mug spang du med// rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin// zhe sdang rang dang spyir bstan pa// kun

nas mnar sems rtogs pa yi// sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad la// 'jug par mos pa'i rang bzhin can// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// zhe sdang snying rje spang bsgrub
med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mnar sems pa// dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na// sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang// chos ky-i dbyings las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs pa
nyid sgyu mar skye// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// bdag dang srog dang sems can dang// gang zag gso ba'i rang bzhin med// snang ba thams cad bdag med de// mnar sems chos kyi dbyings su
gcig/ thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// kun dang dbyer med chos sku yis// kun la rtag pa'i phyag rgya yin// mi dmigs de ltar snang pa la// phyin ci log gi blo bslad pas// rtog pa'i yul la mnar

sems te// chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs shing// myang 'das 'khor bar dbyer med phyir// don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu

ma'i chos nyid las// gdul bya'i zhing ni bsam yas sprul// 'dul thabs las kyang bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na// rnam par

byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med// nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ khong nas 'gying zhing sems khengs pa// pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag
sdug bsngal stong bdag med// nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas// kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying nyid// de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te// chos nyid mi dmigs med pa

las// dregs pas khong khengs 'gying bar skyes// skyes 'gying nyid na dmigs med de// skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings su gcig/ 'gying ba'i rang bzhin ngang gis dag/ 'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir// chos
sku'i phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs 'gag pa med pa nyid// log rtog sgyu ma 'gying bar skyes// 'gying bas yul gzhan gnon pa nyid// chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te// sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med
phyir// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni// nga rgyal gdul bya bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag

rgya chen po yin// nga rgyal spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// zhi sgrub nga rgyal spang du med// 'dod chags rang gi mtshan nyid ni// sred pa kun la zhen pa ste// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa

ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chags spangs ma chags sgrub tu med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'dod cing chags pa sgyu mar srid// mi dmigs pa la mi

gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams bdag las mi gzhan te// spyod pa sgyu mar ro gcig phyir// chos nyid chos can dmigs su med// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med phyir// chos sku'i phyag rgya
chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'dod sred cing// chos nyid de la chags rtog pa// yul dang 'dod chags rang nyid kyang// skye med chos nyid mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// bden gnyis
dbyer med ro gcig pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs dbyings nyid spros med las// 'dod chags sgyu mar spros pa ni// gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi

khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// 'dod chags mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni// rnam par byang pa ma yin phyir// chags dang ma chags gnyis med par// 'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med// phrag dog kun gyi

mtshan nyid ni// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan// thabs kyi sbyor ba'i rang bzhin can// phrag dog spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// dog pa spangs

shing yangs sgrub med// chos nyid du ni ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ni// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// phrag dog pa yi sgyu ma nyid// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu

mar skyes// phun sum tshogs par sbyor ba yi// thabs kyi sgyu ma'i chos nyid de// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pas// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen po yin// gang yang yangs dog mi dmigs las// sgyu mar gzhan gyi phun

tshogs la// phrag dog rtog par 'dzin pa dang// rtog pa'i phrag dog mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// bden pa gnyis kar ro gcig pa// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya

chen po yin// mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun tshogs la// phrag dog rnam rtog spros pa ni// gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// phrag dog mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni// rnam par byang ba'i
mtshan nyid de// dog pa spang med yang sgrub med// sems can rnam pa mang po kun// nang gi chen po lnga bstan pa// rang spyi'i mtshan nyid spyad par bya// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// ma grol
khams gsum 'khor ba yin// de ltar nges par ci mngon na// sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad// kun la gnod par byed mi nus// thabs dang shes rab rtogs pa yi// dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi
'gyur// thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na// lam gyi dge spyad stegs bcas kyang// mtho rigs lha dang mi ru skye// skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob// thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni// mtshams med sems can ma
lus kun// byang chub snying rje bsad na yang// bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob// ma bsad bsad pa'i sems med na// phyogs can sems can yal por te// snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur// 'dod
chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/ gang phyir byang chub sems de ni// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal// nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs// ngo bo yin par yang dag
gsung// chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas// de phyir de
bzhin gshegs bsam yas// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// gsang sngags bla na med pa
ni// thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub// bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med// don dam cir yang ma grub la// sgyu ma'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// theg chen dag gis zin pa ni// nyon mongs lam yang rnam par

grol// thabs chen dag gis ma zin na// dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang// rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya
ngan 'das// gnyis ka yod pa ma yin pas// 'khor ba stong par shes pa ni// de ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// nyon mongs phyin ci log rnam dag/ thabs la mkhas pas zin gyur kyang// grol la thar par mi

'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed kun// sngon dang smad 'tshong byed pa'ang lhung// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang// phal la med pas mi rung na// sngags
mchog shin tu zab pa yi// skye bo kun gyis dpya bar 'byung// de nas dges pa chen po des// bdud rtsi dang du blang bar gsungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med na// sku gsung rdo rje'i dbang thob
'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas su de phyir gsungs// mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtogs na// byol song la la mnyen zhing dul// zhi dul chos dang ldan gyur yang// drang srong gtsang ma 'phags mthun dang// ji
srid 'dod pa spong byed pa// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// chos rnams yongs kyis dag pa nyid// rnam bzhi'i tshul gyis don rtogs mngon// rgyu rnams rab tu dag pa dang// 'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur

te// don dam dmigs med rang bzhin dag/ kun rdzob sgyu mar ye nas dag/ rgyu yi mtshan nyid dag pa ni// phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te// sems nyid gzung 'dzin nyid snang ba// gzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba

che// rgyu nyid rang gi sems yin pas// 'byung ba chen po rgyu nas dag/ 'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni// sems can kun gyi rus pa ste// rdo rje byang chub sems yin la// sha ni pad+ma'i rak+ta yin// dri chen dri chu gur
kum chu// so so'i lus la gnas pa dag/ don dam dmigs med dag pa ni// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang// gang gi ngo bo'ang ma yin te// skye 'gag med par ye nas dag/ kun rdzob ye nas dag pa
ni// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang// chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas// mi dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang// de bzhin gshegs par ye nas mnyam// de bas gtsang sme med par spyod// sems can rtog

pa bzlog phyir sman// gtso ru dang du blang bar bya// de bas sems can phyin ci log/ chos rnams dag par ma shes pas// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs te/ kha cig ji srid 'tsho bar zos// byol song ma lus rtswa

mchog za// lha dang drang srong gtsang ma za// zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs// rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni// rang bzhin yong gis dag pa yis// mnyam pa'i dbyings su yang dag rtogs// thabs dang

shes rab 'brel ba yis// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rtogs pa'ang mtshan// gtsang dang mi gtsang rtogs pa'ang mtshan// mtshan ma gnyis kyang rnam spangs te// mkhyen pas dbus

la'ang gnas mi 'gyur// sgrub pa'i rdzas yang dag gsungs// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang// dri chen dri chu rak+ta dag/ bsgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bza'// dngos grub ya mtshan chen po 'grub// tshe la dbang dang

rig pa 'dzin// mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs med 'grub// mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i sa// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis// yi dam

mi spang brtag bsgom zhing// yi dam lha yi mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur// lha ni mi spang don nyid ni// lhun grub ye shes sems dpa' nyid// 'khor
dang bcas pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po ste// phyag rgya chen po'i sku rdzogs na// dkon mchog gsum po mchod pa yin// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyar na// yon tan chung yang
'grub par 'gyur// ye nas mnyam gnyis sbyor bas su// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam sbyor pas// dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam par 'byung// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam pa'i

phyir// sku gsum ye shes lnga rdzogs 'grub// rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya// byang chub ston pa'i 'dren pa po// long ba'i dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin// slob dpon de la
smod pa ni// dper na mun khang sgron bsad na// mthong ba'i don mi rtogs pa bzhin// sdug bsngal nyam thag yun rings su// bskal pa mang por myong par mngon// de bas gus pas rtag tu gyis// yul la dbang

ba'i rgyal po pas// shin tu gtso bar blang bar bya// drin chags skyed pa'i pha ma bas// shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni// bla med byang chub 'gro ba'i spun// chos nyid dam tshig smon lam

mthus// byang chub rigs 'dzin sar nges pas// de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni// rang la rang gis mtshon btab nas// rang srog tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar// rang gis gcod cing phung bar 'gyur// tshe 'dir mi bde
sna tshogs pa// mi 'dod bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang// ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa'i// sdug bsngal kha rgyud myong bar 'gyur// yun rings rtag tu mi thar pa'i// shin tu
nyam thag myong bar 'gyur// grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyad// gnyis med spyod dang rjes spyod spun// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin// shes rab gsal bas rtag tu gdung// yang dag nyid kyis de
skad gsungs// gsang ba'i gzhan la mi bsgrag cing// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor rnam pa rnam gnyis kyis// thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs na// mnyam pa'i spyod pas la dor

ro// phal dang mi 'dra yang dag rtogs// ma rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang// skye bo kun la rtag tu gsang// gsang phyir brda dag sna tshogs gsungs// thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yi// gsang sngags skyon yod
ma yin te// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// snod ma yin dang blo rtul rnams// las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang// brgya la gang zhig gsang don 'di// las 'phro ngan la bsgrags gyur na// dper na

gtsub shing me gtsubs na// gtsub shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang// gzhan yang 'tshig par 'gyur ba bzhin// chos don bzang po me dang 'dra// skal ba chung zhing shes rab dman// blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa'i
mis// mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pas// ngan song gsum du 'phang bar 'gyur// gsang thos ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong// gsang ba 'phel bar byed pa yang// smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing// sdug

bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur// des na sems can don phyir gsang// rlung phyogs tsam du'ang brjod mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa yang// don dam kun rdzob dbyer

med pa'i// mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge A+oM// de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thugs

dang ye shes lnga// bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya che// gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang sgyur te// goms shing brtan par bya ba yin// de bas bar chad brtson med na// dper na
sa bon tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa 'dra ba ste// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur// mi khom 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad
la// dmigs med gcig dang du ma bral// mtha' dbus gang yang ma yin pa'i// ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med// mnyam pa chen po'i phyag rgya yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang// 'jig rten 'das

dang 'jig rten pa'i// yon tan skyon rnams skye 'gag med// gang gi ngo bor ma grub mnyam// kun rdzob chos nyid dbyer med pa'i// mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo'ang min// chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs pas// snang zhing
bya ba byed nus pas// phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang// dus bzhi khams gsum thams cad dang// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// yon tan skyon rnams thams cad kyang// sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas
gnas// sngags 'chang gsal por rtogs byas nas// bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med// ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na// phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang// rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis// de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la// ma 'dres rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// sku gsung thugs ni
bsam mi khyab// mnyam pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgom// de ltar dam tshig 'di gsungs te// de la gnas na 'grub par 'gyur// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod

bya// lus dang ngag sems brtan gyur na// byang chub rab 'byams thob par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po las 'das na// nyen ni shin tu che bar gsungs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// sngags kyi spyod
pa don grub pa// rmongs pa gal te 'das byas nas// de yi srog kyang der zad 'gyur// dam tshig bsrung dang sngags bzlas dang// phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa bzhi// brtson 'grus che zhing brtan pas
zung// rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung gyur na// mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs// ji ltar ral gri rnon po la// legs par bzung ba ma byas na// nges par lag pa chod pa ltar// de bzhin nan tan med pa
yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni bzlas pas kyang// yan lag sku ni ma gsal na// 'chi ba'am 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni// don ldan ma nyams dag byas shing// brtson 'grus cher
bskyed myur bar 'grub// sngags bsgom ma nyams phyag rgyar gsal// cho ga yo byad gtsor ma gsungs// 'tshogs na yang ni nyes pa med// ma 'tshogs na yang 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor

bas// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang// 'grub par 'gyur te nyes skyon med// ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dam tshig sum brgya pa rtsa ba bco lnga pa mdor bshad pa'i le'u
ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal pos/ dam tshig bco lnga pa'i mdo 'di ltar yang bshad de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid
du// dbyings su ro gcig de bsdus te// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor bas na// chags pa med pa'i tshul
du spyod// 'di ni rnams dag legs pa'i lam// byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas// bde mchog mi zad rin chen gter// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku// nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni// lus dang
zas kyis bsgribs 'gyur te// yi dwags sdug bsngal gnas su 'gro// skom dang bkres pa'i nyon mongs 'gyur// rnag khrag ngan skyugs rtag mthong yang// de la spyod pa'i dbang yang med// rtsub shing gdug
bas bsrung bar 'gyur// thugs rje chen po'i zhe sdang gis// 'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo bcad cing// bde gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed// yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur// thugs rje'i tshul gyis khro ston
pa// shin tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jog/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhi ba'i sa// yang dag mchog gi bde ba 'grub// ye shes gsal ba'i gti mug ni// bdag dang bdag gis dbyer med de// rang bzhin med pa'i
dbyings la rol// thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngang// kun tu khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba// shin tu 'od gsal rnam dag lam// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa sbyong// sems can nyon mongs dug sel
'gyur// thams cad zhing sbyong nga rgyal ni// yon tan skyed pa'i mdzod yin te// nga med bdag med mi dmigs la// su zhig de la nga rgyal med// dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// shin tu rgyal
ba'i khyu mchog 'grub// lha srin bdud sde tshar gcad pa'i// dpa' bor 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob// phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba// nga dang bdag med don rtogs na// dog dang yangs pa gnyis ka
med// bde mchog dkyil 'khor yangs pa 'grub// phrag dog dngos po mi shes bzhin// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin gyur na// lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye// de nas yi dwags dag tu 'gro// gal te yul sa rnyed gyur
na// shin tu mi bde dog par 'gyur// gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la// dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur// mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub// phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni// nga dang
bdag tu 'dzin pa dang// phyin ci log la phrag dog ste// thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor// bde ba mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'gyur// nga med bdag med dbyings
su thim// lhun grub don mchog 'grub par 'gyur// yi dam lha ni rtag bsgoms na// rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi// bdag gis kun la dbang sgyur te// rigs 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje slob
dpon smad mi bya// yon tan rin chen gter chen po// thams cad ma lus ston pa ste// nyon mongs ma lus rtsa gcod pa// bla med 'bras bu thob par byed// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po bas// shin tu lhag pa'i

bkur bsti bya// drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// phyag rgya chen por rtag tu bzhag/ sngags ni rtag tu brjod par bya// nyin yang lan gsum

mtshan lan gsum// mkhas pa dag gis rgyun du bya// bar ma chad bar bsgrims te gnas// gsang ba'i man ngag spel mi bya// rdo rje'i lce yi tshul yod kyang// theg pa dman dang ma 'dres pa// skye bo phal la smra mi

bya// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral la// mngan sems spya sems smad pa dag/ rji phyogs tsam du'ang smra mi bya// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// bdud rtsi sman rnams rtag tu spyad// bla med 'gro ba'i gsos yin

pas// gtsang sme med par bza' bar bya// yid bzhin bdud rtsi dbang byed 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog chen po ni// sangs rgyas lnga po de yin pas// mi spang rtag tu bsgrub

par bya// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi lta ba dam tshig yin// mi gtong phyir yang dam zhes bya// gzungs su gyur pas dam zhes bya// rdo rje dam pa slob dpon des// rdo rje ma
nor lam ston pas// de la yang ni tshig ces bya// yang na de bzhin bka' bcag pas// mi khom gnas su 'tshig par 'gyur// dam tshig ces ni de la brjod// rdo rje rigs kyis bsgrub bya ba// sbyor

dang sgrol bas mthar phyin 'gyur// sbyor ba nyid na sgrol ba yin// sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor grol dang// ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor sgrol dang// dbang po yul du sbyor sgrol dang// thabs

chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang// mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo// yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la rdzogs// shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu sbyor// thabs chen sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dbyings dang dbyings su thams
cad sgrol// rol pa'i 'phrin las bsam mi khyab// thugs rje'i sprul pa cir yang ston// sbyor sgrol 'phrin las bdag la rdzogs// byang chub sems sprul phyogs bcur 'phro// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par
byed// rigs 'dzin bde ldan thob par byed// bla med zhing rnams dag par byed// sku gsung lhun grub phyogs bcur 'dul// rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te// theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod// zad mi
shes kyi gter du'ang 'gyur// rdo rje rigs pa 'dzin gyi sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ thugs rje'i sprul pa dpag med kyi// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus

mkhyen// 'gro ba nyid ni nyid kyi sku// nyon mongs byang chub lam du mkhyen// 'khor ba nyid na bde gnas so// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'// dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o// spong ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

dam tshig ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje thugs rje'i ngang// dmyal ba'i gnas rnams tshar gcod pa// brgyad brgyad bcu drug zhing du sbyor// tsha ba rnams la bsil ba'i sman// grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman// bsil dro 'jam

rtsub cha snyoms la// thugs rje'i byin brlabs de ltar ston// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// chags pa'i ye shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// ji
ltar bde ba'i ro myong bzhin// myong tshor nyid na rang bzhin med// chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// yi dgas gnas rnams tshar gcod cing// lus dang gnas kyis bsgribs pa yi// nyon mongs gnyis ka med
par byed// gti mug ces pa'i dam tshig ni// nga dang bdag med dbyer med pa'i// shes rab chen po'i 'od gsal gyis// dran smra med pa'i sdug bsngal gsol// rmongs med sgrib pa dag par byas// ye shes

gsal ba'i thugs rje yis// bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol// byol song gnas ni stongs byed cing// thugs rje'i sgron ma de ltar ston// phrag dog chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yengs pa chen po'i ye shes
med de yang dag nyid// rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor

zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang rig nyid la gnas pa yis// sus kyang ma byas rang rig ste// thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyar// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis// ma

lus de bzhin nyid du sdud// sdud dang mi sdud gnyis ka ni// yang dag kho na nyid du'o// bde ba'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus rnam par dag/ nyid kyi dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// bde
dang mi bde gang yang med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang btsan pa// yang dag nyid kyis de skad bshad// bshad dang nyan dang gnyis ka min// de bzhin nyid du yang dag

'du// dus bzhi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thas cad kun la dbang sgyur te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad dang// 'byung dang

'byung bar ma nges pa'i// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi// mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner sbyor// lhun grub ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten

pa'i// thams cad dbyer med byang chub ste// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i chos// ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa yi// byang chub lam chen 'di yin te// thams cad dbyer med nyid du 'dus// byang chub don sgrub ye nas
rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim// rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// theg pa che mchog rigs su nges// rigs de byang chub brtan pas gzung// thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings shes
na// rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// las dang las kyi bag chags med// ces kyang ma gos thams cad 'joms// skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin// byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa

zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// snang grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa// phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag/ de bzhin dbyings kyi ngang du thim// mdor na zhing khams ma lus pa// yon
tan rin chen bkod pa yi// ye shes rgyan gyis bkras pa'i rnams// zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab// ye shes bzhugs gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa
kun gyi gnas// gsang sngags chen po sgrub 'dod pas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i don nyid rtogs// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can ni// gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig/ de ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni// rdo
rje'i gzhug gnas yin par bshad// ma 'jigs rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis// so so yod pa ma yin te// nyon mongs gnyen pos bcos su
med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig pas// de la 'jigs pa'i gnyen po med// cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang yin// nga med bdag med rgyal ba'i mchog/ gzhal yas khang

brtan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas su// dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu med// sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan// ye shes rgyu las grub
pa'o// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// zag pa zad pas grub pa yi// nams kyang 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings// sna tshogs kun bsgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gdos pa can gyi chos min pas// ji ltar
bsams pa bzhin du 'grub// rig pa rang dbang gyur nas ni// stongs par bya'am mi stong bya// thams cad dbyer med nga yin pas/ kha dog dbyibs kyang rin po che// thams cad khyab dang yungs
'bru'i tshul// bsam yas mtha' dbus med pa'o// 'dren byed gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ma rig log rtog bsam yas kyis// 'jig rten khams rnams rgyud cing 'khor// 'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'bras

bu gnyis// gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma// yang dag byang chub sems rig na// ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste// thams cad ma lus bde gnas pa'o// lam la ston byed ces bya
ba'i dam tshig ni/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom bya ste// nyon mongs lam lnga sgom bkag nas// lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin// rtog dang mi rtog gnyis ka min// gnyis med de nyid yang dag lam// thabs

dang shes rab ngang nyid du// shin tu mnyam gzhag rtogs bya zhing// bla med lam la ston par byed// yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang// de bzhin nyid kyis ma

brjod kyang// sems can blo yi rim pa bzhin// so sor 'tsham par kun la bstan// 'di ni rdo rje theg mchog ste// rgya mtsho'i gling du chu 'bab bzhin// thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid// theg pa thams cad rdo rje'i
sa// rab tu rtogs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab blo chen rab ldan pas// don du mi 'gyur yang ma gsungs// srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su// thugs rje ston pa bsam mi khyab// don dang mthun
pa 'ba' zhig ston// mi mthun zhags pas 'khor ba gcod// bde gshegs zhing rnam dag par byed// thams cad dbyings su rtogs par 'dus// sgyur byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang rig ye shes
dbang thob pas// dkar po tshon gyi mdog bstan bzhin// dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang// de bzhin dug gsum byang chub ste// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thar par

byed// thar dang ma thar gnyis ka med// thams cad ma lus byang chub rgyu// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang// log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// sgyu ma yin phyir
rang bzhin mnyam// mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor lo// theg mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs// dpe byad mtshan bzang dpag tu
med// thams cad dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// spyod yul thams cad smon na mkhyen// de bzhin nyid du kun rtog la// gnyis su med par dbang sgyur te// ma
lus thams cad bde ldan zhing// thams cad byang chub mchog tu 'gyur// ye nas dngos po med pa la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rigs 'dzin gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab rnam

gsum goms byas na// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te// rtag tu yangs pa chen po sgom// rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa yi// rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yis// brgya brgyad
dag tu bsnur zhing gnas// lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas sa// zad med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab chen po rnam dag pas// spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur// shes dang spyod yul
gnyis su med// de bzhin nyid du ro gcig ste// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas// zad med rin chen gtor du 'gyur// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi mchog/ 'og min mtha' dbus bsam mi khyab// sgrub med

mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yin// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis min pa// de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/ thams cad gnyis su med

pa la// sgrub dang grub par yod ma yin// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la// de la lam gyis bcos su med// thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ye nas dag gyur kyang// phyin ci log
gi blo log nas// log rtog gnas dang longs spyod dang// ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab// 'khrul rtog blo ngan bzlog pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris
gnas// byang chub lam chen rtogs par ston// gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// mi dang tshig tu brtags nas ston// ji snyed mang po'i don brjod
kyang// rdo rje'i gsung la spros pa med// spros med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// kun tu brda 'jal ye shes gsung// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// thams cad pad+ma chags pa med pa'o// bsgyur ba
zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du dbang sgyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbyings su bstim// zad med ye shes
gter ldan pa// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor don rtogs rnam par dag/ thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thar pa'i dkyil 'khor

'bum phrag dag/ 'gro drug du gnas ma lus la// gsung gcig tshig tu ma brjod kyang// sngon gyi thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// thar dang ma thar gnyis ka la// so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// chos nyid gsung
mchog dam pa yis// thar pa bskul zhing ngan song sbyong// rang rig dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de ni ji snyed yod pa yi// mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa
yang// rang rig rnam par rtog pa nyid// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang// ye shes rnam par dag pa'i yul// yi ge

med 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yi ge'i tshogs dang sgra spangs pa'i// brjod med ngang du gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos rnams thams cad ye nas dag/ thams cad thugs su gyur pa

nas// sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min// thugs ni thugs la mi gnas pa'o// bdud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// bdag nyid lha yi
dkyil 'khor te// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gnas// bdud bzhi bcom pa'i skyes mchog gis// dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom// ma rig log 'dren 'dul mdzad de// chos kyi dbyings su thams
cad thim// stong gsum kun grags zhes bye ba'i dam tshig ni/ thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// 'gro ba'i 'phrin las bsam mi khyab// sku gsung thugs dang yon

tan las// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad gdul bya chud ma zos// ngan song sbyong zhing byang chub zhing// ye shes tshogs rdzogs kun tu ston// ye shes gsung mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/
'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// yang dag shes pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cir yang snang// snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid de// de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang
can// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar gnas// 'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin// bsam yas rdo rje'i gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mtha' dang dbus med

kun tu khyab/ khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i sku// sgra skad sna tshogs grags pa yang// dngos po med pa dngos po'i sgra// ji ltar pi wang la thogs na// sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung gyur kyang// dngos po med pa de bzhin
nyid// phyogs dus dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad dang// dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun// phyogs dus snga phyi med pa yis// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// 'jig
rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor snang ba thams cad kun// rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'du// rang rig de nyid thams cad yin// 'jig med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus

byas yin// 'dus byas snang ba'ang rdo rje nyid// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka min// yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med de// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// gzhig dang gshig par

bya ba min// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag/ de bzhin sku nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// thar ba rnams la dag pa'i sku// rtog pa rnams

la 'khor ba'i lus// so sor 'tsham par don ston cing// stonapa nyid na dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du kun la snang// kun la de ltar rtogs par byas// lhun grub bde gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos
rnams ma lus thams cad la// byang chub snying po yod par blta// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i// byang chub snying por thams cad 'dus// phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun// bdag gi ngang du gnas pas

na// bdag la bdag ni dbang sgyur nas// spyod yul thams cad smon na shes// che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig na/ rig pa rang dbang gyur pas na// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur te// gong na med pa'i
sa mnan pas// thams cad kun gyi gtso bo yin// thams cad ma lus gnyis min pa// sgom dang bsgom par bya ba min// de bzhin nyid la dbang sgyur bas// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig go/ chos kyi dkyil
'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud dag rnams la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas// chen po'i gzugs snang thams cad ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sgyu ma rtsal
rnams 'dzin gyur pa// de bzhin yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te// thams cad kun nas 'khyil bar gnas// zad med gter chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ zag bcas gnod sbyin
nor 'dra ba// sems can 'phel 'grib zad 'gyur gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni// zag med 'phel 'grib med pa yi// mang du spros pas phra mi 'gyur// nyung du bsdus pas
sbom po min// zad med rin chen gter yin pas// thams cad kun tu khyab pa'o// rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// rnam rtog
rkyen gyis blo bur du/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson rar gnas// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yis// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba gnyis// rang bzhin med par don rtogs na// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par
dag/ gzung 'dzin bral byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyin ci log tu rnam brtags pa'i// bdag dang bdag gir so sor snang// de la 'dzin pa gnyis zhugs na// rang bzhin med pa bzhin so sor snang// yang

dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// dngos po thams cad stong pa yin// dngos dang stong nyid mi gnas pa// de rtogs sdug bsngal bral byed yin// yum gyur dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'byung ba lnga
la brten gyur na// thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus gnas// skye 'khrungs ma lus gzhi yang yin// thams cad kun gyi rgyu yang yin// de bzhin shes rab rnams gsum gyis// le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus

'bod// de bzhin dbyings nyid rtogs gyur na// bla med byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas// chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu
nyid rang bzhin gnyis ka dag/ rang bzhin ye nas de bzhin no// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa ni// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// sems can don

byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// byang chub sems su rgyu gcig pas// rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa snod// nyon mongs lam las grol bar byed// nyon mongs khams gsum gnas pa

yang// phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin// de rtogs mtho ris thar pa'o// rtogs na don 'dzin zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang// sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa// gnyis ka rang rig nyid

du 'dus// de nyid yang dag yin par dag/ sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni/ yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin// ming tshig sgra la mi rten par// blo yi gting du go bar byos// sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam
tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems nyid las ni gzhan na med// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// byang chub lam de ring ba min// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// ga nas ma 'ongs gar mi
'gro// rtog med rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// rjod med spros med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa
yang// so so'i mtshan nyid ma rtogs pa// ba spu'i cha tsam brjod pa med// bsod nams chen pos btang ba ni// sangs rgyas zhing nyid dag pa'o// las ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas// de gnyis dbyings

las spros pa med// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rnam dag sku gsung sprul pa la// che mchog sna tshogs bstan pa yang// byang chub sems la snang gyur te// snang ba nyid na dbyings su 'ub// phyin
ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis/ khams gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor// de nyid log rtog sna tshogs snang// de las ma gtogs gang yang med// ye nas ma bcos pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bla med byang

chub smos ci dgos// 'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snying por gnas// de bzhin dbyings kyis kun tu khyab// ji lta ba yi ngang gnas la/ de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas// gnyis su med
par rtogs gyur na// su yi bcos su su yis rtogs// rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi// sus kyang ma byas ngang gis

gsal// ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi// ye shes can gyi spyod yul te// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs// thams cad dbyings phyug ma zhes bya
ba'i dam tshig ni/ mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// bdag dang bdag gi med pa yi// shin tu zab pa'i blo las byung// chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na// sku dang ye

shes bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang rig don rtogs na// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// byang chub sdom zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis// chags med dbyings la mnyam gzhag

na// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing// nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur// bdag gis yang dag rtogs byas te// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ thams cad mnyam pa'i
dbyings su dgod// phyogs dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang// rtog pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang// snang ba nyid na dbyer med de// mtha' dbus med de zlum po
yi// de bzhin rang gi rig pa yang// mtha' dang dbus med du ma min// gang du mi 'gro kun tu khyab// kun la de bzhin mi gnas pa'o// thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams so sor
rtogs byas shing// thams cad gnyis med dbyings shes na// mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste// kun tu zad med rin chen gter// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi
'byung ste// rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// thabs nyid shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid

dang// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// sbyor dang mi sbyor gnyis ka med// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de nyid shes rab yin par bshad// rtag tu thabs nyid mi

dmigs pa'o// shes rab nyid thabs su sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang 'byung// 'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med// med pa nyid na sna tshogs
snang// thams cad shes rab dbyings las phyung// mnyan bsam sgom pa'i shes rab kyis// shes rab thabs kyi don rtogs byos// kun la de ltar 'byor bar gyis// gnyis med byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig
ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur na// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro ste// kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po// de yis ma byas gang yang med/ kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min// shin tu brtag dka' sus
mi rigs// bdag gis bdag rang mi mthong na// gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// thams cad sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas lha dang lha mo yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang// dbang po

yul du sbyor ba'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum du 'byor// dus bzhi lha mo nyid du sbyor// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo bzhi'o// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun// mnyam pa'i dbyings
dang rigs par sbyor// yang na shes rab dbyings ma la// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la// bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms te// gnyis su med par ldan par bya// rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur
nas// byang chub pad+ma shin tu spro// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor kun bkod la// 'gro ba mang po bde thob nas// slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// bde
gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs// phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs// bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs// thams cad dbyings su 'byor bas na// ngan 'gror mi lhung yang dag 'grub// 'di ni

bsgral ba chen po yin// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// sbyor ba nyid na ma lus bsgral// thams cad ma lus bsgral ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa// gnas pa'i sems can thams
cad kun// bdag nyid chen po rtogs pa yis// dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya// shin tu khro bo chen po yis// thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar// chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin
