gyis// gnyis su med par thabs kyis bsgral// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas// thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya'o// ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la// gnas
pa'i sems can ma lus kun// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs te// ye shes me chen bsgom byas nas// thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis

brlab// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur// de ltar bsgral ba kun byas kyang// bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med// phung po lnga po gzhig pa la// bshig na 'byung ba bag la zha// ma bshig na yang 'byung ba
yin// rnam shes med pas bsad byas na// gnas pa nyid na dngos po med// sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang// sus kyang zin cing gsod pa med// 'o na thugs rjes

gang bsgral na// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun// phyin ci log las bzlos byas te// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang// shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de tsam la
ni bsgral zhes gdags// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsa bcad nas// byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin// ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i
dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// rang bzhin ngang gis bdag med pas// kun la thogs med spyad gyur

kyang// spyad dang spyod pa gnyis ka med// thams cad ye nas stong pa la// gang gis len cing gang la spyod// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// thogs pa med par spyad gyur kyang// 'ching bar mi 'gyur bsod
nams tshogs// chags med ye shes chen po yin// ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings// de nyid rang rig yin par bshad// gnyis su med par rtogs gyur na// blangs pa nyid na kun tu bzang// brdzun du smra ba

zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas dngos po yod min te// rang bzhin ngang gis 'od gsal la// ming dang tshig gis mtshon mod kyis// ming dang tshig la dngos po med// ma

rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis// nga dang bdag tu med pa la// so so'i mtshan ma dngos por gzung// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod med de// chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam// ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang// rjod
par byed dang brjod pa med// chos rnams thams cad rdzun du snang// rdzun nyid la ni rdzun spyod de// rdzun zhes brtag tsam yod ma yin// thams cad rdzun gyi tshig bzhin no// rdo rje 'joms byed ces

bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thog ma med nas phyin ci log/ bdag dang bdag gi med pa la// rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// 'dzin pa dngos por yod ma yin// mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i
ting 'dzin gyis// bdag rtog bag chags kun bcom nas// rdo rje dbyings su thim par bya// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor
ba rnams// gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba min// 'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor// blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis// chos kyi don po mchog nyon la// 'khor ba spangs med sangs rgyas zhing// thams cad ma
lus chos nyid rtogs// rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nor gyi mchog ni dkor bdun yin// 'dod pas btsal bas mi rnyed de// rang rig dbyings kyi ye shes dang// sku gsung thugs 'das mi
dmigs pa// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// dmigs su med par 'byor byas na// nor bdun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan// pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/
'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba min// pad+ma 'dam nas skyes dang 'dra// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// bdag las gud na gcig kyang
med// bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing// don rnams grub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rdo rje'i rigs kyis thams cad bcom// rin chen rigs kyis yon tan
'byin// pad+ma'i rigs kyis chags med 'gyur// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// thams cad don rnams rdzogs par bya// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// mnyam pa'i dbyings la sems kyis blta// skye
shi med par lhun gyis 'grub// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las rmad byung kun grags pa// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// rang byung ye shes gnas med yin// mtho dman kun gyi gzugs

snang dang// bla med byang chub skur snang ba// me long lta ba'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// brjod med rang
bzhin kun tu go/ nyon mongs med cing bla med sgra// ma brjod stong gsum grags pa yis// gsung brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// brjod pa med na stong gsung med// de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa'o// thams cad
mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med// de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// sus kyang ma bcos
ma byas pa// bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs mi 'gyur// dngos med kun la dbang sgyur ba// sku gsung yang dag ldan gyur na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du 'ub// spyod
yul ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung// mi zad rin chen gter chen 'grub// gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yi// byang chub dkor ni rin po che// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs

kyis// bya byed med par rnam bzhi mdzad// mdzad dang mdzad par bya ba med// sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod// spyod med ngang gis dkyil 'khor la// chags med tshul du rnam par rol// bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs

kyang byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mod kyis// brjod pa'i mtshan nyid yongs med de// mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang// de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid

yin// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// de ni rig pa rang dbang sgyur// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyis
kun tu khyab// snod bcud ma lus thams cad la// snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur// nam mkha' bzung du med pa ltar// snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni nam

mkha'i rang bzhin no// rten byed sa chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrung ma lus thams cad 'byung// thams cad kun gyi gnas rten

te// de bzhin theg chen bla med la// byang chub sangs rgyas kun tu gnas// theg pa mtho dman thams cad 'byung// thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus// sreg byed 'bar ba ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/
bdag med rang rig ye shes kyis// dngos dang dngos med bag chags bsregs// rang dang spyi yi chos rnams dang// sems kyi phro rtog thams cad kun// dngos po med par rtogs byas nas// 'khor ba ma spangs
rnam par dag/ mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtog pa thams cad ye shes tshogs// thams cad 'khrug byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad ni// sgrib
gnyis dag gis 'khor bar gyur// mnyan bsam sgom pa'i shes rab kyis// bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas na// pha rol phyin rdzogs bcu sgrub// sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te// mnyam pa'i zhing la thams
cad bkod// khrus kyis mchog ni de yin no// g.yeng byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ye nas dag pa la// bdag 'dzin rdul gyis g.yog par gyur// sems dang rdul rnams med
rtogs pa// ye shes rlung gis bag chags gtor// chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la gzung du med pa ltar// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thams cad kun la dbang
sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang rig phyin ci log pa'i// gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gyur na// thams cad ma lus bdag yin pas// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur
te// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// ji ltar spyad kyang bsod nams tshogs// mnyam rigs ye shes chen po yin// chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams
cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// snang ba nyid na gzha' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med par kun tu snang// de nyid chos sku yin par bshad// cis kyang ma gos ma spangs pa'o// so sor snang zhing mthun pa'i

gzugs// bdag dang bdag tu ma brtag pa// de ltar bu yi ngang du snang// chos rnams sgra ltar shes pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang// dngos po med las dngos po'i sgra// brjod dang

sgra yi dngos po min// chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos// thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon las gud na med// sgra nyid don gyi dngos po min// don nyid sgra las gud na med// chos rnams dri

yi mtshan nyid du// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro// de bzhin dri yi dbang po yang// yod pa ma yin kun tu gsung// the tshom med

pa'i shes rab kyis// chos kun de ltar shes par gyis// dri yis rab tu tshim gyur kyang// dri dang snom pa gnyis su med// chos thams cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad

kun// gzhi rtsa med pas thams cad 'byung// de bzhin dbang po dngos med dang// rdzas kyi dngos po med pa yang// rnam shes dbang po yul tshogs na// ro yi dbang po thams cad 'grub// ro dang ro ru rtogs pa
yis// rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma// chos rnams thams cad reg bya ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzugs rnams lbu ba gdos pa 'dra// tshor ba chu yi bur bzhin// mtshan 'dzin smig rgyu bzhin du
gnas// rnam shes sgyu mas dbang sgyur na// mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// bde ba'i ro mchog kun yang myong// de nyid bsod nams tshogs chen te// bde ba chags med ye shes yin// 'dus byas rnam
par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yang dag nyid la gnas bcas na// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rags pa snang ba de bzhin gshegs// sgyu ma 'dzin pa yum gyi dbyings// gzugs kyi
mtshan ma dngos po med// gcig la'ang lnga lngar gzhig pa dang// thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du gnas// nam mkha' de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'dus ma byas kun tu 'byung bzhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/

gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang// log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong// rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med las// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad

snang// snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku// cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub// ci yang med par kun gyi bzhin// glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad kun// rnam rtog
'du byed mang pos g.yengs// ji ltar byis pa shes ma bye// bya byed mang pos g.yengs par gnas// bya byed mang po bdag med par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas// mtshan ma'i mnyam pa'i dbyings su
gnas// 'du byed sna tshogs mi g.yo brtan// dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad skye med pas// shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// rang rig ye shes 'od gsal
bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob ste// spyod pa'i chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun kyang rang bzhin ye nas bzlum// thams

cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// rang byung chen pos kun tu khyab// rang byung de nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no// chos dbyings de nyid zab
pa nyid// kun la gnas shing rtag dka' ba'i// rang rig dag pas dbang sgyur nas// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// ye nas bde gnas zhing du gnas// chos rnams dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam

tshig ni/ ye nas dbyings su ro gcig pas// de la nga dang bdag ma rtog/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo ma byed// thams cad bde gshegs snying po bas// rkyen gyi rdul gyis ga la
'go/ shes rab mchog gis de ltar rtogs// ma lus kun 'dus dbyings zhes byos// thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis// bdag rtog mtshan ma kun bshig

nas// mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya ru// thams cad 'dus par yang dag rtogs// rtogs pa nyid kyang dngos med la// de nyid sna tshogs par snang ba// snang ba nyid na bya byed med// de nyid 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya
yin// g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas// gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos med de la su zhig

bsad// gang zhig gnyis su 'dzin pa la// skye dang 'chi ba de la yod// ye shes can gyis rtags pa na// skye 'chi nyid na dngos po med// thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mchog gsum rdzogs
pa man chad nas// ngan song gnas rnams thams cad du// yang dag par ni dbyer med de// gang yang spang bar bya ba min// theg pa mtho dman bsam yas pa// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// ngan song

gnas rnams thams cad kun// bla med byang chub rgyu yod pa'o// thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad kun tu bzang po yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// thogs pa med par sbyar bya
ste// bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang brtag/ gzhan yang stong khams thams cad na// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams
cad spyad// thams cad ma tshud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rigs mchog ma rtogs pa// theg pa dman dang lta ba dman// des ni theg mchog rtogs mi

'gyur// mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis kun khyab kyang// nyon mongs sdug bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs// de yis yang bdag nyid mi mthong// mi mthong ba la mi chud bya// thams cad bsrung du med pa zhes bya ba'i dam

tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med// dge dang mi dge gnyis ka med// nyon mongs spang zhing byang sgrub med// de bzhin nyid kyi klung gyur na// bde dang mi bde dbyer
med de// ye nas rnam dag mnyam nyid gnas// de la srung du rdul tsam med// thams cad bsrung bya zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can khams gsum 'khor ba yi// thog ma med nas sems yan btang// phyin
ci log la 'jol nyog spyad// gzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags// des na 'khor bar rtag tu 'phyan// de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs nas// nga med bdag med mnyam par

bsrungs// thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal ba'i// sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun// de bzhin du na ma bsrungs nas// yak+Sha khro bo me dbal gyis// snying nas

drangs te khrag 'thungs nas// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de yi sdug bsngal gsod thag chad// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// dam tshig so sor spyad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rigs lnga so sor dbye ba

yi// de bzhin gshegs pa khyi yi sha/ rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/ rin po che ni rta yi sha/ pad+ma nya yi sha chen de// don yod nam mkha' lding gi sha/ dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// yang na thams
cad gcig tu bsdu// yang na mtshan nyid med par brtag/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ de bzhin nyid kyi rgyas btab pas// gnyis su dbyer med ting 'dzin brtan// de ltar
sangs rgyas sems can ni// rang rig byang chub sems yin pas// dus gsum na ni rgyal mi bzhugs// sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa'i// brjod pa'i tshig las 'das pa de// rgyal ba yin zhes rgyal ba
gsung// de ltar shes pa rgyal ba pas// thabs mkhas shes pa'i ting 'dzin yin// phyag rgya'i dam tshig chen po ni// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// thams cad

kun la yod par bshad// ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor nyid// bla na med pa'i mchog yin te// rdo rje rigs mchog thams cad kyi// bar ma chad pa rtag par sgrub// byang chub shing drung skye bar 'gyur// bla
med byang chub mchog kyang 'grub// skye shi med pa'i bde 'grub ste// sems la dbang yang thob par 'gyur// spyod yul thams cad smon na shes// gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na// nyon mongs ngan song
gnas su skye// byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// bla med 'gro ba'i rgyun yang bcad// rigs chad nyid du gnas par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu mnyam pa'i don rtogs la// sku ni
gzha' tshon tshul 'dra bar// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// 'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par// gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom// lha yi bu rnams gsal bsgom na// bsod nams tshogs

chen thob par 'gyur// de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na// ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom// yid dam lha de spangs byas na// ngan song mi bde rtag tu myong// sngags

dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad// don gyis zin par bya ba ni// rnal 'byor 'grub pa'i lam yin pas// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad// rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam yang yin// mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa'ang
yin// don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te// rtag tu mnyam gzhag phyag rgya yin// dug gsum gting 'byin sngags yin te// yang dag don chen klung 'dod pas// dus 'tshams med par phyag rgya sngags// yid

brtan rtag tu bzlas bsgom bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// phyag rgya spyod dang yi ge oM// rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa'o// yon tan zad med sbyin pa
yin// byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa// chags med zhing du 'god pa yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing// 'khor ba'i lam rnams stongs par byed// ma rig mun sel sgrol ma

yin// long ba rnams kyi dmigs bu mkhan/[ ]/ de la rtag tu mchod byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring// rdo rje mched lcam grogs mchog ni// rang sems dag pas 'grub sla'i phyir// rdo rje rigs kyi
spun yin te// thog ma med nas las mthun pas// lta spyod gcig tu 'dir skye ste// gcig la gcig ni mig 'drar bya// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// mched la ngan sems dpya byas na// dmyal ba chen por
ltung bar 'gyur// de bas dam tshig 'da' ma byed// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// srid gsum ma lus kun la khyab// phyin ci log gis rang bsgribs

nas// dbul mo gter dang gyad nor 'dra// de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di// gsang ba'i snod dang mi ldan la// shin tu gsang phyir bstan mi bya// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis// chos la skyon yod ma
yin te// sems can don phyir shin tu gsang// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ de la gsang ba bstan gyur na// rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par// 'phral gyi spyod tshul de dag la// shin tu nges pa'i don
gzung nas// gsang don de nyid log par 'khrid// ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor// de bas rab tu gsang bar bya// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// thar lam kun la mkhas par bya// shes rab mchog

dang ldan pas na// sems can snod rim dang sbyar zhing// theg pa mthon dman don nyid ni// so sor 'tsham par kun la bstan// dang du blang dang mi spang ba// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu spyad// chags pa med

par gyur pa dang// dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni// dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung// ma rtogs pa yis spyad gyur na// yi dwags srin po'i gnas su skye// yang na dam tshig 'di ltar bur// ji ltar spyad
kyang sdom mi 'da'// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis su 'gyur// 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba na// ma nyams de yi dbyings na gnas// shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bya
lam nam mkha' gcod bzhin gyis// 'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun// mkha' la rlung chen 'phyo ba bzhin// yid kyi rtogs chags ma lus pa// chu la nya chen 'phyo ba ltar// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar

ltos// de ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting spos// rdo rje theg mchog khas 'ches pa// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par// gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing// thug thub dag
tu spyad byas na// dmyal khams dag tu brgyud par 'gyur// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bur// mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min// mnyam dang rtog pa gang yang med// ci la'ang mi gnas kun
la spyod// spyod par byed dang spyad pa med// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin par skye// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// yon tan mi zad gnas kyang yin// mnyam pa'i don
nyid mi shes shing// kun rdzob don dam gnyis 'byed la// chos dang gang zag bdag med par// 'di ni byang chub sa ba yin// las dang nyon mongs thams cad la// mnyam pa'i don du mi shes shing// rten 'brel

rgyu 'bras yod 'dzin na// 'di na ring sangs rgyas kyi sa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bden bzhi'i dngos po yod blta zhing// spong dang mi spong byed gyur pa// 'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin// dge bcu dag
la gtsor len cing// dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas// lha dang mi yi skye gnas te// 'dod khams dag tu 'khor ba'i sa// mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtogs shing// tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi// rim par
so sor bdag 'dzin cing// gzugs sogs rnams la bdag tu rtogs// de ni tshangs gnas rim par skye// mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs nas// ming bzhi med par mi shes de// skye mched bzhi la gnas
gyur pa// srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru skye// thams cad mnyam par ma shes nas// ma lus kun la zhe sdang zhing// snying rje yang dag med gyur na// 'di ni mi zad chen po yi// dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa
yin// chags med dngos po mi shes na// thams cad kun la 'dod chags shing// lus kyi bsgribs dang zas kyis bsgribs// yi dgas chen po'i gnas su skye// nga dang bdag med ma shes shing// chos rnams
kun la rmongs byas pas/ shes rab gsal don med pas na// dge sdig gnyis kyi don ma rtogs// 'di ni byol song gnas su skye// shin tu nga rgyal cher bskyed cing// thams cad bdag gir bzung bas na// kun
dang rtsod pa'i las byed cing// lha ma yin gyi gnas su skyes// theg mchog mtho dman thams cad dang// 'jig rten lta ba thams cad kun// ye shes chen po rab brtags na// rang bzhin med las cir yang
'grub// rang bzhin dbyings las nyams pa med// shes rab chen po'i mig ldan pas// mthon dman gnas dang lam drung gnas// so so de bzhin 'khor bar gzigs// sngags mchog bla na med pas
na// mtshan ma kun tu mi rtag par// mnyam pa'i ngang du thams cad med// kun kyang mnyam pa nyid yin pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so so lta ba brjod mi bya// spyir ni log rtog bsam yas
pa// ye nas yod pa ma yin te// so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyis// gzung 'dzin dra bas bsgribs gyur te// ci yang med la cir yang snang// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de ltar rtogs na

bde 'gro'i gnas// rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i ltar spyod ni// ji ltar spyod kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la bya chen lding ba bzhin// chu la rkyal chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkha' la rlung chen

'gro ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myong bar 'gyur// de la su zhig chags par byed// spyod bzhin ma chags

ye shes yin// bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu yi ngang du spyod// 'di ni spyod pa brlabs chen yin// lta spyod ya char ma gyur pas// sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad/ kha cig lta ba mnyam

gnas dang// spyod pa dag dang yong mi mthun/ kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang// mnyam pa'i lta ba yong mi shes/ kha cig lta spyod gnyis ka med// yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis// don dam kun rdzob dbyer
med par// yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs// bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni// don dam du ni dbyer med de// kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la// dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po

ni// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu yang dbyer med de// lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo// thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni nor bdun no// kun
rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so// mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag/ thams cad dag ces bya ba yang// dngos po gsal dag ma yin
te// snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag/ dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las// rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rigs chen dag tu zad par 'dus// ma lus chos kun dbyer mi
dmigs// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje ste// rigs ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin// mi dmigs dbyings nas kun 'byung bas// yon tan chen po'i gnas yin te// zhing khams mi zad gnas kyang yin// 'di ni rin
chen rigs su gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// chags dang chags par bya med pas// de bzhin nyid du don gcig ste// nyes pas ma gos pad+ma yin// thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus
pas// 'di la bya ba rdul tsam med// ma byas bzhin du don grub pas// skyon yon byang chub nyid du sbyor// 'di ni las rnams grub pa yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// mtha' dang dbus med du ma
bral// gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid// dbyer med pa yi tshul rtogs te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// gsal ba dro bar gnas byed cing// mtshan
ma'i bag chags sreg byed pa// 'di na me yi rigs su bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ngang gis ye nas 'byor ldan zhing// mnyen chags nyid du gnas pa ni// yang nas yang du rgyun ma chad// mi
bde dag bas chu chen yin// chos rnams ma lung thams cad ni// dngos por snang la gzung du med// bskyod nas thams cad kun smra ste// 'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad// dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams
las// 'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad kun gyi 'tsho skyed yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// sra zhing rten pa'i gnas yod pas// dngos po med pa'i
tshul rtogs te// 'di ni sa chen yin par bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nam mkha' chen po yis// phyi dang nang gi go 'byed pa'o// thams cad gsal ba'i ngang yin te// 'byung ba bzhi
po thams cad kyang// thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du thim// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kyang// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'ub// nyon mongs pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ma rig pa ni rig par
gyur// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin gshegs// dngos med rtogs na byang chub lam// ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro// de bas thos bsam bsgom pa yis// yang dag don nyid
rtogs byas te// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// 'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na// yang dag don la chags byed de// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// ma chags pa la chags pa ni// shin tu

chags mchog chen po yin// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung 'gyur ba// snang mtha' yas kyi zhing dag yin// thams cad pad+mar rdzus las skyes// rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa ru ste// zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyin ci

log la zhe sdang zhing// zhe sdang dngos po med shes na// zhe sdang mi sdang mnyam shes te// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// thams cad kun tu dbyer med de// de ltar ma rtogs kun
la sdang// de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes// des ni zhe sdang nyid du mthong// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin// gti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pa// chos rnams ma
lus thams cad kun// don dam du ni dbyer med la// kun rdzob sgyu ma mig yor tshul// snang ba nyid na dngos po med// de la su zhig gnyis su 'dzin// thams cad dbyer med mi dmigs pa// shes rab can gyi
gti mug yin// de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o// nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mnyam pa nyid la gnas bcas nas// phyin ci log dang theg dman la// shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang// nga
rgyal zhi ba so so min// rang bzhin med pas dbyings su 'dus// 'di ni yon tan 'byung gnas yin// de bzhin dag par shes par byos// phrag dog mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa
ste// 'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin// mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus// mi mnyam pa la shin tu sdom// de bas phrag dog chen po yin// phyin ci log ni bdag tu

bcings// gzung dang 'dzin pa shin tu dog/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// dog yangs med de thams cad mnyam// de nyid shes pas las rab 'grub// phung po lnga shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phung po lnga por

snang ba yang// kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed// bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul// so so'i ro rnams myong byed cing// phung po'i mtshan nyid gzhig byas na// so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med// gang gis de la

dngos gzung na// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston// snang dang mi snang gnyis su med// de rtogs rnam
par thar pa'i gnas// gzugs nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi// bde dang mi bde'i dngos po med// gnyis ka ma yin lung ma

bstan// sna tshogs tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang// tshor dang 'byung ba gnyis ka stong// stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin// de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin// 'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// gsum tshogs mtshan

mar 'dzin pa yin// so so'i mtshan nyid gshig pa na// dngos po med de de bzhin nyid// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs pa// bya byed med par kun tu 'jug khams gsum ma lus thams cad la// mtshan ma che chung

bsam mi khyab/ khyab med dngos po yod ma yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan// 'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas// rtsa ba brgyad pos klong 'gyur te// lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kun la 'phro// de rtogs rtsa ba
yod ma yin// med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'byung// de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni// rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas/ khams gsum btson rar rgyun du 'khor// yang dag don bzhin rig pas ni// 'phro

ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid// de las rang rig 'byung ba ni// dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma// ye shes dbyings la rol par mdzad// sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin par bshad// kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes
te// de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/ kha dog dbyibs dang rigs brgyud min// gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs// 'di ni kun la dbang sgyur te// mtho ris 'gro'am ngan song 'gro// rtogs dang

ma rtogs khyad par ro// bzhi po mnyam pa'i ngang shes na// de ni ye shes chen po yin/ kha dog lnga yi dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang// rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs
byas te// ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong// ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang// ljang khu la sogs nag por bstan// chos rnams bdag
med rtogs byas na// byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu mdog ni dkar bar bstan// de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// pad+ma rA ga zhes brjod de// chags dang
chags par bya ba med// chags med phyir yang dmar po'o// yon tan gter chen zad mi shes// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la// zad med rin chen gter gyur
pa// mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan// chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dbyings su yang dag bsdu dgos pas// las rnams ma lus rdzogs byed de// kun tu las

ni ljang khu'i mdog/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la// cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med/ kha dog nag po'i dngos po la// tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med// de bzhin kun la shes par byos// phyogs lnga
zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin du// dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la// ye shes rtogs pas don bya'i phyir// phyogs dang dbus su gnas par byas// sems can ma rig ldongs pa
la// nyon mongs ma lus gsal bya'i phyir// ye shes sgron ma'i 'od 'bar bas// ma rig mun pa sel bar byed// de phyir de la shar zhes bya// sems can ma lus thams cad la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi
gnas shing// ma rig mun pa nub gyur pas// de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun// ye shes chen pos bdag med par// sdug bsngal rab tu byang byas pas// de la byang gi

phyogs zhes bya// de ltar ma lus thams cad la// thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub// rnam rtog mtshan nyid byang gyur pa// de ni yon tan chen po rdzogs// de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun// de bzhin nyid kyi
dbyings su 'dus// phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid de bzlum pa'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta// ma rig phyin ci log rnams kyis// phyogs rnams so sor bzung gyur
na// rtag tu nyon mongs 'khor bar 'gyur// dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yul lnga dag la dbang byed pa'i// phyin ci log ni dngos por 'dzin// dngos por gzung bas 'khor bar
'khyams// gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la// snang zhing dngos po med pa dang// lha dang lha mo'i dngos por brtag/ bdag dang lha nyid gnyis med pa'o// sgra rnams sna tshogs grag pa yang// sgra nyid

dngos po med par shes// sgra brjod ma lus thams cad ni// chos kyi sgra chen sna tshogs yin// dri yi dngos por snang ba yang// dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med// dri snom chos kyi dri yin te// shes rab chen pos de

ltar rtogs// ro yi dngos por snang ba yang// ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin// ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi'o// bde ba de yis tshim par byed// reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang// reg bya'i dngos po yod min te// reg

byar snang ba longs spyod yin// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis// dbang po yul la chags gyur na// rtag tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing// ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad// rtswa dang
sogs ma'i me bzhin du/ khams gsum dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de bas ye shes chags med rtogs// byas la mi sogs bsod nams tshogs// kun la spyod cing ma gos pas// ye shes chen po rtag tu

bsgoms// mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang gi chos thams cad don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa dang/ kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob dbyer med par mnyam pa

dang/ chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang/ rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o// de la don dam pa skye ba med par mnyam pa ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid
dang stong pa'i mtha'// yang dag nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// mtshan nyid med cing dmigs su med// gzung du med cing smon pa med// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid

med// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa ni// 'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang// sprul snang bya ba thams cad byed// rtog pa kun gyi tshad mar
snang// 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te// bya byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnas// thams cad snang la rang bzhin med// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ni// chos rnams ma
lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung// med dang yod pa gnyis ka min// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang// snang ba nyid na dngos po med// dngos

med de nyid sna tshogs pa// de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// 'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las// ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gzhi rtsa

yod pa ma yin te// rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar byung// so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni// thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam// mtshan 'dzin so sor gnas pa ni// shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam// rnam par
shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni/ rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa// rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi// 'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
kun// nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing// kun kyang dbyer med nyid yin pas// thams cad me long blta ba'i tshul// thams cad kun la yud rtog cing// rtogs dang brtag par bya ba med// dus gsum du yang mi
dmigs pa// 'di ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin// log rtog dbang po'i spyod yul sa// dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med par// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// mnyam pa
rnam lnga de ltar brtag/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang// thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtag/ 'di ni yang dag rtogs pa yin// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam

tshig ni// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang// 'khor gyi khro
bo khro mo'o// yang na 'das pa dkyil nyid de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor nyid do// chos kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing// byang chub sems dang ma chags
pa'i// gnyis su med par thim gyur nas// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan// 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor

dang// gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtag/ thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni// chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang// ngan song sbyong zhing thar lam ston// stong gsum grags pa'i sgra chen dang// thams cad 'jal ba'i
sgra yang yin// bde ba tshim byed bsod nams te// brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin// 'di ni chags med ma yi gsung// chos nyid dngos po med pa la// dri yis mchog tu tshim byed pa// bsod nams tshogs
chen yin par bshad// chags med ye shes tshul yin te// de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na// rigs 'dzin rnams la bskul bar 'gyur// ngan song gsum du chos kyi dri// kun tu bde gnas thob par byed// sgyu
'phrul dra ba las/ dam tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ bdag dang sems can dbyer med par
yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'dus shing/ bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po'i gtso// kun rdzob sgyu mar

zhal mthong ba'i// thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing// yul dang rtog pa nyid med par// gang gis de ltar rig pa de// gzhi rtsa med

dbyings skad cig ma// snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas// lta spyod mthun pas zhal mthong yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chos

dbyings bdag dang dbyer med par// mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub lhun grub zhing// de ltar gang gis rtogs gyur pa// de ni ye shes mig can te// de yis yang dag snying po mthong// de
nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa// shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin// rang bzhin dbyings nas 'od gsal ba// sems dpa'i mchog tu yang dag gsungs// de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin// de bzhin mnyam rdzogs
lhun grub kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga// rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rtog gnyis bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis// lhar gsal dngos po med bsgoms na// mthong thos la sogs med
pa'i tshul// rang rig ye shes gsal bsgoms na// rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub// 'grub 'gyur nyin na dngos po med// ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis// bdud dpung dkyil du ta la
btsugs// thams cad byang chub zhing bsdus te// gdug pa ngang gis ma dag nas// ta la bcad bsam yongs mi chod// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin// bdag dang ting 'dzin mthun gyur pas// de nyid rdo rje
zhal mthong yin// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bsgoms te// ting 'dzin shin tu 'dris gsal na// thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// kun la dbang sgyur cis mi tshugs// bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer
med de// las mthun ji ltar snang ba bzhin// bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod gcig/ de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chen po rags pa thabs su rtogs// so so'i
mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtogs// gnyis med 'grel pa thabs chen yin// kun kyang shes rab ngang du gnas// snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid la ma g.yos phyir// yod dang med pa gnyis ka
min// gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru med// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// 'dus nyid gnas su ma thebs pa'i// thams cad de lta bu yi ngang// mnyam nyid dbyer med cis
mi tshugs// de nyid sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas yin// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ste// sems dpa' nyid dang rigs 'thun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// rgyud byas phung po khams rnams

kyi// gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig/ sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul// snang ba nyid na dngos po med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs bstan// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnam shes byang chub

sems// yul dus byang chub chen po yin// bdag rtog rnam bzhi khro bo yin// rtag tshad mu bzhi khro mo'o// de sems rang rig nyid ces bya// thams cad dbyings gyur kun tu bzang// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'
yin// gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur na// sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs 'thun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang// sgra yis mtshon nas

don bstan pa// kun kyang yi ge ming tshig bzhin// gang yang dngos yod ma yin te// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang// snang ba nyid na gang yang min// bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang// dngos po med de yang
dag nyid// de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i// sa rdo dran med ma yin te// de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas// gang gis de ltar rtogs pa yi// rigs mchog dam pa'i rgyun yin

te// rdo rje sems dang dbyer med phyir// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pa// kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang// byang chub sems la gnas bcas
pa// dper na mngal dang sgo nga yis// mngon du ma byung bsgribs gyur kyang// rtsal chen gzugs des 'dul ba bzhin// rnam rtog gzugs de bor ma thag/ thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhing// rigs mchog
dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i// dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs// bde ba can gyi zhing yang 'thob// byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi ston pa
po// lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur// bde ba'i rigs mchog kun la spyod// skye rga na 'chi la sogs pa'i// sdug bsngal zad
pa'i go 'phang thob// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje rigs su 'dren par byed// bdud sde tshar gcod nyon mongs
'dul// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// mi rtag pa yi tshul yang ston// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// byang chub rnams la rab byung tshul// bla med theg
pa sangs rgyas tshul// lhun grub rnams la rdo rje'i dbyings// kun la mthun pa'i tshul ston yang// rang bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du cir yang ston// snang stong rdo rje nam

mkha'i spyan// sku gsung rdo rje nam mkha'i skus// bla med theg pa rdo rje che// 'og min 'dzam gling dus gcig tu// thugs nyid lhun grub rnams la snang// der snang ji bzhin gsung nyid kyang// zla ba gzugs

brnyan bzhin du snang// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de lta bu yi ngang du gnas// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab kyis rdo rje
sems dpa' zhal mthong ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen pos/ dbang po dang yul gyi mtshan nyid 'di ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// dbang po yul du snang ba

kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang te// snang ba'i dngos po rnams gshig na// so so'i mtshan nyid dngos med par// nam mkha'i de nyid lngas
gzhigs na// gzhigs na nam mkha'i ngang du zha// nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim// thim gyur dbyings nas kun 'byung bas// thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas
so// gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma// skad cig ma yi dbyings nyid las// cir yang snang yang mi 'gag pa// de nyid thabs kyi mchog yin te// snang ba'i rang bzhin med par ni// bya byed byed pa shes rab

nyid// nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni// kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la// nga dang bdag tu rnam par rtog/ bde sdug mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// phyin ci log gis gzung gyur kyang// kun gzhi dngos po med pas
na// bag chags bsag pa'i gnas med de// snang ba dngos po med pa la// nyon mongs blo yis blang du med// bgo dang bgo bar bya ba min// de ltar bgo byed dngos po med// de bzhin sems kyi log brtags
pas/ khams gsum btson rar rtag par 'khor// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka la// skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin// rtog pa nyid kyang ma grub na// yul gyi dngos po ga la

grub// yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni// snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa// phyi ma ma byung rtag tu med// da lta rang bzhin dmigs su med// rtswa shing kha nas rlung 'phyo 'dra// rgyun ni yongs su ma chad pa// 'di ni kun
tu 'byung ba yin// de ltar don rnams dngos po med// chu dang rlung bang rlabs 'dra bar// de bzhin gcig dang so so min// de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid// gcig pa min te so so min// chos
kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsum// dbyer med gcig gi ngang yin te// gcig kyang gcig tu brjod pa med// de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin// rtogs na sangs
rgyas gud na med// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// mtshan mas mtshon du med pa ste// shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba// yangs shing rgya cher gting zab pa// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te// gang
nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// 'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min// brtag dka' shin tu mi dmigs te// mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs med tshul du der

snang ngo// dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang// rang rig kha na tsam du zad// rang rig bstan du med par ni// sems can ma lus thams cad kyis// de ltar khong du chud par byos// nyon mongs sdug bsngal

med pa dang// bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rtsa ba snying rje chen po yis// sems can ma lus thams cad la// snying rje theg pa ma chad par// nyon mongs lam las bsgral ba'i phyir// byams pas sems can

kun zin gyis// de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la// snying rje'i zhags pa che brkyang nas// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen po skyo ma byed// de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la// las kyi sgrib pas
mi gos shing// thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par// dga' ba dag la 'gyod ma byed// sems can nga dang bdag med la// thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi byed de// bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad
dri ma med par bya// chos rnams thams cad stong pa bas// de la dngos dang rtog pa med// nam mkha'i ngang la gnas pa la// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// snang
ba thams cad dngos med pas// yod dang med pa thams cad kun// mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigs so// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang// bdag las gzhan pa ma
yin pas// kun la smon cing chags su med// byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni// shin tu bdag dka' gting zab pas// rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de
nyid ji lta bur// byang chub de ni sems yin no// sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang// dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin// thams cad ma lus chos so
cog/ sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub// rdzun med dpa' bos de skad bshad// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad// spyod pa nyid na chags med cing// dus mtha'
med par mnyam par gnas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la// mngon sum tshad mas brtag mthong yang// snang ba nyid na dngos po med// de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs// gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod

ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa ste// ri bong rwa dang mo gsham bu// tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyang// thams cad ming tsam stong pa nyid// thams cad ma lus stong zhes te// dran med gdos pa ma yin
pas// rtog med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// gdos pa can gyi chos min te// shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o// thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na// de nyid don dam dbyings
yin te// gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med// yod pas btsal na sgro btags 'gyur// med pas btsal na skur btab te// yod med gnyis las btsal byas na// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// rnam par

rtog pa mi mnga' ste// de yis mi mkhyen gang yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu// tshig gis snga phyi yod med kyang// don gyi cig char rdzogs par bsgom// de lta bu yi don rtogs na// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod
longs spyod kyang// theg chen bsgom las nyams pa med// gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i// blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyang nas// ma rtogs le los snyoms las byas// don ma grub par ngan song 'gro// sems
kyis mnyam pa ma rtogs na// tshig gis mnyam pas 'tshang mi rgya// de bas don tshig ldan par byos// 'on kyang the tsom med pas 'grub// rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis// dus mtha' med par de ltar

bsgom// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig/ rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// des ni byang chub snying po len// zhes rdo rje

gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen po des/ sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams

cad phyag rgyar bsdus nas phyi nang snod bcud thams cad 'di ltar brtag cing// phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang// dam tshig gi gnas yin no// phyag rgyar bsdu zhing spro ba'ang 'di yin no// de rnams kyi ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba de nyid nges pa las// byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o// mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus par// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// ye
nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid// mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba med// de bzhin nyid kyi ngang nyid du// chos rnams ma 'dus gang yang med// de phyir de bzhin nyid du 'ub// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
rten pa'i// brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun// chos nyid ngang las ma gtogs pa// log rtog nyon mongs rdul tsam med// phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od 'bar yang// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te// bdag nyid
dbyings las mi gzhan te// mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi// rnam gsum tshul gyi bsgom byas shing// phyag rgya bskyed cing log 'dul ba// bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par

byed// de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/ rim gyis phyag rgya bskyed pa ni// bdag nyid phyag rgya kun gyi mchog/ de bzhin nyid kyi snying po ni// ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// byang chub skye 'khrung rgyu yang
yin// 'bras bu yang dag mchog kyang 'bar// rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa// bcu gsum lhun gnas don grub pa// bde gnas bla na med pa'i bla// mthar phyin gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o// rang bzhin phyag
rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// rigs lnga bde gshegs yab yum du// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thams cad shes rab nyid la rol// de ming

ma chags tshogs chen po// yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs// lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// nang gi rtags ni phyi ru ste// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug pa dang// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// lag gi 'du 'phro
bsam yas dang// yan lag stabs chen bsgul bsigs kun// nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas// 'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa// rang byung chen po lha yi

lha// rdo rje cha mchog phyag rgya che// thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed// dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags par bya// las dang las kyis mi gos pa// gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing// ma chags pa la chags
pa dang// shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la// sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes// yon tan mi zad gter du 'gyur// 'di ni mi zad par ldan pa'i// sku gsung thugs ni rdzogs
byed pa'o// rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// gdul bya'i don ched bsam mi khyab// 'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung ba// thams cad dbang bsdus don grub pa// ma lus
kun 'dus rnam par dag/ kun nas bzlums shing 'od zer 'phro// rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus// rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste// lhun grub dkyil
'khor ngang nyid du// phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni// thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin// dper na rgyal pos rgya btab na// sems can kun gyis yongs mi 'da'// de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag

rgya yis// kun la khyab cing thams cad snang// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun// mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang byar med// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na// 'di lta bu la

rtag tu gnas// de lta bu yi blo med na// rdo rje'i rigs su yongs ma bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ phyag rgya dam tshig gi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen pos rgyud kyi don 'di gtad pa'i phyir/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pas// gtsug gi nor ltar kun 'byung ba// ye shes dag pa gsang

ba'i snying// rin po che yi gsang sgrom nas// thugs kyi ljags kyi pad+mas ni// bcom ldan rnams la bshad byas pas// de bzhin bcom ldan rnams kyis kyang// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis// dkyil 'khor rnam

bdun bzung ba dang// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi// mnyam pa'i lam la gnas par gyis// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis// lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// nam mkha'i lus dang nam mkha'i yid// nam mkha'i thugs

dang ldan par gyis// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis// rtsa ba mi spang dang du blang// dam tshig 'phrin las ma lus pa// lus kyi yan lag bzhin du gyis// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya rnams// rgyal ba'i dkyil

'khor nyid dang ni// mchod pa dam pa nyid du gzung// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang// lag na rdo rje can gyis ni// nges par gsungs pa gzung ba'i phyir// kun gyis mgrin gcig bsdebs nas ni// bdag po rgyud la phyag

kyang btsal// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa// ye shes dag pa'i snying po la// gtsug gi nor ltar de bzhin 'dud// rin po che yi gsang ba'i sgrom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la// de la rtag par bzhin phyag 'tshal// nges pa'i

dkyil 'khor rnam bdun dang// mi gnas mnyam pa'i lam de la// phyag 'tshal de bzhin phyag kyang 'tshal// lus ngag yid gsum nam mkha' ltar// rang bzhin 'od gsal dngas pa la// de la'ang rtag pa'i bzhin phyag 'tshal// rtsa ba

bco lnga mchog gi gtso// dam tshig 'phrin las ma lus pa'ang// de la'ang rtag pa'i bzhin phyag 'tshal// phyogs bcu'i gzugs sgra ma lus pa// sna tshogs bsgyur ba'i 'phrul mo che// de la'ang rtag pa'i bzhin phyag

'tshal// e ma ho kun tu bzang po dang// e ma ho ri ngo mtshar rmad kyi rgyud// e ma ho mdzes khyad par can// de la rtag tu'ang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo// e ma go sgyu 'khrul dra ba la// e ma lus kyi mgo bzhin du// de bzhin mi
'gral 'dud par bgyid/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sku 'khrul dra ba las de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos rgyud gtad pa dang/ 'khor rnams kyis rgyud gzung ba'i le'u ste sum cu gsum
pa'o//// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdzogs so////
